column2: A Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sãakpãmɩne nɩ nyã, wʊ yin a Nãa David nɩ Abraham bal pɔ,
Abraham lɛ ɩ Isaakɩ sãa, ka Isaakɩ mɩ ɩ Jekɔb sãa, ka Jekɔb mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ Juda sãa nɩ a wʊ yɛɛr,
ka Juda mɩ ɩ Perejɩ nɩ Jera sãa, ka ba ma di Tamar, nɩ Perejɩ na ɩ Hejoron sãa, ka Hejoron mɩ ɩ Aram sãa,
ka Aram mɩ ɩ Aminadab sãa, ka Aminadab mɩ ɩ Nason sãa, ka Nason mɩ ɩ Salmon sãa,
ka Salmon mɩ ɩ Boajɩ sãa, ka a wʊ ma di Worahab, ka Boajɩ mɩ ɩ Obed sãa, a wʊ ma lɛ Wʊruf, ka Obed mɩ ɩ Jesɩ sãa,
ka Jesɩ mɩ ɩ a Nãa David sãa. David lɛ ɩ a Solomon sãa, ka a wʊ ma dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a Yurɩya pɔɔ.
Ka a Solomon mɩ ɩ Wʊrehobom sãa, ka Wʊrehobom mɩ ɩ Abija sãa, ka Abija mɩ ɩ Asa sãa,
ka Asa mɩ ɩ Jehosafatɩ sãa, ka a Jehosafatɩ mɩ ɩ Jehoram sãa, ka Jehoram mɩ ɩ Yujiya sãa,
ka Yujiya mɩ ɩ Jotam sãa, ka Jotam mɩ ɩ Ahajɩ sãa, ka Ahajɩ mɩ ɩ Hɛjɩkiya sãa,
ka Hɛjɩkiya mɩ ɩ Manasɛ sãa, ka Manasɛ mɩ ɩ Amɔn sãa, ka Amɔn mɩ ɩ Josiya sãa,
ka Josiya mɩ ɩ Jekoniya sãa, nɩ a wʊ yɛɛr a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban bar a ba tẽe tɩ chen tɩ kpɩɛrɛ Babilon tẽe.
Ban wa tɩ be a Babilon tẽe pɔ, Jekoniya lɛ ɩ a Sealtɩɛl sãa, ka Sealtɩɛl ɩ Jerubabel sãa,
ka Jerubabel mɩ ɩ Abiud sãa, ka Abiud mɩ ɩ Eliyakim sãa, ka Eliyakim mɩ ɩ Ajor sãa,
ka Ajor mɩ ɩ Jadɔk sãa, ka Jadɔk mɩ ɩ Achɩm sãa, ka Achɩm mɩ ɩ Ɛliud sãa,
ka Ɛliud mɩ ɩ Elɩyajar sãa, ka Elɩyajar mɩ ɩ Matan sãa, ka Matan mɩ ɩ Jekɔb sãa,
Jekɔb mɩ lɛ ɩ a Josefʊ sãa na ɩ Mɛɛr sɩrɛ 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Yesu ma, a Yesu nyã lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.

An yi Abraham tɩ ta a Nãa David, a Yesu sãakpãmɩne ɩ naa pie nɩ anaar, an yi Nãa David tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a ba dɔ̃dɔ̃mɔ̃sɩ na nyɔɔr ba chiin a Babilon wɛr pɔ ba mɩ ɩ naa pie nɩ anaar, an lɛ yi a ba gbãgbaar ɩfʊ a Babilon wɛr pɔ tɩ tãn a Nɩ-iraa a ba mɩ ɩ pie nɩ anaar.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto dɔɔfʊ yele tu. A wʊ ma Mɛɛr ŋmaan na Josefʊ baraa tɩchɛ baa kul taa sɛrɛ ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ vɛ̃ ka wʊ tara pʊɔ.
A wʊ baraa Josefʊ na ɩ nɩtor jũu, ba bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ su wʊ vĩ nɩyɔɔ pɔ ɛ, ka wʊ tɩɛr ɩka wʊ sɔɔl bar wʊ jaa jomm.
Wʊn wa tɩɛr a yele nyã maalfʊ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn malaka wa a wʊ sɛ̃ jãn pɔ wa 'yɛr, “Josefʊ, David bie, ta joro dãbãɛ ɩka fʊ de a Mɛɛr ka wʊ ɩ a fʊ pɔɔ ɛ, a bie na be a wʊ pʊɔm yin a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kpɛ̃ɔ pɔ.
Wʊn dɔɔn dabile ka fʊ na bʊɔlɔ a wʊ yuor Yesu, 'lɔ lɛ na faa a wʊ nɩbɛ yin a ba yeldɛbɛ pɔ.”
Anyã a jaa ɩ naa ka a wiil a sɩ Soro 'yɛrbie wʊn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr tu a wʊ 'yɛ'yɛrɛ pɔ ɩ yelmãɛ,
“Nyɛ a pɔɔsarbile na tara na pʊɔ dɔɔ dabile, ban 'yɔ̃ɔn a wʊ yuor Emanuwɛl,”
Josefʊ na wa jɛɔ a gʊ̃ɔ pɔ, wʊ ɩn a lɛ jaa a Nãaŋmɩn malaka na 'yɛr ɩka wʊ ɩ. Ka wʊ de a Mɛɛr ka wʊ ɩ a wʊ pɔɔ,
tɩchɛ baa lɔɔ sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʊn dɔɔ a dabile, na wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ yuor Yesu.
Yesu ban wa dɔɔ Bɛtɩlɛhɛm tẽe a Judiya paal pɔ a Nãa Hɛrɔd sɔ̃ɔ, yɛ̃ dẽme yin be a Jerusalɛm sapar wa,
na ba wa sʊrɔ, “Nyɩnɛ lɛ a bie be ban dɔɔ ka wʊ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nãa? Sɩ nyɛ naa a wʊ ŋmɛrbir a sapar ɩka sɩ wa puor wʊ.”
A Nãa Hɛrɔd na wa wõ a lɛ wʊ pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ naa, ka Jerusalɛm nɩyɔɔ pʊʊr mɩ sɔ̃ɔ,
be lɛ wʊ bʊɔl a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɛɛ wiwiilbe sʊʊr bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ bɔ̃ɔ a jie 'lɔ ban na dɔɔ a Nɩ-iraa.
Ka ba 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Bɛtɩlɛhɛm na be Judiya, lɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ dɔ̃ɔ sɛb bin,
‘Fʊ̃ʊ Bɛtɩlɛhɛm na be a Judiya paal pɔ, fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ jaa pʊʊrbile a Juda kpãɛn dẽme pɔ, fʊ pɔ lɛ a kpɛ̃ɔ sʊɔ na yi kaara a n nɩbɛ Isɩral.’ ”
Be lɛ ka Hɛrɔd sɔɔl bʊɔl a yɛ̃ dẽme bala sʊʊr ba a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a ŋmɛrbir na pur wa.
Be lɛ wʊ tara ba chiin Bɛtɩlɛhɛm tɩ 'yɛr, “Yɩ chen tɩ yɔbɔ a bie kaa nɛ nɛ, yin wa nyɛ wʊ yɩ lɩɛb wa 'yɛr kʊ ma ka n mɩ chen tɩ puor wʊ.”
Ban wa chɛl a nãa 'yɛr baar, ba yin lo a sɔr chiine, a ŋmɛrbir 'lɔ ban nyɛ a sapar de ban nie tɩ ara a jie 'lɔ a bie na be.
Ban wa nyɛ ka a ŋmɛrbir ara nʊ̃ɔ kpɛ ban yɔɔ jaa.
Ban kpɛ a yir pɔ, ba nyɛn a bie nɩ a wʊ ma Mɛɛr, na ba gbur dumo puor wʊ. Be lɛ ba tũ a ba wʊʊr pɔ ir kʊfʊsɩ na ɩ sɛlma, nyɩnyɩbɩ kãa nyũu nʊ̃ɔ nɩ kãnyũu ala ban bʊɔlɔ sɩmura kʊ wʊ.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ɔ kpãa ba a jãn pɔ, ɩka ba ta lɛ lɩɛb chen a Nãa Hɛrɔd sɛ̃ ɛ, ka ba tu jiyuo kul a ba tẽe.

A yɛ̃ bɔ̃ɔnbɔ na wa chen baar, a Nãaŋmɩn malaka wan Josefʊ sɛ̃ jãn pɔ wa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Vaa ir 'mɔɔ a bie nɩ a wʊ ma, na fʊ jo chiin be Ijipitɩ wɛr pɔ, na fʊ tɩ be a be wa tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn na 'yɛr kʊ fʊ, bojũu a Hɛrɔd nɩ a wʊ nɩbɛ bʊɔrɔ na a bie kʊfʊ.”
Ka a Josefʊ ir 'mɔɔ a bie nɩ a wʊ ma a tãsɔɔ bãɩn jo chiin be a Ijipitɩ.
Be lɛ wʊ tɩ jãnɛ tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a Nãa Hɛrɔd na wa kpi. A yelsɩ anyã ɩ naa lɛ ka a na ɩ yelmãɛ ɩka a lɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɛ'yɛrɛ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩka, “Ijipitɩ pɔ lɛ ɩn bʊɔl a n bie yin.”

A Nãa Hɛrɔd na wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a yɛ̃ dẽme banyã na yɩ a sapar bɛl wʊ naa a suur kpɛ wʊ a wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ sojasɩ ɩka ba chen tɩ kʊ dabile jaa na be a Bɛtɩlɛhɛm na ta yuom ayi bɩɩ na ba ta sɛrɛ ɛ, yi a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ jaa wʊn sʊʊr bɔ̃ɔn yi a yɛ̃ bɔ̃ɔnbɔ sɛ̃.
A lɛ jaa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Jeremiya na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩ yelmãɛ,
“Ba wõn kɔkɔr be a Wurama tẽe pɔ, kõyiel nɩ wuur kpãɛn, Wurachɛl lɛ kõnõ a wʊ bibiir 'yɔ̃ɔ. Ba kpi na, waa lɛ bʊɔrɔ 'maalfʊ ɛ bojũu baa lɛ chɛnɛ go ɛ.”
Hɛrɔd na wa kpi, Nãaŋmɩn malaka wan Josefʊ sɛ̃ be a Ijipitɩ jãn pɔ wa 'yɛr,
“Vaa ir 'mɔɔ a bie nɩ a wʊ ma na fʊ chiin a Isɩral wɛr pɔ, a bala na dɔ̃ɔ bʊɔrɔ a bie kʊfʊ kpi naa.”
Josefʊ vaan ir 'mɔɔ a bie nɩ a wʊ ma chiin a Isɩral wɛr pɔ.
Tɩchɛ wʊn wa wõ ɩka Archelaus lɛ di a nãa a Judiya a wʊ sãa kũu puor, wʊ joro na dãbãɛ ɩka wʊ lɛ chen a be. Ka a Nãaŋmɩn wa kpãa wʊ a jãn pɔ ɩka wʊ chen be Galilee paal pɔ.
Be lɛ wʊ chen Najaretɩ tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a be, ka a lɛ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩ yelmãɛ, “Ban bʊɔl wʊ naa Najaretɩ nɩrɛ.”
Sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Jɔɔn kɔ̃suor mʊɔlɔ a Judiya mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ
'yɛrɛ, “Yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ befʊ, a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ ta na.”
Jɔɔn nyã 'yɛr lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Isaiya dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a wʊ 'yɛr, “Kɔkɔr kɔ̃ɔ lɛ gɔ̃nɔ̃ 'yɛrɛ be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ, chɔɔr a sɩ Soro sɔr, maal a wʊ sɔbie ka a tor.”
Nyɔɔma kɔɔlʊ fuu lɛ Jɔɔn ma su tɩ de gãn a lũn a sɩɛ. Soor nɩ sɩkãa lɛ ɩ a wʊ bʊ̃diir.
Nɩyɔɔ yin a Jerusalɛm nɩ Judiya chiine a wʊ sɛ̃ nɩ a bala na yi a Jordan man koor.
Ba woro naa a ba yeldɛbɛ tɩ wʊ suoro ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ be a Jordan man pɔ.
Jɔɔn na wa nyɛ a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Saduseemɩne na waara a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ sofʊ jie, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩn waa bibiir, an n 'yɛr kʊ yɩ ɩka yɩ jo yi a Nãaŋmɩn suur na waara mɔ̃?
Yɩ vɛ̃ ka a yɩ lɛ befʊ wiil ɩka yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr.
Yɩ ta chɛnɛ ŋmara jir 'yɔ̃ɔn yɩ mãɛ ɩka, ‘Abraham lɛ ɩ a sɩ sãa ɛ.’ N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na tʊ̃ɔn maal a kʊsɩbɛ anyãna ka a lɩɛb ɩ a Abraham bibiir.
A 'lar dɔɔl a tɩɛ pĩlem gu a ŋmaafʊ, tɩɛ jaa ba wa wɔ̃nɔ̃ wɔ̃ sʊ̃n ɛ ban ŋmaa wʊn lɔb 'yɔ̃ɔ bũu pɔ.
“Maa 'lɔ suoro yɩn nɩ kʊ̃ɔ ka yɩ na lɩɛb a yɩ befʊ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ na tara kpɛ̃ɔ gar ma ben a n puor waara, a wʊ nafɔɔr gba ba sɛɛ ɩka n tuo ɛ. 'Lɔ lɛ na de a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nɩ bũu son yɩ.
A ŋmayɩɛlaa ben a wʊ nũu pɔ, ka wʊ na yɩɛl a mʊ̃ɩ a vafʊ jie na wʊ kpaar a bie 'yɔ̃ɔ a boor pɔ tɩ chʊm a sɔ̃sɔɔr nɩ bũu 'lɔ na ba tara kpĩinfʊ bar.”
Yesu yin a be a Galilee chen a Jordan man pɔ, ka a Jɔɔn na tɩ so wʊ a kʊ̃ɔ.
Jɔɔn ba ta bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ so wʊ ɛ, na wʊ 'yɛr fʊ̃ʊ lɛ sɛɛ ɩka fʊ so ma tɩchɛ ka fʊ lɛ wa a n sɛ̃ go?
Tɩchɛ ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Vɛ̃ ka a ɩ a lɛ a pʊ̃pãanyã, a vɩɛl na ɩka sɩ ɩ a lɛ jaa Nãaŋmɩn na bʊɔrɔ.” Ka Jɔɔn sɔɔ lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr.
A lɛ wʊn wa so a Yesu a kʊ̃ɔ baar, a wʊ yi a kʊ̃ɔ pɔ, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ wʊ nyɛ a saaju na yuo a wʊ nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na kaara ŋmam kaar suu wa mar a Yesu ju.
Tɩ a kɔkɔr yɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ a saaju 'yɛrɛ, “A anyãna lɛ ɩ a n binʊ̃nãa ka a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ma 'maa nɩ wʊ.”
A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tara na Yesu kpɛ̃n a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ, ka a tɩɩ tɩ bɛɛr wʊ kaa.
Waa di bon jaa ber lɩjaayi nɩ tãsɔɔ gbulo lɩjaayi ɛ, ka kɔ̃ kpɛ wʊ.
A 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ala ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie, 'yɛr kʊ a kʊsɩbɛ a nyãna ka a lɩɛb bʊ̃diir.”
Tɩchɛ ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, bʊ̃diir tɛɛ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ kʊ nɩrɛ nyɛvʊr ɛ, tɩchɛ 'yɛrbir jaa na yi Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ pɔ.”
A bɛɛr kaa sʊɔ lɛ tara wʊn don a Jerusalɛm, tɩ wiil wʊ a puorfʊ jie na do gar a jaa,
tɩ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ala ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie, ɔɔ lo a tẽe. A sɛb ɩka, wʊn vɛ̃n ka a wʊ malakasɩ gu fʊ na ba nyɔɔ fʊ nɩ a ba nuur ka fu gbɛr kʊ ŋme kʊsɩr ɛ.”
Ka a Yesu mɩ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “A mɩ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, ta bɛɛr a yɩ Nãaŋmɩn kaa ɛ.”
A tɩɩ lɛ tara wʊn don tɔ̃ɔ ju tɩ wiil wʊ a nãa di jiir a jaa na be ka a wɛr pɔ, na a bʊ̃vɩɛlsɩ lɛ an be.
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ɩn kʊ fʊ naa anyãna a jaa, ala ɩ fʊ gbur dumo puor ma.”
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Fʊ̃ʊ Satan nyã tɔɔ yi be. A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, a sɩ Soro Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka yɩ puoro na yɩ tʊ̃nɔ̃ kʊrɔ a 'lɔ tɛɛ.”
A tɩɩ bar wʊn tɩ chen, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn malakasɩ wa sʊ̃ʊ wʊ.
Yesu na wa wõ ɩka ba nyɔɔn Jɔɔn na ba pɔɔ, wʊ chen Galilee.
Wʊ yin Najaretɩ na wʊ tɩ kpɩɛrɛ be a Kapenahum a man nɛɛ be Jebulun nɩ Naftalɩ wɛr pɔ.
Ka a lɛ jaa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Isaiya na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩ yelmãɛ,
“Jebulun wɛr, Naftalɩ wɛr, a man sɔr a Jordan man gɔ̃ɔn. Galilee be a nɩyor na kpɩɛrɛ.
A nɩbɛ na dɔ̃ɔ be libe pɔ nyɛn chãa, nɩbɛ bala na ba dɔ̃ɔ tara nyɛvʊr Nãaŋmɩn pɔ ɛ, nyɛn Nãaŋmɩn chãa kpɛ̃ɛ.”
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ Yesu piel na wʊ mʊɔlɔ 'yɛrɛ, “Yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ befʊ a saaju nãalʊ̃ʊ ta na.”
Yesu na wa de a Galilee man gogoro lana, wʊ nyɛn yɛɛr ayi Simon ban bʊɔlɔ Pita nɩ a wʊ yɛbɛ Andiru na lɔɔrɔ lɔyaar 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a kʊ̃ɔ pɔ. Ba dɔ̃ɔ ɩ jãnyɔɔrbɔ.
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ turo ma, n vɛ̃ naa ka yɩ nyɔɔrɔ nɩbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.”
Ka ba tɔ̃ɔ tãɛ a lɔyaarsɩ bar tɩ na ba turo wʊ.
Wʊn lɛ yɩ a be chiine, wʊ lɛ nyɛn yɛɛr ayi, Jemesɩ na ɩ Jebedee bidaba naa a wʊ yɛbɛ Jɔɔn ka ba be a gboro pɔ nɩ a ba sãa Jebedee, maala a ba lɔyaarsɩ ka wʊ bʊɔl ba.
A ba tɔ̃ɔ tɩɛ a gboro bar nɩ a ba sãa tɩ turo wʊ.
Yesu yɔn a Galilee wile ba a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir tɩ mʊɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ tɩ sãana nɩrɛ jaa baal.
Ka a wʊ yele yaar a Siriya ka ba tara a baalsɩ ba jaa waan a wʊ sɛ̃, bala a baalsɩ nɩ ãgãn ɔbɔ na nyɔɔ, bala na tara a sɩdɛbɛ, banyã baal tãanaa na nyɔɔ nɩ gbɛrfʊ jaa bʊrɔ, ka wʊ sãa a ba baalsɩ.
Nɩyɔɔ yin Galilee, nɩ Dekapolisɩ, nɩ Jerusalɛm, nɩ Judiya nɩ a Jordan man gɔ̃ɔn wa turo wʊ.
Yesu na wa nyɛ a nɩyɔɔ, wʊ don tɔ̃ɔ ju, wʊn wa tɩ jɛ̃ baar ka a wʊ poturbo wa a wʊ sɛ̃.
A wʊ piel wile ba 'yɛrɛ,
“Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ a yɩn banyãna na ba tara bon jaa ɛ, tɩ bʊɔrɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʊɔrɔ. Yɩn lɛ so a saaju nãalʊ̃ʊ.
Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ a yɩn na kõnõ, Nãaŋmɩn na 'maan a yɩ nyãa.
Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ a yɩn na siir a yɩ mãɛ. Nãaŋmɩn na kʊ ban bon jaa na be a wɛr pɔ.
Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ banyã kɔ̃ nɩ kɔ̃nyũur na kpɛ yeltorsɩ jũu, ban tɩɩ naa.
Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ yɩn banyã na kaara nɩrɛ nɩbaal, Nãaŋmɩn mɩ na kãan a yɩ nɩbaal.
Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ banyã na nʊ̃ Nãaŋmɩn sɩrɛ, nɩ a ba nyãa wʊ jaa, bala lɛ na nyɛ Nãaŋmɩn.
Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ banyã na bʊɔrɔ nyã'maar, ban bʊɔlɔ ban Nãaŋmɩn bibiir.
Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ yɩn bala nɩbɛ na ge yeltorsɩ jũu, yɩn lɛ so a saaju nãalʊ̃ʊ.
“Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ yɩn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ nɩbɛ na tʊrɔ yɩ, na ba gere yɩ, tɩ ŋmara jirsɩ 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr dɛbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ yɩ, a maa jũu.
Yɩ tara pʊpɛl, a yɩ sãyar bɛrma naa a saaju, lɛ nɩ wʊ ju lɛ ba dɔ̃ɔ ge a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na dɔ̃ɔ be be.
“Yɩ kaara fɩka nyaar a wɛr pɔ, tɩchɛ a nyaar nʊ̃ɔ wa baar, ŋmɩnɛ ban lɛ ɩ wʊ ka wʊ lɛ nʊ̃mɔ̃ go? A maa lɛ tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ kʊ bon jaa ɛ, ba ma kpaar bar ka nɩbɛ nɛɛrɛ nɩ gbɛɛ.
“Yɩ kaara fɩka chãa a wɛr pɔ. Yir ban mɛ tɔ̃ɔ ju kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ sɔɔl ɛ.
Nɩrɛ maa chʊm fãtɩn de pɩɛ pɔɔ ɛ tɩchɛ wʊ ma bin a kuorgbe ju kʊ chaar yɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ jaa a yir pɔ.
Lɛ nɩ wʊ ju mɩ lɛ, yɩn lɛ ɩ chãa a yɩ taaba sɛ̃, ka ba na nyɛ a yɩ tʊ̃vɩɛlsɩ na ba pɛɛ a yɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn na be a saaju.
“Yɩ ta tɩɛr ɩka n wan ɩka n wa sɔ̃ɔ a nɛbinãa bɩɩ, a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ wiilfʊ bar ɛ, n ba wa ɩka n wa sɔ̃ɔ yaa bar ɛ, n wan ɩka n vɛ̃ ka a ɩ yelmãɛ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, ɩka a saaju nɩ a wɛr ba wa baar ɛ, a sɛbir bile bʊ̃'yen gba kʊ̃ ir a nɛbinãa pɔ ɛ, tɩ ta a lɛ yele jaa na ɩ yelmãɛ.

A lɛ jũu, nɩrɛ jaa wa sɔ̃ɔ a nɛbinsɩ anyãna ãsʊɔ jaa tɩ wiil a wʊ taaba ka ba mɩ maala a lɛ, na ɩn a bile a saaju nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ, tɩchɛ nyã jaa na maala tɩ wile bamɩne ka ba mɩ maala a lɛ, na ɩn kpɛ̃ɛ a saaju nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.
N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ, a yɩ yeltorsɩ ba wa tɩ gar a nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne ɛ, yɩn ba be na wa kpɛ a saaju nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ ɛ.
“Yɩ wõn ban dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne, ‘Ta kʊ nɩrɛ ɛ,’
Tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ, ala ɩ fʊ nyɛn na yɛbɛ suur, wʊn nyɛn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ, ala ɩ fʊ tʊ̃n yɛbɛ na nyɛn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ a nɩbɛrɛ niem, fʊ̃ʊ wa 'yɛr nɩrɛ ɩka, jɔl nyã, na kpɛ̃n a bũu dagel 'lɔ pɔ.
“Ala wa ɩ fʊ waara nɩ naa a fʊ kʊfʊ, a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lofʊ jie na fʊ wa tɩɛr tɔ ɩka fʊ̃ʊ nɩ a yɛbɛ tara na 'yɛr,
bar a fʊ bon a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lofʊ jie tɩ lɩɛb chen tɩ 'maal a fʊ yɛbɛ tɩ pãa wa de a fʊ bon kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn.
“An ɩ yɩn nɩ a yɩ sãn sʊɔ lɛ chiine a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ jie, yɩ mʊlɔ wʊ a sɔr pɔ, ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, wʊn de yɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ a 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ nũu pɔ, ka wʊ de yɩ kʊ a nɩpɔɔraa ka wʊ mɩ pɔɔ yɩ bar.
Ala be a lɛ, faa be na wa yi ka fʊ̃ʊ ba wa yab a sãn baar ɛ.
“Yɩ dɔ̃ɔ wõ ban 'yɛr ɩka ta gãn nɩrɛ pɔɔ bɩɩ sɩrɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ nyã jaa na wa kaa pɔɔ jaa tãɩɩ tɩ bʊɔrɔ na gãn wʊ, a nɩrɛ 'lɔ gãn wʊ naa a wʊ tɩɛr pɔ.
Ala ɩ a fʊ nũsʊ̃ɔ nɩbir vɛ̃ naa ka fʊ ɩ yelbier, 'loo wʊ bar, a fʊ ãgãn lõboor ãsʊɔ na ba be be ɛ, sa naa a fʊ ãgãn wʊ jaa na kpɛ bũu pɔ.
Ala ɩ a fʊ nũsʊ̃ɔ nũu mɩ lɛ vɛ̃ ka fʊ ɩ yelbier ɛ, ŋmaa wʊ 'lɔ bar, a fʊ ãgãn lõboor ãsʊɔ na ba be be ɛ, sa naa a fʊ ãgãn wʊ jaa na kpɛ bũu pɔ.
“A mɩ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩka, nɩrɛ nyã jaa na tɔr a wʊ pɔɔ bar, wʊ kʊ wʊ a pɔɔ bar gãn.
Tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, nɩrɛ nyã jaa na tɔr a wʊ pɔɔ bar, ala baa ɩ wʊ sɛ̃nɛ naa ɛ, vɛ̃n kʊ ɩ sɛ̃sɛ̃nɛ, nɩrɛ nyã jaa na kul a pɔɔ 'lɔ mɩ ɩn sɛ̃sɛ̃nɛ.
“Yɩ mɩ lɛ wõn ban dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne, ‘Yɩ taa sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a nɛɛ 'lɔ yɩn põl 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩ mãɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ tara a lɛ yɩn põl 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro.’
Tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ, yɩ ta pɔ jaa ɛ, yɩ ta pɔn a saaju gba ɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn jaa jie lɛ,
bɩɩ a wɛr ju, a wʊ gbɛr dɔɔlfʊ jie lɛ bɩɩ Jerusalɛm ɛ, bojũu be lɛ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ kpɩɛrɛ.
Ta pɔn a fʊ ju ɛ, fʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka a fʊ jukɔɔl ãsʊɔ pɛl bɩɩ sɔb ɛ.
Yɩ vɛ̃ ka a yɩ ɔ̃ɔ ɩ ɔ̃ɔ ka a yɩ kai ɩ kai, bon 'lɔ na gar a nɩtɔ̃ yin a dɛɛr sʊɔ sɛ̃.
“Yɩ dɔ̃ɔ wõ ban 'yɛr ɩka nɩbir na yãan nɩbir sãn, ka nyɩm mɩ yaa nyɩm sãn.
Tɩchɛ maa 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ, ta pii a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sɔ̃ɔ fʊ sɔr ɛ. Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ wa 'ma fʊ a tʊkpal nyã pɔ, lɩɛb a nyã lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ.
Ka nɩrɛ wa bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ sɛb fʊ nãa yir tɩ de a fʊ fuu, kʊ wʊ a 'lɔ fʊn su, na fʊ yaa a pʊɔm bon pʊɔ wʊ.
Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ wa fɩr fʊ ɩka fʊ de a wʊ tuor tuo chiin niem bãlãa, tuo chiin tɛɛr jaa.
Kʊ nɩrɛ jaa na sʊɔr fʊ, ta mɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ nyã mɩ na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ pɛ̃ɛ a fʊ bon ɛ.
“Yɩ wõn ban dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩka, yɩ nʊ̃ a yɩ tɔ sʊɔ tɩ 'laar a yɩ dɔ̃sʊɔ.
Tɩchɛ maa 'lɔ 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ, nʊ̃ a yɩ dɔ̃dẽme tɩ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʊrɔ a bala na gere yɩ,
ka yɩ na ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bibiir bojũu 'lɔ lɛ ma vɛ̃ ka a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ pur 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɩdɛbɛ nɩ a nɩsʊ̃n tɩ na wʊ ma vɛ̃ ka saa wa 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na tor nɩ a bala na ba tor ɛ.
Yɩn nʊ̃ a bala na nʊ̃ yɩ tɛɛ, bo sãyar lɛ yɩn nyɛ? A lõpodierbe maa mɩ ɩ a lɛ bɩɩ?
Yɩn ma puoro a bala tɛɛ na ɩ a yɩ nɩbɛ, bo tɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ be be? A bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, maa mɩ ɩ a lɛ bɩɩ?
Yɩ ɩ nɩmɩn a lɛ a yɩ sãa Nãaŋmɩn na be a saaju kaar.
“Yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʊ̃, na yɩ taa mʊɔlɔ a yɩ yeltorsɩ a nɩbɛ niem ɛ, ka ba na bɔ̃ɔn ɛ, yɩn wa ɩrɛ a lɛ, yɩ kʊ̃ nyɛ sãyar a yɩ sãa Nãaŋmɩn na be a saaju sɛ̃ ɛ.

“A lɛ jũu, fʊ̃ʊ wa de bon kʊ nɩrɛ na ba tara ɛ, ta vɛ̃ ka nɩbɛ bɔ̃ɔn ɛ, fɩka lɛ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme na ma maala a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yie nɩ a tẽn pɔ ɛ, ka nɩbɛ na pɛɛ ba ɛ. Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, bala nyɛn a ba sãyar baar.
A lɛ jũu, fʊ̃ʊ wa de bon kʊ nɩrɛ na ba tara ɛ, ta vɛ̃ ka a gubaa nũu bɔ̃ɔn a bon 'lɔ a nũsʊ̃ɔ na maala ɛ,
ka nɩrɛ ta bɔ̃ɔn a bon fʊn maala ɛ, tɩchɛ a fʊ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn na nyɛrɛ yelsɔɔlsɩ na kʊ fʊn a sãyar.

“Yɩn maa wa sʊɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn, yɩ ta ma kaara a nɛɛr ayi dẽme kaar ɛ, ba ma nʊ̃n ɩka ba puoro a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yie pɔ, nɩ a tẽbɛrɛ pɔ, nɩ a sɔchara pɔ, ka nɩbɛ na nyɛ ba. Yelmãɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, ɩka ba nyɛn a ba sãyar baar.
Tɩchɛ fʊ̃ʊ maa wa sʊɔrɔ a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nyã sɩn ba nyɛrɛ ɛ, kpɛ a fʊ die pɔ, tɩ pɔɔ a pãn, tɩ sʊɔr a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn na nyɛrɛ bon jaa, na yab fʊn a sãyar.
Yɩn maa wa sʊɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn, yɩ ta ma 'yɛrɛ 'yɛrbie ala na ba tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ ɛ, lɛ lɛ a bala na ba bɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn ma maala, ba tɩɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na wõn a ba sʊɔrfʊ a ba 'yɛrbiyɔɔ jũu.
Yɩ ta kaara a ba kaar ɛ, a yɩ Sãa den nie bɔ̃ɔn bon 'lɔ yɩn bʊɔrɔ.
“Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ yɩn ma sʊɔr a Nãaŋmɩn. Sɩ Sãa na be a saaju. Sɩ kʊ naa a fʊ yuor tɩɩr.
A fʊ nãalʊ̃ʊ wʊ wa. A fʊ bɔfʊ wʊ ɩ a wɛr pɔ, nɩtãa lɛ a fʊ bɔfʊ na ɩrɛ be a saaju.
Kʊ sɩ a dɩna bʊ̃diir ka a sɛɛn sɩ.
Vɛ̃ a sɩ yeldɛbɛ bar, nɩtãa lɛ sɩn ma vɛ̃ kʊ a sɩ taaba yeldɛbɛ bar ba.
Ta sɔɔ ka bɛɛr kaa nyɔɔ sɩ ɛ, faa sɩ yin a dɛɛr sʊɔ nũu pɔ.
“Yɩn wa vɛ̃ a yɩ taaba yeldɛbɛ bar ba, a yɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn na be a saaju mɩ na vɛ̃n bar yɩ.
Yɩn ba wa vɛ̃ a yɩ taaba yeldɛbɛ kʊ ba ɛ, a yɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn mɩ kʊ̃ vɛ̃ a yɩ yeldɛbɛ kʊ yɩ ɛ.
“Yɩn wa gal kɔ̃, yɩ ta sɔ̃ a yɩ nin a nɛɛr ayi dẽme kaar ɛ, ba ma sɔ̃n a ba nin ka a ba taaba nyɛ bɔ̃ɔ ka ba gal kɔ̃. Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka ba nyɛn a ba sãyar baar.
Yɩn wa gal kɔ̃, yɩ lor a yɩ nie maal a yɩ mãɛ,
ka nɩbɛ ta bɔ̃ɔn yɩn gal kɔ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ a yɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nyã sɩn ba nyɛrɛ ɛ, a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nyã na nyɛrɛ yelsɔɔlsɩ na yab yɩn a sãyar.
“Yɩ ta bine a yɩ nãbonsɩ ka a wɛr ju be kpolo, nɩ sɔrɔ, nɩ na sɔ̃ɔ bar ɛ, nɩ be nãnyisɩ nɩ naa kpɛ ju ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ bʊɔrɔ nãbonsɩ bine a saaju, be lɛ a kpolo nɩ sɔrɔ na kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ sɔ̃ɔ bar ɛ, nɩ be a nãnyisɩ na kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ kpɛ ju ɛ.
A jie 'lɔ a fʊ nãbonsɩ na be, be lɛ a fʊ tɩɛr mɩ ma be.
“A fʊ nɩbir lɛ ɩ a fʊ ãgãn chãa. A fʊ nɩbir wa ɩ a fʊ ãgãn wʊ jaa ma sɛɛn na chãa.
Tɩchɛ a fʊ nɩbir ba wa ɩ ɛ, a fʊ ãgãn wʊ jaa ma ɩn libe. Ala ɩ a chãa 'lɔ na be a fʊ pɔ ɩn libe, nyɛ lɛ a libe na jã.
“Nɩrɛ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ tʊ̃ nɩbɛrɛ ayi tʊ̃mɔ̃ ɛ. Wʊn nʊ̃n ãsʊɔ, tɩ 'laar ãsʊɔ, bɩɩ wõnõ a ãsʊɔ toor, tɩ ba wõnõ ãsʊɔ toor ɛ. Yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ tʊ̃ kʊ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ libie ɛ.

“A lɛ jũu, n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a yɩ nyɛvʊr yele wõnõ yɩ ka yɩ 'yɛrɛ ɩka, bo lɛ yɩn di, bɩɩ bo lɛ yɩn nyũ ɛ. Bɩɩ waala ɩka, bo lɛ yɩn su pɔɔ a ãgãn ɛ. A nyɛvʊr ba fɛr gar a bʊ̃diir ɛ, ka a ãgãn mɩ fɛr gar a bʊ̃sursɩ ɛ?
Yɩ kaa a lubil na be a saaju. Ba maa bʊr ɛ, bɩɩ ŋma ɛ, bɩɩ tara boor ma bin ɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ guolo ba. Yaa fɛr gar a lubil bɩɩ?
A yɩ buor sʊɔ lɛ na waal na wʊ tʊ̃ɔ de bɩbir bʊ̃'yen pʊɔ a wʊ nyɛvʊr pɔ?
“Ka bo lɛ vɛ̃ ka yɩ tɩɛrɛ a bʊ̃sursɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ? Yɩ kaa nyɛ a mɔpuul lɛ an ma nʊ̃ɔ, ba maa tʊ̃ ɛ, bɩɩ wob fuu su ɛ,
a Nãa Solomon gba nɩ a wʊ tɩɩr wʊ jaa ba dɔ̃ɔ su fuu ka wʊ vɩɛlɛ gar a mɔpuul a nyãna ɛ.
Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn maal a mɔpuul ka a vɩɛlɛ, tɩchɛ a maa kor ɛ. Nɩbɛ ma chʊm ka a di. A Nãaŋmɩn na ma maal a mɔpuul a nɩtɔ̃, wʊ kaara a yɩn na ɩ a wʊ nɩbɛ gar a mɔpuul anyãna. A yɩ sɔɔfʊ lɛ ba jã bon ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ta waala 'yɛrɛ ɩka, bo lɛ yɩn di bɩɩ nyũ ɛ, bɩɩ bo lɛ yɩn su ɛ?
A bala na ba puor ɛ, lɛ de a ba tɩɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a anyãna pɔ, a yɩ Sãa bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka yɩ bʊɔrɔ naa a bonsɩ anyãna a jaa.
Yɩ de nie bɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ nɩ a wʊ yeltorsɩ, tɩchɛ a anyãna a jaa, wʊn den pʊɔ yɩ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ta waala a bio 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, bio lɛ na waala a wʊ mãɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ. Bɩbir jaa tara na a wʊ yelwõnsɩ.
“Yɩ ta tɔɔr nɩrɛ jaa 'yɛr ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn mɩ wa tɔɔr a yɩ 'yɛr ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn na tɔɔr a yɩ 'yɛr nɩtãa lɛ yɩn tɔɔr a yɩ tɔ sʊɔ 'yɛr. Lɛ fʊn man tɩr, lɛ mɩ lɛ ban man kʊ fʊ.
“Ŋmɩnɛ a fʊ nyɛ dabile na be a fʊ yɛbɛ nɩbir pɔ tɩ ba chɛlɛ a dakpɛ̃ɛ na be a fʊ̃ʊ nɩbir pɔ ɛ?
Bɩɩ ŋmɩnɛ fʊn ɩ 'yɛr kʊ a fʊ yɛbɛ vɛ̃ ka ir a dabile na be a fʊ nɩbir pɔ bar tɩ ba chɛlɛ a dakpɛ̃ɛ na be a fʊ nɩbir pɔ ɛ?
Yɩn nɛɛr ayi dẽme, de nie ir a dakpɛ̃ɛ a fʊ nɩbir pɔ bar na fʊ pãa nyɛrɛ tʊ̃ɔ ir a dabile a fʊ yɛbɛ nɩbir pɔ mɩ bar.
“Ta de bon na ɩ chɛchɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ baar ɛ, bɩɩ lɔb a fʊ bʊ̃vɩɛlsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ dor ɛ, ban nɛb na nɩ gbɛɛ tɩ lɩɛb nyɔɔ fʊ.
“Yɩ sʊɔr, Nãaŋmɩn na kʊ yɩ naa. Yɩ yɔbɔ, yɩn nyɛ naa, yɩ kpoor a pãn, wʊn yuo naa.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sʊɔr na nyɛ naa, ka a 'lɔ mɩ na yɔbɔ nyɛ, ka a pãn mɩ yuo kʊ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kpoor.
“A yɩn na ɩ a sãamɩne, buor sʊɔ bie lɛ na sʊɔr a wʊ sãa bʊ̃diir, ka wʊ de kʊsɩr kʊ wʊ?
Bɩɩ ka a bie sʊɔr jãm, ka wʊ de waa kʊ wʊ?
Ala ɩ a yɩn na ɩ a yelbe-ɩrbɛ bɔ̃ɔn bʊ̃vɩla ma maal kʊ a yɩ bibiir, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an ɩ ka a yɩ Sãa na be a saaju, kʊ̃ de bʊ̃vɩɛl kʊ a bala na sʊɔr wʊ ɛ?
A lɛ yɩn ma bʊɔrɔ ɩka a nɩbɛ ba ma maala kʊrɔ yɩ, yɩ mɩ ma maala a lɛ ban bʊɔrɔ kʊrɔ ba, a nyã lɛ ɩ a Nɛbinãa nɩ a 'Yɛ'yɛrbɛ Wiilfʊ.
“Yɩ tu a dɔ̃dɔr fɩɩl pɔ kpɛ, bojũu a dɔ̃dɔr yal sɔr ɩn jaa kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ tɩ ɩ sɔ̃ɔfʊ sɔr tɩchɛ ka nɩyɔɔ turo.
A dɔ̃dɔr ɩn jaa fɩɩl ka nyɛvʊr sɔr mɩ ɩ jaa kãrakãra ka nɩbɛ bãlãa na tʊ̃ɔ tu.
“Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a jire 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ, ba ma bal ba mãɛ piir kaar tɩchɛ ba ɩn mɔdʊ̃ be be na sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.
A ba wɔ̃mɔ̃ lɛ yɩn bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ban be. Ba ma pɔr 'wɔ̃rɔ gʊtɩɛ ju bɩɩ pɔr kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ nyaartɩɛ ju ɔ?
Lɛ mɩ lɛ tɩsʊ̃ jaa ma wɔ̃n wɔ̃sʊ̃n ka tɩdɛɛr mɩ ma wɔ̃ wɔ̃dɛbɛ.
Tɩsʊ̃ ba wɔ̃nɔ̃ wɔ̃dɛbɛ ɛ bɩɩ tɩdɛɛr mɩ ba wɔ̃nɔ̃ wɔ̃sʊ̃n ɛ.
Tɩɛ jaa baa wa wɔ̃nɔ̃ wɔ̃sʊ̃n ɛ, ban ŋmaa wʊn lɔb 'yɔ̃ɔ bũu pɔ.
A ba wɔ̃mɔ̃ lɛ yɩn de bɔ̃ɔn ba.
“A ba ɩ nɩrɛ jaa na bʊɔlɔ ɩka n Soro, n Soro, lɛ na kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ nyã na maala a lɛ a n Sãa Nãaŋmɩn na be a saaju na bʊɔrɔ.
A bɩbir 'lɔ daar, nɩyɔɔ na 'yɛr kʊ ma n Soro, n Soro, saa 'yɛr Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr a fʊ yuor pɔ ɛ, na sɩ diin a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yɩ a fʊ yuor pɔ ɛ, na sɩ tʊ̃ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ a fʊ yuor pɔ ɛ?
A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ɩn 'yɛr kʊ ba, n ba bɔ̃ɔ yɩ ɛ, yɩ tɔɔ chen be, yɩn yelbe-ɩrbɛ.
“A lɛ jũu, nɩrɛ jaa na wõ a n 'yɛrbie anyãna tɩ maala a lɛ na kaara fɩka yɛ̃ sʊɔ na mɛ a wʊ yir dɔɔl pie ju.
Saa wa naa, ka a kʊ̃ɔ yɩ yaar jilʊ̃ a yir ka a sɛsɛbɛ fu ŋme a yir tɩchɛ waa lo ɛ, bojũu wʊ ara na kʊsɩr ju.
Tɩchɛ, nɩrɛ jaa na wõ a n 'yɛrbie anyãna tɩ na waa maal ɛ, kaara fɩka jɔl na mɛ a wʊ yir dɔɔl bire ju.
Saa wa naa, ka a kʊ̃ɔ yɩ yaar jilʊ̃ a yir, ka a sɛsɛbɛ fu ŋme a yir kʊ lo ka a wʊ lofʊ ɩ dɛɛr.”
Yesu na wa 'yɛr a 'yɛrbie anyãna baar nɛɛ 'maan a nɩyɔɔ nɩ a wʊ wiilfʊ,
bojũu wʊ wile ban nɩ kpɛ̃ɔ gar a ba nɛbinãa wiwiilbe.
Yesu na wa yɩ a tɔ̃ɔ ju suu nɩyɔɔ turo wʊ naa,
a nɩyɔɔ na turo wʊ, ka daba ãsʊɔ na tara kɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ baal wa gbur dumo a wʊ niem tɩ 'yɛr, “N Soro fʊ̃ʊ sɔɔ sãa ma.”
Ka Yesu tur a wʊ nũu sɩɩr a daba tɩ 'yɛr, “N sɔɔ naa, sa.” Ajienaa ka a daba kɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ baal bar wʊ.
Be lɛ ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, taa 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ nɩrɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ chen tɩ wiil a fʊ mãɛ kʊ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrloro na fʊ chiin a fʊ kʊfʊ tɩ ir a nɛɛ 'lɔ a Mosesɩ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ka a di dãasɩɛ.
Yesu na wa kpɛ a Kapenahum a sojasɩ nɩdiere chen a wʊ sɛ̃ tɩ sʊɔr wʊ 'yɛr,
“N Soro, a n tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ lɛ gã a yir ba tʊɔrɔ ire ɛ, na wʊ wõnõ a ãgãn tuo.”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ɩ̃n wa sa naa a wʊ baal kʊ wʊ.”
Ka a sojasɩ nɩdiere 'yɛr, “N Soro n ba sɛɛ ɩka fʊ wa a n yir ɛ, 'yɛr a 'yɛrbir tɛɛ, a n tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ na sa naa.

A maa mãɛ tara na nɩbɛrɛ ɩn joro dãbãɛ, naa mɩ tara a sojasɩ ka ba mɩ be a n pĩlem, maa 'yɛr kʊ nyã ɩka wʊ, chen, wʊ ma chen naa, bɩɩ ãsʊɔ ɩka, wa, wʊ ma wa naa, bɩɩ ka n 'yɛr kʊ a n gbãgbaa, maal nyã, wʊ ma maal naa.”
Yesu na wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃, nɛɛ 'maa wʊ naa ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a bala na turo wʊ, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ. A Isɩral nɩbɛ pɔ gba, n ba nyɛ a sɔɔfʊ nyã tɔ ɛ.
N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka nɩyɔɔ na yin jie jaa wa na ba wa lɔ̃ɔ din a Abraham nɩ a Isaakɩ nɩ a Jekɔb a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ,
tɩchɛ a bala na so a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ, wʊn lɔb ban bar yõo a jilibe pɔ, be lɛ ban kõnõ ɔɔrɔ nɩ nyɩmɛ.”
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a sojasɩ nɩdiere, “Kulo, a ɩ a lɛ kʊ fʊ, fʊn tara a sɔɔfʊ jũu.” A tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ sa naa a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ.
Yesu na kpɛ a Pita yir, wʊ nyɛn a Pita dãɛ ma ãgãn na tɔ kʊ gã.
Wʊ sɩɩr a pɔɔ nũu, ka a ãgãn tʊl baar a wʊ ir maal bʊ̃diir kʊ wʊ.
A jãanʊɔr 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ba waan na nɩyɔɔ a sɩdɛbɛ na tara a Yesu sɛ̃, ka wʊ de a 'yɛrbir diin a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi tɩ sãa a bala jaa an ɔɔrɔ.
Ka a lɛ jaa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Isaiya na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩ yelmãɛ, “Ɩka wʊ den a sɩn baalsɩ a jaa bar.”
Yesu na wa nyɛ a nɩyɔɔ na ŋmaa jilʊ̃ wʊ, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo yɩ gɔ̃ɔ a man gɔ̃ɔn.
A nɛɛ wiwiilbe ãsʊɔ tɔɔn ta wʊ tɩ 'yɛr, “Wiwile, jie jaa fʊn chiine ɩn turo fʊ naa.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Mɔbaar tara naa bɔɔr ka lubil mɩ tara choor tɩchɛ maa Nɩsaal Bie ba tara jie na bin a n ju ɛ.”
Ka a wʊ poturo ãsʊɔ mɩ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “N Soro kʊ ma sɔr ka n kul tɩ ũu a n sãa baar.”
Tɩchɛ ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a daba, “Turo ma tɩ bar ka a kũn ũno a ba mãɛ kũn.”
Yesu na wa kpɛ a gboro pɔ a wʊ poturbo mɩ tu wʊn kpɛ.
Kɔ̃sɛbɛ ir a man pɔ, ka a gboro sɛɛ kʊ̃ɔ ɩrɛ na mʊr tɩchɛ ka a Yesu gã gur.
Be lɛ ba chen tɩ sãɩ wʊ na ba 'yɛr, “Sɩ Soro faa sɩ, a kʊ̃ɔ dire sɩ naa!”
Ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Bo lɛ so ka yɩ joro a dãbãɛ? A yɩ sɔɔfʊ lɛ ba jã bon ɛ.” Ka a Yesu ir tãn ka a sɛsɛbɛ na ta furo ŋmaa vʊʊr ka a kʊ̃ɔ mɩ na ta ɔɔrɔ lo jaa jomm.
Nɛɛ 'maan a nɩbɛ ka ba sʊrɔ taa, nɩ an lɛ a nyã ka a sɛsɛbɛ nɩ a kʊ̃ɔ tu a wʊ nɛɛ?
Yesu na wa ta a Gadara paal pɔ, dɔɔr ayi na tara sɩdɛbɛ yɩn a yar par tuor wʊ. Ban ɩ a nɩbebe jũu, nɩrɛ jaa maa 'la tu a sɔr 'lɔ ɛ.
Ban wa nyɛ a Yesu ba ŋmen chɛlma tɩ 'yɛrɛ, “Bo lɛ fʊ bʊɔrɔ ka a sɩ sɛ̃, fʊ̃ʊ Nãaŋmɩn Bie? Fʊ wan ɩka fʊ wa ge sɩ tɩchɛ ka a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ bɩbir wa ta bɩɩ?”
Do yɔɔ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ara gbʊr ba dire.
Ka a sɩdɛbɛ sʊɔr wʊ, “Ala ɩ fʊn dii sɩn bar, sɔɔ ka sɩ chen tɩ kpɛ a dor anyã pɔ.”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ chen!” Be lɛ a sɩdɛbɛ yi naa kpɛ a dor pɔ, ka a dor a jaa jo tĩgbil suu tɩ kpɛ a man kʊ̃ɔ pɔ gbʊ̃m kpi kpi.
A bala na kaara a dor jon kul, ban wa tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a tẽe pɔ, ba man bon 'lɔ jaa na ɩ a bala na tara a sɩdɛbɛ nɩ a lɛ jaa na ɩ a dor.
A tẽe wʊ jaa nɩbɛ yɩn wa a Yesu sɛ̃; ban wa nyɛ wʊ ba sʊɔr wʊn ɩka wʊ yɩ a ba wɛr pɔ.
Yesu na wa kpɛ a gboro pɔ, wʊ gɔ̃ɔn a man chen a wʊ mãɛ tẽe be a Kapenahum.
Dɔɔr bamɩne tuon daba nɩ fɔbaa nuur nɩ a gbɛɛ na kpi waan wa kpɛ̃n wʊ gaal a Yesu niem. Yesu na wa nyɛ lɛ ban sɔɔ de wʊ, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a baalaa, “N bie ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ, a fʊ yeldɛbɛ vɛ̃n bar.”
Ka a nɛɛ wiwiilbe bamɩne pãa jɛ̃ bʊlɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ pʊʊr pɔ, “A daba nyã fere na sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn yuor.”
Yesu bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ban tɩɛr, ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tɩɛrɛ dɛɛr a yɩ pʊʊr pɔ?
'Yɛr buor sʊɔ lɛ ɩ kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃? N 'yɛr ɩka a wʊ yeldɛbɛ vɛ̃n bar bɩɩ n 'yɛr ɩka wʊ ir chiine?
Tɩchɛ pʊ̃pãanyã ɩn wiil yɩ naa ka yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka maa Nɩsaal Bie tara na kpɛ̃ɔ a wɛr pɔ, na vɛ̃ nɩrɛ yeldɛbɛ bar.” Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʊ a gbɛrɛ, “Ir 'mɔɔ a fʊ bʊ̃gãnaa kulo nɩ.”
Ka a daba vaa ir kulo.
A nɩbɛ na nyɛ a lɛ nɛɛ 'maa ban ka ba pɛɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn na kʊ nɩsaal a kpɛ̃ɔ nyã.
Yesu na wa yi a be chiine, wʊ nyɛn daba na di Matiu na jãnɛ a lõpoo defʊ jie, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ir turo ma,” ka a Matiu ir turo wʊ.
Ka ba 'mataa kul a wʊ yir tɩ jɛ̃ dire ka a lõpodiere nɩ a yelbe-ɩrbɛ yɔɔ wa pʊɔ ba nɩ a Yesu poturbo ka ba 'mataa dire.
A Faraseemɩne na wa nyɛ a nɩtɔ̃ ba sʊʊr a Yesu poturbo, “Bo lɛ so ka a yɩ wiwile 'mataa dire nɩ a lõpodierbe nɩ a yelbe-ɩrbɛ?”
Yesu wõn a lɛ ban 'yɛr, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nɩrɛ na kpɛ̃mɛ ba chiine tɩtɩlɛ jie ɛ, tɩchɛ baalaa lɛ ma chen.
Tɩchɛ yɩ kul tɩ tɩɛr a yele nyã kaa, ‘N bʊɔrɔ na nɩbaal a ba ɩ dʊ̃n bɔɔr lofʊ ɛ.’
Ka a Jɔɔn poturbo wa a wʊ sɛ̃ wa sʊrɔ, “Ŋmɩnɛ a sɩn nɩ a Faraseemɩne ma gal kɔ̃ tɩchɛ ka a fʊ poturbo 'lɔ maa gal kɔ̃ ɛ?”

Ka a Yesu sʊʊr ba, “Fʊn tʊ̃ɔ maal a bala ban bʊɔl a pɔɔ paalaa jie ka ba tara pʊsɔ̃ɔ a pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ na chɛnɛ be a ba sɛ̃ ɔ, ban tʊ̃ɔ naa? Sɔ̃ɔ waara naa ka a nɩbɛ na wa nyɔɔ ma chiin, a ber ala pɔ lɛ a n poturbo pʊɔ na sɔ̃ɔ ka ba gal kɔ̃.
“Nɩrɛ maa ŋmaa fɔpaalaa sɛ choo fɔkoraa pɔ ɛ, 'lɔ be ɩ a lɛ a fɔpaalaa na tɔɔn a fɔkoraa chɩɛr. Ka a chɩɛrfʊ na ɩ dɛɛr.
Bɩɩ nɩrɛ ma den dãbãɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ dãa wɔkoraa pɔ ɛ, 'lɔ be ɩ a lɛ a dãbãɩn na pur naa a wʊɔ ka a dãa kpaar ka a wʊɔ mɩ sɔ̃ɔ. Ba ma den dãbãɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ a dãa wɔpaalaa pɔ, ka a ta sɔ̃ɔ ɛ.”
A Yesu na chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ a anyãna kʊrɔ ba, a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir nɩdiere wa gbur dumo a wʊ niem tɩ 'yɛr, “A n bipɔɔ lɛ kpi ajienaa, wa lɩɛb a fʊ nuur sɩɩr wʊ tɩ wʊn sa naa.”
Ka a Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo ir turo wʊ.
Ban wa de a sɔr chiine ka pɔɔ na lo sɩɛ suoro faara yuom pie nɩ ayi, wʊ gʊɔr a Yesu puor tɩ sɩɩr a fuu nɛɛ,
bojũu wʊ tɩɛr a wʊ pʊɔm ɩka 'lɔ sɩɩr a Yesu fuu wʊn sa naa.
Yesu na lɩɛb nyɛ a pɔɔ wʊ 'yɛr naa, “Ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ n yɛpɔɔ, a fʊ sɔɔfʊ sãa fʊ naa.” A dẽdẽe daa a pɔɔ jãɩ ŋmaa naa.
A Yesu na wa kpɛ a lɔ̃ɔfʊ nɩdiere yir na wʊ nyɛ a ɩɩlpɛɛlbɛ nɩ a nɩyɔɔ na pɔɔrɔ gɔ̃mɔ̃,
ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Yɩ tɔɔ chen be a pɔɔbile ba kpi ɛ, wʊ gur naa.” Ka ba laara wʊ.
A nɩyɔɔ na wa yɩ a yõo baar, wʊ kpɛ̃n tɩ nyɔɔ a wʊ nũu, ka a pɔɔbile vaa ir.
Ka a yele ŋme yaar a paal 'lɔ wʊ jaa.
Yesu na wa yi a be chiine, jɔ̃n ayi turo wʊ naa, na ba gboolo bʊɔlɔ, “Kaa sɩ nɩbaal, David Bie.”
Wʊn wa kpɛ a yir, a jɔ̃n wan a wʊ sɛ̃, ka Yesu sʊʊr ba, “Yɩ sɔɔn de ɩka ɩn tʊ̃ɔ sa a yɩ baal ɔ?” Ka ba 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ɔ̃ɔ, sɩ Soro.”
Ka wʊ sɩɩr a ba nɩbie tɩ 'yɛr, “A yɩ sɔɔfʊ jũu yɩn nyɛrɛ naa.”
Ka a ba nɩbie tɔ̃ɔ yuo yuor. Tɩchɛ ka Yesu kpãkpãan ba ɩka ba taa vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa bɔ̃ɔn ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ba yin tɩ ŋme a wʊ yele yaar a tẽe 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ wʊ jaa.
A jɔ̃n ayi bala na wa lɩɛb chen baar, ba tara na daba na tara sɩdɛbɛ na wʊ ɩ wõo waan a Yesu sɛ̃.
A sɩdɛbɛ na wa yɩ a daba pɔ baar, wʊ piel 'yɛrɛ, ka nɛɛr 'maa a nɩyɔɔ ka ba 'yɛrɛ, “Saa dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ a nɩtɔ̃ a Isɩral jaa ɛ.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Faraseemɩne 'yɛr, “A sɩdɛbɛ nãa lɛ kʊ wʊ a kpɛ̃ɔ ka wʊ dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire.”
Yesu yɔn a tẽbɛrɛ nɩ a tẽbil a jaa pɔ, wile a nɩbɛ a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yie pɔ, tɩ mʊɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ sãana nɩ baal jaa bʊrɔ.
Wʊn wa nyɛ a nɩyɔɔ, nɩbaal kpɛ wʊ naa bojũu baa bɔ̃ɔ a ba ju tɩɛr ɛ, na baa mɩ lɛ tara sʊ̃nɔ̃ ɛ, fɩka piir na ba tara chɩnɛ ɛ.
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo, “A pʊɔ bɛrma naa tɩchɛ ka a ŋmaŋmarba ba waa ɛ,
a lɛ jũu yɩ sʊɔr a pʊɔ sʊɔ ka wʊ bar tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ ka ba wa a pʊɔ pɔ.”
Yesu bʊɔl a wʊ poturbo pie nɩ ayi na wʊ kʊ ba kpɛ̃ɔ ɩka ba dii a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi, na ba sãana nɩ baal jaa bʊrɔ.
A poturbo pie nɩ ayi na ɩ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ yoe lɛ a anyãna, Simon ban bʊɔlɔ Pita, nɩ a wʊ yɛbɛ Andiru, Jemesɩ na ɩ Jebedee bidaba, nɩ a wʊ yɛbɛ Jɔɔn.
Filip nɩ Batolomi, Tomasɩ nɩ Matiu na ɩ a lõpodiere. Jemesɩ na ɩ Alfayasɩ bidaba nɩ Tadius.
Simon na mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a wʊ wɛr yele, nɩ Judas Isɩkariyot 'lɔ lɛ wa gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu.
A poturbo pie nɩ ayi banyã lɛ a Yesu tʊ̃ nɩ a kpãafʊ anyãna. “Yɩ ta kpɛ a nɩyor bɩɩ a Samariya tẽn pɔ ɛ,
tɩchɛ yɩ chen a Isɩral nɩbɛ bala na bɔr a piir kaar sɛ̃.
Yɩ chen tɩ mʊɔl a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ na yɩ 'yɛrɛ, a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ ta na.
Yɩ sãana a baalsɩ, na yɩ sãnɛ a kũusɩ, na yɩ sãana a kɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ baalsɩ na yɩn maal ba ka ba ɩ nɩsʊ̃n, na yɩ dire a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire. Yɩ nyɛn pɔrɔ, yɩ mɩ tɩ tɩr pɔrɔ.
Yɩ ta de sɛlma ɛ bɩɩ diere libie 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a yɩ wʊʊr pɔ ɛ,
bɩɩ 'mɔɔ wʊɔ tara a sɔr pɔ ɛ, bɩɩ 'mɔɔ fuusɩ ayi ɛ, bɩɩ de nafɔbɔ pʊ̃ɔ ɛ, bɩɩ dadiiraa ɛ, bojũu tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ jaa sɛɛn naa wʊ sãyar.
“Yɩn wa kpɛ tẽe jaa pɔ, yɩ sʊʊr kaa nɩrɛ 'lɔ nɩ na de yɩ, yɩ kpɩɛrɛ a wʊ 'yɛr na yɩ wa tɩ yɩn a be.
Yɩn wa kpɛ a yir, yɩ puor a nɩbɛ.
A yir 'lɔ nɩbɛ wa sɔɔ de yɩ, yɩ vɛ̃ ka a yɩ nyã'maar be a ba sɛ̃, tɩchɛ bala ba wa sɔɔ de yɩ ɛ, yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ nyã'maar.
Nɩrɛ jaa baa wa sɔɔ de yɩ ɛ bɩɩ chɛl a yɩ 'yɛr ɛ, yɩ kpoor a yɩ gbɛɛ tã-uul bar yɩn wa yire be a tẽe 'lɔ bɩɩ a yir 'lɔ pɔ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, Nãaŋmɩn na kãan a Sodom nɩbɛ nɩ a Gomora nɩbɛ nɩbaal a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ bɩbir gar a nɩbɛ bala a tẽe 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ.
Yɩ nyɛ, n tʊ̃nɔ̃ yɩ naa fɩka piir na kpɛ jubɛrɛ pɔ kaar, yɩ ɩ yɛ̃n dẽme waba kaar, na yɩ kaara fɩka ŋmama na ba maala dɛɛr ɛ.
“Yɩ gu a yɩ mãɛ, ban nyɔɔr yɩn chiin tɩ kʊ a nɩbɛrɛ na ba fɔb yɩ a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir,
ban fɩr yɩn chiin a paal nɩbɛrɛ jie nɩ a nãmɩne yie a n yuor jũu, ka yɩ na di dãasɩɛ kʊ a bala na ɩ a nɩyor.
Ba la wa nyɔɔr yɩ chiin a 'yɛr tɔɔr fʊ jie, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a wõnõ yɩ a lɛ yɩn tɩ 'yɛrɛ ɛ nɩ a lɛ yɩn na 'yɛr ɛ; bon 'lɔ yɩn na 'yɛr Nãaŋmɩn na wiil yɩ naa a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ nɔ̃.
A ba ɩ yɩn lɛ na 'yɛr ɛ tɩchɛ a yɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na wiil yɩn a lɛ yɩn na 'yɛr.
“Yɛbɛ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ yɛbɛ ka ba kʊ wʊ, ka a sãa mɩ gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ bie. Bibiir kʊ lɛ wõnõ a ba sãamɩne toor ɛ, na ba vɛ̃ ka ba kʊ ba.
Nɩrɛ jaa na 'laar yɩ naa yɩn sɔɔ ma jũu, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sɔɔ ara tɩ ta a baaraa, na nyɛn faafʊ.
A tẽe 'lɔ nɩbɛ wa gere yɩ, yɩ yi a be fɔɔ chen tẽyuo; yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, yɩ kʊ yɔ a Isɩral tẽn bar ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a Nɩsaal Bie wa ɛ.
“Jãjãna ba gar a wʊ wiwile ɛ bɩɩ ka gbãgbaa gar a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ɛ.
A sɛɛn ɩka a jãjãna wʊ nyɛtãan a wʊ wiwile, ka a gbãgbaa mɩ nyɛtãan a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ. Ɩ ba bʊɔlɔ na a yir sʊɔ Beeljebul, yodɛɛr buor lɛ ban pãa bʊɔlɔ a yir dẽme!
“Yɩ ta joro nɩbɛ dãbãɛ ɛ, bon jaa ba be be pɔɔ ka ba kʊ̃ yuo ɛ, bɩɩ bon jaa ba be be sɔɔl ka ba kʊ̃ bɔ̃ɔn ɛ.
Bon 'lɔ n 'yɛr kʊ yɩ libe pɔ yɩ 'yɛr wʊ chãa pɔ, bon 'lɔ yɩn wʊ ka ba bʊl 'yɛr yɔ̃ɔ pʊɔm 'yɛr mʊɔl wʊ a gaɩ jur.
Yɩ ta joro a bala na kʊ a ãgãn tɩ kʊ tʊ̃ɔ kʊ a sɩɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ joro a 'lɔ nɩ na tʊ̃ɔ kʊ a sɩɛ nɩ a ãgãn a bũu dagel 'lɔ pɔ.
Ba ma dãn tiitasɩ ayi kobsɩ ayi. Tɩchɛ ãsʊɔ kʊ lo tẽe ɛ, ala baa ɩ a yɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʊ lɛ ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn sɔr a yɩ jukɔɔl a jaa bɔ̃ɔ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ, yɩ tara na tɔ̃nɔ̃ gar a tiitasɩ.
“Nɩrɛ jaa na wa 'yɛr ɩka wʊ bɔ̃ɔ ma naa a nɩbɛ niem, 'lɔ lɛ n mɩ na 'yɛr ɩka n bɔ̃ɔ naa a n Sãa na be a saaju niem,
tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na chiir ma a nɩbɛ niem, 'lɔ lɛ n mɩ na chiir a n Sãa na be a saaju niem.
“Yɩ ta tɩɛr ɩka nyã'maar lɛ n waan a wɛr pɔ ɛ; n ba waan nyã'maar ɛ tɩchɛ ootaa lɛ n waan.
N wan ɩka n wa vɛ̃ ka ‘Bie nɩ sãa ootaa, ka bipɔɔ oo a ma, pɔɔ na oo naa a wʊ bidaba pɔɔ ka a bidaba pɔɔ mɩ oo a wʊ sɩrɛ ma.
Yir dẽme na lɩɛb ɩ dɔ̃dẽme.’
“Nɩrɛ jaa na nʊ̃ a wʊ sãa bɩɩ a wʊ ma gar ma wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ɩ a n poturo ɛ, nɩrɛ jaa mɩ na nʊ̃ a wʊ bie bɩɩ bipɔɔ gar ma, wʊ kʊ tʊ̃ɔ ɩ a n poturo ɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na ba de a wʊ daa tuo turo nɩ ma ɛ, wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ɩ a n poturo ɛ.
Bala na bʊɔrɔ a ba nyɛvʊr na bɔr wʊ naa tɩchɛ bala mɩ na bɔr a ba nyɛvʊr a maa jũu na nyɛ wʊ naa.
“Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔɔ de yɩ, sɔɔn de ma, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa mɩ na sɔɔ de ma sɔɔn de a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔɔ de a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ wʊn ɩ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ jũu na nyɛn a wʊ sãyar. Nɩrɛ jaa mɩ na sɔɔ de nɩrɛ na ɩ nɩtor wʊn ɩ nɩtor jũu na nyɛn a nɩtor sãyar.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na kʊ a bʊ̃bile banyãna ãsʊɔ kɔ̃'maar nɩ ŋmele wʊ̃n ɩ a n poturbo jũu, yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka a nɩnyɩnɛ kʊ̃ faa a wʊ sãyar ɛ.”
Yesu na wa wiil a wʊ poturbo pie nɩ ayi baar, wʊ yin a be chen a Juu nɩbɛ tẽn tɩ wile na wʊ mʊɔlɔ a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ a tẽn ala na be a Galilee paal pɔ.
Jɔɔn na be a nɩpɔɔ die pɔ, tɩ wa wõ lɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na maala, wʊ tʊ̃n a wʊ poturbo bamɩne
ɩka ba tɩ sʊʊr, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ nɩ na wa bɩɩ, sɩ chɛlɛ nɩyuo?”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ lɩɛb kul tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a Jɔɔn, a lɛ yɩn wõ tɩ nyɛ.
Jɔ̃n nyɛrɛ naa, ka a gbɛrsɩ mɩ chiine, ka kɔ̃kɔ̃n mɩ sa, ka wõn mɩ wõnõ jaa chɛchɛ, ka kũusɩ jɛɔ, ka 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ mɩ ta a nɔ̃n dẽme.
Pʊpɛl sʊɔ lɛ a 'lɔ na ba baala ma ɛ.”
Ban wa chen baar, Yesu piel 'yɛrɛ a Jɔɔn 'yɛr kʊrɔ a nɩyɔɔ, “Bo lɛ yɩ dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ ɩka yɩ tɩ kaa? A jɩmur a sɛsɛbɛ na dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ bɩɩ?
Kai, ka bo lɛ yɩ chen ɩka yɩ tɩ kaa? Daba na su bʊ̃vɩɛl lɛ yɩ chen ɩka yɩ tɩ kaa bɩɩ? Nyɛ a bala na ma su bʊ̃vɩɛl ɛ, nãmɩne yie lɛ ba ma be.
Tɩchɛ bo lɛ yɩ chen ɩka yɩ tɩ kaa? Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ bɩɩ? Ɔ̃ɔ, n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka wʊ gar Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ.
A nyã yele lɛ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka ɩn tʊ̃ naa a n tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ ka wʊ de a fʊ nie na wʊ tɩ chɔɔr a fʊ sɔr kʊ fʊ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka bala jaa pɔɔ na dɔɔ ka a wɛr pɔ, ba ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ gar a Jɔɔn kɔ̃suor ɛ, tɩchɛ 'lɔ mɩ na ɩ a pʊʊr a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ gar wʊ naa.
An yi a Jɔɔn Kɔ̃suoro sɔ̃ɔ wa tɩ tãn a dɩna a Nãaŋmɩn Nãalʊ̃ʊ nʊ̃ɔnɔ̃ naa ka a kpãɛn dẽme sɔ̃ɔ wʊ.
A Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ba jaa nɩ a nɛbinãa dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr tɩ tãn a Jɔɔn sɔ̃ɔ.
Ala ɩ yɩn sɔɔn de, a anyãna 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Elaija nɩ naa lɩɛb wa.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara toor wʊ chɛlɛ.
“Tɩchɛ bo lɛ ɩn de a dɩna nɩbɛ man? Ba nyɛntãan bibiir na ma jãnɛ a ba dãɛn jiir na ba bʊɔlɔ taa,
sɩ pɛɛl a ɩlɛ tɩ yaa sɛɛrɛ bãnɛ ɛ, na sɩ kõnõ kõyiel yaa ŋmara nɩbikʊ̃ɔ ɛ.
A Jɔɔn na wa, waa dire ɛ, na waa lɛ nyuro go ɛ, ka ba 'yɛr ɩka sɩdɛɛr lɛ wʊ ɩ.

Tɩchɛ ka a Nɩsaal Bie wa na wʊ ma dire tɩ nyuro ka ba 'yɛr ɩka di dire nɩ dãburo lɛ wʊ ɩ, na wʊ ɩ a lõpodierbe nɩ a yelbe-ɩrbɛ baraa. A ma wiil a lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na tor, bala wa nyɛ lɛ a wʊ nɩbɛ na kpɩɛrɛ nɩ yɛ̃.”
Yesu pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔn naa a tẽn bala nɩbɛ a be a wʊ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ na tʊ̃, tɩchɛ ka baa sɔɔ de wʊ ɛ.

“Nɛbier ben a yɩn Korajin dẽme sɛ̃. Nɛbier mɩ ben a yɩn Betɩsaida dẽme sɛ̃. A a ɩ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ala ɩn tʊ̃ a yɩ jie, mɩ ta tʊ̃n be a lɛ a Tire nɩ a Sidon tẽn pɔ, ban taa lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr na ba su bʊ̃jarsɩ jɛn tãpɩɛl pɔ.
Tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ daar Nãaŋmɩn na kãan a Tire nɩ a Sidon nɩbɛ nɩbaal gar a yɩn.
A yɩn Kapenahum dẽme, ban 'mɔɔ yɩn don saaju bɩɩ? Kai, ban suun yɩn a kpĩisɩ tẽe. Ala ɩ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ na tʊ̃ a yɩ pɔ mɩ ta tʊ̃n a Sodom pɔ, a tẽe anyãna naa chɛnɛ na wa tɔ dɩna.
Tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ daar Nãaŋmɩn na kãan Sodom nɩbɛ nɩbaal gar a yɩn.”
A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ Yesu 'yɛr naa, “N dãn a n Sãa Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a saaju nɩ a tẽe wʊ jaa Soro, bojũu fʊ sɔɔl a yele anyãna a yɛ̃n dẽme sɛ̃ tɩ ir wiil bibiir.
Ɔ̃ɔ, n Sãa lɛ lɛ ɩ a fʊ pʊpɛl ka fʊ maal.
“N Sãa den a yele a jaa kʊ, nɩrɛ jaa ba bɔ̃ɔ a Bie ɛ, ka a Sãa ba lɛ ɛ, nɩrɛ jaa mɩ ba bɔ̃ɔ a Sãa ɛ, ka a Bie ba lɛ ɛ, nɩ a bala a Nãaŋmɩn Bie na ir, na wiil ban a Sãa.
“Yɩ wa a n sɛ̃, yɩn banyã na bal na yɩ tuo tuor ka a wõnõ yɩ, ɩn too yɩn a yɩ pɛ̃n.
Yɩ de a n daa tuo na yɩ jãn yi a n sɛ̃, bojũu n ɩn jomm sʊɔ, naa siir a n mãɛ a n nyãa pɔ, yɩn nyɛn pɛ̃nfʊ kʊ a yɩ sɩɩr.
Bojũu a n daa ɩn kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃, ka yɩn tʊ̃ɔ tuo a tuor ala ɩn na kʊ yɩ.”
A ba kor ɛ tɩchɛ ka Yesu kpɛ a pʊɔ sãlsɔɔ tala a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar. Kɔ̃ kpɛ̃n a wʊ poturbo, ka ba piel fɔrɔ a bʊ̃bie ɔɔrɔ.
A Faraseemɩne na wa nyɛ a lɛ, ba sʊʊr a Yesu, “Fʊ nyɛn lɛ na ba tu a nɛbinãa a fʊ poturbo na ɩrɛ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar ɔ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yaa kar a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ nyɛ a lɛ a Nãa David na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ nɩ a wʊ nɩbɛ a kɔ̃ na kpɛ ɛ?
Wʊ kpɛ̃n a Nãaŋmɩn yir ka 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ nɩbɛ tɩ de a paanʊ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban ben kʊ Nãaŋmɩn na ba 'wɔb na ba tara sɔr ɛ, ka ala ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrloro tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Bɩɩ yaa kar a Mosesɩ nɛbinãa pɔ lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlorbo a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar a puorfʊ yir pɔ na ma tʊ̃ tɩ na baa bʊɔlɔ a lɛ bier ɛ?
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ ben ka na gar a puorfʊ yir.
A Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr a, ‘Nɩbaal lɛ n bʊɔrɔ, a ba ɩ dʊ̃n yɩn kʊ chʊm kʊ ma ɛ.’
A maa Nɩsaal Bie lɛ ɩ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Soro.”
Yesu yin a be chen a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir pɔ,
tɩ nyɛ daba kɔ̃ɔ nũu na kpi. Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “A tara na sɔr ɩka fʊ sãa baal a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar ɔ?” Ba sʊʊr a lɛ bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba nyɛ a wʊ pɔ 'yɛr 'yɛr.
Yesu sʊʊr naa, “Ala ɩ a yɩ ãsʊɔ tara na pɛr ka wʊ lo bulo pɔ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar, ŋmɛ lɛ fʊn ɩ? A ba ɩ fʊn ir wʊn a bɔɔ pɔ ɛ?
A nɩsaal gar pɛr. A lɛ jũu a sɩ nɛbinãa bar sɔr ɩka fʊ maal vɩla kʊ nɩrɛ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar.”
Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a daba 'lɔ nũu na kpi, “Tur a fʊ nũu.” A wʊ tur ka a nũu wʊ jaa sa kaara a nũu nyã sʊɔ kaar.
A Faraseemɩne yin na ba piel guoro a Yesu kʊfʊ.
Yesu na wa bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ban piel guoro ɩka ba ɩ wʊ, wʊ yin a jie 'lɔ ka nɩyɔɔ jaa turo wʊ. Wʊ sãan a bala an ɔɔrɔ.
Tɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba ɩka ba ta 'yɛr a wʊ yele kʊ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ.
Wʊ maal a nɩtɔ̃, ka a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr tu a 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Isaiya na ɩ yelmãɛ,
“A n tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a nyã ɩn kaa ir, a 'lɔ n na nʊ̃, a 'lɔ a n pʊɔ na pɛlʊ. Ɩn yɔ̃ɔ wʊn a n Sɩɛ, ka wʊ mʊɔl a n 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ yele kʊ a nɩbɛ ba jaa.
Wʊ kʊ tara nɛchɩrɛ bɩɩ ŋmiere chɛlsɩ bɩɩ pɔɔrɔ gɔ̃mɔ̃ yõo ɛ.
Wʊn siir wʊ mãɛ kʊ a bala na siir a ba mãɛ, tɩ na wʊ maal vɩla kʊ a bala na ba tara sʊ̃nɔ̃ ɛ. Wʊn ara na kpɛ̃ɔ tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʊn na vɛ̃ ka a nɩbɛ sɔɔ de a Nãaŋmɩn yeltorsɩ.
A wʊ yuor pɔ lɛ a nɩbɛ ba jaa na tara tɩɛrtɔ fʊ jie.”
Ba waan na daba na ɩ jɔ̃ɔ tɩ ɩ wõo na tara sɩdɛbɛ Yesu sɛ̃. Wʊ sãn a daba baal, ka wʊ nyɛrɛ tɩ lɛ 'yɛrɛ jaa chɛchɛ.
Nɛɛr 'maan a nɩyɔɔ ka ba sʊrɔ taa ɩka, kaa 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Nãa David Bie bɩɩ?
Tɩchɛ a Faraseemɩne na wa wõ a lɛ ba 'yɛr naa, “Wʊ dire na sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire bojũu, a sɩdɛbɛ nãa Beeljebul lɛ kʊ wʊ a kpɛ̃ɔ ka wʊ dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ.”
Yesu na bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ban tɩɛrɛ, a wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Tẽe 'lɔ na ŋma dẽdẽme jɛɛrɛ taa kʊ kor ɛ. Tẽe 'lɔ bɩɩ yir kpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ na ŋma dẽdẽme jɛɛrɛ taa kʊ ara ɛ.
Ala ɩ a Satan diin Satan kʊ yi na wʊ ŋma dẽdẽme ŋmɛ lɛ a wʊ nãalʊ̃ʊ na ɩ ara?
Ala ɩ Beeljebul lɛ kʊ ma a kpɛ̃ɔ ka dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ, tɩ a bala na ɩ a yɩ poturbo, bo lɛ ba tara dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ? A lɛ jũu bala lɛ na ɩ a yɩ 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ.
Ala ɩ Satan diin Satan kʊ yi na wʊ ŋma dẽdẽme ŋmɛ lɛ a wʊ nãalʊ̃ʊ na ɩ ara? Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ lɛ kʊ ma a kpɛ̃ɔ ka dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire wiil ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ ta yɩ naa.
“Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ nɩrɛ na tʊ̃ɔ ɩ kar kpɛ gãdaa yir de a wʊ bonsɩ, 'lɔ ba de nie lũ a gãdaa nyã tɩ de a wʊ bonsɩ ɛ?
“Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba be a n sɛ̃ ɛ, tara man nɩ 'yɛr, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba pʊɔ ma a sɩ kaal lɔ̃ɔ taa ɛ wʊ ma yɛ̃yɛl bar.
A lɛ jũu n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka nɩbɛ na nyɛn yelbier jaa nɩ 'yɛrdɛɛr jaa ban 'yɛr vɛ̃ kʊ fʊ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na 'yɛr 'yɛrdɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʊ nyɛ yelbier vɛ̃ kʊ fʊ ɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na 'yɛr 'yɛrdɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a maa Nɩsaal Bie na nyɛn yelbier vɛ̃ kʊfʊ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na 'yɛr 'yɛrdɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʊ nyɛ yelbier vɛ̃ kʊ fʊ ɛ. Dɩna nɩ daar kɔ̃ɔ.
“Ala ɩ tɩɛ vɩɛlɛ na wʊ ma wɔ̃n wɔ̃vɩɛl, ala ɩ tɩɛ ɩn tɩdɛɛr wʊ ma wɔ̃n wɔ̃dɛbɛ. Tɩɛ jaa a wʊ wɔ̃mɔ̃ lɛ ba ma de bɔ̃ɔn wʊ.
Yɩn waa bibiir! Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩn tʊ̃ɔ 'yɛr 'yɛr vɩɛlsɩ ala ɩ yɩ ɩn yelbe-ɩrbɛ? A ala na sɛɛ a pʊɔ lɛ a nɛɛ ma 'yɛr.
A nɩsʊ̃ a yelsʊ̃n ala na be a wʊ pʊɔm lɛ wʊ ma 'yɛr, ka a nɩdɛɛr mɩ ma 'yɛr a yeldɛbɛ ala na be a wʊ pʊɔm.
Yelmãɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ daar, nɩrɛ jaa na man 'yɛrdɛɛr 'lɔ jaa bʊrɔ na dɔ̃ɔ yi a wʊ nɛɛ pɔ.
A fʊ 'yɛrbie lɛ na wiil a lɛ fʊn be, naa wiil a fʊ sɔ̃ɔnaa.”
Be lɛ ka a nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne bamɩne 'yɛr, “Wiwile, sɩ bʊɔrɔ na ɩka sɩ nyɛ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ na ɩ jãnɛ a fʊ jie.”
Tɩchɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A yɩn banyãna na ɩ a putudẽme nɩ sɛ̃sɛ̃nbɛ tɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka n tʊ̃ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ka a na ɩ jãnɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ kʊ̃ nyɛ ãsʊɔ jaa ɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Jona jãnɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Nɩtãa lɛ a Jona na dɔ̃ɔ gã a jãnele pʊɔm ber ata nɩ tãsɔɔ gbulo ata lɛ mɩ lɛ a Maa Nɩsaal Bie mɩ na gã a yaa pɔ ber ata nɩ tãsɔɔ gbulo ata.
A 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ daar Ninive nɩbɛ na yin 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩn dɩna nɩbɛ 'yɛr, bojũu ba lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr a Jona na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊ ba, tɩchɛ yɩ kaa, a 'lɔ na gar a Jona ben ka.
A pɔɔ nãa na yin be a par a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ daar na wʊ wa 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩn dɩna nɩbɛ 'yɛr, bojũu wʊ dɔ̃ɔ yi be a tẽtɛɛr wa chɛl a Nãa Solomon yɛ̃ 'yɛr, tɩchɛ yɩ kaa a 'lɔ na gar a Solomon ben ka.
“Sɩdɛɛr wa yɩ nɩrɛ pɔ, wʊ ma chen dãlpʊʊr pɔ tɩ bʊɔrɔ pɛ̃nfʊ jie 'lɔ baa wa nyɛ ɛ,
wʊ ma 'yɛr naa ɩn lɩɛb kul a yir 'lɔ pɔ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ yɩ. Wʊ wa nyɛn a yir ka wʊ ɩ yirkpolo na wʊ vɩɛlɛ,
ka wʊ chen tɩ bʊɔl sɩdɛbɛ ayopõi na tara a putuo gar wʊ ka ba tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a be. Ka a nɩrɛ nyã pãa ɩ dɛɛr gar a lɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ be. Lɛ lɛ an kaara a yɩn putudẽme a dɩna.”
Wʊn chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ nɩ a nɩyɔɔ, a wʊ ma nɩ a wʊ yɛɛr wa ben yõo bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba nyɛ wʊ.
Nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Nyɛ a fʊ ma nɩ a fʊ yɛɛr lɛ be yõo bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba nyɛ fʊ.”
Tɩchɛ Yesu sʊʊr a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na 'yɛr a 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “An lɛ a ɩ ma nɩ ba boo lɛ ɩ a n yɛɛr?”
Wʊ lɩɛb tur a wʊ poturbo nũu tɩ 'yɛr, “Nyɛ a n ma nɩ a n yɛɛr!
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na maala a lɛ a n Sãa na be a saaju na bʊɔrɔ lɛ ɩ a n yɛɛr nɩ a n ma.”
A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ Yesu yin a yir pɔ tɩ jãnɛ a man kõkoor.
A nɩyɔɔ na lɔ̃ɔ jũu wʊ kpɛ̃n jɛ̃ a gboro pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a nɩyɔɔ ara a man kõkoor.
Sʊkpar lɛ wʊ lɔɔrɔ wile nɩ ba yelyɔɔ, “Yɩ chɛlɛ, kʊɔraa lɛ yin wʊ bʊ̃bʊrɔ bʊrfʊ jie.
Wʊ tɩ yaara na yʊɔrɔ nɩ ka amɩne lo sɔr pɔ, ka lubil tuur di.
A bʊ̃bie amɩne mɩ lon kʊsɩr pãn ju naa bul tɩ kpi bojũu tãn ba waa ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa nyãa, a bʊ̃bulo jʊɔl naa kpi, bojũu a ba ba nyɩbɛ ɛ.
Ka amɩne mɩ lo gʊʊr pɔ 'mataa bul ka a gʊʊr nʊ̃ɔ fãɩn ba.
Tɩchɛ amɩne mɩ lon kɔjɔ̃ pɔ bul dɔɔ jur kɔbaa, amɩne lɩjaata amɩne lɩjɛr nɩ pie.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara toor wʊ chɛlɛ.”
A poturbo wan a wʊ sɛ̃ wa sʊʊr, “Bo lɛ so fʊn ma lɔɔrɔ a sʊkpar kʊrɔ ba?”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩn 'lɔ ɩn vɛ̃ naa ka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ yelsɔɔlsɩ tɩchɛ a bala na chɛ sʊkpar lɛ n lɔɔrɔ kʊrɔ ba.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na tara Nãaŋmɩn tɩɛr, Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃n ka a nɩnyɩnɛ bɔ̃ɔfʊ pʊɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ, tɩchɛ a bala jaa na ba bʊɔrɔ a wʊ bɔ̃ɔfʊ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn na pɔɔn a ba tɩɛr.
A par nɩ nyã ɩn lɔɔrɔ a sʊkpar kʊrɔ ba, ba ma kaa naa tɩ maa nyɛ ɛ, na ba ma wõ tɩ maa bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ.
Bala 'lɔ an ɩn yelmãɛ ɩka a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Isaiya na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩka, ‘A nɩbɛ banyã na ma wõ naa tɩ ba kʊ̃ bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ, ban ma kaa naa tɩ ba kʊ̃ nyɛ ɛ.
A nɩbɛ banyã nyãn dar naa ka a ba tobo pɔɔ baa wõnõ ɛ, na ba ũu a ba nɩbie, ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, ban taa kãan naa a ba nɩbie na ba wõn a ba tobo, na ba bɔ̃ɔ a par, na ba lɩɛb wa ka n sãa ba.’
Tɩchɛ yɩn 'lɔ, yɩ ɩn bɔɔsʊ̃n dẽme, a yɩ nɩbie na nyɛ, ka a yɩ tobo mɩ wõ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ yɔɔ nɩ nɩtorsɩ yɔɔ ta bʊɔrɔ na ɩka ba nyɛ bon 'lɔ yɩn nyɛ tɩchɛ baa nyɛ ɛ, na ba ta wõ bon 'lɔ yɩn wõ tɩchɛ baa tʊ̃ɔ wõ ɛ.
“Yɩ pãa chɛlɛ a kʊɔraa sʊkpa par,
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na wõ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr tɩ ba bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ, a dɛɛr sʊɔ ma wan wa ir a bon 'lɔ na bʊr a wʊ nyãa pɔ, a bʊ̃bie anyã lɛ, a ala na lo a sɔr pɔ.
Ala mɩ na lo a kʊsɩr pãn ju lɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na wõ a 'yɛr sɔɔ de fɔfɔɔ jaa nɩ pʊpɛl,
tɩchɛ a nɩrɛ nyã ba ba nyɩbɛ ɛ, na wʊ di kãnyir ara bãlãa, a lɛ jũu wõm bɩɩ bɛɛr kaa wa pɔɔ wʊ a 'yɛr jũu, a nɩrɛ nyã ma lo naa.
A bʊ̃bie ala mɩ na lo a gʊʊr pɔ, 'lɔ lɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na wõ a 'yɛr tɩ nʊ̃ a wɛr ju nyɛvʊr yelwõnsɩ nɩ a wɛr ju bʊ̃bʊɔrsɩ fãɩn a 'yɛr ka waa dɔɔ bie ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a bʊ̃bie ala na lo a kɔjɔ̃ pɔ lɛ a nɩrɛ nyã na wõ a 'yɛr bɔ̃ɔ a par, 'lɔ lɛ wɔ̃ wɔ̃mɔ̃ dɔɔ jur, amɩne kɔbaa, amɩne lɩjaata amɩne mɩ lɩjɛr nɩ pie.”
Yesu lɛ lɔb a sʊkpa ãsʊɔ kʊ ba, “Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ ɩn de a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ man. Nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ lɛ bʊr bʊ̃bivɩɛl a wʊ pʊɔ pɔ,
nɩrɛ jaa na wa gã gur baar, a dɔ̃sʊɔ wan wa bʊr mɔɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a chi pɔ tɩ na wʊ kul.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a chi na wa tɩ bulo ka a mɔɩ mɩ bul puro.
“A daba tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ wan wa sʊʊr wʊ, ‘Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, a ba ɩ bʊ̃bivɩɛl lɛ fʊ bʊr a pʊɔ pɔ ɛ; tɩ nyɛ a mɔɩ mɩ yi?’
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, ‘Dɔ̃sʊɔ lɛ tʊ̃ a lɛ.’ A tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ sʊʊr wʊ, ‘Fʊ bʊɔrɔ na ɩka sɩ chen tɩ vɔ̃ a mɔɩ bar bɩɩ?’
“Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, ‘Kai, yɩn be vɔ̃nɔ̃ a mɔɩ, yɩn wa vɔ̃n a chi mɩ bar.
Yɩ bar ka a 'mataa nʊ̃ɔ tɩ tãn a ŋmafʊ daar, ɩn 'yɛr kʊ a ŋmaŋmarba ka ba dɔ̃ɔ vɔ̃ a mɔɩ lũ lũ chʊm bar tɩ ŋma a chi 'yɔ̃ɔ a n boor pɔ.’ ”
Yesu lɛ lɔb a sʊkpa ãsʊɔ kʊ ba go, “A Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ kaara naa fɩka kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ bir nɩrɛ na de bʊr a wʊ pʊɔ pɔ.
'Lɔ lɛ a bʊ̃bie a jaa pɔ bʊ̃bile tɩchɛ 'lɔ wa nʊ̃ɔ, 'lɔ lɛ ma ɩ a tɩɩr a jaa pɔ tɩkpɛ̃ɛ, ka lubil ma 'yɔ̃ɔ choor a wʊ ju.”
Wʊ lɛ lɔb a sʊkpa ãsʊɔ kʊ ba, “A Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ kaara naa fɩka dãbɩl pɔɔ na de 'yɔ̃ɔ jɔ̃ yɔɔ pɔ ka a ir vʊ̃.”
Yesu den sʊkpar 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ nɩ a nɩyɔɔ a yelsɩ anyã, wʊ maa 'yɛr 'yɛr kʊ ba ka waa lɔb sʊkpa ɛ.
A nyã lɛ na wiil ɩka a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩn yelmãɛ, “Ɩka ɩn ma den a n nɛɛ lɔɔrɔ nɩ sʊkpar naa wiil yɩ yelsɩ ala na sɔɔl a wɛr pielfʊ daar.”
Wʊ yin a nɩyɔɔ pɔ kpɛ a yir, ka a wʊ poturbo wa a wʊ sɛ̃ wa 'yɛrɛ, wiil sɩ a mɔɩ na be a pʊɔ pɔ sʊkpa par.
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A nɩrɛ 'lɔ na bʊr a bʊ̃bivɩɛl lɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie.
A pʊɔ lɛ ɩ a wɛr. A bʊ̃bivɩɛl lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ bibiir. A mɔɩ lɛ a bala na ɩ a dɛɛr sʊɔ bibiir.
A dɔ̃sʊɔ 'lɔ mɩ na bʊr lɛ ɩ a tɩɩ. A ŋmafʊ lɛ ɩ a wɛr baarfʊ daar, a ŋmaŋmarba lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn malakasɩ.
“Lɛ ban na chʊm a mɔɩ bũu pɔ ka a di, lɛ mɩ lɛ na ɩ a wɛr baarfʊ daar.
A maa Nɩsaal Bie na tʊ̃n a n malakasɩ ka ba wa tuur a nɩsʊ̃n a nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ, tɩchɛ a bala jaa na vɛ̃ ka a nɩbɛ maala yelbier nɩ yelbe-ɩrbɛ ba jaa 'mataa bar.
Ka ba lɔb ba 'yɔ̃ɔ bũu dagel pɔ, be lɛ ban kõnõ ɔɔrɔ nɩ nyɩmɛ.
A bala na tor na chaar naa mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ kaar a ba Sãa nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara tobo wʊ chɛlɛ.
“A Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ kaara naa fɩka nɩrɛ na nyɛ nãbonsɩ pʊɔ pɔ 'mɔɔ sɔɔl tɩchɛ ka a wʊ pʊɔ pɛl, ka wʊ tɩ da a wʊ bonsɩ a jaa wʊn tara tɩ dãn a puo.
“A Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ lɛ kaara naa fɩka nɩrɛ na yʊɔrɔ bʊɔrɔ kʊsɩvɩɛl,
wʊn wa nyɛ a ãsʊɔ daa na be tuo, wʊ tɩ dãn a wʊ bonsɩ a jaa tɩ dãn.
“A Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ lɛ nyɛntãan fɩka lɔyaar ban lɔb 'yɔ̃ɔ man pɔ, kʊ nyɔɔr jãdẽdẽme.
A lɔyaar na wa sɛɛ ba tɔɔn yin a gogoro ju, tɩ jãnɛ tuur a jãsʊ̃n 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɛr pɔ, tɩ lɔb a jãdɛbɛ bar.
Lɛ lɛ an be a wɛr baarfʊ daar. A Nãaŋmɩn na tʊ̃n a wʊ malakasɩ ka ba wa tuur a nɩdɛbɛ yin a nɩmɩn pɔ,
tɩ na ba lɔb a nɩdɛbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a bũu dagel pɔ, be lɛ ban kõnõ tɩ ɔɔrɔ nyɩmɛ.
“Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a yelsɩ anyã na a jaa par ɔ?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Ɔ̃ɔ.”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A nɛɛ wile ãsʊɔ jaa ban wiil ka wʊ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ yele kaara naa fɩka yir sʊɔ na de bʊ̃paalaa nɩ bʊ̃koro yin a wʊ boor pɔ.”
Yesu na wa wiil a sʊkpar anyã par, wʊ yin a be.
Wʊ wan a wʊ mãɛ paal pɔ tɩ piel wile a nɩbɛ a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir, ka nɛɛr 'maa ba ka ba 'yɛr, “Nyɛ lɛ a daba nyã nyɛ a yɛ̃ nyã nɩ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ a nyã?
A ba ɩ a mɩmɩɛrɛ bidaba lɛ ɛ? A ba ɩ a wʊ ma lɛ ba bʊɔlɔ a Mɛɛr ɛ? A ba ɩ a wʊ yɛɛr nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ Josefʊ nɩ Simon nɩ Judas ɛ?
A ba ɩ sɩn nɩ a wʊ yɛpɔbɔ ba jaa lɛ 'mataa be a ka ɛ? Nyɩnɛ lɛ a daba nyã nyɛ a kpɛ̃ɔ nyã?”
Tɩ na ba tɔr a wʊ yele. Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ nyɛrɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ jie jaa tɩchɛ a wʊ mãɛ tẽe nɩ a wʊ mãɛ yir pɔ, wʊ maa nyɛ 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ ɛ.”
Ban ba sɔɔ de wʊ jũu, waa tʊ̃ɔ tʊ̃ nɛ'maa tʊ̃yɔɔ a be ɛ.
A ber ala pɔ, a Hɛrɔd na ɩ a Galilee nãa wõn a Yesu yele
na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ, “Jɔɔn Kɔ̃suor lɛ tɔ̃ɔ ir ɩ vʊr, ala lɛ so ka wʊ tara a kpɛ̃ɔ tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ anyãna.”
A Nãa Hɛrɔd vɛ̃n ka ba nyɔɔ Jɔɔn lũ 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩpɔɔ die pɔ a wʊ yɛbɛ Filip pɔɔ Hɛrɔdiyas jũu.
Bojũu Jɔɔn ma 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ wʊ ɩka, “A ba tara sɔr ka fʊ kul wʊ ɛ.”
Hɛrɔd ta bʊɔrɔ na a wʊ kʊ fʊ tɩ joro a Juu nɩbɛ dãbãɛ bojũu ba sɔɔn ɩka wʊ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ.
A Hɛrɔd dɔɔfʊ bɩbir dãɛn daar, a Hɛrɔdiyas bipɔɔ sɛn bãnɛ a nɩyɔɔ niem, ka a Hɛrɔd pʊɔ pɛl
yɔɔ jaa ka wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ kʊ a pɔɔbile, “Sʊɔr ma bon jaa fʊn bʊɔrɔ ɩn kʊ fʊ naa.”
A wʊ ma wiil wʊn a bon 'lɔ wʊn na sʊɔr, ka wʊ 'yɛr, “N bʊɔrɔ na ɩka fʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Jɔɔn Kɔ̃suor ju a la'yɛlma pɔ kʊ ma a pʊ̃pãanyãna.”
A nãa pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ naa, tɩchɛ wʊn faa 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɛɛ a nɩyɔɔ niem ɩka a lɛ a pɔɔbile na bʊɔrɔ a ɩ.
Wʊ tʊ̃n ka ba ŋmaa a Jɔɔn ju a nɩpɔɔ die pɔ.
Ba 'yɔ̃ɔn a ju a la'yɛlma pɔ wa kʊ a pɔɔbile, ka wʊ de kʊ a wʊ ma.
Jɔɔn poturbo wan wa 'mɔɔ a ãgãn tɩ ũu tɩ na ba tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu.
A Yesu na wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃, wʊ kpɛ̃n a gboro chen jiyuo 'lɔ wʊ yõ. Tɩchɛ a nɩyɔɔ na wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃ ba yin a tẽn ala pɔ bɩɛr wʊ nɩ gbɛɛ chen a be.
Wʊn wa yi a gboro pɔ, wʊ nyɛn nɩyɔɔ ka nɩbaal kpɛ wʊ tɩchɛ ka wʊ sãa a ba baalsɩ.
Mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa mʊrɔ, a poturbo wa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “A ka ɩn mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ ka a sɔ̃ɔ mɩ po, bar a nɩbɛ sɔr ka ba chen a tẽbil pɔ, tɩ da bʊ̃diir di.”
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A ba sɛɛ ɩka ba chen ɛ, yɩ kʊ ba bʊ̃kɔ̃ɔ ka ba di.”
Ka ba 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Paanʊ̃ɔsɩ anũu nɩ jãmɛ ayi tɛɛ lɛ sɩ tara.”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ de wa kʊ ma.”
Wʊ vɛ̃n ka a nɩyɔɔ banyãna jɛ̃ tẽe. Wʊ den a paanʊ̃ɔsɩ anũu nɩ a jãmɛ ayi ala dʊl kaa saaju tɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan tɩ na wʊ ŋma de kʊ a poturbo ɩka ba de põ a nɩbɛ. Ka a poturbo de põ a nɩbɛ.
Ba jaa din tɩɩ tɩchɛ ka a poturbo wob a bʊ̃ŋmaarsɩ ala na chɛ sɛɛ pɛr pie nɩ ayi.
A bala na di tɩɩ tɛɛ ɩn dɔɔr tur anũu ka pɔbɔ nɩ bibiir ba pʊɔ ɛ.
Ajienaa lɛ, wʊ vɛ̃n ka a poturbo kpɛ a gboro gɔ̃ɔ a man gɔ̃ɔn tɩchɛ ka wʊ vɛ̃ ka a nɩbɛ yaar.
Wʊn wa wɛl a nɩbɛ baar, wʊ don a tɔ̃ɔ ju ɩka wʊ tɩ sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn. Jãanʊɔr na wa ta, wʊ chɛnɛ na be a be a wʊ yõ.
Tɩchɛ a kɔ̃sɛbɛ ŋmen a gboro dãdaal chiin tɛɛr ka wʊ jãan a man nɛɛ, bojũu a kɔ̃sɛbɛ fɔ̃ɔ gar ba naa.
A wɛr na wa chaara wa la la la ba nyɛn a Yesu na chiine a kʊ̃ɔ ju waara a ba sɛ̃.
A poturbo na wa nyɛ a Yesu na chiine a kʊ̃ɔ ju waara a ba sɛ̃, dãbãɛ kpɛ ba naa, ka ba kõ 'yɛr, “Kpĩin lɛ!”
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ tara kãnyir, maa lɛ, yɩ ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ.”
Pita 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “N Soro, ala ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ vɛ̃ ka chiine a kʊ̃ɔ ju wa a fʊ sɛ̃.”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr wʊ, “Wa,” ka Pita yi a gboro pɔ piel chiine a kʊ̃ɔ ju waara a Yesu sɛ̃.
Pita na nyɛ a sɛsɛbɛ na furo yɔɔ dãbãɛ kpɛ wʊ naa, ka wʊ piel mʊrɔ a kʊ̃ɔ pɔ, ka wʊ bʊɔl, “N Soro, faa ma.”
Ajienaa lɛ, a Yesu tur a wʊ nũu nyɔɔ wʊ tɩ 'yɛr, “Fʊ̃ʊ sɔɔfʊ na ba jã bon ɛ, bo so ka fʊ baala?”
Ban wa kpɛ a gboro pɔ baar ka a sɛsɛbɛ ŋmaa jaa jomm.
A bala na be a gboro pɔ gbur dumo puor wʊ tɩ 'yɛrɛ, “Yelmãɛ, fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie.”
Ban wa gɔ̃ɔ a man baar ba chen a Genesaretɩ wɛr pɔ.
A tẽe 'lɔ dẽme na wa wõ a wʊ yele ba 'yɛr lʊɔr a paal 'lɔ wʊ jaa na ba waan bala jaa an ɔɔrɔ,
na ba wa sʊɔrɔ ɩka ba sɩɩr a wʊ fuu nɛɛ, a bala jaa na sɩɩr a fuu nɛɛ sa naa.
A Faraseemɩne nɩ a nɛɛ wiwiilbe bamɩne na yi a Jerusalɛm wan a Yesu sɛ̃ wa sʊʊr wʊ,
“Ŋmɩnɛ a fʊ poturbo ba turo a sɩ sãakpãmɩne wiilfʊ ɛ? Ba maa pɛɛ a ba nuur tɩ di ɛ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Ŋmɩnɛ ka yɩ sɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nɛbinsɩ tɩ na yɩ turo a yɩ mãɛ wiilfʊ?
Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr naa, ‘'Yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʊ sãa nɩ a fʊ ma,’
Tɩchɛ yɩn 'yɛr ɩka nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na 'yɛr a wʊ sãa bɩɩ ma ɩka, sʊ̃ʊfʊ 'lɔ jaa ɩn tara naa kʊ fʊ, n den kʊ Nãaŋmɩn.
Tɩchɛ na waa de a wʊ bʊ̃tarsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a a wʊ sãa ɛ, yɩn ɩ a lɛ, yɩ sɔ̃ɔn Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ, tɩ na yɩ turo a yɩ mãɛ binfʊ.
Yɩn nɛɛr ayi dẽme! Isaiya 'yɛr yelmãɛ nɩ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩka,
‘A nɩbɛ banyãna den a ba nɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ ma tɩchɛ a ba nyãn pɔ, ba tɔɔn jãan ma.
A ba puorfʊ ba tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ kʊ ma ɛ, nɩsaal wiilfʊ lɛ ba wile.’ ”
Yesu bʊɔl a nɩyɔɔ a ba wa a wʊ sɛ̃, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ chɛlɛ na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a par.
A ba ɩ bon 'lɔ na ma tu a nɩsaal nɛɛ pɔ kpɛ lɛ ma sɔ̃ɔ wʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ bon 'lɔ na ma yɩ a nɩsaal nɛɛ pɔ lɛ ma sɔ̃ɔ wʊ.”
A poturbo wa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Fʊ bɔ̃ɔn naa an kpɛ a Faraseemɩne ban wõ a 'yɛr nyã fʊn 'yɛr ɔ?”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Tɩɛ 'lɔ jaa a n Sãa na be a saaju na ba sɛl ɛ, ɩn vʊ̃ɔ wʊn bar.
Yɩ bar ba, jɔ̃n lɛ tɔɔrɔ jɔ̃n. Jɔ̃ɔ wa tɔɔrɔ a wʊ jɔ̃ɔ tɔ sʊɔ ba jaa ma lon bɔɔ pɔ.”
Tɩchɛ ka Pita 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Wiil a sʊkpa nyã par kʊ sɩ.”
Be lɛ wʊ 'yɛr, “A yɩn mɩ na ɩ a n poturbo ba bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ?
Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ka bon 'lɔ jaa na tu a nɛɛ pɔ kpɛ a pʊɔ pɔ ma tun a par bɔɔ pɔ yi bɩɩ?
Tɩchɛ bon 'lɔ na ma yi a nɛɛ pɔ, yin a tɩɛr pɔ, anyãna lɛ ma sɔ̃ɔ a nɩsaal.
A nɩsaal tɩɛr pɔ lɛ a tɩɛr dɛbɛ ma yi, nɩrɛ kʊfʊ, pɔɔdeyele, sɛ̃sɛ̃yele, nãnyiyele, jir dãasɩɛ, nɩ a gagaryele ma be.
A anyãna lɛ a bonsɩ ala na ma sɔ̃ɔ a nɩsaal tɩchɛ nɩrɛ na din nũdɛbɛ ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʊ ɛ.”
Yesu yin a be chen a Tire paal nɩ Sidon paal pɔ.
Be lɛ a pɔɔ na yi a Kanaan paal pɔ yi piel ŋmiere chɛlsɩ, “N Soro kaa a n nɩbaal David Bie, a sɩdɛɛr lɛ tara a n bipɔɔ.”
Tɩchɛ a Yesu ba 'yɛr 'yɛr jaa kʊ wʊ ɛ. Ka a wʊ poturbo wa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Dii wʊ bar, wʊ pɔɔrɔ sɩn gɔ̃mɔ̃.”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “A piir ala na bɔr a Isɩral nɩbɛ pɔ tɛɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ ba tʊ̃ ma.”
Tɩchɛ ka a pɔɔ wa gbur dumo a wʊ niem 'yɛr, “N Soro, sʊ̃ʊ ma.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “A ba sɛɛ ɩka fʊ de bibiir bʊ̃diir lɔb 'yɔ̃ɔ baar ɛ.”
Ka a pɔɔ 'yɛr, “Ɔ̃ɔ, n Soro, a baar gba ma dire na a bʊ̃di pʊr pʊr ala na ma ŋmara loro a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ dakɔɔ pĩlem.”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a pɔɔ, “Pɔɔ, a fʊ sɔɔfʊ bɛrma naa! A ɩ kʊ fʊ a lɛ fʊn bʊɔrɔ.” A wʊ bipɔɔ sa naa a dẽdẽe daa 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.
Yesu na wa yi a be, wʊ den a Galilee man yal kõkoor 'lana, na wʊ tɩ do tɔ̃ɔ ju jãnɛ.
A nɩyɔɔ tara na a nɩbɛ gbɛɛ na kpi kpi, nɩ jɔ̃n, nɩ a gbɛrsɩ, nɩ a wõn 'matãan baalsɩ yɔɔ waan a wʊ sɛ̃. Ba wa bin ban a wʊ niem a wʊ sãa a ba jaa baalsɩ.
Nɛɛr 'maan a nɩbɛ ban wõ ka a wõn 'yɛrɛ, ka a gbɛrsɩ sa chiine ka a bala a gbɛɛ nɩ na kpi kpi mɩ sa ka a jɔ̃n mɩ nyɛrɛ. Ka ba dãna a Isɩral nɩbɛ Nãaŋmɩn.
Yesu bʊɔl a wʊ poturbo wa 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nɩbaal kpɛ ma naa nɩ a nɩyɔɔ banyãna bojũu ba ben a n sɛ̃ ber ata tɩ ba di bon jaa ɛ, n ba bʊɔrɔ ɩka n vɛ̃ ka ba lɩɛb chiine kɔ̃ ɛ, amɩne ban wa lon sɔr pɔ.”
Ka a wʊ poturbo 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Nyɛ lɛ sɩn nyɛ paanʊ̃ɔ a dãlpʊɔ nyã pɔ tʊ̃ɔ kãan a nɩyɔɔ banyãna?”
Ka Yesu sʊʊr ba, “Paanʊ̃ɔ aŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tara?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Ayopõi nɩ jãmɛ bãlãa.”
Wʊ vɛ̃n ka a nɩbɛ jãnɛ tẽe.
Ka wʊ pãa de a paanʊ̃ɔsɩ ayopõi nɩ a jãbãlãa ala na wʊ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, tɩ na wʊ ŋma de kʊ a wʊ poturbo, ka ba de põ a nɩbɛ.
Ba jaa din tɩɩ, ka a poturbo wob a bʊ̃ŋmaar 'yɔ̃ɔ pɛr ayopõi.
A bala na di ɩn dɔɔr tur anaar, ka pɔbɔ nɩ bibiir nũu ba pʊɔ ɛ.
Wʊn wa vɛ̃ ka a nɩbɛ yaar baar wʊ kpɛ̃n a gboro na wʊ chen Magadan paal pɔ.
A Faraseemɩne nɩ a Saduseemɩne wan ɩka ba bɛɛr Yesu kaa na ba 'yɛrɛ, “Wiil sɩ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ na ɩ jãnɛ na yi a saaju.”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Ala wa ɩ jãanʊɔr lɛ, yɩ ma 'yɛr ɩka a wɛr chaar naa bojũu a saaju mʊ̃ɔ naa.

Ala wa ɩ bibio lɛ, yɩ ma 'yɛr ɩka saa na wan a dɩna, a julõjuur sɔb naa ka saa koro. Yɩ ma kãan a saaju tɩ 'yɛr ɩka saa na wan bɩɩ wʊ kʊ̃ wa ɛ, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a tẽe nɩ a saaju 'yɛr ma 'yɛr, ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a jãnsɩ a dɩna ɛ?
Yɩn yelbe-ɩrbɛ nɩ sɛ̃sɛ̃nbɛ lɛ bʊɔrɔ ɩka n tʊ̃ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ka yɩ kaa, yɩ kʊ̃ nyɛ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ka a Jona nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ba lɛ ɛ.” Be lɛ wʊ bar ba tɩ chen.
A poturbo ĩin ba tʊ̃ɔ de paanʊ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ na ba gɔ̃ɔ a man gɔ̃ɔn.
Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ gu yɩ mãɛ a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Saduseemɩne dãbɩl pɔ.”
Ba piel mana kʊrɔ taa, “Sɩn ba waan paanʊ̃ɔ jaa lɛ so.”
Yesu na wa bɔ̃ɔn wʊ 'yɛr naa, “Yɩn sɔɔfʊ na ba jã bon ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ 'yɛrɛ ɩka yaa tara paanʊ̃ɔ ɛ?

Yaa nyɛ bɔ̃ɔ a par sɛrɛ bɩɩ? Yaa tɩɛrtɔ a paanʊ̃ɔsɩ anũu a nɩbɛ tur anũu na di faa tɩ yɩ wob a bʊ̃ŋmaar 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɛr pie nɩ ayi bɩɩ? Yaa tɩɛrtɔ a paanʊ̃ɔsɩ anũu a nɩbɛ tur anũu na di faa tɩ yɩ wob a bʊ̃ŋmaar 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɛr pie nɩ ayi bɩɩ?
Bɩɩ a paanʊ̃ɔsɩ ayopõi a nɩbɛ tur anaar na di faa tɩ yɩ wob 'yɔ̃ɔ pɛr ayopõi bɩɩ?
Bo lɛ so ka yaa tɩɛr bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a ba ɩ paanʊ̃ɔ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ ɛ? Yɩ gu yɩ mãɛ a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Saduseemɩne dãbɩl yele pɔ.”
Be lɛ ba pãa tɩɛr bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a ba ɩ a paanʊ̃ɔ dãbɩl lɛ ɛ tɩchɛ ba bɔ̃ɔn a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Saduseemɩne wiilfʊ.
A Yesu na wa kpɛ a Sisariya Filipai paal pɔ, wʊ sʊʊr a wʊ poturbo, “An lɛ a nɩbɛ 'yɛr ɩka a maa Nɩsaal Bie ɩ naa?”
Ka ba 'yɛr, “Bamɩne 'yɛr ɩka Jɔɔn Kɔ̃suoro, ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛr ɩka Elaija lɛ, ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛr ɩka Jeremiya bɩɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ãsʊɔ lɛ.”
Tɩchɛ a wʊ sʊʊr ba, “An lɛ yɩn 'yɛr ɩka n ɩ naa?”
Ka Simon Pita 'yɛr, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ a Nɩ-iraa, a Nãaŋmɩn Vʊr Bie.”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Fʊ ju nʊ̃mɔ̃ na Simon, Jona bie! A ba ɩ nɩsaal nɩ nɩrɛ lɛ ir wiil fʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ a n Sãa na be a saaju lɛ.
Maa lɛ 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ fʊ, a fʊ̃ʊ Pita, a par lɛ kʊsɩr pie, a fʊ 'yɛr nyãna pɔ lɛ, ɩn tu bʊɔl nɩbɛ a ba wa sɔɔ de ma ka a kpĩi tẽe kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ba ɛ.
Ɩn kʊ fʊn a saaju nãalʊ̃ʊ pãn bie, bon 'lɔ jaa fʊn lũ ka a wɛr pɔ, a mɩn lũn a be a saaju, bon 'lɔ jaa fʊn for bar ka a wɛr pɔ, a mɩn for bar a be a saaju.”
Ka wʊ pãa kpãkpãan a wʊ poturbo ɩka ba taa 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ nɩrɛ jaa ɩka 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa ɛ.
An piel a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a Yesu piel 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ ba ɩka wʊn chen Jerusalɛm tɩ di dɔɔyɛ a nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɛɛ wiwiilbe nuur pɔ, ka ba kʊ wʊ, ka a ber ata daar a wʊ lɛ ir ɩ vʊr.
Ka Pita tɔɔ wʊ yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ na wʊ tɩ piel 'yɛrɛ, “N Soro, Nãaŋmɩn kʊ sɔɔ ka a yele nyã ɩ fʊ ɛ.”
Tɩchɛ a Yesu lɩɛb 'yɛr kʊ a Pita, “Tɔɔ lan ka tɩ chɛ ma. Fʊ ɩn Satan, na fʊ ɩ gbɛr ŋme bon kʊ ma. Faa tara Nãaŋmɩn bonsɩ tɩɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ nɩsaal bonsɩ tɩɛr lɛ fʊ tara.”
Ka a Yesu pãa 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo, “Ala ɩ ãsʊɔ jaa bʊɔrɔ na ɩka wʊ ɩ a n poturo, wʊ 'laar a wʊ mãɛ tɩ 'mɔɔ a wʊ daa tuo turo nɩ ma.
A nɩrɛ 'lɔ na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ faa a wʊ nyɛvʊr na bɔr wʊ naa, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na bɔr a wʊ nyɛvʊr a maa jũu, na nyɛ wʊ naa.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ tara naa a wɛr ju bonsɩ a jaa, tɩ bɔr a wʊ nyɛvʊr, bo tʊ̃nɔ̃ lɛ wʊn nyɛ? Bɩɩ bo lɛ wʊn de tɛɛn a wʊ nyɛvʊr?
A maa Nɩsaal Bie na waan naa Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr nɩ a wʊ malakasɩ wa yab nɩrɛ jaa bon 'lɔ wʊn maal.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka a yɩ bamɩne na ara a ka kʊ̃ kpi ɛ, tɩ na yɩ nyɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie na waara a n nãa difʊ jie.”
A ber ayʊɔb daar, Yesu tara na Pita nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ a wʊ yɛbɛ Jɔɔn don tɔ̃wõo ju a ba tɛɛ.
Wʊ chil wʊ mãɛ a ba niem, ka a wʊ nie nyɩlɛ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ kaar, ka a fuu pɛl nyɩlɛ bũu kaar.
Mosesɩ nɩ Elaija mɩ wa dũun yɩ ara a wʊ sɛ̃, ka ba wa 'mataa 'yɛrɛ.
Pita 'yɛr kʊ Yesu, “N Soro, a vɩla na ka sɩn kpɩɛrɛ a ka. Ala ɩ fʊ sɔɔ naa, ɩn 'yɔ̃ɔn sɛɛr ata a ka na, ka fʊ so a ãsʊɔ, ka Mosesɩ mɩ so a ãsʊɔ, ka Elaija mɩ so a ãsʊɔ.”
Wʊn chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ ka a julõjupɩla wa pɔɔ ba naa, ka Nãaŋmɩn kɔkɔr 'yɛr be a julõjuur pɔ, “Nyã lɛ a n Binʊ̃nãa, a n pʊɔ pɛl wʊ naa, yɩ chɛlɛ a wʊ 'yɛr.”
A poturbo na wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃ dãbãɛ kpɛ ba naa ka ba lo kpa tẽe.
Tɩchɛ ka Yesu wa sɩɩr ba tɩ 'yɛrɛ, “Yɩ ir, yɩ ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ.”
Ban wa dʊɔ kaa, baa nyɛ nɩrɛ jaa ka a Yesu tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Ban wa yi a tɔ̃ɔ ju suro, Yesu kpãa ba naa, “Yɩ taa 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ nɩrɛ jaa a bon 'lɔ yɩn nyɛ ɛ, tɩ tãn a daar 'lɔ a maa Nɩsaal Bie na lɩɛb ir a kũu pɔ.”
Ka a wʊ poturbo sʊʊr wʊ, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a ɩ ka a nɛɛ wiwiilbe 'yɛr ɩka Elaija lɛ na de nie wa?”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr, “Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, ɩka Elaija wa naa wa chɔɔr a bonsɩ a jaa.
Tɩchɛ yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka Elaija den nie wa ka baa bɔ̃ɔ wʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ ba ɩ wʊn a lɛ na pɛl a ba pʊɔ. Lɛ mɩ lɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie mɩ na di a dɔɔyɛ a ba nuur pɔ.”
Be lɛ a poturbo pãa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka Jɔɔn Kɔ̃suoro 'yɛr lɛ wʊ 'yɛrɛ.
Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo na wa chen a nɩyɔɔ sɛ̃, daba wa gbur dumo a wʊ niem,
tɩ 'yɛr, “N Soro, kaa a n bie nɩbaal, kpũgul lɛ wʊ loro na wʊ dire dɔɔyɛ yɔɔ, sɔ̃ɔ ãsʊɔ wʊ ma lon bũu pɔ bɩɩ kʊ̃ɔ pɔ.
N tara wʊn waan a fʊ poturbo sɛ̃, tɩchɛ baa tʊ̃ɔ sãa wʊ ɛ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yɩn dɩna nɩbɛ babãma dẽme, a yɩ sɔɔfʊ na ba jã bon ɛ, n be a yɩ sɛ̃ naa tɩ tãn dabor? N tara nɩ yɩ kãnyir jã ŋmɩnɛ?” Tɩ 'yɛr a daba, “Tɔɔ a bie wa kʊ ma.”
Yesu tãn a sɩdɛɛr ka wʊ yi a bie pɔ, a dẽdẽe daa ka a bie sa.
A poturbo wan a Yesu tɛɛ sɛ̃ wa sʊʊr, “Ŋmɩnɛ a ɩ ka sɩn ba tʊ̃ɔ dii a sɩdɛɛr bar ɛ?”
Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Bojũu a yɩ sɔɔfʊ ba jã bon ɛ. Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, yɩn tara sɔɔfʊ kʊ jã a kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ bir, yɩn 'yɛr kʊ a tɔ̃ɔ nyãna, ir a ka chen a be; wʊn ir chen. Tɩ yele jaa kʊ ɩ kpɛ̃ɔ kʊ yɩ ɛ.”
Ban wa lɔ̃ɔ taa a Galilee, Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Ban gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a maa Nɩsaal Bie ka n di dɔɔyɛ a nɩbɛ nuur pɔ.
Ban kʊ maa naa, ka a ber ata daar ka n lɩɛb ir ɩ vʊr.” Ban wõ a nɩtɔ̃, ba pʊʊr sɔ̃ɔ naa.
A Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo na wa ta a Kapenahum, a puorfʊ yir lõpodierbe wa 'yɛr a Pita, “A yɩ wiwile maa yab a puorfʊ yir lõpoo bɩɩ?”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Ɔ̃ɔ, wʊ ma yab naa.” Pita na wa ta a yir, Yesu lɛ de nie sʊʊr Simon, “Bo lɛ fʊ tɩɛr?” Ba boo lɛ ma yab a lõpoo kʊ a wɛr ju nãmɩne? A ba bibiir lɛ bɩɩ nɩyor lɛ ma yab?
Pita na 'yɛr ɩka nɩyor sɛ̃, lɛ Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “A lɛ a bibiir son ba mãɛ.

Tɩchɛ saa bʊɔrɔ ɩka sɩ sɔ̃ɔ a nɩbɛ banyãna pʊɔ ɛ, yɩ chen a man pɔ tɩ lɔb a jãpãɩ, yin wa ir a jãdɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ yɩ yuo a nɛɛ, yɩn nyɛn libir, yɩ de ya a sɩ lõpoo. De a jãm 'lɔ fʊn dɔ̃ɔ nie nyɔɔ, fʊ̃ʊ wa haa a wʊ nɛɛ fʊn nyɛn libibir, de a 'lɔ yab a sɩ lõpoo.”
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a poturbo wa a Yesu sɛ̃ na ba wa sʊʊr, “An lɛ ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ gar ba jaa a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ?”
Wʊ bʊɔl bibile na wʊ vɛ̃ a wʊ ara a ba pɔ,
tɩ wʊ 'yɛr, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, yɩn baa lɩɛb na yɩ kaara fɩka bibiir kaar ɛ, yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sɩɩr wʊ mãɛ a bibile nyãna kaar, lɛ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ gar ba jaa a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.
“Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na de a bibile nyãna a n jũu, maa lɛ wʊ de.
Tɩchɛ, ala ɩ ãsʊɔ jaa mɩ vɛ̃ naa a bʊ̃bile nyãna na sɔɔ ma ɩ yelbier, a nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, bala 'mɔɔ nɩɛr lũ yɔɔl a wʊ nyĩe pɔ daa 'yɔ̃ɔ a man pɔ, ala sa.
“Nɛbier lɛ kʊ a wɛr, a bɛɛr kaa na vɛ̃ ka ba ɩ yelbier. Bɛɛr kaa na wa naa, tɩchɛ nɛbier lɛ kʊ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ an tu wa!

Ala ɩ a fʊ nũu bɩɩ gbɛr vɛ̃ naa ka fʊ ɩ yelbier, ŋmaa wʊ lɔb bar. Fʊn tɩ kpɛ a nyɛvʊr pɔ nɩ nũŋmaa bɩɩ gbɛŋmaa sãn fʊn tara a nuur nɩ a gbɛɛ a jaa ayi tɩ na fʊ tɩ kpɛ a wõm jie a be a bũu na ba kpĩine ɛ.
Ala ɩ a fʊ nɩbir mɩ vɛ̃ naa ka fʊ ɩ yelbier, 'loo lɔb bar. Fʊn tɩ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ nɩ nɩbifɩɛ sa naa fʊn tara a nɩbie ayi tɩ na fʊ tɩ kpɛ wõm jie.
“Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn sʊ̃ na yɩ taa kaara a bʊ̃bil banyãna ãsʊɔ pɔrɔ ɛ, yelmãɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ a ba malakasɩ ben a saaju ma kaara a n Sãa niem.
“Bo lɛ yɩ tɩɛr? Ala ɩ a nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ tara na piir kɔbaa, ka bʊ̃'yen wa bɔr, a ba ɩ wʊn bar a kɔbaa forbir ala a pɛchiin baa pɔ, tɩ yʊɔrɔ bʊɔrɔ a bʊ̃'yen 'lɔ tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ jaa wʊn na tɩ nyɛ wʊ bɩɩ?
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, 'lɔ wa nyɛ wʊ, nʊ̃ɔ ma kpɛ wʊ naa gar a kɔbaa forbir ala na ba bɔr ɛ.
Lɛ nɩ wʊ ju mɩ lɛ ɩka a ba ɩ a yɩ Sãa saaju bɔfʊ ɩka a bʊ̃bil banyãna ãsʊɔ wʊ bɔr ɛ.
“Ala ɩ a fʊ yɛbɛ ãsʊɔ ɩ fʊn yelbier, chen tɩ wiil wʊ a wʊ sɔ̃ɔnaa fʊ̃ʊ nɩ a 'lɔ tɛɛ. 'Lɔ wa sɔɔ a wʊ bɔrfʊ, yɩ lɛ ɩn yɛɛr go.
Tɩchɛ 'lɔ ba wa sɔɔ a fʊ 'yɛr ɛ, tara nɩbʊ̃'yen bɩɩ nɩbɛ ayi chiin, ka a nɩbɛ ayi bɩɩ nɩbɛ ata di a 'yɛr dãasɩɛ.
'Lɔ wa tɔr a nɩbɛ bala niem, 'yɛr kʊ a pupuorbiir, ka 'lɔ wa chɛnɛ tɔr na waa tu a ba nɛɛ ɛ, fʊ maal wʊ fɩka a lɛ fʊn na maal a nɩyuo, bɩɩ a lõpodier kaar.
“Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, bon 'lɔ jaa yɩn lũ ka a wɛr pɔ, mɩ lũn a saaju bon 'lɔ yɩn lor bar a wɛr pɔ a mɩ lor bar a saaju.
“Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, a yɩ nɩbɛ ayi tara sɔɔfʊ sʊɔr bon jaa, a n Sãa na be a saaju na kʊ yɩ naa.
Jie 'lɔ nɩbɛ ayi bɩɩ ata na ara nɩ a maa yuor, n ben a ba pɔ.”
Pita wan wa sʊʊr wʊ, “N Soro, ala ɩ a n tɔ sʊɔ ɩ man yelbier gbɛɛ aŋmɩnɛ lɛ ɩn vɛ̃ bar wʊ? Gbɛɛ ayopõi (7) bɩɩ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ fʊ a ba ɩ gbɛɛ ayopõi ɛ, tɩchɛ gbɛɛ lɩjaata nɩ pie nɩ ayopõi gbɛɛ ayopõi (77).”
“A lɛ jũu a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ na nyɛntaa fɩka nãa na bʊɔr ɩka 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ ba guor a ba libie kaa.
Wʊn wa tɩ piel guoro a libie yele ba nyɔɔn ãsʊɔ na di wʊ turo pie sãn waan a wʊ sɛ̃,
wʊn kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ yab a sãn ɛ, a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr ɩka ba da 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ pɔɔ nɩ a bibiir nɩ a wʊ bonsɩ a jaa yab a sãn.
“Ka a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ lo gbur dumo a wʊ niem lɔɔrɔ nuur 'yɛrɛ, ‘Tara nɩ ma kãnyir, ɩn yab a fʊ sãma a jaa.’
A nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kãan a wʊ nɩbaal tɩ vɛ̃ a wʊ sãma kʊ wʊ, tɩ bar wʊ.
“Tɩchɛ, a daba nyã nɩ wʊ ju na wa yɩ a yõo nyɛ a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃tɔ sʊɔ na di wʊ toofar kɔbaa sãn, wʊ chɩm a daba kɔkɔr pɔ tɩ 'yɛr, ‘Yab ma a sãn fʊn di.’
“Ka a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ nyã mɩ lo gbur dumo tɩ sʊɔrɔ, ‘Tara nɩ ma kãnyir, tɩ ɩn yab fʊn a sãn.’
“Ka wʊ tɔr, tɩ nyɔɔ wʊ chiin tɩ pɔɔ tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʊn yab a sãn.
A wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃taaba na wa nyɛ a lɛ wʊn ɩ, ba pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ naa, ka ba chen tɩ man a jaa kʊ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ a lɛ jaa na ɩ.
Ka a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ bʊɔl wʊ wa sʊʊr wʊ, ‘Fʊ̃ʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃putuo sʊɔ. Fʊn sʊɔr ma jũu lɛ so ka n vɛ̃ a sãn bar fʊ.
Fʊ mɩ kʊ̃ naa kaa a fʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃tɔ sʊɔ nyã nɩbaal nɩtãa a lɛ ɩn kaa a fʊ nɩbaal ɛ?’
A wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ suur ir naa ka wʊ de wʊ tɩr ɩka ba tɩ pɔɔ wʊ ge wʊ tɩ tãn a daar 'lɔ wʊn yab a sãn a jaa.
“Lɛ mɩ lɛ a n Sãa na be a saaju na ɩ yɩ mɩ, yɩn baa vɛ̃ a yɩ yɛbɛ yelbier bar ɛ.”
Yesu na wa 'yɛr a anyã baar, wʊ yin a Galilee chen Judiya paal pɔ, a Jordan man gɔ̃ɔn.
Nɩyɔɔ turo wʊ naa, ka wʊ sãa a ba baalsɩ a be.
Faraseemɩne bamɩne wan a wʊ sɛ̃ ɩka ba wa bɛɛr wʊ kaa, na ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Sɔr ben be ɩka daba wʊ bar a wʊ pɔɔ yele kɔ̃ɔ jũu bɩɩ?”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr, “Yaa kar a be a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na maal ba a pielfʊ daar ‘Maal daba nɩ pɔɔ’ ”,
na wʊ 'yɛr, “A lɛ jũu, daba na bar a wʊ sãa nɩ a wʊ ma, tɩchɛ ka 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ pɔɔ ɩ bʊ̃'yen, ka ba jaa ayi ɩ ãgãn bʊ̃'yen?
Baa lɛ chɛnɛ ɩ ayi ɛ, tɩchɛ ba ɩn ãgãn bʊ̃'yen. A lɛ jũu, bon 'lɔ Nãaŋmɩn na 'mataa, nɩrɛ wʊ ta oor aa ɛ.”
Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Ŋmɩnɛ ka a Mosesɩ 'yɛr ɩka sɩ kʊ wʊ pɔɔ bar gãn, tɩ bar wʊ?”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Bojũu a yɩ nyãkpãɛn jũu lɛ so ka a Mosesɩ bar a sɔr ɩka, yɩ bar a yɩ pɔbɔ, tɩchɛ a pielfʊ daar a ba dɔ̃ɔ be a lɛ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na bar a wʊ pɔɔ, ka ala ba ɩ sɛ̃fʊ jũu tɩ kul pɔɔ yuo, wʊ sɔ̃ɔn a kul taa.”
A wʊ poturbo 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, ala ɩ lɛ lɛ a be a daba nɩ a wʊ pɔɔ, a ba sɛɛ ɩka nɩrɛ wʊ kul pɔɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ sɔɔ a wiilfʊ nyã ka a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ a ba bɔ̃ɔ a par tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.

Bamɩne ben be na ba dɔɔr ɛ, an ɩ lɛ lɛ ba dɔɔ ba ka be, ka bamɩne mɩ a ba taaba lɛ maal ba ka baa dɔɔr ɛ, ka bamɩne mɩ tɔr a kul taa a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ jũu, 'lɔ jaa nɩ na tʊ̃ɔ sɔɔ a wiilfʊ nyã, wʊ sɔɔ.”
Nɩbɛ waan na bibiir ɩka wʊ dɔɔl ba a wʊ nũu na wʊ sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn kʊ ba. Tɩchɛ a poturbo mɩɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na waan ba.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yɩ bar a bibiir sɔr ka ba wa a n sɛ̃, yɩ ta pii ba sɔr ɛ, a banyã taaba lɛ so a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ.”
Wʊ dɔɔl ban a wʊ nuur sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn kʊ ba, tɩ chen.
Be lɛ ka nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ wa a wʊ sɛ̃ wa sʊʊr, “Wiwile, bo yelvɩla lɛ ɩn ɩ naa nyɛ nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ?”
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr, “Ŋmɩnɛ a fʊ sʊrɔ ma bon 'lɔ na ɩ vɩla? Nɩbʊ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ ɩ nɩbie. Ala ɩ fʊ bʊɔrɔ na ɩka fʊ nyɛ nyɛvʊr turo a nɛbinsɩ.”
Ka daba sʊʊr wʊ, “A boo?” Ka Yesu 'yɛr, “Ta kʊ nɩrɛ ɛ, ta sɛ̃ ɛ, ta ju ɛ, ta di jir dãasɩɛ ɛ,
'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʊ sãa nɩ a fʊ ma,
Ka a daba 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “N tu naa anyãna a jaa, bo lɛ chɛ ma?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ala ɩ fʊ bʊɔrɔ na ɩka fʊ ɩ chɛchɛ, tɩ de a fʊ bʊ̃tarsɩ a jaa da, na fʊ de a libie kʊ a nɔ̃n dẽme, fʊn nyɛn a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ tɩ na fʊ wa turo ma.”
A daba na wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃, wʊ chiin naa pʊsɔ̃ɔ bojũu wʊ tara na bʊ̃tarsɩ.
Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ yɩ, an ɩn kpɛ̃ɔ tara sʊɔ na kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.
Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ go, an ɩn kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ ka nyɔɔma na kpɛ kparpĩi bɔɔ pɔ gar tara sʊɔ na kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.”
A poturbo na wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃, nɛɛ 'maa ba naa ka ba sʊrɔ, “An lɛ na pãa nyɛ faafʊ?”
Ka Yesu kaa ba tɩ 'yɛr, “Ala na ɩ tuo nɩrɛ sɛ̃, Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ yele jaa ba ɩ tuo ɛ.”
A Pita 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Nyɛ sɩn bar bonsɩ a jaa tɩ wa turo fʊ? Bo sãyar lɛ sɩn nyɛ?”

Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, a bonsɩ a jaa bʊ̃paalaa lɩɛbfʊ daar, a maa Nɩsaal Bie na jãnɛ naa a tɩɩr nãalʊ̃ʊ dakɔɔ ju. Ka a yɩn bala mɩ na turo ma mɩ jãnɛ a nãa dakɔɔ pie nɩ ayi ju, tɔɔrɔ a Isɩral bala pie nɩ ayi 'yɛr.
Nɩrɛ nyã jaa na bar a wʊ yir bɩɩ yɛɛr bɩɩ yɛpɔbɔ, bɩɩ sãa, bɩɩ ma, bɩɩ bibiir, bɩɩ puo a maa jũu na nyɛn dɔɔltaa gbɛɛ kɔbaa tɩ tara nyɛvʊr na ba tara baar fʊ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a nɩyɔɔ na de a nie na wa ben puor, tɩchɛ ka a puor dẽme nɩ wa de a nie.
“Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ nyɛntãan fɩka daba kɔ̃ɔ na dɔ̃ɔ ŋmaa ir bibio jaa pipi yi ɩka wʊ tɩ bɔ nɩbɛ ka ba chen tɩ kɔ wʊ puo pɔ.
Wʊ sɔɔ naa ɩka wʊn yab ba naa a lɛ ban na de a bɩbir gbul ka wʊ tara ba chiin a wʊ puo pɔ.
“A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ lɛ wa do bãlãa wʊ yɩn tɩ nyɛ a nɩbɛ bamɩne na ara a daa pɔ na baa maala bon jaa ɛ.
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, ‘Yɩ mɩ chen a n puo pɔ tɩ ɩn yab yɩn naa a lɛ jaa na sɛɛn.’
Ka ba sɔɔ chen. Tɩ wʊ lɛ yɩ go a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa vɩrʊ̃ gar ju sãlsɔɔ nɩ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa suro a tɩɩr pɔ na wʊ tɩ bɔ a nɩbɛ bamɩne mɩ.
A jãanɔ'maar sɔ̃ɔ, wʊ lɛ yin tɩ nyɛ bamɩne mɩ na chɛnɛ jɛ̃ pɔrɔ jaa. Ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, ‘Bo lɛ so a dɩna yɩn jãnɛ ba maala bon jaa ɛ?’
A ba 'yɛr, ‘Nɩrɛ jaa ba sʊɔr sɩ kɔb ɛ.’ Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, ‘Yɩ wa a sɩ chen a n puo pɔ a yɩ tɩ kɔ.’
“Jãanʊɔr na wa ta, a puo sʊɔ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kaara a wʊ puo, ‘Bʊɔl a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ kʊ ba a ba libie, de nie piel a bala na bɩɛr wa tɩ tãn a bala na dɔ̃ɔ nie wa.’
“A bala na wa bɩɛr wa ãsʊɔ jaa den a bɩbir gbul libir.
A dɔ̃ɔ nie dẽme na wa tɩ wa, ba tɩɛr ɩka ban nyɛn gar a lɛ, tɩchɛ a wʊ kʊ ãsʊɔ jaa mɩ bɩbir gbul libir.
Tɩchɛ ban wa de a lɛ baar, ba vʊ̃n nɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a puo sʊɔ,
na ba gɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a puo sʊɔ 'yɛrɛ, ‘A nɩbɛ banyãna wa bɩɛr wa tɩ fʊ yab sɩ jãtaa, nɩ sɩn na ŋmaa ir nɩ ɔɔr wa tʊ̃ lɛ̃ɛɛ ka mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ ŋme sɩ tɩ mʊrʊ̃.’
“Ka wʊ lɩɛb sʊʊr a ba ãsʊɔ, ‘N badaba, n ba ɩ fʊ dɛɛr ɛ, a ba ɩ yɩn lɛ sɔɔ ɩka yɩn den a bɩbir gbul libir ɛ?
De a fʊ libir chiine. Maa lɛ nʊ̃ naa kʊ a puor dẽme nɩtãa a lɛ ɩn kʊ yɩ.
N ba tara sɔr na de a n libie ɩn a lɛ ɩn bʊɔrɔ bɩɩ? Bɩɩ fʊ tara nyuur nɩ a n maal vɩla?’
“A lɛ jũu, a puor dẽme na wa ben niem ka a nie dẽme mɩ wa be a puor.”
Yesu na wa pãa duoro a Jerusalɛm, wʊ tara na a poturbo pie nɩ ayi yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ na wʊ tɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba,
“Nyɛ, sɩ ben duoro a Jerusalɛm ka ban tɩ de a maa Nɩsaal Bie 'yɔ̃ɔ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɛɛ wiwiilbe nuur pɔ.
Ban de man kʊ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka ba la ma, tʊrɔ ma, chɩrɛ nataar 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma, na ba ge ma, tɩ kʊ ma, ka a ber ata daar ka n ir ɩ vʊr go.”
Be lɛ ka Jebedee pɔɔ tara a wʊ bibiir ayi waan a wʊ sɛ̃ wa lo gbur dumo a wʊ niem na wʊ sʊɔrɔ bon kɔ̃ɔ.
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr wʊ, “Bo lɛ fʊ bʊɔrɔ?” Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Vɛ̃ ka a n bibiir banyã ayi ka ãsʊɔ jãnɛ a fʊ nũsʊ̃ɔ ka ãsʊɔ mɩ jãnɛ a fʊ gʊbaa jie a fʊ nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Faa bɔ̃ɔ a bon 'lɔ fʊn sʊɔrɔ ɛ. Ban tʊ̃ɔ nyũn a dɔɔyɛ ŋmele 'lɔ ɩn na nyũn ɔ?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Sɩn tʊ̃ɔ naa.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩn tʊ̃ɔ nyũn a n ŋmele tɩchɛ maa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ 'yɛr a buor sʊɔ na jãnɛ a n nũsʊ̃ɔ bɩɩ a n gʊbaa jie ɛ, ka a bala a n Sãa na chɔɔr kʊ tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.”
A poturbo pie bala na wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃, ba nyɛn naa a yɛɛr ayi bala suur.
Ka a Yesu bʊɔl ba waan wa 'yɛr, “Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn na ɩka a bala na kaara a nɩbɛ bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ lɛ kaara ba bon jaa pɔ, ka a ba nɩbɛrɛ tʊ̃ɔ ba.
A kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ be a lɛ a yɩ pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ ɩ a yɩ kpɛ̃ɛ, wʊ ɩ a yɩ tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ ɩ a yɩ nɩdiere, wʊ ɩ a yɩ gbãgbaa.
Nɩtãa lɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie na ba wa ɩka ba tʊ̃nɔ̃ kʊrɔ ma ɛ, tɩchɛ ka wʊ ɩ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ na wʊ de a n nyɛvʊr faan nɩyɔɔ yelbier bar.”
Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo na wa yire a Jeriko nɩyɔɔ turo wʊ naa.
Ka a jɔ̃n ayi jãnɛ a sɔr kõkoor. Ban wa wõ ɩka Yesu lɛ tala, ka ba gboolo, “Sɩ Soro, David Bie wooo ɩ, kaa a sɩ nɩbaal.”
Ka a nɩyɔɔ 'yɛr ɩka ba bar gɔ̃mɔ̃ tɩchɛ ka ba chɛnɛ gboolo, “Sɩ Soro, David Bie wooo ɩ, kaa a sɩ nɩbaal.”
Yesu ara na tɩ bʊɔl ba sʊrɔ, “Bo lɛ yɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka n maal kʊ yɩ?”
Ka ba 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Sɩ Soro, sɩ bʊɔrɔ na ɩka sɩ nyɛrɛ.”
Nɩbaal kpɛ̃n a Yesu, ka wʊ sɩɩr a ba nɩbie, ka ba nyɛrɛ na ba turo wʊ.
Ban wa gbʊrɔ a Jerusalɛm nɩ a Betefagɩ a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ ju, Yesu tʊ̃n a wʊ poturbo ayi,
na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ chen a tẽbile 'lɔ na be a yɩ niem, yɩn tɩ nyɛn bʊ̃ɔ ban lũ ka a bʊ̃pɔl ara kɔɔ wʊ, yɩ for yaa waan.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ wa sʊʊr yɩ naa, ‘Ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ foro a bʊ̃ɔ?’ Yɩ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, ‘A Sɩ Soro lɛ bʊɔrɔ yaa.’ Wʊn bar sɔr ka yɩ foraa waan fɔɔ jaa.”
A yele anyã ɩ na ka a na ɩ yelmãɛ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr na wʊ 'yɛrɛ.
“'Yɛr kʊ a Jerusalɛm nɩbɛ, ‘Nyɛ, a yɩ nãa waara na a yɩ sɛ̃. Wʊ siir wʊ mãɛ na wʊ do bʊ̃ɔ. Bʊ̃pɔl bile lɛ wʊ do waara nɩ.’ ”
A poturbo chen tɩ tʊ̃ a lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr ɩka ba ɩ.
Ba waan na a bʊ̃ɔ nɩ a bʊ̃pɔl bile na ba de a ba fɔɔr 'yɩɛr dɔɔl, ka wʊ do jãnɛ a bʊ̃pɔl ju.
Nɩyɔɔ 'yɩɛr a ba fɔɔr a sɔr pɔ ka bamɩne mɩ 'mɛl vaɩ 'yɩɛr a sɔr pɔ.
A nɩyɔɔ bala na be a niem nɩ a bala na turo a puor chɩlɛ na 'yɛrɛ, “Yãan yooo, Nãa David Bie! Nãaŋmɩn wʊ sʊ̃ʊ a 'lɔ wʊn tʊ̃!
Wʊn wa kpɛ a Jerusalɛm tẽe pɔ, a nɩbɛ ba jaa ɩrɛ na yulõbʊmm, na ba sʊrɔ, “An lɛ a nyã?”
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na turo wʊ 'yɛr, “Nyã lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ, Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ na be Galilee.”
Yesu kpɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ, na wʊ dire a bala na chiin a bonsɩ tɩ daara nɩ a bala na daara baraa, tɩ na wʊ dara a libitɛɛrbɛ tɛɛbʊlsɩ nɩ a bala na daara a papar dakɔɔr lɔɔrɔ.
Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, ‘A n yir na ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn sʊɔrfʊ jie,’
Jɔ̃n nɩ gbɛrsɩ chen a be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir ka wʊ sãa ba.
Tɩchɛ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɛɛ wiwiilbe na nyɛ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ wʊn tʊ̃ nɩ a bibiir na ɩrɛ a gɔ̃mɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir pɔ ɩka, “Yãan yooo! Nãa David Bie.” Ka a ba pʊʊr sɔ̃ɔ.
Ba sʊɔr a Yesu, “Fʊ wõn a lɛ a bibiir banyãna na 'yɛrɛ ɔ?” Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Ɔ̃ɔ, yaa dɔ̃ɔ kar ɩka, ‘A bibiir nɩ bipɩlɛ nɛgãma pɔ lɛ yɩ bʊɔrɔ pɛɛfʊ ɛ?’ ”
Wʊ bar ba naa tɩ yi chen a Betanɩ tẽe pɔ tɩ gã a be.
Wʊn wa lɩɛb chen a tẽkpɛ̃ɛ pɔ a bibio, kɔ̃ kpɛ wʊ naa.
Wʊ nyɛn kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ tɩɛ na ara a sɔr kõkoor, a wʊ chen tɩ ta ka wɔ̃mɔ̃ ba be be ɛ, tɩ wʊ ɩ va nara tɛɛ. Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a tɩɛ, “Fʊ kʊ̃ lɛ wɔ̃ wɔ̃mɔ̃ go ɛ!” Ka a tɩɛ juɔl kpi ajienaa.
A poturbo na wa nyɛ a tɩɛ na kpi, nɛɛr 'maa ba naa ka ba 'yɛrɛ, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a tɩɛ ɩ juɔl ajienaa a lɛ?”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, yɩn tara sɔɔfʊ na yaa baal ɛ, a ba ɩ a lɛ na tʊ̃ kʊ a tɩɛ nyã tɛɛ lɛ yɩn tʊ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩn gba 'yɛr kʊ a tɔ̃ɔ nyãna, ‘Ir suu a man pɔ,’ tɩ wʊ̃n ir naa.
Yɩn wa sʊɔr bon jaa tɩ tara sɔɔfʊ, yɩn nyɛ naa.”

Yesu na wa tɩ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ na wʊ wile, ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Juu nɩbɛrɛ wa a wʊ sɛ̃ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʊn wile wa sʊʊr wʊ, “Bo kpɛ̃ɔ lɛ fʊ de tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyã nɩ an lɛ kʊ fʊ a sɔr ɩka fʊ tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyã?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “N mɩ na sʊʊr yɩn sʊʊrfʊ bʊ̃'yen. Yɩn wa tʊ̃ɔ wiil ma a par, n mɩ na wiil yɩ naa a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kʊ ma a kpɛ̃ɔ ka tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyãna.

A Jɔɔn na dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kʊ wʊ a sɔr bɩɩ nɩbɛ lɛ kʊ wʊ a sɔr? Yɩ 'yɛr n kaa?” Ka ba piel chɩrɛ taa, “Sɩn be 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ tʊ̃ wʊ wʊn sʊʊr sɩ naa ka bo lɛ so ka saa sɔɔ de wʊ ɛ?
Tɩchɛ sɩn mɩ 'yɛr ɩka nɩrɛ lɛ tʊ̃ wʊ a ba ɩ ɛ, sɩ joro naa a nɩbɛ dãbãɛ bojũu nɩrɛ jaa sɔɔ naa ɩka a Jɔɔn ɩn Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ.”
Be lɛ a ba 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “Saa bɔ̃ɔ ɛ.” Ka a Yesu mɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “N mɩ kʊ̃ 'yɛr kʊ yɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kʊ ma a kpɛ̃ɔ ka n tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyãna ɛ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tɩɛr? Daba lɛ tara bibiir ayi, na wʊ chen tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a dɔ̃ɔ sʊɔ, ‘N Bie chen tɩ tʊ̃ a n puo tʊ̃mɔ̃ a dɩna.’
Ka wʊ 'yɛr, ‘N kʊ̃ chen ɛ,’ tɩchɛ na wʊ ta sɔ̃ɔ lɩɛb a wʊ tɩɛr na wʊ chen.
A sãa lɛ chen tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a ayi sʊɔ a lɛ nɩ wʊ ju mɩ, ka wʊ 'yɛr, ‘N chen naa,’ tɩ na wʊ tɔr.

“A bibiir banyãna ayi, buor sʊɔ lɛ tʊ̃ a wʊ sãa bɔfʊ?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “A dɔ̃ɔ sʊɔ lɛ.” Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ a lõpodierbe nɩ a pɔɔ baar na dɔ̃ɔ yɩn nie kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.
Jɔɔn Kɔ̃suoro wan wa wile yɩ a yelmãɛ sɔr ka yaa sɔɔ de wʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ a lõpodierbe nɩ a pɔɔ baar sɔɔn de wʊ, yɩn sɔɔ wa nyɛ gba yaa lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr sɔɔ de wʊ ɛ.

“Yɩ lɛ chɛlɛ a sʊkpa ãsʊɔ. Daba lɛ kɔ wʊ puo na wʊ. Wʊ wɔɔn a puo wʊ jaa jilʊ̃, na wʊ tuu bɔɔ ka ban ma pɔr a wɔ̃mɔ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ na ba nɛŋmɛr ir a kʊ̃ɔ. Wʊ mɛn jie ãsʊɔ na do ka nɩrɛ na ma do jãnɛ a be kaara a puo. Wʊ den a puo kʊ nɩbɛ ɩka ba kaara tɩ na wʊ yɔ chen paal yuo pɔ.
A pɔrfʊ sɔ̃ɔ na wa ta, wʊ tʊ̃n a wʊ gbãgbaar ɩka ba chen a nɩbɛ bala sɛ̃ tɩ pɔr a tɩɛ wɔ̃mɔ̃.
“Tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ bala nyɔɔ a wʊ gbãgbaar ŋme a ãsʊɔ, na ba kʊ a ãsʊɔ tɩ na ba lɔb a ãsʊɔ nɩ kʊsɩbɛ kʊ.
Be lɛ wʊ lɛ tʊ̃ a gbãgbaar bamɩne ka ba ge ba a lɛ nɛ nɩ wʊ ju.
A baaraa lɛ wʊ tʊ̃ a wʊ mãɛ bie a ba sɛ̃ na wʊ 'yɛr, ‘Ban 'yɔ̃ɔ naa a n bie.’
“Tɩchɛ a pokaarba na wa nyɛ a bie, ba 'yɛr kʊ taa, ‘Nyã lɛ ɩ a bʊ̃dire, yɩ ɩ a sɩ kʊ wʊ tɩ de a bonsɩ.’
Be lɛ ba nyɔɔ wʊ kʊ lɔb bar a puo kõkoor.
“Pʊ̃pãanyã a puo sʊɔ wa wa, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ wʊn ɩ a pokaarba banyãna?”
Ka ba 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Wʊn wan wa kʊ a pokaarba banyã ba jaa tɩ de a puo kʊ nɩyor, a bala na ma sɔɔ ka ba põ a puo bonsɩ a ŋmafʊ sɔ̃ɔ.”
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yaa kar a jie nyã a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr ɩka a, ‘A kʊsɩr 'lɔ a mɩmɩɛrbɛ na tɔr bar lɛ ɩ a kʊsɩr ju. A sɩ Soro lɛ tʊ̃ a nɩtɔ̃ ka a sɔb sɩ a nɩbie.’
“A lɛ jũu n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ, Nãaŋmɩn na faan a wʊ nãalʊ̃ʊ yin a yɩ sɛ̃ kʊ a nɩyor bala na sɔɔ wʊ.
Nɩrɛ nyã na lo a kʊsɩr nyã ju na pʊrpʊr a, tɩchɛ a wʊ mɩ na kʊ nɩrɛ nyã ju wʊn lo dɔɔl.”
A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Faraseemɩne na wa wõ a wʊ sʊkpar anyãna, ba bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka bala lɛ wʊ lɔɔrɔ a sʊkpar gbɛɛrɛ nɩ.
Ka ba bʊɔrɔ na sɔr ɩka ba nyɔɔ wʊ, tɩ na ba joro a nɩyɔɔ dãbãɛ bojũu ba nyɛn ka wʊ ɩ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ.
Yesu lɛ lɔɔrɔ na sʊkpar kʊrɔ a nɩbɛ na wʊ 'yɛrɛ,
“A Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ nyɛntãan fɩka nãa kɔ̃ɔ na maal a wʊ bidaba na kulo pɔɔ paalaa bʊ̃diir.
Wʊ tʊ̃n a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ ɩka ba tɩ 'yɛr a bala wʊn bʊɔl a pɔɔ paalaa jie, tɩchɛ a bala wʊn bʊɔl ka ba tɔr.
“Wʊ lɛ tʊ̃n nɩyor ɩka ba tɩ 'yɛr a bala wʊn bʊɔl, ‘Nyɛ, n maal a pɔɔ paalaa bʊ̃diir baar, n kʊn a n nadar nɩ a napɔl ka yele jaa chɔɔr baar, yɩ wa a pɔɔ paalaa jie.’
“Tɩchɛ ka ba tɔr ka nyã jaa ma chen wʊ chenfʊ jie, ka ãsʊɔ mɩ chen a wʊ puo pɔ, ka ãsʊɔ mɩ chen a wʊ yar jie.
Tɩchɛ ka a bala na chɛ nyɔɔr a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ ge ba tɩ na ba kʊ ba.
A nãa suur ir naa ka wʊ tʊ̃ a wʊ sojasɩ ɩka ba tɩ kʊ a nɩkʊrbɔ bala tɩ chʊm a ba tẽe.
“Tɩ na wʊ pãa 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ, ‘Yele jaa chɔɔr baar, tɩchɛ a bala ɩn bʊɔl ba sɛɛ ɛ.
Yɩ yi a tẽe pɔ tɩ bʊɔl nɩrɛ jaa yɩn nyɛ ka wʊ wa a pɔɔ paalaa jie.’
Lɛ lɛ, a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ yin a tẽe pɔ tɩ bʊɔl nɩrɛ jaa ban nyɛ, a nɩmɩn nɩ a nɩdɛbɛ ka a yir wa sɛɛn nɩbɛ wʊ jaa.
“Tɩchɛ a nãa na wa kpɛ ɩka wʊ kaa a nɩbɛ, wʊ nyɛn daba ãsʊɔ na ba su a pɔɔbɩɛl fuu ɛ,
Ka wʊ suur wʊ, ‘N badaba, ŋmɩnɛ fʊ ɩrɛ wa kpɛ a ka tɩ ba su a pɔɔ paalaa fuu ɛ?’ Ka a daba kpal a nɛɛ.
“Ka a nãa 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ, ‘Yɩ lũ a wʊ gbɛɛ naa nuur na yɩ lɔb wʊ bar yõo a libe pɔ, be lɛ nɩbɛ na kõnõ tɩ ɔɔrɔ nyɩmɛ.’
“Nɩyɔɔ lɛ ba bʊɔl, tɩchɛ bãlãa lɛ ban chɛl ir.”
Be lɛ ka a Faraseemɩne guor taa na ba wa bɛɛr Yesu kaa na ba na nyɔɔ wʊ a wʊ 'yɛrbie pɔ.
Be lɛ ba tʊ̃ a ba poturbo nɩ a nɩbɛ bamɩne na yi a Nãa Hɛrɔd sɛ̃, na ba 'yɛr, “Wiwile, sɩ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka fʊ ɩn yelmãɛ sʊɔ, na fʊ wile Nãaŋmɩn sɔr nɩ yelmãɛ, bojũu faa kaara lɛ nɩbɛ na 'yɛrɛ bɩɩ oor ɛ.
'Yɛr kʊ sɩ a lɛ fʊn tɩɛr. A tara na sɔr ɩka sɩ yab a lõpoo kʊ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa bɩɩ sɩ ta yab ɛ?”
Tɩchɛ a Yesu na bɔ̃ɔn a ba pʊtɩdɛɛr jũu, ka ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Yɩn nɛɛr ayi dẽme. Bo lɛ yɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka yɩ bɛɛr ma kaa?
Yɩ wiil ma a libir n kaa.” Be lɛ ba de a libikur waan.
Ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “An foto nɩ an yuor lɛ be a libir pɔ?”
Ka ba 'yɛr, “A Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa lɛ.” Lɛ lɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ de a 'lɔ na ɩ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa sofʊ na yɩ kʊ wʊ, na yɩ mɩ de a 'lɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sofʊ mɩ kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn.”
Ban wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃, nɛɛ 'maa ba naa ka ba bar wʊ tɩ chen jaa jomm.
A bɩbir 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, a Saduseemɩne na 'yɛr ɩka a kũu pɔ irfʊ ba be be ɛ, ba wan a Yesu sɛ̃ wa sʊʊr wʊ,
“Wiwile, Mosesɩ sɛb ɩka yɛbɛ wa kpi tɩ bar pɔɔ na ba tara bie ɛ, a wʊ yɛbɛ wʊ kul a pɔɔkʊɔr 'lɔ na wʊ dɔɔ bibiir kʊ a wʊ yɛbɛ 'lɔ na kpi.
Yɛɛr ayopõi lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be a ka a sɩ sɛ̃ ka a ba kpɛ̃ɛ kul pɔɔ na waa dɔɔ bie ɛ, tɩ kpi tɩchɛ a pɔɔkʊɔr bar ka a yɛbɛ de kul.
Ka a ayi sʊɔ mɩ de a pɔɔkʊɔr kul baa mɩ dɔɔ bie, tɩchɛ ka wʊ mɩ kpi. A lɛ nɛ nɩ wʊ ju mɩ lɛ ata tɩ tãn a ayopõi sʊɔ.
Ba jaa na wa kul a pɔɔkʊɔr nyã lʊɔr taa baar a pɔɔkʊɔr nyã mɩ baar kpi.
Bala wa ir yi a kũu pɔ, a nɩbɛ banyã ayopõi an pɔɔ, lɛ wʊn ɩ, an ɩ ba jaa kul wʊn lʊɔr taa?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yaa nyɛ yɩn bɔr, bojũu yaa bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn gãma nɩ a wʊ kpɛ̃ɔ ɛ.
Nɩbɛ wa ir a kũu pɔ, ba kʊ̃ lɛ kul taa ɛ, tɩ ban kaara fɩka malakasɩ na be a saaju.
Tɩchɛ a kũu pɔ ir fʊ yele, yaa kar a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ yɩ ɩka,
n ɩ naa a Abraham Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Isaakɩ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Jekɔb Nãaŋmɩn ɛ?
A nɩbɛ na wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃ nɛɛr 'maa ba naa nɩ a wʊ wiilfʊ.
