A Faraseemɩne na wa wõ ɩka Yesu 'yɛr tʊ̃ɔ a Saduseemɩne, ba mɩ lɔ̃ɔn taa.
Ka a ba ãsʊɔ na ɩ a nɛɛ wiwile sʊʊr 'yɛrbir bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ bɛɛr a Yesu kaa,
“Wiwile, A Mosesɩ nɛbinsɩ a jaa pɔ, buor lɛ ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “ ‘Nʊ̃ a fʊ Soro Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a fʊ nyãa wʊ jaa, nɩ a fʊ nyɛvʊr wʊ jaa, nɩ a fʊ tɩɛr wʊ jaa.’
Nyã lɛ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a nɛdɔ̃ɔ.
A ayi sʊɔ mɩ nɩ nyã, ‘Nʊ̃ a fʊ tɔ sʊɔ a fʊ kaar.’
A Mosesɩ nɛɛr a jaa nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ wiilfʊ kpãkpãana na a binfʊ nyãna.”
A Faraseemɩne na wa 'mataa, Yesu sʊʊr ba naa.
“Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tɩɛr a Nɩ-iraa yele? An bie lɛ wʊ ɩ?” Ka ba 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “David bie lɛ.”
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr ba, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ka a nãa David a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ, a wʊ bʊɔl wʊ ɩka, ‘N Soro’? Bojũu wʊ 'yɛr naa ɩka,
‘A Soro 'yɛr kʊ a n Soro, “Jãnɛ a n nũsʊ̃ɔ jie, ka n wa de a fʊ dɔ̃dẽme ka ba ɩ a fʊ gbɛɛ dɔɔlfʊ jie.” ’
Ala ɩ David bʊɔl wʊn wʊ ɩka, ‘N Soro,’ ŋmɩnɛ wʊn ɩrɛ wa ɩ a wʊ bie?”
An yɩ a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ chiine, nɩrɛ jaa ba lɛ haa nɛɛ 'yɛr 'yɛr ɛ bɩɩ lɛ 'la sʊʊr sʊʊrfʊ jaa go ɛ.
Yesu pãa 'yɛr kʊ a nɩyɔɔ bala nɩ a wʊ poturbo,
“A nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne jãnɛ na a Mosesɩ dakɔɔ ju.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ maala a lɛ ban wile tɩ na yɩ turo, tɩ yɩ ta maala a lɛ ban maala ɛ, bojũu ba maa turo a lɛ ban wile ɛ.
Ba ma lũn tuor tɩɩr tuo nɩbɛ, tɩ maa sɔɔ de a ba nubir sɩɩr ɛ.
“Yele jaa ban tʊ̃nɔ̃, ba ma bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka nɩbɛ ba nyɛ ba, na ba ma lũ a fɔɔr a ba jur pɔ, tɩ na ba ma su fuusɩ ban ma sɛ bonsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ jaa vɛvɛɛ.
Bala wa lɔ̃ɔ taa dire, a ji'yɔ̃ɔnsɩ jie lɛ ba ma nʊ̃ ɩka ba jãnɛ, nɩ a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir a jibɛrɛ jiir.
Ala tɩ na ba ma bʊɔrɔ ɩka bama puoro ba a dar pɔ, na ba ma bʊɔrɔ ɩka nɩbɛ ba bʊɔlɔ ba, Wiwiilbe.
“Yɩ ta sɔɔ ka ba bʊɔlɔ yɩ, Wiwiilbe ɛ, nɩkpɛ̃ɛ bʊ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ yɩ tara. Yɩ jaa ɩn yɛɛr.
Yɩ ta bʊɔl nɩrɛ jaa yɩ, sãa a wɛr pɔ ɛ, bojũu yɩ tara na Sãa bʊ̃'yen na be a saaju.
Bɩɩ yɩ ta bʊɔl nɩrɛ jaa wiwile ɛ, bojũu yɩ tara na Wiwile bʊ̃'yen tɛɛ na ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.
A 'lɔ na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ ɩ a yɩ kpɛ̃ɛ wʊ ɩ a yɩ tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na 'mɔɔrɔ a wʊ mãɛ ire nɩ, Nãaŋmɩn na suun wʊn pĩlem tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na siir wʊ mãɛ Nãaŋmɩn na 'mɔɔ wʊn ka wʊ do.
“Tɩchɛ nɛbier ben a yɩn nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne na ɩ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme sɛ̃. Yɩ pɔɔn a nɩbɛ var bar a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ. Yɩn mãɛ ba kpɩɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ na yɩ pɔɔ var a bala na bʊɔrɔ a kpɛfʊ bar.

“Nɛbier ben a yɩn nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne na ɩ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme sɛ̃. Yɩ ma yɔn jitɛbɛ nɩ a man pɔ na yɩ tɩ 'yɛr lɩɛb nɩrɛ tɩɛr, yɩn wa tʊ̃ɔ wʊ ka wʊ kaara a yɩ kaar, yɩ ma lɩɛb wʊ naa ka wʊn di dɔɔyɛ a bũu dagel pɔ a yɩ kaar.
“Nɛbier ben a bala na ɩ jɔ̃n tɩ na ba tɔɔrɔ a jɔ̃n, na ba ma 'yɛr ɩka, ‘Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na pɔn a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir a ba ɩ tuo ɛ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na pɔn a sɛlma 'lɔ na be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir a lũ wʊ naa.’
Yɩ ɩn jɔ̃n na yɩ ɩ jɔlɔ. Buor lɛ ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ, a sɛlma bɩɩ a Nãaŋmɩn yir 'lɔ na maal a sɛlma ka wʊ ɩ a chɛchɛ?
Yɩ mɩ 'yɛr naa, ‘Ala ɩ nɩrɛ pɔn na a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lofʊ jie, a ba tuo ɛ, tɩchɛ ala ɩ nɩrɛ pɔn na a Nãaŋmɩn kʊfʊ 'lɔ na dɔɔl a jie, a lũ wʊ naa.’
Yɩn jɔ̃n banyã. Buor lɛ ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ, a kʊfʊ bɩɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lofʊ jie na ma vɛ̃ ka wʊ ɩ chɛchɛ?
A lɛ jũu, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na pɔn a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lofʊ jie, pɔn wʊ naa nɩ bon jaa na dɔɔl a wʊ ju.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na pɔn a Nãaŋmɩn yir, pɔn wʊ naa nɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na jãnɛ a be.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na pɔn a saaju, pɔn naa a Nãaŋmɩn nãkɔɔ nɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na jãnɛ a be.

“Nɛbier ben a yɩn nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne na ɩ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme sɛ̃. Yɩ ma ir a bonsɩ pɔ jiir pie pɔ bʊ̃'yen lɔ̃ɔn badʊʊ gba vaar kʊ Nãaŋmɩn, tɩ na yɩ tɔr a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛr ala na tɩrɛ bar na ɩ yelmãɛ sɔr tufʊ, nɩbaal kaafʊ nɩ yelmãɛ tarfʊ. A anyã lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka yɩ turo tɩ na yɩ taa ire amɩne bara ɛ.
Yɩn jɔ̃tɔɔrbɔ ba nyã. Yɩ ma chuor a jãajubil bar tɩ ma vɔl a nyɔɔma.
“Nɛbier ben a yɩn nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne na ɩ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme sɛ̃. Yɩ ma pɛɛn a ŋmanyuraa nɩ a ladiraa a yõo tɩchɛ ka a pʊɔ sɛɛn bɔgar nɩ nyuur.
Yɩn Faraseemɩne na ɩ jɔ̃n. Yɩ ma dɔ̃ɔ pɛɛ a ŋmanyuraa pʊɔ tɩchɛ ka a yõo mɩ pãa pɛɛ a yõo ka a vɩɛlɛ.
“Nɛbier ben a yɩn nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne na ɩ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme sɛ̃. Yɩ kaara fɩka yar ban pãɛ ka a vɩɛlɛ, tɩchɛ ka a pʊɔ pɔ tara nɩbɛ kɔbɔ nɩ dɛɛr jaa bʊrɔ.
Lɛ nɩ wʊ ju mɩ lɛ a yɩn a yõo, yɩ ɩn nɩtor a yɩ taaba sɛ̃, tɩchɛ a yɩ pʊɔm, yɩ tara na nɛɛr ayi nɩ putuyele.
“Nɛbier ben a yɩn nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne na ɩ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme sɛ̃. Yɩ mɛn a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ yar, tɩ na chɔɔr a bala na tor yar,
tɩ na yɩ 'yɛr ɩka, ‘Sɩn ta be be a sɩ sãakpãmɩne sɔ̃ɔ, sɩ kʊ̃ naa ta pʊɔ ba kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ɛ.’
A nɩtɔ̃ jũu yɩ din a yɩ mãɛ dãasɩɛ ɩka yɩ ɩn a nɩbɛ bala na kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ bibiir.
Yɩ baar baar a lɛ a yɩ sãakpãmɩne na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ.
“Yɩn waa bibiir, ŋmɩnɛ yɩn ɩrɛ wa chãɛ a bũu dagel kũu.
A lɛ jũu ɩn tʊ̃n Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ, yɛ̃n dẽme, nɩ a wiwiilbe, ka yɩ kʊ bamɩne yɔɔl a daa ju, yɩn pɔɔn bamɩne na yɩ fɔb ba a yɩ lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir, tɩ na yɩ pãa tulo yʊɔrɔ bʊɔrɔ ba a tẽn a jaa.
Ka a na di yɩ a nɩbɛ bala na ɩ a nɩtor ba bɔ̃ɔ yele jaa yɩn kʊ, piel a Abel jãɩ sɔ̃ɔ tɩ tãn a Jekariya bidaba Barakiya ban kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lofʊ jie nɩ a puorfʊ jie chara pɔ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, a yɩn dɩna nɩbɛ na nyɛn gefʊ a yele anyãna jũu.

“Pa yɩn Jerusalɛm nɩbɛ, a yɩn na ma kʊrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na yɩ lɔɔrɔ a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na tʊ̃ a yɩ sɛ̃ nɩ kʊsɩbɛ, nyɛ lɛ an ma ɩrɛ ma vɔlaa jã ka n ma bʊɔrɔ ɩka n kaal a fʊ bibiir 'mataa fɩka nʊ̃ɔ na ma ũun a wʊ bil, tɩchɛ ka faa bʊɔrɔ ɩka fʊ maal a lɛ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu n bar a fʊ tẽe kʊ fʊ ka wʊ ɩ dakpolo.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka yɩ kʊ̃ lɛ nyɛ ma go ɛ, wa tɩ tãn yɩn na 'yɛr ɩka, ‘Nãaŋmɩn wʊ sʊ̃ʊ a 'lɔ wʊn tʊ̃.’ ”
Yesu na wa yi a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir pɔ na wʊ chiine, a wʊ poturbo turo wile ɩka wʊ nyɛ lɛ ban mɛ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir ka wʊ kaara.
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Mɩ yɩ mɩ nyɛ naa anyãna a jaa? Yelmãɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, a kʊsɩvɩɛl anyãna ãsʊɔ jaa kʊ lɛ wa chɛnɛ dɔɔl a wʊ tɔ ju ɛ. Ban wa dãn a jaa lɔb.”
Yesu na wa do jãnɛ a Olive Tɔ̃ɔju, a poturbo wan a wʊ sɛ̃ a ba tɛɛ wa sʊʊr wʊ, “'Yɛr kʊ sɩ a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a anyãna nɩ na ɩ. Bo lɛ na ɩ a jãnɛ a fʊ waa sɔ̃ɔ nɩ a wɛr baarfʊ daar?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn sʊ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa ta wa bɛl yɩ ɛ.
Bojũu, nɩyɔɔ na de naa maa yuor waan wa 'yɛrɛ, ‘Maa lɛ a Nɩ-iraa,’ na ban bɛl nɩyɔɔ.
Yɩn wa wõn tam, ka ba 'yɛrɛ a tam 'yɛr, yɩ ta mɩrɛ ɛ. A lɛ na ɩ naa, tɩchɛ a wɛr baarfʊ chɛnɛ na be puor.
Paal dẽdẽme na yin tam, ka a nãmɩne mɩ yɩ tam ka kɔ̃ mɩ lo ka a tẽe jiir amɩne dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.
A dɔɔyɛ anyãna, an kaara fɩka a pɔɔ na ma dɔɔrɔ ka a wõnõ wʊ.
“Ban pãa nyɔɔr yɩn chiin na ba tɩ pɔb yɩ na ba kʊ yɩ, ka a paalsɩ a jaa 'laar yɩ, yɩn sɔɔ ma jũu.
Nɩyɔɔ na bar a ba sɔɔfʊ, na ba gar 'yɔ̃ɔ taa na ba 'laar taa.
Jir ŋmarba 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na wan wa 'yɛrɛ bɛlɛ nɩyɔɔ.
Nɩyɔɔ nɩ na tɔr Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ, ba kʊ̃ nʊ̃ taa ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ nyã na ara tɩ tãn a baaraa Nãaŋmɩn na faa wʊ naa.
Ban mʊɔl a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã a wɛr wʊ jaa ka a ɩ dãasɩɛ a paalsɩ a jaa pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a wɛr pãa baar.
“Yɩn wa nyɛ naa a yele 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'laar na waara nɩ sɔ̃ɔfʊ ka wʊ be a jichɛchɛ 'lɔ nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Danɩɛl na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr. Vɛ̃ ka a nyã na kara bɔ̃ɔ a par.
Yɩn wa nyɛ a lɛ a nɩbɛ bala na kpɩɛrɛ a Juda, ba jo do a tɔ̃ɔ ju.
Nɩrɛ jaa na be gar ju, wʊ ta suu a die pɔ tɩ de bon jaa ɛ.
'Lɔ mɩ na be a puo pɔ wʊ ta kul a yir tɩ de a wʊ fuu ɛ.
A bɩbir nyãna wa vɩɛ an ɩn tuo kʊ a pɔɔpʊʊr nɩ a bala na tara a bi'yɛnsɩ.
Yɩ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka a yɩ jofʊ ta ɩ sãɛ ɛ, bɩɩ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn na maal a wɛr wa tãn a pʊ̃pãanyã, baa di a dɔɔyɛ nyã bʊrɔ ɛ, bɩɩ dɔɔyɛ kʊ̃ lɛ wa jã wʊ go ɛ.
Ala ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn ba ŋmaa a ber ala bar ɛ, nɩrɛ kʊ̃ lɛ chɛnɛ go ɛ. Tɩchɛ a bala wʊn chɛl ir jũu wʊn ŋmaan a ber bar.
A lɛ daar nɩrɛ wa 'yɛr yɩ ɩka, ‘Nyɛ a Nɩ-iraa,’ bɩɩ ‘'Lɔ nɩ nyã,’ yɩ ta sɔɔ de ɛ.
Bojũu jirsɩ Nɩ-irsɩ nɩ jirsɩ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na wa naa wa tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ na ba bɛl nɩbɛ bamɩne ala ɩ ba tʊ̃ɔ naa ban 'mantaa bɛl a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na chɛl ir.
Yɩ nyɛ, n den nie 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ.
“A lɛ jũu, bala wa 'yɛr kʊ yɩ ɩka, ‘Nyɛ 'lɔ nɩ nyã a dãlpʊɔ ju,’ yɩ ta yi a be ɛ. ‘Bala wa 'yɛr nyɛ, 'lɔ nɩ nyã a die pɔ,’ yɩ ta sɔɔ ɛ.
A lɛ a saa nyɩɩrfʊ na ma yi a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ purfʊ jie na wʊ chaar 'yɔ̃ɔ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ mʊrfʊ jie, lɛ lɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie waa mɩ na kaara.
Jie 'lɔ jaa bʊ̃kũu na be, be lɛ a sɩdumo ma 'laara.
“Ajienaa, a ber anyãna a dɔɔyɛ baarfʊ puor, ‘A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na lii naa, ka a chuu mɩ kʊ̃ lɛ chaar ɛ, ka a ŋmɛrbie pɔrɔ yire a saaju loro, ka a saaju bonsɩ a jaa dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.’
“A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ban nyɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie na waara a julõjuur pɔ, ka a paalsɩ a jaa na be ka a wɛr pɔ kõnõ. Ka ba nyɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie na yi a saaju a julõjuur pɔ, waara nɩ kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ tɩɩr.
Wʊn tʊ̃n a wʊ malakasɩ ka ba pɛɛl a ɩɩl kpɛ̃ɔ jaa na ba bʊɔl a nɩbɛ bala wʊn chɛl ir a wɛr wʊ jaa 'mataa.
“Yɩ de a pɔlpɔl tɩɛr yele jãn yɛ̃. 'Lɔ wa tʊɔrɔ a vaar, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a tʊl sɔɔ gbʊr naa.
A lɛ nɩ wʊ ju mɩ lɛ, yɩn wa nyɛ a yelsɩ anyãna, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a maa Nɩsaal Bie waa gbʊr naa jaa yɛ̃yɛ̃.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, a pʊ̃pãanyã nɩbɛ kʊ̃ kpi baar ɛ, wa tɩ tãn a yelsɩ anyãna na ɩ.
A saaju nɩ a wɛr na wa baaraa, tɩchɛ maa 'yɛrbie 'lɔ kʊ̃ wa baar ɛ.
“Nɩrɛ jaa ba bɔ̃ɔ a bɩbir nyã ɛ, bɩɩ a sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a malakasɩ mɩ gba na be a saaju ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, bɩɩ a Bie ɛ, ka a Sãa tɛɛ ba lɛ bɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
A lɛ an dɔ̃ɔ kaara a Nowa sɔ̃ɔ, lɛ lɛ an mɩ na kaara a maa Nɩsaal Bie waa sɔ̃ɔ.
Bojũu sɛrɛ, tɩchɛ ka a kɔ̃paalaa wa nɩbɛ dire na, tɩ nyuro, ka dɔɔr nɩ pɔbɔ kulo taa, tɩ tãn a bɩbir 'lɔ a Nowa na kpɛ a daka bulomtum pɔ.
Baa bɔ̃ɔn ɛ, tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a kɔ̃paalaa na wa di ba, lɛ mɩ lɛ an kaara a maa Nɩsaal Bie waa daar.
Nɩbɛ ayi na ben puo pɔ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn wa de a ãsʊɔ chiin tɩ bar a ãsʊɔ.
Pɔbɔ ayi na 'mantaa nɩɛnɛ jɔ̃ ka a Nãaŋmɩn wa de a ãsʊɔ chiin tɩ bar a ãsʊɔ.
“A lɛ jũu yɩ kaara sʊ̃, bojũu yaa bɔ̃ɔ a bɩbir 'lɔ a yɩ Soro nɩ na wa ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a yele anyã par, a yir sʊɔ ta bɔ̃ɔn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a nãnyie na waara a tãsɔɔ, wʊ kʊ̃ naa gur ɛ, ka a nãnyie wa kar kpɛ wʊ a yir ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ mɩ guro a yɩ mãɛ, bojũu a maa Nɩsaal Bie na wan a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ yɩn kʊ̃ bɔ̃ɔn ɛ.
“An lɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ɩ a yɛ̃ nɩ a yelmãɛ sʊɔ a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔ ka wʊ kaara wʊ a yir na wʊ kʊrɔ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ a ba bʊ̃diir a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʊn 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ?
An ɩn bɔɔsʊ̃n kʊ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ nyãna a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa nyɛ ka wʊ ɩrɛ a lɛ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, wʊn vɛ̃n ka wʊ kaara a wʊ bonsɩ a jaa.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ nyãna ɩn putusʊɔ na wʊ tɩɛr a wʊ nyãa pɔ ɩka, a n nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kor naa,
tɩ piel gere a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ bala na be a yir tɩ pãa ma di na wʊ ma pʊɔ a dãnyurbo pɔ,
a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa dũu wʊ naa a bɩbir 'lɔ wʊn ba tɩɛr nɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʊn ba bɔ̃ɔn ɛ.
Wʊn ŋma wʊn gbʊl gbʊl 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme pɔ, be lɛ ban kõnõ tɩ ɔɔrɔ nyɩmɛ.
“A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ na kaara fɩka pɔɔsarsɩ pie na de a ba fãtɩnɛ ɩka ba tɩ tuor a pɔɔ paalaa nɩ a wʊ sɩrɛ.
Ka a ba anũu ɩ jɔlɔ, tɩchɛ ka a ba anũu mɩ ɩ yɛ̃ dẽme.
A jɔlɔ bala den a ba fãtɩnɛ tɩchɛ baa de kãa pʊɔ ɛ,
tɩchɛ ka a ba anũu bala mɩ na ɩ a yɛ̃ dẽme, de kãa pʊɔ a ba fãtɩnɛ pɔ.
A pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ na wa kor a waa jũu, gʊ̃ɔ kpɛ ba naa ka ba gã gur.
“A tãsɔɔ bãɩn lɛ ba ŋme chɛlma tãna 'yɛrɛ, ‘A pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ waara, yɩ yi wa tuor wʊ yooo.’
“A pɔɔsarsɩ pie banyãna vaan ir tɩɛ tɩɛ a ba gonsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba fãtɩnɛ pɔ.
A jɔlɔ bala 'yɛr kʊ a yɛ̃ dẽme, ‘Yɩ pʊr a yɩ kãa amɩne kʊ sɩ, a sɩ bonsɩ kpĩine naa.’
“Be lɛ ka a yɛ̃ dẽme bala 'yɛr kʊ ba, ‘Kai, a kʊ̃ ta sɩ nɩ a yɩn ɛ. Yɩ chen a be ban daara na yɩ tɩ da.’
“Tɩchɛ, ban lɩɛb chiine a dafʊ jie, a pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ wa naa, ka a bala jaa na chɔɔr 'mataa kpɛ a pɔɔ paalaa kulfʊ jie, tɩ na ba nyɔɔ a pãn pɔɔ.
“A jɔlɔ anũu bala mɩ wa bɩɛr wa na ba mɩ wa kpooro a pãn 'yɛr, ‘Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, yuo a pãn ka sɩ kpɛ.’
“Tɩchɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, ‘Yelmãɛ jaa, n ba bɔ̃ɔ yɩ ɛ.’
“A lɛ jũu yɩ gu yɩ mãɛ bojũu yaa bɔ̃ɔ a bɩbir bɩɩ a sɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
“A mɩ lɛ nyɛntãan go fɩka daba kɔ̃ɔ na bʊɔrɔ yɔfʊ na wʊ bʊɔl a wʊ gbãgbaar 'mataa de a wʊ bonsɩ põ ba.
Wʊ kʊn ãsʊɔ sɛlbie anũu, na wʊ kʊ ãsʊɔ mɩ sɛlbie ayi na wʊ kʊ ãsʊɔ mɩ sɛlbir bʊ̃'yen. Wʊ ma kʊn ãsʊɔ jaa man a wʊ fɔ̃ɔ, tɩ na wʊ yɔ.
A 'lɔ na de a sɛlbie anũu tɩ yar nyɛ sɛlbie anũu tʊ̃nɔ̃ dɔɔl.
A 'lɔ mɩ na de a sɛlbie ayi tɩ yar mɩ nyɛ sɛlbie ayi tʊ̃nɔ̃ dɔɔl.
Tɩchɛ a 'lɔ na de a sɛlbir bʊ̃'yen tɩ tuun bɔɔ de a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛlbir ũu.
“An wa kor bãlãa ka a gbãgbaar bala nɩkpɛ̃ɛ wa wa ɩka ba guor a sɛlbie yele.
A 'lɔ na de a sɛlbie anũu waan na sɛlbie anũu wa 'yɛr, ‘Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, sɛlbie anũu lɛ fʊ dɔ̃ɔ kʊ ma, nyɛ sɛlbie anũu tɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ n nyɛ dɔɔl.’
“Ka a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, ‘Fʊ tʊ̃n vɩla, gbãgbamãɛ lɛ fʊ ɩ. Fʊ tara na yelmãɛ a bʊ̃bile pɔ, ɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ fʊn ka fʊ kaara bʊ̃yɔɔ. Wa pʊɔ ma ka sɩ 'mataa dire a nʊ̃ɔ.’
“A 'lɔ mɩ wʊn kʊ a sɛlbie ayi wa 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, ‘Fʊ dɔ̃ɔ kʊ ma sɛlbie ayi, nyɛ sɛlbie ayi tʊ̃nɔ̃ lɛ n nyɛ dɔɔl.’
“Ka a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, ‘Fʊ tʊ̃n vɩla, gbãgbamãɛ lɛ fʊ ɩ. Fʊ tara na yelmãɛ a bʊ̃bile pɔ, ɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ fʊn ka fʊ kaara bʊ̃yɔɔ. Wa pʊɔ ma ka sɩ 'mataa dire a nʊ̃ɔ.’
“A 'lɔ mɩ wʊn kʊ a sɛlbir bʊ̃'yen wa 'yɛr naa, ‘Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, n bɔ̃ɔn na fʊn ɩ nɩbikõo sʊɔ na fʊ ma ŋma a be fʊn ba bʊr ɛ, na fʊ ma wob a be fʊn maa yaar bar ɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka dãbãɛ kpɛ ma ka de a fʊ sɛlbir tɩ ũu bar. Nyɛ a fʊ sɛlbir.’
“Ka a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, ‘Fʊ̃ʊ gbãgbaputuo nɩ koro sʊɔ nyã. Fʊn ben bɔ̃ɔn ɩka n ma ŋman a be ɩn maa bʊr ɛ, naa wob a jie 'lɔ ɩn maa yaar bar ɛ,
a ta sɛɛn ɩka fʊ ta de a n sɛlbir tɩ yɔ̃ɔ a libie yir pɔ, ka maa ta wa lɩɛb wa ka n nyɛ tʊ̃nɔ̃ dɔɔl ɛ?
“ ‘Yɩ faa a sɛlbir bʊ̃'yen a wʊ sɛ̃ na yɩ kʊ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara a sɛlbie pie.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na tara yɔɔ, ban kʊ wʊn yɔɔ pʊɔ ka ba tara yɔɔ tɩchɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba tara bon jaa ɛ, a bãlãa 'lɔ wʊn tara gba ban faan yin a wʊ sɛ̃.
A gbãgbaburbur nyã 'lɔ, yɩ de wʊ lɔb bar yõo be lɛ ban kõnõ tɩ ɔɔrɔ nyɩmɛ.’
“A maa Nɩsaal Bie wa wa a n tɩɩr pɔ, nɩ a n malakasɩ ba jaa, ɩn wa jãnɛ naa, a n tɩɩr nãalʊ̃ʊ dakɔɔ ju.
A paalsɩ a jaa na pãa lɔ̃ɔ taa a n niem, ka n pãa oor a nɩbɛ nɩtãa lɛ pɛchinɛ na ma oor a piir nɩ a bʊʊr.
Ɩn oon a piir bar a n nũsʊ̃ɔ jie, tɩchɛ ka a bʊʊr mɩ ara a n gʊbaa jie.
“Ka n pãa 'yɛr kʊ a bala na be a n nũsʊ̃ɔ jie, ‘Yɩ wa, yɩn a n Sãa Nãaŋmɩn na sʊ̃ʊ. Yɩ wa kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ, de a yɩ nãbomo wʊn chɔɔr bin gun yɩ a wɛr pielfʊ sɔ̃ɔ.
Bojũu kɔ̃ dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ ma, ka yɩ kʊ ma ka n di, kɔ̃nyũur dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ ma, ka yɩ kʊ ma kʊ̃ɔ ka n nyũ, n dɔ̃ɔ ɩ sãan ka yɩ ir ma sãan.
N ba dɔ̃ɔ tara bʊ̃sursɩ ɛ, ka yɩ kʊ ma fuu ka n su, n dɔ̃ɔ bɩɛrɛ ka yɩ sãa ma. N dɔ̃ɔ be pɔɔfʊ die pɔ, ka yɩ wa piir ma kaa.’
“A nɩmɩn na pãa lɩɛb sʊʊr wʊ, ‘Sɩ Soro, nyɩnɛ lɛ sɩ nyɛ fʊ, ka a kɔ̃ kpɛ fʊ, ka sɩ kʊ fʊ bʊ̃diir a fʊ di, bɩɩ ka kɔ̃nyũur kpɛ fʊ, ka sɩ kʊ fʊ kʊ̃ɔ a fʊ nyũ?
Sɔ̃ɔ buor lɛ sɩ nyɛ fʊ, ka fʊ ɩ sãan ka sɩ ir fʊ a sãan, bɩɩ ka faa tara bʊ̃sursɩ ɛ, ka sɩ kʊ fʊ fuu a fʊ su?
Sɔ̃ɔ buor lɛ sɩ nyɛ fʊ, ka fʊ bɩɛrɛ, ka sɩ tɩ piir fʊ kaa, bɩɩ sɔ̃ɔ buor lɛ ba nyɔɔ fʊ pɔɔ ka sɩ chen tɩ piir fʊ kaa?’
“A nãa na 'yɛr kʊ ba, ‘Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, a lɛ yɩn dɔ̃ɔ maal kʊ a nɩba'yɔ̃ɔnsɩ bala na ɩ a n sofʊ, maa lɛ yɩ maal kʊ.’
“Tɩchɛ na wʊ pãa 'yɛr kʊ a bala mɩ na be a wʊ gʊbaa jie, ‘Pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ turo yɩ naa, yɩ tɔɔ chen be na yɩ tɩ kpɛ a bũu 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na gbɔɔ gun a tɩɩ nɩ a wʊ malakasɩ.
Bojũu kɔ̃ dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ ma, ka yaa kʊ ma bon jaa ka n di ɛ. Kɔ̃nyũur dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ ma, ka yaa kʊ ma kʊ̃ɔ ka n nyũ ɛ.
N dɔ̃ɔ ɩ sãan, ka yaa kaa ma sãan kaa fʊ ɛ, n ba tara bon jaa na su ɛ, ka yaa kʊ ma fuu ka su ɛ, ka n bɩɛrɛ, bɩɩ be pɔɔfʊ die pɔ, ka yaa wa piir ma kaa ɛ.’

“Ka ba pãa mɩ lɩɛb sʊʊr wʊ, ‘Sɩ Soro, sɔ̃ɔ buor lɛ sɩ nyɛ fʊ, ka a kɔ̃ kpɛ fʊ, bɩɩ ka a kɔ̃nyũur kpɛ fʊ, bɩɩ ka fʊ ɩ sãan, bɩɩ ka faa tara bon jaa na su ɛ, bɩɩ ka fʊ bɩɛrɛ, bɩɩ ka fʊ be pɔɔfʊ die pɔ, ka saa kaa fʊ ɛ?’
“Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, ‘Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, yɩn ba maal kʊ a nɩba'yɔ̃ɔnsɩ bala ãsʊɔ ɛ, maa lɛ yaa maal kʊ ɛ.’
“A nɩbɛ banyãna na chen a dɔɔyɛ 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ jie, tɩchɛ ka a nɩmɩn mɩ chen a nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ jie.”
A Yesu na wa 'yɛr a anyãna a jaa baar, wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo,
“Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a chɛn ber ayi ka a Gõl Bar Difʊ na ta, ka ba na de a maa Nɩsaal Bie tɩr ka ba kpa ma a daa ju.”
A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ lɔ̃ɔ taa a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ yir na di Kayafasɩ,
na ba bʊɔrɔ vuo ban na tu nyɔɔ a Yesu na ba kʊ.
Tɩchɛ ka ba 'yɛr, a ta ɩ a Gõl Bar Difʊ sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, ka jɛɛr taa ɩrɛ wa ir a chara pɔ ɛ.
Yesu na wa be a Betanɩ a Simon 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a kɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ yir,
ban wa jɛ̃ dire, pɔɔ kɔ̃ɔ waan na pãrtɔvɩla nɩ kãnyũu kɔ̃ɔ dafʊ na ba wõnõ ɛ, na wʊ kpaar dɔɔl a Yesu ju.
A poturbo na wa nyɛ a lɛ, ba nyɛn suur na ba 'yɛr, “Bo lɛ so ka wʊ sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a kãnyũu nyã bar a nɩtɔ̃?
Fʊn taa den a kãnyũu anyãna da libiyɔɔ de kʊ a nɔ̃n dẽme.”
Yesu na bɔ̃ɔn a ba tɩɛr, wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ mii 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ? Wʊ maal vɩla kʊ ma.
A nɔ̃n dẽme 'lɔ, yɩn nɩ bala ben ka tɩchɛ maa kʊ be a yɩ sɛ̃ sɔ̃ɔ jaa ɛ.
Wʊn kpaar a kãnyũu anyãna 'yɔ̃ɔ ma, wʊ maal a lɛ chɔɔr ma gun a n ũufʊ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, jie jaa ban wa mʊɔl a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyãna a wɛr wʊ jaa pɔ, ban 'yɛr naa a lɛ a pɔɔ nyã na ɩ na ba chɛnɛ tara a wʊ tɩɛr.”
A Pie Nɩ Ayi bala ãsʊɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Judas Isɩkariyot chen a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ sɛ̃
tɩ sʊʊr ba, “Bo lɛ yɩn kʊ ma ala ɩ n de wʊn 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩ nuur pɔ?” Ba sɔr sɛlbie lɩjɛr nɩ pie kʊ wʊ.
An yɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ wʊ bʊɔrɔ na vuo wʊn na tu de a Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba nuur pɔ.
A bɩbir dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ɩ naa a Paanʊ̃kõo Lɔ̃ɔfʊ, ka a Yesu poturbo wa sʊʊr wʊ, “Nyɩnɛ lɛ fʊ bʊɔrɔ ɩka sɩ chen tɩ chɔɔr a Gõl Bar nyã Difʊ bar ka sɩ tɩ di?”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ chen a tẽe pɔ, daba kɔ̃ɔ sɛ̃ na yɩ tɩ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, ‘A wiwile 'yɛr naa, a n sɔ̃ɔ gbʊr naa, ka maa nɩ a n poturbo na di a Gõl Bar Difʊ a fʊ yir.’ ”
A poturbo ɩn a lɛ jaa a Yesu na 'yɛr ɩka ba ɩ. Ka ba maal a Gõl Bar bʊ̃diir.
A jãanʊɔr na wa ta, Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo Pie nɩ Ayi wa jɛ̃n jil a bʊ̃diir na di.
Ban wa dire, wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, a yɩ ãsʊɔ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ ma.”
Be lɛ ka ba jaa pʊʊr sɔ̃ɔ ka ba sʊrɔ wʊ bʊ̃'yen 'yen, “An ɩn maa lɛ ɔ, n Soro?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “A 'lɔ ɩn 'mataa tun ala bʊ̃'yen pɔ lɛ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ ma.
A maa Nɩsaal Bie na kpi naa nɩtãa lɛ ban sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ. Tɩchɛ nɛbier ben a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a maa Nɩsaal Bie wʊn din dɔɔyɛ gar nɩrɛ jaa. Bala ta ba dɔɔ wʊ ɛ, ala sa.”
Judas a 'lɔ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ sʊʊr, “An ɩn maa lɛ ɔ, Wiwile?” Ka a Yesu sɔɔ, “Ɔ̃ɔ, fʊ̃ʊ lɛ.”
Ban wa dire, Yesu den a paanʊ̃ɔ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan na wʊ ŋma de kʊ a wʊ poturbo, tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr, “Yɩ de 'wɔb, a maa ãgãn lɛ.”
Wʊ lɛ den a ŋmele 'lɔ ban nyuro nɩ, na wʊ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan tɩ lɛ de kʊ ba, “Yɩ jaa yɩ de nyũ.
A anyãna lɛ ɩ a n jãɩ na ɩ a nɛtɩraa ɩn tara nɩ yɩ na tara kpɛ̃ɔ. An kpaar na a faa nɩyɔɔ ka yelbier vɛ̃ kʊfʊ be be.
N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, n kʊ̃ lɛ nyũ a dãa anyãna ɛ, wa tɩ tãn a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ɩn na 'mataa nyũn yɩ a dãpaalaa a n Sãa nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.”
Ban wa yiel a yiel dãn Nãaŋmɩn, ba suun chen a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ ju.
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ jaa na jon a tãsɔɔ nyãna tɩ bar ma a n yõ, a maa jũu. A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, ‘Ɩn ŋme naa pɛchinɛ kʊ ka a piir yɛ̃yɛl.’
Tɩchɛ maa wa ir a kũu pɔ, ɩn dɔ̃ɔ yɩn nie chen a Galilee.”
Ka a Pita 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ala ɩ ba jaa sɔɔn bar fʊ a fʊ jũu, maa 'lɔ kʊ̃ bar fʊ ɛ.”
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a Pita, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ fʊ, ɩka a tãsɔɔ nyãna a nɔrdɔ̃ɔ kʊ̃ kõ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka fʊ chiir ma gbɛɛ ata.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita 'yɛr kʊ wʊ ɩka, “Ala ɩ maa nɩ fʊ̃ʊ na 'mataa kpi gba, tɩ n kʊ̃ 'yɛr ɩka n ba bɔ̃ɔ fʊ ɛ.” Ka a poturbo bala mɩ na chɛ 'yɛr a lɛ nɛ.
Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo chen a jie 'lɔ ban bʊɔlɔ a Getɩsemanɩ, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ jãnɛ a kana tɩchɛ ka n chen tɩ sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn.”
Be lɛ wʊ tara Pita nɩ Jebedee bibiir ayi ka a wʊ pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ jaa ka tɩɛr nyɔɔ wʊ.
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “N tɩɛr sɔ̃ɔ naa, tɩ nyɛtãan kũn, yɩ jãnɛ a ka na gu ma.”
Wʊ chen a niem bãlãa tɩ lo kpa tẽe sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ, “N Sãa ala ɩ a tara naa ɩfʊ kɔ̃ɔ, vɛ̃ ka a dɔɔyɛ ŋmele nyãna po ma. Tɩchɛ a ta ɩ lɛ maa na bʊɔrɔ ɛ, tɩ a ɩ a lɛ fʊ̃ʊ na bʊɔrɔ.”
Wʊ lɩɛb wa a poturbo sɛ̃ wa nyɛ ka ba guro. Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A mɔ̃ yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ jɛ̃ bãlãa jaa gu ma ɛ?
Yɩ jɛɔ chɛlɛ, na yɩ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka a bɛɛr kaa ta wa nyɔɔ yɩ ɛ. A ba tɩɛr bʊɔrɔ naa tɩchɛ ka a ba ãgãma ba tʊɔr ɛ.”
Wʊ lɛ chen a gbɛɛ ayi sʊɔ tɩ sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn. “N Sãa, ala ɩ a dɔɔyɛ ŋmele nyã kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ po ma ɛ, ka maa ba nyũn wʊ ɛ, fʊ̃ʊ bɔfʊ wʊ ɩ.”
Wʊ lɛ wan wa nyɛ ka ba chɛnɛ guro, bojũu gʊ̃ɔ kpɛ ba naa.
Be lɛ wʊ lɛ bar ba tɩ chen a gbɛɛ ata sʊɔ tɩ sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn a lɛ nɛ nɩ wʊ ju.
Wʊ lɩɛb wa a poturbo sɛ̃ wa sʊʊr ba, “Yɩ chɛnɛ na gã guro na yɩ pɛnɛ wɛ? Nyɛ, a sɔ̃ɔ ta naa ka ban gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a maa Nɩsaal Bie de wʊ kʊ a yelbe-ɩrbɛ.
Yɩ vaa ir ka sɩ chen. Yɩ nyɛ a gagaraa na waara.”
A Yesu na chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ, ka Judas na ɩ a wʊ poturbo Pie nɩ Ayi ãsʊɔ, tɩ daasãa nɩ nɩbɛ na yi a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ sɛ̃ waara nɩ sɔbɛrɛ nɩ dakʊrsɩ a wʊ sɛ̃.
A Judas dɔ̃ɔ man ba ɩka, a 'lɔ wʊn tɩ puor tɩ mʊʊr a kɔtɩr 'lɔ lɛ, yɩ nyɔɔ wʊ.
Ban wa tɩ ta, Judas pɔɔn chen tɩ 'yɛr, “Wiwile, n puor fʊ naa,” tɩ mʊʊr a Yesu kɔtɩr.
Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “N badaba, tʊ̃ a lɛ fʊn bʊɔrɔ ɩka fʊ tʊ̃.” Be lɛ ba wa nyɔɔ a Yesu.
Be lɛ ka a Yesu poturbo ãsʊɔ na ara gbʊr wʊ vʊ̃ɔ a sʊɔ chen a Juu dẽme bɔɔrlo nãa gbãgbaa toor ŋmaa.
Be lɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “De a sʊɔ su a sʊkpa pɔ, bala na jɛɛrɛ nɩ a sʊɔ na kpin a sʊɔ kũu.
Fʊ tɩɛr ɩka n kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ bʊɔl a n Sãa ka wʊ sʊ̃ʊ ma nɩ a malakasɩ gbulo pie nɩ ayi bɩɩ?
Tɩchɛ ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an ɩrɛ wa ɩ yelmãɛ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãma na 'yɛr ɩka a nɩtɔ̃ lɛ na ɩ?”
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, a Yesu sʊʊr a nɩyɔɔ bala, “A mɔ̃ nɩbier lɛ n ɩ ka yɩ waan sʊʊr nɩ dakʊrsɩ a n nyɔɔ fʊ jie wɛ? Bɩbir jaa lɛ n ma jãnɛ wile yɩ a puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ, tɩ yaa nyɔɔ ma ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a ɩ naa a lɛ ka a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn gãma pɔ ɩ yelmãɛ.” Be lɛ ka a Yesu poturbo ba jaa bar wʊ tɩ jo.
A bala na nyɔɔ a Yesu, chiin wʊ naa a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãa Kayafasɩ sɛ̃, ka a nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ ba jaa wa lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Tɩchɛ ka Pita be a puor jaa turo, na wʊ tɩ kpɛ a bɔɔrlo nãa yir bɛchaar pɔ, tɩ lɔ̃ɔ jãnɛ nɩ a gugurbo, ɩka wʊ nyɛ lɛ an na baar.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ nɩbɛrɛ pãa bʊɔrɔ jir ŋmarba ka ba na ŋmaa jire 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ, ka ba na tu a be kʊ a Yesu.
Tɩchɛ baa nyɛ yele jaa a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ. Nɩyɔɔ daan yi ŋma jiryɔɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ, tɩchɛ ka a ba 'yɛrbie ɩ jirsɩ. A baaraa nɩbɛ ayi daan yi
na ba 'yɛr ɩka, “A daba nyãna lɛ 'yɛr ɩka, ‘Ɩn tʊ̃ɔ ŋmɛr a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir nyãna bar tɩ de ber ata lɛ mɛn wʊ.’ ”
A be lɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãa ir ara tɩ sʊʊr a Yesu, “Faa tara 'yɛr jaa na 'yɛr bɩɩ? Bo dãasɩɛ lɛ a anyã ban dire dɔɔlɔ fʊ?”
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu ɩ jaa gbul. Be lɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãa 'yɛr, “N sʊrɔ fʊ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ɩ a vʊr niem, ɩka fʊ 'yɛr kʊ sɩ, ala ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie.”

Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ɔ̃ɔ, a lɛ nɛ fʊn 'yɛr lɛ. Tɩchɛ yɩ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ ɩka daar kɔ̃ɔ, yɩn nyɛn a maa Nɩsaal Bie na jãnɛ a Kpɛ̃ɔ Sʊɔ nũsʊ̃ɔ jie. Yɩ mɩ na lɛ nyɛ ma naa ka n yɩ a julõjuur pɔ waara.”
Ka a bɔɔrlo nãa tɔɔ a fuu chɩɛr tɩ 'yɛr, “Wʊ sɔ̃ɔn Nãaŋmɩn yuor. Bo lɛ so sɩn chɛnɛ bʊɔrɔ dãasɩdirbe? Yɩ wõn wʊ tʊ Nãaŋmɩn.
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tɩɛr?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Wʊ sɛɛn kũu.”
Ba chir nataar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ a nie pɔ, tɩ ma gbul nũu ŋmen wʊ, ka bamɩne mɩ ma 'ma wʊ,
tɩ sʊʊr, “Nɩ-iraa, ala ɩ fʊ bɔ̃ɔn yele jaa wiil sɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ŋme fʊ?”
Pita jãnɛ naa a yõo a bɛchaar pɔ. Ka a gbãgbapɔɔbile ãsʊɔ wa a wʊ sɛ̃ wa 'yɛr, “Fʊ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ turo a Yesu na yi a Galilee.”
Tɩchɛ ka wʊ chiir a ba jaa niem tɩ 'yɛr, “N ba bɔ̃ɔ a 'yɛr 'lɔ par fʊn 'yɛrɛ ɛ.”
Wʊn wa tɩ ara a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ, a pɔɔbile ãsʊɔ nyɛ wʊ naa na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ na ara a be, “A daba nyã mɩ dɔ̃ɔ turo a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ.”
Be lɛ a Pita lɛ chiir pɔ tɩ 'yɛr ɩka, “N ba bɔ̃ɔ a daba nyãna ɛ.”
A ba kor ɛ, ka a bala na ara gbʊr a Pita mɩ 'yɛr, “Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, fʊ ɩ naa a ba ãsʊɔ. A fʊ kɔkɔr yin fʊn chãa pɔ.”
Be lɛ ka a Pita pɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wʊ mãɛ tɩ mɩ pɔrɔ kʊrɔ ba 'yɛrɛ ɩka, “N ba bɔ̃ɔ a daba nyãna ɛ.” Ka a nɔraa mɩ tɔ̃ɔ kõ.
Be lɛ ka Pita tɩɛr tɔ a lɛ a Yesu na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, “Fʊn chiir ma naa gbɛɛ ata tɩchɛ ka a nɔraa kõ.” Ka a Pita ir yi a yõo tɩ kõ nɩbaal kõn.
A wɛr na wa chaar bibio, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa guor lɛ ban na ɩ kʊ a Yesu.
Ba lũ wʊn tara chiin a paal Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Pilate sɛ̃.
Judas na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ na wa nyɛ ɩka ba tɔɔr a Yesu 'yɛr guor a wʊ kʊfʊ, wʊ pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ naa ka wʊ lɛ lɩɛb a libibie lɩjɛr nɩ pie na wʊ tɩ kʊ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ.
Tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr, “N maal yelbier nɩ ɩn gar 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ na ba maal yelbier jaa ɛ.” Tɩchɛ ka ba 'yɛr, “Sɩ baka ba lɛ ɛ? Fʊ 'yɛr a ɩ.”
Wʊ den a libie lɔb bar a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir pɔ, tɩ na wʊ yi tɩ yɔɔl miir.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ wob a libie na ba 'yɛr ɩka a ba sɛɛ ɩka sɩ de yaa 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir libie pɔ ɛ, bojũu a ɩn jãɩ libie.
Ban wa guor taa baar, ba den a libie dãn a lamɩɛr wɛr a jie ban ma ũno sãanba.
Lɛ lɛ so ka nɩbɛ bʊɔlɔ a jie nyã, “Jãɩ Wɛr,” wa tãn dɩna.
A ɩn yelmãɛ nɩ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Jeremiya na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, “Ba den a libibie lɩjɛr nɩ pie a lɛ a Isɩral nɩbɛ na sɔɔ de,
na ba dãn a lamɩɛr wɛr nɩtãa lɛ a sɩ Soro na 'yɛr.”
Yesu na wa ara a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Pilate niem, wʊ sʊʊr wʊ naa, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nãa ɔ?” Ka a Yesu 'yɛr “Ɔ̃ɔ, a lɛ nɛ fʊn 'yɛr lɛ.”
A bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ na sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wʊ yuor, waa 'yɛr 'yɛr jaa ɛ.
Be lɛ a Pilate sʊʊr wʊ, faa 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr jaa wɛ? Nyɛ lɛ ban sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʊ yuor jã?
Tɩchɛ a Yesu ba haa nɛɛ sɔɔ wʊ nɩ a ala a jaa ban 'yɛrɛ dɔɔlɔ wʊ ɛ, ka a 'maa a Pilate nɛɛ.
A lɔ̃ɔ difʊ sɔ̃ɔ wa ta, ba ma 'yɛr ɩka a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Pilate wʊ ir nɩrɛ 'lɔ a nɩbɛ na bʊɔrɔ a pɔɔ fʊ die pɔ bar.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, ba pɔɔn daputuo sʊɔ kɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ jaa na bɔ̃ɔ ka wʊ di Barabasɩ.
A lɛ a nɩyɔɔ na wa lɔ̃ɔ taa, Pilate sʊʊr ba naa, “An lɛ yɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka n yuo kʊ yɩ, Barabasɩ bɩɩ Yesu, a 'lɔ ban bʊɔlɔ a Nɩ-iraa?”
Bojũu wʊ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a nyuur ban tara nɩ a Yesu lɛ so ban nyɔɔ wʊ waan a wʊ sɛ̃.
A Pilate na wa jãnɛ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ dakɔɔ ju, a wʊ pɔɔ tʊ̃n 'yɛr wʊ, “Taa ɩrɛ wa ɩrɛ a daba 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na ba maal bon jaa yele jaa ɛ, bojũu jãa, n din dɔɔyɛ jãn pɔ nɩ a wʊ yele.”
Tɩchɛ a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩyɔɔ ɩka ba sʊɔr ka wʊ yuo Barabasɩ bar, tɩ kʊ a Yesu.
Ka a Nãa Pilate lɛ bɔ̃ɔ sʊʊr ba go, “A nɩbɛ banyã ayi, buor lɛ yɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka n yuo kʊ yɩ?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Barabasɩ.”
Ka a Nãa Pilate sʊʊr ba, “Tɩ n ɩ ŋmɩnɛ nɩ a 'lɔ yɩn bʊɔlɔ a Nɩ-iraa?” Ka ba jaa 'yɛr, “Kpa wʊ a daa ju.”
Ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Bo yelbier lɛ wʊ ɩ? Bo dɛɛr lɛ wʊ maal?” Tɩchɛ ka ba tãna kpɛ̃ɔ jaa 'yɛrɛ, “Kpa wʊ a daa ju.”

A Pilate na wa nyɛ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ yele jaa ɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ wɩlɛwɩlɛ jaa tɩ gar, ka wʊ de kʊ̃ɔ pɛɛn a wʊ nuur a nɩyɔɔ niem, tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr, “Maa ba pʊɔ a daba nyã kũu pɔ ɛ. Yɩn sɛ̃ lɛ a be.”
Be lɛ ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa 'mataa 'yɛr, “Vɛ̃ ka a wʊ jãɩ dɔɔl a sɩn nɩ a sɩ bibiir ju.”
Be lɛ wʊ yuo a Barabasɩ kʊ ba. Wʊ vɛ̃ naa ka ba fɔb a Yesu tɩ wʊ de wʊ kʊ a sojasɩ ka ban tɩ kpa a daa ju.
Be lɛ ka a sojasɩ tara a Yesu tɩ kpɛ̃n a nãa yir kpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ pɔ, tɩ bʊɔl a ba taaba sojasɩ lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Ba yaar a wʊ bonsɩ bar tɩ de fuu jɩɛ su wʊ,
na ba lɛ de gʊʊr wob nãa jupil kaar su wʊ. Ba den dãgbal 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ a nũsʊ̃ɔ pɔ, na ba gbur dumo a wʊ niem laara wʊ, “Yãan yooo, Juu nɩbɛ nãa!”
Ba ma chɩr nataar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ tɩ de daa ŋmen wʊ a ju pɔ.
Ban wa la wʊ a nɩtɔ̃ wa baar, ba yãan a fuu jie 'lɔ bar tɩ de a wʊ mãɛ fuu su wʊ, na ba pãa de wʊ chiin ɩka ba tɩ kpa a daa ju.
Ban wa yi a sɔr pɔ, ba nyɛn daba na yi Sirenɩ ka a wʊ yuor di Simon, ka ba nyɔɔ wʊ fɩr wʊ ka wʊ tuo a Yesu daa.
Ba tɩ tãn jie ban bʊɔlɔ Gɔlgɔta, a par lɛ ɩka, Julaa Jie.
Ba den tãɩtuo 'yɔ̃ɔ dãa pɔ ɩka a Yesu wʊ nyũ, tɩ wʊn wa lɛm kaa, wʊ tɔr bar.
Ban wa kpa wʊ a daa ju baar, ba põ naa a wʊ fɔɔr ŋmen gbãm bɔ̃ɔn ala ãsʊɔ jaa nɩ na di,
tɩ na ba jãnɛ a jie pire wʊ.
Ba sɛb a yele 'lɔ jũu ban kʊn wʊ mar a daa ju ɩka, NYƐ A YESU, A JUU NƖBƐ NÃA.
Ba mɩ kpan nɩfarba ayi a dabãbãnsɩ mɩ ju, ka ãsʊɔ be a Yesu nũsʊ̃ɔ jie ka ãsʊɔ mɩ be a wʊ gubaa jie.
A bala na tala a be tʊrɔ wʊ, na ba vavire jur
'yɛrɛ, “A fʊ̃ʊ na 'yɛr ɩka fʊn ŋmɛr a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir tɩ de ber ata mɛn, faa a fʊ mãɛ. Ala ɩ fʊ ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn Bie, wa suu a daa ju.”
Lɛ nɩ wʊ ju mɩ lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ mɩ laara wʊ,
na ba 'yɛrɛ, “Wʊ faan nɩbɛ bamɩne, tɩ wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ faa a wʊ mãɛ ɛ. 'Lɔ lɛ ɩ a Isɩral Nãa, wʊ wa suu a daa ju a pʊ̃pãanyãna, ka sɩ sɔɔ de wʊ.
Wʊ sɔɔn Nãaŋmɩn. Vɛ̃ ka Nãaŋmɩn faa wʊ a pʊ̃pãanyãna, bojũu wʊ 'yɛr naa ɩka wʊ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn Bie.”
Lɛ nɩ wʊ ju mɩ lɛ a nɩfarba ayi bala mɩ ban kpa gbʊr wʊ, mɩ tʊ wʊ.
A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa ara gar ju sãlsɔɔ, a wɛr wʊ jaa sɔb naa tɩ tãn a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ balfʊ sɔ̃ɔ.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a Yesu chɩɩr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa na wʊ 'yɛr, “Ɛloɩ, Ɛloɩ, lama sabakatanɩ.” A par lɛ ɩka “N Nãaŋmɩn, n Nãaŋmɩn, bo lɛ so fʊn lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ ma?”
A nɩbɛ bala na ara gbʊr wʊ, na wa wõ a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr, ka ba 'yɛr ɩka, “Elaija lɛ wʊ bʊɔlɔ.”
Ajienaa ka a daba ãsʊɔ jo chen tɩ 'mɔɔ sapɔ 'lɔr a dãmiir amɩne pɔ, na wʊ char daa pɔ, de kʊ a Yesu ɩka wʊ mʊʊr.
Tɩchɛ ka bamɩne 'yɛr, “Yɩ bar a sɩ kaara, Elaija na wa yɔɔ wʊ naa bɩɩ.”
Be lɛ a Yesu chɩɩr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa tɩ ŋmaa a vʊʊr.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir pɔ, ban lũ fɔbaa chɩɛr a saaju tɩ gbem a par. Ka a tẽe dãm, ka a kʊsɩbɛ mɩ ŋmɛr ŋmɛr.
A yar mɩ yuo yuor, ka a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ bamɩne na dɔ̃ɔ kpi, jɛɔ.
Ban wa yi a ba yar pɔ a lɛ, ka a Yesu na wa ir a kũu pɔ baar, ka ba pãa kpɛ a tẽchɛchɛ pɔ, ka nɩyɔɔ jaa tɩ nyɛ ba.
A sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a bala wʊn ara nɩ na ba pire a Yesu, nyɛn a wɛr na dãm nɩ a lɛ jaa na ɩ, ka dãbãɛ kpɛ ba, ka ba 'yɛr, “Yelmãɛ jaa lɛ, a daba nyã ɩn a Nãaŋmɩn Bie.”
Pɔɔ yɔɔ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ be a be ara tɛɛr jaa kaara, bala lɛ dɔ̃ɔ tu wʊ yin a Galilee na ba sʊ̃nɔ̃ wʊ.
A pɔbɔ banyãna pɔ lɛ Mɛɛr na yi Magdala, nɩ Mɛɛr na ɩ Jemesɩ nɩ Josefʊ ma, nɩ a Jebedee bibiir ma.
A jãanʊɔr na wa ta, a taraa sʊɔ kɔ̃ɔ na yɩ Arimatɩya ban bʊɔlɔ Josefʊ, wʊ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a Yesu poturo.
Wʊ chen a Pilate sɛ̃ tɩ sʊɔr a Yesu ãgãn. Ka a Pilate bar sɔr ka ba yɔɔ a Yesu kʊ wʊ.
A Josefʊ yɔɔn a ãgãn pil fɔpɩla,
kul tɩ ũu a wʊ mãɛ yaa paalaa pɔ wʊn chɩ a kʊsɩr pɔ. Wʊ bil kʊsɩr wa pɔɔ a yaa nɛɛ tɩ na wʊ kul.
Mɛɛr na yi Magdala nɩ a Mɛɛr ãsʊɔ ben be jãnɛ a yaa puor.
A Chɔɔrfʊ Bɩbir ka a wɛr na chaar ka a ɩ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir lɛ, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Faraseemɩne chen tɩ 'yɛr a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Pilate,
“Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, sɩ lɛ tɩɛr a lɛ a jir ŋmara 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr wʊn dɔ̃ɔ chɛnɛ, ‘Ɩka ber ata daar ɩn lɛ lɩɛb ir ɩ vʊr.’

A lɛ jũu vɛ̃ ka ba gu a yaa tɩ tãn a ber ata daar, ka ala ba ɩ lɛ ɛ, a wʊ poturbo na chen tɩ ju a ãgãn a yaa pɔ, tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ ɩka, 'lɔ lɛ ir a kũu pɔ, ka a bɛlfʊ taa ɩ dɛɛr gar a lɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɛ.”
Ka a Pilate 'yɛr, “Yɩ de gugurbo ka ba tɩ gu a yaa a lɛ yɩn bɔ̃ɔ.”
Be lɛ ba tara a gugurbo chiin ka ba tɩ bɛ a yaa bɔɔ pɔɔ, tɩ na ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a kʊsɩr jãnɛ, tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ ka a gugurbo ara gu.
A Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir na wa baar, ka a na ɩ a Pɛ̃nfʊ divɩɛ bio daar a wɛr na wa chaara wa la la la, Mɛɛr na yi a Magdala nɩ a Mɛɛr ãsʊɔ yin chen ɩka ba tɩ kaa a yaa.
Be lɛ ka a tẽe dãm kpɛ̃ɔ jaa, ka a ɩ Nãaŋmɩn malaka lɛ yi a saaju suu wa bil a kʊsɩr bar a yaa nɛɛ tɩ do jãnɛ.
A wʊ nie nyɩlɛ saa nyɩɩrfʊ kaar, ka a wʊ bʊ̃sursɩ pɛl jaa pɩlpɩl.
Dãbãɛ kpɛ̃n a bala na ara kaara, ka ba gĩem ara kũn kaar.
A malaka 'yɛr kʊ a pɔbɔ, “Yɩ ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ, n bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a Yesu 'lɔ ban kpa a daa ju lɛ yɩ bʊɔrɔ.
Waa be ka ɛ. Wʊ ir naa ɩ vʊr nɩtãa a lɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr. Yɩ wa muul kaa a jie wʊn gã.
Yɩ chen fɔɔ jaa na yɩ tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo, ‘Wʊ lɩɛb ir a kũu pɔ, na wʊ de yɩ nie chiine a Galilee. Be lɛ yɩn tɩ nyɛ wʊ.’ N pãa 'yɛr kʊ yɩ.”
A pɔbɔ banyãna yin a yaa par nɩ dãbãɛ jo fɔɔ jaa nɩ pʊpɛl chen ɩka ba tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo.
Be lɛ ka ajienaa, ka a ɩ Yesu lɛ tuor puor ba, ka ba lo kpa a wʊ niem nyɔɔ a wʊ gbɛɛ puor wʊ.
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, yɩ ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ, “Yɩ tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a n yɛɛr ɩka ba chen a Galilee, be lɛ ban tɩ nyɛ ma.”
A pɔbɔ na wa chiine, a sojasɩ bamɩne na dɔ̃ɔ guro a yaa kpɛ̃n a tẽkpɛ̃ɛ pɔ, tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ a lɛ jaa na ɩ.
A bɔɔrlo nãa nɩ a wʊ nɩbɛrɛ na wa lɔ̃ɔ taa, ba guor taa de libiyɔɔ kʊ a sojasɩ
tɩ na ba 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ 'yɛr ɩka, ‘A wʊ poturbo lɛ wa ju a wʊ ãgãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ sɩn chɛnɛ gã guro.’
Ala ɩ a 'yɛr nyã wa lon a Nãa Pilate toor pɔ, sɩn maal wʊ naa ka a wʊ pʊɔ pɛl a sɩ ir yɩ yin wõm pɔ.”
A sojasɩ den a libie tɩ na ba ɩ a lɛ ban 'yɛr ɩka ba ɩ. A Juu nɩbɛ ma chɛnɛ na 'yɛr a yele nyãna a dɩna.
A poturbo pie nɩ bʊ̃'yen chen a Galilee a tɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ju a Yesu na wiil ba ɩka ba do.
Ban wa nyɛ wʊ, ba gbur dumo na ba puor wʊ tɩchɛ ka bamɩne chɛnɛ baala.
Ka a Yesu wa 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A n Sãa den a kpãɛn ala a jaa na be a saaju, nɩ a kpãɛn ala a jaa na be a wɛr pɔ kʊ ma.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ yɔ a wɛr wʊ jaa na yɩ tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ paalsɩ ka ba wa turo ma, na yɩ suoro ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, a Sãa yuor, nɩ a Bie yuor, nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yuor 'yɔ̃ɔ,
tɩ na yɩ wile ba ka ba sɔɔ de, tɩ turo bon jaa ɩn 'yɛr kʊ yɩ. Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka ɩn ma ben a yɩ sɛ̃ sɔ̃ɔ jaa, tɩ tãn a wɛr baarfʊ daar.”
Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ pielfʊ.
'Yɛ'yɛrɛ kɔ̃ɔ yuor na di Isaiya sɛb naa, “Nyɛ, ɩn tʊ̃ naa a n tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ ka wʊ de nie tɩ chɔɔr a sɔr kʊ fʊ.”
“Kɔkɔr tãna naa a dãlpʊɔ ju, ‘Chɔɔr a sɔr kʊ a sɩ Soro na fʊ maal a wʊ sɔr ka wʊ tor.’ ”
Lɛ lɛ a Jɔɔn wa, na wʊ wa suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ be a dãlpʊɔ ju, na wʊ mʊɔl 'yɛr, “Yɩ lɩɛb yi a yɩ tɩɛr dɛɛr pɔ so a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, ka wʊ vɛ̃ a yelbebe kʊ yɩ.”
Ka a nɩbɛ yire a tẽn ala a jaa na be a Judiya wɛr pɔ, ka a bamɩne mɩ yire a Jerusalɛm. Ba chire naa a ba pʊʊr 'yɛrɛ a ba yelbebe kʊrɔ wʊ tɩchɛ ka wʊ suoro ba jaa a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ a Jordan man pɔ.
Nyɔɔma kɔɔlʊ fuu lɛ Jɔɔn ma su tɩ de gãn lũn a sɩɛ. Soor nɩ sɩkãa lɛ ɩ a wʊ bʊ̃diir.
Wʊ 'yɛr naa, “N puor sʊɔ ben be, na wʊ gar ma. A wʊ nafɔɔr mibe gba n ba sɛɛ ɩka n guun for ɛ.
Maa suoro yɩ naa nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ tɩchɛ 'lɔ na so yɩ naa nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.”
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ Yesu yi naa Najaretɩ na be a Galilee wɛr pɔ wa, ka a Jɔɔn so wʊ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ a Jordan man pɔ.
A Yesu na wa yire a kʊ̃ɔ pɔ, wʊ nyɛ naa a saaju na tɔɔ yuo ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa suro fɩka papa wa kpɛ a Yesu pɔ.
Tɩ a kɔkɔr yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ 'yɛrɛ, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a n binʊ̃nãa, ka a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ma 'maa nɩ fʊ.”
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ de wʊ fɔɔ jaa chiin a dãlpʊɔ ju,
ka wʊ tɩ be be ber lɩjaayi ka a Satan bɛɛr wʊ kaa. 'Lɔ nɩ a mɔdʊ̃n lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be, ka a malakasɩ wa sʊ̃nɔ̃ wʊ.
Jɔɔn ban wa nyɔɔ pɔɔ baar, Yesu chen naa a Galilee na wʊ tɩ mʊɔlɔ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ.
Wʊ 'yɛr naa, “A sɔ̃ɔ ta naa ka a Nãaŋmɩn di a wʊ nãalʊ̃ʊ. Yɩ lɩɛb yi a tɩɛr dɛɛr pɔ na yɩ sɔɔ de a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ.”
A lɛ a Yesu na wa de a Galilee man lana, wʊ nyɛ naa Simon nɩ a wʊ yɛbile Andiru ka ba lɔɔrɔ lɔyaar, jãnyɔɔrbɔ lɛ ba ɩ,
ka wʊ bʊɔl ba, “Yɩ wa turo ma, ka n lɩɛb yɩ ka yɩ nyɔɔrɔ nɩbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.”
Ka ba tɔ̃ɔ tɩɛ a jãmɛ nyɔɔrfʊ bar tɩ turo wʊ.
Wʊn wa chen a niem bãlãa, wʊ nyɛ naa Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn, Jebedee bibiir, a ba be a gboro pɔ chɔɔrɔ a lɔyaarsɩ.
Wʊn wa nyɛ ba, wʊ bʊɔl ba naa, ka ba bar a ba sãa nɩ a gboro nɩ a bala ban yara tɩ turo a Yesu.
Be lɛ ba wa chen a Kapenahum ka a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir wa ta, ka a Yesu chen tɩ kpɛ a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie tɩ piel wile.
A nɩbɛ nɛɛr 'maa naa nɩ a wʊ wiilfʊ, bojũu wʊ wile ba naa nɩ Nãaŋmɩn sɔr. Waa ɩ fɩka a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe ɛ.
A sɩdɛɛr sʊɔ kɔ̃ɔ mɩ chen tɩ kpɛ a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie tãna 'yɛrɛ nɩ,
“Bãa lɛ a fʊ̃ʊ Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ bʊɔrɔ a sɩ sɛ̃? Fʊ wa naa ɩka fʊ wa sɔ̃ɔ sɩ bar bɩɩ? N bɔ̃ɔ naa a nɩrɛ 'lɔ fʊn ɩ, fʊ ɩ naa a chɛchɛ 'lɔ na yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃!”
Ka a Yesu tãn wʊ, “Pɔɔ a fʊ nɛɛ tɩ wa yi a daba pɔ!”
Ka a sɩdɛɛr daa a daba lɔb tẽe nɩtãa kpũgul loro tɩ ŋme chɛlma tɩ wa yi a daba pɔ.
Ka a nɛɛr 'maa a nɩbɛ ka ba lɩɛb sʊrɔ taa, “Bo lɛ? Wiil paal bo mɩ nɩ nyã, na tara kpɛ̃ɔ lɛ! Wʊ ma 'yɛr 'yɛr, ka a sɩdɛbɛ ma tu a wʊ nɛɛ.”
Ka a wʊ yele yaar a Galilee wɛr wʊ jaa.
Ban wa yi a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie, 'lɔ nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn chen naa a Simon nɩ Andiru yir,
ka a ãgãn tɔ a Simon dãɛ pɔɔ ka ba 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu.
Yesu kpɛ naa a wʊ sɛ̃ tɩ nyɔɔ a wʊ nũu sʊ̃ʊ wʊ ka wʊ ir. A ãgãn tʊl baar wʊ, ka wʊ ir maal bʊ̃diir kʊ ba.
A jãanʊɔr 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa mʊr, a nɩbɛ waan na baalsɩ nɩ a bala a sɩdɛbɛ na tara a Yesu sɛ̃.
Ka a tẽe nɩbɛ ba jaa wa lɔ̃ɔ a dɔ̃dɔ̃rʊ,
ka a Yesu sãa nɩyɔɔ na tara baal jaa bʊrɔ. Wʊ mɩ dii naa a sɩdɛbɛ yɔɔ ka a yi, tɩ maa sɔɔ ka a sɩdɛbɛ 'yɛr 'yɛr ɛ, bojũu ba bɔ̃ɔ naa a nɩrɛ 'lɔ wʊn ɩ.
A wɛr na chaara a bibio pipi tɩ chɛnɛ sɔb, Yesu ir na wʊ yi a yir na wʊ chen a jie ãsʊɔ ɩka wʊ tɩ sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn.
Simon nɩ a wʊ taaba mɩ yin bʊɔrɔ wʊ na ba wa nyɛ wʊ,
na ba 'yɛr, “Nɩbɛ ba jaa yʊɔrɔ na bʊɔrɔ fʊ!”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yɩ ɩ ka sɩ chen jiyuo, a tẽn anyã na gbʊr, ka n tɩ mʊɔl 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr a be, ala 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ n wa.”
Wʊ yɔ naa a Galilee wɛr wʊ jaa na wʊ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ yie pɔ tɩ na wʊ dire a sɩdɛbɛ mɩ ka a yire.
Ka a daba ãsʊɔ mɩ na ɩ kɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ wa gbur dumo sʊɔr wʊ, “Fʊ̃ʊ sɔɔ, sãa ma.”
Ka nɩbaal kpɛ a Yesu ka wʊ tur a wʊ nũu sɩɩr a daba tɩ 'yɛr, “N sɔɔ naa. Sa!”
Ajienaa ka a kɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ sa.
Yesu kpãa wʊ naa kpãkpãan wʊ ɩka,
“Taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ nɩrɛ ɛ. Chen tɩ wiil a fʊ mãɛ kʊ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrloro tɩ ir a nɛɛ 'lɔ a Mosesɩ na 'yɛr ka a ɩ dãasɩɛ.”
Tɩchɛ a daba na wa yi wʊ piel naa na wʊ ŋme a Yesu yele yaar, ka a lɛ jũu Yesu ba lɛ tʊ̃ɔ yʊɔrɔ chãa pɔ a tẽe pɔ ɛ. Wʊ ma be naa a tẽe kõkoor, a nɩbɛ chɛnɛ yire jiir jaa waara a wʊ sɛ̃.
A anyã puor, Yesu lɩɛb wa a Kapenahum, ka nɩbɛ wõ ka wʊ be naa a yir.
Nɩyɔɔ wan wa duo na ba sɛɛ a die wa tɩ yin a yõo. Ka wa 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊrɔ ba.
Be lɛ ka daba ãsʊɔ mɩ bɩɛrɛ, a wʊ nuur nɩ a wʊ gbɛɛ kpi naa, ka nɩbɛ anaar jɛ̃jɛl wʊ na ba waan a Yesu sɛ̃.

Ka ba wa ta, ka jie ba be be a ba na tu kpɛ̃n a be a Yesu na be ɛ, a nɩyɔɔ jũu. Be lɛ ba do a gar ju na ba tɩ ŋmaa puo a jie 'lɔ a Yesu na ara, tɩ na ba de a daba nɩ a fɔbaa 'lɔ ban 'mɔɔn wʊ waan tur bar ka wʊ suu tɩ gã a Yesu niem.
Be lɛ a Yesu na wa nyɛ a lɛ ban sɔɔ de wʊ, wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a dabaala, “N bie, n vɛ̃ naa fʊ yelbebe bar.”
Ka be lɛ ka a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe bamɩne na be be tɩɛrɛ,
“Ka nyɛ daba na ara fere na wʊ sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn yuor tɛɛ. An lɛ na tʊ̃ɔ nɩrɛ yelbebe vɛ̃ bar, ka Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ?”
Ajienaa Yesu bɔ̃ɔn naa a lɛ ban tɩɛrɛ a ba pʊʊr pɔ, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Bãa lɛ yɩ tɩɛrɛ a lɛ a yɩ pʊʊr pɔ?
Buor sʊɔ lɛ ɩ kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃, n 'yɛr ɩka n vɛ̃ naa wʊ yelbebe bar, bɩɩ, n 'yɛr ɩka a daba nyã wʊ ir, 'mɔɔ a wʊ bʊ̃gãnaa, na wʊ kulo nɩ?
N bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a Nɩsaal Bie tara naa kpɛ̃ɔ a wɛr pɔ na vɛ̃ nɩrɛ yelbebe kʊ wʊ.” Be lɛ wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a daba 'lɔ nuur nɩ a gbɛɛ na kpi,
“Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ, ir, na fʊ 'mɔɔ a bʊ̃gãnaa, na fʊ kulo nɩ.”
Be lɛ, ka wʊ vaa ir 'mɔɔ a bʊ̃gãnaa yin a nɩbɛ ba jaa niem. Nɛɛr 'maa ba naa ka ba dãna Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ, “Saa dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ a lɛ ɛ.”
Yesu lɩɛb chen a man nɛɛ ka nɩyɔɔ wa a wʊ sɛ̃ ka wʊ wile ba.
A Yesu na wa chiine wʊ nyɛ naa a Alfayasɩ bie, Levi, ka wʊ jãnɛ a lõpo defʊ jie, ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ir turo ma,” ka wʊ ir turo wʊ.
A lõpodierbe nɩ a yelbetʊ̃nbɔ yɔɔ turo naa a Yesu, ka 'lɔ nɩ a bamɩne nɩ a wʊ poturbo 'mataa dire a Levi yir.

A Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe na ɩ a Faraseemɩne nyɛ a lɛ wʊn jãnɛ nɩ a lõpodierbe nɩ a yelbetʊ̃nbɔ 'mataa dire, ka ba sʊʊr a wʊ poturbo, “Bãa lɛ so a daba nyã na 'mataa dire nɩ a lõpodierbe nɩ a yelbetʊ̃nbɔ?”

Yesu wõ naa a lɛ ban 'yɛr, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nɩrɛ na kpɛ̃mɛ waa chiine tɩtɩlɛ jie ɛ. Baalaa lɛ ma chen. N ba wa ɩka n wa bʊɔl a nɩtorsɩ ɛ. N wa naa ɩka n wa bʊɔl a yelbebe tʊ̃nbɔ ka ba wa lɩɛb a tɩɛr.”
Jɔɔn poturbo nɩ a Faraseemɩne nɩbɛ gal kɔ̃, ka nɩbɛ wa sʊʊr a Yesu, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a Jɔɔn poturbo nɩ a Farasee poturbo ma gal kɔ̃, tɩchɛ ka a fʊ̃ʊ poturbo maa gal kɔ̃ ɛ?”
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an ɩ ka nɩbɛ be a pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ jie tɩ tʊ̃ɔ kɔ̃ gal? Wʊn chɛnɛ be a ba sɛ̃, ba kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ɛ.
A daar 'lɔ ban wa de a pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ, ban gal a kɔ̃.
“Nɩrɛ maa ŋmaa fɔpaalaa sɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ fɔkoraa pɔ ɛ. 'Lɔ be sɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a lɛ, a fɔpaalaa na tɔɔ naa a fɔkoraa chɩɛr.
Nɩrɛ maa de dãbãɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ wɔkoraa pɔ ɛ. 'Lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ, a wʊɔ na pur naa, ka a dãa nɩ a wʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ. Wʊ ma 'yɔ̃ɔ naa dãbãɩn wɔpaalaa pɔ.”
A Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar, Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo kpɛ̃n tala puo sãlsɔɔ, ka a wʊ poturbo piel fɔrɔ a bʊ̃bie.
Ka a Faraseemɩne 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “Nyɛ lɛ a fʊ poturbo na ɩrɛ. Bo lɛ so ka ba tʊ̃nɔ̃ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir? A ba tara sɔr ɛ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a par a lɛ yɩn kar kaa a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ a nãa David nɩ a wʊ nɩbɛ na ba dɔ̃ɔ tara bon na di ɛ!

A ber ala pɔ Abiyata lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, kɔ̃ dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ ba, ka wʊ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn yir, ka a Abiyata de a paanʊ̃ɔ ala ban bin kʊ Nãaŋmɩn kʊ wʊ, ka wʊ 'wɔb. A paanʊ̃ɔ ala a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlorbo tɛɛ lɛ ma 'wɔb, a ba tara sɔr ɩka nɩyuo wʊ 'wɔb ɛ, tɩchɛ ka David 'wɔb tɩ de kʊ a bala na be a wʊ sɛ̃, ka ba mɩ 'wɔb.”
Be lɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir ben be a nɩbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ, a ba ɩ a nɩbɛ ben be a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka a Nɩsaal Bie ɩ a Soro lɔ̃ɔn a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir gba.”
Sɔ̃ɔ ãsʊɔ go Yesu chen tɩ kpɛ a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie, ka a daba kɔ̃ɔ mɩ be be ka a wʊ nũpɛl kpi.
Ka a nɩbɛ bamɩne na be be bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba gar a Yesu, be lɛ ba tɔɔ gbʊr kaara wʊ. Ka wʊn sãa naa a daba nũu baal a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir bɩɩ.
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a daba nũpɛl na kpi, “Ir ara a sɩ jaa nyɛ fʊ.”
Be lɛ ka a Yesu sʊʊr ba, “Tʊ̃buor sʊɔ lɛ tara sɔr a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir daar ɩka fʊ tʊ̃, a fʊ maal vɩla bɩɩ dɛɛr, fʊ faa nyɛvʊr bɩɩ fʊ kʊ wʊ?” Ka ba ɩ jaa gbulo gbulo.
Wʊ kaa naa ba jaa gʊɔr nɩ suur, ka a wʊ pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ a ba bachɛlfʊ jũu. Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a daba 'lɔ nũpɛl na kpi, “Tur a fʊ nũu.” Wʊ tur naa ka a nũpɛl wʊ jaa sa.
Be lɛ ka a Faraseemɩne yi chen a Hɛrɔd nɩbɛ sɛ̃, a ba tɩ 'mataa guoro a Yesu, bʊɔrɔ sɔr 'lɔ ban na tu kʊ wʊ.
Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo yin chen a man pɔ ka a nɩyɔɔ na yi Galilee wɛr tu ba.
Nɩyɔyɔɔ mɩ yi naa Judiya wɛr, Jerusalɛm, Idumea wɛr nɩ a Jordan man gɔ̃ɔn, nɩ a tẽn na be Tire nɩ Sidon wɛr pɔ, wa a wʊ sɛ̃ bojũu ba wõ naa a lɛ jaa wʊn tʊ̃.
A nɩyɔɔ jũu, Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo, “Yɩ kaa nyɛ gboro kʊ ma ka n sɛr bãlãa.” Wʊ 'yɛr naa a lɛ bojũu waa bʊɔrɔ ɩka a nɩbɛ ba mɩl pɔɔ wʊ ɛ.
A nɩbɛ yɔɔ wʊn sãa lɛ so, a baalsɩ dara taa bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba sɩɩr wʊ.
A sɩdɛbɛ na ma wa nyɛ a Yesu ba ma da naa a nɩrɛ 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ ban be lɔb tẽe tɩ tãna 'yɛrɛ nɩ, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie!”
Tɩchɛ wʊ kpaal ban jũu, ka ba taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ wʊn ɩ ɛ.
Yesu do naa a tɔ̃ɔ ju tɩ bʊɔl a bala wʊn bʊɔrɔ ka ba do wa a wʊ sɛ̃.
A ba pɔ lɛ wʊ kaa ir pie nɩ ayi, bʊɔlɔ ba nɩtʊ̃nsɩ, ka ba na be a wʊ sɛ̃, ka wʊ ma tʊ̃ ba ka ba chen tɩ mʊɔl 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr,
tɩ tara kpɛ̃ɔ dire nɩ sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire.
A nɩbɛ pie nɩ ayi bala wʊn ir yoe lɛ a anyã. Simon, wʊn lɛ kʊ wʊ yopaalaa Pita.
Jemesɩ, nɩ a wʊ yɛbile Jɔɔn, a ba sãa yuor lɛ Jebedee, wʊ bʊɔlɔ ba naa Bɔɔnɛgasɩ, a par lɛ sa tãna bibiir.
Andiru, Filip, Batolomi, Matiu, Tomasɩ, Jemesɩ na ɩ Alfayasɩ bidaba, Tadius, Simon na mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a wʊ wɛr yele,
nɩ a Judas Isɩkariyot, 'lɔ lɛ na wa de a Yesu tɩr.
A Yesu na lɩɛb wa a yir, nɩyɔɔ wa naa wa lɔ̃ɔ go, ka 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ poturbo ba tara jaa gba na di ɛ.
Be lɛ a wʊ yir dẽme na wa wõ a lɛ, ba chen naa ɩka ba tɩ ka wʊ, bojũu ba 'yɛr naa ɩka, “Burbur kpɛ wʊ naa.”
Ka a Mosesɩ Nɛɛr wiwiilbe bamɩne na yi a Jerusalɛm mɩ 'yɛrɛ, “A Beeljebul, lɛ pɔb wʊ! A sɩdɛbɛ nãa lɛ wʊ ma de dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire.”
Yesu bʊɔl naa a nɩbɛ na wʊ lɔb sʊkpar kʊ ba, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a Satan na ɩ lɛ dii a Satan?
Ala ɩ nãa ir jɛɛrɛ nɩ a wʊ mãɛ nãalʊ̃ʊ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ wʊn ɩ ara?
Yir nɩbɛ mɩ ir jɛɛrɛ taa, a yir 'lɔ nɩbɛ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ 'mataa kpɛ ɛ.
Ala ɩ a Satan ir naa na wʊ jɛɛrɛ nɩ a wʊ mãɛ, wʊ mɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ara ɛ, a wʊ baaraa lɛ.
Yelmãɛ, nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ kpɛ gãdaa yir tɩ ju a wʊ bonsɩ ka waa de nie lũ wʊ ɛ. 'Lɔ wa lũ wʊ a lɛ wa baar, wʊn pãa tʊ̃ɔ naa a wʊ yir bonsɩ ju.
Sɩrɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, yeldɛbɛ nɩ ferfʊ a jaa nɩbɛ na fere sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn yuor ban nyɛn vɛ̃ kʊfʊ.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na fere nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʊ̃ nyɛ vɛ̃ kʊfʊ ɛ, bojũu wʊ lo naa a yeldɛɛr 'lɔ pɔ, na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ.”
Ban 'yɛr ɩka wʊ tara naa a sɩdɛɛr lɛ so ka wʊ 'yɛr a lɛ.
Be lɛ ka a Yesu ma nɩ a wʊ yɛɛr wa. Ba ara naa a yõo tɩ tʊ̃ nɩrɛ ka wʊ bʊɔl wʊ.
Nɩyɔɔ jãnɛ naa jilʊ̃ a Yesu tɩ ba 'yɛr wʊ, “A fʊ ma nɩ a fʊ yɛɛr be naa a yõo bʊɔrɔ fʊ.”
Ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “An lɛ ɩ a n ma nɩ a n yɛɛr?”
Be lɛ wʊ kaa a bala na jãnɛ jilʊ̃ wʊ tɩ 'yɛr, “Banyã lɛ ɩ a n ma nɩ a n yɛɛr!
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na turo a Nãaŋmɩn sɔr, 'lɔ lɛ a n yɛbɛ nɩ a n yɛpɔɔ nɩ a n ma.”
Sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ go, Yesu piel wile a man nɛɛ. A nɩyɔyɔɔ na wa lɔ̃ɔ jũu, wʊ kpɛ naa a gboro pɔ jãnɛ, tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ ara kɔɔ a kʊ̃ɔ nɛɛ.
Sʊkpar lɛ wʊ lɔɔrɔ wile nɩ ba yelyɔɔ, sʊkpa ãsʊɔ nɩ nyã:
“Yɩ chɛlɛ! Kʊɔraa lɛ yi chen ɩka wʊ tɩ yaar a wʊ bʊ̃bʊrɔ.
Wʊ yaar naa ka amɩne lo a sɔr pɔ ka a lubil wa tuur di.
Ka amɩne mɩ lo a jie 'lɔ a kʊsɩbɛ na waa gar a tãna, na a bul fɔɔ, a tãna na ba tɩrɛ jũu.
Tɩchɛ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa nyãa, a jʊɔl naa na a kpi, bojũu a ba tara nyɩbɛ ɛ.
Amɩne mɩ tɩ lo naa gʊʊr pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a gʊʊr bul fãɩn naa tara, a ba tʊ̃ɔ dɔɔ ɛ.
Ka amɩne mɩ tɩ lo a kɔjɔ̃ vɩla pɔ, na a dɔɔ yɔɔ. Ka amɩne dɔɔ a lɩjɛr nɩ pie, amɩne lɩjaata ka amɩne mɩ kɔbaa.”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nɩrɛ jaa na tara toor, wʊ chɛlɛ!”
A nɩyɔyɔɔ bala na wa chen tɩ chɛ a nɩbɛ bala na turo wʊ nɩ a wʊ poturbo pie nɩ a ayi bala wʊn ir, ka a ba sʊʊr wʊ a sʊkpar par.
Be lɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩn 'lɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʊ yɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ yelsɔɔlaa, tɩchɛ a banyã 'lɔ na ba pʊɔ ɛ, a yelsɩ a jaa ɩ naa sʊkpar kʊ ba.
A lɛ jũu, ‘Ba ma kãan lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ ba maa nyɛ ɛ, na ba ma chɛl lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ ba maa wõ ɛ. Ala ba ɩ lɛ ɛ ban lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr ka Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃ kʊ ba.’ ”
Ka Yesu sʊʊr ba, “Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a sʊkpa nyã par ɛ? Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩn ɩ wa bɔ̃ɔ sʊkpa jaa par?
Yɩ kaa, a kʊɔraa lɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na yaara a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr.
Nɩbɛ bamɩne kaara naa fɩka a bʊ̃bie ala ban yaar ka a lo a sɔr pɔ. Bala wa wõ a 'yɛr wa baar, a Satan ma wa naa, wa de a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrbir ban bʊr a ba nyãa pɔ.
Ala mɩ na lo a jie 'lɔ a kʊsɩbɛ na waa gar a tãna ɩ naa a bala na wõ a 'yɛr na ba ma sɔɔ de fɔɔ jaa nɩ pʊpɛl,
tɩchɛ baa tara nyɩbɛ ɛ, ba maa kor ɛ. A 'yɛr jũu, wõm bɩɩ gefʊ wa wa a ba sɛ̃, ba ma lɩɛb puor fɔɔ jaa.
A ala mɩ na lo a gʊʊr pɔ ɩ naa a bala na wõ a 'yɛr,
tɩchɛ ka a ãgãn nyã wõm, nɩ a bʊ̃tarsɩ bɛlfʊ, nɩ a bʊ̃bʊɔrsɩ fãɩn a 'yɛr, ka waa tʊ̃ɔ dɔɔ ɛ.
A anyã mɩ na lo a kɔjɔ̃ pɔ ɩ naa a bala na wõ a 'yɛr na ba sɔɔ de na ba dɔɔ jur, ka amɩne ɩ lɩjɛr nɩ pie, amɩne lɩjaata, amɩne mɩ kɔbaa.”
Wʊ sʊʊr ba naa, “Ba ma chʊm fãtɩn na ba de laa kpa pɔɔ bɩɩ de su gado pĩlem bɩɩ? A ba ɩ a jie 'lɔ wʊn na chaar nɩrɛ jaa lɛ ba ma dɔɔl ɛ?
Bon jaa na pɔɔ ban yuo wʊ naa, ka ala a jaa mɩ na sɔɔl yi chãa pɔ.
Nɩrɛ jaa na tara toor, wʊ chɛlɛ!”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ bɔ̃ɔ chɛlɛ sʊ̃ a lɛ yɩn wõnõ. A lɛ fʊn man tɩr, lɛ mɩ lɛ ban man kʊ fʊ, tɩ dɔɔl gba.
Nɩrɛ jaa na tara, Nãaŋmɩn ma vɛ̃ naa ka wʊ nyɛrɛ dɔɔlɔ, nɩrɛ nyã mɩ na ba tara ɛ, a bãlãa ala gba wʊn tara, Nãaŋmɩn na de naa a wʊ sɛ̃.”
Tɩ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ nɩtɔ̃ lɛ wʊ kaara. Daba ma yaar a wʊ bʊ̃bʊrɔ bar.
Tãsɔɔ nɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ, ka wʊ gãn bɩɩ wʊ ir naa, a bʊ̃bie ma bulaa naa nʊ̃ɔ, tɩchɛ a wʊ mãɛ gba maa bɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
A bʊ̃bie ma bul naa a tẽe naa tɔ vaar tɩ dɔɔ jur, bɩ a bie.
Ala wa bɩ baar, wʊ ma chiin nɩ sʊɔ tɩ ŋman bojũu a ŋmab sɔ̃ɔ ta naa.”
Ka Yesu lɛ 'yɛr, “Bo lɛ sɩn de man a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ bɩɩ sʊkpa buor lɛ sɩn lɔb gbɛb wʊ?
Wʊ kaara fɩka a kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ bir, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a bʊ̃bie a jaa pɔ bʊ̃bile.
Tɩchɛ wʊ ma bul ɩ tɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wʊ tɛ wilbɛrɛ, ka a lubil ma wa mara a wʊ 'maar pɔ.”
Yesu de naa sʊkpayɔɔ na nyɛtaa na wʊ 'yɛr a 'yɛr kʊ ba, a lɛ an na ɩ ka ba tʊ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a par.
Sʊkpar tɛɛ lɛ wʊ ma de 'yɛrɛ nɩ a 'yɛr kʊrɔ ba. Tɩchɛ ala wa ɩ 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ poturbo tɛɛ lɛ, wʊ ma wiil naa a jaa par kʊ ba.
A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ jãanʊɔr, wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo, “Yɩ ɩ a sɩ gɔ̃ɔ chen a man gɔ̃ɔn.”
Ba bar naa a nɩyɔyɔɔ bala tɩchɛ ka a wʊ poturbo tara wʊ, ka ba 'matãan a gborsɩ amɩne gɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.
Ka a man kʊ̃ɔ sɛkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ ire ka a kʊ̃ɔ kpɛ a gboro pɔ ɩrɛ na sɛɛ
tɩchɛ ka a Yesu be a gboro par gã kɔɔl wʊ ju guro. Ka a wʊ poturbo sãɩ wʊ na ba sʊrɔ wʊ, “Wiwile, a ba bã fʊ sɩn mʊrɔ bɩɩ?”
Be lɛ ka wʊ ir tãn a sɛsɛbɛ nɩ a man, “Yɩ ŋmaa vʊʊr! Yɩ ara a lɛ nɛ!” Ka a sɛsɛbɛ ŋmaa vʊʊr ka a man ara jomm.
Ka wʊ sʊʊr a wʊ poturbo, “Bo lɛ so ka yɩ joro a dãbãɛ? Yɩ chɛnɛ na ba sɔɔ ma bɩɩ?”
Ka a dãbãɛ kpɛ ba ka ba lɩɛb sʊrɔ taa, “An lɛ a nyã ka a sɛsɛbɛ nɩ a man tu a wʊ nɛɛ?”
Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo gɔ̃ɔ naa a man, a Gerasenɩ nɩbɛ wɛr pɔ.
Yesu na wa yi a gboro pɔ, daba na gele yi naa a yar par wa tuor wʊ.
A gẽgelaa nyã kpɩɛrɛ naa a yar par ka nɩrɛ jaa ba be be na tʊ̃ɔ lũ wʊ nɩ bɔ̃jɔrsɩ gba ɛ.
Ba ma lũ naa a wʊ gbɛɛ nɩ a nuur tɩchɛ ka wʊ ŋma, tɩ kar a kue ala bar. Nɩrɛ jaa ba be be na tʊ̃ɔ wʊ ɛ.
Tãsɔɔ nɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ, wʊ ma be naa a yar par nɩ a tɔ̃n ju tãna tɩ ŋmara a wʊ mãɛ nɩ kʊsɩbɛ.
Wʊn wa nyɛ a Yesu na be tɛɛr, wʊ jo naa tɩ lo gbur dumo a wʊ niem,
tɩ na wʊ ŋme chɛlma 'yɛrɛ, “Bo fʊ bʊɔrɔ ɩka fʊ ɩ ma? Fʊ ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na gar a jaa Bie pɔn Nãaŋmɩn ɩka fʊ kʊ̃ ge ma ɛ.”
Bojũu Yesu dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ wʊ ɩka, “A fʊ̃ʊ sɩdɛɛr wa yi a daba pɔ.”
Be lɛ ka Yesu sʊʊr wʊ, “Bãa a fʊ yuor di?” Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Sɩyɔɔ, bojũu sɩ waa naa.”
Ka wʊ sʊɔr a Yesu yãayãabɩlɛ ɩka wʊ ta dii wʊ bar a jie 'lɔ ɛ.
Doyɔɔ mɩ ara na gbʊr a tɔ̃ɔ, dire.
Ka a sɩdɛbɛ sʊɔr a Yesu, “Ir sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a dor ala pɔ na fʊ sɔɔ ka sɩ tɩ kpɛ a ba pɔ.”
Wʊ sɔɔ naa ka a sɩdɛbɛ yi tɩ kpɛ a dor ala. A ɩ naa dor tur ayi (2,000) ka a jaa tĩgbil suu tɩ kpɛ a man pɔ gbʊ̃m kpi kpi.
A bala na kaara a dor jon kul a tẽe pɔ nɩ a tẽbil ala na gbʊr tɩ 'yɛr a lɛ na ɩ. Ka a nɩbɛ yi chen ɩka ba tɩ kaa.
Ba wa naa a Yesu sɛ̃ wa nyɛ a daba 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ tara a sɩdɛyɔɔ gele ka wʊ chɩ su bonsɩ jãnɛ, ka a dãbãɛ kpɛ ba.
A bala na nyɛ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ a lɛ na ɩ a daba na dɔ̃ɔ tara a sɩdɛbɛ nɩ a dor 'yɛr,
ka a nɩbɛ piel sʊɔrɔ a Yesu ka wʊ yi a ba wɛr pɔ.
Yesu na wa kpɩɛrɛ a gboro pɔ ka a daba 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩdɛbɛ na yi sʊɔr wʊ ɩka wʊ ɩ a ba 'mataa chen.
Ka a Yesu ba sɔɔ ɛ, tɩ 'yɛr wʊ, “Kul a fʊ yir dẽme sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba a lɛ a Soro na ɩ kʊ fʊ, nɩ a lɛ wʊn jo a fʊ nɩbaal.”
A daba chen na wʊ tɩ piel 'yɛrɛ a lɛ a Yesu na maal kʊ wʊ a wɛr 'lɔ pɔ ban bʊɔlɔ a Dekapolisɩ. Ka a nɛɛr 'maa a nɩbɛ.
Yesu na wa gɔ̃ɔ a man gɔ̃ɔn go, nɩyɔyɔɔ lɔ̃ɔ naa na ba jilʊ̃ wʊ. Wʊ chɛnɛ na ara a man nɛɛ,
ka a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ãsʊɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Jairusɩ wa a be. Wʊn wa nyɛ a Yesu,
wʊ gbur dumo a Yesu niem tɩ sʊɔr wʊ, “Yãayãabɩlɛ, a n bipɔɔbile lɛ ɩ baal ɩrɛ na kpi. Wa dɔɔl wʊ a fʊ nũu ka wʊ sa ta kpi ɛ.”
Ka a Yesu nɩ a daba 'mataa chiine. Nɩyɔyɔɔ turo naa dara taa tɩɛrɛ wʊ.
Pɔɔ kɔ̃ɔ mɩ ben be lo sɩɛ suoro faara yuomo pie nɩ ayi.
Wʊ bal di dɔɔyɛ yɔɔ a tɩtɩɩlbɛ jie na wʊ sɔ̃ɔ bon jaa wʊn tara tɩ ba sa ɛ. Ka a baal tʊ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʊ.
Wʊn wa wõ a Yesu yele, wʊ tu naa a puor tɩ sɩɩr a wʊ fuu,
bojũu wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ mãɛ. “Maa tʊ̃ɔ sɩɩr a wʊ fuu gba, ɩn sa naa, na n pɛ̃n.”
Wʊn wa sɩɩr a Yesu fuu nɛɛ wa baar, a jãɩ ŋmaa naa a dẽdẽe daa ka wʊ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a wʊ wʊʊr baar naa.
Ka a Yesu mɩ bɔ̃ɔn a fɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a kpɛ̃ɔ na yi a wʊ sɛ̃. Ka a wʊ lɩɛb a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ sʊʊr, “An lɛ sɩɩr a n fuu?”
Ka a wʊ poturbo 'yɛr, “Nyɛ a lɛ a nɩyɔyɔɔ banyã na dara taa tɩɛrɛ fʊ, tɩchɛ a fʊ sʊrɔ a sʊɔ 'lɔ na sɩɩr fʊ!”
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu chɛnɛ kaara gʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ nyɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sɩɩr wʊ.
Ka a pɔɔ na bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ na ɩ, dãbãɛ kpɛ wʊ naa ka wʊ mɩrɛ na wʊ wa gbur dumo a Yesu niem tɩ 'yɛr a lɛ jaa na ɩ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “N yɛpɔɔ, fʊn sɔɔ ma jũu, fʊ sa naa. Kulo nɩ ãgãn 'maar, a fʊ dɔɔyɛ baar naa.”
A Yesu ba 'yɛr baar ɛ, tɩchɛ nɩbɛ kɔ̃ɔ yi a Jairusɩ yir wa 'yɛr wʊ, “A fʊ bie kpi naa. Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ fʊ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wiwile go?”
Yesu ba chɛlɛ a lɛ ban 'yɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a daba, “Taa joro dãbãɛ ɛ. Sɔɔ ma dɛ.”
Yesu ba sɔɔ ka nɩrɛ jaa tu wʊ ɛ, ka Pita nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ a wʊ yɛbile Jɔɔn tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Ban wa ta a Jairusɩ yir, Yesu nyɛ naa a nɩbɛ na kõnõ ŋmiere chɛlsɩ.
Ka wʊ kpɛ tɩ sʊʊr ba, “Bãa lɛ yɩ kõnõ ŋmiere nɩ a chɛlsɩ a lɛ? A bie ba kpi ɛ. Wʊ gur naa.”
A ba laara tʊrɔ nɩ wʊ. Wʊ dii naa a nɩbɛ ba jaa bar ka ba yi tɩ wʊ tara a bie sãa nɩ a ma nɩ a wʊ poturbo bala wʊn 'mataa chiin, a ba kpɛ a jie 'lɔ a bikũu na be.
Ka wʊ tɩ nyɔɔ a pɔɔbile nũu tɩ 'yɛr, “Talita kum!” A par lɛ a Yesu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr pɔ, “Pɔɔbile, ir!”
Ka wʊ vaa ir chiine. Yuomo pie nɩ ayi bie lɛ. Ka a yele 'maa ba nɛɛ.
Yesu kpaal ba naa jũu ka ba taa vɛ̃ ka a nɩrɛ jaa wõ naa ɛ. Tɩ 'yɛr ɩka ba kʊ a pɔɔbile bʊ̃diir ka wʊ di.
Yesu yi naa a be ka a wʊ poturbo tu wʊ ka a ba 'mataa kul a Najaretɩ na ɩ a wʊ tẽe.

Ka a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir wa ta, ka wʊ kpɛ be a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie tɩ piel wile, ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na wõ nɛɛr 'maa. Ka ba sʊrɔ, “Nyɩnɛ lɛ a daba nyã nyɛ a bɔ̃ɔfʊ nyã? Yɛ̃ buor lɛ a nyã wʊn tara na wʊ gba tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃?
A ba ɩ a mɩmɩɛrɛ lɛ ɛ? A ba ɩ a Mɛɛr bie lɛ ɛ, a wʊ yɛbil ɩ Jemesɩ nɩ Josesɩ nɩ Judas nɩ Simon ɛ? Ka a wʊ yɛpɔbɔ mɩ be ka a sɩ sɛ̃ ɛ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ nyɛrɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ jie jaa, tɩchɛ a wʊ mãɛ tẽe nɩ a wʊ yir dẽme nɩ a wʊ nɩbɛ sɛ̃ lɛ waa nyɛrɛ 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ ɛ.”
Waa tʊ̃ɔ tʊ̃ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ yɔɔ a be ɛ, tɩ wʊ dɔɔl a wʊ nũu baalsɩ bãlãa a ba sa.
Yesu nɛɛ 'maa wʊ naa bojũu baa sɔɔ de wʊ ɛ. Wʊ yɔn gʊɔr a tẽn na wʊ wile.
Wʊ bʊɔl naa a wʊ poturbo Pie nɩ Ayi bala wʊn dɔ̃ɔ ir, ka ba wa a wʊ sɛ̃ ka wʊ tʊ̃ ba ayir yir, na wʊ kʊ ba kpɛ̃ɔ ka ba tʊ̃ɔ sɩdɛbɛ.
Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ ta de bon jaa ɛ, yɩ tara dadiirsɩ tɛɛ. Yɩ ta tara bʊ̃diir ɛ, bɩɩ wʊʊr ɛ, bɩɩ yɔ̃ɔ libie a yɩ sɩɩr gãma pɔ ɛ.
Yɩ ãsʊɔ jaa wʊ su nafɔbɔ nɩ fuu bʊ̃'yen tɛɛ.
Yir jaa pɔ yɩn wa kpɛ, yɩ be a be tɩ ta a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ yɩn wa yi a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ.
Tẽe jaa pɔ yɩn wa kpɛ ka baa de yɩ ɛ, bɩɩ sɔɔ a 'yɛr ɛ, yɩn wa yire yɩ kpoor a yɩ gbɛɛ tã-uul ka a di a ba dɛɛr dãasɩɛ.”
Ba yin chen tɩ mʊɔlɔ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ɩka a nɩbɛ ba lɩɛb ba tɩɛr.
Ba diin a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi, tɩ 'lɩɩ baalsɩ kãa ka ba sa.
A nãa Hɛrɔd mɩ wõ naa a anyã, bojũu nɩrɛ jaa wõ naa a Yesu yuor. Ka a bamɩne 'yɛrɛ, “A Jɔɔn 'lɔ na ɩ a kɔ̃suoro, 'lɔ lɛ tɔ̃ɔ yi a yaa pɔ, ala lɛ so ka wʊ tʊ̃nɔ̃ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ a lɛ.”
Ka a banyã mɩ 'yɛrɛ, “Elaija lɛ.” Ka a bamɩne mɩ chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ, “Wʊ ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ãsʊɔ nɩtãa a bala na dɔ̃ɔ be be a kõro jaa.”
Tɩchɛ a Hɛrɔd na wa wõ, wʊ 'yɛr naa, “A Jɔɔn 'lɔ ɩn vɛ̃ ka ba ŋmaa a wʊ ju lɛ, yi.”
A Hɛrɔd mãɛ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka ba nyɔɔ a Jɔɔn waan, wa lũ 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ. Wʊ ɩ naa a nɩtɔ̃, a wʊ yɛbile Filip pɔɔ Hɛrɔdiyas wʊn de jũu.
Jɔɔn 'yɛr kʊ a Hɛrɔd, “A ba tara sɔr ɩka fʊ de a fʊ yɛbil vʊr pɔɔ kul ɛ.”
Ka a Hɛrɔdiyas tara nɩ a Jɔɔn jɛɛr bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ kʊ wʊ, tɩchɛ waa tʊ̃ɔ ɛ.
A Hɛrɔd bɔ̃ɔ naa a Jɔɔn na ɩ nɩsʊ̃ nɩ chɛchɛ, na wʊ joro a Jɔɔn dãbãɛ, na wʊ gu wʊ tara. A Hɛrɔd wa wõ a Jɔɔn 'yɛr a ma sɔb wʊn nɩbir, tɩchɛ wʊ ma bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka wʊ chɛlɛ a wʊ 'yɛr.

Tɩchɛ sɔr wa yuon kʊ a Hɛrɔdiyas a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a nãa na wa maala a wʊ dɔɔfʊ bɩbir yele. A wʊ dɔɔfʊ bɩbir nyãna daar, wʊ bʊɔl naa a nɩbɛrɛ bala na turo a wʊ puor, nɩ a sojasɩ nɩbɛrɛ, nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ na be a Galilee pɔ.
A Hɛrɔdiyas bipɔɔ wa kpɛ naa, na wʊ sɛ a bãnɛ ka a pɛl a nãa Hɛrɔd nɩ a wʊ nɩbɛrɛ bala ba jaa pʊɔ. Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a pɔɔbile, “Sʊɔr ma bon jaa fʊn bʊɔrɔ, ɩn kʊ fʊ naa.”
Be lɛ wʊ põl kʊ a pɔɔbile, “Bon jaa fʊn sʊɔr ala ɩ a n nãalʊ̃ʊ ŋmaa gba lɛ, n na kʊ fʊ naa.”
Ka wʊ yi chen tɩ sʊʊr a wʊ ma, “Bo lɛ ɩn sʊɔr?” Ka a wʊ ma 'yɛr wʊ, “Tɩ sʊɔr a Jɔɔn Kɔ̃suor ju.”
Ka a pɔɔbile yi pɔɔ fɔɔ lɛ kpɛ a nãa sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, “N bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka fʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Jɔɔn Kɔ̃suor ju a la'yɛlma pɔ kʊ ma a pʊ̃pãanyã.”
A nãa pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ naa, tɩchɛ a nɩbɛ bala wʊn bʊɔl na wʊn põl kʊ a pɔɔbile jũu, waa bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ tɔr ɛ.
Ka wʊ tʊ̃ a nɩkʊrɔ ãsʊɔ a dẽdẽe daa ɩka wʊ chen tɩ ŋmaa a Jɔɔn ju waan. A daba chen tɩ ŋmaa a Jɔɔn ju a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ
'yɔ̃ɔ a la'yɛlma pɔ waan, wa kʊ a pɔɔbile ka wʊ de kʊ a wʊ ma.
A Jɔɔn poturbo na wõ a lɛ, ba chen tɩ 'mɔɔ wʊ na ba ũu.
A Yesu nɩtʊ̃nsɩ lɩɛb wa lɔ̃ɔ taa a wʊ sɛ̃, na ba wa man a lɛ jaa ban tʊ̃ tɩ wiil a nɩbɛ, na ba kʊ a Yesu.
A nɩbɛ yɔɔ na waara tɩ chiine jũu, jaa gba ba be be a ban di ɛ. Be lɛ ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ wa a sɩn tɛɛ chen a jie 'lɔ a nɩbɛ na ba be ɛ, a yɩ tɩ jãnɛ pɛ̃n.”
Ba kpɛ naa a gboro bala tɛɛ chen a jie 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.
Tɩchɛ a nɩbɛ na wa nyɛ ban chiine ba bɔ̃ɔ ba naa. A ba yi a tẽn a jaa de nie jon gbɛɛ tɩ ara a be.
A Yesu na wa tɩ ta, na wʊ nyɛ a nɩyɔɔ a ba ɩrɛ nɩbaal a wʊ sɛ̃, ban kaara fɩka piir na ba tara chɩnɛ jũu, wʊ piel wile ba yelyɔɔ.
Mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa mʊrɔ a wʊ poturbo wa naa wa 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “A ka ɩ naa mɔgɔ̃ɔ, tɩ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ mɩ mʊrɔ;
wɛl a nɩbɛ bar a ba chen a por nɩ a tẽn na gbʊr tɩ bɔ bʊ̃diir da di.”
Ka be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr sɔɔ ba, “Yɩn mãɛ yɩ kʊ ba bʊ̃kɔ̃ɔ a ba di.” Ka a poturbo 'yɛr ɩka, “Nyɩnɛ lɛ sɩn nyɛ a libie anyãna? Nɩbʊ̃'yen ŋmɛrsɩ aniin sãyar gba! Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ sɩn ɩ kʊ ba jaa bʊ̃diir?”
A be lɛ a Yesu sʊʊr ba, “Paanʊ̃ɔsɩ aŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tara? Yɩ chen tɩ kaa.” Be lɛ ba chen tɩ kaa tɩ wa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Paanʊ̃ɔsɩ anũu, nɩ jãmɛ ayi.”
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a poturbo a ba ɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa a ba jɛ̃ gbulsɩ a mɔ'yɔlɔ ju.
Be lɛ a nɩbɛ jãnɛ jãnɛ, a gbulsɩ gbulsɩ. Bamɩne jãnɛ naa kɔɔr kɔɔr, ka bamɩne mɩ jãnɛ lɩjaayi nɩ piir.

A Yesu de naa a paanʊ̃ɔsɩ anũu nɩ a jãmɛ ayi ala na wʊ kaa saaju tɩ dʊl puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan. Wʊ de naa a paanʊ̃ɔsɩ ŋma ŋma tɩ de kʊ a wʊ poturbo tɩ 'yɛr, “Yɩ de põ a nɩbɛ.” Tɩ lɛ de a jãmɛ ayi ala mɩ ŋma põ a nɩbɛ.
A nɩbɛ ba jaa din, na ba tɩɩ,
tɩchɛ ka a poturbo wob a bʊ̃ŋmaara 'yɔ̃ɔ pɛr pie nɩ ayi.
A nɩbɛ bala na dɔ̃ɔ di a bʊ̃diir ala, dɔɔr tɛɛ ɩ naa tur anũu.
Ajienaa, ka a Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ poturbo a ba kpɛ a gboro na ba de nie chiine a Betɩsaida tɩ wʊ na wɛl a nɩbɛ bar.
Wʊn wa bar ba wa baar, wʊ do naa a tɔ̃ɔ ju ɩka wʊ tɩ puor.
A wɛr na wa sɔɔrɔ, a gboro be naa a man sãlsɔɔ, tɩchɛ ka wʊ be a wɛyõo, 'lɔ tɛɛ.
Wʊ nyɛ naa a wʊ poturbo ka ba mɔ̃nɔ̃ a gboro faara bojũu a sɛsɛbɛ furo na tuoro ba. A wɛr na wa gbʊrɔ a chaarfʊ, wʊ yin chiine a kʊ̃ɔ ju waara a ba sɛ̃, ta bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ po ba.
Ban wa nyɛ wʊn chiine a kʊ̃ɔ ju a lɛ, ba tɩɛr ɩka kpĩin lɛ, na ba ŋme chɛlsɩ,
bojũu ba jaa nyɛ wʊ naa ka dãbãɛ kpɛ ba. Ajienaa, ka a Yesu tãn, “Yɩ nyɔɔ nyãa! Maa lɛ! Yɩ taa joro dãbãɛ ɛ.”
Tɩ pãa kpɛ a gboro pɔ ka a sɛsɛbɛ ŋmaa vʊʊr. Ka a nɛɛr 'maa ba yɔɔ jaa.
Baa dɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a paanʊ̃ɔsɩ ala par ɛ, bojũu a ba ju ba wõnõ nyaar ɛ.
Ban wa gɔ̃ɔ a man do lũ a gboro a Genesaretɩ gɔ̃ɔn,
tɩ tɔ̃ɔ yi a gboro pɔ, nɩbɛ nyɛ naa a Yesu bɔ̃ɔ.
A nɩbɛ jon yɔ a wɛr 'lɔ wʊ jaa na ba tuo a ba baalsɩ nɩ sɔ̃n chiin jie jaa ban wõ ɩka wʊ be naa.

Jie jaa wʊn chen, tẽkpɛ̃ɛ pɔ bɩɩ, tẽbile pɔ bɩɩ, ka a tẽe kõkoor lɛ̃ɛɛ, ba ma gaal naa a ba baalsɩ a chãa pɔ. Ba ma sʊɔrɔ naa a Yesu ɩka wʊ sɔɔ ka ba sɩɩr a wʊ fuu nɛɛ gba, bala jaa na sɩɩr, ma sa naa.
A Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe bamɩne yi naa a Jerusalɛm wa lɔ̃ɔ a Yesu sɛ̃,
na ba nyɛ a wʊ poturbo ka ba dire nɩ nũdɛbɛ. Ka a lɛ wiil ɩka baa pɛɛ a ba nuur a, “Puorfʊ pɛɛfʊ 'lɔ ɛ.”
A Faraseemɩne nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ba maa di ka bala ba pɛɛ a ba puorfʊ pɛɛfʊ 'lɔ ɛ, na ba turo a lɛ a ba nɩbɛrɛ na bin.
Bala wa yi daa wa, ba maa di ka bala ba pɛɛ a pɛɛfʊ 'lɔ ɛ. Ban turo a ba bin yɔɔ ala jũu, ba ma pɛɛn a ŋmama, dʊʊr nɩ a kulaar.
Ala lɛ so ka a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe sʊʊr a Yesu, “Bo lɛ so ka a fʊ poturbo ba turo a lɛ a sɩ nɩbɛrɛ na bin ɛ, na baa pɛɛ a ba nuur ɛ tɩ dire nɩ nũdɛbɛ!”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ a Isaiya dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a yɩn nɛɛr ayi dẽme 'yɛr na wʊ sɛb. Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr naa, ‘A yɩn nɩbɛ banyãna 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma naa nɩ a yɩ nɛɛ, tɩchɛ ka a yɩ pʊtɩɛr jãa a n sɛ̃.
Pɔrɔ lɛ yɩ puoro ma, bojũu yɩ wile naa nɩsaal nɛbinsɩ tɩ tɩɛr ɩka maa nɛɛ lɛ.’
Yɩ bar naa a Nãaŋmɩn Nɛɛ tɩ turo a lɛ a yɩ nɩbɛrɛ na bin.
“A ba ɩ ka yɩ de yɛ̃ bar a Nãaŋmɩn Nɛɛ tufʊ tɩ turo a lɛ a yɩn mãɛ na bin ɛ.
Mosesɩ 'yɛr naa a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, ‘'Yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʊ sãa nɩ a fʊ ma.’
Tɩchɛ ka yɩn 'yɛr ɩka a sɛɛ na, nɩrɛ wa 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ sãa bɩɩ a wʊ ma, ‘Bon jaa ɩn naa kʊ fʊ, n den kʊ Nãaŋmɩn.’
Yɩ maa lɛ vɛ̃ ka wʊ maal bon jaa kʊ a wʊ sãa bɩɩ a wʊ ma ɛ.
Yɩn ɩrɛ a nɩtɔ̃ jũu, ka yɩ kaara a Nãaŋmɩn Nɛɛ pɔrɔ tɩ turo a lɛ yɩn mãɛ na bin. Yelyɔɔ mɩ ben be yɩn ɩrɛ nɩ nyɛtaa a nɩtɔ̃.”
A Yesu lɛ bɔ̃ɔ bʊɔl a nɩyɔɔ ka ba lɩɛb wa a wʊ sɛ̃. Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Yɩ ãsʊɔ jaa wʊ chɛl wõ ɩn 'yɛrɛ tɩ na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a par.
Bon jaa ba be ka a yõo ka nɩrɛ na de di ka a bʊ̃nyɩnɛ vɛ̃ ka wʊ dɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ bon 'lɔ na yi a nɩrɛ pʊtɩɛr pɔ lɛ na vɛ̃ ka wʊ dɛɛ.”
Sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʊn wa bar a nɩyɔɔ bala tɩ kpɛ a yir, a wʊ poturbo sʊʊr wʊ naa a sʊkpa par.
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr ba, “Yɩ mɩ ɩ naa a nɩbɛ bala na ba bɔ̃ɔ a par bɩɩ? Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka bon jaa ba be be ka nɩrɛ na de di na wʊ dɛɛ ɛ,
bojũu wʊ maa kpɛ a wʊ tɩɛr pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ pʊɔm lɛ wʊ ma suu na wʊ tɩ yi.” Yesu 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ na wʊ wiil ɩka a bʊ̃diir a jaa sɛɛn difʊ.
Na wʊ mɩ lɛ 'yɛr ɩka, “Bon nyã na yi a nɩrɛ pʊtɩɛr pɔ lɛ ma tʊ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka wʊ dɛɛ.
Ala na ma yi a nɩrɛ pʊtɩɛr pɔ lɛ, tɩɛr dɛbɛ, nɩ a sɛ̃sɛ̃yele, nɩ a nãnyuur, nɩ nɩrɛ kʊfʊ, nɩ sɛ̃fʊ,
nɩ a nyuur, nɩ a putuo, nɩ jire, nɩ kakaba, nɩ bɔbier, nɩ yosɔ̃ɔ, nɩ pɔlyele nɩ a jɔlyele.
A yeldɛbɛ anyãna a jaa lɛ ma yi a nɩrɛ pʊtɩɛr pɔ, vɛ̃ ka wʊ dɛɛ.”
Be lɛ ka a Yesu yi a be na wʊ chen a Tire wɛr pɔ. Wʊ tɩ kpɛ naa a yir ãsʊɔ pɔ, tɩ waa bʊɔrɔ ɩka nɩrɛ jaa wʊ bɔ̃ɔ ka wʊ ben be ɛ. Tɩchɛ wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ sɔɔl ɛ.
Ala a pɔɔ na tara wʊ bipɔɔ ka a sɩdɛɛr tara, ajienaa wʊn wʊ wõ a Yesu 'yɛr, wʊ wan wa lo gbur dumo a wʊ niem.
A pɔɔ ba dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ɛ, na wʊ dɔ̃ɔ yi be a Siriya Fonisiya paal pɔ. Wʊ sʊɔr naa a Yesu ɩka, wʊ dii a sɩdɛɛr bar a wʊ bipɔɔ pɔ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Bar ka a bibiir di a lɛ ban bʊɔrɔ, taa de a bibiir bʊ̃diir kʊ baar ɛ.”
Ka a pɔɔ mɩ 'yɛr, “Sɩrɛ lɛ, n Soro, tɩchɛ a baar mɩ ma dire naa a bʊ̃ pʊr pʊr ala a bibiir na ma dire, tɩchɛ ka a loro a tẽe.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “A nɩtɔ̃ fʊn 'yɛr jũu, kulo. A sɩdɛɛr bar naa a fʊ bipɔɔ.”
Wʊ kul tɩ nyɛ a bie na gã a gado ju, tɩ a sɩdɛɛr yi.
Yesu lɛ yi naa a Tire wɛr pɔ, na wʊ tu a Sidon suu a Galilee man pɔ, na wʊ tɩ chen a Dekapolisɩ paal pɔ.
Be lɛ ka nɩbɛ bamɩne waan daba na ɩ wõo, na waa tʊ̃ɔnɔ̃ 'yɛrɛ sʊ̃ ɛ. Ba sʊɔr a Yesu ka wʊ sɩɩr a daba nɩ a wʊ nũu na wʊ sãa wʊ.
Ka Yesu tara a daba yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ, na wʊ de a wʊ nubie su a daba tobɔɔr pɔ, be lɛ wʊ chɩr nataar tɩ sɩɩr a daba jãlbir.
Na wʊ dʊl kaa a saaju tɩ vʊʊr na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a daba, “Efata!”, a par lɛ a Yesu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr pɔ, yuo.
Ajienaa ka a daba tobo yuo ka a jãlbir lɩɛb ka wʊ piel 'yɛrɛ jaa chɛchɛ.
Yesu kpaal ban jũu ɩka ba taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ. Tɩchɛ a lɛ wʊn kpãa ba lɛ lɛ ba mɩ 'yɛrɛ yʊɔrɔ nɩ a jie wʊ jaa.
A nɩbɛ nɛɛ 'maan yɔɔ jaa ka ba 'yɛrɛ, “Wʊ ɩn yele jaa sʊ̃. Wʊ gba ma vɛ̃ naa ka wõo wõnõ, tɩ jãlbir lɩɛb 'yɛrɛ chɛchɛ.”
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ, nɩyɔɔ lɛ lɔ̃ɔn taa go a Yesu sɛ̃, tɩ baa tara bon na di ɛ. Yesu bʊɔl a wʊ poturbo ka ba wa a wʊ sɛ̃ ka wʊ 'yɛr,
“A nɩbɛ banyã ɩrɛ naa nɩbaal, bojũu ber ata nɩ nyã ban be a n sɛ̃, baa lɛ tara bon na di ɛ.
Maa mɩ bar ba ka ba kulo nɩ a kɔ̃, ban tɩ lon sɔr pɔ, bojũu bamɩne yin tɛɛr.”
Ka a wʊ poturbo 'yɛr, “Tɩchɛ nyɩnɛ lɛ a kanaa a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ nɩrɛ na nyɛ bʊ̃diir kʊ ba?”
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr ba, “Paanʊ̃ɔsɩ aŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tara?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Paanʊ̃ɔsɩ ayopõi.”
Wʊ 'yɛr naa a nɩbɛ, ka ba jãnɛ tẽe, tɩ na wʊ de a paanʊ̃ɔsɩ ayopõi ala puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, tɩ ŋma ŋma de kʊ a wʊ poturbo ka ba de põ a nɩbɛ.
Ba tara naa a jãbil amɩne, ka wʊ de a ala mɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, tɩ 'yɛr ɩka a poturbo ba de põ a nɩbɛ.
Ba di naa tɩɩ tɩ chɛ. Ka a wʊ poturbo wob a bʊ̃ŋmaara ala ban di faa 'yɔ̃ɔ pɛr ayopõi.
Ba ɩ naa tur anaar. Ka wʊ bar ba a sɔr.
Ajienaa, 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ poturbo 'mantaa kpɛ a gboro pɔ, na ba chen a Dalmanuta paal pɔ.
Be lɛ a Faraseemɩne wa sʊrɔ wʊ yelsʊʊrsɩ, bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba bɛɛr wʊ kaa, na ba 'yɛr ɩka wʊ wiil ba jãnɛ kɔ̃ɔ ka ba bɔ̃ɔ ɩka wʊ yin a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
Ka wʊ vʊʊr lɛ fãa tɩ 'yɛr, “Bo lɛ so ka a yɩn pʊ̃pãanyã nɩbɛ bʊɔrɔ jãnɛ ɩka yɩ nyɛ? Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, yɩ kʊ̃ nyɛ jãnɛ jaa ɛ.”
Wʊ bar ba naa tɩ kpɛ a gboro gɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a man gɔ̃ɔn.
A wʊ poturbo ĩin naa ba tara paanʊ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ tara bʊ̃'yen tɛɛ a gboro pɔ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a Faraseemɩne paanʊ̃ɔ dãbɩl nɩ a Hɛrɔd paanʊ̃ɔ dãbɩl mɩ.”
Ka a wʊ poturbo guor taa 'yɛrɛ, “Sɩn ba tara a paanʊ̃ɔ lɛ so.”
Yesu na bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ban 'yɛrɛ, wʊ sʊʊr ba naa, “Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ 'yɛrɛ ɩka yaa tara paanʊ̃ɔ ɛ? Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a par sɛrɛ ɛ? A yɩ nyãa kpɛ̃mɛ na mɩ?
Yɩ tara na nɩbie tɩ ba nyɛrɛ ɛ, na yɩ tara tobo tɩ ba wõnõ ɛ. Yɩ ĩin bɩɩ?
A paanʊ̃ɔsɩ anũu ɩn dɔ̃ɔ de ŋma kʊ a dɔɔr tur anũu, pɛr aŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ wob a bʊ̃ŋmaar na chɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Pɛr pie nɩ ayi.”
Ka a Yesu lɛ bɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, “Ɩn lɛ de a paanʊ̃ɔsɩ ayopõi na n ŋma kʊ a nɩbɛ tur anaar, pɛr aŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ lɛ wob 'yɔ̃ɔ?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Pɛr ayopõi.”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a par sɛrɛ ɛ?”
Ba wa ta na a Betɩsaida tẽe pɔ, ka a nɩbɛ bamɩne tara jɔ̃ɔ waan a Yesu sɛ̃ wa sʊɔr wʊ, ka wʊ sɩɩr a jɔ̃ɔ ka wʊ nyɛrɛ.
Yesu nyɔɔ naa a jɔ̃ɔ nũu tɩ tɔɔ wʊ yin a tẽe chɛchɛ. Wʊ tɩ chɩr nataar 'yɔ̃ɔ a daba nɩbie pɔ tɩ dɔɔl wʊ a nũu tɩ sʊʊr wʊ, “Fʊ nyɛn bon bɩɩ?”
Ka a daba dʊɔ kaa tɩ 'yɛr, “N nyɛn nɩbɛ na kaara tɩɩr kaar na ba vire yʊɔrɔ.”
Ka a Yesu lɛ de a wʊ nuur pɔɔ a daba nɩbie, ka a wʊ nɩbie yuo, ka wʊ nyɛrɛ pãa nyɛ bomo a jaa chɛchɛ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Kulo, ta lɛ kpɛ a tẽe pɔ ɛ.”
Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo chen naa a tẽn ala naa gbʊr Sisariya Filipai. A sɔr pɔ ban be chiine, a Yesu sʊʊr ba naa, “An lɛ a nɩbɛ 'yɛrɛ ɩka n ɩ naa?”
Ka ba 'yɛr, “Bamɩne 'yɛr naa ɩka fʊ̃ʊ lɛ a Jɔɔn 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ. Ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛr ɩka Elaija. Ka a bamɩne mɩ chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ ɩka fʊ ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ãsʊɔ na dɔ̃ɔ be be.”
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr ba, “Tɩchɛ an lɛ yɩ mɩ 'yɛr ɩka n ɩ naa?” Ka a Pita 'yɛr, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ a Nɩ-iraa, a Nãaŋmɩn na tʊ̃ ɩka fʊ faa a wʊ nɩbɛ.”
Ka a Yesu kpãa ba, “Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ a n 'yɛr kʊrɔ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ.”

Yesu piel wile ba na wʊ 'yɛrɛ ɩka a Nɩsaal Bie na din dɔɔyɛ yele yɔɔ pɔ, ka a Juu nɩbɛrɛ, nɩ a ba bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe tɔr wʊ bar, na ba kʊ wʊ. Tɩchɛ a ber ata daar wʊn ir naa a kũu pɔ ɩ vʊr.
Wʊ 'yɛr naa anyã chãa pɔ, ka a Pita tara wʊ yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ tɩ piel mii 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu lɩɛb kaa a wʊ poturbo tɩ mɩ mii 'yɔ̃ɔ a Pita 'yɛrɛ, “Tɔɔ chen be, Satan! A fʊ tɩɛr ɩn nɩrɛ tɩɛr, waa ɩ Nãaŋmɩn tɩɛr ɛ.”
Be lɛ wʊ bʊɔl a nɩyɔɔ nɩ a poturbo ka ba wa a wʊ sɛ̃, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ turo ma, a nɩnyɩnɛ na 'laara a wʊ mãɛ tɩ de a daa na ɩ dɔɔyɛ nɩ kũu, tɩ turo ma.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na bʊɔrɔ a wʊ nyɛvʊr, a wʊ nyɛvʊr na bɔr na, tɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sɔɔ a wʊ nyɛvʊr bɔrfʊ a maa nɩ a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã jũu, na faa wʊ naa.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ tara naa a wɛr nyã bonsɩ a jaa tɩ a wʊ sɩɛ wɛ, bo tɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ be be?
Bɩɩ bo lɛ nɩrɛ na de tɛɛn a wʊ sɩɛ?

Ala ɩ nɩrɛ mɩ nyɛ naa a maa nɩ a n 'yɛrbie ka a ɩ vã yele a nɩbɛ banyã na tɔr Nãaŋmɩn bar, nɩ a putudẽme sɛ̃, a Nɩsaal Bie mɩ na kaa naa a nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ ka wʊ ɩ vĩ sʊɔ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʊn wa lɩɛb wa nɩ a wʊ Sãa tɩɩr 'matãan a malaka chɛchɛsɩ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, bamɩne ara naa a kana na ba kʊ̃ kpi ɛ, tɩchɛ na ba nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ na na wa nɩ kpɛ̃ɔ.”
A ber ayʊɔb puor, Yesu tara naa Pita nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn tɛɛ na wʊ de ba nie ka ba 'mataa do tɔ̃wõo kɔ̃ɔ ju. Be lɛ wʊ tɩ chil a ba niem.
A wʊ fuu pɛl nyɩlɛ gar bʊ̃pɩla jaa nɩrɛ na maal a ka a wɛr pɔ.
Ka a Elaija nɩ a Mosesɩ, wa daa yi a ba sɛ̃. Ka bala nɩ a Yesu 'mataa 'yɛrɛ.
Ka a Pita 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “Wiwile, a sɛɛ naa sɩn be a ka. Sɔɔ, ka sɩ maal sɛɛr ata: fʊ̃ʊ ãsʊɔ, Mosesɩ ãsʊɔ, Elaija mɩ ãsʊɔ.”
Pita ba bɔ̃ɔ ŋmɩnɛ wʊ na 'yɛr ɛ, bojũu dãbãɛ kpɛ ba naa.
Ka a julõjuur wa pɔɔ ba, tɩ kɔkɔr 'yɛr a be a julõjuur pɔ, “N binʊ̃nãa lɛ a nyãna. Yɩ chɛlɛ a wʊ 'yɛr.”
Ajienaa ban ɩka ba kaa, baa lɛ nyɛ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ, tɩ nyɛ a Yesu tɛɛ.
Ban wa yi a tɔ̃ɔ ju suro, ka a Yesu kpãa ba ɩka ba taa wa 'yɛrɛ a lɛ ban nyɛ kʊrɔ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ, wa tɩ tãn a lɛ a Nɩsaal Bie na ir yi a wʊ kũu pɔ.
Baa 'yɛr kʊ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ, tɩ 'yɛrɛ na ba sʊrɔ taa a kũu pɔ irfʊ par.
Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Bo lɛ so ka a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe 'yɛr ɩka Elaija lɛ na de nie wa?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ a Elaija de nie wa chɔɔr a yele jaa. Tɩ ba mɩ sɛb ɩka a Nɩsaal Bie na din dɔɔyɛ yɔɔ ka ba tɔr wʊ bar.
Tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka a Elaija wa naa ka ba ɩ a lɛ jaa ban bʊɔrɔ kʊ wʊ nɩtãa a lɛ ban sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ.”
Ban wa ta a poturbo ŋmaa bala sɛ̃, ba nyɛn nɩyɔɔ na ara jilʊ̃ ba ka a bala nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe chɩrɛ taa.
Ka nɩbɛ na wa nyɛ a Yesu na waara, ka ba nɛɛ 'maa ka ba jo tuor puor wʊ.
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr a wʊ poturbo, “Bo lɛ yɩ chɩrɛ taa a lɛ?”
Ka nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ 'yɛr a be a nɩyɔɔ pɔ, “Wiwile, n bidaba lɛ sɩdɛɛr nyɔɔ ka wʊ maa tʊ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɛ, ka n waan a fʊ sɛ̃.
'Lɔ wa ir wʊ, wʊ ma daa wʊn lɔb tẽe ka wʊ furo a natafuul tɩ ɔɔrɔ a nyɩmɛ tɩ tãa. Ka n wa sʊɔr a fʊ poturbo ɩka ba dii a sɩdɛɛr nyãna bar, ka baa tʊ̃ɔ ɛ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Aa, a yɩn nɩbɛ banyã na ba tara sɔɔfʊ ɛ, n be a yɩ sɛ̃ kor ta ŋmɩnɛ? N tara kãnyir ŋmɩnɛ kʊ yɩ? Waan a bie wa kʊ ma.”
Ka ba waan a bie. A sɩɛ na wa nyɛ a Yesu, wʊ ir tãa a bie ka wʊ lo tẽe, mɩrɛ tɩ bile tɩ furo a natafuul.
Be lɛ a Yesu sʊʊr a bie sãa, “Sɔ̃ɔ buor lɛ a piel wʊ a nɩtɔ̃?” Ka a sãa 'yɛr, “A bibile daar jaa lɛ a piel wʊ.
Wʊ ma daa wʊn lɔb bũu pɔ bɩɩ kʊ̃ɔ pɔ bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ kpi. Ala ɩ fʊn tʊ̃ɔ ɩ yele kɔ̃ɔ, kaa a sɩ nɩbaal tɩ na fʊ sʊ̃ʊ sɩ.”
Ka a Yesu mɩ 'yɛr, “Bo lɛ so ka a fʊ 'yɛr ɩka ala ɩ ɩn tʊ̃ɔ naa? Yele jaa ɩn kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ kʊ a bala na sɔɔ de ma.”
Ajienaa lɛ a bie sãa chɩɩr, “N sɔɔn de fʊ! Sʊ̃ʊ ma, a n sɔɔfʊ ba bɛrma ɛ!”
Yesu na wa nyɛ a nɩyɔɔ na joro lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa a jie, wʊ tãn a sɩdɛɛr, “Fʊ̃ʊ sɩdɛɛr na ma vɛ̃ ka nɩbɛ ɩ wõn, wa yi a bie pɔ na fʊ taa lɛ ɩrɛ wa kpɩɛrɛ a wʊ pɔ go ɛ!”
Ka a sɩɛ ŋme chɛlma tɩ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bie yɔɔ tɩ yi, ka a bie gã kaara fɩka kũu. Ka a nɩbɛ 'yɛr, “Wʊ kpi naa!”
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu nyɔɔ a wʊ nũu tɔɔ, ka wʊ ir ara.
Yesu na wa kpɛ a yir 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ poturbo tɛɛ, ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Bãa lɛ so ka sɩn ba tʊ̃ɔ a sɩdɛɛr nyã dii bar ɛ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Nãaŋmɩn sʊɔrfʊ tɛɛ lɛ na vɛ̃ a fʊ dii a sɩɛ nyã ka wʊ yi.”
Ba yin a jie 'lɔ tɩ tu a Galilee tal. Yesu ba bʊɔrɔ ɩka nɩrɛ jaa wʊ bɔ̃ɔ a jie ban be ɛ,
bojũu wʊ wile naa a wʊ poturbo, “Ban de naa a Nɩsaal Bie kʊ a nɩbɛ, ka ba kʊ wʊ. Ka a ber ata daar wʊn ir naa, na wʊ tara nyɛvʊr.”
Tɩchɛ baa bɔ̃ɔ a par a lɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ joro dãbãɛ ɩka ba sʊʊr wʊ.
Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo wa ta na a Kapenahum. Ban wa kpɛ a yir, a Yesu sʊʊr ba naa, “Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ chɩrɛ taa a sɔr pɔ a lɛ?”
Ka ba ɩ jaa gbulo, bojũu a sɔr pɔ ba chɩrɛ na taa ɩka an lɛ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ.
Yesu na wa jãnɛ wʊ bʊɔl naa a wʊ poturbo Pie nɩ Ayi na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A yɩ ãsʊɔ wa bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ de nie, a nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ wʊ ɩ a yɩ jaa bile, na wʊ ɩ a yɩ jaa tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃.”
Yesu vɛ̃ naa ka bibile kɔ̃ɔ ir ara a ba jaa sãlsɔɔ. Wʊ 'mɔɔn a bie tɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba,
“Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na de a bibiir banyãna taaba a n jũu, maa lɛ wʊ de. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa mɩ na de ma, a ba ɩ maa lɛ wʊ de ɛ, tɩchɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma lɛ wʊ de.”
Ka a Jɔɔn 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Wiwile, sɩ nyɛ naa nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ mɩ na de a fʊ yuor na wʊ dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire. Ka sɩ 'yɛr ɩka wʊ bar bojũu waa ɩ a sɩ ãsʊɔ ɛ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ ta dii wʊ bar ɛ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na de a n yuor tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ kʊ̃ 'yɛr ma 'yɛrdɛɛr go ɛ.
Nɩrɛ jaa na ba jɛɛr nɩ sɩ ɛ, pʊɔ sɩ naa.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na kʊ yɩ kɔ̃'maar nɩ ŋmele, yɩn ɩ a maa sofʊ jũu, a nɩnyɩnɛ kʊ̃ wa faa a wʊ sãyar ɛ.
“Ala ɩ ãsʊɔ jaa mɩ vɛ̃ naa a bʊ̃bil banyãna ãsʊɔ na sɔɔ ma ɩ yelbier, a nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, bala 'mɔɔ nɩɛr lũ yɔɔl a wʊ nyĩe pɔ daa 'yɔ̃ɔ a man pɔ, ala sa.
Ala ɩ a fʊ nũu vɛ̃ naa ka fʊ ɩ yelbier, ŋmaa bar. Fʊn tɩ kpɛ nyɛvʊr pɔ nɩ nũŋmaa sa naa fʊn tara a nuur a jaa ayi tɩ tɩ kpɛ a wõm jie a be a bũu na ba kpĩine ɛ.
Ala ɩ a fʊ gbɛr mɩ vɛ̃ naa ka fʊ ɩ yelbier, ŋmaa bar fʊn tɩ kpɛ nyɛvʊr pɔ nɩ gbɛŋmaa sa naa fʊn tara a gbɛɛ a jaa ayi tɩ tɩ kpɛ a wõm jie.
Ala ɩ a fʊ nɩbir mɩ vɛ̃ naa ka fʊ ɩ yelbier, 'loo bar. Fʊn tɩ kpɛ Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ nɩ nɩbifɩɛ sa naa fʊn tara a nɩbie ayi tɩ tɩ kpɛ a wõm jie.
Be lɛ a ‘Bufulo ba kpire ɛ, ka a bũu mɩ ba kpĩine ɛ.’
Dɔɔyɛ difʊ na lɩɛb nɩrɛ jaa nɩtãa lɛ nyaar na ma wõ bʊ̃diir ka a nʊ̃mɔ̃.
“Nyaar ɩ naa, tɩchɛ a nʊ̃ɔ wa baar, ban lɛ bʊɔl wʊn nyaar ɔ? Yɩ ɩ nyaar, na yɩ tara nyã'maar kʊ taa.”
Yesu pãa yin a jie 'lɔ na wa chen a Judiya paal, na wʊ tɩ gɔ̃ɔ a Jordan man. Nɩyɔɔ lɛ wa naa a wʊ sɛ̃ go, ka wʊ wile ba nɩtãa a lɛ wʊn ma wile ba.
A Faraseemɩne bamɩne wa naa ɩka ba wa bɛɛr wʊ kaa, na ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Sɔr ben be ka daba na tɔr a wʊ pɔɔ bar bɩɩ?”
Ka a Yesu mɩ sʊʊr ba, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a Mosesɩ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr?”
Ka ba 'yɛr, “Mosesɩ bar sɔr ɩka daba wʊ sɛb dãasɩɛ gãn tɩ na wʊ tɔr a wʊ pɔɔ bar.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A yɩ nyãkpãɛn jũu lɛ so ka wʊ sɛb a lɛ.
Tɩchɛ a wɛr pielfʊ, Nãaŋmɩn maal daba nɩ pɔɔ.
A lɛ jũu, daba na bar a wʊ sãa nɩ a wʊ ma tɩchɛ ka 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ pɔɔ ɩ bʊ̃'yen,
ka ba jaa ayi ɩ ãgãn bʊ̃'yen.
A lɛ jũu, bon 'lɔ jaa Nãaŋmɩn na 'mataa, nɩrɛ wʊ ta nyɔɔ wɛl ɛ.”
Ban wa lɩɛb kul a yir, a Yesu poturbo sʊʊr wʊ naa a 'yɛr nyã go.
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Daba jaa na tɔr wʊ pɔɔ bar tɩ kul pɔɔ yuo, wʊ maal yelbier.
Lɛ mɩ lɛ, pɔɔ wa tɔr a wʊ sɩrɛ bar tɩ kul dayuo wʊ mɩ maal yelbier.”
Nɩbɛ dɔ̃ɔ waara nɩ a ba bibiir ɩka Yesu wʊ dɔɔl ba a wʊ nũu, tɩchɛ ka a wʊ poturbo mii 'yɔ̃ɔ ba.
Yesu na wa nyɛ a lɛ a wʊ poturbo na ɩ, wʊ nyɛn suur na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ bar a bibiir ka ba wa a n sɛ̃, na yɩ ta ŋmaa ba sɔr ɛ. A ba nyãna taaba lɛ so a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ jaa na ba sɔɔ de a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ nɩtãa a bibile ɛ, wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ kpɛ be ɛ.”
Be lɛ wʊ 'mɔɔr a bibiir, tɩ dɔɔl ba nuur na wʊ sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ ba.
Yesu na wa de a sɔr chiine, daba jon var gbur dumo a Yesu niem tɩ sʊʊr wʊ, “Wiwiilmãɛ, bo lɛ ɩn maal, naa nyɛ nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ fʊ bʊɔl ma nɩmãɛ? Nɩrɛ jaa ba ɩ mãɛ ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Fʊ bɔ̃ɔ naa a Nãaŋmɩn Nɛɛ. Taa kʊ nɩrɛ ɛ. Taa sɛ̃nɛ ɛ. Taa juro ɛ. Taa dire dãasɩjirɩ ɛ. Taa fɔlɔ ɛ. 'Yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʊ sãa nɩ a fʊ ma.”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Wiwile, n bile sɔ̃ɔ jaa lɛ n turo a Nɛɛ anyãna wa tãn a dɩna.”
Yesu kaa naa a daba nɩ nʊ̃fʊ, tɩ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “A chɛ fʊn yelbʊ̃'yen. Kul tɩ da a fʊ bonsɩ a jaa de põ nɔ̃n dẽme, ala lɛ fʊn tara bʊ̃mãɛ a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃. Tɩ na fʊ pãa wa turo ma.”
A 'yɛr nyã vɛ̃ naa ka a daba sɔ̃ nie na wʊ kul pʊsɔ̃ɔ, bojũu tara sʊɔ lɛ wʊ ɩ.
Be lɛ ka a Yesu kaa gʊɔr na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo, “A tara sʊɔ kpɛfʊ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ ɩn kpɛ̃ɔ!”
A 'yɛrbie anyãna vɛ̃ naa ka ba nɛɛr 'maa, tɩchɛ ka wʊ lɛ 'yɛr go, “Bibiir, a ɩn kpɛ̃ɔ kʊ nɩrɛ jaa na na kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ!
An ɩn kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃, nyɔɔma na na kpɛ kparpĩi bɔɔ pɔ gar tara sʊɔ na na kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.”
Ka a poturbo pãa ɩ chĩcham, tɩ lɩɛb sʊrɔ taa, “An lɛ na pãa tʊ̃ɔ nyɛ faafʊ?”
Ka a Yesu kaa ba tɩ 'yɛr, “Nɩrɛ sɛ̃ 'lɔ, a ɩn tuo, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ba lɛ ɛ. Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ yele jaa ba ɩ tuo ɛ.”
Be lɛ Pita 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Nyɛ, sɩn bar bon jaa tɩ wa turo fʊ!”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na bar a wʊ yir bɩɩ yɛɛr, bɩɩ yɛpɔbɔ bɩɩ a wʊ sãa bɩɩ a wʊ ma, bɩɩ bibiir bɩɩ wɛr, tɩ 'la maa nɩ a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã jũu,
wʊn nyɛn yɔɔ a dɩna. Wʊn nyɛn yie, yɛɛr, yɛpɔbɔ, mamɩne, bibiir nɩ wɛr dɔɔl gbɛɛ kɔbaa, nɩ a gefʊ! Tɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ na waara, ka wʊ nyɛ nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a nɩyɔɔ bala na de nie na wa ben puor, ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na be a puor mɩ wa de a nie.”
Ba dɔ̃ɔ de a sɔr duoro a Jerusalɛm ka Yesu de a nie, tɩ a wʊ poturbo nɛɛr 'maa ka bala mɩ na turo joro dãbãɛ. Wʊ tɔɔ naa a Pie Nɩ Ayi yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ 'yɛr kʊ ba a lɛn na wa a wʊ sɛ̃.
Yesu 'yɛr naa, “Sɩn chiine a Jerusalɛm tẽe pɔ, be lɛ ban tɩ de a Nɩsaal Bie kʊ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe, ka ba ɩka wʊ sɛɛn kũu, na ba nyɔɔ wʊ kʊ a nɩbɛ na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ.
A banyãna na la wʊ naa, na ba chɩr nataar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ, na ba fɔb wʊ tɩ kʊ wʊ. Ka a ber ata daar wʊn ir naa a kũu pɔ ɩ vʊr.”
Be lɛ a Jebedee bibiir Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn tɔɔ gbʊr a Yesu na ba 'yɛr, “Wiwile, sɩ bʊɔrɔ na ɩka sɩ sʊɔr fʊ yele kɔ̃ɔ ka fʊ maal kʊ sɩ.”
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr ba, “Bãa lɛ yɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka n maal kʊ yɩ?”
Ka ba 'yɛr, “Vɛ̃ ka a sɩ ãsʊɔ jãnɛ a fʊ nũsʊ̃ɔ loor, ka 'yen mɩ jãnɛ a fʊ gʊba loor a fʊ nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a bon yɩn sʊɔrɔ ɛ. Yɩn tʊ̃ɔ nyũn a dɔɔyɛ ŋmele 'lɔ ɩn wa nyũn, bɩɩ kpɛ a dɔɔyɛ 'lɔ pɔ ɩn wa kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ sofʊ kaar ɔ?”
Ka a ba 'yɛr, “Ɔ̃ɔ.” Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yɩn nyũn a ŋmele 'lɔ ɩn na nyũn, na yɩ so a kʊ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn na so,
tɩchɛ a n nũsʊ̃ɔ loor nɩ a n gʊba loor 'lɔ n ba tara sɔr ɩka n kʊ yɩ ɛ. Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ lɛ tara sɔr ɩka wʊ de a jiir anyãna kʊ a bala wʊn chɔɔr.”
A poturbo pie bala na chɛ na wa wõ a yele, ba nyɛn suur 'yɔ̃ɔ a Jemesɩ nɩ a Jɔɔn.
Ka a Yesu bʊɔl ba jaa 'mataa tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa a bala na ɩ a nãmɩne a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ma fɩrɛ naa a nɩbɛ, ka a nɩbɛrɛ ma wile a ba kpãɛn.
A ba ɩ lɛ lɛ a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ ɩ a yɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, wʊ ɩ a yɩ jaa tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃,
ka a 'lɔ mɩ na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ ɩ a nɩdiere, wʊ ɩ a yɩ jaa gbãgbaa.
A Nɩsaal Bie mɩ gba ba wa, ɩka ba wa tʊ̃nɔ̃ kʊrɔ wʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊ wa naa ɩka wʊ wa tʊ̃ kʊ ba, na wʊ de a wʊ nyɛvʊr lɩɛ faan nɩyɔɔ.”
Ba pãa wa naa a Jeriko. Ban wa kpɛ a Jeriko tɩ yire, nɩyɔɔ turo naa Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo, ka a jɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Batimayus, Timeyus bidaba, jãnɛ a sɔr kõkoor sʊɔrɔ bomo.
Wʊn wa wõ ka a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ lɛ, ka wʊ piel gboolo, “Yesu, David Bie, kaa n nɩbaal!”
Ka a nɩbɛ bamɩne ɩka wʊ pɔɔ a nɛɛ, tɩchɛ ka wʊ pãa chɛnɛ mal gboolo, “David Bie, kaa n nɩbaal!”
Be lɛ a Yesu tɛɛ ara tɩ 'yɛr, “Yɩ bʊɔl wʊ.” Ka ba bʊɔl a jɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr wʊ, “'Maa nyãa! Ir ara, wʊ bʊɔlɔ fʊ naa.”
Ka wʊ vaa ir lɔb a fɔbaa bar tɩ wa a Yesu sɛ̃.
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr wʊ, “Bãa fʊ bʊɔrɔ ɩka n maal kʊ fʊ?” Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Wiwile, n bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka n nyɛrɛ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Chiine! Fʊ sa naa, fʊn sɔɔ ma jũu.” Ajienaa, wʊ nyɛrɛ naa, na wʊ turo a Yesu ka ba de a sɔr.
A lɛ ban wa gbʊrɔ a Jerusalɛm, ba ta naa a tẽn ayi, Betefagɩ nɩ Betanɩ na be a Olive tɔ̃ɔ par, ka Yesu tʊ̃ wʊ poturbo ayi.
Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ chen a tẽbile 'lɔ na be a yɩ niem, Yɩn wa kpɩɛrɛ a tẽe pɔ, yɩn nyɛn bʊ̃bile nɩrɛ jaa na ba do wʊ sɛrɛ ɛ, ban lũ. Yɩ for waan.
Ka nɩrɛ wa sʊʊr yɩ ɩka bãa lɛ yɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ, yɩ 'yɛr wʊ ɩka, a yɩ Soro lɛ bʊɔrɔ wʊ, tɩ wʊn lɩɛb waan fɔɔ.”
Ba chen tɩ nyɛ a bʊ̃bile ban lũ a yõo dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ. Ban wa foro,
nɩbɛ bamɩne na ara a be sʊʊr ba naa, “Bãa lɛ yɩ foro a bʊ̃bile ɩrɛ nɩ?”
Ka ba 'yɛr a lɛ a Yesu na ɩka ba 'yɛr, ka a nɩbɛ bar ba.
Be lɛ ba waan a bʊ̃bile wa kʊ a Yesu, na ba de a ba fɔɔr 'yɩɛr dɔɔl a bʊ̃bile ju, ka wʊ do jãnɛ.
Nɩyɔɔ na bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu jũu, ba den fɔɔr 'yɩɛr a sɔr pɔ, ka bamɩne mɩ kar vaɩ a por pɔ wa 'yɩɛr a sɔr pɔ.
Ka a bala na be a niem nɩ a bala na be a puor, pãa chɩlɛ gɔ̃nɔ̃ 'yɛrɛ, “Yãan yooo! Nãaŋmɩn wʊ sʊ̃ʊ a 'lɔ wʊn tʊ̃!
Nãaŋmɩn wʊ sʊ̃ʊ a sɩ sãa David nãalʊ̃ʊ na waara! Yãan yooo! Sɩ dãn Nãaŋmɩn yɔɔ jaa!”
Yesu na wa ta a Jerusalɛm, wʊ chen tɩ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʊ Yir kaa a bomo a jaa. A wɛr na sɔɔrɔ jũu, 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ poturbo pie nɩ ayi yin chen a Betanɩ.
A wɛr na wa chaar ka a Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo lɩɛb yi a Betanɩ waara a Jerusalɛm, kɔ̃ kpɛ naa a Yesu.
Be lɛ wʊ nyɛ a kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ tɩɛ na tɔ vaar ara a niem, ka wʊ chen ɩka wʊ tɩ kaa wɔ̃mɔ̃ ben be bɩɩ. Wʊ chen tɩ ta ka a ɩ wɔ̃mɔ̃ ba be be ɛ, vaar tɛɛ lɛ, bojũu a ba ɩ a wɔ̃mɔ̃ sɔ̃ɔ lɛ ɛ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a tɩɛ, “Nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ lɛ wa pɔr a fʊ wɔ̃mɔ̃ di ɛ.” A wʊ poturbo wõ naa a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr.

Ban wa ta a Jerusalɛm, Yesu chen tɩ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʊ Yir bɛchaar pɔ dire a nɩbɛ bala na chiin a bonsɩ tɩ daara nɩ a bala na daara. Wʊ daa naa libitɛɛrbɛ tɛɛbʊlsɩ lɩɛb kpa, tɩ da a bala mɩ na daara a papasɩ dakɔɔr lɔb.
Waa sɔɔ ka a nɩrɛ jaa tuo bon jaa tun a bɛchaar 'lɔ pɔ ɛ.
Be lɛ ka wʊ pãa wile ba na wʊ 'yɛr, “A Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr naa a wʊ gãn pɔ, ‘N yir ɩ naa a yir a nɩbʊrɔ ba jaa na wa puor ma,’
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃ bʊɔrɔ sɔr 'lɔ ban tu kʊ wʊ, tɩ na ba joro wʊ dãbãɛ bojũu a nɩyɔɔ nɛɛr 'maa ba naa a wʊ wiilfʊ pɔ.
A jãanʊɔr na wa ta, Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturo lɩɛb chen a Betanɩ.
A wɛr na wa chaar bibio ka ba lɩɛb chiine a Jerusalɛm, ba nyɛ naa ka ɩ a kɔ̃kɔ̃tɩɛ na kpi lɔ̃ɔn a nyɩbɛ.
Be lɛ ka a Pita tɩɛr a lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr kʊ a tɩɛ, na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Wiwile, nyɛ a tɩɛ 'lɔ fʊn pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ! Wʊ kpi naa!”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ sɔɔ de Nãaŋmɩn.
Sɩrɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, ala ɩ yɩ ãsʊɔ sɔɔ naa de Nãaŋmɩn na waa baala a wʊ tɩɛr pɔ ɛ, 'lɔ gba na tʊ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ a tɔ̃ɔ nyãna, ‘Ir tɩ lo a man pɔ,’ a Nãaŋmɩn na sɔɔ naa ka a lɛ ɩ.
Ala lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, fʊ̃ʊ puor Nãaŋmɩn sʊɔr bon jaa tɩ sɔɔ ɩka, wʊn ɩn kʊ fʊ, wʊn ɩ naa.
Fʊ̃ʊ wa ɩka fʊ puor, tɩ tara nɩrɛ nɩ 'yɛr, vɛ̃ kʊ a nɩnyɩnɛ. A fʊ Sãa na be a saaju mɩ na vɛ̃ naa a fʊ yelbier kʊ fʊ.”
Ba lɛ wa naa a Jerusalɛm go, ka a Yesu tɩ kpɛ yʊɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʊ Yir bɛchaar pɔ. A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ wa naa a wʊ sɛ̃.
Ba wa sʊʊr wʊ naa, “An lɛ kʊ fʊ a sɔr ka fʊ tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyã? Fʊ tara naa a sɔr ɩka fʊ tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyã ɔ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “N sʊʊr yɩ sʊʊrfʊ bʊ̃'yen. Yɩn wa tʊ̃ɔ wiil ma a par, n mɩ na wiil yɩ naa a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kʊ ma a sɔr ka n tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyã.
Jɔɔn na dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kʊ wʊ a sɔr bɩɩ, nɩbɛ lɛ kʊ wʊ a sɔr? Yɩ 'yɛr n kaa!”
A ba lɩɛb chɩrɛ taa, “Sɩn be 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ tʊ̃ wʊ, wʊn sʊʊr sɩ naa, ka bo lɛ so ka saa sɔɔ wʊ ɛ?
Tɩchɛ sɩn mɩ 'yɛr ɩka nɩrɛ lɛ tʊ̃ wʊ, a ba ɩ ɛ.” Ba joro naa a nɩbɛ dãbãɛ, bojũu nɩrɛ jaa sɔɔ naa ɩka a Jɔɔn ɩn Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ.
Lɛ lɛ ba 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “Saa bɔ̃ɔ ɛ.” Ka a Yesu mɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “N mɩ kʊ̃ 'yɛr kʊ yɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kʊ ma a sɔr ka n tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyãna ɛ.”

Ka a Yesu lɛ piel 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ ba nɩ sʊkpa. Wʊ 'yɛr naa, “Daba lɛ kɔ wʊ puo na wʊ bʊr tɩwɔ̃nsɩ. Wʊ wɔɔ naa a puo wʊ jaa jilʊ̃, na wʊ tuu bɔɔ ka ban ma pɔr a wɔ̃mɔ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ na ba nɛŋmɛr ir a kʊ̃ɔ. Wʊ mɛn jie ãsʊɔ na do ka nɩrɛ na ma do jɛ̃ a be kaara a puo. Wʊ de naa a puo na wʊ kʊ nɩbɛ ɩka ba kaara tɩ na wʊ yɔ chen paal yuo pɔ.
A wɔ̃fʊ sɔ̃ɔ wa ta naa ka wʊ tʊ̃ a wʊ gbãgbaa ãsʊɔ ɩka wʊ chen a nɩbɛ bala sɛ̃ tɩ de a wɔ̃mɔ̃ amɩne.
Tɩchɛ ka ba nyɔɔ wʊ ŋme bar ka wʊ kul nũjaal.
Be lɛ wʊ lɛ tʊ̃ a gbãgbaa ãsʊɔ ka ba lɛ ŋme wʊ a ju puo tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ vĩ.
Wʊ lɛ tʊ̃n ãsʊɔ ka ba kʊ a 'lɔ. Ka wʊ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ tʊ̃ bamɩne, ka ba pɔb bamɩne tɩ kʊ a bamɩne.
“Wʊ chen nɩbʊ̃'yen wʊn na tʊ̃, 'lɔ lɛ a wʊ bibʊ̃'yen wʊn nʊ̃. 'Lɔ lɛ wʊ wa tʊ̃ a baaraa jaa na wʊ 'yɛr, ‘Ban 'yɔ̃ɔ naa a n bie.’
“Tɩchɛ a pokaarba na wa nyɛ a bie, ba 'yɛr kʊ taa, ‘A nyã lɛ ɩ a bʊ̃dire! Yɩ ɩ a sɩ kʊ wʊ, tɩ chɛ ka a bonsɩ ɩ a sɩ sofʊ.’
