Be lɛ ba nyɔɔ wʊ kʊ lɔb bar a puo kõkoor.
“Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tɩɛr ɩka a puo sʊɔ na ɩ naa? Wʊn wan wa kʊ a pokaarba banyãna ba jaa tɩ de a puo kʊ nɩyor!
Yaa kar a jie nyã a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɛ? Wʊ 'yɛr ɩka, ‘A kʊsɩr 'lɔ a mɩmɩɛrbɛ na tɔr bar lɛ ɩ a kʊsɩr ju.
A sɩ Soro lɛ tʊ̃ a nɩtɔ̃ ka sɔb sɩ a nɩbie.’ ”
Be lɛ a Juu nɩbɛrɛ bʊɔrɔ sɔr ɩka ba nyɔɔ a Yesu, bojũu ba bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka bala lɛ wʊ lɔb a sʊkpa gbɛb. Tɩchɛ ba joro naa a nɩyɔɔ bala dãbãɛ, na ba bar wʊ tɩ lɩɛb chen.
Ba lɛ tʊ̃ naa a Faraseemɩne bamɩne nɩ nɩbɛ bamɩne na yi a nãa Hɛrɔd sɛ̃, ka ba wa bɛr Yesu nɛɛ nyɔɔ wʊ, a wʊ 'yɛrbie pɔ.

Ba wa na wa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Wiwile, sɩ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka fʊ ɩn yelmãɛ sʊɔ. Nɩbɛ 'yɛrbie maa tʊ̃ɔ a fʊ pʊtɩɛr lɩɛb ɛ, bojũu fʊ maa chɛlɛ a lɛ nɩrɛ jaa na be ɛ. Tɩchɛ fʊ wile na a Nãaŋmɩn sɔr nɩ yelmãɛ. A tara naa sɔr ɩka sɩ yab a lõpo kʊ a nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa bɩɩ?
Sɩ yab bɩɩ sɩ ta yab ɛ?” Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu bɔ̃ɔn a ba nɛbɛr yele ban waan, na wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Bo lɛ yɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka yɩ bɛɛr ma kaa? Yɩ de a libir ãsʊɔ waan ka n kaa.”
Be lɛ ba de a libir kur ãsʊɔ waan, ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “An foto nɩ a yuor lɛ be a libir pɔ?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Siisa lɛ.”
Lɛ lɛ ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ de a 'lɔ na ɩ a Siisa sofʊ na yɩ yab wʊ, na yɩ mɩ de a 'lɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sofʊ na yɩ mɩ kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn.” Ka ba faa tɩ nyɔɔr a nɛɛr ara nɩ.
A nɩbɛ bamɩne ban bʊɔlɔ a Saduseemɩne na 'yɛr ɩka kũu pɔ irfʊ ba be be ɛ, mɩ wa naa wa sʊʊr wʊ,
“Wiwile, Mosesɩ sɛb kʊ sɩ ɩka nɩrɛ yɛbɛ wa kpi tɩ bar pɔɔ na ba tara bie ɛ, a wʊ yɛbɛ wʊ kul a pɔɔkʊɔr 'lɔ na wʊ dɔɔ bibiir kʊ a wʊ yɛbɛ 'lɔ na kpi.
Yɛɛr ayopõi lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be, ka ba kpɛ̃ɛ kul pɔɔ kpi tɩ chɛ bar, waa tara bie ɛ.
Ka a wʊ turo de a pɔɔkʊɔr kul, baa mɩ dɔɔ bie ɛ, tɩchɛ ka wʊ mɩ kpi. A lɛ nɛ nɩ wʊ ju mɩ lɛ a turo ata sʊɔ.
Yelmãɛ jaa a yɛɛr ayopõi banyãna ba jaa kulnaa a pɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, tɩ waa dɔɔ bie ɛ, a baaraa jaa ka a pɔɔ mɩ kpi.
Bala wa ir yi a kũu pɔ, an pɔɔ lɛ wʊn ɩ, an ɩ ba jaa kul wʊn lʊɔr taa?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yaa nyɛ yɩn bɔr, bojũu yaa bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn sɛbɛ nɩ a wʊ kpɛ̃ɔ ɛ.
Nɩbɛ wa ir a kũu pɔ ba kʊ̃ lɛ kul taa ɛ, tɩ ban kaara naa fɩka a malakasɩ, baa kulo taa ɛ.
A kũu pɔ irfʊ yele yɩ kar a Mosesɩ gãn pɔ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʊn nyɛ a tɩbile na 'lɩrɛ bũu, ka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, ‘N ɩ naa a Abraham Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Isaakɩ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Jekɔb Nãaŋmɩn.’
Wʊ ɩ naa vʊr Nãaŋmɩn, waa ɩ kũn Nãaŋmɩn ɛ. Yɩ tul naa.”
A Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wile ãsʊɔ wa ara na chɛl a lɛ a Yesu nɩ a nɩbɛ na 'mataa 'yɛrɛ. Ka wʊ nyɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr nʊ̃mɔ̃. Ka wʊ mɩ sʊʊr a Yesu, “A Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛr a jaa pɔ, buor sʊɔ lɛ ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ?”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “A 'lɔ na ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ gar a jaa nɩ nyã, ‘A Isɩral nɩbɛ, yɩ chɛlɛ! A sɩ Soro Nãaŋmɩn, wʊ ɩ naa Soro bʊ̃'yen tɛɛ.
Nʊ̃ a fʊ Soro Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a fʊ nyãa, nɩ a fʊ nyɛvʊr wʊ jaa, nɩ a fʊ tɩɛr wʊ jaa, nɩ a fʊ kpɛ̃ɔ wʊ jaa.’
A 'lɔ na tu nɩ nyã, ‘Nʊ̃ a fʊ tɔ sʊɔ nɩtãa lɛ fʊn nʊ̃ a fʊ mãɛ.’
Ka a daba 'yɛr, “Wiwile, fʊ 'yɛr yelmãɛ, a lɛ fʊn 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn bʊ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ be be, ka ãsʊɔ jaa ba lɛ be be pʊɔ wʊ ɛ.
A fʊ nʊ̃ wʊ nɩ a fʊ nyãa, nɩ a fʊ tɩɛr wʊ jaa, nɩ a fʊ kpɛ̃ɔ wʊ jaa, na fʊ lɛ nʊ̃ a fʊ tɔ sʊɔ nɩtãa a fʊ mãɛ, a yele anyãna tufʊ ɩn gar dʊ̃n fʊn kʊ chʊm kʊ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ bɔɔrlorsɩ a jaa.”
Yesu na nyɛ a lɛ a daba na 'yɛr nɩ yɛ̃ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Faa jãa nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ ɛ.” An yi a be chiine nɩrɛ jaa ba lɛ 'la sʊʊr wʊ sʊʊrfʊ go ɛ.
A lɛ a Yesu na wile a Puorfʊ Yir bɛchaar pɔ, wʊ sʊʊr naa a nɩbɛ, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a ta ka a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe 'yɛr ɩka David bie lɛ a Nɩ-iraa?
A ba ɩ a David mãɛ pɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, ka wʊ 'yɛr ɩka, ‘A n Soro Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊ a n Soro nyã wʊn ir, “Jãnɛ a n nũsʊ̃ɔ loor ka n wa de a fʊ dɔ̃dẽme bin a fʊ gbɛɛ pĩlem.” ’
Ala ɩ David mãɛ bʊɔl wʊ naa a wʊ Soro, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ wʊn lɛ ɩ a wʊ bie tɛɛ?” Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala ara chɛlɛ wʊ nɩ pʊpɛl.
Yesu wile naa tɩ na wʊ kpãa ba, “Yɩ gu yɩ mãɛ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe sɛ̃, ba ma su naa a fuu vɛɛsɩ ala yʊɔrɔ ɩka ba puor ba a dar pɔ.
Bala be wa kpɛ a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie, a niem lɛ ba ma jãnɛ.
Ba mɩ ma fɔlɔ naa a pɔɔkɔɛ, na ba mɩ ma puor Nãaŋmɩn kor, bʊɔrɔ ɩka nɩbɛ ba kaara ba. A nɩbɛ banyãna 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ na kpɛ̃mɛ naa.”
Yesu jɛ̃n gbʊr a jie ban 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a libie a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʊ Yir pɔ, na wa kaara a lɛ a nɩyɔɔ na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a ba libie. Taraa dẽme yɔɔ jaa lɔɔrɔ naa yɔɔ.
Be lɛ ka a pɔɔkɔnɔ̃ɔ sʊɔ mɩ be be na wʊ mɩ waan libikue ayi na ɩ kobo wa 'yɔ̃ɔ a libie pɔ.
Ka Yesu bʊɔl a wʊ poturbo ka ba tɔɔ gbʊr wʊ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, a pɔɔkɔnɔ̃ɔ sʊɔ nyã lɔb gar ba jaa.
A tara dẽme ma 'yɔ̃ɔn tɩ chɛ a libiyɔɔ amɩne, tɩchɛ a pɔɔkɔnɔ̃ɔ sʊɔ nyã 'lɔ, a jaa lɛ wʊ de 'yɔ̃ɔ. Waa lɛ tara bon jaa go ɛ.”
Yesu na wa yire a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʊ Yir pɔ, a wʊ poturo ãsʊɔ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Wiwile, nyɛ a kʊsɩbɛ ban mɛn a yir kpɛ̃ɛ nyã ka wʊ kaara ka!”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr sɔɔ wʊ, “Mɩ fʊ nyɛ naa a lɛ ban mɛ a yir kpɛ̃ɛ nyãna? A kʊsɩvɩɛl anyãna 'yen jaa kʊ̃ lɛ wa chɛnɛ dɔɔl wʊ tɔ ju ɛ. Ban dãn a jaa lɔb.”
Yesu na wa jãnɛ a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ ju, a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʊ Yir nidaa, Pita nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn nɩ Andiru sʊʊr wʊ naa a ba tɛɛ,
“'Yɛr kʊ sɩ a daar 'lɔ a anyã na ɩ. Bo lɛ na ɩ a jãnɛ sɛrɛ tɩ chɛ ka a wa ɩ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ka nɩrɛ jaa ta wa bɛl yɩ ɛ!
Nɩyɔɔ na de naa maa yuor waan wa 'yɛrɛ, ‘Maa lɛ a Yesu,’ na ba wa bɛlɛ nɩyɔɔ.
Yɩn wa wõn tam, ka ba 'yɛrɛ a tam 'yɛr, yɩ taa mɩrɛ ɛ. A lɛ na ɩ naa, tɩchɛ a wɛr baarfʊ chɛnɛ na be puor.
Nɩbʊr dẽdẽme na yin tam, ka a nãmɩne mɩ yi tam. Ka a tẽgãn dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ jiir yɔɔ, ka kɔ̃ mɩ lo. A dɔɔyɛ anyãna lɛ ɩ a pielfʊ.

“Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn, ɩka ban ma nyɔɔr yɩn chiin a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ jie, na ba lɛ pɔb yɩ, a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir. A maa yɩn sɔɔ jũu, ban tara yɩn chiin a tẽe nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nãmɩne jie, ɩka ba tɩ tɔɔr a yɩ 'yɛr, tɩ yɩn tu naa a be 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ kʊ ba.
A 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã na den nie ta a nɩbʊrɔ ba jaa.

Bala wa nyɔɔr yɩ chiin a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ jie, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka tɩɛr nyɔɔ yɩ a lɛ yɩn tɩ 'yɛr ɛ. Lɛ jaa a Nãaŋmɩn na wiil yɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ sɔ̃ɔ, 'yɛr wʊ. A ba ɩ yɩn lɛ 'yɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ a 'yɛrbie yi naa a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛ̃.
“Yɛbɛ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ yɛbɛ, ka ba kʊ wʊ, ka a sãa mɩ gar 'yɔ̃ɔ bie, ka ba kʊ wʊ. Bibiir kʊ̃ lɛ wõnõ a ba sãamɩne toor ɛ, na ba vɛ̃ ka ba kʊ a ba sãamɩne.
Nɩrɛ jaa na 'laar yɩ naa, yɩn sɔɔ ma jũu, tɩ 'lɔ na sɔɔ tɩ ta a baaraa, na nyɛn Nãaŋmɩn faafʊ.
“Yɩn nyɛ naa a yele 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'laar
Nɩrɛ jaa na be gar ju, ta suu a die pɔ tɩ de bon jaa ɛ.
'Lɔ mɩ na be a puo pɔ, ta lɛ chen tɩ de a wʊ fɔbaa ɛ.
A bɩbir nyãna an ɩn tuo kʊ a pɔɔpʊʊr nɩ a bala na tara a bi'yɛnsɩ.
Yɩ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka a ta wa ɩ uon ɛ.
A ber ala pɔ, nɩbɛ na din dɔɔyɛ yɔɔ. Nãaŋmɩn na maal a wɛr baa di a dɔɔyɛ nyã bʊrɔ ɛ, tɩ ba mɩ kʊ̃ lɛ wa di wʊ go ɛ.
Ala ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn ba ŋmaa a ber ala bar ɛ, nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ chɛ ɛ. Tɩchɛ a bala wʊn chɛl ir jũu, wʊ ŋmaan bar.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, nɩrɛ wa 'yɛr kʊ yɩ ɩka yɩ nyɛ a Nɩ-iraa a ka, bɩɩ kasɛn lɛ wʊ be, yɩ taa sɔɔrɔ ɛ.

Bojũu a jire Nɩ-iraa nɩ a jire 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na wa na wa tʊ̃nɔ̃ a lɛ a nɩbɛ na ba dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ ɛ, na ba maala yelbɛrɛ fɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kʊ ba a kpɛ̃ɔ. Na ba bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba bɛl a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na chɛl ir, ala ɩ ban tʊ̃ɔ naa.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn! N den nie 'yɛr kʊ yɩ.
“Tɩchɛ a dɔɔyɛ nyã baarfʊ sɔ̃ɔ, ‘Mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na lii naa, ka a ŋmɛraa kʊ̃ mɩ lɛ chaar ɛ,
Ka a ŋmɛrbie pɔrɔ yire a saaju loro, tɩ a saaju wʊ jaa dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.’
“A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, ban nyɛn a Nɩsaal Bie na waara a julõjuur pɔ, nɩ kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ tɩɩr.
Wʊn tʊ̃ naa a wʊ malakasɩ, ka ba wa lɔ̃ɔ taa a bala wʊn chɛl ir a wɛr wʊ jaa, tɩ yin a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ purfʊ jie tɩ tɔ a mʊrfʊ jie.
“Yɩ de a pɔlpɔl tɩɛ yele jãn yɛ̃. 'Lɔ wa tʊɔrɔ a vaar yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a tʊl sɔ̃ɔ gbʊr naa.
A lɛ mɩ nɩ wʊ ju lɛ, yɩn wa nyɛ a lɛ n 'yɛr kʊ yɩ na ɩrɛ, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a sɔ̃ɔ gbʊr naa jaa yɛ̃yɛ̃.
N 'yɛrɛ naa yelmãɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, ɩka a pʊ̃pãanyã nɩbɛ kʊ̃ kpi baar ɛ, tɩ yɩ nyɛ a yele anyãna ka a ɩ.
A saaju nɩ a wɛr na wa baar naa tɩchɛ maa 'yɛrbie dɔ̃ɔ kʊ̃ wa baar ɛ.
“Nɩrɛ jaa ba bɔ̃ɔ a bɩbir nyã ɛ, bɩɩ a sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a malakasɩ gba na be a saaju ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a Bie mɩ ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a Sãa tɛɛ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ.
Yɩ gu yɩ mãɛ vɩla! Yɩ kaar sʊ̃! Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a sɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
An kaar naa fɩka yir sʊɔ na wa yʊɔrɔ tɩ de a wʊ yir 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ nuur pɔ, na wʊ kʊ ãsʊɔ jaa nɩ wʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃, tɩ mɩ 'yɛr kʊ a dɔ̃dɔr guro ka wʊ kaara.
A lɛ jũu yɩ kaara tɩ guro wʊ, bojũu yaa bɔ̃ɔ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a yir sʊɔ na na lɩɛb wa ɛ. Amɩne kɔ̃ɔ a wa ɩ jãanʊɔr, bɩɩ tãsɔɔ bãɩn, bɩɩ nɔrsɩ na kõnõ, bɩɩ bibio pipi.
Yɩ ta wa vɛ̃ ka wʊ wa dũu yɩ a yɩ be gʊ̃ɔ pɔ ɛ.
A lɛ n 'yɛr kʊ yɩ, nɩrɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛr kʊ yɩ kaar sʊ̃!”
A chen ber ayi ka ban di a Gõl Bar Difʊ nɩ a Paanʊ̃kõo Lɔ̃ɔfʊ, ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe bʊɔrɔ vuo 'lɔ ban na tu sɔɔl nyɔɔ a Yesu kʊ.
Tɩchɛ ka ba 'yɛr, “A ta ɩ a lɔ̃ɔfʊ sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, ka a jɛɛr taa ir a chara pɔ ɛ.”

Yesu na wa be a Betanɩ a Simon 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a kɔ̃kɔn yir, ka ba 'mataa dire, pɔɔ kɔ̃ɔ wa waan na pãrtɔvɩla nɩ kãnyũu kɔ̃ɔ dafʊ na ba wõnõ ɛ. A pɔɔ kpɩr naa a pãrtʊɔ nyĩe tɩ kpaar a kãnyũu ala dɔɔl a Yesu ju.
Ka a nɩbɛ bala na be be nyɛ suur tɩ 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ taa, “Bo lɛ so ka wʊ sɔ̃ɔ a kãnyũu nyã bar a nɩtɔ̃?
Wʊn taa den da nɩbʊ̃'yen yuon gbul sãyar libie na wʊ de kʊ nɔ̃n dẽme.” Tɩ mii 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɔɔ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ bar wʊ! Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ mii 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ? Wʊ maal vɩla kʊ ma.
A nɔ̃n dẽme 'lɔ, yɩn nɩ bala ben ka. Yɩn tʊ̃ɔ sʊ̃ʊ ba sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ jaa yɩn bʊɔrɔ, tɩchɛ maa kʊ̃ be a yɩ sɛ̃ sɔ̃ɔ jaa ɛ.
Wʊ ɩ naa a lɛ wʊn tʊ̃ɔ. Wʊ kpaar a kãnyũu 'yɔ̃ɔ ma tɩ chɛ ka n ba kpi sɛrɛ ɛ, na wʊ chɔɔr ma guro nɩ a n ũufʊ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, jie jaa ban wa 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyãna a wɛr wʊ jaa pɔ, ban 'yɛr naa a lɛ a pɔɔ nyã na ɩ na ba chɛnɛ tara a wʊ tɩɛr.”
A Pie nɩ Ayi bala wʊn kaa ir ãsʊɔ ban bʊɔlɔ a Judas Isɩkariyot chen a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr ba ɩka wʊ bʊɔrɔ na ɩka wʊ de a Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba nuur pɔ.
Ban wa wõ a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr ka a nʊ̃mɔ̃ ba, ka ba 'yɛr ɩka ban kʊ wʊn libie. Ka a Judas pãa bʊɔrɔ vuo 'lɔ wʊn na tu de a Yesu kʊ ba.
A bɩbir dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ɩ naa a Paanʊ̃kõo Lɔ̃ɔfʊ, ka ban na kʊ a pele na ba di a Gõl Bar Difʊ, Yesu poturbo sʊʊr wʊ naa, “Nyɩnɛ lɛ fʊ bʊɔrɔ ɩka sɩ chen tɩ chɔɔr a Gõl Bar nyã bʊ̃diir a fʊ tɩ di?”
Wʊ tʊ̃ naa a wʊ poturbo ayi, na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ chen a tẽe pɔ, daba na tuo kʊ̃ɔ nɩ dʊʊ na tuor yɩ naa. Yɩ turo wʊ.
A yir 'lɔ pɔ wʊn wa tɩ kpɛ, yɩ sʊʊr a yir sʊɔ, ‘A Wiwile ɩka sɩ wa sʊʊr fʊ, “Nyɩnɛ lɛ a 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ poturbo na wa 'mataa di a Gõl Bar Difʊ?” ’
Wʊn wiil yɩ naa bɔɔpɩɛ ban chɔɔr. Yɩ maal a bʊ̃diir a be.”
Ba yin chen a tẽe tɩ nyɛ a lɛ jaa a Yesu na 'yɛr kʊ ba. Ka ba maal a Gõl Bar bʊ̃diir.
Jãanʊɔr na wa ta, Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo Pie nɩ Ayi wa naa.
Ban wa dire, wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, a yɩ ãsʊɔ na tɩ gar 'yɔ̃ɔ ma; ãsʊɔ sɩn 'mataa dire nɩ a labʊ̃'yen pɔ.”
Be lɛ ka ba jaa pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ ka ba sʊrɔ wa bʊ̃'yen 'yen, “Maa lɛ ɔ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “A yɩ Pie nɩ Ayi ãsʊɔ lɛ! A yɩ ãsʊɔ sɩn 'mataa tũno a labʊ̃'yen pɔ lɛ.
A Nɩsaal Bie na kpi naa nɩtãa lɛ ban sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ. Tɩchɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nɩsaal Bie na din dɔɔyɛ gar nɩrɛ jaa! Ka bala ta ba dɔɔ wʊ ɛ, ala sa.”
Ban wa dire ka a Yesu de a paanʊ̃ɔ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, tɩ ŋmaa de kʊ a wʊ poturbo, na wʊ 'yɛr, “Yɩ de, a n ãgãn lɛ.”
Wʊ lɛ den a ŋmele 'lɔ ban nyuro nɩ, na wʊ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan tɩ lɛ de kʊ ba, ka ba jaa nyũ.
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “N jãɩ lɛ a anyã na vɛ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn nɛtɩraa na tara kpɛ̃ɔ, an chir naa, na a faa nɩyɔɔ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, n kʊ̃ lɛ nyũ a dãa anyãna ɛ, wa tɩ tãn a daar 'lɔ ɩn na nyũ a bʊ̃paalaa a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.”
Ban wa yiel yiel dãn Nãaŋmɩn, ba suun chen a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ ju.
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ jaa na jon tɩ bar ma, nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛr a wʊ gãn pɔ, Ɩn ŋme naa pɛchinɛ kʊ ka a piir yɛ̃yɛl.
Tɩchɛ maa wa ir a kũu pɔ, ɩn de yɩn nie chen a Galilee.”
Ka a Pita chɛ nyãa 'yɛr, “Ala ɩ gba, ba jaa sɔɔn bar fʊ tɩ maa 'lɔ kʊ̃ bar fʊ ɛ.”
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a Pita, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ fʊ, dɩna tãsɔɔ, a nɔrdɔ̃ɔ kʊ̃ kõ gbɛɛ ayi sɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ fʊ 'yɛr gbɛɛ ata ɩka faa bɔ̃ɔ ma ɛ.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita 'yɛr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa ɩka, “Maa nɩ fʊ̃ʊ na 'mantaa kpi gba, tɩ n kʊ̃ 'yɛr ɩka n ba bɔ̃ɔ fʊ ɛ.” Ka a bala mɩ na chɛ 'yɛr a lɛ nɛ.
Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo chen naa a jie 'lɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Getɩsemanɩ, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ jãnɛ a kana, tɩ ka n chen tɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn.”
Be lɛ wʊ tara Pita nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn 'mataa chiin ka a wʊ pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ jaa, ka tɩɛr nyɔɔ wʊ yɔɔ.
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “N tɩɛr sɔ̃ɔ naa, tɩ nyɛtãan kũu. Yɩ jãnɛ a kana gu ma tɩ na yɩ taa guro ɛ.”
Wʊ chen naa a niem bãlãa tɩ lo kpa tẽe sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɩka ala ɩ a tara naa ɩfʊ kɔ̃ɔ, wʊ vɛ̃ ka a sɔ̃ɔ nyãna po wʊ.
Wʊ 'yɛr naa, “N Sãa, yele jaa ba gar a fʊ maalfʊ ɛ. De a dɔɔyɛ ŋmele nyãna bar a n sɛ̃, tɩchɛ a ta tu maa bɔfʊ ɛ, a tu a lɛ fʊ̃ʊ na bʊɔrɔ.”
Wʊ lɩɛb chen a poturbo sɛ̃ tɩ nyɛ ka a ɩ ba gur naa. Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a Simon Pita, “Simon, fʊ guro naa ɔ? A fʊ kʊ̃ lɛ tʊ̃ɔ jɛ̃ bãlãa gu ma ɛ?
Yɩ jɛ̃ gu chɛlɛ, na yɩ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka a bɛɛrkaa ta wa tʊ̃ɔ yɩ ɛ. A yɩ tɩɛr 'lɔ bʊɔrɔ naa tɩchɛ ka a yɩ ãgãma ba tʊɔr ɛ.”
Wʊ lɛ chen naa tɩ puor a Nãaŋmɩn a lɛ nɛ nɩ wʊ ju.
Wʊ lɩɛb wa nyɛ ba go ka a ɩ ba gur naa bojũu gʊ̃ɔ kpɛ ba naa. Baa bɔ̃ɔ ŋmɩnɛ ban lɛ 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu ɛ.
Wʊ lɩɛb wa a ba sɛ̃ a gbɛɛ ata sɔ̃ɔ wa sʊʊr ba, “Yɩ chɛnɛ na gã guro na yɩ pɛ̃nɛ ɔ? A sɛɛ naa! A sɔ̃ɔ ta naa. Nyɛ, ba gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nɩsaal Bie kʊ a yelbe-ɩrbɛ!
Yɩ vaa ir, ka sɩ chen a ba sɛ̃. Nyɛ, a n gagaraa na waara!”

Yesu na chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ lɛ ka Judas na ɩ a wʊ poturo pie nɩ ayi ãsʊɔ tɩ daasãa, nɩ nɩbɛ na tara sɔbɛrɛ nɩ dakʊrsɩ waara nɩ a Yesu nyɔɔfʊ jie. A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ lɛ tʊ̃ ba.
Judas dɔ̃ɔ wiil a nɩbɛ mana ɩka, “A 'lɔ ɩn na tɩ puor mʊʊr a kɔtɩr yɩ nyɔɔ a 'lɔ, na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ tara wʊ chiin.”
Ban wa ta, Judas pɔɔn chen a Yesu sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, “Wiwile!” Tɩ puor wʊ nɩ mʊʊrfʊ.
Ka a bala wʊn chiin nyɔɔ a Yesu.
Be lɛ ka a bala ãsʊɔ na ara gbʊr a Yesu vʊ̃ɔ a wʊ sʊɔ chɛn a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãa gbãgbaa toor ŋmaa.
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr ba, “A mɔ̃ nɩbier lɛ n ɩ ka yɩ waan sɔbɛrɛ, nɩ dakʊrsɩ a n nyɔɔfʊ jie ɔ?
Bɩbir jaa lɛ n ma dɔ̃ɔ be a yɩ sɛ̃, na n wile yɩ a Puorfʊ Yir pɔ, tɩ yaa nyɔɔ ma ɛ. Tɩchɛ a ɩ naa a lɛ ɩka a tu a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr.”
Be lɛ a Yesu poturbo ba jaa bar wʊ tɩ jo.
Pɔlbile kɔ̃ɔ mɩ na vaar fɔbaa tɛɛ turo nɩ a Yesu, ba nyɔɔ wʊ naa.
Ka wʊ mɩɩr a fɔbaa 'yɔ̃ɔ ba tɩ jon sal'mʊɔr.
Be lɛ ba chiin a Yesu a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãa yir, ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ ba jaa nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ 'matãan a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe, na ɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ nɩbɛrɛ, wa lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Pita mɩ turo naa a puor jaa na wʊ wa tɩ kpɛ a bɔɔrlo nãa yir bɛchaar pɔ, na wʊ 'mataa jãnɛ nɩ a bala na kara a Puorfʊ Yir uoro bũu.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ nɩbɛrɛ na chɛ bʊɔrɔ yele kɔ̃ɔ na wiil ɩka Yesu sɛɛn kũu, tɩ baa nyɛ ɛ.
Nɩyɔɔ mɩ ŋman jirsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ, tɩchɛ a ba 'yɛrbie ŋma taa poe.
Ka a bamɩne mɩ ir ŋmaa jire 'yɛr ɩka,
“A ba sɛ̃, wʊ 'yɛr naa ɩka, ‘A Puorfʊ Yir nyãna a nɩrɛ nũu na mɛ, ɩn ŋmɛr wʊ naa tɩ na n de ber ata mɛn 'lɔ na ba ɩ nɩrɛ nũu bʊ̃mɩɛraa ɛ.’ ”
Tɩchɛ a ba 'yɛr mɩ ba ɩ bʊ̃'yen ɛ.
Be lɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãa ir ara tɩ sʊʊr a Yesu, “Faa 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr sɔɔrɔ ba bɩɩ? Bo dãasɩɛsɩ lɛ anyãna ban dire dɔɔlɔ fʊ. A ɩn yelmãɛ ɔ?”
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu ɩ jaa gbul, waa 'yɛr sɔɔ wʊ ɛ. Ka a bɔɔrlo nãa lɛ sʊʊr wʊ go, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ sɩn 'Yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Bie na ɩ a Nɩ-iraa ɔ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Maa lɛ. Yɩn nyɛ naa a Nɩsaal Bie na jãnɛ a Tʊ̃ɔfʊ Sʊɔ nũsʊ̃ɔ loor. Yɩ mɩ na lɛ nyɛn wʊn waara a julõjuur pɔ.”
Ka a bɔɔrlo nãa tɔɔ a fuu chɩɛr nɩ suur, tɩ sʊʊr, “Bãa lɛ sɩn lɛ bʊɔrɔ nɩrɛ ɩka wʊ lɛ 'yɛr a wʊ 'yɛr go?
Yɩn mãɛ wõ naa a lɛ wʊn fere. Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tɩɛr?” Ka ba jaa 'yɛr ɩka wʊ sɛɛn kũu.
Be lɛ a bamɩne piel chɩrɛ nataar 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʊ, ka a bamɩne mɩ pɔɔ a wʊ nɩbie tɩ ŋme wʊ, tɩ sʊʊr wʊ, “Wiil sɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ŋme fʊ.” Ka a bala mɩ na guro a Puorfʊ Yir mɩ ŋme ŋme wʊ.
Pita jãnɛ naa a be a bɛchaar pɔ, ka a bɔɔrlo nãa gbãgbapɔɔbile ãsʊɔ wa wa.
Wʊn wa nyɛ a Pita na uoro a bũu, wʊ kaa wʊ naa lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ 'yɛr, “Fʊ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ turo a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ.”
Ka a Pita chɩɩr tɩ 'yɛr, “N ba bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ fʊn 'yɛrɛ par ɛ.” Tɩ na wʊ tɔɔ chen tɩ ara a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ.
A pɔɔbile na wa nyɛ a Pita a be, wʊ lɛ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ na ara a be, “A nyã mɩ ɩ naa a ba ãsʊɔ.”
Ka a Pita lɛ chɩɩr go. A ba kor ɛ, tɩ a bala na ara gbʊr a Pita mɩ 'yɛr, “Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, fʊ ɩ naa a ba ãsʊɔ, bojũu Galilee lɛ fʊ mɩ yi.”
Ka a Pita pɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wʊ mãɛ, tɩ pɔrɔ kʊrɔ ba 'yɛrɛ ɩka, “N ba bɔ̃ɔ a daba nyã 'yɛr yɩn 'yɛr ɛ.”

Ajienaa lɛ ka a nɔraa mɩ tɔ̃ɔ kõ a gbɛɛ ayi sʊɔ. Ka a Pita pãa tɩɛrtɔ a lɛ a Yesu na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Fʊn chɩɩr ma naa gbɛɛ ata, tɩ ka a nɔrdɔ̃ɔ kõ gbɛɛ ayi.” Pita na wa tɩɛr bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ, ka wʊ kõ yɔɔ jaa.
A wɛr na wa chaar bibio, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ ba jaa nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ nɩbɛrɛ na chɛ, lɔ̃ɔn guor taa lũ a Yesu tara wʊ chiin tɩ kʊ a nãa Pilate.
Ka a Pilate sʊʊr wʊ, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nãa ɔ?” Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Ɔ̃ɔ, a ɩn a lɛ fʊn 'yɛr.”
Ka a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Yesu yuor.
Be lɛ a Pilate sʊʊr a Yesu, “Faa 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr jaa ɛ, nyɛ lɛ ban sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ fʊ a yuor jã!”
Tɩchɛ Yesu ba haa nɛɛ ɛ, ka a 'maa a Pilate nɛɛ.
A mɩ ɩ naa a ba tʊ̃mɔ̃ lɛ ka bala wa lɔ̃ɔ taa dire a Gõl Bar Difʊ, a ba nãa ma ir nɩrɛ 'lɔ a nɩbɛ na bʊɔrɔ a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ bar.
Barabasɩ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ pʊɔ a nɩbɛ bamɩne pɔ, na dɔ̃ɔ ir jɛɛr nɩ a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na ba kʊ nɩbɛ, ka ba nyɔɔr ba pɔɔ.
Nɩyɔɔ wa naa a Pilate sɛ̃ wa sʊɔr wʊ ɩka, wʊ ɩ kʊ ba a lɛ wʊn ma ɩ.
Ka a Pilate sʊʊr ba, “Yɩ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka n ir a Juu nɩbɛ nãa kʊ yɩ bɩɩ?”
Pilate bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a nyuur ban tara nɩ a Yesu lɛ vɛ̃ ban nyɔɔ wʊ waan a wʊ sɛ̃.
Tɩchɛ ka a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ dʊ̃ a nɩbɛ toor ɩka, ba 'yɛr ɩka, wʊ yuo a Barabasɩ bar.
Ka a Pilate sʊʊr ba go, “Tɩ n ɩ ŋmɩnɛ nɩ a 'lɔ yɩn bʊɔlɔ a Juu nɩbɛ nãa?”
Ka ba tãn, “Kpa wʊ a daa ju!”
Be lɛ ka a Pilate sʊʊr ba, “Bãa wʊ ɩ? Bo tʊ̃dɛɛr lɛ wʊ tʊ̃?” Tɩchɛ ka ba tãna kpɛ̃ɔ jaa, “Kpa wʊ a daa ju!”
Pilate na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ pɛl a nɩbɛ pʊɔ jũu, wʊ yuo naa a Barabasɩ kʊ ba. Wʊ vɛ̃ naa ka ba fɔb a Yesu yɔɔ jaa, tɩ de wʊ kʊ a sojasɩ ɩka, ba tɩ kpa wʊ a daa ju, ka wʊ kpi.
Be lɛ a sojasɩ tara a Yesu kpɛ̃n a nãa yir kpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ pɔ, tɩ bʊɔl a ba taaba sojasɩ lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Ba den fuu jɩɛ nãa fuu kaar su wʊ, na ba lɛ de gʊʊr vil nãa jupil kaar su wʊ.
Tɩ pãa piel laara wʊ, “Yãan yooo, Juu nɩbɛ nãa!”
Tɩ ma de daa ŋmen wʊ a jũu tɩ chɩrɛ nataar 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʊ. Ba gbur dumo a wʊ niem puoro wʊ.
Ban wa la wʊ a nɩtɔ̃ wa baar, ba yaa naa a fuu 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ bar, tɩ de a wʊ mãɛ fuu su wʊ, na ba pãa de wʊ chiin ɩka ba tɩ kpa wʊ a daa ju.
A sɔr pɔ, ba nyɛn Simon na yi Sirenɩ tẽe pɔ, Aleksanda nɩ Worofʊs sãa lɛ. Mʊɔ pɔ lɛ wʊ yi tala, ka ba nyɔɔ wʊ fɩr ka wʊ de a Yesu daa tuo.
Ba chiin naa a Yesu tɩ tãn a be ban bʊɔlɔ a Yesu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr pɔ, Gɔlgɔta. A par lɛ ɩka, Julaa Jie.
Ka ba pãa de tãɩ kɔ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a dãa pɔ, ɩka wʊ nyũ, tɩ wʊ tɔr.
Be lɛ ba kpa wʊ a daa ju. Ba põ naa a wʊ fɔɔr na ba ŋme gbãm bɔ̃ɔ a ala ãsʊɔ jaa na na de.
Bibipɔl lɛ ba kpa wʊ.
Ba sɛb naa a yele 'lɔ jũu ban kʊn wʊ mar a daa jũu ɩka, “A JUU NƖBƐ NÃA.”
Ba mɩ kpan nãnyisɩ ayi a dabãbãnsɩ mɩ ju, ka ãsʊɔ be a Yesu nũsʊ̃ɔ loor ka a ãsʊɔ mɩ be a wʊ gʊba loor.
A bala na tala a be a wʊ kpafʊ jie tʊrɔ wʊ, vavire a ba jur 'yɛrɛ, “Wooo, a fʊ̃ʊ nyã na 'yɛr ɩka fʊn sɔ̃ɔ naa a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʊ Yir nyã bar tɩ mɛ wʊ a ber ata,
wa suu a daa ju, na fʊ faa a fʊ mãɛ!”
Lɛ nɩ wʊ ju lɛ, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe mɩ laara wʊ, na ba 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ taa, “Nyɛ, wʊ faan bamɩne, tɩ wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ a wʊ mãɛ faa ɛ!
Vɛ̃ a 'lɔ na 'yɛr ɩka, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa, na wʊ ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ nãa, suu a daa ju a sɩ kaa, tɩ na sɩ pãa sɔɔ.” A bala mɩ ban kpa gbʊr wʊ, lɛ lɛ ba mɩ tʊ wʊ.
A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa ara a gar ju sãlsɔɔ, a wɛr wʊ jaa sɔb naa wa tɩ tãn a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ balfʊ sɔ̃ɔ.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ lɛ, ka a Yesu chɩɩr bʊɔl, “Eloi, eloi, lama sabakatanɩ.” A par lɛ a Yesu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr pɔ ɩka, “N Nãaŋmɩn, n Nãaŋmɩn, bo lɛ so ka fʊ lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ ma?”
A bala na ara gbʊr a be wõ na ba 'yɛr, “Yɩ chɛlɛ! Elaija lɛ wʊ bʊɔlɔ.”
Ka a daba ãsʊɔ jo chen tɩ 'mɔɔ sapɔ 'lɔr a dãmiir amɩne pɔ, na wʊ chab daa tur a Yesu ɩka wʊ mʊʊr, tɩ na wʊ lɛ 'yɛr, “Yɩ vɛ̃ a sɩ kaara, Elaija na wa yɔɔ wʊ naa bɩɩ.”
Be lɛ a Yesu chɩɩr tɩ ŋmaa a vʊʊr.
Ka a Juu Nɩbɛ Puorfʊ Yir pɔ, ban lũ a fɔbaa var a die chɩɛr a saaju tɩ gbem a par.
A sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na ara a be a Yesu niem na wõ a wʊ chɩɩrfʊ, tɩ nyɛ a lɛ mɩ wʊn ŋmaa a vʊʊr, wʊ 'yɛr naa, “Yelmãɛ jaa, a daba nyã ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn Bie.”
A pɔbɔ bamɩne lɔ̃ɔn Mɛɛr na yi Magdala tẽe pɔ, nɩ Salome, nɩ a Mɛɛr na ɩ a Jemesɩ bile, nɩ Josesɩ ma mɩ ara na tɛɛr jaa tɩ kaar wʊ.
A Galilee pɔ, a pɔbɔ banyãna lɛ turo wʊ, na ba sʊ̃nɔ̃ wʊ. Ka a pɔbɔ bamɩne mɩ na 'matãan wʊ wa a Jerusalɛm, mɩ be be.
A daar 'lɔ ɩ naa a ba Chɔɔrfʊ Bɩbir ban na chɔɔr a ba mãɛ, bojũu a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ wa mʊr, a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir piel naa. A jãanʊɔr na wa tara
a Josefʊ na yi a Arimatɩya tẽe pɔ, na ɩ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ãsʊɔ ban 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃, tɩ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ chɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Nãalʊ̃ʊ, nyɔɔn nyãa chen a Pilate sɛ̃, tɩ sʊɔr a Yesu ãgãn ɩka wʊ ũu.
Pilate na wa wõ ɩka a Yesu kpi naa, a 'maa wʊn nɛɛ. Be lɛ wʊ bʊɔl a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ka wʊ wa, ka wʊ sʊʊr wʊ, “A Yesu kpin bɩɩ?”
Ka a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr, “Ɔ̃ɔ, wʊ kpi naa.” Ka a Pilate sɔɔ ɩka a Josefʊ wʊ tɩ yɔɔ a Yesu ãgãn.
Josefʊ dãn fɔbaa na wʊ tɩ yɔɔ a Yesu ãgãn vil wʊ chiin tɩ ũu, a yaa ban chɩ kʊsɩr pɔ. Ba bil kʊsɩr wa pɔɔ a yaa nɛɛ.
A Mɛɛr na yi a Magdala, nɩ a Mɛɛr na ɩ a Josesɩ ma, nyɛ naa a jie 'lɔ ban ũu wʊ.
A Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir na wa baar, Mɛɛr na yi a Magdala, nɩ Salome, nɩ a Mɛɛr na ɩ a Jemesɩ ma, ba dãn a kãnyũur ala ɩka ba chiin tɩ jɛ a Yesu ãgãn.
A Pɛ̃nfʊ divɩɛ bio daar, bibio mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na pur baar, ba chen naa a yaa par.
A kʊsɩr na pɔɔ a yaa nɛɛ ba gbʊr ɛ, ka ba sʊrɔ taa, “An lɛ na tɩ bil a kʊsɩr bar sɩ a yaa nɛɛ?”
Tɩchɛ ban dʊɔ kaa a ba nidaa, a kʊsɩr 'lɔ bil yi a yaa nɛɛ.
Ban tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a yaa pɔ, ba nyɛn pɔlbile na su fuu pɩla jãnɛ nɩ a nũsʊ̃ɔ loor, ka pɩla ɔɔ ba.
A pɔlbile 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka yɩ pɩla ɔɔrɔ ɛ. Yɩ bʊɔrɔ naa a Yesu 'lɔ na yi a Najaretɩ ban kpa a daa ju. Wʊ ir naa ɩ vʊr! Waa be a ka ɛ! Yɩ nyɛ a jie 'lɔ ban gaal wʊ.
Yɩ lɩɛb kul tɩ 'yɛr a wʊ poturbo nɩ a Pita ɩka, wʊ de yɩn nie chiine a Galilee, be lɛ yɩn tɩ nyɛ wʊ, nɩtãa a lɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ yɩ.”
Chĩcham kpɛ ba naa ka ba nɛɛ 'maa, ka ba jo yi a yaa par. Baa 'yɛr 'yɛr kʊ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ, bojũu dãbãɛ kpɛ ba naa.
A Pɛ̃nfʊ divɩɛ bio daar bibio, Yesu na wa ir a kũu pɔ, wʊ den nie dũu a Mɛɛr na yi a Magdala, a 'lɔ pɔ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ dii a sɩdɛbɛ ayopõi bar ka a yi.
A Mɛɛr chen tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a bala na dɔ̃ɔ be a Yesu sɛ̃, a bala a nie na sɔb ka baa kõnõ.
Ban wa wõ ka wʊ 'yɛr ɩka a Yesu ir naa kũu pɔ ɩ vʊr, ka wʊ nyɛ wʊ, baa sɔɔ de ɛ.
A anyã puor lɛ, a Yesu lɩɛb nɩyuo na wʊ dũu a ba ayi na de sɔr chiine a tẽe ãsʊɔ pɔ.
Ba lɩɛb chen a Jerusalɛm tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a ba taaba, tɩchɛ baa sɔɔ ɛ.
A ba kor ɛ, tɩ a Yesu lɛ dũu a Pie nɩ Bʊ̃'yen na 'mataa dire. Wʊ miin 'yɔ̃ɔ ba a ba ba sɔɔfʊ pɔ, nɩ a ba nyãkpãɛn jũu, bojũu baa sɔɔ de a bala na nyɛ wʊn ir a kũu pɔ 'yɛr.
Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ yɔ a wɛr wʊ jaa, na yɩ mʊɔl 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã kʊ a nɩbʊrɔ ba jaa.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔɔ de a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã, ka ba so wʊ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, wʊn nyɛn a Nãaŋmɩn faafʊ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na ba sɔɔ de a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã ɛ, a nɩnyɩnɛ na wɛ naa.
A jãnsɩ anyã na turo naa bala na sɔɔ. Ban de naa n yuor diin sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi, na ba lɛ bɔ̃ɔ 'yɛrbʊlsɩ 'yɛrfʊ.
Ban ma 'mɔɔr waba. Bala wa nyũ bon na tara lɔɔ, tɩ a kʊ̃ ɩ ba yele ɛ. Baalaa ban dɔɔl a ba nũu, wʊn sa naa.”
A Soro Yesu na wa 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ kʊ a wʊ poturbo, Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃ naa ka wʊ do a saaju tɩ jãnɛ a wʊ nũsʊ̃ɔ loor.
Be lɛ ka a poturbo yi chen tɩ mʊɔlɔ a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ jie jaa. Be lɛ ka a Soro 'mataa tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ ba, ka a wʊ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ anyã ban tʊ̃nɔ̃ wiil ɩka a wʊ 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ ɩn yelmãɛ.
Nɩtãa lɛ a nɩyɔɔ na mɔ̃ man a lɛ na ɩ a sɩ ber anyã pɔ,
a lɛ ɩn yelmãɛ, ba dɔ̃ɔ be be na ba nyɛn nɩbir a pielfʊ, na ba ɩ a 'yɛr nyã gbãgbaar.
A lɛ jũu n baraa Teofilusɩ, n mɩ mɔ̃n vɩɛr a 'yɛr tɩ tãn a pielfʊ nyɛ ka a ɩ yelmãɛ lɛ, ka n bʊɔrɔ ɩka n sɛb a lɛ na tu taa kʊ fʊ.
Ka fʊ na tʊ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a lɛ ban wiil fʊ ɩn yelmãɛ.
A Judiya Nãa Hɛrɔd sɔ̃ɔ, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrloro ãsʊɔ ben be ban bʊɔlɔ Jekariya wʊ pʊɔ naa a Abija gbul pɔ ka a wʊ pɔɔ yuor di Elijabetɩ na yi a Aaron bʊrɔ pɔ.
Ba jaa ayi yele tor Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ka ba turo a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ na 'yɛr na baa tara chɛfʊ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ baa tara bie ɛ, bojũu a Elijabetɩ abbaa ka 'lɔ naa sɩrɛ jaa nyɔ̃ɔ.
A mɩ lʊɔr wa ta a Jekariya ka wʊ̃n tʊ̃ a bɔɔr lofʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃ kʊ Nãaŋmɩn.
Gbãm lɛ ba gba ir wʊ nɩtãa lɛ a ba bɔɔrlo tʊ̃mɔ̃ na be, ka wʊn ma kpɛ a puorfʊ yir tɩ chʊm a tãɩ nyũu vɩla ala.
Ka a sɔ̃ɔ na wa ta ɩka wʊ chʊm a tãɩ nyũu vɩla anyãna, a nɩbɛ ara naa a yõo puoro.
Be lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn malaka wa dũu wʊ be a tãɩ nyũu vɩla chʊmfʊ jie a nũsʊ̃ɔ jie.
Jekariya na wa nyɛ wʊ a lɛ, pɩla ɔɔ wʊ naa ka dãbãɛ kpɛ wʊ.
Tɩchɛ ka a malaka 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Jekariya ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn wõn a fʊ sʊɔrfʊ, a fʊ pɔɔ Elijabetɩ na dɔɔn dabile ka fʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ yuor Jɔɔn.
A wʊ yele na ɩn nʊ̃ɔ kpɛ fʊ ka fʊ chɩlɛ ka nɩyɔɔ mɩ chɩlɛ a wʊ dɔɔfʊ jũu.
An ɩ wʊn ɩn kpɛ̃ɛ a Nãaŋmɩn niem, wʊ kʊ̃ nyũ dãa ban 'yɔ̃ɔ dãbɩl ɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na sɛɛ wʊn be a ma pʊɔm.
Wʊn lɩɛb naa a Isɩral nɩbɛ yɔɔ jie waan a ba Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.

Wʊn den a sɩ Soro nie nɩ a sɩɛ nɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ be a Elaija 'yɔ̃ɔ, na wʊ lɩɛb sãamɩne ka ba tara a ba bibiir tɩɛr. Ka bawõnsɩ mɩ nyɛ yɛ̃ na ba maala yeltorsɩ na wʊ vɛ̃ ka nɩbɛ mɩ chɔɔr ba mãɛ gun a sɩ Soro.”
Ka a Jekariya sʊʊr a malaka, “Ŋmɩnɛ ɩn ɩrɛ wa sɔɔ a nɩtɔ̃ fʊn 'yɛr? Maa nɩ n pɔɔ jaa kor naa.”
Ka a malaka 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Maa lɛ a Gabɩrɛl na ma ara a Nãaŋmɩn niem, 'lɔ lɛ tʊ̃ ma nɩ a 'yɛr nyã ɩka n wa 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã kʊ fʊ.
A lɛ jũu fʊn ɩn wõo fʊ kʊ̃ lɛ tʊ̃ɔ 'yɛr 'yɛr ɛ, wa tãn a bɩbir 'lɔ a anyãna na ɩ bojũu faa sɔɔ de a 'yɛr ala na wa ɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ na sɛɛ ɛ.”
A nɩbɛ bala na be a yõo chɛlɛ a Jekariya wʊ̃n kor a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir, ka chĩcham kpɛ ba.
Be lɛ ka wʊ wa yi tɩ wʊ kʊ̃ lɛ tʊ̃ɔ 'yɛr 'yɛr ɛ, ka a nɩbɛ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka wʊ nyɛn nyɛfʊ kɔ̃ɔ bojũu nuur kaalfʊ lɛ wʊ mana nɩ ba tɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɛ.
A lɛ a wʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃ bɩbie na wa baar be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir, wʊ lɩɛb kul a wʊ yir.
A anyã puor lɛ ka wʊ pɔɔ Elijabetɩ tara pʊɔ na wʊ sɔɔl ŋmɛrsɩ anũu.
Na wʊ pãa 'yɛrɛ, “Nyɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na maal ma, a wʊ maal vɩla bɩbir vɩɛ naa ka wʊ ir ma a vĩ yin a nɩbɛ niem bar.”
Elijabetɩ pʊɔ na wa ta ŋmɛrsɩ ayʊɔb, Nãaŋmɩn tʊ̃ naa a Gabɩrɛl a tẽe na be a Galilee paal pɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Najaretɩ,
be lɛ pɔɔsarbile kɔ̃ɔ be, ka daba ban bʊɔlɔ Josefʊ na ɩ a Nãa David yɔ̃ɔ ŋmaa baraa na kul ka a pɔɔbile yuor di Mɛɛr.
A malaka chen a wʊ sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, “N puorfʊ naa, fʊ ɩn nɩ'yɔ̃ɔ naa, Nãaŋmɩn ben a fʊ sɛ̃.”
Ka dãbãɛ nyɔɔ a Mɛɛr nɩ a puorfʊ nyã bʊrɔ, na wʊ sʊrɔ wʊ mãɛ a puorfʊ nyã par.
Tɩchɛ ka a malaka 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ, fʊ ɩn nɩ'yɔ̃ɔ naa Nãaŋmɩn niem.
Fʊn tara na pʊɔ dɔɔ dabile, na fʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ yuor Yesu.
Wʊn ɩn kpɛ̃ɛ, ka ba bʊɔlɔ wʊ a Nãaŋmɩn na be a Saaju Bie. A sɩ Soro Nãaŋmɩn na den a wʊ sãa David nãalʊ̃ʊ kʊ wʊ.
'Lɔ lɛ na di a Jekɔb yir nãa jaa kpo kpo, a wʊ nãa kʊ̃ wa baar ɛ.”
Ka a Mɛɛr sʊʊr a malaka, “N ba ta daba sɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ ŋmɩnɛ ɩn ɩrɛ wa dɔɔ a bie?”
Ka a malaka 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na wa kpɛ fʊ naa, ka a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ wa ger pɔɔ fʊ a bichɛchɛ 'lɔ fʊn na dɔɔ, ban bʊɔlɔ wʊ̃n Nãaŋmɩn Bie.
Nyɛ a fʊ yɛbɛ Elijabetɩ gba na ɩ a pɔɔ abbaa na wʊ nyɔ̃ɔ tɩ wʊ tara na pʊɔ na dɔɔ bie, chuur ayʊɔb nɩ nyã wʊn gal.
Yele jaa ba ɩ tuo Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ.”
Be lɛ a Mɛɛr 'yɛr, “Nyɛ, Nãaŋmɩn gbãgbaa lɛ n ɩ, a ɩ a lɛ kʊ ma fʊn 'yɛr?” Ka a malaka bar wʊ tɩ chen.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a Mɛɛr pɔɔ yi do a tɔ̃ɔ ju a Judiya tẽe pɔ.
Wʊ tɩ kpɛ naa a Jekariya yir na wʊ puor a Elijabetɩ.
Elijabetɩ na wõ a Mɛɛr puorfʊ ka a bie ɔɔ lɩɛb be a wʊ pʊɔm ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛɛ a Elijabetɩ.
Ka wʊ ŋme chɛlma 'yɛrɛ, “Nãaŋmɩn sʊ̃ʊ fʊn gar a pɔbɔ ba jaa, na wʊ mɩ sʊ̃ʊ a bie 'lɔ na be a fʊ pʊɔm.
Tɩchɛ nyɛ 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ na kaara, ka a n Soro ma wa a n sɛ̃?
Ɩ̃n wa wõ a fʊ puorfʊ a bie na gã a n pʊɔm ɔɔn lɩɛb nɩ pʊpɛl.
Pʊpɛl sʊɔ lɛ fʊ ɩ an ɩ fʊ sɔɔn de a lɛ a n Soro na tʊ̃, ka ba wa 'yɛr fʊ ɩka an ɩ naa a lɛ.”
Ka a Mɛɛr 'yɛr, “N pɛɛn Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a pʊɔ wʊ jaa.
A n sɩɛ chɩlɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a n Fafaara 'yɔ̃ɔ.
An ɩ wʊ tɩɛrtɔ a wʊ gbãgbapɔɔbile mãɛ siirfʊ. An yi dɩna chiine, a dɔɔ tu taa ba jaa na bʊɔlɔ ma naa bɔɔsʊ̃n sʊɔ.
An ɩ a Tʊ̃ɔfʊ Sʊɔ lɛ maal a lɛ kʊ ma. A wʊ yuor ɩn chɛchɛ.
A wʊ nɩbaal be naa a bala na joro wʊ dãbãɛ sɛ̃, yi a yɔn tɩ tãn a yɔn suulsɩ.
A wʊ nũu tʊ̃n tʊ̃bɛrɛ, wʊ yɛ̃yɛl naa a bala na bʊɔrɔ a yuor a ba tɩɛr pɔ bar.
Wʊ dɔɔn nãmɩne a ba nãa dakɔɔr jur bar, tɩchɛ na wʊ 'mɔɔr a bala na siir a ba mãɛ ka ba do saaju.
Wʊ kʊ naa a kɔ̃ dẽme bʊ̃sʊ̃n, tɩ dii a tara dẽme bar nũjaalsɩ.
Wʊ sʊ̃ʊn a wʊ gbãgbaa Isɩral tɩ tɩɛrtɔ ɩka wʊ kaa Abraham nɩ a wʊ yɔn nɩbaal bɩbir jaa, nɩtãa lɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ a sɩ sãamɩne.”
Mɛɛr jãnɛ na a Elijabetɩ sɛ̃ ŋmɛrsɩ ata tɩ lɩɛb kul a wʊ tẽe.
Elijabetɩ dɔɔfʊ bɩbir wa vɩɛ naa ka wʊ dɔɔ dabile.
Ka a bala na kpɩɛrɛ gbʊr a Elijabetɩ nɩ a wʊ yir dẽme na wõ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na maal vɩla kʊ wʊ ba pʊɔ mɩ pɛl naa a wʊ kaar.
A ber aniin daar ba wa naa ɩka ba wa ŋmaa a bie yʊɔr, na ba ta bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba de a sãa yuor 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ bʊɔlɔ a Jekariya.
Tɩchɛ ka a ma ba sɔɔ ɛ, tɩ 'yɛr, “A bie yuor din Jɔɔn.”
A ba 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Fʊ bal nɩrɛ jaa ba di a yuor nyã ɛ.”
Tɩ na ba pãa 'lɩɩr sʊʊr a sãa a yobuor wʊn bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a bie.
Ka wʊ man ba ɩka ba kʊ wʊ bon ka wʊ sɛb, wʊn ben wa de a bon na wʊ sɛb, “A bie yuor din Jɔɔn.” Ka nɛɛr 'maa ba jaa.
Ajienaa lɛ a Jekariya nɛɛ mɩ 'laa ka a jãlbir bal ka wʊ tʊ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ na wʊ pɛɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn.
Ka dãbãɛ kpɛ a bala jaa na gbʊr a be ka nɩbɛ 'yɛrɛ ka a yaar de a Judiya tẽn ala na be a tɔ̃n ju.
Nɩrɛ jaa na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ a ma 'maa wʊn nɛɛ ka wʊ ma sʊʊr, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a bie nyã na wa kaara?” Bojũu a Soro nũu dɔɔl naa a bie.
Jekariya na ɩ a sãa, Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛɛ wʊ naa ka wʊ 'yɛrɛ,
“Pɛɛfʊ wʊ ta a Isɩral Nãaŋmɩn, bojũu wʊ wa naa wa faa a wʊ nɩbɛ.
Wʊ kʊ sɩn gãdaa ɩka wʊ faa sɩ na yi a wʊ gbãgbaa Nãa David yir,
nɩtãa lɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ tu a wʊ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ chɛchɛ bala sɛ̃ a kõr jaa ka ba 'yɛr,
ɩka wʊ faa sɩ a sɩ dɔ̃dẽme sɛ̃, na wʊ faa sɩ a bala na laar sɩ nuur pɔ.
Wʊ maal a nɩtɔ̃ ɩka wʊ wiil nɩbaal kʊ a sɩ sãamɩne, na wʊ lɛ tɩɛr a wʊ nɛtɩr chɛchɛ 'lɔ,
a lɛ wʊn pɔ kʊ a sɩ sãakpã Abraham.
Wʊ pɔn 'yɛr ɩka, wʊn faa sɩ naa a sɩ dɔ̃dẽme nuur pɔ, ka sɩ puoro wʊ kʊ̃ lɛ joro dãbãɛ ɛ,
na sɩ ɩ chɛchɛ nɩ nɩtorsɩ a wʊ niem a ber a jaa.
A fʊ̃ʊ na ɩ a n bie ban bʊɔlɔ fʊ naa a saaju Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ, an ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ na de a sɩ Soro nie chɔɔr a wʊ sɔr,
na fʊ vɛ̃ ka wʊ nɩbɛ bɔ̃ɔ a faafʊ sɔr, na ba nyɛ yelbier vɛ̃ kʊfʊ.
Nãaŋmɩn na tara nɩ sɩ nɩbaal jũu, wʊ vɛ̃ naa ka a fafaara pur chaar 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ yi a saaju,
na wʊ chaar 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na kpɩɛrɛ a libe pɔ, tɩ be a kũu gãagiel pĩlem, na wʊ wiil a sɩ gbɛɛ ka a de nyã'maar sɔr.”
A bie nʊ̃ɔ naa ka a sɩɛ kpɛ̃ɔ be a wʊ sɛ̃. Mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ lɛ wʊ kpɩɛrɛ tɩ tãn a bɩbir 'lɔ wʊn na wiil a wʊ mãɛ kʊ a Isɩral nɩbɛ.
A ber ala pɔ, a paal Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa Agustus 'yɛr naa ɩka ba sɔr a nɩbɛ ba jaa na be a Worom paal pɔ.
A sɔrfʊ nyã lɛ ɩ a sɔrdɔ̃ɔ ban sɔr a nɩbɛ ka a Kiriniyus mɩ ɩ a Siriya nãa.
Nɩrɛ jaa kul a wʊ mãɛ tẽe ka ban tɩ sɔr wʊ.
Ala lɛ so ka a Josefʊ mɩ na yi a Najaretɩ tẽe na be a Galilee wɛr pɔ, na wʊ chen a Judiya wɛr pɔ, a Nãa David tẽe ban bʊɔlɔ a Bɛtɩlɛhɛm, bojũu a Nãa David yir lɛ wʊ yi tɩ lɛ ɩ a wʊ bal nɩrɛ.
Josefʊ tara na a Mɛɛr na tara a pʊɔ wʊn bʊɔrɔ a kulfʊ 'mataa chiin ka ban tɩ sɔr ba.
A lɛ ban be a Bɛtɩlɛhɛm ka a Mɛɛr bie dɔɔfʊ daar ta.
Ka wʊ dɔɔ a pɔɔsarbie ka wʊ ɩ dabile a wʊ vil wʊ a fɔbaa gaal a dʊ̃n mʊɔr 'wɔfʊ jie bojũu baa nyɛ jie na kpɛ a sãanba kpɛfʊ jie ɛ.
Pɛchiinbɛ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ gbʊr a tẽe na ba gãn a ba piir be a mʊ̃ɔ pɔ kaara.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn malaka yi a saaju wa a ba sɛ̃, ka Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr chaar pɔɔ ba, ka dãbãɛ kpɛ ba.
Tɩchɛ a malaka 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ, 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ lɛ n waan a yɩ sɛ̃, an ɩn chɩlfʊ kpɛ̃ɛ kʊ a nɩbɛ ba jaa.
A dɩna tãsɔɔ ba dɔɔ naa a Fafaara a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãa David tẽe pɔ. Wʊ ɩ naa a sɩ Soro nɩ a Nɩ-iraa.
Jãnɛ yɩn na de bɔ̃ɔn wʊ nɩ nyã. Yɩn nyɛ naa a bipɩla ban vil a fɔbaa gaal wʊ a dʊ̃n mʊɔr 'wɔfʊ jie.”
Ajienaa a saaju malakasɩ yɔɔ wa naa wa 'matãan a malaka 'lɔ a ba dãna a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ nɩ,
“Tɩɩr wʊ ta a Nãaŋmɩn na be a saaju, ka nyã'maar mɩ be a nɩbɛ bala na pɛlɛ a wʊ pʊɔ a wɛr pɔ.”
A malakasɩ na wa bar ba tɩ lɩɛb do a saaju, ka a pɛchiinbɛ 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ taa, “Yɩ ɩ a sɩ chen a Bɛtɩlɛhɛm tẽe pɔ, tɩ kaa a yelnyɩnɛ na ɩ ka a Nãaŋmɩn tʊ̃ 'yɛr sɩ.”
Be lɛ ba pɔɔ chen tɩ nyɛ a Mɛɛr nɩ a Josefʊ nɩ a bipɩla na gã a dʊ̃n mʊɔr 'wɔfʊ jie.
A lɛ ban wa nyɛ wʊ, ba 'yɛr naa a lɛ a malaka na 'yɛr kʊ ba a bibile yele.
A bala ba jaa na wõ a lɛ a pɛchiinbɛ na 'yɛr a bie 'yɛr kʊ ba, ka nɛɛr 'maa ba jaa.
Tɩchɛ ka a Mɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a anyãna a wʊ pʊɔm tara tɩɛrɛ.
A pɛchiinbɛ lɩɛb chen a piir jie tɩ dãna Nãaŋmɩn na ba pɛɛrɛ wʊ a ala a jaa ban wõ tɩ nyɛ a lɛ a malaka na 'yɛr kʊ ba.
A ber aniin na wa ta, ba ŋmaa wʊn a yʊɔr tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ a yuor Yesu, a yuor nyã lɛ a malaka 'yɛr kʊ a Mɛɛr tɩ ka wʊ wa tara a pʊɔ.
Mɛɛr na wa baar a padɔɔr a lɛ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ na 'yɛr, Josefʊ nɩ a Mɛɛr den a bie chiin a Jerusalɛm na tɩ kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn.
Nɩtãa lɛ a Soro na 'yɛr, “Yɩ de dabil dɔ̃ɔ jaa kʊ a Soro.”
Ba den a bɔɔrlo bomo ala a Soro na 'yɛr ɩka, “Ŋmama ayi bɩɩ papa pɔlɔ ayi tɩ pɔl a ba mãɛ.”
Daba kɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ be a Jerusalɛm ban bʊɔlɔ Simeon na wʊ ɩ nɩtor na waa baala Nãaŋmɩn ɛ. Wʊ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ chɛlɛ a Isɩral nɩbɛ faafʊ bɩbir ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ be a wʊ sɛ̃.
A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ ɩka wʊn nyɛ naa a Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ a Soro na tʊ̃ nɩ nɩbir tɩ kpi.
A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ vɛ̃n ka Simeon chen be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ, ka a ɩ a Josefʊ nɩ a Mɛɛr mɩ waan naa a ba bie Yesu a be na wa ir a nɛɛ.
Ka a Simeon de a bie 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ nũu pɔ tɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan 'yɛrɛ,
“Tʊ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʊɔ, nɩtãa lɛ fʊn tɩr a fʊ nɛɛ kʊ a maa na ɩ a fʊ gbãgbaa, fʊn tʊ̃ɔ bar ma sɔr nɩ nyã'maar.
Bojũu n nɩbir nyɛ naa a fafaara,
'lɔ fʊn chɔɔr ka nɩrɛ jaa nyɛ wʊ.
Wʊn ɩn chãa wiil a nɩbɛ bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, tɩ na wʊ ɩ tɩɩr kʊ a fʊ nɩbɛ Isɩral.”
Ka a Yesu sãa nɩ a ma nɛɛ 'maa a lɛ a Simeon na 'yɛr a wʊ yele.
Ka a Simeon pãa 'yɛr nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ ba, tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a Mɛɛr na ɩ a ma, “A bie nyãna lɛ Nãaŋmɩn kʊ a Isɩral nɩbɛ, ka ba yɔɔ na ŋme gbɛr lo tɩ ir, na wʊ ɩ jãnɛ ka ban 'yɛrɛ kpɛrɛ nɩ wʊ.
Nɩbɛ yɔɔ pʊtɩɛr na gãn chãa pɔ, ka a fʊ̃ʊ mɩ pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ fɩka sʊɔ ban chɔr fʊ.”
Pɔɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ben be ban bʊɔlɔ Ana na wʊ ɩ Fanuwɛl bie na wʊ ɩ Aserɩ bal nɩrɛ, na wʊ ɩ pɔɔ nyɔ̃ɔ. Wʊ kul sɩrɛ maal yuomo ayopõi.
Ka a sɩrɛ kpi tɩ wʊ ɩ a pɔɔkʊɔr maal yuomo lɩjaanaar nɩ anaar (84). Waa gala a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊ ma ben be na wʊ ma gal bʊ̃diir tɩ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn tãsɔɔ nɩ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ wʊ wa a ba sɛ̃ tɩ dãn Nãaŋmɩn tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr a bie 'yɛr kʊ a bala jaa na chɛlɛ a Jerusalɛm faafʊ bɩbir.
A lɛ a Josefʊ nɩ a Mɛɛr na wa ir a nɛɛ maal a lɛ a Soro na bin, ba lɩɛb kul a Najaretɩ na ɩ a ba tẽe na be a Galilee wɛr pɔ.
Be lɛ a bie tɩ nʊ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ fɔ̃ɔ na wʊ sɛɛn yɛ̃ ka a Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ be a wʊ sɛ̃.
Yuon jaa a sãa naa ma ma chen a Jerusalɛm tɩ lɔ̃ɔ na ba di a Gõl Bar Difʊ.
Yesu na wa nyɛ yuomo pie nɩ ayi ba tara wʊn don a Difʊ nyã jie nɩtãa lɛ ban ma ɩrɛ.
A Gõl Bar Difʊ ber na wa baar, ba lɩɛb kulo a ba tẽe tɩchɛ a Yesu bar a Jerusalɛm ka baa bɔ̃ɔn ɛ.
Ba tɩɛr ɩka wʊ taa pɔɔ a ba nɩbɛ kulo nɩ tɩ chen bɩbir bʊ̃'yen baa nyɛ wʊ ɛ, na ba pãa yʊɔrɔ bʊɔrɔ wʊ a ba nɩbɛ nɩ a ba nɩbɔ̃ɔnsɩ nɩ a ba barmɩne sɛ̃.
Ban ba wa nyɛ wʊ ɛ, ba lɩɛb chen a Jerusalɛm a wʊ bɔfʊ jie.
A ber ata daar lɛ a ba tɩ nyɛ wʊ a be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ, ka wʊ jãnɛ a wiwiilbe chara pɔ chɛlɛ a lɛ ban 'yɛrɛ na wʊ sʊrɔ ba sʊʊrfʊsɩ.
Nɩrɛ jaa na wõ a lɛ wʊn ire a 'yɛrsɩ par a chɔ̃ chɔ̃ nɛɛ 'maa ba naa.
A sãa nɩ a ma na wa nyɛ wʊ a ba nɛɛ mɩ 'maa ba naa ka a ma sʊʊr, “Pa n bie, bo lɛ fʊ maal sɩ a nɩtɔ̃, ka maa nɩ a fʊ sãa yɔbɔ fʊ lɛ̃ɛɛ wa faa?”
Ka Yesu sʊʊr a ma, “Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ yʊɔrɔ bʊɔrɔ ma? Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka ɩn be naa a n Sãa yir ɛ?”
Tɩchɛ baa bɔ̃ɔ a anyãna wʊn 'yɛr kʊ ba par ɛ.
A wʊ ir pɔɔ ba, a ba pãa kul a Najaretɩ a wʊ tɩ wõnõ a ba toor, tɩchɛ ka a ma 'yɔ̃ɔ a 'yɛr anyãna a jaa a wʊ pʊɔm.
Ka a Yesu nʊ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ yɛ̃ nɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ ka wʊ yele nʊ̃mɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ nɩ a nɩbɛ sɛ̃.

Yuon pie nɩ anũu lɛ a Tiberiyus Siisa di a nãkpɛ̃ɛ ka a Pontius Pilate mɩ ɩ a Judiya paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ka a Hɛrɔd mɩ di a Galilee nãa ka a wʊ yɛbɛ Filip mɩ ɩ a Ituriya nɩ a Tɩrakonɩtɩs nãa. Ka a Lisaniyasɩ mɩ di a Abilenɩ nãa.
Anasɩ nɩ Kayafasɩ bala lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ. Ka a Nãaŋmɩn de a wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a Jekariya bidaba Jɔɔn be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ.
Wʊ yɔn a tẽn ala a jaa na jilʊ̃ a Jordan man na wʊ 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ a nɩbɛ, “Yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr na yɩ so a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, ka Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃ a yɩ yeldɛbɛ kʊ yɩ.”
Nɩtãa lɛ a Isaiya na sɛb a wʊ gãn pɔ, “Nɩrɛ 'yɛrɛ naa be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ, ‘Yɩ chɔɔr a sɩ Soro sɔr, na yɩ maal a wʊ sɔr ka wʊ tor.
Na yɩ 'mʊr a kʊlsɩ, na yɩ ŋmɛr a tɔ̃n nɩ a gbẽgbẽnsɩ ka a jãtaa. Yɩ maal a sɔgɔ̃rsɩ a jaa ka a tor, na yɩ maal a sɔr nyara nyara ka wʊ sal.
Nɩsaal bʊrɔ ba jaa na nyɛn Nãaŋmɩn faafʊ.’ ”
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na waara a Jɔɔn sɛ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ sofʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Yɩn waa bibiir, an lɛ 'yɛr kʊ yɩ ɩka yɩ jo yi a Nãaŋmɩn suur na waara a yɩ sɛ̃?
Yɩ vɛ̃ ka yɩ befʊ wiil ɩka yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr. Yɩ ta chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ a yɩ mãɛ ɩka, Abraham lɛ ɩ a sɩ sãa, n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na tʊ̃ɔn maal a kusɩbɛ anyãna a ba lɩɛb ɩ a Abraham bibiir.
A 'lar dɔɔl a tɩɛ nyɩbɛ ju, tɩɛ jaa ba wa wɔ̃nɔ̃ wɔ̃ sʊ̃n ɛ, ban ŋmaa wʊn lɔb 'yɔ̃ɔ bũu pɔ.”
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala sʊʊr wʊ, “Ŋmɩnɛ sɩn pãa ɩ?”
Ka Jɔɔn 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa na tara fuusɩ ayi, wʊ ir ãsʊɔ kʊ a wʊ tɔ sʊɔ na ba tara ɛ, nyã mɩ na tara bʊ̃diir wʊ ɩ a lɛ.”
Lõpodierbe mɩ wan a Jɔɔn sɛ̃ ɩka wʊ so ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, na ba mɩ sʊʊr wʊ, “Wiwile sɩ mɩ ɩ ŋmɩnɛ?”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ ta ma de dɔɔl a lɛ ban ɩka yɩ de ɛ.”
Sojasɩ bamɩne mɩ wan wa sʊʊr wʊ, “Sɩn mɩ, sɩ ɩ ŋmɩnɛ?” Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ ta fɩr nɩrɛ de libir ɛ, yɩ ta mɩ ŋmaa jir kara dɔɔl nɩrɛ ɛ, na yɩ vɛ̃ ka a yɩ sãyar sɛɛn yɩ.”
Ka a nɩbɛ mɩ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ toor chɛlɛ, pãa tɩɛrɛ ɩka a Jɔɔn lɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.
A Jɔɔn 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Maa 'lɔ kʊ̃ɔ lɛ n suoro yɩ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ na gar ma na wa naa, a wʊ nafɔɔr mibe gba, n ba sɛɛ ɩka n for ɛ. 'Lɔ lɛ na de Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nɩ bũu son yɩ.
A ŋmayɩɛl naa ben a wʊ nũu pɔ, a wʊ na yɩɛl a mʊ̃ɩ a vafʊ jie na wʊ kpaar a bie 'yɔ̃ɔ a boor pɔ tɩ chʊm a sɔ̃sɔɔr nɩ bũu 'lɔ na ba tara kpĩinfʊ bar.”
Jɔɔn kpãa ban nɩ yelyɔɔ na wʊ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊ ba.
Tɩchɛ a nãa Hɛrɔd na de a wʊ yɛbɛ pɔɔ Hɛrɔdiyas kul, Jɔɔn 'yɛr wʊ naa ɩka a ba tara sɔr ka wʊ kul wʊ ɛ, tɩ 'yɛr wʊ a dɛbɛ amɩne wʊn ɩ.
Hɛrɔd lɛ maal dɛɛr wʊn vɛ̃ ka ba nyɔɔ Jɔɔn tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ.
Ban ba nyɔɔ a Jɔɔn pɔɔ sɛrɛ ɛ, wʊ so naa a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ na wʊ mɩ so a Yesu a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ. Ka a Yesu sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka a saaju yuo.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ de papa ãgãn suu wa 'mar a Yesu ju, tɩ a kɔkɔr yi be a saaju 'yɛr, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a n Bidanʊ̃naa ka fʊ yele pɛl a n pʊɔ.”
Yesu nyɛn yuon lɩjɛr nɩ pie tɩ piel a wʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃, ka nɩbɛ tɩɛr ɩka wʊ ɩ naa a Josefʊ bidaba, na ɩ a Heli bidaba,
Matatɩ bidaba, Levi bidaba, Melki bidaba, Janai bidaba, Josefʊ bidaba,
Matatiyasɩ bidaba, Amosɩ bidaba, Nahum bidaba, Esili bidaba, Nagai bidaba,
Maat bidaba, Matatiyasɩ bidaba, Semeyin bidaba, Josekɩ bidaba, Joda bidaba,
Joanan bidaba, Aresa bidaba, Jerubabel bidaba, Sealtɩɛl bidaba, Neri bidaba,
Melki bidaba, Adi bidaba, Kosam bidaba, Elmadam bidaba, Erɩ bidaba,
Josua bidaba, Eliyeja bidaba, Jorim bidaba, Matatɩ bidaba, Levi bidaba,
Simeon bidaba, Juda bidaba, Josefʊ bidaba, Jonam bidaba, Eliyakim bidaba,
Melea bidaba, Mena bidaba, Matata bidaba, Natan bidaba, David bidaba,
Jesɩ bidaba, Obed bidaba, Boajɩ bidaba, Salmon bidaba, Nason bidaba,
Aminadab bidaba, Aram bidaba, Hejoron bidaba, Perejɩ bidaba, Juda bidaba,
Jekɔb bidaba, Isaakɩ bidaba, Abraham bidaba, Tera bidaba, Nahor bidaba,
Serugu bidaba, Wɛru bidaba, Peleg bidaba, Eber bidaba, Sela bidaba,
Kainan bidaba, Afakadɩ bidaba, Sem bidaba, Nowa bidaba, Lamekɩ bidaba,
Metusela bidaba, Enok bidaba, Jared bidaba, Mahalaleel bidaba, Kenan bidaba,
Enosɩ bidaba, Setɩ bidaba, Adama bidaba, Nãaŋmɩn bidaba.
Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛɛn a Yesu na wʊ lɩɛb wʊ yin a Jordan man jie kpɛ̃n wʊ a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ.
Be lɛ a tɩɩ bɛɛr wʊ kaa ber lɩjaayi, waa di bon jaa a ber anyãna pɔ ɛ, ka a kɔ̃ kpɛ wʊ.
A tɩɩ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ala ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie, 'yɛr kʊ a kʊsɩbɛ anyãna, ka a lɩɛb bʊ̃diir.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ ɩka, a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, “Bʊ̃diir tɛɛ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ kʊ nɩrɛ nyɛvʊr ɛ.”
A tɩɩ lɛ tara wʊn don tɔ̃ɔ ju tɩ wiil wʊ a nãa di jiir a jaa na be ka a wɛr pɔ
tɩ 'yɛr, “Ɩn kʊ fʊ naa anyãna a jaa fɔ̃ɔ nɩ a ba nãyele, maa lɛ ba de a ba fɔ̃ɔ kʊ, ka n mɩ na de kʊ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa ɩn bʊɔrɔ.
Ala ɩ, fʊ gbur dumo puor ma fʊ̃ʊ lɛ so.”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr wʊ, “A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka fʊ puor, na fʊ tʊ̃nɔ̃ kʊrɔ a 'lɔ tɛɛ.”
A tɩɩ lɛ tara wʊn chiin a Jerusalɛm ka wʊ tɩ do a puorfʊ yir jie 'lɔ na do na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “Ala ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie ɔɔ lo a tẽe,
bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, ‘Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ naa ka a wʊ malakasɩ wa gu fʊ taa lɛɛ,
na ba nyɔɔ fʊ nɩ a ba nuur ka a fʊ gbɛr kʊ̃ ŋme kʊsɩr ɛ.’ ”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a tɩɩ, a mɩ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, “Ta bɛɛr a fʊ Nãaŋmɩn kaa ɛ.”
A tɩɩ na wa baar a bɛɛr kaa anyãna wʊ bar wʊn tɩ chen, tɩ lɛ guro nɩ sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ wʊn lɛ wa nyɛ jie.
Yesu lɩɛb kul a Galilee nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kpɛ̃ɔ ka a wʊ yele yaar a wɛr 'lɔ wʊ jaa.
Wʊ tɩ wile naa a nɩbɛ a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir ka a nɩrɛ jaa pɛɛrɛ wʊ.
Yesu lɩɛb chen a Najaretɩ be wʊn nʊ̃ɔ, a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar wʊ tɩ kpɛ̃n a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir an ɩ lɛ lɛ wʊ ma ɩrɛ na wʊ ir ara na wʊn kar gãn.
Ka ba de Isaiya gãn kʊ wʊ, ka wʊ nyɔɔ 'yɩɛr a jie 'lɔ ban sɛb,
“Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ be naa a n 'yɔ̃ɔ, bojũu wʊ ir ma naa ɩka n tɩ 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ kʊ a nɔ̃n dẽme, naa mɩ tɩ 'yɛr kʊ gbãgbaar ka ban so ba mãɛ, naa 'yɛr kʊ jɔ̃n ka ba yuo, naa 'yɛr faa a bala ban gere,
naa 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn maal vɩla yuon kʊ ba.”
Be lɛ wʊ pilʊ̃ a gãn de kʊ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ tɩ jãnɛ, ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa na be a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir kpa a nɩbie 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ.
Ka wʊ piel 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ ba, “Dɩna a lɛ yɩn wõ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, a ɩ naa a lɛ.”
Ba jaa 'yɛrɛ naa a wʊ sʊ̃ 'yɛr ka ba nɛɛr 'maa a 'yɛr vɩɛlsɩ na yire a wʊ nɛɛ pɔ ka ba sʊrɔ taa, “A ba ɩ a Josefʊ bidaba lɛ a nyã ɛ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, yɩn sʊʊr ma naa nɩ a sʊkpa nyã, ‘Tɩtɩlɛ, tɩɩl a fʊ mãɛ, maal a ala fʊn maal a Kapenahum ka a fʊ tẽe.’ ”
A wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, ba maa de Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ a wʊ mãɛ tẽe pɔ ɛ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka pɔɔkɔyɔɔ ben a Isɩral nɩbɛ wɛr pɔ a Elaija sɔ̃ɔ, a war bũu 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ ŋmaa a yuom ata nɩ ŋmɛrsɩ ayʊɔb a wɛr wʊ jaa.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn ba tʊ̃ a Elaija a pɔɔkɔɛ ba nyã ãsʊɔ jaa sɛ̃ ɛ, tɩ tʊ̃ wʊ a pɔɔkʊɔr na be a Jarefat na be a Sidon wɛr pɔ.
A Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Elisa sɔ̃ɔ, kɔ̃kɔ̃n mɩ ben a Isɩral nɩbɛ wɛr pɔ tɩ ãsʊɔ jaa ba sa ɛ, ka Naaman na yi a Siriya wɛr pɔ ba lɛ ɛ.”
A nɩyɔɔ bala na be a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir 'lɔ pɔ, ka suur kpɛ ba jaa.
Ba ir da wʊ yin a tẽe pɔ don a tɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ju a ba tẽe na mɛ bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba daa wʊ lɔb a tɔ̃ɔ koro pɔ.
Tɩchɛ ka wʊ fʊɔl yi a nɩyɔɔ bala sãlsɔɔ a lɛ na wʊ chen.
Be lɛ wʊ suu chen a Kapenahum na be a Galilee wɛr pɔ, ka a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar ka wʊ piel wile a nɩbɛ.
Ka a wʊ wiilfʊ 'maa ba nɛɛ bojũu a wʊ 'yɛr tara na kpɛ̃ɔ.
Daba mɩ ben a be a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir na tara a dɛɛr sʊɔ, ka a sɩdɛɛr be a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ, a wʊ ŋme chɛlma sʊʊr,
“Ai, a fʊ̃ʊ Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ, bo fʊ bʊɔrɔ ka a sɩ sɛ̃? Fʊ wa naa ɩka fʊ wa sɔ̃ɔ sɩ bar bɩɩ? N bɔ̃ɔ naa a nɩnyɩnɛ fʊn ɩ, fʊ ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nɩchɛchɛ 'lɔ.”
Ka Yesu tãn wʊ, “Pɔɔ a nɛɛ tɩ wa yi a daba 'yɔ̃ɔ.” A sɩdɛɛr daan a daba lɔb a nɩbɛ niem tɩ na wʊ yi a daba 'yɔ̃ɔ tɩ waa 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ baal ɛ.
Ka a nɛɛr 'maa a nɩbɛ ka ba sʊrɔ taa, “Wiilbuor mɩ nɩ nyã? Wʊ den kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ tʊ̃ɔfʊ 'yɛr kʊ a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi.”
Ka a wʊ yele yaar de a tẽn ala na jilʊ̃ a be.
Yesu yi naa a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir na wʊ chen a Simon yir. Ka ãgãn tɔ a Simon dãɛ ma ka ba sʊɔr a Yesu ɩka wʊ sʊ̃ʊ wʊ.
Ka wʊ guun ger a pɔɔ na wʊ tãn a ãgãn tʊl ka wʊ bar a pɔɔ, ka wʊ sa na wʊ ir maal bʊ̃diir kʊ ba.
A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa mʊrɔ nɩbɛ waan naa ba baalsɩ a Yesu sɛ̃, ka wʊ dɔɔl ba a wʊ nũu na wʊ sãa baal jaa bʊrɔ ban waan.
Sɩdɛbɛ yin a nɩyɔɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ tãna 'yɛrɛ, “Fʊ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn Bie.” Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu tãn ba ka ba ta 'yɛrɛ ɛ, an ɩ ba bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.
A wɛr na wa chaar Yesu yin tɩ jãnɛ a jie ãsʊɔ wʊ yõ, ka a nɩbɛ yɔbɔ wʊ tɩ nyɛ a jie wʊn be ba lɛ bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ bar ba tɩ chen ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A sɛɛ naa ɩka n 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr kʊ a tẽn anyã mɩ bojũu a lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tʊ̃ ma.”
Tɩ na wʊ chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr be a a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ yie a Juu nɩbɛ tẽe pɔ.
Bɩbir ãsʊɔ Yesu be naa a Genesaretɩ man nɛɛ, ka nɩyɔɔ ara jilʊ̃ wʊ chɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr.
Wʊ nyɛn gborsɩ ayi a gogoro nɛɛ a jãnyɔɔrbɔ na bar tɩ suu pɛɛrɛ a ba lɔyaarsɩ.
Ka wʊ kpɛ a gboro ãsʊɔ pɔ na ɩ Simon bon tɩ sʊɔr wʊ ɩka wʊ daa wʊ ka wʊ jãan a gogoro bãlãa. Wʊ pãa jãnɛ naa a gboro pɔ tɩ wile a nɩbɛ.
Wʊn wa baar a 'yɛr ka wʊ 'yɛr a Simon, “Daa a gboro chiin a kɔ̃die pɔ na fʊ tɩ lɔb a fʊ lɔyaar.”
Ka a Simon 'yɛr, “Kpãkpãana, tãsɔɔ jaa lɛ sɩ lɔb lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ saa nyɔɔ bon ɛ, tɩchɛ fʊn 'yɛr go, ɩn lɔbaa.”
Ban wa lɔb, ba nyɔɔr jãyɔɔ ka a lɔyaarsɩ ɩrɛ na chɩɛr.
Ka ba 'lɩɩr a ba taaba na be a gboro ãsʊɔ pɔ, ka ba wa sʊ̃ʊ ba. Ba wa naa ka a gborsɩ a jaa ayi wa sɛɛ ka ba ɩrɛ na mʊr.
Simon Pita na wa nyɛ a lɛ, wʊ lon kpa a Yesu niem tɩ 'yɛr, “N Soro sɛr chen tɩ bar ma yelbe-ɩrɛ lɛ n ɩ.”
A jãyɔɔ anyã ban nyɔɔr jũu, 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ taaba nɛɛr 'maa naa.
Lɛ lɛ a Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn na ɩ a Jebedee bibiir na ɩ a Simon taaba. Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a Simon, “Ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ, an yi dɩna chiine fʊn nyɔɔrɔ na nɩbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.”
Be lɛ ba tɔɔ a gborsɩ waan a gogoro nɛɛ wa bar bomo a jaa tɩ turo a Yesu.
Yesu na wa be a tẽe ãsʊɔ pɔ, daba kɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ baal na de a ãgãn wʊ jaa nyɛn a Yesu na wʊ lo kpa tẽe a Yesu niem tɩ sʊɔr wʊ, “N Soro, fʊ̃ʊ sɔɔ, sãa ma.”
Ka Yesu tur a wʊ nũu sɩɩr a daba tɩ 'yɛr, “N sɔɔ naa sa.” Ajienaa ka a kɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ baal bar wʊ.
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Taa 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ nɩrɛ ɛ, tɩ chen tɩ wiil a fʊ mãɛ kʊ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrloro na fʊ ir a nɛɛ 'lɔ a Mosesɩ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ka a di dãasɩɛ ɩka fʊ ɩn nɩsʊ̃.”
Tɩchɛ ka a wʊ yele chɛnɛ ŋme yaar a jie wʊ jaa ka a nɩyɔɔ wa chɛlɛ a wʊ 'yɛr ka wʊ sãa a ba baalsɩ.
Tɩchɛ wʊ ma chɛnɛ na tɔɔ wʊ mãɛ yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ tɩ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn.
Bɩbir ãsʊɔ Yesu na wile ka a ɩ a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe na yi a Galilee tẽbil a jaa nɩ a Judiya ka bamɩne yi a Jerusalɛm mɩ ben be jãnɛ. Ka a Soro kʊ a Yesu kpɛ̃ɔ ɩka wʊ sãan baalsɩ.
Dɔɔr bamɩne tuon nɩrɛ nɩ sɔ̃ɔ a nuur nɩ a gbɛɛ na kpi waan bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba kpɛ̃n wʊ tɩ gaal a Yesu niem.
Ban ba wa nyɛrɛ sɔr a nɩyɔɔ jũu, ba don naa gar ju tɩ yuo bɔɔ tur bar ka wʊ suun a sɔ̃ɔ a nɩbɛ sãlsɔɔ tɩ gã a Yesu niem.
Yesu na nyɛ a lɛ ban sɔɔ de, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a baalaa, “N baraa, a fʊ yeldɛbɛ vɛ̃n bar.”
Ka a nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne pãa jɛ̃ tɩɛrɛ, “An lɛ a nyã na jãnɛ fere sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn yuor a nɩtɔ̃? An lɛ na tʊ̃ɔ nɩrɛ yelbier vɛ̃ bar ka Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ?”
Yesu bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ban tɩɛrɛ ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Bo lɛ yɩ tɩɛrɛ a anyã a lɛ a yɩ pʊɔm?
'Yɛr buor lɛ ɩ kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃? N 'yɛr ɩka a wʊ yeldɛbɛ vɛ̃n bar bɩɩ n 'yɛr ɩka wʊ ir chiine?
Tɩchɛ nɩtɔ̃ lɛ yɩn bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a maa Nɩsaal Bie tara na kpɛ̃ɔ a wɛr pɔ na vɛ̃ yeldɛbɛ bar.” Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a dagbɛrɛ, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ nɩ ir 'mɔɔ a fʊ sɔ̃ɔ kulo nɩ.”
Ajienaa ka wʊ vaa ir ara a ba niem, 'mɔɔ a wʊ bʊ̃gãnaa pɛɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn kulo nɩ.
Ka nɩrɛ jaa nɛɛ 'maa ka ba dãna Nãaŋmɩn. Ka dãbãɛ kpɛ ba ka ba 'yɛrɛ, “Sɩ nyɛn yelkal bala dɩna.”
A anyã puor Yesu yin tɩ nyɛ lõpodiere ban bʊɔlɔ Levi na jãnɛ diere wʊ lõposɩ, ka wʊ bʊɔl wʊ, “Ir turo ma.”
Ka a Levi vaa ir bar bomo a jaa tɩ turo wʊ.
Levi maal bʊ̃diir kʊ a Yesu a be a wʊ yir na wʊ bʊɔl a taaba lõpodierbe nɩ nɩyɔɔ ka ba wa 'mataa dire.
Tɩchɛ a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe hũhũnõ nɩ a yele nyã sʊrɔ a Yesu poturbo, “Bo lɛ so ka yɩ 'mataa dire nɩ a lõpodierbe nɩ a tʊ̃dɛbɛ tʊ̃nbɔ?”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A ba ɩ nɩrɛ na kpɛ̃mɛ lɛ chiine tɩtɩlɛ jie ɛ, tɩchɛ baalaa lɛ ma chen.
N ba wa ɩka n wa bʊɔl a nɩtorsɩ ɛ, n wa naa ɩka n wa bʊɔl a tʊ̃dɛbɛ tʊ̃nbɔ ka ba wa lɩɛb tɩɛr.”
Ka ba lɛ sʊʊr a Yesu, “Ŋmɩnɛ a ɩ ka Jɔɔn poturbo nɩ a Faraseemɩne poturbo ma jɛ̃n kɔ̃ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn, tɩchɛ ka a fʊ̃ʊ poturbo ma tɔ̃ɔ kpal a dib nɩ a nyũfʊ a lɛ a tɔ̃tɔ̃?”
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr ba, “Fʊn tʊ̃ɔ maal a bala ban bʊɔl a pɔɔ paalaa jie ka ba jɛ̃n kɔ̃ a pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ na chɛnɛ be a ba sɛ̃ ɔ?
Tɩchɛ bɩbir kɔ̃ɔ na wa vɩɛ naa ka a pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ yi a ba sɛ̃, a ber ala pɔ 'lɔ ban jɛ̃n nɩ kɔ̃.”
Sʊkpa nyã lɛ wʊ lɔb kʊ ba, “Nɩrɛ maa ŋmaa fɔpaalaa sɛ choo fɔkoraa pɔ ɛ, 'lɔ be ɩ a lɛ a fɔpaalaa na chɩɛraa a fɔkoraa, bʊ̃paalaa nɩ bʊ̃koraa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ 'mataa ɛ.
Nɩrɛ maa 'yɔ̃ɔ dãbãɩn a dãa wɔkoraa pɔ ɛ, 'lɔ be ɩ a lɛ a dãbãɩn na pur naa a wʊɔ ka a dãa kpaar ka a wʊɔ mɩ sɔ̃ɔ.
Ba ma den dãbãɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ a dãa wɔpaalaa pɔ.
Nɩrɛ wa nyũ a dãgaa wʊ maa lɛ bʊɔrɔ a dãbãɩn ɛ, wʊ ma 'yɛr ɩka a dãgaa ɩn gar a dãbãɩn.”
A Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir ãsʊɔ daar, Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo kpɛ̃n tala a puo sãlsɔɔ, ka a wʊ poturbo piel fɔrɔ a bʊ̃bie na ba ŋmɩɛnɛ nɩ a nuur ɔɔrɔ.
Ka a Farasee bamɩne sʊʊr ba, “Bo lɛ yɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ na ba tara sɔr a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar ɛ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yaa kar a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ nyɛ a lɛ a David na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ nɩ a wʊ nɩbɛ a kɔ̃ na kpɛ ba ɛ?
Wʊ kpɛ̃n a Nãaŋmɩn yir tɩ de a paanʊ̃ɔ ala ban bin kʊ Nãaŋmɩn na wʊ 'wɔb an ba tara sɔr ɛ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔrlorbo tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ. Tɩ de amɩne mɩ kʊ a wʊ nɩbɛ.”
Ka a Yesu pãa 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Maa Nɩsaal Bie lɛ ɩ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Soro.”
A Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar ãsʊɔ, wʊ ben a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir na wʊ wile, ka a daba ãsʊɔ be be a nũsʊ̃ɔ na kpi.
A Faraseemɩne nɩ a nɛɛ wiwiilbe bʊɔrɔ sɔr na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu, lɛ lɛ ba tɔɔ gbʊr kaara wʊ ɩka ba kaa ala ɩ wʊn sãan a baal a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir ɔ.
Tɩchɛ Yesu bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ban tɩɛrɛ na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a daba 'lɔ nũu na kpi, “Ir ara ka nɩrɛ jaa nyɛ fʊ.” Ka a daba ir ara.
Ka a Yesu pãa 'yɛr kʊ ba, “N sʊʊr yɩ kaa, bo lɛ sɛɛ ɩka a maal a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar, fʊ maal vɩla bɩɩ fʊ maal dɛɛr? Fʊ kʊ nɩrɛ bɩɩ fʊ faa nɩrɛ, bɩɩ fʊ sɔ̃ɔ bar?”
Wʊ kãan ba jaa gʊɔr tɩ 'yɛr a daba, “Tur a fʊ nũu.” A wʊ tur ka a nũu wʊ jaa sa.
Tɩchɛ ka a suur kpɛ ba ka ba guoro taa a lɛ ban na ɩ a Yesu.
A ber ala ãsʊɔ pɔ, Yesu don a tɔ̃ɔ ju Nãaŋmɩn sʊɔrfʊ jie, wʊ sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn a tãsɔɔ 'lɔ wʊ jaa.
A wɛr na wa chaar a bibio, wʊ bʊɔl naa a poturbo ka ba wa a wʊ sɛ̃, ka wʊ ir a ba pɔ pie nɩ ayi bʊɔlɔ ba nɩtʊ̃nsɩ.
A bala wʊn ir lɛ, Simon wʊn lɛ kʊ yopaalaa Pita, nɩ a wʊ yɛbɛ Andiru, Jemesɩ, Jɔɔn, Filip, Batolomi,
Matiu, Tomasɩ, Jemesɩ na ɩ Alfayasɩ bidaba, Simon na mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a wʊ wɛr yele,
Jemesɩ bidaba Judas, nɩ a Judas Isɩkariyot 'lɔ lɛ wa ɩ a gagaraa.
Yesu tara ban suun ka ba tɩ ara a jie 'lɔ na jãtaa, kaa poturbo yɔɔ be be, ka a nɩyɔɔ mɩ yi Judiya, Jerusalɛm, ka bamɩne mɩ yi a Tire tẽe nɩ a Sidon tẽe na be a man koor.
Ba wa naa ɩka ba wa chɛl a wʊ 'yɛr tɩ wʊ sãa a ba baalsɩ. Wʊ sãan a bala ba jaa na tara a sɩdɛbɛ.
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa bʊɔrɔ a Yesu sɩɩrfʊ bojũu kpɛ̃ɔ yire naa a wʊ pɔ sãana a ba jaa baalsɩ.
Yesu kaara naa a wʊ poturbo tɩ 'yɛr, “Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ a yɩn banyãna na ɩ a nɔ̃n dẽme. Yɩn lɛ so a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ.
Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ a yɩn a kɔ̃ na kpɛ pʊ̃pãanyã yɩn lɛ na wa tɩɩ. Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ a yɩn na kõnõ a pʊ̃pãanyã, yɩn wa laara naa.
Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ yɩ a nɩbɛ na wa 'laar yɩ, na ba oo yɩ bar, tɩ tʊrɔ yɩ na ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a yɩ yuor fɩka bʊ̃dɛɛr a maa Nɩsaal Bie jũu.
A bɩbir nyã wa vɩɛ yɩ chɩlɛ nɩ pʊpɛl, bojũu a yɩ sãyar waa naa na be a saaju. Lɛ lɛ a ba sãakpãmɩne dɔ̃ɔ maal a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ.
Nɛbier pɔɔn a yɩn na ɩ a tara dẽme, yɩn 'lɔ nyɛn a yɩ 'maalfʊ.
Nɛbier kpɛ̃n a yɩn na tɩɩ a pʊ̃pãanyã kɔ̃ na kpɛ yɩ naa. Nɛbier kpɛ̃n a yɩn na laara a pʊ̃pãanyã, yɩn lɛ nɩbaal na wa kpɛ a yɩ kõnõ.
Nɛbier kpɛ̃n a yɩn nɩbɛ jaa na bʊɔlɔ yɩ yo sʊ̃, lɛ lɛ a ba sãakpãmɩne mɩ dɔ̃ɔ bʊɔlɔ a jir 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ a yosʊ̃n.
“Tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ a yɩn na chɛlɛ a n 'yɛr, yɩ nʊ̃ a yɩ dɔ̃dɔ̃mɔ̃sɩ na yɩ maal vɩla kʊ a bala na 'laar yɩ.
Yɩ 'yɛr nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ, na yɩ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʊrɔ a bala na gere yɩ.
Nɩrɛ wa 'ma fʊ tʊkpal pɔ, lɛ lɩɛb a bʊ̃'yen ka wʊ lɛ 'ma, nɩrɛ wa de a fʊ fuu kpɛ̃ɛ ta mɔ̃ɔ wʊ a fuu bile ɛ.
Nɩrɛ jaa wa sʊɔr fʊ bon de kʊ wʊ, nɩrɛ wa de a fʊ bon taa lɛ wa sʊrɔ wʊ go ɛ.
A lɛ yɩn bʊɔrɔ ɩka a nɩbɛ ba maal kʊ yɩ, yɩ mɩ maal a lɛ kʊ ba.
“Ala ɩ yɩ nʊ̃ naa a bala na nʊ̃ yɩ, yobuor lɛ yɩ nyɛ? A yelbetʊ̃nbɔ gba mɩ nʊ̃n a bala na nʊ̃ ba.
Ala ɩ yɩ maala na vɩla kʊrɔ a bala na maal yɩ a vɩla, yobuor lɛ yɩn nyɛ? A yelbetʊ̃nbɔ gba mɩ ɩrɛ naa a lɛ.
Ka ala ɩ fʊ pɛ̃ɛn a bala fʊn tɩɛr ɩka ban wa yab fʊ naa, yobuor lɛ yɩn wa nyɛ? A yelbetʊ̃nbɔ ma pɛ̃ɛn a ba taaba tɩɛrɛ ɩka ban wa yab a jaa.

Tɩchɛ yɩ nʊ̃ a yɩ dɔ̃dɔ̃mɔ̃sɩ na yɩ maal vɩla kʊ ba, yɩ pɛ̃ɛ ba na yɩ taa chɛlɛ ɩka ba lɛ wa yab yɩ ɛ. Ala lɛ a yɩ sãyar na waa, ka yɩ na ɩ a saaju Nãaŋmɩn bibiir, bojũu 'lɔ lɛ maala vɩla kʊrɔ a nɩhayasɩ nɩ putudẽme.
Yɩ ɩ nɩbibaal dẽme nɩtãa lɛ a yɩ Sãa na ɩ a nɩbibaal sʊɔ.
“Yɩ ta tɔɔr nɩrɛ 'yɛr ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn mɩ wa tɔɔr a yɩ 'yɛr ɛ. Yɩ ta 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ 'yɛr ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn mɩ ta 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ 'yɛr ɛ. Yɩ vɛ̃ kʊ nɩrɛ ka Nãaŋmɩn mɩ vɛ̃ kʊ yɩ.
Yɩ de tɩr, Nãaŋmɩn mɩn kʊ yɩ naa, man vɩla tɩ dib 'yɔ̃ɔ tɩ yɛ yɛɛ ka a yaara, an kpaar dɔɔl a yɩ gbɛɛ ju. A bon 'lɔ yɩn man tɩr, 'lɔ mɩ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na man kʊ yɩ.”
Sʊkpa nyã lɛ a Yesu lɛ lɔb kʊ ba, “Jɔ̃ɔ na tʊ̃ɔn jɔ̃ɔ tɔɔ? Ba jaa ayi kʊ̃ lo bɔɔ pɔ ɛ?
Nɩrɛ na jãna wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ gar a wʊ wiwile ɛ, tɩ 'lɔ wa jãn baar wʊn tʊ̃ɔ kaara a wʊ wiwile kaar.
“Ŋmɩnɛ a fʊ kaara a dabile na be a fʊ yɛbɛ nɩbir pɔ, tɩ ba chɛlɛ a dakpɛ̃ɛ na be a fʊ̃ʊ nɩbir pɔ ɛ?

Bɩɩ Ŋmɩnɛ a ɩ ka fʊ 'yɛr kʊ a fʊ yɛbɛ, n yɛbɛ vɛ̃ ka n ir a a dabile bar a fʊ nɩbir pɔ, tɩ ba ire a dakpɛ̃ɛ na be a fʊ̃ʊ nɩbir pɔ ɛ? Fʊ̃ʊ nɩbɛlɛ nyã, de nie ir a dakpɛ̃ɛ a fʊ nɩbir pɔ bar na fʊ pãa nyɛrɛ tʊ̃ɔ ir a dabile a fʊ yɛbɛ nɩbir pɔ bar.
“Tɩsʊ̃ ba wɔ̃nɔ̃ bidɛbɛ ɛ, bɩɩ tɩdɛɛr mɩ ba wɔ̃nɔ̃ bisʊ̃n ɛ.
Tɩɛ jaa a wʊ wɔ̃mɔ̃ lɛ ba ma de bɔ̃ɔn wʊ. Ba maa pɔr kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ gʊtɩɛ ju ɛ, bɩɩ pɔr 'wɔ̃rɔ tamiir tɩɛ ju ɛ.
Nɩsʊ̃ a yelsʊ̃ ala na be a wʊ pʊɔm lɛ wʊ ma 'yɛrɛ, ka a nɩdɛɛr mɩ ma 'yɛrɛ a yeldɛbɛ ala na be a wʊ pʊɔm. Ala na sɛɛ a pʊɔ lɛ a nɛɛ ma 'yɛrɛ.
“Ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ bʊɔlɔ ma ɩka Soro, tɩ na yaa turo a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr ɛ?
Nɩrɛ jaa na wa a n sɛ̃ na wʊ wõ a n 'yɛr tɩ maala, ɩn wiil yɩ naa a lɛ wʊn be.
Wʊ kaara fɩka nɩrɛ na mɩɛrɛ yir na wʊ tuu a dachin par kparaa bɔɔ tɩ pɔɔn kʊsɩr na mɛ a dachin dɔɔl. Kʊ̃ɔ wa yaar yi jilʊ̃ a yir, ka a kɔ̃sɛbɛ ŋmiere a yir tɩ waa dam ɛ, bojũu ba mɛ wʊn sʊ̃.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na wõ a n 'yɛr tɩ na waa maala ɛ, wʊ kaara fɩka nɩrɛ na mɛ yir dɔɔl a tãn mʊɔr ju, waa tuu tɩ mɛ ɛ. A kɔ̃sɛbɛ wa yin ŋme a dachin, ka a dachin wʊ jaa lo ŋmɛr.”
A lɛ a nɩbɛ na wõ a 'yɛrsɩ anyãna a Yesu na 'yɛr kʊ ba baar wʊ chen a Kapenahum.
Be lɛ a soja nɩdiere gbãgbaa wʊn nʊ̃ yɔɔ jaa bɩɛrɛ ɩrɛ na ŋmaa vʊʊr.
Soja nɩdiere na wõ a Yesu yele, wʊ tʊ̃n a Juu nɩbɛ nɩdierbe bamɩne ka ba tɩ sʊɔr a Yesu ka wʊ wa sãa a wʊ gbãgbaa.
Ba wan a Yesu sɛ̃ wa sʊɔr wʊ yãayãabɩlɛ 'yɛrɛ, “A daba nyã sɛɛ naa ɩka fʊ tɩ sʊ̃ʊ wʊ,
bojũu wʊ nʊ̃n a sɩ nɩbɛ na vɛ̃ ka ba mɛ a sɩ lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie.”
Yesu pɔɔ ba naa ka ba 'mataa chiine tɩ gbʊrɔ a daba yir, ka wʊ tʊ̃ a wʊ barmɩne ka ba tuor 'yɛr a Yesu ɩka. “N Soro, ta bal a fʊ mãɛ ɛ, bojũu n ba sɛɛ ka fʊn wa kpɛ a n yir ɛ.
Ala lɛ so gba maa mãɛ na ba 'la wa a fʊ sɛ̃ ɛ. Tɩchɛ 'yɛr bir tɛɛ an sãan a n gbãgbaa.

Bojũu maa mãɛ tara na nɩbɛrɛ ɩn joro dãbãɛ, naa mɩ tara a sojasɩ ka ba mɩ be a n pĩlem. Maa 'yɛr kʊ ãsʊɔ ɩka wʊ, chen wʊ ma chen naa, bɩɩ ãsʊɔ ɩka wʊ wa, wʊ ma wa naa. N ma 'yɛr kʊ a n gbãgbaa, maal anyã, ka wʊ ma maal.”
A lɛ a Yesu na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ a daba nyã na ba ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ na 'yɛr, ka nɛ'maa wʊ, ka wʊ lɩɛb 'yɛr kʊ a nɩyɔɔ bala. “A Isɩral nɩbɛ pɔ gba, n ba nyɛ a sɔɔfʊ nyã bʊrɔ ɛ.”
Ka a wʊ barmɩne bala wʊn tʊ̃ lɩɛb kpɛ a yir tɩ nyɛ ka a gbãgbaa sa.
Ala lɛ a wɛr chaar ka Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo 'matãan nɩyɔɔ na turo wʊ ka ba 'mantaa chen a tẽe ban bʊɔlɔ Nain.
Wʊn wa gbʊr a tẽe dɔ̃dɔr kpɩɛraa ba tuon kũu wa yin na ɩ a pɔɔ bidabʊ̃'yen tɩ wʊ ɩ pɔɔkʊɔr. Ka a tẽe 'lɔ nɩbɛ yɔɔ mɩ pʊɔ wʊ.
A lɛ a Soro na wa nyɛ a pɔɔ, nɩbaal kpɛ wʊ naa ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a pɔɔ, “Ta kõnõ ɛ.”
Tɩ na wʊ chen tɩ sɩɩr a kũu ban tuo, ka a bala na tuo a ba ara. Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Pɔlbile, fʊ̃ʊ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ nɩ ir.”
Ka a kũu vaa ir jãnɛ tɩ piel na wʊ 'yɛrɛ ka Yesu de wʊ kʊ a ma.
Dãbãɛ kpɛ̃n ba jaa ka ba pɛɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ nɩ, “Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrkpɛ̃ɛ ãsʊɔ lɛ yi sɩ, Nãaŋmɩn wan ɩka wʊ wa sʊ̃ʊ a wʊ nɩbɛ.”
Ka a Yesu yele ŋme yaar a Judiya paal wʊ jaa nɩ a tẽn ala na gbʊr.
Jɔɔn poturbo tɩ man a yele anyã a jaa kʊ wʊ, ka wʊ bʊɔl a ba ayi
na wʊ tʊ̃ ba a Soro sɛ̃ ka ba tɩ sʊʊr wʊ kaa, “Fʊ̃ʊ ɩ a 'lɔ na wa bɩɩ sɩ chɛlɛ nɩyuo?”
Ka a nɩbɛ bala wa a Yesu sɛ̃ wa 'yɛr, “A Jɔɔn kɔ̃suor lɛ tʊ̃ sɩ a fʊ sɛ̃ ɩka sɩ wa sʊʊr fʊ kaa, fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a 'lɔ na wa bɩɩ sɩ chɛlɛ nɩyuo?”
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ mɩ lɛ Yesu sãa baalsɩ, bala na tara a sɩdɛbɛ na wʊ yuon jɔ̃n nɩbie.
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a bala a Jɔɔn na tʊ̃, “Yɩ lɩɛb kul tɩ man kʊ a Jɔɔn a lɛ yɩn nyɛ tɩ wõ, jɔ̃n nyɛrɛ naa ka gbɛrsɩ chiine ka kɔ̃kɔ̃n sa, ka wõn wõnõ, ka kũusɩ ir ɩ vʊɛ, ka a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ mɩ ta a nɔ̃n dẽme.
Pʊpɛl sʊɔ lɛ a 'lɔ a n yele na ba bãr wʊ lɔb ɛ.”
A bala a Jɔɔn na tʊ̃ na wa chen baar, Yesu piel 'yɛrɛ a Jɔɔn 'yɛr kʊrɔ a nɩyɔɔ bala, “Bo lɛ yɩ dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ a kaafʊ jie? A jɩmur a sɛsɛbɛ na dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ bɩɩ?
Ala ba ɩ lɛ ɛ, bo yɩ chen tɩ nyɛ? Daba na su bʊ̃pɩɛl ɔ? Kai, a bala na suro a bʊ̃sʊ̃n, na ba dire a bʊ̃sʊ̃n nãa yir lɛ ba ma be.
Tɩchɛ bo lɛ yɩ tɩ nyɛ? Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ɔ. Ɔ̃ɔ, n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka wʊ gar Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ.
A anyã yele lɛ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, ‘Ɩn tʊ̃ naa a n tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ ka wʊ de a fʊ nie na wʊ tɩ chɔɔr a fʊ sɔr kʊ fʊ.’
N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka bala pɔɔ na dɔɔ ka a wɛr pɔ ba ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ gar a Jɔɔn ɛ, tɩchɛ 'lɔ mɩ na ɩ jaa pʊʊr a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ gar wʊ naa.”
Ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa lɔ̃ɔn a lõpodierbe gba na wõ a lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr, ba sɔɔ naa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn yele tor naa, na ba sɔɔ ka a Jɔɔn so ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ.
Tɩchɛ a Faraseemɩne nɩ a bala na bɔ̃ɔ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ, bala mãɛ tɔr naa a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʊɔrɔ, bojũu baa sɔɔ ka a Jɔɔn so ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ ɛ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Ba boo lɛ ɩn de a dɩna nɩbɛ naa man? Bo lɛ ba nyɛtãan?
Ba nyɛntãan bibiir na jãnɛ daa pɔ bʊɔlɔ taa, ‘Sɩ pɛɛlɛ naa a laa 'lɩr tɩ yaa sɛɛrɛ bãnɛ ɛ, na sɩ kõnõ kõyiel tɩ yaa ŋmara nɩbikʊ̃ɔ ɛ.’
A Jɔɔn kɔ̃suor na wa, waa dire bʊ̃diir ɛ, waa nyuro dãa ɛ, ka yɩ 'yɛr ɩka sɩdɛɛr lɛ wʊ tara.
Ka a maa Nɩsaal Bie wa na n dire na n nyuro ka yɩ lɛ 'yɛr, ‘Wʊ dire na ba gala ɛ, na wʊ nyuro dãa, na wʊ ɩ a lõpodierbe nɩ a tʊ̃dɛtʊ̃nbɔ baraa.’
Tɩchɛ a yɛ̃ ma wiil a lɛ wʊn tor a wʊ bibiir pɔ.”
A Farasee nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ bʊɔl a Yesu ɩka wʊ wa di bʊ̃diir a wʊ yir, ka wʊ chen a Farasee nɩrɛ 'lɔ yir tɩ jãnɛ a bʊ̃diir difʊ jie.
Pɔɔ ben a tẽe pɔ na wʊ tʊ̃nɔ̃ tʊ̃dɛbɛ, wʊn wa wõ ɩka a Yesu ben a Farasee yir, wʊ den a kãnyũvɩla na sɛɛ pãrtɔbile na wʊ chiin.
Wʊ tɩ kpɛ̃n naa na wʊ ara a Yesu gbɛɛ par kõnõ. Wʊ soor a nɩbikʊ̃ɔ 'maan a Yesu gbɛɛ tɩ nyɔɔ a jukɔɔl fɩɛl bar, tɩ mʊʊr a gbɛɛ tɩ kpaar a kãnyũvɩla ala 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu gbɛɛ pɔ.
Ka a Farasee nɩrɛ 'lɔ na bʊɔl wʊ ka wʊ tɩ dire, na nyɛ a lɛ ka wʊ tɩɛr, “Ala ɩ a daba nyãna ta ɩn Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ wʊn taa bɔ̃ɔn naa a pɔɔ nyãna tɔ sʊɔ na sɩrɛ wʊ, wʊ tʊ̃nɔ̃ na tʊ̃dɛbɛ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr sɔɔ wʊ, “Simon, n tara na 'yɛr na sʊʊr fʊ.” Ka a Simon 'yɛr, “Wiwile, sʊʊr ma.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Nɩbɛ ayi kɔ̃ɔ lɛ tɩ pɛ̃ɛ nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ libie, ãsʊɔ pɛ̃ɛn kɔɔr anũu (500) ka ãsʊɔ mɩ pɛ̃ɛ lɩjaayi nɩ pie (50).
A nɩbɛ ayi banyãna ãsʊɔ jaa ba tara a libie na yab wʊ ɛ, ka a 'lɔ na so a libie 'yɛr, ‘Yɩ ta lɛ yab go ɛ, a sãn baar naa.’ Buor sʊɔ lɛ na nʊ̃ wʊ yɔɔ?”
Ka a Simon 'yɛr, “N tɩɛr ɩka a 'lɔ sãn na waa lɛ.” Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Sɩrɛ fʊ 'yɛr.”
Yesu lɩɛb tor a pɔɔ tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʊ a Simon, “Fʊ nyɛn a pɔɔ nyãna? Ɩn wa kpɛ a fʊ yir, faa kʊ ma kʊ̃ɔ ɩka n pɛɛ gbɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a pɔɔ pɛɛn a n gbɛɛ nɩ a wʊ nɩbikʊ̃ɔ tɩ de a wʊ jukɔɔl fɩɛl bar.
Faa sʊʊr ma kpãɛn ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ jaa ɩn wa kpɛ a pɔɔ nyã ba bar ma kpãɛn sʊʊrfʊ ɛ.
Faa pur kãa 'yɔ̃ɔ ma a ju pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ a pɔɔ kpaar a kãnyũvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ ma a gbɛɛ pɔ.
A lɛ jũu n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ fʊ ɩka a wʊ tʊ̃dɛbɛ ala a jaa vɛ̃n kʊ wʊ, bojũu a wʊ nʊ̃fʊ waa naa. Tɩchɛ a 'lɔ Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ jaa pʊʊr kʊ a wʊ nʊ̃fʊ mɩ ɩn jaa pʊʊr.”
A Yesu pãa 'yɛr kʊ a pɔɔ, “A fʊ yeldɛbɛ vɛ̃n bar.”
Ka a bala na lɔ̃ɔ jɛ̃n wʊ 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ taa, “An lɛ anyã, na wʊ mɩ ma vɛ̃ nɩrɛ yeldɛɛr bar?”
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a pɔɔ, “A fʊ sɔɔfʊ faa fʊ naa, chiine nɩ nyã'maar.”
A anyãna puor, Yesu yɔn a tẽbɛrɛ nɩ a tẽbil 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr kʊrɔ ba ka a wʊ nɩtʊ̃nsɩ Pie nɩ Ayi pʊɔ wʊ.
Ka a pɔbɔ bamɩne mɩ pʊɔ wʊ, bala lɛ wʊ dɔ̃ɔ dii a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi na wʊ sãa a ba baalsɩ, ãsʊɔ lɛ ba bʊɔlɔ Mɛɛr na yi a Magdala 'lɔ lɛ wʊ dii a sɩdɛbɛ ayopõi ka a yi,
Joana lɛ a ãsʊɔ na ɩ a Kuja na kaara a Hɛrɔd yir pɔɔ, Susana lɛ a ãsʊɔ nɩ a pɔbɔ yɔɔ bamɩne. Banyãna lɛ de a ba bomo sʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo.
Nɩyɔɔ yin tẽn tẽn waara a Yesu sɛ̃, a nɩyɔɔ banyãna na wa duo, sʊkpa nyã lɛ wʊ lɔb kʊ ba,
“Kʊɔraa lɛ yin wʊ bʊ̃bʊrɔ bʊrfʊ jie. Wʊ tɩ yaara naa yʊɔrɔ nɩ ka amɩne tɩ lo sɔr pɔ, ka ba nɛ nɛb ka lubil wa tuur di.
Ka amɩne mɩ tɩ lo kʊsɩr pãn ju naa bul tɩ kpi bojũu tãn ba be be ɛ.
Ka amɩne mɩ lo gʊʊr pɔ 'mataa bul ka a gʊʊr nʊ̃ɔ fãɩn ba.
Tɩchɛ ka amɩne mɩ lo a kɔjɔ̃ pɔ bul dɔɔ jur kɔɔkɔɔr naa gar a lɛ wʊn bʊr.” Yesu na wa 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ baar, wʊ 'yɛr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa, “Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara tuor wõnõ nɩ wʊ chɛlɛ.”
Ka a wʊ poturbo sʊʊr wʊ a sʊkpa nyã par.
A wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩn 'lɔ, n vɛ̃ naa ka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ yelsɔɔlsɩ, tɩchɛ a bala na chɛ, sʊkpar lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ ba, ‘Ba ma kaa naa tɩ maa nyɛ ɛ, na ba ma wõnõ tɩ ba bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ.’
“A sʊkpa par nɩ nyã. Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr lɛ ɩ a bʊ̃bie.
A ala na lo a sɔr pɔ ɩn a bala na wõ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr, tɩchɛ ka a tɩɩ wa ir naa a ba nyãa pɔ, ka ba ta sɔɔ de nyɛ faafʊ ɛ.
Ala mɩ na lo a kʊsɩr pãn ju ɩn a bala na wõ a 'yɛr den pʊpɛl, tɩchɛ baa tara nyɩbɛ ɛ. Ba sɔɔn ara bãlãa tɩchɛ bɛɛr kaa wa wa ba ma lo naa.
A bʊ̃bie ala na lo a gʊʊr pɔ ɩn a bala na wõ a 'yɛr, tɩchɛ ka a ãgãn nyã vɔlaa nɩ bʊ̃tarsɩ nɩ a bʊ̃bʊɔrsɩ fãɩn ba ka baa tʊ̃ɔ dɔɔ bie ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a bʊ̃bie ala na lo a kɔjɔ̃ pɔ, ɩn a bala na wõ a 'yɛr na ba sɔɔ den nyãa ara nɩ pʊpɛl, ka a kãnyir vɛ̃ ka ba dɔɔ jur.
“Nɩrɛ jaa maa chʊm fãtɩn de laa kpa pɔɔ ɛ, bɩɩ de su gado pĩlem ɛ. Tɩchɛ wʊ ma den dɔɔl a dɔɔlfʊ jie ka a bala na kpɩɛrɛ nyɛ a chãa.
Bojũu bon jaa ba be be na sɔɔl ka ba kʊ̃ nyɛ wʊ ɛ, bɩɩ bon jaa ba be be sɔɔl ka ba kʊ̃ bɔ̃ɔn ɛ, bɩɩ kʊ̃ yi chãa pɔ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʊ̃ a lɛ yɩn chɛlɛ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na bɔ̃ɔ a par Nãaŋmɩn na lɛ kʊ wʊn dɔɔl, nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na ba bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn na den a bãlãa 'lɔ wʊn tɩɛr ɩka wʊ bɔ̃ɔn a par.”
Yesu ma nɩ a wʊ yɛɛr wan ɩka ba wa nyɛ wʊ, tɩchɛ a nɩyɔɔ jũu ba kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ kpɛ ɛ.
Ka nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ 'yɛr wʊ, “A fʊ ma nɩ a fʊ yɛɛr lɛ be a yõo bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba nyɛ fʊ.”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “N ma nɩ a n yɛɛr lɛ a bala na wõ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr na ba turo.”
Bɩbir ãsʊɔ lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo, “Yɩ ɩ a sɩ gɔ̃ɔ a kasɛn a manyal gɔ̃ɔn.” Be lɛ ba kpɛ a gboro na ba gɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.
Ban gɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ tɩ wʊ gã gur. Ka a kɔ̃sɛkpɛ̃ɛ ire a man pɔ ka a kʊ̃ɔ ɔɔrɔ kpɩɛrɛ a gboro pɔ, ka ba ɩrɛ na mʊr.
Ka a poturbo tɩ sãɩ wʊ 'yɛrɛ, “Kpãkpãana, a kʊ̃ɔ na di sɩ naa.” Ka a Yesu ir tãn a sɛsɛbɛ nɩ a kʊ̃ɔ na ɔɔrɔ, ka a sɛsɛbɛ ŋmaa vʊʊr ka a kʊ̃ɔ mɩ lo jaa jomm....
Tɩ pãa sʊʊr a wʊ poturbo, “Nyɩnɛ a yɩ sɔɔfʊ be?” Ka ba mɩ de dãbãɛ sʊrɔ nɩ taa, “Nɩ an lɛ anyã, na 'yɛr ka a sɛsɛbɛ nɩ kʊ̃ɔ tu a wʊ nɛɛ?”
Ba yin a Galilee gɔ̃ɔn na ba gɔ̃ɔ a Gerasenɩ gɔ̃ɔn.
Yesu na wa yire a gogoro ju wʊ tuor daba na tara sɩdɛbɛ na wʊ gele yi a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ. Bojũu a kor wʊn yi a yir na wʊ maa su fuu ɛ, tɩ na wʊ gãna a yar par.
Wʊn wa nyɛ a Yesu wʊ ŋmen chɛlma tɩ lo a Yesu niem na wʊ tãna 'yɛrɛ nɩ, “Bo lɛ fʊ bʊɔrɔ ka a n sɛ̃, a fʊ̃ʊ na ɩ a saaju Nãaŋmɩn Bie? N sʊɔrɔ fʊ naa, ta ge ma ɛ.”

Bojũu Yesu dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ a sɩdɛɛr ɩka wʊ yi a daba 'yɔ̃ɔ. Gbɛɛ yɔɔ jaa lɛ a ma ir a daba ka ba ma gbar a nuur nɩ a gbɛɛ nɩ bɔ̃jɔrsɩ kaara wʊ, tɩ wʊ ma kar a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ bar ka a sɩdɛɛr ma dii wʊ bar be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ wʊ yõ.
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr wʊ, “A fʊ yuor lɛ di bo?” Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Nɩyɔɔ.” Bojũu sɩdɛyɔɔ lɛ kpɛ wʊ.
Ka a sɩdɛbɛ sʊɔrɔ a Yesu ɩka wʊ ta dii ba 'yɔ̃ɔ be a bɔɔ fulom 'lɔ pɔ ɛ.
Doyɔɔ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ara be a tɔ̃ɔ kõkoor dire, ka a sɩdɛbɛ sʊɔr a Yesu ɩka wʊ sɔɔ ka ba yi tɩ kpɛ a dor ala pɔ, ka wʊ sɔɔ kʊ ba sɔr.
A sɩdɛbɛ yin a daba pɔ tɩ kpɛ a dor pɔ, ka a tĩgbil suu tɩ kpɛ a man kʊ̃ɔ pɔ tɩ gbʊ̃m kpi kpi.
A bala na kaara a dor na wa nyɛ a lɛ na ɩ, ba jon kul a tẽe pɔ, nɩ a tẽbil ala na gbʊr tɩ 'yɛr a lɛ na ɩ.
Ka a nɩbɛ yi chen ɩka ba tɩ kaa a lɛ na ɩ. Ba chen a Yesu sɛ̃ tɩ nyɛ a dagẽgelaa a sɩdɛbɛ na yi tɩ chɛ bar ka wʊ chɩ na wʊ su a fuu jãnɛ a Yesu gbɛɛ par, ka a dãbãɛ kpɛ ba.
A nɩbɛ bala na dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ a lɛ an ɩ ka a gẽgelaa sa pãa mana kʊrɔ a nɩbɛ.
Ka a Gerasenɩ paal nɩbɛ ba jaa sʊɔrɔ a Yesu ɩka wʊ yi a be, bojũu dãbãɛ kpɛ ba naa. Lɛ lɛ wʊ kpɛ a gboro yi a be chen.
Ka a daba 'lɔ pɔ a sɩdɛbɛ na yi sʊɔr a Yesu ɩka ba 'mataa chen, tɩchɛ a Yesu lɩɛb wʊ bar tɩ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ,
“Lɩɛb kul a fʊ yir tɩ man a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ kʊ fʊ.” Lɛ lɛ ka a daba kul a tẽe pɔ tɩ mana kʊrɔ a nɩbɛ a lɛ a Yesu na ɩ kʊ wʊ.
Yesu na wa lɩɛb wa, a nɩyɔɔ tuor de wʊ, bojũu ba dɔ̃ɔ chɛlɛ wʊ.
Ka daba ban bʊɔlɔ Jairusɩ na ɩ a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir nɩdier, wa gbur dumo a Yesu niem sʊɔrɔ wʊ yãayãabɩlɛ ɩka wʊ wa a wʊ yir,
bojũu a wʊ bipɔɔ bʊ̃'yen tɛɛ na nyɛ yuom pie nɩ ayi lɛ kpire. Yesu na de a sɔr chiine ka a nɩyɔɔ mɩl pɔɔ wʊ.
Ka pɔɔ mɩ be be na lo sɩɛ suoro faara yuom pie nɩ ayi, nɩrɛ jaa ba tʊ̃ɔ wʊ sãa ɛ.
A wʊ turo a puor tɩ sɩɩr a Yesu fuu nɛɛ ka a jãɩ ŋmaa ajienaa.
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr, “An lɛ sɩɩr ma?” Ka ba jaa chiir ɩka baa sɩɩr wʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a Pita 'yɛr, “N Soro, a nɩbɛ waa naa na dara taa tɩɛr fʊ.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ sɩɩr ma na wʊ sa ka n bɔ̃ɔn.”
A pɔɔ na wa nyɛ ka ɩ wʊ kʊ̃ lɛ tʊ̃ɔ sɔɔl ɛ, wʊ mɩrɛ naa wa lo gã a Yesu niem. A nɩyɔɔ bala niem tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr a lɛ jũu wʊn sɩɩr wʊ na wʊ sa ajienaa.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “N bipɔɔ, a fʊ sɔɔfʊ sa fʊ naa, kulo nɩ nyã'maar.”
Yesu na chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ, nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ yin a lɔ̃ɔfʊ nɩdier Jairusɩ yir wa 'yɛrɛ, “A fʊ bipɔɔ kpi naa ta lɛ fɩrɛ a wiwile go ɛ.”
Yesu na wõ a lɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a Jairusɩ, “Ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ. Sɔɔ ma dɛ. Wʊn sa naa.”
Wʊn wa ta a Jairusɩ yir waa sɔɔ ka nɩyuo kpɛ be ɛ, tɩ tara Pita, Jɔɔn nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ a bi sãa nɩ a ma kpɛ̃n.
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na kõnõ ŋmiere a chɛlsɩ, Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ bar a kõn waa kpi ɛ, wʊ gur naa.”
Ka ba laara wʊ ban bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a bie kpi naa.
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu nyɔɔ a bie nũu tɩ 'yɛr, “N bie, ir.”
Ka wʊ sɩɛ lɩɛb wa kpɛ ka wʊ vaa ir. Ka a Yesu pãa 'yɛr, yɩ kʊ wʊ bʊ̃kɔ̃ɔ ka wʊ di.
Ka a sãa naa ma nyɔɔ nɛɛ, tɩchɛ ka a Yesu kpãkpãan ba ɩka ba taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ nɩrɛ jaa a lɛ na ɩ ɛ.
Yesu na wa bʊɔl a wʊ nɩtʊ̃nsɩ pie nɩ ayi lɔ̃ɔ taa, wʊ kʊ ban kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ tʊ̃ɔfʊ ka ban diin sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi tɩ sãa baalsɩ.
Wʊ tʊ̃ ba naa ka ba chen tɩ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr tɩ sãa baal.
Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ taa tara bon jaa chiine ɛ. Yɩ ta de dãgbal ɛ, bɩɩ wʊɔ ɛ, bɩɩ bʊ̃diir ɛ, bɩɩ libie ɛ, bɩɩ de fuusɩ ayi ɛ.
Yir jaa pɔ yɩn tɩ kpɛ, yɩ jãnɛ a be tɩ tãn a daar 'lɔ yɩn na yi a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ.
Ala ɩ nɩbɛ ba wa de yɩ ɛ, yɩ yi a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ, tɩ yɩn wa yire yɩ pĩ pĩ a yɩ gbɛɛ tã-uul ka a di a ba dãasɩɛ.”
Be lɛ ba yi lʊɔrɔ a tẽn tẽn 'yɛrɛ a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã sãa na nɩ a nɩbɛ baalsɩ a jie wʊ jaa.
A Nãa Hɛrɔd na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ na ɩrɛ, ka tɩɛr nyɔɔ wʊ, bojũu bamɩne 'yɛrɛ naa ɩka Jɔɔn lɛ tɔ̃ɔ ir ɩ vʊr.
Ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛrɛ ɩka a Elaija lɛ tɔ̃ɔ yi, ka bamɩne mɩ chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ãsʊɔ lɛ tɔ̃ɔ ir ɩ vʊr.
Tɩchɛ ka a Hɛrɔd 'yɛr, “N ŋmaan Jɔɔn ju, tɩ an 'yɛr lɛ a nyã ɩn wõnõ?” Na wʊ mʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ nyɛ a Yesu.
A nɩtʊ̃nsɩ lɩɛb wa na ba wa man kʊ a Yesu a lɛ ban tʊ̃. Ka wʊ pãa tara a bala tɛɛ ka ba 'mataa chen a tẽe ban bʊɔlɔ Betɩsaida.
Tɩchɛ ka a nɩyɔɔ chɛnɛ bɔ̃ɔn na ba bɩɛr chen a jie. Wʊ de ba naa na wʊ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, tɩ sãa a bala na bʊɔrɔ a sãafʊ.
Mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa mʊrɔ, a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ pie nɩ ayi tɩ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Wɛl a nɩbɛ bar a ba chen a tẽbil anyã nɩ a por anyã na gbʊr na ba tɩ bɔ gaa jie nɩ bʊ̃diir di bojũu a ka ɩn mɔgɔ̃ɔ.”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr sɔɔ ba, “Yɩn lɛ na kʊ ba bʊ̃kɔ̃ɔ ka ba di.” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Paanʊ̃ɔsɩ anũu nɩ jãbie ayi tɛɛ lɛ sɩ tara, ka a ba ɩ sɩ chen tɩ da bʊ̃diir wa kʊ a nɩyɔɔ ba nyãna ɛ?”
A nɩyɔɔ bala, dɔɔr tɛɛ ɩn tur anũu (5,000). Tɩchɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a poturbo, “Yɩ ŋma a nɩbɛ ka ba jãnɛ jãnɛ gbulsɩ lɩjaayi nɩ pie pie.”
A poturbo ɩn a lɛ ka nɩrɛ jaa jɛ̃ tẽe.
Yesu den a paanʊ̃ɔsɩ a nũu nɩ a jãmɛ ayi ala dʊl kaa saaju tɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, tɩ na wʊ ŋma ŋma, de kʊ a poturbo ɩka ba de põ a nɩbɛ.
Ba jaa din tɩɩ, ka a poturbo wob a bʊ̃ŋmaar ala na chɛ sɛɛ pɛr pie nɩ ayi.
Daar kɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Yesu tɛɛ wa sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka wʊ poturbo be be ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “An lɛ a nɩbɛ 'yɛrɛ ɩka n ɩ naa?”
Ka ba 'yɛr, “Bamɩne 'yɛr ɩka fʊ ɩn a Jɔɔn 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛr ɩka Elaija lɛ, ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛr ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ãsʊɔ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ lɩɛb wa.”
Ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Tɩchɛ yɩn mɩ, an lɛ yɩ 'yɛr ɩka n ɩ naa?” Ka a Pita 'yɛr, “Fʊ ɩ naa a Nɩ-iraa yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.”
Ka a Yesu kpãkpãan ba ɩka ba taa 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ.
Tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr, “A maa Nɩsaal Bie na din dɔɔyɛ yɔɔ ka a nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe tɔr ma bar, ka ba kʊ ma, ka a ber ata daar ka n ir ɩ vʊr.”
Be lɛ wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba jaa, “Ala ɩ nɩrɛ na turo ma naa, wʊ 'laar a wʊ mãɛ tɩ tuo a wʊ daa turo nɩ ma.
Bojũu nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ faa a wʊ nyɛvʊr a wʊ nyɛvʊr na bɔr naa, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na lɔb a wʊ nyɛvʊr bar a maa jũu na faa wʊ naa.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ tara naa a wɛr wʊ jaa bonsɩ tɩ bɔr bɩɩ ka a wʊ sɩɛ wɛ, bo tɔ̃nɔ̃ wʊ nyɛ?
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ nyɛ naa maa nɩ a n 'yɛr ka a ɩ vĩ yele a wʊ sɛ̃, a maa Nɩsaal Bie mɩ na kaa naa nɩnyɩnɛ ka wʊ ɩ vĩ sʊɔ maa wa lɩɛb waara nɩ a n tɩɩr nɩ a Sãa tɩɩr nɩ a malaka chɛchɛ bala.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka a yɩ bamɩne gba ara naa kana kʊ̃ kpi ɛ, tɩ na ban nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ.”
Yesu na 'yɛr a 'yɛrbie anyãna baar a maal ber aniin tɩ wʊ tara Pita, Jɔɔn nɩ Jemesɩ don a tɔ̃ɔ ju Nãaŋmɩn sʊɔrfʊ jie.
Wʊn tɩ sʊɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn ka a nie lɩɛb, ka a fuu pɛl nyɩlɛ bũu 'lɩraa kaar.
Ka a dɔɔr ayi, Mosesɩ nɩ Elaija wa naa a wʊ sɛ̃.
Ba wa yin naa a saaju tɩɩr 'yɛrɛ nɩ a Yesu. Ba 'mantaa 'yɛrɛ a kũu a Yesu na tɩ kpi a Jerusalɛm 'yɛr.
Gʊ̃ɔ kpɛ̃n a Pita nɩ a wʊ taaba, tɩchɛ ban wa jɔɔ ir ba nyɛn a wʊ tɩɩr nɩ a dɔɔr ayi bala a ba ara a wʊ sɛ̃.
A dɔɔr bala na lɩɛb chiine ka Pita 'yɛr, “N Soro, a sɛɛn ka sɩn kpɩɛrɛ a ka. Bar a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ sɛɛr ata, fʊ̃ʊ so ãsʊɔ, Mosesɩ ãsʊɔ Elaija mɩ ãsʊɔ.” Waa bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ ɛ.
Wʊn chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ a julõjuur wa pɔɔn ba jaa ka a dãbãɛ kpɛ a Pita, Jɔɔn nɩ Jemesɩ.
Ka a kɔkɔr yi be a julõjuur pɔ 'yɛrɛ, “Nyã lɛ ɩ a n Bie ɩn ir, yɩ chɛlɛ a wʊ 'yɛr.”
A kɔkɔr na wa 'yɛr baar, ba nyɛn a Yesu tɛɛ na ara. Ka a poturbo ba 'la man kʊ nɩrɛ a lɛ ban nyɛ ɛ.
A wɛr na wa chaar, ba yin a tɔ̃ɔ ju suu, a nɩyɔɔ wa lɔ̃ɔ a wʊ sɛ̃.
Ka a daba bʊɔl be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ, “Wiwile, n sʊɔrɔ fʊ naa, kaa a n bidaba, 'lɔ tɛɛ lɛ ɩ a n bie.
Sɩɛ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ tara wʊ, ma ire wʊ ba gala ɛ. Wʊ maa ŋmen a chɛlma tɩ tãanaa tɩ furo a natafuul a nɛɛ pɔ. Wʊ maa bara wʊ ɛ, na wʊ bʊɔrɔ a wʊ sɔ̃ɔfʊ.
N sʊɔr a fʊ poturbo ɩka ba dii a sɩɛ nyã bar tɩchɛ baa tʊ̃ɔ ɛ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yɩn babãma dẽme na ba tara sɔɔfʊ ɛ, n be a yɩ sɛ̃ naa tara yɩ nɩ kãnyir tɩ tãn dabor?” Tɩ 'yɛr a daba, “Tɔɔ a bie wa kʊ ma!”
A bie na chɛnɛ waara ka a sɩdɛɛr ir a bie tãa lɔb a tẽe, tɩchɛ ka a a Yesu tãn a sɩdɛɛr na wʊ sãa a bie de kʊ a sãa.
Nɩbɛ ba jaa nɛ'maa naa ban nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ. A nɩbɛ na chɛnɛ kpire a lɛ a Yesu na ɩ, tɩ wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a poturbo,
“Yɩ chɛlɛ a lɛ ɩn 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, ban gar naa maa Nɩsaal Bie 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɩbɛ nuur pɔ.”
Tɩchɛ baa bɔ̃ɔ a anyãna wʊn 'yɛr par ɛ, a lii ba naa, ka ba bɔ̃ɔ faa, tɩ joro dãbãɛ ba 'la sʊʊr wʊ ɛ.
Nɛchɩrɛ ir naa a Yesu poturbo pɔ ɩka a ba buor sʊɔ lɛ na ɩ a ba kpɛ̃ɛ.
Yesu na bɔ̃ɔ a ba tɩɛr, wʊ tɔɔn bibile wa lan a wʊ lõboor.
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nɩrɛ jaa na de a bibile nyãna a maa jũu maa lɛ wʊ de. Nɩrɛ jaa mɩ na de ma wʊ mɩ den a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma. Bojũu nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ɩ a yɩ jaa bile, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ gar yɩ jaa.”
Ka a Jɔɔn 'yɛr, “N Soro, sɩ nyɛn nɩrɛ na de a fʊ yuor dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire, ka sɩ 'yɛr wʊ ɩka wʊ ta ɩrɛ a lɛ ɛ, bojũu waa ɩ a sɩ ãsʊɔ ɛ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yɩ ta ŋmaa wʊ sɔr ɛ, bojũu nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba kpɛrɛ yɩ ɛ, wʊ pʊɔ yɩ naa.”
Lɛ a sɔ̃ɔ na wa gbʊrɔ ka Yesu na lɩɛb do a saaju, wʊ ŋmen nyãa a Jerusalɛm chenfʊ.
Wʊ den nie tʊ̃ nɩbɛ ka ba de nie chen a Samariya tẽbile ãsʊɔ pɔ, na ban tɩ chɔɔr a jie bar wʊ.
Tɩchɛ a tẽe 'lɔ nɩbɛ ba sɔɔ de wʊ ɛ, bojũu Jerusalɛm lɛ wʊ chiine.
Ka a wʊ poturbo Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn na wa nyɛ a lɛ, ka ba sʊʊr a Yesu, “Sɩ Soro, fʊ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka sɩ bʊɔl bũu ka ayi saaju suu wa di ba bɩɩ?”
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu lɩɛb tãn ba ɩka ba ta ɩ a lɛ ɛ.
Tɩ na ba chen tẽyuo pɔ.
A sɔr ban chɛnɛ de chiine ka daba ãsʊɔ 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “Jie jaa fʊn chiine ɩn turo fʊ naa!”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Mɔbaar tara naa bɔɔr ka a lubil mɩ tara choor, tɩchɛ maa Nɩsaal Bie ba tara jie na bin a n ju ɛ.”
Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a daba ãsʊɔ, “Turo ma.” Tɩchɛ ka a daba 'yɛr, “N Soro, bar ma sɔr ka n kul tɩ ũu a n sãa baar.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a daba, “Bar ka a kũn ũno ba mãɛ kũn tɩchɛ fʊ̃ʊ 'lɔ, chen tɩ mʊɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr.”
Ka ãsʊɔ mɩ 'yɛr, “N Soro, ɩn turo fʊ naa tɩ bar ma sɔr ka n kul tɩ 'yɛr a n yir dẽme.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Nɩrɛ na nyɔɔ niin kuur tɩ lɩɛb kaara a puor ba sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃ ɛ.”
A nyã puor Yesu lɛ ir naa nɩbɛ lɩjaata nɩ pie nɩ ayi (72) bamɩne go, na wʊ tʊ̃ ba ayir yir ka ba de nie chen a tẽn nɩ a jiir ala a jaa wʊn na yɔ.
Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A puo bɛr ma naa, tɩchɛ ka a bala na ŋmara ba waa ɛ, a lɛ jũu yɩ sʊɔr a puo sɔɔ ka wʊ waan tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ wa 'yɔ̃ɔ a puo pɔ.
Yɩ chen, yɩ kaara na fɩka piir ɩn tʊ̃nɔ̃ ka yɩn tɩ kpɛ gbõgborosɩ pɔ.
Yɩ taa de libie ɛ, bɩɩ wʊɔ ɛ, bɩɩ na fɔɔr ɛ, na yɩ puor nɩrɛ taa wa jaa a sɔr pɔ ɛ.
“Yir jaa pɔ yɩn wa kpɛ, yɩ de nie 'yɛr, ‘Nyã'maar wʊ be a yir nyã pɔ.’
Ala ɩ nyã'maar sʊɔ ben a yir pɔ, a yɩ nyã'maar na be naa a wʊ sɛ̃, ala ba ɩ lɛ ɛ, an lɩɛb wa a yɩ sɛ̃.
Yɩ jãnɛ a yir nyɩnɛ pɔ dire na yɩ nyuro bon jaa ban wa kʊ yɩ, tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ sãyar sɛɛn wʊ naa. Yɩ taa lʊɔrɔ yie yʊɔrɔ nɩ ɛ.
Tẽe jaa pɔ yɩn wa kpɛ, ka ba de yɩ, yɩ dire bon jaa ban kʊ yɩ.
Yɩ sãana a baalsɩ bala na be be tɩ na yɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba, ‘A Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ gbʊr yɩ naa.’
Tɩchɛ tẽe jaa pɔ yɩn wa kpɛ, ka baa de yɩ ɛ, yɩ yi de a tẽe sãlsɔɔ tɩ 'yɛr,
‘A yɩ tẽe tã-uul gba na mar a sɩ gbɛɛ, sɩ kpoor 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ. Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a nyãna ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ gbʊr naa.’
N 'yɛr kʊ yɩ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ bɩbir, Sodom na sa naa a tẽe 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.

“Nɛbier ben a yɩn Korajin dẽme sɛ̃, nɛbier mɩ ben a yɩn Betɩsaida dẽme mɩ sɛ̃. A nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ala ɩn tʊ̃ a yɩ jie, ala ɩ a mɩ ta tʊ̃n a lɛ a Tire nɩ Sidon tẽe pɔ, ban taa sun bʊ̃jarsɩ jɛ̃n tãpɩɛl pɔ lɩɛb ba tɩɛr.
Tɩchɛ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ daar, a Tire nɩ a Sidon na sa yɩ naa.
A yɩn Kapenahum dẽme, ban 'mɔɔ yɩn don saaju bɩɩ? Kai, ban suun yɩ naa kpĩisɩ tẽe.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na chɛlɛ a yɩn na ɩ a n poturbo na chɛl naa a n 'yɛr, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tɔr yɩ mɩ tɔr ma naa. Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tɔr ma mɩ tɔr naa a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma.”
A nɩbɛ lɩjaata nɩ pie nɩ ayi bala wʊn tʊ̃ lɩɛb wa a wʊ sɛ̃ chɩlɛ 'yɛrɛ, “Sɩ Soro, a fʊ yuor jũu a sɩdɛbɛ tu naa a sɩ nɛɛ na be yire a nɩbɛ pɔ.”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, “N nyɛn Satan na yi saaju lo fɩka saa na nyɩɩr.
N kʊ yɩn kpɛ̃ɔ ka yɩn nɛɛrɛ waba nɩ lɔ̃n na yɩ tʊ̃ɔ a yɩ dɔ̃dɔ̃mɔ̃ Satan, bon jaa kʊ̃ ɩ yɩ ɛ.
Yɩ ta chɩlɛ a sɩdɛbɛ na tu a yɩ nɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ chɩlɛ a yɩ yuor sɛb bin be a saaju.”

A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nʊ̃ɔ kpɛ a Yesu ka wʊ 'yɛr, “N dãn a fʊ̃ʊ n Sãa na ɩ a saaju nɩ a tẽe Soro, bojũu fʊ̃ʊ lɛ sɔɔl a yele anyãna bar ka a bala na ɩ a yɛ̃ dẽme nɩ a bala na jãn ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ na fʊ de wiil kʊ bibiir. Ɔ̃ɔ, n Sãa lɛ lɛ nʊ̃mɔ̃ fʊ ka fʊ maal.

Maa lɛ a n Sãa kʊ a yele a jaa, nɩrɛ jaa ba bɔ̃ɔ a Bie ka a Sãa ba lɛ ɛ. Nɩrɛ jaa mɩ ba bɔ̃ɔ a Sãa ka a Bie ba lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala a maa Nãaŋmɩn Bie na ir, na wiil naa a sãa kʊ ba. Ka ba bɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na be.”
Tɩ pãa lɩɛb 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo tɛɛ, “Pʊpɛl dẽme lɛ a bala nɩbir na nyɛ a anyã yɩn nyɛ.
Bojũu n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ nɩ a nãmɩne dɔ̃ɔ bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba nyɛ a anyã yɩn nyɛ, tɩ ba nyɛ ɛ, na ba ta wõ a anyã yɩn wõ tɩ ba wõ ɛ.”
Nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ na bɔ̃ɔ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka wʊ bɛɛr a Yesu kaa na wʊ ir sʊʊr, “Wiwile, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ɩn ɩ naa nyɛ nyɛvʊr kpo kpo?”
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr wʊ, “Bo ba sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ bin? Ŋmɩnɛ fʊ ma kar?”
Ka a daba 'yɛr, “Nʊ̃ a fʊ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a fʊ nyãa wʊ jaa, nɩ a fʊ nyɛvʊr wʊ jaa, nɩ a fʊ kpɛ̃ɔ wʊ jaa, nɩ a fʊ tɩɛr wʊ jaa.
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr, “Fʊ 'yɛr vɩla, tɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ, fʊn ben be kpo kpo.”
Tɩchɛ wʊn ba ɩrɛ a lɛ ɛ, tɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ sɔɔl a wʊ mãɛ bar jũu, wʊ sʊʊr naa Yesu, “Nɩbuor lɛ ɩ a n tɔ sʊɔ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Daba kɔ̃ɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ yi Jerusalɛm chiine Jeriko ka a nãnyisɩ tɩ var wʊ be a sɔr pɔ. Ba yaar naa fuusɩ tɩ ŋme ŋme wʊ, ka wʊ vɔɔ chɛ bãlãa naa kpi, ka ba bar wʊ tɩ chen.
A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrloro ãsʊɔ mɩ de a sɔr 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, wʊn tɩ nyɛ a daba, wʊ gõl bar tɩ chen.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʊ yir tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ mɩ waara wa nyɛ, na wʊ mɩ gõl tu jiyuo chen.
Tɩchɛ ka a nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ na ɩ a Samariya nɩrɛ mɩ tu a sɔr 'lɔ a daba na gã, wʊn wa nyɛ wʊ, nɩbaal kpɛ wʊ naa.
Ka wʊ tɔɔ ta a daba pʊr dãa pɛɛn a natɩɛ bar, tɩ maal kãa fɔ, tɩ de fɔbaa lũ pɔɔ. Na wʊ 'mɔɔ a daba dɔɔl a wʊ bʊ̃ɔ ju chiin a sãanba gaa jie tɩ gãn.
Wɛr na wa chaar, wʊ den a kpãna libikue ayi kʊ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kaara a sãanba tɩ 'yɛr, ‘Kaara wʊ, maa wa lɩɛb gɔr, ala ba wa ta ɛ, ɩn lɛ yab kʊ fʊ.’ ”
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr a daba, “A nɩbɛ ata banyãna, buor sʊɔ lɛ ɩ a daba nyã, a nãnyisɩ na ŋme tɔ sʊɔ?”
A wʊ 'yɛr, “Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kaa a wʊ nɩbaal.” Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Mɩ chen tɩ maal a lɛ nɛ.”
Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo na chiine ba vɩɛn kpɛ tẽbile kɔ̃ɔ pɔ, ka pɔɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Mata ka wʊ de ba na ir ba sãan.
A Mata tara na yɛbɛ ban bʊɔlɔ Mɛɛr, ka 'lɔ jãnɛ a Soro gbɛɛ par chɛlɛ a lɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Mata wʊ yõ sõsoro nɩ a tʊ̃mɔ̃, na wʊ wa tɔɔ ta a Yesu sɛ̃ 'yɛr, “N Soro, a ba bã fʊ a n yɛbɛ na bar a tʊ̃mɔ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ ma ka n sõsoro nɩ ɛ? 'Yɛr wʊ ka wʊ ir wa sʊ̃ʊ ma.”
Ka a Soro 'yɛr, “Mata, Mata fʊ fɩrɛ na fʊ mãɛ ka suur kʊrɔ fʊ.
Tɩchɛ yelbʊ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ fɛr, Mɛɛr ir naa a bʊ̃sʊ̃ nɩrɛ na kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ faa wʊ yin a wʊ sɛ̃ ɛ.”
Bɩbir ãsʊɔ Yesu ben a jie kɔ̃ɔ na wʊ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn, wʊn wa sʊɔr baar, ka a wʊ poturbo ãsʊɔ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Sɩ Soro, wiil sɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sʊɔrfʊ, nɩtãa lɛ a Jɔɔn na wiil a wʊ poturbo.”
A wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩn ma wa sʊɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn yɩ 'yɛr, Sɩ Sãa, sɩ kʊ naa a fʊ yuor tɩɩr. A fʊ nãalʊ̃ʊ wʊ wa.
Na fʊ kʊ sɩ a sɩ bɩbir jaa bʊ̃diir.
Vɛ̃ a sɩ maal dɛbɛ bar, bojũu sɩ mɩ vɛ̃n kʊ a bala jaa na maal sɩ a dɛɛr. Ta sɔɔ ka bɛɛr kaa nyɔɔ sɩ ɛ.”
Be lɛ wʊ pãa 'yɛr kʊ ba. “Ala ɩ a yɩ ãsʊɔ tara na baraa na wʊ wa ir chen a wʊ sɛ̃ tãsɔɔ bãɩn tɩ 'yɛr, ‘Pɛ̃ɛ ma jɔ̃ nɩ ŋmele,
bojũu n baraa ãsʊɔ lɛ wa suu a tãsɔɔ nyãna tɩ n ba tara bon na maal kʊ wʊ ɛ.’
Ka wʊ gã be a die pɔ tɩ 'yɛr, ‘Ta dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma ɛ, a pãn pɔɔ naa ka maa naa bibiir be gã, n kʊ̃ lɛ tʊ̃ɔ ir kʊ fʊ bon go ɛ.’
N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ, a wʊ baraa na ba sɔɔ ir kʊ wʊ a jɔ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊn chɛnɛ ara kpãkpãana, wʊn wa ir kʊ wʊ jã a lɛ wʊn bʊɔrɔ.
“Lɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, yɩ sʊɔr, Nãaŋmɩn na kʊ yɩ naa. Yɩ kaa yɩn nyɛ naa, yɩ kpoor a pãn wʊn yuo naa.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sʊɔr, wʊn nyɛ naa, ka a 'lɔ mɩ na kaara nyɛ, ka a pãn mɩ yuo kʊ a 'lɔ na kpoor.
A yɩn na ɩ a sãamɩne, buor sʊɔ bie lɛ na sʊɔr wʊ jãm ka wʊ de waa kʊ wʊ.
Bɩɩ sʊɔr najɛl ka wʊ de lɔ̃ɔ kʊ wʊ?
Ala ɩ a yɩn gba na ɩ nɩdɛbɛ bɔ̃ɔn vɩla ma ɩ kʊ a yɩ bibiir, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an ɩ ka yɩ Sãa na be a saaju kʊ̃ de a Sɩɛ kʊ a bala na sʊɔr wʊ ɛ?”
Yesu dire naa a sɩdɛɛr na be daba yɔ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka wʊ ɩ wõo. A sɩdɛɛr na wa yi a daba 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka wʊ tʊ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ, ka nɛ'maa a nɩbɛ.
Tɩchɛ ka a bamɩne 'yɛrɛ, “A sɩdɛbɛ nãa Beeljebul lɛ wʊ de dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ.”
Ka a bamɩne mɩ bɛɛr wʊ kaara na ba bʊɔrɔ jãnɛ na yi saaju.
Yesu bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ban tɩɛrɛ na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nãa jaa na jɛɛrɛ nɩ a wʊ mãɛ a wʊ nãa na sɔ̃ɔ naa. Yir nɩbɛ mɩ na ir jɛɛrɛ taa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ 'mataa kpɛ ɛ.
Lɛ mɩ lɛ, ala ɩ a Satan lɩɛb jɛɛrɛ nɩ a wʊ mãɛ, ŋmɩnɛ a wʊ nãalʊ̃ʊ na ɩ ara? N 'yɛr naa nɩtɔ̃ bojũu yɩ 'yɛr ɩka a Beeljebul lɛ n de dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ.
Ala ɩ a Beeljebul lɛ n tara dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ, tɩ a bala na ɩ a yɩ poturbo bo lɛ ba tara dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ? A lɛ jũu, bala lɛ na ɩ a yɩ 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ lɛ n dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire wiil yɩn ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ wa naa a yɩ sɛ̃.
“Gãdaa na gu a wʊ yir nɩ jɛɛr bomo, a wʊ bonsɩ maa dam ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ wa wa naa na wʊ kpɛ̃mɛ gar wʊ, wʊn faan a wʊ jɛɛr bomo ala wʊn dɩɛl tɩ de a wʊ bonsɩ põn nɩbɛ.
“Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba be a n sɛ̃ ɛ, wʊ tara man nɩ 'yɛr, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba pʊɔ ma a sɩ kaala lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa ɛ, wʊ ma yɛ̃yɛl bar.
“Sɩdɛɛr ban wa dii bar ka wʊ yi nɩrɛ pɔ, wʊ ma chen dal pʊɔ ju tɩ bʊɔrɔ pɛ̃nfʊ jie, na waa nyɛ ɛ, na wʊ pãa wa 'yɛr, ‘Ɩn lɩɛb kul a nɩrɛ 'lɔ pɔ ɩn yi tɩ chɛ bar.’
Wʊn wa lɩɛb wa, wʊ nyɛn a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kaara yir kaar ban pɩɩr tɩ chɔɔr wʊ sʊ̃.
Ka wʊ pãa tɩ bɔ sɩɩr ayopõi na tara putuo gar wʊ ka ba chen tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a be. Ka a daba pãa ɩ dɛɛr gar a lɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ be.”
A nyãna lɛ a Yesu 'yɛrɛ ka a pɔɔ ŋme chɛlma be a nɩyɔɔ pɔ tɩ 'yɛr, “Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ a fʊ ma 'lɔ na dɔɔ fʊ, nɩ a wʊ bɩr fʊn 'yɛn.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, a bala na wõ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr na ba turo, bala lɛ ɩ a pʊpɛl dẽme.”
A nɩbɛ na waara 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ka Yesu 'yɛr, “A dɩna nɩbɛ banyãna ɩn putudẽme tɩ bʊɔrɔ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ka a na ɩ jãnɛ, tɩchɛ ba kʊ̃ nyɛ ãsʊɔ jaa ɛ, ka a Jona jãnɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Bojũu, lɛ a Jona na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ jãnɛ kʊ a Ninive dẽme, lɛ mɩ lɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie na ɩ a jãnɛ kʊ a dɩna nɩbɛ.
A Siba Pɔɔ Nãa na yin a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ daar na wʊ wa 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩn dɩna nɩbɛ 'yɛr, bojũu wʊ dɔ̃ɔ yi be a tẽtɛɛr wa chɛl a Nãa Solomon yɛ̃ 'yɛr, tɩchɛ yɩ kaa a 'lɔ na gar a Solomon ben ka.
A 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ daar Ninive nɩbɛ na ir 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩn dɩna nɩbɛ 'yɛr, bojũu ba lɩɛb ba tɩɛr a Jona na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊ ba, yɩ kaa a 'lɔ na gar a Jona ben ka.
