“Nɩrɛ jaa ba be na chʊm fãtɩn na wʊ sɔɔl bar ɛ, bɩɩ de laa kpa pɔɔ ɛ. Wʊ ma dɔɔl bar a dɔɔl fʊ jie, ka a bala na kpɩɛrɛ nyɛ a chãa.
A fʊ nɩbir ɩn a ãgãn fãtɩn. A fʊ nɩbie wa ɩ, a fʊ ãgãn wʊ jaa ma sɛɛn nɩ chãa. Tɩchɛ ala ba wa ɩ ɛ, a fʊ ãgãn wʊ jaa ma ɩn libe.
Yɩ kaara sʊ̃ ka a chãa 'lɔ na be a yɩ pɔ, taa lɩɛb libe ɛ,
A lɛ jũu, ala ɩ a chãa sɛɛn a fʊ ãgãn wʊ jaa ka a libe bãlãa jaa ba be be ɛ, wʊ jaa na ɩn chãa nɩtãa lɛ a fãtɩn na ma chaar fʊ a wʊ chãa.”
Yesu na wa 'yɛr baar, Farasee nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ bʊɔl wʊ naa ka wʊ tɩ di bʊ̃diir, lɛ lɛ wʊ chen tɩ kpɛ jãnɛ a bʊ̃diir par.
Tɩchɛ ka a Farasee nɩrɛ jʊrɔ a Yesu ka a ɩ waa pɛɛ a ba pɛɛfʊ ɛ, ka nɛɛ 'maa wʊ.
Be lɛ a Soro pãa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Faa nyɛ, a yɩn Faraseemɩne ma pɛɛr naa a ŋmama nɩ a laar dũkur, tɩchɛ ka a yɩ pʊɔ sɛɛn fɔlfʊ nɩ putuo.
Jɔlɔ banyã, a ba ɩ a 'lɔ na maal a yõo 'lɔ lɛ mɩ maal a pʊɔ ɛ?
Tɩchɛ a ala na be a laa pʊɔm, yɩ de kʊ a nɔ̃n dẽme ka a bonsɩ a jaa pãa vɩɛlɛ kʊ yɩ.

“Nɛbier ben a yɩn Faraseemɩne sɛ̃, bojũu bʊ̃bile jaa yɩn da lɔ̃ɔn badʊʊ gba vaar, yɩ ma ir a da ŋmaa tɩ na yɩ ĩin vɩla maalfʊ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn nʊ̃fʊ bar. Ala lɛ yɩn taa irɛ na yɩ ta ĩin a ala na de nie bar ba maal ɛ.
Nɛbier ben a yɩn Faraseemɩne sɛ̃, bojũu yɩ nʊ̃ naa a nɩbɛrɛ jaa jie a yɩ lɔ̃ɔfʊ yie pɔ na yɩ mɩ nʊ̃ a daa pɔ puorfʊ.
Nɛbier ben a yɩ sɛ̃, bojũu yɩ kaara naa fɩka yar nɩbɛ na ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ do yʊɔrɔ.”
Ka a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwile ãsʊɔ 'yɛr, “Wiwile, a anyãna fʊn 'yɛr, sɩ jaa lɛ fʊ 'mataa tʊrɔ.”
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr wʊ, “A yɩn Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɛbier ben a yɩ sɛ̃, bojũu yɩ ma tuon nɩbɛ tuor na tɩrɛ tɩ na yɩ maa ir a yɩ nubir gba tɩɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ɛ.
Nɛbier ben a yɩ sɛ̃, bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ bala a yɩ sãamɩne na kʊ, yɩn lɛ mɛ a ba yar.
A lɛ yɩn maal din dãasɩɛ ɩka a yɩ sãamɩne lɛ. Bala lɛ kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ka yɩ mɩ mɛ a ba yar.
A nɩtɔ̃ jũu lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ yɛ̃ sʊɔ 'yɛr, ‘N tʊ̃n a n 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ nɩ a n nɩtʊ̃nsɩ a ba sɛ̃, ka ban ir bamɩne kʊ tɩ ge bamɩne.’
A lɛ jũu, yele tuon a yɩn dɩna nɩbɛ. A Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ bala ban kʊ a kõr jaa, yɩn lɛ na yab a ba sãn.
Piel a Abel jãɩ sɔ̃ɔ tɩ tãn a Jekariya ban kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lofʊ jie nɩ a puorfʊ jie chara pɔ. Ɔ̃ɔ, n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka a yɩn dɩna nɩbɛ lɛ na yab a jaa sãn.
Nɛbier ben a yɩn Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe sɛ̃, bojũu yɩn lɛ tara a bɔ̃ɔfʊ pãn bir, yɩn mãɛ ba kpɩɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ pɔɔ var a bala na bʊɔrɔ a kpɛfʊ.”
Yesu yin a be wʊn 'yɛr a anyãna, ka a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe kpãkpãana wʊ nɩ suur sʊrɔ nɩ wʊ 'yɛr yɔɔ.
Na ba bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ 'yɛr 'yɛr lɩɛb nyɔɔ wʊ mãɛ.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ lɛ, a nɩyɔɔ turo turo tire taa na ba nɛɛrɛ taa, ka Yesu piel kpãana a wʊ poturbo na wʊ 'yɛrɛ, “Yɩ gu yɩ mãɛ a Faraseemɩne dãbɩl pɔ, ala lɛ ɩ a ba nɛɛr ayi.
Bon jaa ba be be na pɔɔ naa kʊ̃ wa yuo ɛ, bɩɩ sɔɔl ka ba kʊ̃ bɔ̃ɔn ɛ.
Ala yɩn 'yɛr libe pɔ, na yin chãa pɔ, ka ba wõ naa, ka a ala yɩn bʊl 'yɛr be a die pɔ, ban mʊɔl 'yɛr be a gar ju.
“N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ a yɩn na ɩ a n barmɩne ɩka, yɩ ta joro a bala na kʊ a yɩ ãgãn ɛ, tɩ na ba kʊ̃ lɛ tʊ̃ɔ yele jaa ɩ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ɩn wiil yɩ naa a 'lɔ yɩn na joro. Yɩ joro a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ɔ kʊ yɩ, tɩ lɛ tʊ̃ɔ lɔb yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a dɔɔyɛ jie. Ɔ̃ɔ, 'lɔ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ ɩka yɩ joro.
A ba ɩ kobsɩ ayi lɛ ba ma dãn tiitasɩ anũu ɛ? Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn maa ĩin a ba bʊ̃'yen bar ɛ.
Sɩrɛ jaa, Nãaŋmɩn sɔr a yɩ jukɔɔl a jaa bɔ̃ɔ, yɩ ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ, yɩ gar tiita yɔɔ.
“N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na wa 'yɛr chã a nɩbɛ niem, ɩka wʊ bɔ̃ɔ naa a maa Nɩsaal Bie, 'lɔ lɛ n mɩ na 'yɛr chã ɩka, n bɔ̃ɔ wʊ naa a Nãaŋmɩn malakasɩ niem.
Tɩchɛ 'lɔ mɩ na chiir ma a nɩbɛ niem, 'lɔ lɛ n mɩ na chiir a Nãaŋmɩn malakasɩ niem.
Nɩrɛ jaa na 'yɛr 'yɛr kpɛ̃n a maa Nɩsaal Bie na chɛnɛ na nyɛ vɛ̃ kʊ fʊ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na 'yɛr 'yɛrdɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʊ̃ nyɛ vɛ̃ kʊ fʊ ɛ.
Bala wa nyɔɔr yɩ chiin a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yie nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a kpãɛn dẽme sɛ̃, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a ɩ yɩ tɩɛr a lɛ yɩn na tɩ 'yɛr faa yɩ mãɛ ɛ, bɩɩ a lɛ yɩn na 'yɛr ɛ.
Bojũu a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na wiil yɩ naa a lɛ yɩn na 'yɛr.”
Ka nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ na be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Wiwile 'yɛr a n yɛbɛ ka wʊ ɩ a sɩ põ a kpĩi bonsɩ.”
A Yesu 'yɛr wʊ, “Daba, an 'yɔ̃ɔ ma ɩka n ɩ 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ naa põnõ yɩ kpĩi bomo?”
Tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ kaara sʊ̃, na yɩ gu yɩ mãɛ a bʊ̃yɔɔ bɔfʊ pɔ, nɩrɛ bʊ̃yɔɔ ba kʊrɔ wʊ nyɛvʊr ɛ.”
Be lɛ wʊ lɔb a sʊkpa nyã kʊ ba, “Danãa kɔ̃ɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be, na wʊ kɔ chɛ yɔɔ jaa a wʊ puo pɔ.
Na wʊ piel tɩɛrɛ ɩka ŋmɩnɛ lɛ wʊn ɩ, ‘Ɩn ba tara jie na bin a bonsɩ ɛ?’
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ ɩn ɩ, ‘Ɩn ŋmɛr a bobo anyãna bar, tɩ naa mɛ bʊ̃bɛrɛ naa su a chi 'yɔ̃ɔn a bonsɩ a be.
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʊ n mãɛ, ãgãn, pɛnɛ, n tara na bʊ̃yɔɔ ɩn bin kʊ n mãɛ yuon kʊ̃ bɔ̃ɔ sɔr ɛ. Ɩn dire naa, na n nyuro, na n chɩlɛ.’
Tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, ‘Jɔl nyã, fʊn kpin a tãsɔɔ nyãna, tɩ a bonsɩ ala fʊn bin kʊ a fʊ mãɛ, an lɛ na de?’
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ an be nɩrɛ jaa na bin bonsɩ kʊ a wʊ mãɛ, tɩ ba ɩ tara sʊɔ Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ.”
Kaa Yesu pãa 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo, “A lɛ jũu, n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, yɩ ta waala a yɩ nyɛvʊr 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, 'yɛrɛ ɩka bo lɛ yɩn di ɛ. Bɩɩ waala ɩka bo lɛ yɩn su pɔɔ a ãgãn ɛ.
A nyɛvʊr gar naa a bʊ̃diir, ka a ãgãn mɩ gar a fɔɔr.
Yɩ kaa a gagasɩ, ba maa bʊr ɛ, bɩɩ ŋma ɛ, bɩɩ tara boor ma bin ɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ guolo ba. Yɩn, yɩ gar a lubil.
A yɩ buor sʊɔ lɛ na waal na wʊ wa de bɩbir bʊ̃'yen pʊɔ a wʊ nyɛvʊr pɔ?
Ala ɩ yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ a yelbile nyãna ɩ ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ tɩɛrɛ a ala na chɛ?
“Yɩ kaa nyɛ a lɛ a bonsɩ puul na ma nʊ̃ɔ. Ba maa tʊ̃ ɛ, bɩɩ wob fuu su ɛ, tɩchɛ a nãa Solomon gba nɩ a wʊ bʊ̃tarsɩ ba dɔ̃ɔ su fuu ka wʊ vɩɛlɛ gar naa ɛ.
Ala ɩ nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn ma pãɛ a bonsɩ puul a mʊ̃ɔ pɔ ka a vɩɛlɛ a dɩna tɩchɛ ka a wɛr chaar ka a bũu di, wʊ kʊ̃ pãɛ a yɩn gar a lɛ ɛ? Yɩn sɔɔfʊ na ba jã bon ɛ.
Yɩ ta ir nyãa 'yɔ̃ɔ a ala yɩn na di bɩɩ nyũ pɔ ɛ, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a yɩ pɩla ɔɔrɔ ɛ.
Nɩrɛ jaa, ala puor lɛ ba turo, tɩchɛ a yɩ Sãa bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka yɩ bʊɔrɔ naa a bonsɩ anyãna.
Yɩ de nie bɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ, ka anyãna a jaa wʊn den pʊɔ yɩ.
“Yɩn piir na ba jã bon ɛ, yɩ ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ, bojũu a yɩ Sãa pʊɔ pɛl naa wʊn kʊ yɩ a wʊ nãalʊ̃ʊ.
Yɩ da a yɩ bonsɩ de a libie põ nɔ̃n dẽme, yɩn tara naa a libie wʊʊr ala na ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ. Ka a yɩ bʊ̃tarsɩ be a saaju, naa kʊ̃ wur ɛ. Nãnyie kʊ̃ gbʊr be ɛ, kpolo ba be be na mʊʊ ɛ.
Bojũu, a jie a yɩ bʊ̃tarsɩ na be, be lɛ a yɩ nyãa mɩ ma gã.
“Yɩ chɔɔr yɩ mãɛ gu tɩ chʊm a yɩ fãtɩnsɩ ka a lɩrɛ.
Yɩ kaara fɩka tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ na chɛlɛ a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ka wʊn yi a pɔɔ kulfʊ jie wa. 'Lɔ wa kpoor a pãn ban yuo wʊn a pãn ajienaa ka wʊ kpɛ.
An ɩn bɔɔsʊ̃n kʊ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ banyãna a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa nyɛ ba ka ba chɛnɛ jɛ̃ gu wʊ. Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka wʊn chɔɔr naa a wʊ mãɛ ka ba 'mataa jãnɛ a bʊ̃diir jie ka wʊ põ ba a bʊ̃diir.
An ɩn bɔɔsʊ̃n kʊ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ bala a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa nyɛ ban chɔɔr, ala ɩ gba ka tãsɔɔ põn lɛ bɩɩ, ka nɔrsɩ kõnõ naa.
Tɩchɛ yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a par, ɩka ala ɩ a yir sʊɔ bɔ̃ɔ naa a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a nãnyie na waara, wʊ kʊ̃ sɔɔ ka a nãnyie kar a pãn tɩ kpɛ a yir ɛ.
A yɩn mɩ yɩ chɔɔr gu, bojũu a maa Nɩsaal Bie na lɩɛb wa a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ yɩn ba lɛ tɩɛrɛ ma ɛ.”
Ka a Pita sʊʊr wʊ, “N Soro, sɩn lɛ fʊ lɔb a sʊkpa nyã kʊ bɩɩ nɩrɛ jaa lɛ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “An lɛ pãa ɩ a yelmãɛ nɩ a yɛ̃ sʊɔ, a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔ ka wʊ kaara wʊ a yir, na wʊ kʊrɔ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ a ba bʊ̃diir a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ na sɛɛ?
An ɩn bɔɔsʊ̃n kʊ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ nyãna a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa nyɛ wʊn ɩrɛ a lɛ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, wʊn vɛ̃n ka wʊ kaara a wʊ bonsɩ a jaa.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ nyãna tɩɛr a wʊ nyãa pɔ ɩka, a n nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kor a waa, tɩ piel pɔɔrɔ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ bala na be a yir, tɩ pãa ma di na wʊ nyũ buu.
A tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ nyãna, a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa dũu wʊ naa a bɩbir 'lɔ wʊn ba tɩɛrɛ nɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʊn ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ. Wʊn ŋma wʊn jaa gbʊl gbʊl, tɩ lɔb wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na ba sɔɔ de pɔ ɛ.
A tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ 'lɔ na bɔ̃ɔ lɛ a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na bʊɔrɔ tɩ na waa chɔɔr tʊ̃n a lɛ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na bʊɔrɔ ɛ, wʊn nyɛn ŋmefʊ yɔɔ.
Tɩchɛ a 'lɔ na ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ maal bɔr ban ŋme wʊn jaa bãlãa. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ ban kʊ yɔɔ ban bʊɔrɔ na yɔɔ yi a wʊ sɛ̃, fʊ̃ʊ nũu pɔ ban 'yɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ, fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ban sʊʊr yɔɔ.
“Bũu lɛ n waan ɩka n wa 'yɔ̃ɔ a wɛr pɔ, ɩn taa bʊɔrɔ naa ala ɩ a ben ta 'lɩrɛ.
Tɩchɛ n chɛnɛ tara yele ɩn na ɩ Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ sofʊ kaar ka a ɩ ma tɩɛr tɩ tãn ɩn na wa baar.
Yɩ maa tãan nɛbʊ̃'yen yele lɛ n waan a wɛr pɔ bɩɩ? Kai, n 'yɛr kʊ yɩ, tɩchɛ ootaa lɛ n waan.
An yi a dɩna nɩbɛ anũu na kpɩɛrɛ yir na ŋman jiir ayi. Ka ata jɛɛrɛ nɩ a ayi ka ayi mɩ jɛɛrɛ nɩ a ata.
Ban ooro nɩ taa, sãa na oon bie ka a bie mɩ oo a sãa, ka a ma oo a bipɔɔ ka a bipɔɔ mɩ oo a ma. Pɔɔ na oo naa a wʊ bidaba pɔɔ, ka a bidaba pɔɔ mɩ oo a wʊ sɩrɛ ma.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a nɩyɔɔ bala, “Yɩn wa nyɛ julõjuur na ire a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ mʊrfʊ jie yɩ ma 'yɛr ɩka saa na wa naa, ka a ma ɩ a lɛ.
Yɩn wa nyɛ sɛsɛbɛ mɩ na furo duoro jũu, yɩ ma 'yɛr ɩka tʊl na wa naa. Ka a ma ɩ a lɛ.
A yɩn nɛɛr ayi dẽme banyãna. Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a tẽe nɩ a saaju 'yɛr ma 'yɛr, ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ a dɩna 'yɛr 'yɛr ɛ?
“Bo lɛ so ka yɩn mãɛ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ tɔɔr a lɛ na tor ɛ?
An ɩ a yɩn nɩ a yɩ sãn sʊɔ lɛ 'mataa chiine, yɩ mʊlɔ wʊ a sɔr pɔ, ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, wʊn de yɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ a 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ nũu pɔ, ka wʊ de yɩ kʊ a nɩpɔɔrɔ ka wʊ mɩ pɔɔ yɩ bar.
N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, ala be ɩ a lɛ, faa be na wa yi ka faa yab a fʊ sãn baar ɛ.”
Nɩbɛ bamɩne mɩ ben be a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, na ba pãa mana kʊrɔ a Yesu a lɛ a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Pilate na dɔ̃ɔ kʊ a Galilee dɔɔr bamɩne, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban be a bɔɔr lofʊ jie.
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ tɩɛr ɩka bala lɛ maal dɛɛr gar a Galilee nɩbɛ ba jaa, ala lɛ so ban di a dɔɔyɛ nyã bɩɩ?
A ba ɩ lɛ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka yɩn ba wa lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr ɛ, yɩ mɩ na wɛ naa.
Bɩɩ a nɩbɛ pie nɩ aniin (18) bala a jiwõo 'lɔ na kar lo kʊ a Siloam, yɩ tɩɛr ɩka bala lɛ maal yeldɛɛr gar a bala jaa na kpɩɛrɛ a Jerusalɛm bɩɩ?
N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩn mɩ baa lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr ɛ, yɩ mɩ na wɛ naa.”
A sʊkpa nyã lɛ Yesu pãa lɔb kʊ ba, “Daba kɔ̃ɔ lɛ tara kɔ̃kɔ̃tɩɛ a wʊ puo pɔ, a wʊ wa chen ɩka wʊ tɩ kaa a tɩɛ wɔ̃n bɩɩ, tɩchɛ a tɩɛ ba wɔ̃ ɛ.
Be lɛ wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ wʊn vɛ̃ ka wʊ kaara a puo, ‘Bojũu, yuom ata nɩ nyã ɩn yɔ ka, ma bʊɔrɔ a wɔ̃mɔ̃ ɩka n pɔr tɩ ma wa bɔ faa. Ŋmaa wʊ lɔb, ŋmɩnɛ an ɩ ka wʊ pii a wɛr ara nɩ?’
Ka a 'lɔ na kaara a puo 'yɛr, ‘Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, bar wʊ ka n tuu jilʊ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ pʊɔr ka yuon waara,
'lɔ wa wɔ̃ go, tɩ 'lɔ ba wa wɔ̃ ɛ, ka n ŋmaa wʊ lɔb.’ ”
A Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar Yesu ben a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir ãsʊɔ pɔ wile ba,
be lɛ a pɔɔ be a sɩdɛbɛ na maal ka wʊ kab gʊ̃mɔ̃ yuom pie nɩ aniin (18), wʊ maa tʊ̃ɔ dɔl ɛ.
Yesu na nyɛ a pɔɔ a lɛ, wʊ bʊɔl wʊ naa ka wʊ wa a wʊ sɛ̃, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Pɔɔ, a fʊ baal bar fʊ naa.”
Tɩ na wʊ pãa de a wʊ nũu dɔɔl a pɔɔ, ka a pɔɔ dɔl ajienaa na wʊ pɛɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn.

Tɩchɛ ka a suur kpɛ a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir nɩdier Yesu na sãa a baalaa a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar jũu, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ, “Bibie ayʊɔb ben be ka nɩrɛ na de tʊ̃n tʊ̃mɔ̃, yɩ ma wa ka wʊ sãana yɩ a ber ala pɔ, yɩ ta ma waara a Pɛ̃nfʊ Daar ɛ.”
Ka a Soro 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Yɩn nɛɛr ayi dẽme banyãna, a yɩ buor sʊɔ lɛ maa yuo a wʊ niin bɩɩ a wʊ bon chiin tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ kʊ̃ɔ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir ɛ?
Ka a pɔɔ nyãna na ɩ a Abraham bipɔɔ, a tɩɩ na lũ yuom pie nɩ aniin (18), a ba sɛɛ ɩka wʊ for a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar bɩɩ?”
Wʊn wa 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ ka a vĩ kpɛ a bala jaa na bɛrɛ wʊ a nɛɛ, tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ chɩlɛ a tʊ̃vɩɛlɛ ala wʊn tʊ̃.
A Yesu pãa 'yɛr, “Bo lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ nyɛtãan? Bo lɛ ɩn de man?
Wʊ kaara fɩka kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ bir nɩrɛ na de bʊr a puo pɔ ka wʊ bul na wʊ ɩ tɩɛ, ka a lubil wa 'yɔ̃ɔ choor a wilsɩ ju.”
Wʊ lɛ sʊʊr ban go, “Bo lɛ ɩn de a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ man?
Wʊ kaara fɩka dãbɩl pɔɔ na de 'yɔ̃ɔ jɔ̃ yɔɔ pɔ ka a ir vʊ̃.”
Yesu wile naa nɩbɛ be a tẽbɛrɛ nɩ a tẽbil ala pɔ tɩ na wʊn chen Jerusalɛm.
Be lɛ a nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ sʊʊr wʊ, “N Soro, nɩbɛ bãlãa tɛɛ lɛ na nyɛ faafʊ bɩɩ?” Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba,
“Yɩ mɔ̃ tu a dɔ̃dɔ̃ bile pɔ kpɛ, n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka nɩyɔɔ lɛ na mʊɔrɔ bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba kpɛ tɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ kpɛ ɛ.
A yir sʊɔ na wa ir pɔɔ a pãn var yɩ bar be a yõo, ka yɩ ara kpooro sʊɔrɔ, ‘Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, yuo sɩ a pãn.’ Tɩchɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ yɩ, ‘N ba bɔ̃ɔ yɩ ɛ, bɩɩ a jie yɩn yi ɛ.’
Ka yɩ pãa 'yɛrɛ, ‘Sɩn nɩ fʊ̃ʊ jaa 'mantaa di tɩ nyũ, a fʊ wiil sɩ be a sɩ tẽe sãlsɔɔ.’
Tɩchɛ ka wʊn 'yɛr, ‘N ba bɔ̃ɔ yɩ ɛ, bɩɩ a jie yɩn yi ɛ, yɩ tɔɔ yi tɩ chɛ ma a yɩn na tʊ̃nɔ̃ a dɛbɛ.’
“Be lɛ yɩn kõnõ ɔɔrɔ a nyɩmɛ, yɩn wa nyɛ a Abraham, Isaakɩ nɩ Jekɔb nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ba jaa be a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a yɩn 'lɔ be a yõo.
Nɩbɛ na yin a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ purfʊ jie, a mʊrfʊ jie, a jũu nɩ a par na ba wa jãnɛ dire be a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.
Sɩrɛ jaa, nɩbɛ ben puor tɩ na ban wa de nie, ka a bala mɩ na be a niem mɩ wa be a puor.”
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ lɛ a Faraseemɩne bamɩne wa a Yesu sɛ̃ wa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Yi a ka chen jiyuo. A Hɛrɔd bʊɔrɔ na a fʊ kʊfʊ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ chen tɩ 'yɛr a mɔbaa 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, ɩn dii naa a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi ka n sãa a nɩbɛ baalsɩ a dɩna nɩ bio ka a dayere daar ka n baar a n tʊ̃mɔ̃.
Lɛ jaa an ɩ, ɩn chɛnɛ na chiine a dɩna nɩ bio nɩ a dayere. Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ kʊ̃ kpi ka Jerusalɛm ba lɛ ɛ.

“Gboo yɩn Jerusalɛm dẽme, yɩn lɛ ma kʊrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ tɩ lɔɔrɔ a bala Nãaŋmɩn na tʊ̃ a yɩ sɛ̃ nɩ kʊsɩbɛ. N ma bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka n kaal a fʊ bibiir 'mataa nɩtãa lɛ nʊ̃ɔ na ma kaal a wʊ bil 'mataa a wʊ pɩrɛ pɔ, tɩ yɩ maa sɔɔ ɛ.
Yɩ nyɛ, a yɩ yir na lɩɛb dakpolo, tɩ ka n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka yɩ kõ lɛ nyɛ ma go ɛ, tɩ tãn a daar 'lɔ yɩn na 'yɛr, ‘Nãaŋmɩn wʊ sʊ̃ʊ a 'lɔ wʊn tʊ̃!’ ”
A Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir ãsʊɔ daar, Yesu chen a Faraseemɩne nɩdiere ãsʊɔ yir difʊ jie ka ba jʊrɔ wʊ.
Be lɛ ka daba kɔ̃ɔ na tara a baal vʊ̃ naa ara a wʊ niem.
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ bɔ̃ɔnbɔ, “A tara na sɔr ka fʊn sãa nɩrɛ na bɩɛrɛ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir bɩɩ a ba tara sɔr ɛ?”
Tɩchɛ ka ba ɩ jaa gbulo, ka Yesu de a nũu dɔɔl a daba sãa a wʊ baal tɩ bar wʊ sɔr.
Tɩ na wʊ pãa sʊʊr ba, “Ala ɩ a yɩ ãsʊɔ bie bɩɩ a wʊ nadar lon bulo pɔ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir, wʊ kʊ̃ chen tɩ ir wʊ fɔfɔɔ jaa bɩɩ?”
Baa lɛ tara 'yɛr na 'yɛr ɛ.
Yesu nyɛn a nɩbɛ bala ban bʊɔl ɩka ba wa di, ka ba tuur a nɩbɛrɛ jaa jiir jãnɛ, ka wʊ lɔb a sʊkpa nyã kʊ ba,
“Nɩrɛ wa bʊɔl fʊ pɔɔ kulfʊ jie, fʊ̃ʊ wa chen ta tɩ jãnɛ a nɩbɛrɛ jaa jie ɛ, amɩne wʊ bʊɔl nɩrɛ na gar fʊ ka wʊn wa.
Ala wa ɩ a lɛ, wʊn wa 'yɛr fʊ naa, ‘Ir, ka a daba nyã jãnɛ a fʊ jaa jie.’ Vĩ lɛ fʊn ir tɩ jãnɛ nɩ a puor.
Tɩchɛ bala wa bʊɔl fʊ, tɩ jãnɛ a puor, ka a 'lɔ na bʊɔl fʊ wa 'yɛr, ‘N badaba wa jãnɛ ka a niem, be lɛ fʊn pãa vʊ̃ a fʊ taaba niem.’
Bojũu, nɩrɛ jaa na 'mɔɔrɔ wʊ mãɛ saaju, Nãaŋmɩn na siir wʊ naa, 'lɔ mɩ na siir a wʊ mãɛ, Nãaŋmɩn na 'mɔɔ wʊn saaju.”

Ka Yesu pãa 'yɛr kʊ a 'lɔ na bʊɔl wʊ, “Fʊ̃ʊ wa bʊɔl nɩrɛ ɩka wʊ wa di, taa wa bʊɔlɔ a fʊ barmɩne, bɩɩ a fʊ yɛɛr, bɩɩ a fʊ bal nɩbɛ, bɩɩ a fʊ tɔ dẽme bala na ɩ tara dẽme ɛ. Ala ɩ fʊ ɩn a lɛ, ban bʊɔl fʊn daar kɔ̃ɔ tɩ yaa a sãn.
Tɩchɛ fʊ̃ʊ wa bʊɔlɔ nɩbɛ ɩka ba wa di, bʊɔl a nɔ̃n dẽme, nɩ a gbɛrsɩ, nɩ a nɩbaalsɩ, nɩ a jɔ̃n.
Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na sʊ̃ʊ. Ban ba tara bon na yab fʊ ɛ, fʊ̃ʊ lɛ na nyɛ sãyar a lɛ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ na wa ir a kũu pɔ ɩ vʊ ɛ.”
Ka a bala na lɔ̃ɔ dire ãsʊɔ na wõ a nɩtɔ̃, na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “An ɩn bɔɔsʊ̃n kʊ a 'lɔ na wa jãnɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ dire.”
Be lɛ a Yesu lɔb a sʊkpa nyã, “Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ chɔɔrɔ na wʊ bʊɔlɔ nɩyɔɔ ɩka ba wa di.
A sɔ̃ɔ na wa ta, wʊ tʊ̃n a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ ɩka wʊ chen tɩ 'yɛr a bala wʊn bʊɔl ɩka wʊ maal yele a jaa baar.
Tɩchɛ ka a ba ãsʊɔ jaa 'yɛr ɩka ba kʊ̃ nyɛ jie ɛ. Ka a 'lɔ ban dɔ̃ɔ ta ka wʊ 'yɛr, ‘N dãn popaalaa naa chiine ɩka n tɩ kaa, n kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ tɩ ɛ.’
Ka a ãsʊɔ mɩ 'yɛr, ‘N dãn narkʊɔrsɩ pie naa jãna n kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ tɩ ɛ.’
Ka a ãsʊɔ mɩ 'yɛr, ‘Pɔɔ lɛ n de n kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ tɩ be ɛ.’

“A tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ lɩɛb wa 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ kʊ a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, ka a suur kpɛ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃, ‘Lɩɛb chen fɔfɔɔ jaa a tẽe sãlsɔɔ nɩ a kõkorsɩ pɔ, na fʊ tɩ bʊɔl a nɔ̃n dẽme, a gbɛrsɩ, jɔ̃n nɩ a nɩbaalsɩ waan.’
Ka a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ wa 'yɛr, ‘Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, n ɩ naa a lɛ fʊn 'yɛr ɩka n ɩ, tɩchɛ ka a jie chɛnɛ be be.’
Be lɛ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ pãa lɛ 'yɛr kʊ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃, ‘Yi chen a sɔɩ pɔ, nɩ a sɛɛr pɔ tɩ bʊɔl nɩbɛ waan ka n yir wa sɛɛ.
N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka ãsʊɔ jaa kʊ̃ lɛ̃ maa ɛ.’ ”
Yesu nɩ a nɩyɔɔ 'mantaa chiine, ka wʊ lɩɛb kaa ba tɩ 'yɛr,
“Ala ɩ nɩrɛ na wa naa a n sɛ̃, na waa 'laar a wʊ sãa nɩ a wʊ ma, nɩ a wʊ pɔɔ, a wʊ bibiir, a wʊ yɛɛr nɩ a wʊ yɛpɔbɔ 'matãan a wʊ mãɛ nyɛvʊr ɛ, wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ɩ a n poturo ɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na ba de a wʊ daa tuo turo nɩ ma ɛ, wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ɩ a n poturo ɛ.
“Ala ɩ a yɩ ãsʊɔ bʊɔrɔ na yir kpɛ̃ɛ mɛfʊ, a ba ɩ wʊn den nie jãnɛ guor kaa ala ɩ wʊ tara naa a libie na tʊ̃ɔ mɛn baar ɛ?
Na wʊ taa kpar a yir tɩ ba tʊ̃ɔ baar ɛ, ka a wʊ taaba nyɛ laara wʊ
'yɛrɛ, ‘Jaal piel a mɛfʊ tɩ na waa baar ɛ.’
Bɩɩ nãbuor lɛ bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ tɩ jɛb a wʊ nãa tɔ sʊɔ na waa de nie jãnɛ kaa ɩka wʊn tʊ̃ɔ de a wʊ nɩbɛ turo pie (10,000) tɩ jɛb a 'lɔ na waara nɩ a wʊ nɩbɛ turo lɩjɛr (20,000) ɔ?
Ala ɩ wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ɛ, wʊn tʊ̃n nɩbɛ ka ba chen tɩ 'maal a nãa 'lɔ na chɛnɛ be a tɛɛr.
Lɛ mɩ lɛ, a yɩ ãsʊɔ jaa baa bar a wʊ bonsɩ a jaa ɛ, wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ɩ a n poturo ɛ.
“Nyaar ɩ naa, tɩchɛ a wʊ nʊ̃ɔ wa baar, ŋmɩnɛ ban lɛ ɩ wʊ ka wʊ lɛ nʊ̃mɔ̃ go?
Wa vɩɛl kʊ a tãpuor tãna ɛ, ban lɔb bar. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara toor wõnõ, vɛ̃ ka wʊ wõ naa.”
A lõpodierbe nɩ a tʊ̃dɛtʊ̃nbɔ lɔ̃ɔn taa na chɛl a Yesu 'yɛr.
Tɩchɛ ka a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe hũhũnõ 'yɛrɛ, “A daba nyã diere naa tʊ̃dɛtʊ̃nbɔ ka ba 'mataa dire.”
A Yesu pãa lɔb a sʊkpa nyã kʊ ba,
“Ala ɩ a yɩ ãsʊɔ tara na piir kɔbaa ka a bʊ̃'yen wa bɔr, a ba ɩ wʊn bar a kɔbaa forbir ala a pɛchiin baa pɔ, tɩ yʊɔrɔ bʊɔrɔ a bʊ̃'yen 'lɔ tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ jaa wʊn wa tɩ nyɛ wʊ bɩɩ?
'Lɔ wa nyɛ a pɛr nʊ̃ɔ ma kpɛ wʊ naa ka wʊ 'mɔɔ dɔɔl bɔɔ ju
kulo nɩ a yir, tɩ pãa bʊɔlɔ a wʊ barmɩne nɩ a wʊ taaba lɔ̃ɔ taa tɩ 'yɛr, ‘Yɩ pʊɔ ma chɩlɛ, bojũu n nyɛ naa a n pɛr 'lɔ na bɔr.’
N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka a lɛ nɛ nɩ wʊ ju mɩ lɛ, chɩl kpɛ̃ɛ na ben a saaju a tʊ̃dɛtʊ̃nɔ̃ bʊ̃'yen na lɩɛb a wʊ tɩɛr gar a kɔbaa forbir bala na ba tara tɩɛr lɩɛb fʊ ɛ.
“Bɩɩ pɔɔ buor lɛ tara libibie pie ka ãsʊɔ bɔr, wʊ kʊ̃ chʊm bũu den saar pɩɩr a die wʊ jaa na wʊ wa tɩ nyɛ wʊ bɩɩ?
'Lɔ wa nyɛ wʊ, wʊ ma bʊɔl a wʊ barmɩne nɩ a wʊ taaba lɔ̃ɔ taa tɩ 'yɛr, ‘Yɩ pʊɔ ma chɩlɛ, n nyɛ naa a n libir na bɔr.’
Lɛ nɛ nɩ wʊ ju mɩ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, nʊ̃ɔ mɩ na kpɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn malakasɩ ala ɩ a tʊ̃dɛtʊ̃nɔ̃ bʊ̃'yen lɩɛb a wʊ tɩɛr.”
Yesu chɛnɛ na 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ ba, “Daba lɛ tara wʊ dabil ayi.
Ka a bile sʊɔ wa 'yɛr kʊ a sãa, ‘N sãa, põ a fʊ kpĩi bomo ir a n bon kʊ ma.’ Ka a sãa de a wʊ kpĩi bomo põ ba.
A ba kor ɛ, ka a bile 'lɔ lɔ̃ɔ taa a wʊ bonsɩ a jaa yi chiin tẽyuo pɔ, na wʊ tɩ bũbur a bonsɩ sɔ̃ɔ a jaa bar.
Wʊn wa sɔ̃ɔ a jaa baar, ka a kɔ̃ lo a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ, ka a wõm piel kpɛ wʊ.
Wʊ chen a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ yir tɩ bɔ tʊ̃mɔ̃, ka a nɩrɛ 'lɔ ma tʊ̃ wʊ ka wʊ chen a puo pɔ tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ dor bʊ̃diir.
A jɔ̃ pɛbɛ ala ma ɩrɛ wʊn vɔlaa ka wʊ bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ 'wɔb tɩɩ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ jaa maa kʊ wʊ bon ɛ.
“Ka a yɛ̃ wa wʊ ka wʊ 'yɛr, ‘N sãa tara na tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ a ŋmɩnɛ a ba ma di bʊ̃diir faa, tɩchɛ ka a maa wa kpire nɩ kɔ̃ ka?
Ɩn lɩɛb kul a n sãa sɛ̃ naa tɩ 'yɛr wʊ, n maal dɛɛr Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ nɩ a fʊ sɛ̃.
N ba lɛ chɛnɛ sɛɛ ka ban bʊɔl ma a fʊ bie ɛ, maal ma ka n ɩ a fʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ ãsʊɔ.’
Lɛ wʊ ir kulo a sãa sɛ̃. Tɩchɛ wʊn chɛnɛ be a nɩdaa waara, a sãa nyɛ wʊ naa ka nɩbaal kpɛ wʊ ka wʊ jotuor a bie kõr tɩ puor wʊ.
Ka a bidaba 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, ‘N sãa, n maal dɛɛr Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ nɩ a fʊ sɛ̃, n ba lɛ sɛɛn ka ban bʊɔl ma a fʊ bie go ɛ.’
Tɩchɛ ka a sãa 'yɛr kʊ a gbãgbaar, ‘Yɩ pɔɔ fɔɔ tɩ de fuu nyã na vɩɛlɛ wa su wʊ, na yɩ de bɔ̃bile 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ a nubir pɔ, na yɩ de nafɔbɔ wa su wʊ.
Yɩ tɩ kaa nele na 'wɔr na yɩ waan wa kʊ ka sɩ 'wɔb tɩ chɩlɛ.
Bojũu a n bidaba nyãna dɔ̃ɔ kpi tɩ lɛ ir ɩ vʊr, wʊ dɔ̃ɔ bɔr tɩ sɩ lɛ nyɛ wʊ.’ Ka ba piel chɩlɛ.
“Tɩchɛ ka a bidakpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ be a puo pɔ, na wʊ wa ir waara, wʊn wa gbʊrɔ a yir wʊ wõn bãnɛ nɩ chɛlsɩ.
Be lɛ wʊ bʊɔl a gbãgbaa ãsʊɔ na wʊ sʊʊr a yelnyɩnɛ na be be.
Ka a gbãgbaa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, ‘A fʊ yɛbile lɛ wa ka a fʊ sãa ɩ a ba kʊ nel'wɔr jaa, bojũu wʊ nyɛn a wʊ bie na lɩɛb wa nɩ lãafɩɛ tɩ chɛnɛ kpɛ̃mɛ.’
A suur kpɛ a yɛkarma ka wʊ jɛ, waa kpɛ ɛ. Ka a sãa yi 'maala wʊ ɩka wʊ kpɛ.

Tɩchɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a sãa, ‘Nyɛ lɛ ɩn wõnõ a fʊ toor naa tʊ̃nɔ̃ kʊrɔ fʊ a yuom anyãna a jaa, n ba gɔ̃ɔ fʊ nɛɛ jaa ɛ. Tɩchɛ faa mɩ wa kʊ ma bule gba ɩka, n mɩ kʊ ka maa nɩ a n barmɩne mɩ 'mataa di tɩ chɩlɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a fʊ bibawõno nyãna na de a fʊ bonsɩ yin ka a 'lɔ nɩ a pɔɔ baar tɩ 'mataa sɔ̃ɔ bar, tɩ lɩɛb wa a yir ka fʊ ir kʊ nel'wɔr kʊ wʊ.’
Ka a sãa 'yɛr, ‘Fʊ̃ʊ 'lɔ, fʊ ben a n sɛ̃, ka a bomo a jaa ɩn tara ɩ a fʊ bonsɩ.
Tɩchɛ a sɛɛ naa ka sɩn dãɛnɛ na sɩ chɩlɛ bojũu a fʊ yɛbile nyãna dɔ̃ɔ kpi tɩ lɛ ɩ vʊr go, na wʊ dɔ̃ɔ bɔr tɩ sɩ lɛ nyɛ wʊ.’ ”
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo ɩka, “Taraa sʊ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be, na wʊ tara nɩrɛ na kaara wʊ a bonsɩ, na wʊ pʊ̃pʊrɔ bara.
Ka wʊ bʊɔl wʊ waan wa sʊʊr, ‘N wõn ban 'yɛrɛ a fʊ 'yɛr yʊɔrɔ nɩ, man a lɛ fʊn tʊ̃ kʊ ma, bojũu fʊ kʊ̃ lɛ tʊ̃ɔ tʊ̃ a tʊ̃mɔ̃ ɛ.’
Ka a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ mãɛ, ‘Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ɩn pãa ɩ a pʊ̃pãanyã? A n nɩkpɛ̃ɛ faa man a tʊ̃mɔ̃, n mɩ ba lɛ kpɛ̃mɛ na tʊ̃ɔ kɔ ɛ, a mɩ na ɩn vĩ ɩn na sʊɔrɔ.
N bɔ̃ɔ lɛ ɩn na ɩ maa ba lɛ wa tara tʊ̃mɔ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka nɩbɛ chɛnɛ de ma a ba yie.’
Be lɛ wʊ bʊɔl a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sãma dẽme ba jaa na wʊ sʊʊr a 'lɔ na de nie, ‘A ŋmɩnɛ lɛ fʊ di a n nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sãn?’
Ka wʊ 'yɛr, ‘Kãlaar kɔbaa (100) lɛ n di a sãn.’ Ka a 'lɔ na kaara a bonsɩ 'yɛr, ‘De a gãn nyãna jɛn fɔɔ jaa na fʊ sɛb lɩjaayi nɩ pie (50).’
Tɩ na wʊ lɛ sʊʊr a ayi sʊɔ, ‘A ŋmɩnɛ fʊ mɩ di a n nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sãn?’ Ka wʊ 'yɛr, ‘Chi bɔtɔr kɔbaa (100) sãn lɛ n di.’ Ka wʊ 'yɛr, ‘De a fʊ gãn na fʊ sɛb lɩjaa naar 'yɔ̃ɔ (80).’
Ka a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ dãn a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ nyãna na ba tara yelmãɛ ɛ, bojũu wʊ tɩɛr nɩdaar. A wɛr nyã nɩbɛ tara na yɛ̃ a ba taaba jie gar a chãa nɩbɛ.
“N 'yɛr na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, yɩ de a wɛr nyã bʊ̃tarsɩ na yɩ ŋman barmɩne ala wa baar, Nãaŋmɩn na de yɩn kpɛ̃n a yir kpo kpo 'lɔ pɔ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na tara yelmãɛ nɩ a bʊ̃bile, wʊn tara naa yelmãɛ nɩ a bʊ̃yɔɔ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa mɩ na ba tara yelmãɛ nɩ a bʊ̃bile ɛ, wʊ kʊ̃ mɩ tara yelmãɛ nɩ a bʊ̃yɔɔ ɛ.
Ala ɩ yaa tara yelmãɛ nɩ a wɛr bʊ̃tarsɩ ɛ, an lɛ na sɔɔ de a yelmãɛ bomo kʊ yɩ?
Ala ɩ yaa tara yelmãɛ nɩ nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ bon ɛ, an lɛ na kʊ yɩ a yɩ bon?
Gbãgbaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ tʊ̃ kʊ nɩbɛrɛ ayi ɛ, wʊn nʊ̃n ãsʊɔ tɩ 'laar ãsʊɔ, bɩɩ wʊn wõnõ na ãsʊɔ toor tɩ ba wõnõ ãsʊɔ toor ɛ. Yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ tʊ̃ kʊ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ libie ɛ.”
A Faraseemɩne na nʊ̃ libie na wõ a lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr, ka ba laara wʊ.
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ ma maal yɩ mãɛ nɩtorsɩ a nɩbɛ niem, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn bɔ̃ɔn a yɩ tɩɛr. Bon 'lɔ nɩbɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn bʊ̃chiiraa.
“A Mosesɩ Nɛɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ 'yɛr wa tãn a Jɔɔn sɔ̃ɔ. An yi a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʊ jaa, ba 'yɛr naa a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr sʊ̃n ka a ãsʊɔ jaa mʊɔrɔ wʊ sɔr, ɩka wʊ kpɛ.
An ɩn kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ kʊ a saaju nɩ a tẽe ka a po tal, gar a Nɛɛ 'yɛr bir na yi lo.
Nɩrɛ jaa na dii a wʊ pɔɔ bar tɩ kul pɔɔ yuo, wʊ maal dɛɛr, ka a daba 'lɔ mɩ na kul a pɔɔ a sɩrɛ na dii bar, mɩ maal dɛɛr.
“Tara sʊɔ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be, na wʊ ma su kparsɩ nɩ fuu pɩɛl na wʊ dire bʊ̃nʊ̃n bɩbir jaa.
Ka a sʊsʊɔrɔ kɔ̃ɔ yuor na di Lajarusɩ mɩ be be na ɩ natɩnara ma jãnɛ a tara sʊɔ dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ.
Na wʊ ma bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ nyɛ a bʊ̃di pʊr pʊr ala a tara sʊɔ na dire ka a ŋmara loro, ka a baar gba ma wa lɛnɛ a wʊ natɩɛ.
A sʊsʊɔrɔ nyãna wa kpi naa, ka a malakasɩ wa de wʊ chiine tɩ bin a Abraham sɛ̃. Ka a tara sʊɔ 'lɔ mɩ wa kpi ka ba ũu wʊ.
“A be a kpĩisɩ tẽe, ka a ɩ dɔɔyɛ jie lɛ, ka wʊ gbã nyɛ Abraham tɛɛr jaa ka a Lajarusɩ jãnɛ a wʊ lõboor.
Be lɛ wʊ bʊɔl, ‘N sãa Abraham, kaa n nɩbaal tɩ na fʊ tʊ̃ a Lajarusɩ ka wʊ 'me kʊ̃ɔ nɩ nubir wa 'maan ma jãlbir, bojũu a wõnõ ma naa ka a bũu pɔ.’
Tɩchɛ ka a Abraham 'yɛr, ‘N bie, tɩɛr kaa fʊn dɔ̃ɔ be a wɛr pɔ dire nʊ̃ɔ, tɩchɛ ka a Lajarusɩ mɩ dire dɔɔyɛ, pʊ̃pãanyã, wʊ mɩ dire naa a nʊ̃ɔ tɩchɛ ka fʊ mɩ dire a dɔɔyɛ.
A nyã gba ba ɩ yele ɛ, a bɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛ nyã na be a sɩ chara pɔ, ka a bala na bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba yi a ka tɩ a yɩ sɛ̃ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ɛ, ãsʊɔ jaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ yi a be tɩ mɩ wa a sɩ sɛ̃ ɛ.’
“Ka wʊ lɔb nũu 'yɛr, ‘Yãayãaabɩlɛ lɛ n sʊɔrɔ, n sãa, tʊ̃ a Lajarusɩ ka wʊ kul a be a sãa yir,
n tara na yɛɛr anũu wʊ tɩ kpãa ba ka ba taa ɩrɛ mɩ wa wa a dɔɔyɛ nyã pɔ ɛ.’
Ka Abraham 'yɛr, ‘Mosesɩ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ a lɛ ban sɛb bin ben a ba sɛ̃, ba chɛlɛ a ala ban 'yɛrɛ.’
Ka wʊ 'yɛr, ‘Kai n sãa Abraham, ala ɩ nɩrɛ lɛ ir a kũu pɔ tɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba ban lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr.’
Ka a Abraham 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, ‘Ala ɩ ba kʊ̃ chɛl a lɛ a Mosesɩ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na 'yɛr lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr ɛ, nɩrɛ sɔɔ ir kũu pɔ tɩ 'yɛr an ɩn pɔrɔ.’ ”
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo, “Yelsɩ ala na vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ ɩ bier ben be na wa, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jie an tu wa ben pɔ'yɔ̃ɔ fʊ pɔ.
A nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, bala 'mɔɔ nɩɛr lũ yɔɔl a nyĩe pɔ daa lɔb a man kʊ̃ɔ pɔ, ala sa wʊn na vɛ̃ ka a bʊ̃bil banyãna ãsʊɔ ɩ bier.
Yɩ guro yɩ mãɛ, ala ɩ fʊ yɛbɛ maal fʊn dɛɛr gɔ̃ wʊ, 'lɔ wa de a bɔrfʊ vɛ̃ kʊ wʊ.
Ala ɩ a bɩbir bʊ̃'yen pɔ lɛ wʊ maal fʊ dɛɛr gbɛɛ ayopõi tɩ mɩ lɩɛb wa a gbɛɛ ayopõi wa de bɔrfʊ, vɛ̃ kʊ wʊ.”
Ka a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ 'yɛr, “Sɩ Soro, pʊɔ sɩ sɔɔfʊ.”
Ka a Soro 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩn tara sɔɔfʊ jaa pʊʊr fɩka kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ bir, yɩn tʊ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ a tɩkpɛ̃ɛ nyãna, ‘Vʊ̃ɔ tɩ ba man pɔ, ka wʊ tu a lɛ yɩn 'yɛr.’
“Ala ɩ a yɩ ãsʊɔ tara na gbãgbaa ka wʊ kʊɔrɔ bɩɩ ŋmaara piir, 'lɔ wa yi a tʊ̃mɔ̃ jie wa, fʊn 'yɛr wʊ naa ɩka wʊ wa jãnɛ di ɔ?
A ba ɩ fʊn 'yɛr wʊ naa, ‘Maal a bʊ̃diir fɔɔ na fʊ chɔɔr a fʊ mãɛ wa ara gu ma, ka n di tɩ nyũ baar ka fʊ mɩ pãa di tɩ nyũ ɛ.’
Wʊn puor naa a gbãgbaa nyãna wʊn 'yɔ̃ɔ ka wʊ maal bɩɩ?
A yɩn mɩ lɛ lɛ, yɩn wa maal ala a jaa Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ, yɩn 'yɛr naa, ‘Saa sɛɛn ɛ, gbãgbaar lɛ sɩ ɩ na sɩ maal a lɛ na ɩ a sɩ tʊ̃mɔ̃.’ ”
Yesu den a sɔr chiine a Jerusalɛm, wʊ kpɛ̃n a Samariya nɩ a Galilee chara pɔ.
Na wʊ chiine kpɛ a tẽbile ãsʊɔ pɔ, ka a kɔ̃kɔ̃n pie tuor wʊ a be. Ba ara na tɛɛr jaa
tɩ gboolo bʊɔlɔ, “Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Yesu, kaa sɩ nɩbaal.”
Wʊn nyɛ ba a lɛ, na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ chen tɩ wiil a yɩ mãɛ kʊ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlorbo.” Ban chen a lɛ, ka a ɩ ba sa naa.
A ba ãsʊɔ na nyɛ ka a ɩ wʊ sa naa, wʊ lɩɛb wa de nɛkpɛ̃ɛ na wʊ pɛɛrɛ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn.
Wʊ lon kpa a Yesu gbɛɛ par tɩ puor wʊ, Samariya lɛ wʊ yi.
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr, “A ba ɩ pie lɛ sa ɛ? Ka nyɩnɛ a pie forbir be?
Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa ba lɩɛb wa ɩka wʊ wa puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan ka a sãan nyã ba lɛ ɛ.”
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ir kulo, a fʊ sɔɔfʊ sa fʊ naa.”
A Faraseemɩne lɛ sʊʊr naa Yesu ɩka dabor lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ na wa, ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ kʊ̃ wa ka ba bɔ̃ɔn ɛ.
Bɩɩ ka nɩbɛ 'yɛr, yɩ nyɛ wʊ ka, bɩɩ yɩ nyɛ wʊ kasɛn, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ ben a yɩ pɔ.”
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʊ a poturbo, “Sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ waara na a yɩn wa bʊɔrɔ ɩka yɩ nyɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie nɩ nɩbir, tɩchɛ yɩ kʊ̃ nyɛ ma ɛ.
Nɩbɛ na 'yɛr yɩ naa, ‘Kasɛn lɛ wʊ be,’ bɩɩ ‘Ka lɛ wʊ be.’ Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa joro turo ba chiine be ɛ.
A maa Nɩsaal Bie bɩbir na kaara naa fɩka a saa na ma nyɩɩr a saaju yi a lõboor nyã tɩ gbem a lõboor ãsʊɔ.
Tɩchɛ ɩn den nie di dɔɔyɛ yele yɔɔ jaa pɔ, ka a dɩna nɩbɛ tɔr ma.
“Lɛ an dɔ̃ɔ kaara a Nowa sɔ̃ɔ, lɛ mɩ lɛ an kaara a maa Nɩsaal Bie sɔ̃ɔ.
Nɩbɛ dire naa na ba nyuro ka dɔɔr nɩ pɔbɔ kulo taa, tɩ tãn a bɩbir 'lɔ a Nowa na kpɛ a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ pɔ, ka a kʊ̃ɔ paal wa sɔ̃ɔ ba jaa bar.
“Lɛ mɩ lɛ a kaara a Lotɩ sɔ̃ɔ, nɩbɛ dire naa, na ba nyuro, na ba daara lɩɛb daara, na ba bʊrɔ na ba mɩɛrɛ nɩ yie.
Tɩchɛ a bɩbir 'lɔ a Lotɩ nɩ wa yi a Sodom bũu nɩ kʊsɩlirsɩ yin saaju lo pɔɔ a nɩbɛ ka ba jaa kpi.
Lɛ lɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie bɩbir mɩ na kaara.
“A bɩbir 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, nɩrɛ na be a wʊ gar ju, ka a wʊ bonsɩ be a die pɔ, wʊ kʊ̃ suu tɩ de ɛ. Lɛ mɩ lɛ nɩrɛ na be puo pɔ kʊ̃ kul tɩ de bon ɛ.
Yɩ tɩɛr a Lotɩ pɔɔ.
Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ faa a wa nyɛvʊr na bɔr wʊ naa, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na lɔb a wʊ nyɛvʊr bar, wʊn tara wʊ naa.
“N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka a tãsɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, nɩbɛ ayi na gãn gaa jie, ka a Nãaŋmɩn wa de bʊ̃'yen tɩ chɛ bʊ̃'yen bar.
Ka a pɔbɔ ayi nɩɛnɛ jɔ̃, ka a Nãaŋmɩn de bʊ̃'yen tɩ chɛ bʊ̃'yen bar.
Dɔɔr ayi mɩ na ben puo pɔ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn wa de ãsʊɔ tɩ chɛ bʊ̃'yen bar.”
Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Sɩ Soro, nyɩnɛ?” Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Jie bʊ̃kũu na be, be lɛ sɩdumosɩ ma loro.”
Yesu pãa lɔb sʊkpa kʊ a wʊ poturbo na wʊ wiil ba a lɛ ban na sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn taa baala ɛ.
Wʊ 'yɛr naa, “A tẽe kɔ̃ɔ pɔ, 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ kɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ be be, waa joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbãɛ ɛ, waa mɩ kaara nɩrɛ nɩbaal ɛ.
Ka a pɔɔ kʊɔr kɔ̃ɔ mɩ be be a tẽe pɔ, na wʊ ma waara a wʊ sɛ̃ wa 'yɛrɛ, ‘'Yɛr faa ma a n sãn sʊɔ sɛ̃.’
Bojũu, gbɛɛ aŋmɩnɛ jaa lɛ wʊ ma tɔr, tɩ wa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ mãɛ, ‘N gba ba joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbãɛ ɛ, bɩɩ kaara nɩrɛ nɩbaal lɛ.
Tɩchɛ bojũu, a pɔɔ kʊɔr nyãna na yʊɔrɔ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma, ɩn tɔɔr a wʊ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ ka wʊ ta yʊɔrɔ bala ma ɛ.’ ”
Ka a Soro 'yɛr, “Yɩ nyɛ lɛ a 'yɛr tɔɔr filefile nyã na 'yɛr.
Nãaŋmɩn mɩ kʊ̃ 'yɛr faa a wʊ nɩ-irsɩ na kõnõ kʊrɔ wʊ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ tãsɔɔ jaa ɛ? Bɩɩ wʊn lɩɛrɛ ban bara?
N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na tɔɔr a ba 'yɛr fɔɔ jaa kʊ ba. A maa Nɩsaal Bie wa lɩɛb wa a wɛr pɔ, ɩn nyɛn nɩbɛ ka ba tara sɔɔfʊ ɔ?”
Yesu lɛ lɔb sʊkpa de man a nɩbɛ bamɩne na tɩɛr ɩka ba ɩn nɩtorsɩ tɩ kaara a ba taaba pɔrɔ.
“Nɩbɛ ayi lɛ dɔ̃ɔ do a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir ɩka ba tɩ sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn. Ɩ̃sʊɔ ɩn Farasee nɩrɛ, ka a ãsʊɔ mɩ ɩ lõpodiere.
Ka a Farasee nɩrɛ 'lɔ ir ara, tɩ sʊɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ nɩ, ‘Nãaŋmɩn n puor fʊn yãan, nɩ ɩn ba kaara a nɩbɛ bamɩne kaar ɛ, nɩfarba, tʊ̃dɛtʊ̃nbɔ, sɛ̃sɛ̃nbɛ, bɩɩ a lõpodiere nyã kaar gba ɛ.
Maa 'lɔ, n ma gal kɔ̃ gbɛɛ ayi daa jaa pɔ, n bonsɩ pie jaa pɔ, n ma ir naa a bʊ̃'yen.’
Tɩchɛ ka a lõpodiere 'lɔ mɩ ara tɛɛr jaa na wʊ 'wor nuur, waa 'la dʊɔ kaa saaju ɛ, tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr, ‘Nãaŋmɩn kaa n nɩbaal, yelbe-ɩrɛ lɛ n ɩ.’

A lõpodiere nyã yele tor naa a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, ka wʊ lɩɛb kul gar, a Farasee nɩrɛ 'lɔ. Bojũu nɩrɛ jaa na 'mɔɔrɔ wʊ mãɛ saaju, Nãaŋmɩn na siir wʊ naa, tɩ nɩrɛ nyã mɩ na siir a wʊ mãɛ, Nãaŋmɩn na 'mɔɔ wʊn saaju.”
Nɩbɛ dɔ̃ɔ waara nɩ bibibil a Yesu sɛ̃ ɩka wʊ sɩɩr ba, ka a poturbo na nyɛ a lɛ na ba mĩi 'yɔ̃ɔ ba.
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu bʊɔl a bibiir ka ba wa a wʊ sɛ̃, ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Yɩ bar a bibiir sɔr ka ba wa a n sɛ̃, na yɩ ta ŋmaa ba sɔr ɛ, bojũu banyãna taaba lɛ so a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, ãsʊɔ jaa ba wa de a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ nɩtãa a bibibile nyãna kaar ɛ, wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ kpɛ be ɛ.”
A nɩdiere kɔ̃ɔ sʊʊr a Yesu, “Wiwiilsʊ̃, bo lɛ ɩn ɩ naa nyɛ nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ?”
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr wʊ, “Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ fʊ bʊɔl ma nɩsʊ̃? Nɩrɛ jaa ba ɩ nɩsʊ̃ ka Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Fʊ bɔ̃ɔ naa a Nãaŋmɩn Nɛɛ. Taa sɛ̃nɛ ɛ, taa kʊrɔ nɩrɛ ɛ, taa juro ɛ, taa ŋmaa jir kara 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ ɛ, na fʊ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʊ sãa nɩ a fʊ ma.”
Ka a daba 'yɛr, “A anyãna a jaa lɛ n turo a n bile sɔ̃ɔ wa tãn dɩna.”
Yesu na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “A chɛ fʊn yelbʊ̃'yen, tɩ da a fʊ bonsɩ a jaa, de põ nɔ̃n dẽme ka a fʊ tara bomo be a saaju, tɩ na fʊ pãa wa turo ma.”
A daba na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ wʊ pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ naa, bojũu tara sʊɔ lɛ wʊ ɩ.
Yesu kaa wʊn tɩ 'yɛr, “An ɩn kpɛ̃ɔ a tara sʊɔ na kpɛ Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.
Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, an ɩn kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ nyɔɔma na kpɛ kparpĩi bɔɔ pɔ, gar tara sʊɔ na kpɛ Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.”
Ka a bala na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ sʊʊr a Yesu, “An lɛ na pãa nyɛ faafʊ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Ala na ɩ tuo nɩrɛ sɛ̃, Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ yele jaa ba ɩ tuo ɛ.”
A Pita 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Sɩn bar bonsɩ a jaa, tɩ wa turo fʊ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ na bar a wʊ yir, bɩɩ pɔɔ, bɩɩ yɛɛr, bɩɩ a wʊ sãa naa ma, bɩɩ bibiir a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ jũu,
wʊn nyɛn dɔɔl taa a dɩna nɩ daar kɔ̃ɔ na wa lɔɔn nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ.”
Yesu tɔɔn a Pie nɩ Ayi yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ, tɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Sɩ ben duoro a Jerusalɛm, ala a jaa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na sɛb 'yɛr a maa Nɩsaal Bie 'yɛr, an tɩ ɩ naa.
Ban tɩ nyɔɔ man kʊ a nɩbɛ bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka ba la ma, tʊrɔ ma, na ba chɩr nataar 'yɔ̃ɔ ma, na ba ge ma, tɩ kʊ ma.
Ka a ber ata daar ka n ir ɩ vʊr go.”
A poturbo ba bɔ̃ɔ a anyãna wʊn 'yɛr par bãlãa jaa ɛ. A liin ba jaa, baa bɔ̃ɔ a ala wʊn 'yɛrɛ ɛ.
Yesu na wa gbʊrɔ a Jeriko, jɔ̃ɔ jɛ̃n be a sɔr kõkoor na wʊ sʊɔrɔ.
Wʊn wa wõ a nɩyɔɔ na chiine tala, a wʊ sʊrɔ, ɩka bo lɛ ɩrɛ.
Ka ba 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Yesu na yi Najaretɩ lɛ tala.”
A wʊ gboolo, “Yesu, David Bidaba, kaa a n nɩbaal.”
Ka a bala na de a nie tãn wʊ 'yɛrɛ pɔɔ a nɛɛ, tɩchɛ ka wʊ chɛnɛ gboolo bʊɔlɔ, “Yesu, David Bidaba, kaa n nɩbaal.”
Ka Yesu tɛɛ ara tɩ 'yɛr ɩka ba tara a daba waan. Lɛ a jɔ̃ɔ na wa gbʊr a Yesu ka wʊ sʊʊr wʊ,
“Bo lɛ fʊ bʊɔrɔ ɩka n ɩ kʊ fʊ?” Ka a jɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, “N Soro n bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka n nyɛrɛ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Nyɛrɛ a fʊ sɔɔfʊ sa fʊ naa.”
Ajienaa ka a ɩ wʊ nyɛrɛ naa, na wʊ dãna Nãaŋmɩn turo nɩ a Yesu. A nɩbɛ ba jaa na wa nyɛ a lɛ, ba mɩ dãna naa a Nãaŋmɩn.
Yesu kpɛ̃n a Jeriko tẽe pɔ tala.
Ka a daba kɔ̃ɔ be be ban bʊɔlɔ Jakiyas, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a lõpodierbe nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wʊ ɩ tara sʊɔ.
Wʊ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka wʊ nyɛ Yesu nɩ nɩbir, tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ waa, a wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ nyɛ wʊ ɛ, bojũu nɩŋmaa lɛ wʊ ɩ.
Be lɛ wʊ de nie jo chen tɩ do kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ tɩɛ ju ɩka wʊ nyɛ a Yesu an ɩ a be lɛ wʊ tu tala.
Yesu na wa ta a tɩɛ pĩlem, wʊ dʊɔn bʊɔl wʊ, “Jakiyas wa suu fɔɔ, a fʊ yir lɛ ɩn gã dɩna.”
Ka a Jakiyas suu fɔɔ jaa na wʊ tuor de a Yesu nɩ pʊpɛl.
A nɩbɛ ba jaa nyɛn a lɛ na ba piel hũhũnõ 'yɛrɛ, “Wʊ ben na tɩ kpɛ a yelbe-ɩrɛ nyãna sãan.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Jakiyas ir ara tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “Nyɛ n Soro, ɩn põ naa a n bʊ̃tarsɩ ŋmaa, naa kʊ a nɔ̃n dẽme, ala ɩ n mɩ fɔl nɩrɛ jaa bon, ɩn yab a lɛ dɔɔl gbɛɛ anaar.”
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Dɩna faafʊ wan a yir nyã pɔ, bojũu a daba nyã mɩ ɩn a Abraham bie.
Bojũu a maa Nɩsaal Bie wa naa ɩka n wa bɔ na n faa a bala na bɔr.”
Ban chɛlɛ a anyãna ka wʊ lɔb sʊkpa kʊ ba, bojũu ba gbʊrɔ naa a Jerusalɛm ka nɩbɛ tɩɛr ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ na tɔɔn daa yi ajienaa.
Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nãbie ãsʊɔ lɛ ir na chen a tẽtɛɛr ãsʊɔ ka ba tɩ su wʊ nãa, ka wʊ lɩɛb wa.
Na wʊ bʊɔl a wʊ gbãgbaar pie na wʊ de a sɛlbie pie na wʊ kʊ ba tɩ 'yɛr, ‘Yɩ de a libie anyãna tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ, wa tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn na lɩɛb wa.’
Tɩchɛ ka a wʊ tẽe dẽme 'laar wʊ, ir nɩbɛ tʊ̃ wʊn chen baar ka ba tɩ 'yɛr ɩka, ‘Baa bʊɔrɔ a daba nyã ɩka wʊ wa ɩ a ba nãa ɛ.’
“Wʊ din a nãa na wʊ lɩɛb wa a wʊ tẽe, wʊ wa tʊ̃n bʊɔl a wʊ gbãgbaar bala wʊn kʊ a libie ka ba wa a wʊ sʊʊr kaa a lɛ ban tʊ̃n a libie.
A 'lɔ na de nie wa 'yɛr naa, ‘Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, a fʊ libir dɔɔn pie dɔɔl.’
Ka a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr, ‘Fʊ maal vɩla fʊn ben tara yelmãɛ nɩ a bʊ̃bile nyã, ɩn vɛ̃ naa ka fʊ kaara tẽn pie.’
A ayi sʊɔ wa 'yɛr, ‘Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, a fʊ libir mɩ dɔɔn anũu dɔɔl.’
Ka a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr, ‘Mɩ kaara tẽn anũu.’
“Ka ata sʊɔ mɩ wa 'yɛr, ‘Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nyɛ a fʊ libir ɩn lũ 'yɔ̃ɔ fɔbaa pɔ bin.
N joro fʊn dãbãɛ, bojũu a fʊ yele kpɛ̃mɛ naa. Fʊ ma den a jie 'lɔ fʊn ba bin ɛ, na fʊ ŋma a jie 'lɔ fʊn ba bʊr ɛ.’
Ka a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr, ‘A fʊ nɛɛ 'yɛrbie lɛ ɩn de tɔɔr a fʊ 'yɛr, gbãgbadɛɛr lɛ fʊ ɩ. Fʊ̃ʊ mãɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a n yele kpɛ̃mɛ naa, ma de a be ɩn ba bin ɛ, na n ma ŋmara a jie 'lɔ ɩn ba bʊr ɛ.
Bo lɛ so ka faa de a n libir tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a be a libie binfʊ jie ɛ, ɩn ben ta wa, n kʊ̃ naa de ka bon dɔɔl ɛ?’
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʊ a bala na ara a be, ‘Yɩ faa a libir 'lɔ a wʊ sɛ̃, na yɩ kʊ a 'lɔ na tara a libie pie.’
Ka ba 'yɛr, ‘Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, pie lɛ wʊ tara.’
Wʊ 'yɛr naa, ‘N 'yɛrɛ yɩ naa ɩka nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara wʊn lɛ nyɛn dɔɔl, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba tara ɛ, tɩ tara bãlãa ban den a bãlãa ala.
Tɩchɛ a n dɔ̃dẽme bala na ba bʊɔrɔ ma ɩka n ɩ a ba nãa ɛ, yɩ nyɔɔr ba waan wa kʊ a ka a n niem.’ ”
Yesu na 'yɛr a anyãna baar wʊ de ban nie ka ba duoro a Jerusalɛm.
A lɛ wʊn wa gbʊrɔ a Betefagɩ nɩ a Betanɩ, tɔ̃ɔ ben be ka ba bʊɔlɔ Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ, wʊ tʊ̃ naa a wʊ poturbo ayi tɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba.
“Yɩ chen a tẽbile 'lɔ a yɩ niem, yɩn wa kpɩɛrɛ a tẽe pɔ yɩn nyɛn bʊ̃pɔlbile ban lũ, baa do wʊ jaa sɛrɛ ɛ, yɩ for wʊ waan.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ wa sʊʊr yɩ naa, ‘Ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ foro a bʊ̃pɔlbile?’ Yɩ 'yɛr wʊ, ‘A sɩ Soro lɛ bʊɔrɔ wʊ.’ ”
A bala wʊn tʊ̃ chen tɩ nyɛ a lɛ nɛ wʊn 'yɛr ba.
Ban wa foro a bʊ̃pɔlbile, a bʊ̃pɔlbile dẽme sʊʊr ba naa, “Ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ foro a bʊ̃pɔlbile?”
A ba 'yɛr, “A sɩ Soro lɛ bʊɔrɔ wʊ.”
Ba waan naa a bʊ̃pɔlbile wa kʊ a Yesu, na ba 'yɩɛr a ba fɔɔr dɔɔl a bʊ̃pɔlbile ju, tɩ nyɔɔ a Yesu ka wʊ do jãnɛ.
A lɛ wʊn chiine, lɛ mɩ lɛ a nɩbɛ 'yɩɛrɛ a fɔɔr den a sɔr.
Wʊn chen wa gbʊrɔ a jie a sɔr na suu a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ ju, a nɩyɔɔ bala na turo wʊ piel chɩlɛ nɩ nɛkpɛ̃ɛ na ba pɛɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ala a jaa ban nyɛ jũu.
“Nãaŋmɩn wʊ sʊ̃ʊ a nãa 'lɔ wʊn tʊ̃!
Ka a Faraseemɩne na be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ, 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “Wiwile tãn a fʊ poturbo a ba bar a gɔ̃n.”
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Ala ɩ ba bar a gɔ̃n, kʊsɩbɛ na pɔɔrɔ naa gɔ̃mɔ̃.”
Yesu na wa tara a Jerusalɛm na wʊ nyɛ a tẽe wʊ kõn kʊ wʊ,
tɩ 'yɛr, “Ala ɩ a fʊ̃ʊ, fʊ̃ʊ gba ta bɔ̃ɔ a bon 'lɔ a dɩna bɩbir nɩ taa waan nyã'maar, tɩchɛ a sɔɔl naa a fʊ sɛ̃.
A bɩbir na wa vɩɛ yɩ naa, ka a yɩ dɔ̃dẽme wa jilʊ̃ yɩ gʊɔr gʊɔr a jie wʊ jaa.
Ban nɛb yɩn ŋmɛr nɩ a yɩ bibiir nɩ a yɩ tẽe ba kʊ̃ wa bar kʊsɩr ka wʊ dɔɔl wʊ tɔ ju ɛ, bojũu yaa tɩɛr tɔ a sɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na waara a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ.”
Wʊ pãa tɩ kpɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ na wʊ piel dire a bala na daara bara.
Na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, ‘A n yir na ɩ naa a puorfʊ jie,’
Bɩbir jaa lɛ wʊ wile ba be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir, tɩchɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ bʊɔrɔ a wʊ kʊfʊ.
Tɩchɛ baa bɔ̃ɔ lɛ ban na ɩ ɛ, bojũu nɩbɛ ba jaa 'yɔ̃ɔn toor chɛlɛ a wʊ 'yɛr.
A bɩbir ãsʊɔ Yesu ben a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ, wile a nɩbɛ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ kʊrɔ ba. Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ wa a wʊ sɛ̃.
Na ba sʊʊr wʊ, “'Yɛr kʊ sɩ a jie fʊn nyɛ a sɔr maala nɩ a anyãna, an kʊ fʊ a sɔr nyã?”
Ka a Yesu mɩ 'yɛr, “N tara na sʊʊrfʊ na sʊʊr yɩ.
A Jɔɔn na dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ an lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ, Nãaŋmɩn lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ bɩɩ nɩrɛ lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ?”
A ba lɩɛb guor taa 'yɛrɛ, “Ala ɩ sɩ ben 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ, wʊn lɩɛb sʊʊr sɩ, ŋmɩnɛ a saa sɔɔ de wʊ ɛ?
Tɩchɛ sɩn mɩ 'yɛr ɩka nɩrɛ lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ, a nɩbɛ ba jaa na lɔb sɩn nɩ kʊsɩbɛ, bojũu ba jaa sɔɔn de ɩka Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ lɛ wʊ ɩ.”
Be lɛ a ba 'yɛr, “Saa bɔ̃ɔ a jie an yi ɛ.”
A Yesu mɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “N mɩ kʊ̃ 'yɛr kʊ yɩ a jie ɩn nyɛ a sɔr maala nɩ a anyãna ɛ.”
Yesu chɛnɛ na 'yɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ na wʊ lɔb a sʊkpa nyã kʊ ba, “Daba lɛ bʊr a tɩwɔ̃nsɩ de kʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ a ba kaara, tɩ yɔ chen tɛɛr na wʊ tɩ kor be jaa.
Ka a tɩɩr wɔ̃mɔ̃ mʊɔfʊ sɔ̃ɔ wa ta ka wʊ ir a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ ãsʊɔ tʊ̃ a bala na kaara wʊ a puo ka ba pɔr a wɔ̃mɔ̃ amɩne tɩr. Tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ bala ŋme wʊ bar ka wʊ kul nũjaal.
Ka wʊ lɛ tʊ̃ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ ãsʊɔ go, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ mɩ ba lɛ ŋme ŋme naa tɩ tu tu wʊ bar, ka wʊ mɩ lɩɛb kul a nũjaala.
Ka wʊ lɛ maal tʊ̃ a ata sʊɔ ka ba ŋme a 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ baal 'mɔɔ lɔb bar a yõo.
“A puo sʊɔ pãa 'yɛr, ‘Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ɩn ɩ? Ɩn tʊ̃n a n bidanʊ̃naa amɩne sɛ̃ ban jo wʊn vĩ.’
Tɩchɛ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ na wa nyɛ a bidaba na waara a ba guor taa 'yɛr, ‘Nyã lɛ ɩ a bʊ̃dire, yɩ ɩ a sɩ kʊ wʊ bar tɩ de a bonsɩ.’
Na ba nyɔɔ wʊ vu yin a puo kõkoor na ba tɩ kʊ wʊ. Bo lɛ a puo sʊɔ na wa ɩ a nɩbɛ banyãna?
Wʊn wa kʊ naa a nɩbɛ banyãna bar, tɩ de a puo kʊ nɩyor.” Lɛ a nɩbɛ na wa wõ a 'yɛrbir nyã a ba 'yɛr, “A kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ɩ a lɛ ɛ.”
Ka a Yesu kaa ba a lɛ a tãɩɩ tɩ sʊʊr, “Ala ɩ a kʊ̃ ɩ a lɛ ɛ, a par nɩ bo an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, ‘A kʊsɩr 'lɔ a mɩmɩɛrbɛ na tɔr lɛ ɩ a kʊsɩr ju?’
Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa wa lo a kʊsɩr nyã ju na kar kara, tɩchɛ 'lɔ mɩ wa lo dib ãsʊɔ wʊn pʊrpʊr wʊ naa.”
Ka a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ kaara sɔr 'lɔ ban na tu nyɔɔ wʊ fɔɔ, bojũu ba bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka bala lɛ wʊ lɔb a sʊkpa gbɛb, tɩchɛ na ba joro a nɩbɛ dãbãɛ.
Ba jʊrɔ naa Yesu, na ba ir nɩbɛ tʊ̃ ka ba tɩ maala fɩka nɩsʊ̃n tɩ jʊrɔ wʊ. Ba bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka ba wõ a wʊ nɛɛ 'yɛrbie de nyɔɔn wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ kpɛ̃ɔ sʊɔ nũu pɔ, na ɩ a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ.
A nɛbɛr nɩbɛ banyãna sʊʊr wʊ naa, “Wiwile sɩ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka fʊ ma 'yɛr naa na fʊ wiil a lɛ na tor, faa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩbɛ gar taa ɛ, tɩchɛ na fʊ wile a nɩbɛ Nãaŋmɩn sɔr nɩ yelmãɛ.
Sɔr ben be a sɩn yab a lõpo kʊ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa bɩɩ sɔr ba be be ɛ?”
Yesu nyɛn a ba yɛ̃ na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba,
“Yɩ wiil ma a libikur. An ju ŋmaa nɩ a wʊ yuor lɛ be be?”
A ba 'yɛr, “A Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa lɛ.” A wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba. “Yɩ kʊ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa a ala na ɩ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa bon na yɩ mɩ de a ala na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bon mɩ kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn.”
Ba bɛr wʊn a nɛɛ faa a anyãna wʊn 'yɛr a chãsara, ka nɛɛr 'maa ba nɩ a 'yɛr nyãna wʊn 'yɛr, a ba ɩ gbulo gbulo.
A Saduseemɩne na 'yɛr ɩka a kũu pɔ irfʊ ba be be ɛ, bamɩne wan a Yesu sɛ̃ wa sʊʊr wʊ.
“Wiwile, Mosesɩ sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ gãn pɔ kʊ sɩ ɩka, ala ɩ daba kul pɔɔ na wʊ wa kpi, tɩchɛ ka a pɔɔ ba dɔɔ bie ɛ, a yɛbɛ wʊ de a pɔɔ kʊɔr kul na wʊ dɔɔ bie kʊ a yɛbɛ.
Yɛɛr ayopõi lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be, ka a ba kpɛ̃ɛ kul pɔɔ na wʊ kpi, tɩ baa dɔɔ bie ɛ.
Ka a wʊ turo
nɩ a ata sʊɔ mɩ kul a pɔɔ, tɩ kpi, lɛ a yɛɛr ayopõi bala mɩ, kul a pɔɔ tɩ kpi baa dɔɔ bie ɛ.
A baaraa jaa ka a pɔɔ mɩ kpi.
An be a lɛ, bala wa ir a kũu pɔ, buor sʊɔ pɔɔ lɛ wʊn ɩ, an ɩ ba jaa ayopõi kul wʊ naa?”
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nɩbɛ na be ka a wɛr pɔ, kulo nɩ taa.
Tɩchɛ a bala na sɛɛn na ir a kũu pɔ a bɩbir 'lɔ, bala ba kulo taa ɛ.
Bala kʊ̃ lɛ kpi go ɛ, nɩtãa lɛ a malakasɩ na ba kpire ɛ. Ba ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn bibiir an ɩ bala lɛ ɩ a kũu pɔ irfʊ bibiir.
A kũu pɔ irfʊ, Mosesɩ mɩ wiil sɩ naa ɩka a ɩn yelmãɛ a lɛ wʊn sɛb a wʊ gãn pɔ, a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛrɛ nɩ wʊ a tɩbile na 'lɩrɛ a bũu, ka wʊ sɛb ɩka Nãaŋmɩn bʊɔl wʊ mãɛ, Abraham, Isaakɩ nɩ a Jekɔb Nãaŋmɩn.
Waa ɩ kũn Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊ ɩn a vʊɛ Nãaŋmɩn a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ ba jaa ɩ vʊɛ.”
Ka a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe bamɩne 'yɛr, “Wiwile, fʊ 'yɛr vɩla.”
Nɩrɛ jaa ba lɛ 'la sʊʊr wʊ go ɛ.
Yesu pãa sʊʊr ba naa, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a ɩ ka a nɩbɛ 'yɛrɛ ɩka a Kɩrɩsɩto ɩn a Nãa David Bidaba?
A Nãa David mãɛ 'yɛr a wʊ yiel gãn pɔ, ‘A n Soro Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊ a n Soro nyã wʊn ir, “Jãnɛ a n nũsʊ̃ɔ jie,
ka n wa de a fʊ dɔ̃dẽme bin a fʊ gbɛɛ pĩlem.” ’
A Nãa David bʊɔl wʊ naa a wʊ Soro, ŋmɩnɛ wʊn lɛ ɩrɛ wa ɩ a wʊ bie?”
A nɩbɛ na chɛlɛ a lɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ, ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a poturbo.
“Yɩ gu yɩ mãɛ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe 'yɔ̃ɔ. Ba nʊ̃ naa fuu vɛɛsɩ sufʊ, na ba nʊ̃ ɩka ba puoro ba a dar pɔ. A ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ yie a niem lɛ ba ma jãnɛ na ba jãnɛ a jibɛrɛ jie bala wa lɔ̃ɔ dire.
Bala lɛ ma fɔlɔ a pɔɔ kɔɛ yie na ba ma sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn kor bʊɔrɔ ɩka a nɩbɛ ba kaara ba. Ban nyɛn ge dɛɛr.”
Yesu dʊɔn kaa nyɛ a tara dẽme na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a ba libie be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir.
Wʊ nyɛn pɔɔ kʊɔr nɔ̃ɔ sʊɔ mɩ na 'yɔ̃ɔ kobsɩ ayi.
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka a pɔɔ kʊɔr nɔ̃ɔ sʊɔ nyã 'yɔ̃ɔn gar ba jaa.
A nɩbɛ banyãna ma ir 'yɔ̃ɔ tɩ chɛ a libie amɩne, tɩchɛ a pɔɔ nyã bon jaa wʊn tara lɛ wʊ de 'yɔ̃ɔ.”
A Yesu poturbo bamɩne 'yɛrɛ na a lɛ ban maal a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir nɩ a kʊsɩr vɩɛlsɩ, nɩ a kʊfʊsɩ ban kʊ Nãaŋmɩn. Tɩchɛ ka Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba,
“A kʊsɩbɛ anyãna yɩn nyɛ a kana, sɔ̃ɔ waara naa, ãsʊɔ jaa kʊ̃ dɔɔl a wʊ tɔ ju ɛ, a jaa na wɛl gã tẽe.”
Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Wiwile, dabor lɛ an ɩ? Bo lɛ na ɩ a jãnɛ ala wa bʊɔrɔ a ɩfʊ?”
A wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ gu yɩ mãɛ ka nɩrɛ taa bɛl yɩ ɛ. Bojũu nɩyɔɔ lɛ na de a n yuor waan wa 'yɛrɛ ɩka, ‘Maa lɛ ba ɩ,’ ka a ɩ, ‘Sɔ̃ɔ gbʊr naa.’ Yɩ taa turo ba ɛ.
Yɩn wa wõ jɛɛr nɩ faa taa, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka dãbãɛ kpɛ yɩ ɛ. A anyãna lɛ na de nie wa, tɩchɛ a ba ɩ a baarfʊ lɛ ɛ.”
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nɩbɛ na ir tɩ jɛɛr nɩ a tẽe ãsʊɔ nɩbɛ, ka a nãmɩne mɩ ir jɛɛrɛ taa.
A tẽe na mɩr naa a jie wʊ jaa ka a kɔ̃ lo ka a baal dɛbɛ de jiir a jaa ka a dãbãɛ nɩ jãnɛ yi saaju.
“Sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka anyãna na wa ɩ ban ge yɩ naa, na ba nyɔɔr yɩ chiin a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir na ba fɩr yɩ chiin tɩ pɔɔ. Ban fɩr yɩn chiin a nãmɩne yie nɩ a paal nɩbɛrɛ jie a n yuor jũu.
A anyãna na kʊ yɩn sɔr ka yɩ di a n dãasɩɛ kʊ ba.
Tɩchɛ yɩ ta ɩ ka a ɩ yɩ tɩɛrɛ a lɛ yɩn na tɩ 'yɛr faa yɩ mãɛ ɛ.
Bojũu maa lɛ na kʊ yɩ a 'yɛr nɩ a yɛ̃ ka a yɩ sãma dẽme kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ nyɛ jie chɩɩr yɩ ɛ.
A yɩ sãamɩne nɩ a yɩ mamɩne, yɛɛr nɩ a yɩ bal nɩbɛ nɩ a yɩ barmɩne na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ ka ba kʊ a yɩ bamɩne.
Nɩbɛ ba jaa na 'laar yɩ naa a maa jũu.
Tɩchɛ a yɩ jukɔɔlbir kʊ̃ wa wɛ ɛ.
Yɩn chɛnɛ sɔɔ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ yelmãɛ yɩn faan yɩ mãɛ.
“Yɩn wa nyɛ a sojasɩ a ba wa ŋmaa jilʊ̃ a Jerusalɛm, yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a wʊ wɛlfʊ gbʊr jaa yɛ̃yɛ̃.
Ka a bala na pãa be a Judiya ba joro duoro a tɔ̃n jur. A bala mɩ na be a a Jerusalɛm tẽe pɔ, yɩ joro yire, ka a bala mɩ na be a tẽe kõkoor ba ta lɛ kpɛ a tẽe pɔ go ɛ.
A sɔ̃ɔ nyãna lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na kpãa a Isɩral nɩbɛ, a kpãafʊ nyã na ɩn a lɛ ban sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ.
A bɩbir nyã na ɩn wõm kʊ a pɔɔ pʊʊr nɩ a bipɩlɛ dẽme, dɔɔyɛ kpɛ̃ɛ na ben a wɛr pɔ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn suur lɛ dire a wʊ nɩbɛ.
Sɔkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ ban kʊn ba, tɩ nyɔɔr ba nɩpɔɔrsɩ kaar kʊ a paalsɩ. Ka a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ na nɛɛrɛ naa a Jerusalɛm wa tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɔ̃ɔ kʊ ba.
“Yɩn nyɛn jãnsɩ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ pɔ, ŋmɛra pɔ nɩ a ŋmɛrbie pɔ. Tuo na pɔɔn nɩbʊrɔ jaa na be ka wɛr ju, ka dãbãɛ kpɛ a nɩbɛ, a man kpɛ̃ɛ kʊ̃ɔ na kara na a ɔɔrɔ.
Dãbãɛ nyã na vɛ̃ naa ka a nɩbɛ pɛl, bojũu ba bɔ̃ɔn naa a dɔɔyɛ nyã na waara a wɛr pɔ, a saaju bomo a jaa na dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ naa.
A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ban nyɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie na yi a julõjuur pɔ, waara nɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ a tɩɩr kpɛ̃ɛ.
A yele anyãna wa ɩrɛ, yɩ ir ara tɩ jɛɛr a yɩ jur, bojũu a yɩ faafʊ gbʊrɔ naa.”
Sʊkpa nyã lɛ a Yesu lɔb kʊ ba, na wa 'yɛr, “Yɩ kaa a pɔlpɔl tɩɛ nɩ a tɩɩr a jaa.
Yɩn wa nyɛ ka a tʊɔrɔ a vaar yɩ ma bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka tʊl tara naa.
A lɛ mɩ lɛ, yɩn wa nyɛ a yelsɩ anyãna ka a ɩrɛ, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ gbʊr naa.
“Yelmãɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka nɩsaal jaa kʊ̃ kpi baar ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a yelsɩ anyãna ɩ ɛ.
A saaju nɩ a tẽe, a jaa na wa baaraa, tɩchɛ a maa 'yɛrbie kʊ̃ wa baar ɛ.
“Yɩ guro yɩ mãɛ, ka a yɩ nyãa taa pɔɔ ɛ, nɩ dãa kuolfʊ nɩ a ãgãn nyã bʊ̃bʊɔrsɩ ka a bɩbir nyã taa wa dũu yɩ fɩka chɛbaa na tɛb ɛ.
Bojũu a lɛ na ɩ ɩn na wa, pɔɔn nɩrɛ jaa na be ka a wɛr nyã pɔ.
Yɩ kaara na yɩ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn, na yɩ tʊ̃ɔ jo yi a ala a jaa na wa wa ɩ pɔ, na yɩn tʊ̃ɔ ara a maa Nɩsaal Bie niem.”
A Yesu ma wile naa a nɩbɛ be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir, tɩchɛ ka a tãsɔɔ ka wʊ ma do a tɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban bʊɔlɔ a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ tɩ gã a be.
Ka a nɩbɛ ma chɛnɛ ŋmaa ir a bibio wa be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir ɩka ba wa chɛl a wʊ 'yɛr.
A Paanʊ̃kõo Lɔ̃ɔfʊ ban bʊɔlɔ a Gõl Bar Difʊ gbʊrɔ naa.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe bʊɔrɔ sɔr 'lɔ ban na tu nyɔɔ a Yesu jaa jom, bojũu ba joro naa a nɩbɛ dãbãɛ.
Ka a Satan pãa kpɛ a Judas na yi a Isɩkariyot na ɩ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ pie nɩ ayi ãsʊɔ.
Wʊ ir chen a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir gugurbo sɛ̃, ka ba tɩ man taa lɛ wʊn na ɩ, ka ba nyɔɔ a Yesu.
Ba pʊɔ pɛl naa ka ba sɔɔ ɩka ban kʊ wʊ naa libie.
Judas sɔɔ naa na wʊ kaara bʊɔrɔ sɔr 'lɔ wʊn na nyɔɔ a Yesu kʊ ba ka a nɩyɔɔ ba be be ɛ.
A Paanʊ̃kõo bɩbir vɩɛ naa, ka ban kʊ a Gõl Bar Difʊ pɛr.
Yesu tʊ̃n a Pita nɩ Jɔɔn na wʊ 'yɛr, “Yɩ chen tɩ chɔɔr jie ka sɩ chen tɩ di a Gõl Bar Difʊ.”
Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Nyɩnɛ lɛ fʊ bʊɔrɔ ɩka sɩ chen tɩ chɔɔr?”
A wʊ 'yɛr, “Yɩn wa tɩ kpɛ a tẽe pɔ, yɩn tuor daba na tuo kʊ̃ɔ nɩ yuor yɩ turo wʊ tɩ kpɛ̃n a yir 'lɔ pɔ wʊn kpɛ.
Na yɩ tɩ 'yɛr a yir sʊɔ, a wiwile lɛ 'yɛr ɩka sɩ wa sʊʊr fʊ kaa, ka nyɩnɛ lɛ a sãanba die be, ka 'lɔ naa wʊ poturbo na wa di a Gõl Bar Difʊ?
Wʊn wiil yɩn bɔɔpɩɛ dikpɛ̃ɛ ban chɔɔr yɩ maal a bʊ̃diir a be.”
Ba chen tɩ nyɛ a lɛ nɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr na ba chɔɔr a bʊ̃diir a be.
A sɔ̃ɔ na wa ta Yesu nɩ a wʊ nɩtʊ̃nsɩ wa jãnɛ naa a bʊ̃diir par.
Be lɛ wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “N bʊɔrɔ na yɔɔ jaa ɩka n 'mataa din yɩ a Gõl Bar nyã bʊ̃diir tɩ na n di a dɔɔyɛ.
Bojũu n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka n kʊ̃ lɛ di yaa go ɛ, wa tɩ tãn yele jaa na maal baar a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.”
Wʊn wa de a dãa naa ŋmele wʊ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ nɩtʊ̃nsɩ, “Yɩ de a anyã nyũ lʊɔr taa.
Bojũu n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka n kʊ̃ lɛ nyũ a dãa anyãna go ɛ, tɩ tãn a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ waa daar.”
Wʊ lɛ den a paanʊ̃ɔ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan tɩ na wʊ ŋma de kʊ ba tɩ 'yɛr, “A maa ãgãn lɛ a nyãna ɩn diere kʊrɔ yɩ, yɩ maala a nɩtɔ̃ tɩɛrɛ nɩ ma.”
Lɛ nɩ wʊ ju lɛ ban wa di baar wʊ den a ŋmele tɩ 'yɛr, “A ŋmele nyã ɩn a nɛtɩr paalaa na ɩ a maa jãɩ na kpaar a yɩ jũu.
“Tɩchɛ a 'lɔ na garʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ ma lɛ n 'mataa dire nɩ a bʊ̃diir.
A maa Nɩsaal Bie na chen naa nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bin, tɩchɛ nɛbier ben a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na garʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ ma.”
A ba piel sʊrɔ taa ɩka a ba buor sʊɔ lɛ na pãa tʊ̃ a nɩtɔ̃.
Ka nɛchɩrɛ mɩ ir a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ pɔ, a ba chɩrɛ taa bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba bɔ̃ɔ buor sʊɔ lɛ na ɩ a ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ.
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nãmɩne ɛ, ma fɩrɛ naa a nɩbɛ, ka a bala mɩ na wile a ba kpãɛn bʊɔlɔ ba mãɛ, nɩsʊ̃nbɔ.
Tɩchɛ yɩn 'lɔ a ba ɩ lɛ lɛ ɛ, a 'lɔ na ɩ a yɩ kpɛ̃ɛ, 'lɔ lɛ na ɩ a yɩ jaa bibile, a 'lɔ na kaara yɩ, 'lɔ lɛ na tʊ̃nɔ̃ kʊrɔ yɩ.
Nɩbuor sʊɔ lɛ ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ, a 'lɔ na jãnɛ a bʊ̃diir par, bɩɩ a 'lɔ na põnõ? A ba ɩ a 'lɔ na jãnɛ a bʊ̃diir par ɛ? Tɩchɛ a maa na ɩ a yɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ben a yɩ sɛ̃, ɩ a yɩ bʊ̃ põnõ.
“Yɩn lɛ ɩ a nɩbɛ bala na chɛnɛ ara gu ma a n wõm pɔ.
N kʊ yɩn a nãalʊ̃ʊ nɩtãa lɛ a n Sãa na kʊ ma a nãalʊ̃ʊ.
Ka maa nɩ yɩn lɔ̃ɔ di tɩ nyũ be a n nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ, na yɩ jãnɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju tɔɔrɔ a Isɩral balsɩ pie nɩ ayi 'yɛr.
“Simon, Simon, a Satan sʊɔr sɔr Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɩka wʊ yɩɛl yɩ chi kaar.
Tɩchɛ a fʊ̃ʊ Pita n sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn kʊ fʊ ɩka, a fʊ sɔɔfʊ ta bʊ̃bʊr ɛ, a fʊ̃ʊ wa lɩɛb puor, fʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ a fʊ taaba ãkpãɛn.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Simon 'yɛr, “N Soro, n chɔɔr naa ɩka maa nɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ na lɔ̃ɔ kpɛ a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ, na sɩ 'mataa kpi.”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “A fʊ̃ʊ Pita, sɛrɛ ka a nɔraa kõ a dɩna fʊn chɩɩr gbɛɛ ata ɩka faa bɔ̃ɔ ma ɛ.”
Be lɛ a Yesu pãa sʊʊr ba, “Ɩn dɔ̃ɔ tʊ̃ yɩ a nũjaala, yaa tara libie ɛ, bɩɩ wʊɔ nɩ nafɔɔr ɛ, yɩ dɔ̃ɔ bɔ bon faa bɩɩ?” A ba 'yɛr ɩka baa bɔ bon jaa faa ɛ.
A wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Tɩchɛ pʊ̃pãanyã, fʊ̃ʊ nyã na tara libie de, fʊ̃ʊ nyã mɩ na tara wʊɔ de, fʊ̃ʊ nyã na ba wa tara sɔkpɛ̃ɛ ɛ, de a fʊ fuu da na fʊ dãn a sɔkpɛ̃ɛ.
A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, ‘Ba sɔr wʊn 'yɔ̃ɔ a tʊ̃dɛbɛ dẽme pɔ.’
Ka a poturbo 'yɛr, “Sɩ Soro nyɛ sɔbɛrɛ ayi.” A wʊ 'yɛr, “A sɛɛ naa.”
Yesu yin duoro a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ ju, nɩtãa lɛ wʊn ma ɩrɛ ka a wʊ poturbo turo wʊ.
Wʊn wa ta a jie wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn na yɩ taa lo a bɛɛr kaa pɔ ɛ.”
Wʊ tɔɔn jãa ba bãlãa fɩka kʊsɩr fʊn na lɔb ka wʊ ta, na wʊ gbʊr dumo sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ,
“N Sãa, ala ɩ fʊ bʊɔrɔ naa, de a dɔɔyɛ ŋmele nyãna bar ma, a ɩ a fʊ bɔfʊ a ta ɩ a maa bɔfʊ ɛ.”
Be lɛ a malaka yi be a saaju wa a wʊ sɛ̃ wa 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ ãkpɛ̃ɔ.
A nɩbaal na kpɛ wʊ a lɛ, ka wʊ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ jaa ka a nyĩe hãna wʊ loro tẽe fɩka jãɩ.
Wʊn wa ir a Nãaŋmɩn sʊɔrfʊ jie lɩɛb chen tɩ nyɛ ka a wʊ poturbo gã gur nɩ pʊsɔ̃ɔ.
Ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ gã guro? Yɩ ir sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn na yɩ taa lo a bɛɛr kaa pɔ ɛ.”
Wʊn chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ a lɛ ka a ɩ a nɩyɔɔ daan sãa, ka a 'lɔ ban bʊɔlɔ a Judas a Pie Nɩ Ayi ãsʊɔ lɛ de ba a nie. Wʊ tɔɔn ta a Yesu puor wʊ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu sʊʊr wʊ, “Judas, fʊ ben de puorfʊ garʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ a maa Nɩsaal Bie?”
Yesu poturbo na nyɛ a lɛ na ɩrɛ ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Sɩ Soro, sɩ chɩɛrɛ nɩ a sɔbɛrɛ bɩɩ?”
Ka a ba ãsʊɔ chɛ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ gbãgbaa nũsʊ̃ɔ toor ŋmaa.
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yɩ ta lɛ maal a lɛ ɛ.” Tɩ na wʊ sɩɩr a daba toor ka wʊ choo.
A Yesu pãa sʊʊr a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir gugurbo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nɩdierbe, “A mɔ̃ nɩbier lɛ n ɩ ka yɩ waan sɔbɛrɛ nɩ dakʊrsɩ a n nyɔɔfʊ jie bɩɩ?
Maa nɩ yɩn lɛ be be bɩbir jaa be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ, yaa nyɔɔ ma ɛ, tɩchɛ a yɩ bɩbir vɩɛ naa ka a libe mɩ di nãa.”
Ba nyɔɔ naa Yesu, na ba chiine a bɔɔrlo nãa yir, ka a Pita mɩ be a puor na wʊ turo.
Ban tɩ ta ba gbɔɔn bũu be a bɛchaar sãlsɔɔ 'mataa jãnɛ ka a Pita mɩ tɩ pʊɔ ba ka ba 'mataa jãnɛ.
Ka a gbãgbapɔɔbile nyɛ wʊ a bũu na chaar na wʊ kaara wʊ jaa tãɩɩ tɩ wa 'yɛr, “A daba nyã mɩ ɩn a wʊ poturo ãsʊɔ.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita chiir 'yɛr, “Pɔɔ, n ba bɔ̃ɔ wʊ ɛ.”
A ba kor ɛ ka a nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ nyɛ wʊ na wʊ 'yɛr, “Fʊ mɩ ɩn a ba ãsʊɔ.” Ka a Pita 'yɛr, “Daba, n ba ɩ a ba ãsʊɔ ɛ.”
A ba lɛ kor ɛ, ka a nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ mɩ 'yɛr, “A ba ɩ baal ɛ, a daba nyã ɩn a ba ãsʊɔ bojũu Galilee lɛ wʊ yi.”
Ka a Pita 'yɛr, “Daba, n ba bɔ̃ɔ a ala fʊn 'yɛrɛ ɛ.” Ka a nɔraa mɩ tɔ̃ɔ kõ a lɛ nɛ.
Ka a Yesu lɩɛb na wʊ kaa a Pita, a wʊ tɔ̃ɔ tɩɛr tɔ a lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr kʊ wʊ ɩka, “Sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka a nɔraa kõ a dɩna fʊn chiir man gbɛɛ ata.”
Ka a Pita ir yi a yõo na wʊ tɩ kõ nɩbaal kõn.
A dɔɔr bala na nyɔɔ a Yesu, piel na ba ɩrɛ wʊ laara tɩ ŋmiere wʊ.
Ba pɔɔ wʊ naa nɩbie tɩ sʊʊr, “Bɔ̃ɔ na fʊ 'yɛr kʊ sɩ a nɩnyɩnɛ na ŋme fʊ?”
Ba lɛ den 'yɛrbidɛbɛ yɔɔ tʊ tʊn wʊ.
A wɛr na wa chaar, a Juu nɩbɛ nɩdierbe nɩ a ba bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ, nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe lɔ̃ɔn taa, ka ba tara a Yesu waan a be.
A ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Ala ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ a Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ, 'yɛr kʊ sɩ.” Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Maa 'yɛr, yɩ kʊ̃ sɔɔ ɛ.
Ala ɩ n sʊʊr yɩn 'yɛr yɩ kʊ̃ haa ma nɛɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ an yi a dɩna chiine, a maa Nɩsaal Bie na jãnɛ naa Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ sɔɔ nũsʊ̃ɔ jie.”
Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie ɔ?” Kaa a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yɩn lɛ 'yɛr ɩka lɛ n ɩ.”
Ka ba pãa 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ taa, “Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ sɩ lɛ bʊɔrɔ dãasɩɛ go? Sɩ wõn yi a wʊ mãɛ nɛɛ pɔ.”
Be lɛ a nɩyɔɔ bala pãa tara a Yesu chiin a be a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Pilate sɛ̃.
Na ba tɩ piel 'yɛrɛ a 'yɛrsɩ anyãna dɔɔlɔ wʊ, “Sɩ nyɛn a daba nyãna ka wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a nɩbɛ 'yɛr, a ba ta yab a lõpo kʊ a Nãa Siisa ɛ, na wʊ lɛ 'yɛr ɩka 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa na ɩ a nãa.”
Ka a Pilate sʊʊr a Yesu, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nãa ɔ?” Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Ɔ̃ɔ, fʊ̃ʊ baa 'yɛr.”
Ka a Pilate pãa 'yɛr kʊ a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ, “N ba nyɛ chɛfʊ jaa a daba nyã jie ɛ.”
Tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ tɔr tɩ chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ, “Wiilfʊ nyãna lɛ wʊ tara dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a nɩbɛ be a Judiya. Galilee lɛ wʊ piel a yele nyãna be wa tãn a ka.”
Pilate na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ ka wʊ sʊrɔ, Galilee lɛ a daba yi bɩɩ?
Wʊn wa bɔ̃ɔn ka a Hɛrɔd paal nɩrɛ lɛ, wʊ vɛ̃ naa ka ba tara wʊ chiin tɩ kʊ a Hɛrɔd, ka ɩ a Jerusalɛm lɛ wʊ mɩ be a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.
Hɛrɔd na wa nyɛ a Yesu, wʊ pʊɔ pɛl naa, bojũu a kor wʊn wõ a Yesu yele na wʊ bʊɔrɔ a wʊ nyɛfʊ, ka wʊ tʊ̃ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃.
Na wʊ sʊʊr a Yesu sʊʊr yɔɔ tɩ waa haa wʊ nɛɛ ɛ.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe na ara a be 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr kpãɛn dɔɔlɔ wʊ.
Hɛrɔd nɩ a wʊ sojasɩ maal a Yesu dɛɛr na ba ɩrɛ wʊ laara. Ba su wʊ naa a nãa fuu tɩ lɩɛb wʊ chiin a Pilate sɛ̃.
Hɛrɔd nɩ a Pilate dɔ̃ɔ tara taa nɩ 'yɛr, tɩ a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ba maal a 'yɛr.
Be lɛ a Pilate bʊɔl a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ, nɩ a tẽe nɩbɛrɛ, nɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩn lɛ waan a daba nyãna a n sɛ̃ wa 'yɛr ɩka wʊ sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ naa a nɩbɛ. N vɩɛr naa a wʊ 'yɛr a yɩ jaa niem ka a ala yɩn 'yɛr dɔɔl wʊ ba ɩ yelmãɛ ɛ.
Hɛrɔd mɩ ba nyɛ yele jaa a wʊ jie ɛ, ala lɛ so ka wʊ lɛ lɩɛb wʊ wa kʊ sɩ, yɩn mãɛ nyɛ naa wʊn ba maal yele jaa na sɛɛn kũu ɛ.
A lɛ jũu ɩn vɛ̃ naa ka ba fɔb wʊ tɩchɛ kaa n bar wʊ.”
Ka ba jaa ŋme chɛl daa 'yɛrɛ, “Ŋmaa daba nyã ju tɩ na fʊ yuo a Barabasɩ na fʊ kʊ sɩ.”
Ba pɔɔ naa a Barabasɩ, bojũu 'yɛr dɔ̃ɔ lo be a tẽe pɔ, ka wʊ kʊ nɩrɛ.
Pilate na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ bar a Yesu wʊ lɛ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ go.
Tɩchɛ ka ba chɛnɛ ŋmiere a chɛlsɩ 'yɛrɛ, “Kpa wʊ a daa ju, kpa wʊ a daa ju.”
Gbɛɛ ata lɛ wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Bo? Bãa dɛɛr lɛ wʊ ɩ? Maa ba nyɛ dɛɛr jaa wʊn sɛɛn kũu ɛ. A lɛ jũu ɩn vɛ̃n ka ba fɔb wʊ tɩ bar wʊ.”
Tɩchɛ ka ba chɛnɛ tãna bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ kpa wʊ a daa ju, ka a ba gɔ̃mɔ̃ wa tʊ̃ɔ wʊ.
Lɛ lɛ a Pilate 'yɛr ɩka wʊn ɩ naa a lɛ ban 'yɛr.
A Barabasɩ 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ dam a tẽe na wʊ kʊn nɩrɛ ka ba nyɔɔ wʊ pɔɔ, wʊ yuo wʊn bar tɩ kʊ ba a Yesu.
A lɛ ban chiine a Yesu, ba nyɔɔn daba yuor na di Simon, Sirenɩ lɛ wʊ yi na wʊ yi a yõo tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a tẽe pɔ. Ba fɩr wʊn de a Yesu daa tuo wʊ ka wʊ turo nɩ wʊ.
Nɩyɔɔ turo wʊ naa lɔ̃ɔn pɔbɔ, bala lɛ kõnõ waala kʊrɔ wʊ.
Ka a Yesu lɩɛb 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Jerusalɛm pɔɔbil, yɩ ta kõnõ kʊrɔ ma ɛ, yɩ kõnõ kʊrɔ a yɩ mãɛ nɩ a yɩ bibiir.
Bojũu bɩbir kɔ̃ɔ na wa vɩɛ naa ka yɩ 'yɛr, ‘Pʊpɛl lɛ kʊ a pɔbɔ bala na ab nɩ pɔɔ 'lɔ jaa na ba dɔɔ bie ɛ, bɩɩ bɩrɛ ala jaa na ba 'yɛn kaa ɛ.’
‘A ban pãa 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ a tɔ̃bɛrɛ, “Yɩ lo pɔɔ sɩ, na yɩ ũu sɩ.” ’
Ala ɩ nɩbɛ maala naa a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ kʊ a tɩɛ na chɛnɛ ɩ a 'maar, ŋmɩnɛ ban ɩ wʊ 'lɔ wa ko?”
Dɔɔr ayi na maal dɛɛr, ka ba nyɔɔr ba 'matãan a Yesu chiine a kʊfʊ jie.
Ba chiin ban tɩ tãn a jie ban bʊɔlɔ Julaa, be lɛ ba kpa ãsʊɔ jaa a wʊ daa ju, ka a nɩdɛbɛ ayi bala ka a ãsʊɔ be a Yesu nũsʊ̃ɔ jie, tɩchɛ ka a ãsʊɔ mɩ be a wʊ gʊbaa jie.
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr, “N Sãa, vɛ̃ kʊ ba, baa bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ ban ɩrɛ ɛ.” Gbãm lɛ ba gba na ba põn a wʊ fuusɩ.
Ka a nɩbɛ ara kaara wʊ, ka a Juu nɩbɛ nɩbɛrɛ ara kpɛrɛ wʊ na ba 'yɛrɛ, “Wʊ ma faan bamɩne, vɛ̃ a wʊ faa a wʊ mãɛ ala ɩ 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na ir.”
Ka a sojasɩ mɩ wa ɩrɛ wʊ laara, na ba de a dãmiir kʊ wʊ.
Tɩ na ba 'yɛrɛ, “Ala ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nãa, faa a fʊ mãɛ.”
Ba sɛb sɛbie mar be a wʊ ju pɔ ka a 'yɛr, “Nyãna lɛ ɩ a Juu Nɩbɛ Nãa”.
A nɩdɛbɛ bala ban lɔ̃ɔ kpan wʊ, ãsʊɔ tʊrɔ wʊn 'yɛrɛ, “A ba ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa ɛ? Faa a fʊ mãɛ tɩ mɩ faa sɩ.”
Tɩchɛ ka a wʊ tɔ sʊɔ 'lɔ gɔ̃nɔ̃ wʊ 'yɛrɛ, “Faa joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbãɛ ɛ, an ɩ a kũu 'lɔ lɛ fʊ mɩ kpire.
Sɩn gefʊ sɛɛn sɩ naa, sɩ nyɛn a lɛ na sɛɛ sɩn maal, tɩchɛ a daba nyã 'lɔ ba maal dɛɛr jaa ɛ.”
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “Tɩɛr tɔ ma fʊ̃ʊ wa kpɛ a fu nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ fʊ, dɩna maa nɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tẽvɩla pɔ.”
A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbʊrɔ a garju sãlsɔɔ tɩchɛ ka a chãa ɩ jaa gbɛb, ka a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ wa tɩ vɩr.
A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ ba lɛ chaar go ɛ, ka a fɔbaa 'lɔ ban lũ var a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir die pɔ 'mar ayi.
Be lɛ a Yesu tãn kpɛ̃ɔ jaa 'yɛr, “N Sãa, fʊ nũu pɔ lɛ n de a n sɩɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ.” Wʊn wa 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ baar, tɩ vʊʊr a wʊ vʊʊr baaraa.
A sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na nyɛ a lɛ na ɩ wʊ dãn Nãaŋmɩn tɩ 'yɛr, “Sɩrɛ jaa a daba nyã ɩn nɩtor.”
Ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa na lɔ̃ɔ taa a be nyɛn a lɛ na ɩ ka ba lɩɛb pʊsɔ̃ɔ, na ba waala kulo.
Tɩchɛ a wʊ nɩbɔ̃ɔnsɩ pʊɔn a pɔbɔ bala na tu wʊ yi a Galilee ara tɛɛr tɩ kaara a lɛ na ɩrɛ.
Daba ãsʊɔ mɩ ben be ban bʊɔlɔ Josefʊ, wʊ pʊɔ naa a nɩbɛrɛ pɔ, na wʊ ɩ nɩsʊ̃ nɩ nɩtor.
Wʊ tɔr naa a lɛ ban 'yɛr nɩ a lɛ ban ɩrɛ. Wʊ yi naa a Judiya paal pɔ tẽe ban bʊɔlɔ Arimatɩya, wʊ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ chɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ.
'Lɔ lɛ chen a Pilate sɛ̃ tɩ sʊɔr a Yesu ãgãn ɩka wʊ ũu.
Na wʊ pãa yɔɔ a kũu suun tɩ vil wʊ a fɔpɩla pɔɔ tɩ ũu wʊ a yaa ban chɩ kʊsɩr pɔ, ban ba ũu nɩrɛ sɛrɛ ɛ.
A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ba mɩ chɔɔrɔ ka a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir na piel.
A pɔbɔ bala nɩ a Yesu na 'mataa yi a Galilee wa, ba tu naa a Josefʊ tɩ nyɛ a yaa nɩ a lɛ ban ũu a Yesu.
Tɩ na ba pãa lɩɛb kul tɩ chɔɔr a tãɩ nɩ a kãnyũu vɩla na tɩ fɔ a Yesu ãgãn, tɩchɛ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir jũu, baa dam ɛ, ba pɛ̃n naa a lɛ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ na 'yɛr.
A Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir divɩɛ bio bibio, a pɔbɔ den a kãnyũur vɩla ala ban chɔɔr chiin a be a yaa par.
Ba tɩ nyɛn ka a kʊsɩr bil yi a yaa nɛɛ pɔ.
Ka ba kpɛ tɩchɛ baa nyɛ a Yesu ãgãn ɛ.
A ba ara bẽne a lɛ nɛ ka a dɔɔr ayi wa dũu ba ka a ba bʊ̃sursɩ pɛl saa nyɩɩrfʊ kaar.
Ka a dãbãɛ kpɛ a pɔbɔ, ka ba kpa kpa jur a tẽe, tɩchɛ ka a dɔɔr sʊʊr ba, “Bo so ka yɩ bʊɔrɔ a vʊr a kũusɩ pɔ?
Waa be ka ɛ. Wʊ ir naa. Yɩ tɩɛr a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr kʊ yɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʊn be a yɩ sɛ̃, be a Galilee.
‘Ban nyɔɔ naa a maa Nɩsaal Bie 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɩdɛbɛ nuur pɔ, ka ba kʊ ma a daa ju, tɩchɛ a ber ata daar, ka n lɛ ir ɩ vʊr.’ ”
Be lɛ ba pãa tɩɛr tɔ a wʊ 'yɛrbie.
Ban wa yi a yaa par kul, ba tɩ man a anyãna kʊ a Pie Nɩ Bʊ̃'yen nɩ nɩrɛ jaa.
Mɛɛr na yi Magdala, nɩ Joana nɩ a Jemesɩ ma Mɛɛr nɩ a bamɩne na pʊɔ ba lɛ man a anyãna kʊ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ.
Tɩchɛ baa sɔɔ de a pɔbɔ 'yɛr ɛ, bojũu a ba 'yɛr nyɛntãan jire.
An be a lɛ ka Pita vaa ir jo chen a yaa par, na wʊ tɩ guun muul kaa na wʊ nyɛ a fɔpɩla na for gã wʊ yõ, ka wʊ lɩɛb yi tɩ bẽne a lɛ na ɩ.
A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a wʊ poturbo ayi chiine naa a tẽbile ãsʊɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Emayusɩ na ba jãan a Jerusalɛm ɛ.
Ka ba pãa 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ taa a lɛ jaa na ɩ.
A lɛ ban 'yɛrɛ na ba mana a anyãna kʊrɔ taa, ka a Yesu mãɛ wa pʊɔ ba a ba 'mataa chiine.
Tɩchɛ ka a lɩɩ ba a baa bɔ̃ɔ wʊ ɛ.
Ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Bo lɛ yɩ chiine mana kʊrɔ taa a lɛ mɔ̃?” Ka a nɩbaal kpɛ ba a ba tɛɛ ara.
Ka ba ãsʊɔ yuor na di Kɩleopasɩ sʊʊr wʊ, “Fʊ̃ʊ tɛɛ lɛ ɩ sãan be a Jerusalɛm na faa bɔ̃ɔ lɛ na ɩ a be a ber ayi anyãna ɛ?”
A wʊ sʊʊr, “Bo yele?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “A Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ, Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ lɛ wʊ ɩ, ka a wʊ 'yɛr nɩ a wʊ maalfʊ kpɛ̃mɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a nɩbɛ niem.
A bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a sɩ nɩbɛrɛ nyɔɔ wʊn tɩr ɩka ba kʊ, ka ba kpa wʊ a daa ju.
Tɩchɛ 'lɔ lɛ sɩn mɩ tɩɛrɛ ɩka wʊn faan a Isɩral nɩbɛ. A ala na ɩ dɛɛr jaa nɩ nyã, ber ata nɩ nyã a lɛ na ɩ.
A sɩ pɔbɔ bamɩne lɛ wa 'maa sɩ nɛɛ, a bibio nyãna lɛ ba chen a yaa par,
tɩchɛ baa tɩ nyɛ a wʊ ãgãn ɛ. Na ba wa 'yɛr kʊ sɩ ɩka ba nyɛn malakasɩ ka ba 'yɛr ɩka wʊ ir ɩ vʊr.
Ka a sɩ taaba bamɩne pãa mɩ chen a yaa par tɩ nyɛ ka ɩ a lɛ nɛ a pɔbɔ na 'yɛr lɛ, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ mãɛ baa nyɛ wʊ ɛ.”
Ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ faa tɩɛr lɛ, na yaa tʊ̃ɔ tɩɛr tɔ na yɩ sɔɔ de a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na 'yɛr ɛ?
A ba ɩ a Nɩ-iraa na din a dɔɔyɛ anyãna tɩ na wʊ pãa kpɛ a wʊ tɩɩr pɔ ɛ?”
Wʊ piel naa Mosesɩ nɩ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ba jaa, na wʊ pãa wiil ba a par a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr a wʊ mãɛ 'yɛr.
A lɛ ban wa tara a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ ban chiine, a Yesu po naa fɩka tɛɛr wʊn chiine.
Tɩchɛ ka ba sʊɔr wʊ yãayãabɩlɛ 'yɛrɛ, “Lɩɛb kpɛ wa gã a sɩ sɛ̃, bojũu mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ 'mʊr baar.” Ka wʊ lɩɛb kpɛ na gã a ba sɛ̃.
Be lɛ a ba tɩ 'mataa jãnɛ a bʊ̃diir par na di, ka wʊ de a paanʊ̃ɔ na puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, tɩ piel ŋmara põnõ ba.
Ka a ba nɩbie pãa yuo, ka ba bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Yesu lɛ, tɩ wʊ bɔr a ba niem.
Ka ba 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ taa, “Ala lɛ so wʊn 'yɛrɛ nɩ sɩ a sɔr pɔ ka a nʊ̃ɔ kpɛ sɩ a lɛ, wʊn wiil sɩ a lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ.”
Be lɛ ba vaa ir fɔɔ jaa lɩɛb chen a Jerusalɛm tɩ nyɛ a Pie Nɩ Bʊ̃'yen nɩ a Yesu poturbo bamɩne na lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Na ba 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ a sɩ Soro ir ɩ vʊr, na wʊ ir a wʊ mãɛ wiil a Simon.”
A ba ayi bala pãa man a lɛ na ɩ a sɔr pɔ nɩ a lɛ ban de bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Yesu lɛ wʊn wa ŋma a paanʊ̃ɔ.
A anyãna ban chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ ka a Yesu mãɛ wa ara a ba sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nyã'maar wʊ be a yɩ sɛ̃.”
Ka a dãbãɛ kpɛ ba a ba mii a lɛ a gbɛ gbɛ, tɩɛr ɩka kpĩin lɛ ba nyɛ.
A wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Bo lɛ so ka a dãbãɛ kpɛ yɩ a lɛ, a nɩ bo lɛ so ka yɩ baala a lɛ?
Yɩ kaa nyɛ a n nuur nɩ a gbɛɛ, maa mãɛ lɛ, yɩ sɩɩr ma kaa, kpĩin ba lɛ ɛ. Kpĩin maa tara ãgãn nʊ̃n nɩ kɔɔr nɩtãa lɛ yɩn nyɛ ma ɩn tara ɛ.”
Wʊn 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ baar, wʊ wiil ban a wʊ nuur nɩ a wʊ gbɛɛ.
Tɩchɛ baa chɛnɛ sɔɔ de sɛrɛ ɛ, nʊ̃ɔ kpɛ ba naa ka a nɛɛr 'maa ba, ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Yaa tara bon na kʊ ma ka n di ɛ?”
Be lɛ ba kʊ wʊ jãŋmaa ban wɔ̃,
ka wʊ 'wɔb be a ba niem.
Wʊ pãa 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A anyãna lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ chɛnɛ be a yɩ sɛ̃. Yele a jaa na sɛb a Mosesɩ nɛɛ pɔ, nɩ a ala na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ gãn pɔ, nɩ a yiel gãn pɔ, a n jũu na ɩ naa lɛ.”
Be lɛ wʊ pãa yuo a ba tɩɛr ka ba tʊ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ala na sɛb a wʊ gãn pɔ.
Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A anyãna lɛ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, a Nɩ-iraa na din dɔɔyɛ na wʊ kpi na wʊ lɛ ir ɩ vʊr a ber ata daar.
Ban den a wʊ yuor mʊɔl kʊ nɩbʊrɔ ba jaa, ka ãsʊɔ jaa wa lɩɛb a wʊ tɩɛr, Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ naa a wʊ yeldɛɛr bar, Jerusalɛm lɛ an piel.
Yɩn lɛ ɩ a anyãna dãasɩɛ dẽme.
A maa na tɩ tʊ̃ naa a 'lɔ a n Sãa na tɩr a nɛɛ kʊ yɩ, tɩchɛ yɩ chɛnɛ jãnɛ a Jerusalɛm, ka a kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ wa yi a saaju wa pɔɔ yɩ.”
Wʊ tara ban yin tɩ gbʊrɔ nɩ a Betanɩ na wʊ tur a nuur saaju sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ ba.
A lɛ wʊn sʊɔr a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ ba, wʊ bar ba naa ka Nãaŋmɩn 'mɔɔ wʊ don be a saaju.
A ba pãa gbʊr dumo puor wʊ tɩ lɩɛb pʊpɛl kul a Jerusalɛm.
Bɩbir jaa lɛ ba ma chen be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir tɩ dãna a Nãaŋmɩn.
A pielfʊ daar a 'lɔ ban bʊɔlɔ a 'Yɛr ben be, ka a 'Yɛr be a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, ka a 'Yɛr ɩ Nãaŋmɩn.
Wʊ dɔ̃ɔ be a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ a pielfʊ daar.
A 'Yɛr nyã lɛ Nãaŋmɩn maal bomo a jaa. Bon jaa ba maal ka a ba tu a 'Yɛr nyã pɔ ɛ.
A wʊ pɔ lɛ nyɛvʊr be, a wʊ nyɛvʊr nyã lɛ kʊrɔ bomo a jaa chãa.
A chãa nyã lɛ chaara a libe pɔ, ka libe ba tʊ̃ɔ wʊ kpĩin ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn tʊ̃n daba na di Jɔɔn.
'Lɔ lɛ wa di a dãasɩɛ na wʊ 'yɛr a chãa nyã 'yɛr, ka a nɩrɛ jaa na tu a wʊ sɛ̃ sɔɔ de a chãa.
Jɔɔn ba ɩ a chãa ɛ, tɩ wʊ wa naa ɩka wʊ wa 'yɛr a chãa 'yɛr.
A yelmãɛ chãa nyã lɛ chaara 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩrɛ jaa na waara a wɛr pɔ.
A 'yɛr dɔ̃ɔ be a wɛr pɔ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn gba maal a wɛr tu a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ, tɩchɛ ãsʊɔ jaa ba bɔ̃ɔ wʊ ɛ.
Wʊ wa naa a wʊ mãɛ paal pɔ, tɩchɛ a wʊ mãɛ nɩbɛ ba de wʊ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩbɛ bamɩne de wʊ naa, na ba sɔɔ de a wʊ yuor, ka wʊ kʊ ba sɔr ka ba ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bibiir.
Baa ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bibiir nɩrɛ dɔɔfʊ kaar ɛ, bɩɩ nɩrɛ bɔfʊ pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn mãɛ lɛ maal ba a wʊ bibiir.
A 'yɛr wa ɩ naa nɩrɛ na wʊ jãnɛ a sɩ sɛ̃. Sɩ nyɛ naa a wʊ tɩɩr, a tɩɩr nyã na ɩ a Sãa Bidabʊ̃'yen tɛɛ. 'Lɔ lɛ yi a Sãa sɛ̃ wa, na wʊ tara wãɛfʊ nɩ yelmãɛ.
Jɔɔn 'yɛr a wʊ 'yɛr, na wʊ tãna 'yɛrɛ, “Nyã lɛ n 'yɛr yɩ ɩka wʊn wa naa, 'lɔ na be a n puor waara gar ma naa, bojũu wʊ dɔ̃ɔ be be tɩ ba wa dɔɔ ma.”
A wãɛfʊ sɛɛ wʊ naa, ka a wʊ maal vɩla lʊɔr sɩ jaa bʊ̃'yen 'yen dɔɔlɔ taa waara a sɩ sɛ̃.
Bojũu, Mosesɩ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ waan a nɛɛ, tɩchɛ Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ lɛ waan a wãɛfʊ nɩ yelmãɛ.
Nɩbʊ̃'yen jaa ba nyɛ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, tɩchɛ a Bidabʊ̃'yen tɛɛ 'lɔ na be a Sãa lõboor lɛ wiil sɩ a lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na be.
A nɩbɛrɛ na be a Jerusalɛm tʊ̃n a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlorbo nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ puorfʊ jie sʊ̃sʊ̃nbɔ ka ba tɩ sʊʊr Jɔɔn, nɩbuor lɛ wʊ ɩ,
Ka a Jɔɔn 'yɛr ba, “N ba ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ wʊn tʊ̃ ɩka wʊ wa faa a wʊ nɩbɛ ɛ.”
Ka ba lɛ sʊʊr wʊ ɩka 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Elaija bɩɩ? Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “N ba ɩ wʊ ɛ.” Ka ba lɛ sʊʊr wʊ ka 'lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ɔ? Ka wʊ ɩka, “Kai.”
Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Tɩ an lɛ fʊ pãa ɩ? A sɩn tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a bala na tʊ̃ sɩ, 'yɛr sɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ fʊn ɩ.”
Jɔɔn den a lɛ a Isaiya na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb na wʊ 'yɛr, “Maa lɛ a kɔkɔr 'lɔ na tãna a dãlpʊɔ pɔ, ɩka yɩ chɔɔr a Soro sɔr.”
A Faraseemɩne tʊ̃n nɩbɛ bamɩne a Jɔɔn sɛ̃.
Ba wa sʊʊr wʊ naa, “Ala ɩ fʊ̃ʊ baa ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Nɩ-iraa ɛ, bɩɩ a Elaija ɛ, bɩɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ãsʊɔ ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ a fʊ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ?”
Be lɛ a Jɔɔn 'yɛr ba, “Maa den kʊ̃ɔ suoro nɩ a nɩbɛ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ ben a yɩ pɔ, yɩn ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
An ɩ maa lɛ de nie wa gba, n ba sɛɛ ɩka n for a wʊ nafɔbɔ mibe gba ɛ.”
Jɔɔn be naa a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ puorfʊ jie suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, a Jordan man gɔ̃ɔn na be a Betanɩ, be lɛ wʊ 'yɛr a 'yɛr anyãna.
Wɛr na wa chaar, Jɔɔn nyɛn a Yesu na tor wʊ waara ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Pɛraabile, 'lɔ lɛ na de a wɛr nɩbɛ yeldɛbɛ bar.
Wʊ ɩ naa a 'lɔ ɩn 'yɛr ɩka, ‘nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ na wa naa, wʊ gar ma naa, bojũu 'lɔ dɔ̃ɔ be be tɩ ba wa dɔɔ ma.’
Maa ba bɔ̃ɔ a nɩnyɩnɛ wʊn ɩ ɛ, tɩ naa wa suoro yɩ nɩ kʊ̃ɔ ka bala jaa na be a Isɩral na nyɛ wʊ.”
A Jɔɔn dãasɩɛ nɩ nyã, “N ben be nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na yi saaju fɩka ŋmam, wa 'mar wʊ, ka a Sɩɛ be a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
N ba dɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a nɩnyɩnɛ wʊn ɩ ɛ. A 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma ɩka n wa suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ ma, ‘A nɩrɛ 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ fʊn wa nyɛ a Sɩɛ na suu wa 'mar na waa yi ɛ, 'lɔ lɛ na suoro a nɩbɛ nɩ a Sɩɛ.’
N nyɛn a anyã na ɩ, 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka 'lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Bidabʊ̃'yen.”
A wɛr na chaar go, Jɔɔn ara na a be nɩ a wʊ poturbo ayi.
Be lɛ wʊ nyɛ Yesu na tala, ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Yɩ nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Pɛraabile.”
A Jɔɔn poturbo ayi bala na wõ a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr, ka ba turo a Yesu chiine.
Yesu na wa lɩɛb nyɛ ba, wʊ sʊʊr ba naa, “Bo yɩ bʊɔrɔ?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Wiwile nyɩnɛ fʊ kpɩɛrɛ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yɩ wa bɔ̃ɔ a jie.” Ba jãnɛ naa a wʊ sɛ̃, bojũu mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ bal baar a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.
A nɩbɛ ayi bala na wõ a lɛ Jɔɔn na 'yɛr ka ba turo a Yesu, ãsʊɔ lɛ Andiru na ɩ a Simon Pita yɛbɛ.
Lɛ a Andiru na de nie ɩ lɛ, wʊ bɔ naa a wʊ yɛbɛ Simon 'yɛr wʊ, “Sɩ nyɛn a Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ na wa faa a wʊ nɩbɛ ban bʊɔlɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto.”
Andiru tara naa a yɛbɛ waan a Yesu sɛ̃. Yesu na wa nyɛ wʊ, ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Jɔɔn bidaba Simon, ban bʊɔlɔ fʊ naa Sɩfasɩ.” A wʊ par lɛ Pita.
A ber anaar daar, Yesu chiine naa a Galilee, be lɛ wʊ nyɛ Filip na wʊ bʊɔl wʊ ɩka wʊ wa turo wʊ.
A Filip yin Betɩsaida, Andiru nɩ Pita tẽe.
Filip mɩ chen tɩ nyɛ Natanɩɛl 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Sɩ nyɛn a 'lɔ a Mosesɩ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na sɛb a wʊ yele, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ, Josefʊ bidaba.”
Be lɛ a Natanɩɛl sʊʊr wʊ, “Yelsʊ̃ na tʊ̃ɔ yi a Najaretɩ tẽe ɔ?” Ka a Filip 'yɛr, “Wa kaa.”
Yesu na wa nyɛ a Natanɩɛl na tor wʊ waara, wʊ 'yɛr naa, “Yɩ nyɛ a sɩ sãakpã Isɩral yɔ̃ɔ na ba tara bɛlfʊ ɛ.”
Ka a Natanɩɛl sʊʊr a Yesu, “Ŋmɩnɛ fʊ ɩrɛ wa bɔ̃ɔ ma?” Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Filip na wa bʊɔlɔ fʊ, ka n nyɛ fʊ naa a kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ tɩɛ pĩlem.”
Be lɛ a Natanɩɛl 'yɛr, “Wiwile, fʊ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn Bie nɩ a Isɩral Nãa.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr sɔɔ wʊ, “Fʊ sɔɔ ma naa, bojũu ɩn 'yɛr ɩka n nyɛ fʊ naa a kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ tɩɛ pĩlem ɔ? Fʊn nyɛn yelbɛrɛ ka a gar lɛ.
Na wʊ 'yɛr, sɩrɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ fʊ ɩka fʊn nyɛn saaju na yuo ka a Nãaŋmɩn malakasɩ suro tɩ duoro a maa Nɩsaal Bie 'yɔ̃ɔ.”
A ber a nyã puor, Yesu ma Mɛɛr be naa a pɔɔ ban kulo a tẽe na be a Galilee paal pɔ, ka ba bʊɔlɔ Keena.
Ba bʊɔl Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo ka ba mɩ be be a pɔɔ kulfʊ jie.
A dãa na wa baar, Mɛɛr 'yɛr kʊ Yesu, “A nɩbɛ dãa baar naa.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “N ma, n sɔ̃ɔ ba ta ɛ, ta wiil ma a lɛ ɩn na ɩ ɛ.”
Mɛɛr lɩɛb 'yɛr kʊ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ, “Yɩ ɩ lɛ Jaa a Yesu na wa 'yɛr ɩka yɩ ɩ.”
Kʊsɩɛ dʊʊr ayʊɔb ben be, be lɛ a nɩbɛ ma ɔ̃ɔ a kʊ̃ɔ pɛɛ a ba mãɛ lɛ a ba puorfʊ na ɩka ba ɩ. Yoi anaar bɩɩ anũu lɛ ma sɛɛ ãsʊɔ jaa.
Yesu 'yɛr a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ ɩka ba ɔ̃ɔ kʊ̃ɔ sɛɛ a dʊʊr.
An wa sɛɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ pãa ɔ̃ɔ a kʊ̃ɔ amɩne kʊ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ na kaara a pɔɔ paalaa yele.” Ka a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ ɩ a lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr ba.
Ka a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ na wa nyũ a kʊ̃ɔ ala na lɩɛb ɩ dãa, waa bɔ̃ɔ a jie a dãa na yi ɛ. A tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ 'lɔ bɔ̃ɔ naa. Be lɛ wʊ bʊɔl a pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ,
na wʊ 'yɛr, “Nɩbɛ ma den nie waan a dãnʊ̃ɔ, bala wa nyũ tɩɩ baar, ka ba pãa waan a ala na ba bɔ̃ɔ nʊ̃mɔ̃ ɛ. Tɩchɛ fʊ̃ʊ 'lɔ bin a dãnʊ̃ɔ bar wa ta a baaraa.”
A nɛ'maa yele nyã lɛ de nie Yesu na ɩ a Keena na be a Galilee paal pɔ. Be lɛ Yesu wiil a wʊ tɩɩr, ka a wʊ poturbo sɔɔ de wʊ.
A nyã puor, 'lɔ naa ma nɩ a wʊ yɛbil naa poturbo 'mantaa chen Kapenahum ɩka ba tɩ jɛ̃ bãlãa.
A kʊ̃ lɛ kor ɛ, ka a Juu nɩbɛ Gõl Bar Difʊ ta, Yesu don a Jerusalɛm.
Be lɛ wʊ tɩ nyɛ nɩbɛ na daara niin, piir nɩ papar, a Juu nɩbɛ puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ. Wʊ nyɛn bamɩne mɩ na jɛ̃n tɛɛbʊlsɩ tɛɛrɛ libie.
Wʊ den miir maal kpaara diin ba bar a puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ, nɩ a ba piir nɩ a niin. Wʊ tɩɛ naa a libitɛɛrbɛ tɛɛbʊlsɩ lɔb ka a libie yɛ̃yɛl.
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a bala na daara a papar, “Yɩ yin a papar a ka, na yɩ ta maal ma a Sãa yir daa difʊ jie ɛ.”
Ka a poturbo pãa tɩɛr tɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr, “Lɛ ɩn nʊ̃ a fʊ yir 'moro man fɩka bũu.”
A Juu nɩbɛrɛ pãa sʊʊr a Yesu, “Jãnɛ buor lɛ fʊn maal wiil sɩ ka a ɩ fʊ tara na sɔr fʊn maal a lɛ?”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr, “Yɩ ŋmɛr a puorfʊ yir nyãna, tɩ ka n de ber ata mɛn wʊ go.”
Ka a nɩbɛrɛ 'yɛr, “Yuom lɩjaayi nɩ ayʊɔb lɛ ba de mɛn a puorfʊ yir nyã, ŋmɩnɛ fʊ̃ʊ na ɩ de ber ata tɛɛ mɛn wʊ?”
Tɩchɛ a puorfʊ yir nyã a Yesu na 'yɛrɛ, ɩ naa a wʊ ãgãn lɛ wʊ 'yɛrɛ.
Yesu na wa ir a kũu pɔ, ka a wʊ poturbo tɩɛr yuo a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr, na ba pãa sɔɔ de lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr nɩ lɛ mɩ a Yesu na 'yɛr.
A be a Jerusalɛm a Gõl Bar Difʊ na wa ta, nɩyɔɔ sɔɔn de a wʊ yuor, bojũu ba nyɛn a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ wʊn tʊ̃.
Tɩchɛ Yesu na bɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ jaa tɩɛr, waa sɔɔ de wʊ mãɛ kʊ ba ɛ.
A ba ɩ nɩrɛ lɛ na 'yɛr wʊ lɛ nɩbɛ na be ɛ, bojũu wʊ bɔ̃ɔn nɩrɛ jaa tɩɛr.
Daba dɔ̃ɔ be be a Faraseemɩne pɔ, ka a wʊ yuor di Nikodimasɩ, wʊ mɩ ɩ naa a Juu nɩbɛ nɩdiere ãsʊɔ.
Wʊ dɔ̃ɔ chen a Yesu sɛ̃ tãsɔɔ na wʊ tɩ 'yɛr, “Wiwile, sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ tʊ̃ fʊ ɩka, fʊ wa wiil sɩ. Fʊ kʊ̃ naa tʊ̃ɔ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ anyãna tʊ̃ ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn ba be a fʊ sɛ̃ ɛ.”
Ka a Yesu haa 'yɛr, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ fʊ, fʊ̃ʊ ba nyɛ dɔɔ paalaa ɛ, fʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ ɛ.”
A Nikodimasɩ sʊʊr wʊ, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ban lɛ ɩ dɔɔ nɩkoraa gbɛɛ ayi? Wʊ kʊ̃ lɛ tʊ̃ɔ kpɛ a wʊ ma pʊɔ pɔ ka wʊ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ dɔɔ wʊ go ɛ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ fʊ, fʊ̃ʊ na kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ, ka baa dɔɔ wʊ nɩ a kʊ̃ɔ nɩ a Sɩɛ ɛ.
A 'lɔ a nɩrɛ na dɔɔ ɩ naa nɩrɛ bie, Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ mɩ lɛ na tʊ̃ɔ nɩrɛ lɩɛb ka wʊ ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bie.
Ta ɩ a nɛɛ 'maa fʊ ɩn 'yɛr ɩka a sɛɛ naa ka ba dɔɔfʊ dɔɔ paalaa ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tɛɛ lɛ tɩrɛ a nyɛvʊr paalaa. A Sɩɛ kaar naa sɛsɛbɛ na furo chiine jie 'lɔ wʊn bʊɔrɔ, fʊn tʊ̃ɔn wõ a dɔɔn, tɩchɛ fʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a jie wʊn yi ɛ, bɩɩ a jie wʊn chiine ɛ.”
Ka a Nikodimasɩ sʊʊr wʊ, “Ŋmɩnɛ an ɩ wa ɩ a lɛ?”
Ka a Yesu haa 'yɛr, “Ŋmɩnɛ fʊ ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ wiwile tɩ ba bɔ̃ɔ a anyãna ɛ?
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ fʊ, sɩ 'yɛrɛ naa ala sɩn bɔ̃ɔ, na sɩ di a ala sɩn 'yɛrɛ dãasɩɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ ãsʊɔ jaa ba de a lɛ sɩn 'yɛr ɛ.
Ala ɩ yaa sɔɔ de a wɛr nyã bonsɩ 'yɛr ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ yɩn ɩrɛ wa sɔɔ de ala ɩ, n 'yɛr naa saaju bonsɩ 'yɛr?
Nɩrɛ ba do saaju jaa ɛ, ka a Nɩsaal Bie na yi a be wa tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
A Nɩsaal Bie na 'mɔɔn saaju nɩtãa lɛ a Mosesɩ na maal a kur jɩɛ 'mɔɔ a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ.
Ka nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na pãa sɔɔ de a Nɩsaal Bie na tara na nyɛvʊr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
“Nãaŋmɩn nʊ̃ naa a nɩbɛ na be ka a wɛr pɔ yɔɔ jaa, na wʊ de a wʊ Bidabʊ̃'yen tɛɛ kʊ sɩ, nɩrɛ jaa wa sɔɔ de wʊ, wʊ kʊ̃ wɛ ɛ, tɩ tara a nyɛvʊr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
Bojũu, Nãaŋmɩn ba tʊ̃ a wʊ Bidabʊ̃'yen nyã a wɛr pɔ ɩka wʊ wa sɔ̃ɔ a nɩbɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊ wa naa ɩka wʊ wa faa ba.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na wa sɔɔ de a Nãaŋmɩn Bidabʊ̃'yen nyã, wʊ kʊ̃ sɔ̃ɔ wʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na ba wa sɔɔ de wʊ ɛ, wʊn sɔ̃ɔ wʊn bar, bojũu waa sɔɔ de a Nãaŋmɩn Bidabʊ̃'yen tɛɛ nyã yuor ɛ.
A baaraa nɩ nyã, chãa wan ka a wɛr pɔ, tɩchɛ a nɩbɛ nʊ̃n libe gar a chãa, bojũu a ba maalfʊ ɩn bier.
A nɩbɛ bala na ɩrɛ a bier 'laar chãa, ba kʊ̃ sɔɔ yi chãa pɔ ɛ, bojũu a chãa na wiil naa a lɛ ban be.
Tɩchɛ ãsʊɔ jaa na be be nɩ yelmãɛ ma wan chãa pɔ, bojũu ba bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka a ba taaba ba bɔ̃ɔ ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ maala a lɛ ban maala.”
A nyã puor, Yesu nɩ a wʊ poturbo 'mantaa chen Judiya be lɛ wʊ jɛ̃n ba bãlãa, na wʊ suoro nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ.
Jɔɔn mɩ dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ be a Ainon, a be ba jãa naa Salim ɛ, bojũu kʊ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ be be yɔɔ. Nɩbɛ dɔ̃ɔ chiine a wʊ sɛ̃ ka wʊ suoro ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ.
Baa na nyɔɔ a Jɔɔn pɔɔ sɛrɛ ɛ.
Jɔɔn poturbo bamɩne nɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ chɩrɛ nɩ taa nɩ a ãgãn pɛɛfʊ yele.
Ba chen a Jɔɔn sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, “Wiwile, fʊ 'yɛr a daba 'lɔ sɛ̃ fʊn dɔ̃ɔ be a Jordan man gɔ̃ɔn. Wʊ suoro na nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ ka nɩrɛ jaa chiine a wʊ sɛ̃.”
Ka Jɔɔn haa 'yɛr, “Nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ɩ bon jaa ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn na be a saaju baa sɔɔ ɛ.
Yɩn mãɛ chɛnɛ na tɩɛr a ŋmɩnɛ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr yɩ ɩka n ba ɩ a Nɩ-iraa ɛ. Tɩchɛ wʊ tʊ̃ ma naa ka n de a wʊ nie.
A 'lɔ na kulo a pɔɔ, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a pɔɔ sʊɔ. A wʊ bɩbɩɛlɛ pʊɔ ma pɛl naa wʊn ara a be wõnõ a pɔɔ sʊɔ kɔkɔr. Ala lɛ so ka a n pʊɔ mɩ pɛl.
A sɛɛ naa ɩka Yesu wʊ do, tɩchɛ ka maa suu.
“Nãaŋmɩn Bie nyã lɛ yi a saaju, 'lɔ lɛ gar ba jaa, nɩrɛ na yi ka a tẽe ɩn a tẽe tʊɔr na wʊ ma 'yɛrɛ a tẽe bomo 'yɛr. A 'lɔ na yi a saaju wa gar a bomo a jaa.
Wʊ ma 'yɛr naa a lɛ wʊn nyɛ nɩ a lɛ wʊn wõ tɩ ãsʊɔ jaa maa sɔɔ de wʊ ɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na wa sɔɔ de, a wiil naa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn ɩ naa yelmãɛ sʊɔ.
Bojũu, Nãaŋmɩn tʊ̃ naa a wʊ Bie ka wʊ wa 'yɛr a wʊ 'yɛr. Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃ naa ka a wʊ Sɩɛ sɛɛ wʊ.
A Sãa nʊ̃ naa Bie na wʊ de yele a jaa 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ nũu pɔ.
Nɩrɛ jaa na sɔɔ de a Bie tara na nyɛvʊr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tɔr wʊ, ba tara a nyɛvʊr nyã ɛ, tɩ Nãaŋmɩn suur be a wʊ sɛ̃.”
Yesu bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a Faraseemɩne wõ naa wʊn nyɛrɛ nɩbɛ suoro ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, ka a bala na turo wʊ gar a bala na turo a Jɔɔn.
Tɩchɛ Yesu poturbo lɛ dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, a ba ɩ Yesu mãɛ lɛ ɛ.
Yesu bar naa Judiya tɩ lɩɛb chiine a Galilee go.
Ka a ɩ Samariya lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka wʊ tu.
A sɔr 'lɔ wʊn tu tɩ yi naa a Saika tẽe pɔ, na wʊ gbʊr a wɛr 'lɔ a Jekɔb na dɔ̃ɔ de kʊ a wʊ bidaba Josefʊ a kõr jaa.
A lɔ-ɔ̃ɔ a Jekɔb na dɔ̃ɔ tuu chɛnɛ na be be, ka a Yesu jɛ̃ gbʊr a lɔ-ɔ̃ɔ bojũu wʊ chen bal. Mɔ̃tɔ̃tuo sɔ̃ɔ lɛ.
Ka a Samariya pɔɔ suu a lɔ-ɔ̃ɔ pɔ kʊ̃ɔ ɔ̃ɔfʊ jie. Ka a Yesu sʊɔr wʊ, “Pɔɔ yãayãabɩlɛ, ɔ̃ɔ a kʊ̃ɔ kʊ ma ka n nyũ.”
A Yesu poturbo mɩ kpɛ̃n a tẽe pɔ ɩka ba tɩ da bʊ̃diir.
Ka a Samariya pɔɔ 'yɛr, “Fʊ̃ʊ Juu nɩrɛ, maa mɩ Samariya pɔɔ, taa ɩ ŋmɩnɛ ka fʊ ɩka n kʊ fʊ kʊ̃ɔ ka fʊ nyũ,” sɩn nɩ Juu nɩbɛ na ba mʊɔrɔ taa bũu ɛ?
A Yesu 'yɛr wʊ, “Faa bɔ̃ɔ a bon a Nãaŋmɩn na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ kʊ fʊ ɛ. Faa mɩ bɔ̃ɔ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sʊɔrɔ fʊ a kʊ̃ɔ ɩka wʊ nyũ ɛ, fʊ̃ʊ ta bɔ̃ɔ, fʊn taa sʊɔr man a kʊ̃ɔ 'lɔ na kʊrɔ nyɛvʊr.”
A pɔɔ 'yɛr, “Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, faa tara bʊ̃-ɔ̃ɔnaa ɛ, ka a lɔ-ɔ̃ɔ mɩ yulʊ̃, nyɩnɛ lɛ fʊn nyɛ a kʊ̃ɔ ala na kʊrɔ a nyɛvʊr?
A sɩ sãakpã Jekɔb lɛ tuu a lɔ-ɔ̃ɔ nyãna kʊ sɩ, ka wʊ yɔn nɩ a wʊ dʊ̃n nyuro. Fʊ̃ʊ bɛrma gar a Jekɔb bɩɩ?”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr, “Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa na nyũ a kʊ̃ɔ nyãna, kɔ̃nyũur na kpɛ wʊ̃n go.
Tɩchɛ ãsʊɔ jaa na nyũ a kʊ̃ɔ ala ɩn na kʊ wʊ, kɔ̃nyũur kʊ̃ lɛ kpɛ wʊ go ɛ. A kʊ̃ɔ ala ɩn na kʊ wʊ kaara kɔ̃bulaa na yire, naa kʊrɔ nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ.”
Ka a pɔɔ 'yɛr, “Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ yãayãabɩlɛ, kʊ ma a kʊ̃ɔ ala ka n nyũ, ka a kɔ̃nyũur ta lɛ nyɔɔ ma ka n suu a lɔ-ɔ̃ɔ nyã pɔ go ɛ.”
A Yesu 'yɛr wʊ, “Kul tɩ tara a fʊ sɩrɛ waan.”
Ka a pɔɔ 'yɛr, “N ma tara sɩrɛ ɛ.” A Yesu 'yɛr, “Yelmãɛ fʊ 'yɛr ɩka faa tara sɩrɛ ɛ.
Fʊ dɔ̃ɔ kul sɩrbɛ anũu, tɩ a daba 'lɔ sɛ̃ fʊn be a pʊ̃pãanyã ba ɩ a fʊ sɩrɛ ɛ.”
Ka a pɔɔ 'yɛr, “Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ n nyɛ naa a fʊ ɩ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ.
A sɩ sãakpãmɩne, a tɔ̃ɔ nyã ju lɛ ba ma do tɩ puor a Nãaŋmɩn tɩchɛ a yɩn Juu nɩbɛ 'yɛr ɩka Jerusalɛm tɛɛ lɛ ɩ a puorfʊ jie.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Pɔɔ sɔɔ de ma, sɔ̃ɔ waara an kʊ̃ ɩ a tɔ̃ɔ nyã ju bɩɩ Jerusalɛm yɩn do tɩ puor a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn go ɛ.
A yɩn Samariya nɩbɛ ba bɔ̃ɔ a 'lɔ yɩn puoro ɛ, a sɩn Juu nɩbɛ bɔ̃ɔ naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ sɩn puoro. Bojũu a sɩ jie lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na tu faa nɩbɛ.
Tɩchɛ a sɔ̃ɔ waara, wʊ gɔr ta baar, a bala na puoro a Nãaŋmɩn sɩrɛ jaa, a sɩɛ na wiil ba naa ka ba puor a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ yelmãɛ. Ba nyãna puorfʊ lɛ a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn bʊɔrɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn ɩn sɩɛ, bala na puoro wʊ a sɩɛ pɔ wʊn wiil ba naa ka ba puor wʊ nɩ yelmãɛ pɔ.”
Ka a pɔɔ 'yɛr, “N bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka a Nɩ-iraa na wa naa, a 'lɔ sɩn na bʊɔlɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto. 'Lɔ wa wa, wʊn wiil sɩ naa yele a jaa par.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a pɔɔ, “Maa lɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ nɩ fʊ̃ʊ na 'yɛrɛ a pʊ̃pãanyã.”
Ka a ɩ a poturbo mɩ tɔ̃ɔ ta nyɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ nɩ a pɔɔ ka a nɛɛr 'maa ba. Tɩchɛ ba ãsʊɔ jaa ba 'la sʊʊr wʊ bo lɛ wʊ bʊɔrɔ bɩɩ bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ wʊ 'yɛrɛ nɩ a pɔɔ ɛ.
A jie lɛ a pɔɔ bar a yuor tɩ jo kul a tẽe pɔ tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ,
“Yɩ wa nyɛ daba na 'yɛr ma ala a jaa n na dɔ̃ɔ maal. Kaa 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa naa 'lɔ bɩɩ?”
Nɩrɛ jaa na be a tẽe pɔ yin chen na tɩ kaa a Yesu.
An wa ɩrɛ a lɛ ka a poturbo sʊɔr a Yesu. “Wiwile yãayãabɩlɛ, di bʊ̃diir.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “N tara na bʊ̃diir yɩn ba bɔ̃ɔ a yele ɛ.”
Ka wʊ poturbo piel sʊrɔ taa, “Nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ tɔ̃ɔ waan bon kɔ̃ɔ wa kʊ wʊ ka wʊ di bɩɩ?”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “N bʊ̃diir lɛ ka n ɩ a lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na bʊɔrɔ, 'lɔ lɛ tʊ̃ ma, ka n baar a tʊ̃mɔ̃ 'lɔ wʊn kʊ ma ɩka n tʊ̃.
Yɩn 'lɔ 'yɛr naa ɩka a chɛn ŋmɛrsɩ anaar ka a ŋmab ta, maa 'yɛr kʊ yɩ ɩka, yɩ kaa yɩn nyɛn a por bonsɩ na mʊ̃ɔ sɛɛ ŋmab.
Pʊ̃pãanyã gba, a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ bala na ŋmara nyɛrɛ naa a ba sãyar, ban lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bʊ̃ŋmarsɩ waara nɩ nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃. Ka a bala na bʊr a bʊ̃bie nɩ a ŋmaŋmarba pãa 'mataa chɩlɛ.
A sʊkpa na ɩ yelmãɛ ɩka, bamɩne lɛ bʊr ka bamɩne mɩ ŋma.
Maa tʊ̃nɔ̃ yɩ naa ɩka, yɩ chen tɩ ŋma a puo 'lɔ pɔ a bamɩne na tʊ̃ hãn.”
Nɩyɔɔ na yi a Samariya tẽe pɔ sɔɔn de Yesu, bojũu a pɔɔ 'yɛr kʊ ba ɩka, “A daba nyã 'yɛr naa a lɛ jaa n na dɔ̃ɔ maal.”
Ba wan wa sʊɔr wʊ ɩka wʊ jãnɛ a ba tẽe, ka wʊ jɛ̃ be ber ayi.
A Samariya tẽe dẽme yɔɔ jie mɩ lɛ sɔɔn de Yesu bojũu ba wʊn a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr.
Be a ba 'yɛr kʊ a pɔɔ, “A ba ɩ lɛ fʊn 'yɛr kʊ sɩ jũu sɩ sɔɔ de a Yesu ɛ, sɩn mãɛ wõ naa a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr kʊ sɩ, ka sɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka 'lɔ lɛ na faa a wɛr nɩbɛ.”
A ber ayi na po, wʊ yin a be na wʊ chen Galilee.
Yesu 'yɛr naa, “Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ nyɛrɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ jie jaa, tɩchɛ a ba tẽe dẽme ba 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ba ɛ.”
Wʊn wa ta a Galilee, a nɩbɛ de wʊn nuur ayi a be, bojũu ba mɩ dɔ̃ɔ chen a Jerusalɛm a Gõl Bar Difʊ jie tɩ nyɛ a lɛ jaa wʊn maal.
Yesu na wa be a Galilee, wʊ lɩɛb chen a Keena tẽe pɔ be wʊn dɔ̃ɔ lɩɛb a kʊ̃ɔ ka a ɩ a dãa. Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kɔ̃ɔ ben Kapenahum ka a wʊ bie bɩɛrɛ.
Wʊn wa wõ ɩka a Yesu yin a Galilee wa a Judiya, wʊ chen tɩ sʊɔr wʊ ɩka wʊ sãa a wʊ bie na kpire.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, “Yɩn baa nyɛ jãnɛ nɩ nɛ'maa yele ɛ, yɩ kʊ̃ sɔɔ de ɛ.”
Ka a daba 'yɛr, “Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, yãayãabɩlɛ, wa ka a n bie ta kpi ɛ.”
A Yesu pãa 'yɛr, “A fʊ bie sa naa, kulo a yir.” A daba sɔɔn de a lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr na wʊ lɩɛb kulo a yir.
Ka a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ na yi a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ yir tuor wʊ a sɔr pɔ 'yɛr, “A fʊ bie sa naa.”
A wʊ sʊʊr ba a sɔ̃ɔ buor a bie na sa, ka ba 'yɛr, “Jãa mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na vɩrʊ̃ lɛ a ãgãn tul bar wʊ.”
Ka a bie sãa tɩɛr tɔ an ɩ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ vɩr naa a jãa, a Yesu na 'yɛr, “A fʊ bie sa naa.” A daba naa bala ba jaa na be a wʊ yir sɔɔn de a Yesu.
A nɛ'maa yelsɩ ayi lɛ anyã Yesu na tʊ̃ wʊn yi a Judiya na wʊ chen a Galilee.
A anyã puor, a Juu nɩbɛ tara na lɔ̃ɔ di ka a Yesu chen a be a Jerusalɛm.
A tẽe pɔ, gbatarbile ben be ka a jɛ̃bɛrsɩ anũu be be. A jie gbʊr a be ban bʊɔlɔ a piir dɔ̃dɔr, ka a Juu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr pɔ a ba bʊɔlɔ Betesda.
A jɛ̃bɛrsɩ ala pɔ baal bʊrsɩ ben be, jɔ̃n, bamɩne gbɛɛ na kpi kpi nɩ gbɛrsɩ ka ba gã kɔɔ a kʊ̃ɔ.
A gbatarbile 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ koor mɩ lɛ nɩbaala na bɛ yuom lɩjɛr nɩ pie nɩ aniin (38) na wʊ gã a be.
Yesu na wa nyɛ a daba, wʊ bɔ̃ɔn naa wʊn gbɛr kor, ka wʊ sʊʊr wʊ, “Fʊ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka fʊ sa bɩɩ?”
Ka a daba 'yɛr, “Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, n ba tara nɩrɛ na 'mɔɔ ma 'yɔ̃ɔ a kʊ̃ɔ pɔ 'lɔ wa dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ, n ma mʊɔrɔ naa ɩka n kpɛ, tɩchɛ ka a nɩrɛ ma dɔ̃ɔ ma nie kpɛ.”
A Yesu pãa 'yɛr wʊ, “'Mɔɔ a fʊ bʊ̃gãnaa chiine.”
Ajienaa ka a daba sa, na wʊ 'mɔɔ a sɔ̃ɔ chiine. A Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir daar lɛ a anyãna ɩ.
A Juu nɩbɛrɛ na wa nyɛ a daba na tuo a sɔ̃ɔ, ka ba 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir lɛ, nɩrɛ jaa ba tara sɔr ɩka wʊ tuo a wʊ sɔ̃ɔ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir ɛ.”
Tɩchɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr, “A daba 'lɔ na sa ma lɛ 'yɛr kʊ ma ɩka n 'mɔɔ a sɔ̃ɔ chiine.”
Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Nɩbuor lɛ 'yɛr fʊ ɩka fʊ 'mɔɔ a sɔ̃ɔ tuo chiine?”
A daba ba dɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a Yesu a nɩbuor wʊn ɩ ɛ, Yesu kpɛ̃n a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ.
A nyã puor, a Yesu nyɛn a daba a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir pɔ na wʊ 'yɛr wʊ, “Fʊ pãa sãn pʊ̃pãanyã, taa wa ɩrɛ yeldɛɛr go ɛ, ka amɩne wa pɔɔ fʊ gar a lɛ ɛ.”
Ka a daba chen tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a Juu nɩbɛrɛ, Yesu lɛ ɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sa ma.
Ba piel bʊɔrɔ sɔɩ na ɩ Yesu yele bojũu wʊ ma tʊ̃nɔ̃ naa a anyãna a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr ba, “N Sãa ba vɛ̃ anyãna tʊ̃fʊ ɛ, ala lɛ so ka n mɩ tʊ̃nɔ̃.”
A nɩbɛrɛ tara na yele ayi ban bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba kõn Yesu. Wʊ sɔ̃ɔ naa a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir yele, tɩchɛ a dɛɛr 'lɔ jaa lɛ wʊn 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn ɩ naa a wʊ Sãa, na wʊ de a wʊ mãɛ ka 'lɔ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn ɩ bʊ̃'yen.
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka a Bie kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ maal bon jaa ɛ. Wʊn tʊ̃ɔ ɩ a lɛ tɛɛ wʊn nyɛ a Sãa na maala, bojũu a Bie ma maal naa a lɛ nɛ wʊn nyɛ a Sãa na maala.
A Sãa nʊ̃n a Bie na wʊ wiil wʊ a yele a jaa wʊn maal. A Sãa gba na wiil wʊn yelbɛrɛ ka yɩ nɛɛr 'maa.
