A lɛ a Sãa na ma sãɩ a kũu na wʊ kʊ wʊ nyɛvʊr, lɛ lɛ a Bie mɩ na kʊ a ãsʊɔ jaa wʊn bʊɔrɔ a nyɛvʊr.
A Sãa gba ba tɔɔrɔ nɩrɛ jaa 'yɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊ ɩka a Bie wʊ tɔɔr nɩrɛ jaa 'yɛr.
A Sãa bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka ba 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Bie nɩtãa lɛ ban 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʊ. Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa wa tɔr ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a Bie ɛ, lɛ mɩ lɛ wʊ tɔr, ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a Sãa na tʊ̃ wʊ ɛ.
“Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, ãsʊɔ jaa na wõ a lɛ ɩn na 'yɛr tɩ sɔɔ de a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma, tara na nyɛvʊr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃. Ba kʊ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ 'yɛr ɛ. Wʊ yin kũu pɔ, tɩ kpɛ nyɛvʊr pɔ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, sɔ̃ɔ waara, wʊ ben ta ka a kũn na wõ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie kɔkɔr. A bala na wõ naa, na ir tara nyɛvʊr.
Bojũu a Sãa tara na kpɛ̃ɔ kʊrɔ nyɛvʊr. Wʊ den a kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ kʊ a Bie ka wʊ mɩ tara nyɛvʊr.
Wʊ kʊ wʊn sɔr ɩka wʊ tɔɔr nɩrɛ jaa 'yɛr, bojũu wʊ ɩ naa Nɩsaal Bie.
“Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a 'maa yɩ nɛɛ ɛ. A sɔ̃ɔ na wa naa, ka a kũn wõ a Nɩsaal Bie kɔkɔr,
na ba yire a ba yar pɔ. Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa na maal vɩla, na yin kpɛ nyɛvʊr pɔ, ka a ãsʊɔ jaa mɩ na maal dɛɛr na yin kpɛ sɔ̃ɔfʊ pɔ.
N kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ maal bon jaa nɩ maa mãɛ kpɛ̃ɔ ɛ. 'Lɔ lɛ 'yɛr ma a lɛ ɩn na tɔɔrɔ ka a n tɔɔrfʊ tara sɔr bojũu n turo naa a wʊ nɛɛ, a ba ɩ n ɩrɛ na lɛ ɩn bʊɔrɔ ɛ.
“Maa 'yɛrɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a n mãɛ, sɔr jaa ba be be na wiil ɩka yelmãɛ lɛ ɛ.
Nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ ben be na 'yɛrɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma, ka n mɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a lɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ ɩn yelmãɛ.
“Yɩ tʊ̃n nɩbɛ a Jɔɔn sɛ̃ ka wʊ tɩ 'yɛr ba a yelmãɛ.
N ba dɩɛl lɛ nɩbɛ na 'yɛrɛ a n 'yɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ yɩ naa anyãna ka yɩ na tʊ̃ɔ nyɛ faafʊ.
Jɔɔn dɔ̃ɔ ɩ fɩka fãtɩn na chaar yɔ̃ɔ ka yɩ pʊɔ pɛl, a yɩ chɩl a chãa nyã pɔ bãlãa.
“Bon kɔ̃ɔ na tɩrɛ gar a lɛ a Jɔɔn na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a n 'yɛr, naa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ala a Sãa na kʊ ma ɩka n tʊ̃. A anyãna a jaa 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ ma, naa wiil ɩka a Sãa lɛ tʊ̃ ma.
A Sãa mɩ na tʊ̃ ma 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ ma, tɩchɛ yaa wõ a wʊ kɔkɔr bɩɩ nyɛ a wʊ nie jaa ɛ.
Yaa sɔɔ a wʊ 'yɛr ɛ, bojũu yɩ tɔr na yaa sɔɔ de a 'lɔ wʊn tʊ̃ ɛ.
Yɩ ma chɛ̃pɛ̃ naa a Nãaŋmɩn gãma, bojũu yɩ tɩɛr naa ɩka be lɛ yɩn nyɛ nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ. Maa 'yɛr lɛ a gãma anyãna 'yɛrɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ tɔr naa na wa a n sɛ̃ wa nyɛ nyɛvʊr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
“N baka ba be nɩrɛ pɛɛfʊ pɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ n bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a yɩ ãsʊɔ jaa ba nʊ̃ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ.
Maa waan naa a n Sãa yuor, ka yaa de ma ɛ. Tɩchɛ yɩn den nɩbɛ na waan ba mãɛ yuor.
Ŋmɩnɛ yɩn ɩrɛ wa sɔɔ? Yɩn na bʊɔrɔ ɩka a yɩ barmɩne ba pɛɛrɛ yɩ, ka yɩ baka ba be a pɛɛfʊ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ na kʊ yɩ ɛ.
“Tɩchɛ, yɩ taa tɩɛr ɩka ɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩn 'yɛr a Sãa niem ɛ. Yɩ den a yɩ tɩɛr dɔɔl Mosesɩ, 'lɔ nɩ wʊ ju lɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ 'yɛr.
Maa 'yɛr lɛ a Mosesɩ na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb, ala ɩ yɩn ta sɔɔ wʊ, yɩn taa sɔɔ ma naa.
Tɩchɛ yɩn ba sɔɔ a lɛ a Mosesɩ na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ yɩn ɩrɛ wa sɔɔ a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr?”
A anyã puor, Yesu gɔ̃ɔ naa a Galilee man gɔ̃ɔn be ban bʊɔlɔ a Tiberiyas.
Nɩyɔɔ tu wʊn chen ban nyɛ wʊn tʊ̃ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ na wʊ sãa baalsɩ.
Ka a Yesu pãa do a tɔ̃ɔ ju, na wʊ tɩ jãnɛ nɩ a wʊ poturbo.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ Gõl Bar Difʊ mɩ gbʊr.
Yesu na wa nyɛ a nɩyɔɔ ka ba waara a wʊ sɛ̃, wʊ sʊʊr Filip, “Nyɩnɛ lɛ sɩn nyɛ bʊ̃diir kʊ a nɩbɛ banyãna?”
Wʊ sʊʊr a nɩtɔ̃ ɩka wʊ bɛɛr a Filip kaa, tɩ bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ wʊn na ɩ.
Ka a Filip 'yɛr, “Faa bɔ̃ɔ ka an den ŋmɛrsɩ aniin sãyar a fʊn dãn paanʊ̃ɔ jaa pʊʊr kʊ a nɩbɛ banyãna ɛ?”
Andiru na ɩ a Simon Pita yɛbɛ, a Yesu poturo ãsʊɔ lɛ, ka wʊ 'yɛr.
“Dabile ben ka na wʊ tara a chi jɔ̃n paanʊ̃ɔ anũu nɩ jãmɛ ayi, tɩ bo an maal a nɩyɔɔ banyãna?”
Mʊɔr pɔɔn a tẽe wʊ jaa, ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a poturbo ka ba ɩ a nɩbɛ jãnɛ jãnɛ. A nɩbɛ bala dɔ̃ɔ ɩ tur anũu (5,000).
Yesu den a paanʊ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ nũu pɔ tɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, tɩ de a paanʊ̃ɔ põ a nɩbɛ, na wʊ lɛ de a jãmɛ mɩ põ ba.
Ka a nɩbɛ di lɛ ban bʊɔrɔ, ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a poturbo ɩka ba wob a bʊ̃ŋmaara ala na chɛ, ka a bon jaa ta wɛ ɛ.
Lɛ lɛ ba wob a ala na chɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ pɛr pie nɩ ayi a chi paanʊ̃ɔ anũu ala.
A nɩbɛ na wa nyɛ a anyã baar lɛ a Yesu na tʊ̃ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃, ba piel 'yɛrɛ, “A nyã lɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ 'lɔ na wa a wɛr pɔ.”
Yesu na wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka ba bʊɔrɔ naa na fɩr wʊ ka wʊ ɩ a ba nãa, wʊ don a tɔ̃ɔ ju wʊ yõ.
A jãanʊɔr 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, a Yesu poturbo lɩɛb suu a man pɔ.
Na ba tɩ kpɛ a gboro pɔ piel gɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Kapenahum. A jãanɔ'maar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ Yesu ba wa a ba sɛ̃ sɛrɛ ɛ.
A sɛsɛkpɛ̃ɛ furo na ka a kʊ̃ɔ dãdaala.
Ka a poturbo na wa mɔ̃ kpɛ sɔɔ jaa, ba nyɛn a Yesu na chiine a kʊ̃ɔ ju waara a gboro par ka dãbãɛ kpɛ ba.
Tɩchɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Maa lɛ, yɩ ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ.”
Ka ba ta ɩka ba de wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ a gboro pɔ, tɩ ajienaa ka a gboro mɩ ta a gogoro nɛɛ a jie 'lɔ ban chiine.
A wɛr na wa chaar, a nɩyɔɔ bala na jãnɛ a man gɔ̃ɔn bɔ̃ɔn na ɩka gboro bʊ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be. Ka Yesu naa poturbo ba 'mataa kpɛ wʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ bala tɛɛ lɛ chiine.
Ka gboi amɩne na yi Tiberiyas wa ara gbʊr a be a Yesu na dɔ̃ɔ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan tɩ ka a nɩbɛ di a bʊ̃diir.
A nɩbɛ na wa nyɛ ka a Yesu bɩɩ a wʊ poturbo ba be be ɛ, ba kpɛ̃n a gboi ala chiine a Kapenahum na tɩ bɔ a Yesu.
Ban wa tɩ nyɛ wʊ a manyal gɔ̃ɔn, ba sʊʊr wʊ naa, “Wiwile, dabor fʊ wa ka?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊ̃rɔ yɩ, yɩ yʊɔrɔ na bʊɔrɔ ma a ba ɩ a nɛ 'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ yɩn nyɛ ɩn tʊ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bʊ̃diir yɩn di tɩɩ jũu.
Yɩ ta tʊ̃nɔ̃ bʊɔrɔ bʊ̃diir anyã na sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ yɩ tʊ̃nɔ̃ bʊɔrɔ bʊ̃diir anyã na kʊ yɩ nyɛvʊr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, ala lɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie na kʊ yɩ. Bojũu 'lɔ lɛ a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn kʊ sɔr ɩka wʊ ɩ a lɛ.”
Be lɛ ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Bãa lɛ sɩn na ɩ na sɩ tʊ̃ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʊɔrɔ?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Nãaŋmɩn tʊ̃mɔ̃ nɩ nyã ɩka yɩ sɔɔ de a 'lɔ wʊn tʊ̃.”
Lɛ lɛ ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Nɛ'maa tʊ̃buor lɛ fʊn tʊ̃ ka sɩ nyɛ tɩ sɔɔ de fʊ? Bo lɛ fʊn ɩ?
A sɩ sãakpãmɩne din a maana a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb. Wʊ kʊ ba naa a bʊ̃diir na yi saaju ka ba di.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, a ba ɩ Mosesɩ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ kʊ yɩ a bʊ̃diir ala na yi a saaju ɛ, tɩchɛ a n Sãa lɛ dɔ̃ɔ kʊ yɩ a yelmãɛ bʊ̃diir ala na yi a saaju.
A Nãaŋmɩn bʊ̃diir ɩ naa a 'lɔ na yi a saaju wa, na wʊ wa kʊrɔ a wɛr nɩbɛ nyɛvʊr.”
Ka ba 'yɛr, “Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, an yi a dɩna tɩ chiine, kʊrɔ sɩ a bʊ̃diir ala.”
Be a Yesu pãa 'yɛr, “Maa lɛ a bʊ̃diir ala na kʊrɔ nyɛvʊr, 'lɔ jaa na wa n sɛ̃ kʊ̃ lɛ chiin kɔ̃ ɛ. 'Lɔ jaa mɩ na sɔɔ de ma, kɔ̃nyũur kʊ̃ lɛ kpɛ wʊ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a lɛ n na 'yɛr kʊ yɩ, yɩ nyɛ ma naa tɩ yaa sɔɔ de ma ɛ.
Bala ba jaa a Sãa na kʊ ma, ban wan a n sɛ̃. Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa mɩ wa wa a n sɛ̃, n kʊ̃ dii wʊ bar ɛ.
Bojũu, n ba yi a saaju wa ɩka n wa ɩ a n bɔfʊ ɛ, tɩ n wa naa ɩka n wa ɩ a Sãa bɔfʊ. 'Lɔ lɛ tʊ̃ ma.
A nyã lɛ ɩ a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma bɔfʊ, ka n taa ɩrɛ wa vɛ̃ ka bala jaa wʊn kʊ ma bɔr ɛ, tɩchɛ ka n sãɩ ba, ka ba ir ɩ vʊɛ a ber baaraa daar.
Bojũu, a n Sãa bɔfʊ nɩ nyã ɩka, nɩrɛ jaa na kaa a Bie na wʊ sɔɔ de wʊ, ban tara naa a nyɛvʊr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, ka n sãɩ ba, ka ba ir ɩ vʊɛ a ber baaraa daar.”
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ piel hũhũnõ bojũu a Yesu 'yɛr ɩka, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a bʊ̃diir 'lɔ na yi a saaju wa.
Ka ba 'yɛrɛ, “A ba ɩ a Yesu lɛ a nyã ɛ, a Josefʊ bidaba, a wʊ sãa nɩ a wʊ ma sɩn bɔ̃ɔ ɛ? Ŋmɩnɛ wʊ ɩrɛ wa 'yɛr ɩka saaju lɛ n yi wa?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr ba, “Yɩ bar a hũhũfʊ.
Nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ wa a n sɛ̃ ɛ, ka a Sãa na tʊ̃ ma baa tɔɔ wʊ waan ɛ, ka n sãɩ wʊ ka wʊ ir ɩ vʊr a ber baaraa daar.
A Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ãsʊɔ dɔ̃ɔ sɛb, ‘Nãaŋmɩn na wiil ba jaa.’
Nɩrɛ jaa ba nyɛ a Sãa ɛ, a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, 'lɔ tɛɛ lɛ nyɛ a Sãa.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sɔɔ de ma tara na nyɛvʊr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
Maa lɛ ɩ a bʊ̃diir ala na tara nyɛvʊr.
A yɩ sãakpãmɩne dɔ̃ɔ di a maana a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ tɩ chɛnɛ kpi.
Tɩchɛ a bʊ̃diir 'lɔ na yi a saaju wa nɩ nyã, 'lɔ lɛ nɩrɛ na di na wʊ kʊ̃ kpi ɛ.
Maa lɛ ɩ a nyɛvʊr bʊ̃diir 'lɔ na yi a saaju wa. Ala ɩ nɩrɛ di naa a bʊ̃diir nyãna, wʊn ben be jaa kpo kpo. A bʊ̃diir nyã ɩ naa a n ãgãn ɩn de kʊrɔ a nɩbɛ na be a wɛr pɔ, ka ba na nyɛ nyɛvʊr.”
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ piel chɩrɛ taa nɩ suur na ba 'yɛrɛ, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a daba nyãna na ɩrɛ wa kʊ sɩ a wʊ ãgãn ka sɩ 'wɔb?”
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ. Yɩn baa 'wɔb a Nɩsaal Bie ãgãn na yɩ nyũ a wʊ jãɩ ɛ, yaa tara nyɛvʊr ɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na 'wɔb a n ãgãn na wʊ nyũ a n jãɩ tara na a nyɛvʊr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, tɩ ka n sãɩ wʊ a wʊ ir ɩ vʊr a ber baaraa daar.
A n ãgãn ɩ naa bʊ̃dimãɛ, ka n jãɩ mɩ ɩ bʊ̃nyũmãɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na 'wɔb a n ãgãn na wʊ nyũ a n jãɩ, be naa a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ka n mɩ be a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Nɩtãa lɛ a Sãa na ɩ a nyɛvʊr sʊɔ na tʊ̃ ma ka n be be a Sãa jũu, nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na 'wɔb ma mɩ na ben be a maa jũu.
A bʊ̃diir nyã lɛ yi a saaju wa. Sɩ sãakpãmɩne dɔ̃ɔ di a maana tɩ kpi, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na di a bʊ̃diir nyã na ben be kpo kpo.”
Yesu na dɔ̃ɔ wile ba a Juu nɩbɛ lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir a Kapenahum ala lɛ wʊ 'yɛr a nyãna.
Yesu poturbo yɔɔ na wa wõ a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr, ka ba 'yɛr, “A fʊ wiilfʊ nyã kpɛ̃mɛ na kpɛ, an lɛ na tʊ̃ɔ de?”
Yesu na bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ a poturbo na hũhũnõ, ka wʊ sʊʊr ba, “A nɩtɔ̃ chɛ yɩn bɩɩ?
Ŋmɩnɛ an pãa kaara, yɩn wa nyɛ a Nɩsaal Bie na duoro a jie 'lɔ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ be?
'Lɔ na kʊrɔ a nɩrɛ nyɛvʊr ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ. Nɩrɛ mãɛ fɔ̃ɔ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ maal bon jaa ɛ. A 'yɛr ala ɩn 'yɛr yɩ, ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr, naa ɩ Nyɛvʊr.
Tɩchɛ a yɩ bamɩne ba sɔɔ ɛ.” Bojũu, Yesu bɔ̃ɔn naa a pielfʊ a 'lɔ na ba sɔɔ de wʊ ɛ, nɩ a 'lɔ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ.
Be lɛ wʊ 'yɛr, “Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ so ka n 'yɛr ɩka ãsʊɔ jaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ wa a n sɛ̃ ɛ, ka a Sãa baa waan wʊ ɛ.”
An yi a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a poturbo yɔɔ ŋmaan yi na baa lɛ turo wʊ go ɛ.
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr a Pie Nɩ Ayi bala, “A yɩn mɩ, yɩ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka yi ŋmaa yi bɩɩ?”
Be a Simon Pita 'yɛr, “N Soro, an sɛ̃ lɛ sɩn chen? An ɩ fʊ̃ʊ tɛɛ lɛ tara a nyɛvʊr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ.
Sɩ sɔɔn de na sɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka fʊ ɩ naa a chɛchɛ sʊɔ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na tʊ̃.”
Ka a Yesu haa 'yɛr, “A ba ɩ maa lɛ ir a yɩ Pie Nɩ Ayi ɛ? Tɩchɛ ka a yɩ ãsʊɔ ɩ Satan tʊɔr.”
Wʊ 'yɛrɛ naa a Judas na ɩ a Pie Nɩ Ayi ãsʊɔ na wa gar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ. Wʊ ɩ naa a Simon bidaba na yi Isɩkariyot.
A anyã puor, Yesu yi naa Judiya tɩ yʊɔrɔ a Galilee paal pɔ, bojũu a Juu nɩbɛ bʊɔrɔ naa a wʊ kʊfʊ.
Tɩchɛ a Juu nɩbɛ sɛɛr pɔ lɔ̃ɔ di bɩbir na wa gbʊrɔ,
a Yesu yɛbil 'yɛr wʊ naa, “Yi a ka chen a Judiya ka a fʊ poturbo mɩ tɩ nyɛ a fʊ nɛ 'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃.
Nɩrɛ jaa na bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba bʊɔlɔ a wʊ yuor ba sɔɔlɔ ɛ. Fʊn maala a nyãna, wiil a fʊ mãɛ ka nɩbɛ jaa nyɛ fʊ.”
Bojũu a wʊ mãɛ yɛbil ba sɔɔ de wʊ gba ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, a Yesu 'yɛr ba, “A n bɩbir ba vɩɛ ɛ, yɩn bɩbir vɩɛ naa.
A wɛr nɩbɛ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ 'laar yɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ ba 'laar ma naa bojũu n 'yɛr ba naa ɩka a lɛ ban ɩrɛ ɩn dɛɛr.
Yɩn, yɩ chiine a lɔ̃ɔ di jie. Maa ba chiine a lɔ̃ɔ di jie sɛrɛ ɛ, bojũu n bɩbir ba vɩɛ ɛ.”
Wʊ 'yɛr naa lɛ tɩ chɛnɛ jãnɛ a Galilee.
A wʊ yɛbil na wa chen a lɔ̃ɔ di jie baar ka wʊ mɩ ir sɔɔl chen.
A lɔ̃ɔ di jie lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ jʊrɔ wʊ tɩ sʊrɔ taa, “Nyɩnɛ lɛ a daba 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ be?”
A nɩyɔɔ bala bʊlɔ na 'yɛrɛ kʊ̃rɔ taa, “A Yesu ɩn nɩsʊ̃.” Ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛrɛ, “Nɩbɛlɛ lɛ wʊ ɩ.”
Tɩchɛ baa 'lara 'yɛrɛ ka a yire chãa pɔ ɛ, bojũu ba joro naa a Juu nɩbɛrɛ dãbãɛ.
A lɔ̃ɔfʊ na wa põ jãtaa, Yesu don kpɛ a Juu nɩbɛ puorfʊ jie na wʊ tɩ piel wile.
Ka a nɛɛr 'maa a Juu nɩbɛrɛ ka ba sʊrɔ taa, “Ŋmɩnɛ a daba nyã ɩrɛ wa bɔ̃ɔ a nɩtɔ̃ wʊn ba jãn ɛ?”
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A wiilfʊ nyã ba yi a n sɛ̃ ɛ, a yi naa a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma sɛ̃.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kaa ir ɩka wʊn ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʊ, wʊn bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka a wiilfʊ nyã yin Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ bɩɩ n mãɛ lɛ n wile.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na 'yɛrɛ a wʊ mãɛ 'yɛr, bʊɔrɔ na 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ kʊrɔ a wʊ mãɛ. Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tʊ̃nɔ̃ bʊɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ kʊrɔ a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ wʊ, a nɩnyɩnɛ ɩn yelmãɛ sʊɔ ka a bɛlfʊ ba be a wʊ jie ɛ.
Mosesɩ baa dɔ̃ɔ bin a Nɛɛ kʊ yɩ ɛ? Tɩ yɩ ãsʊɔ jaa ba tʊ̃ɔ tu ɛ. Bo 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka yɩ kʊ ma?”
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala 'yɛr, “Sɩdɛɛr lɛ fʊ tara, an bʊɔrɔ fʊ kʊfʊ?”
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Gbɛbʊ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ n be tʊ̃, tɩchɛ ka a be 'maa yɩ a nɛɛ a nɩtɔ̃?
Mosesɩ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ wiil yɩ a yʊɔr ŋmaafʊ an ba ɩ 'lɔ sɛ̃ lɛ a dɔ̃ɔ yi ɛ, tɩ yi a sãakpãmɩne sɛ̃, ka ba ma ŋmaa yʊɔr a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar.
Ala ɩ yɩn tʊ̃ɔ ŋmaa bibile yʊɔr a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar tɩ ka a Mosesɩ nɛɛ 'lɔ wʊn bin ba sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, bo lɛ so ka yɩ nyɛ suur 'yɔ̃ɔ ma nɩrɛ ɩn sa a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar?
Yɩ ta bʊ̃nɔ̃ tɔɔr ɛ, tɩ yɩ tɔɔrɔ a lɛ na tor.”
Nɩbɛ bamɩne na yi Jerusalɛm piel sʊrɔ taa, “A ba ɩ a daba nyã lɛ ba bʊɔrɔ a kʊfʊ ɛ,
nyɛ wʊn ara 'yɛrɛ chãa pɔ, ka baa 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr ɛ? A nɩbɛrɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka 'lɔ lɛ a Nɩ-iraa bɩɩ?
Tɩchɛ sɩn bɔ̃ɔ naa a jie 'lɔ a daba nyãna na yi. A Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ wa wa, nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ bɔ̃ɔ a jie wʊn na yi ɛ.”

Yesu chɛnɛ na wile a be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ, na wʊ tãna 'yɛrɛ, “Ɔ̃ɔ yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ma naa, na yɩ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ a jie 'lɔ n na yi. N ba be ka nɩ n mãɛ kpɛ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma ɩn yelmãɛ sʊɔ, yɩn ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ maa bɔ̃ɔ wʊ naa, wʊ sɛ̃ lɛ n yi, 'lɔ lɛ tʊ̃ ma.”
A anyã lɛ ba ta bʊɔrɔ a wʊ nyɔɔfʊ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ jaa ba lɩɛb wʊ nũu sɩɩr wʊ ɛ, bojũu a wʊ bɩbir ba vɩɛ ɛ.
A nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ, bamɩne chɛnɛ na sɔɔ de wʊ na ba 'yɛrɛ, “A Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ wa wa, wʊn tʊ̃n nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ gar a daba nyã bɩɩ?”
Faraseemɩne wõn a lɛ a nɩyɔɔ bala na bʊlɔ 'yɛrɛ a Yesu 'yɛr, ka a bala naa Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ tʊ̃ a puorfʊ yir kakaarba ka ba tɩ nyɔɔ wʊ waan.
Be a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “N be naa yɩ sɛ̃ bãlãa, tɩ naa pãa lɛ lɩɛb chen a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma sɛ̃.
Yɩn wa yʊɔrɔ na bʊɔrɔ ma, tɩchɛ yɩ kʊ̃ nyɛ ma ɛ, a be n na be yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ wa be ɛ.”
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ pãa sʊrɔ taa, “Nyɩnɛ lɛ a daba nyã na pãa chen ka sɩ kʊ̃ nyɛ wʊ ɛ? Wʊn chen naa be a sɩ nɩbɛ na yaar jɛr a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ tɩ wile ba bɩɩ?
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ wʊ 'yɛr ɩka, yɩn wa yʊɔrɔ na bʊɔrɔ ma tɩ yɩ kʊ̃ nyɛ ma ɛ, a be n na be yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ wa be ɛ.”
A bɩbir baaraa daar na ɩ a lɔ̃ɔ di bɩbir kpɛ̃ɛ, Yesu ir ara tɩ tãn 'yɛr, “Kɔ̃nyũur wa kpɛ nɩrɛ, wʊ wa a n sɛ̃ wa nyũ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔɔ de ma nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr, nyɛvʊr kʊ̃ɔ na joro na yire a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ.”
Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr lɛ wʊ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ, a bala na sɔɔ de wʊ ka wʊn kʊ ba. A Sɩɛ ba dɔ̃ɔ wa ɛ, an ɩ a Yesu ba nyɛ a tɩɩr sɛrɛ ɛ.
A nɩbɛ na wa wõ a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr, ka bamɩne 'yɛr, “A daba nyã ɩn Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ yelmãɛ.”
Ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛrɛ, “A nyã lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Nɩ-iraa.” Ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛr, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ na ɩrɛ wa yi Galilee?
Nãaŋmɩn gãn ba 'yɛr ɩka David yɔ̃ɔ lɛ wʊn ɩ na wʊ yi Bɛtɩlɛhɛm, a tẽe 'lɔ a David na dɔ̃ɔ kpɩɛrɛ ɛ?”
Ka a nɩbɛ ŋma dẽ dẽ a Yesu juu.
Bamɩne mɩ ta bʊɔrɔ na ɩka ba nyɔɔ wʊ tɩchɛ nɩrɛ jaa ba 'la sɩɩr wʊ nɩ wʊ nũu ɛ.
A puorfʊ yir gugurbo lɩɛb chen a Farasee nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ sɛ̃, ka ba sʊʊr ba, “Ŋmɩnɛ wʊ ɩ ka yaa waan wʊ ɛ?”
Ka a bala ban tʊ̃, ka ba 'yɛr, “Nɩrɛ jaa ba 'yɛr 'yɛr a daba nyã kaar ɛ.”
Ka a Faraseemɩne sʊʊr ba, “Wʊ mɩ ben bɛl yɩ wɛ?
Yɩ nyɛn a Faraseemɩne nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ ka ba sɔɔ de wʊ?
Kai, tɩchɛ a nɩyɔɔ ba nyãna ba bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ ɛ, ba ben pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ pɔ gba.”
Nikodimasɩ na dɔ̃ɔ chen a Yesu sɛ̃ mɩ ɩ naa a ba ãsʊɔ sʊʊr ba,
“A nɛɛ ba kʊ sɩ sɔr ɩka sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ yele ka saa wõ a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr bɩɩ maala ɛ?”
Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Fʊ mɩ yin Galilee bɩɩ? Jʊʊr kaa, a la ɩ fʊ nyɛn Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ na yi Galilee.”
Ka ba jaa yaar kul a ba yie.
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu mɩ do a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ ju.
Wɛr na wa chaar bibio pipi, Yesu lɩɛb wa kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ, be lɛ a nɩbɛ ŋmaa jilʊ̃ wʊ tɩ wʊ jãnɛ wile ba.
Be lɛ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe, nɩ a Faraseemɩne wa 'mataa waan pɔɔ ban nyɔɔ na gãn daba. Ba vɛ̃n ka a pɔɔ ir ara a ba jaa niem,
tɩ ba 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “Wiwile, a pɔɔ nyãna lɛ gãn daba ka sɩ nyɔɔ.
A Mosesɩ Nɛɛ 'lɔ 'yɛr ɩka sɩ lɔb wʊ nɩ kʊsɩɛ kʊ.”
Ba 'yɛr naa a lɛ bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba bɛɛr Yesu kaa na ba tʊ̃ɔ nyɛ 'yɛr, 'yɛr a wʊ yele. Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu guun de a nubir sɛɛrɛ nɩ a tẽe.
Tɩ ba chɛnɛ sʊrɔ wʊ, ka wʊ dɔl 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Ala ɩ a yɩ ãsʊɔ jaa ben ka ba maal dɛɛr ɛ, a nɩnyɩnɛ wʊ de nie lɔb a pɔɔ nɩ a kʊsɩr.”
Tɩ na wʊ lɛ guun sɛɛrɛ a tẽe go.
A anyãna ban wõ, ba piel yire bʊ̃'yen 'yen, a danyɔ̃n lɛ de nie. A wa tɩ chɛ naa a Yesu nɩ a pɔɔ tɛɛ na ara a be.
Yesu dɔl ir sʊʊr a pɔɔ, “Nyɛ ba be? Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa ba 'yɔ̃ɔ fʊ yele ɛ?”
Ka a pɔɔ 'yɛr, “Kai nɩkpɛ̃ɛ.” Ka Yesu mɩ pãa 'yɛr wʊ, “Maa mɩ kʊ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ fʊ yele ɛ, chiine, taa lɛ wa maala yeldɛɛr go ɛ.”
Yesu lɛ bɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ na wʊ 'yɛr, “Maa lɛ a wɛr nyã chãa, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na turo ma kʊ̃ lɛ chen libe pɔ ɛ, tɩ wʊn tara na nyɛvʊr na ɩ chãa.”
Ka a Faraseemɩne chɩrɛ wʊ 'yɛrɛ, “Fʊ bʊɔrɔ na yuor 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ fʊ mãɛ, ka a fʊ yobɔ ɩ pɔrɔ.”

Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Ala ɩ n bʊɔrɔ naa yuor 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a n mãɛ, a n yobɔ tara na sɔr. Bojũu n bɔ̃ɔ naa jie ɩn yi wa, naa lɛ bɔ̃ɔ a jie ɩn chiine. Tɩchɛ yɩn, yaa bɔ̃ɔ a jie ɩn yi wa ɛ, yaa lɛ bɔ̃ɔ a jie ɩn chiine ɛ.
Yɩ den nɩsaal tɩɛrsɩ tɔɔrɔ nɩ 'yɛr, maa ba tɔɔrɔ nɩrɛ jaa 'yɛr ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ ɩn tɔɔr naa 'yɛr, a lɛ ɩn na tɔɔr na tor naa bojũu n ba ɩ n yõ ɛ, a Sãa na tʊ̃ ma pʊɔ ma naa.
A sɛb a yɩ nɛɛr pɔ ɩka, nɩbɛ ayi 'yɛr ɩn yelmãɛ.
N 'yɛrɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a n mãɛ, ka a Sãa mɩ na tʊ̃ ma 'yɛrɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma.”
Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Nyɩnɛ a fʊ Sãa be?” Ka Yesu 'yɛr “Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ma ɛ, bɩɩ a n Sãa ɛ, ala ɩ yɩ ta bɔ̃ɔ ma naa, yɩn taa bɔ̃ɔ naa n Sãa mɩ.”
Yesu 'yɛr naa a 'yɛr nyã wʊn wile ba a puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ gbʊr a libie lɔb fʊ jie. Tɩ nɩrɛ jaa ba nyɔɔ wʊ ɛ, an ɩ a wʊ bɩbir ba vɩɛ ɛ.
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba go, “N chiine na, yɩn wa yʊɔrɔ na bʊɔrɔ ma tɩ na yɩ kpin a yɩ yelbier. Jie ɩn chiine, yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ wa be ɛ.”
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ pãa sʊrɔ taa, “Wʊn kʊn wʊ mãɛ bɩɩ? Ala lɛ so wʊn 'yɛr ɩka, ‘A jie ɩn chiine yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ wa be ɛ.’ ”
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ, “Yɩn yin ka tẽe, maa yin saaju. A wɛr nyã pɔ lɛ yɩ yi, maa mɩ ba yi a wɛr nyã pɔ ɛ.
N 'yɛr kʊ yɩ ɩka yɩn kpin naa yɩ yelbier, ala ɩ yaa sɔɔ de ma nɩ a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr ɩka n ɩ naa ɛ, sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, yɩn kpin naa yɩ yelbier.”
Ka a nɩbɛ sʊʊr wʊ, “An fʊ ɩ?” A Yesu 'yɛr ba, “N ɩ naa a 'lɔ ɩn 'yɛr kʊ yɩ a kõr jaa.
N tara na yɔɔ ɩn taa 'yɛr tɔɔr a yɩ 'yɛr, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma ɩn yelmãɛ sʊɔ, ala ɩn wõ yi a wʊ sɛ̃ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ a wɛr nɩbɛ.”
Baa bɔ̃ɔ a par ɩka a wʊ Sãa 'yɛr lɛ wʊ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ ɛ.
Be a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yɩn wa 'mɔɔ a Nɩsaal Bie a saaju yɩn bɔ̃ɔ naa a nɩrɛ 'lɔ ɩn ɩ, na yɩ mɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka n ba ɩrɛ yele nɩ maa kpɛ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ naa a lɛ a Sãa na wiil ma.
A 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma be naa n sɛ̃, waa bar ma n yõ ɛ, bojũu n ma ɩrɛ naa lɛ na pɛlɛ a wʊ pʊɔ.”
Wʊn 'yɛrɛ a lɛ tɩ nɩyɔɔ sɔɔn de wʊ.
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a Juu nɩbɛ bala na sɔɔ de wʊ, “Ala ɩ yɩ sɔɔn turo a lɛ ɩn wiil yɩ, yɩn ɩ naa a n poturbo yelmãɛ.
Yɩn bɔ̃ɔn a yelmãɛ, ka a yelmãɛ for yɩ bar ka yɩ so yɩ mãɛ.”
Ka ba 'yɛr, “Sɩn ɩ naa Abraham yɔn, na saa ɩ nɩrɛ jaa gbãgbaar ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ fʊ 'yɛr ɩka ban for sɩn bar ka sɩ so sɩ mãɛ?”
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ jaa na maal dɛɛr ɩn a dɛɛr gbãgbaa.
Gbãgbaa maa be a yir kor ɛ, a bie 'lɔ ma ben be kor.
Ala wa ɩ a Bie for fʊn bar, fʊn son fʊ mɩ sɩrɛ jaa.
N bɔ̃ɔn na yɩn ɩ Abraham yɔn tɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka yɩ kʊ ma, bojũu yaa sɔɔ a n 'yɛr ɛ.
Maa 'yɛrɛ yɩ naa a lɛ ɩn nyɛ a n Sãa sɛ̃, ka yɩn mɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ yɩn wõ a yɩ sãa sɛ̃.”
Ka ba 'yɛr, “Abraham lɛ ɩ a sɩ sãa.” Be a Yesu 'yɛr, “Ala ɩ Abraham bibiir lɛ yɩ ta ɩ, yɩn taa maal a lɛ a Abraham na dɔ̃ɔ maal.
Yɩ ben bʊɔrɔ ɩka yɩ kʊ ma a nɩrɛ na 'yɛr yɩ a yelmãɛ ɩn wõ a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃. Abraham ba dɔ̃ɔ maal lɛ ɛ.
Yɩ ɩrɛ naa a lɛ a yɩ sãa mãɛ na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ.” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Saa ɩ sɛ̃sɛ̃ bibiir ɛ, sɩn Sãa tɛɛ sɩn tara lɛ Nãaŋmɩn.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ta ɩ a yɩ Sãa, yɩn taa nʊ̃ ma naa. Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ lɛ n yi naa be be ka a pʊ̃pãanyã. N ba waan a n mãɛ yuor ɛ, 'lɔ lɛ tʊ̃ ma.
Bo lɛ so ka a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr ba chaar kʊ yɩ ɛ? Bojũu yaa tʊ̃ɔ wõ a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr ɛ.

A yɩ sãa ɩn tɩɩ, a yɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka yɩ maal a lɛ wʊn bʊɔrɔ. An yi a pielfʊ jaa nɩkʊrɔ lɛ wʊ ɩ, waa tara yelmãɛ ɛ, yelmãɛ bãlãa jaa ba be a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ. 'Lɔ wa ŋmaara a jire, lɛ wʊ be, jir ŋmara lɛ wʊ ɩ, na wʊ ɩ a jie a jaa sãa.
Tɩchɛ maa na 'yɛrɛ a yelmãɛ yaa sɔɔ de ma ɛ.
A yɩ ãsʊɔ na 'yɛr ɩka wʊ nyɛn ɩn maal dɛɛr ɔ? Ala ɩ yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ, bo lɛ so ka yaa sɔɔ de ma ɛ?
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ɩ Nãaŋmɩn tʊɔr wõnõ naa a lɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ. Yɩn ba ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn tʊɔr ɛ, yaa wõnõ a lɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ ɛ.”
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ 'yɛr, “Yelmãɛ lɛ sɩ 'yɛrɛ ɩka Samariya lɛ fʊ yi na fʊ tara a sɩdɛɛr.”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “Maa ba sɩdɛɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ n 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ naa a n Sãa, tɩ yɩn ba 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma ɛ.
N ba bʊɔrɔ tɩɩr kʊrɔ a n mãɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ bʊɔrɔ naa a lɛ. 'Lɔ Lɛ ɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, ala ɩ nɩrɛ turo naa maa 'yɛr, wʊ kʊ̃ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ kũu ɛ.”
A anyãna lɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ pãa 'yɛrɛ, “Pʊ̃pãanyã, sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa fʊn tara a sɩdɛɛr. Abraham kpi naa, ka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ kpi, tɩchɛ ka fʊ 'yɛr ɩka ala ɩ nɩrɛ turo naa a fʊ 'yɛr wʊ kʊ̃ bɔ̃ɔ kũu ɛ.
Fʊ̃ʊ bɛrma gar a sɩ sãa Abraham bɩɩ? Wʊ kpi naa, ka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ mɩ kpi. An fʊ tɩɛr ɩka fʊ pãa ɩ naa?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Ala ɩ n ben 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a n mãɛ tɩɩr, a n tɩɩr na ɩn pɔrɔ. A n Sãa 'lɔ yɩn 'yɛrɛ ɩka a yɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ, 'lɔ lɛ kʊrɔ ma a tɩɩr.
Yɩn ba bɔ̃ɔ wʊ gba ɛ, maa bɔ̃ɔ wʊ naa. Ala ɩ n 'yɛr naa ɩka n ba bɔ̃ɔ wʊ ɛ, ɩn ɩ naa jir ŋmara a yɩ kaar. Tɩchɛ maa bɔ̃ɔ wʊ naa, naa turo a wʊ 'yɛr bie.
A yɩ sãa Abraham dɔ̃ɔ chɩlɛ tɩɛr ɩka wʊn taa nyɛ naa a n bɩbir. Wʊ nyɛn ka nʊ̃ɔ nyɔɔ wʊ.”
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ sʊʊr wʊ, “Faa ta yuom lɩjaayi nɩ pie (50) sɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ na fʊ nyɛ Abraham?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, sɛrɛ tɩ ba wa dɔɔ Abraham, ka maa dɔ̃ɔ be be.”
A nyãna, ka ba wob kʊsɩbɛ ɩka ba lɔb wʊ kʊ, tɩchɛ ka a Yesu sɔɔl fʊɔl na wʊ yi a be a ba puorfʊ yir pɔ.
Yesu na chiine a lɛ, wʊ nyɛn daba ban dɔɔ ka wʊ ɩ jɔ̃ɔ.
Ka a poturbo sʊʊr wʊ, “Wiwile, an lɛ maal dɛɛr, a dajɔ̃ɔ bɩɩ a wʊ sãa naa ma lɛ maal dɛɛr, a dajɔ̃ɔ bɩɩ a wʊ sãa naa ma lɛ maal a dɛɛr dɔɔn wʊ, ka wʊ ɩ a jɔ̃ɔ?”
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A daba nyã ba maal dɛɛr ɛ, a wʊ sãa naa ma mɩ ba maal dɛɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ a ɩn a lɛ ka Nãaŋmɩn tʊ̃mɔ̃ na tʊ̃ a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
An chɛnɛ ɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ, sɩn tʊ̃ naa a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma tʊ̃mɔ̃. Wɛr na sɔb naa ka nɩrɛ kʊ̃ lɛ tʊ̃ɔ tʊ̃mɔ̃ tʊ̃ ɛ.
Ɩn chɛnɛ be a wɛr pɔ, maa lɛ a wɛr chãa.”
Wʊn wa 'yɛr a lɛ baar, wʊ chir nataar bun tãn a tẽe na wʊ bɛ a daba nɩbie.
Tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a daba, “Chen, tɩ pɛɛ a Siloam kʊ̃ɔ pɔ.” A Siloam par lɛ, Tʊ̃fʊ. Wʊ chen tɩ pɛɛ nyɛrɛ wa a yir.
Ka a nɩbɔ̃ɔnsɩ bala na dɔ̃ɔ ma nyɛ wʊ na sʊɔrɔ, ka ba sʊrɔ taa, “A ba ɩ a daba nyãna lɛ ma sʊɔrɔ ɛ?”
Bamɩne 'yɛr ɩka 'lɔ lɛ, ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛr, “Nɩnyɛtaa lɛ.” Tɩchɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Maa lɛ.”
Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Ŋmɩnɛ a nɩbie ɩrɛ wa yuo fʊ?”
Ka a daba 'yɛr kʊ ba. “Daba ban bʊɔlɔ Yesu lɛ bu tãn bɛ ma a nɩbie tɩ 'yɛr ma ɩka n chen a Siloam tɩ pɛɛ. Lɛ lɛ n chen tɩ pɛɛ naa nyɛrɛ.”
Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Nyɩnɛ lɛ wʊ be?” Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “N ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ.”
Be lɛ ba tara a daba 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a jɔ̃ɔ chiin a Faraseemɩne sɛ̃.
A bɩbir 'lɔ a Yesu na dɔ̃ɔ bu a tãn na wʊ yuon a daba nɩbie ɩn a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar.
Ka Faraseemɩne sʊʊr a daba lɛ wʊn ɩrɛ wa nyɛrɛ. Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Tãn lɛ wʊ bɛ ma a nɩbie ka n pɛɛ be nyɛrɛ.”
Ka a Faraseemɩne bamɩne 'yɛr, “A daba nyã ba yi Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ, waa sɔ̃nɔ̃ a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir ɛ.” Tɩchɛ ka a bamɩne mɩ sʊʊr, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yelbe-ɩrɛ na tʊ̃ɔ tʊ̃ a nɛ'maa yele nyã?” Na ba ŋma jiir ayi.
Ka ba lɩɛb sʊʊr a daba, “Bo fʊ tara na 'yɛr a wʊ 'yɛr? Fʊ nɩbie ba lɛ wʊ yuo.” Ka a daba 'yɛr, “Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ lɛ wʊ ɩ.”
Ka a Juu nɩbɛrɛ ba sɔɔ de ɛ ɩka a daba dɔ̃ɔ jɔ̃ɔ tɩ wa nyɛrɛ ɛ, ka ba bʊɔl a sãa naa ma.
Ba sʊʊr ba naa, “A yɩ bie lɛ a nyã ɔ? A nyã lɛ yɩ dɔɔ ka wʊ ɩ a jɔ̃ɔ? Ka ŋmɩnɛ wʊ ɩrɛ wa nyɛrɛ?”
Ka a sãa naa ma 'yɛr, “Sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka sɩ bie lɛ, a sɩ dɔɔ wʊ ka wʊ ɩ jɔ̃ɔ.
Tɩchɛ lɛ wʊn ɩrɛ wa nyɛrɛ a pʊ̃pãanyã saa bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, bɩɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na yuo wʊ a nɩbie saa bɔ̃ɔ ɛ. Waa ɩ bibile ɛ, yɩ sʊʊr wʊ, wʊn 'yɛr kʊ wʊ mãɛ.”
A sãa naa ma 'yɛr naa nɩtɔ̃ bojũu ba joro naa a Juu nɩbɛ dãbãɛ, ba den nie 'yɛr ɩka nɩrɛ jaa wa 'yɛr ɩka a Yesu lɛ a Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ, ka ban dii wʊn bar a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie.
Ala lɛ so ka a sãa naa ma 'yɛr, “Waa ɩ bibile ɛ, yɩ sʊʊr wʊ.”
A Faraseemɩne lɛ bʊɔl naa a daba 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a jɔ̃ɔ a gbɛɛ ayi sʊɔ 'yɛr wʊ, “'Yɛr yelmãɛ kʊ Nãaŋmɩn, sɩn bɔ̃ɔn naa a daba nyã na ɩ yelbe-ɩrɛ.”
Ka a daba 'yɛr, “Ala ɩ wʊ ɩn yelbe-ɩrɛ bɩɩ waa ɩ ɛ, n ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, yelbʊ̃'yen ɩn bɔ̃ɔ nɩ nyã. N dɔ̃ɔ ɩ jɔ̃ɔ tɩchɛ pʊ̃pãanyã, n nyɛrɛ naa.”
Be lɛ ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Bo lɛ wʊ ɩ fʊ? Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ wʊ ɩ yuo fʊ a nɩbie?”
Ka a daba 'yɛr, “N ba dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr tɩ yaa chɛlɛ ɛ. Bo yɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka yɩ lɛ wõ ka a ɩ go? Yɩ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ mɩ lɩɛb a wʊ poturbo bɩɩ?”
A ba tʊrɔ wʊ 'yɛrɛ, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a wʊ poturo, sɩn ɩ naa Mosesɩ poturbo.
Sɩ bɔ̃ɔn na ɩka Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr 'yɛr kʊ Mosesɩ, tɩchɛ a daba 'lɔ saa bɔ̃ɔ jie wʊn yi gba ɛ.”
Ka a daba 'yɛr, “A 'maa man nɛɛ yɩn ba bɔ̃ɔ jie wʊn yi ɛ, tɩ yuo ma a nɩbie.
Sɩ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn ba chɛlɛ a yelbe-ɩrbɛ ɛ. Wʊ ma chɛlɛ naa a bala na joro wʊ tɩ maala a lɛ wʊn bʊɔrɔ.
Nɩrɛ jaa ba dɔ̃ɔ wõ ɩka ba yuon nɩrɛ ban lɔ̃ɔ dɔɔn jɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Ala ɩ a daba nyã ba ta yi Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ, wʊ kʊ̃ naa tʊ̃ɔ bon jaa maal ɛ.”
Ka a Juu nɩbɛrɛ 'yɛr kʊ a daba, “A fʊ̃ʊ, yelbier pɔ lɛ ba dɔɔ fʊ, ŋmɩnɛ fʊn ɩrɛ wa wiil sɩ,” tɩ dii wʊ bar a ba pɔ.
Yesu na wõ ɩka ba dii naa a daba bar, wʊ bɔ wʊn wa nyɛ wʊ, na wʊ sʊʊr wʊ, “Fʊ sɔɔn de a Nɩsaal Bie ɔ?”
Ka a daba sʊʊr wʊ, “Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ an lɛ, wiil ma ka n sɔɔ de wʊ.”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “Fʊ nyɛ wʊ naa pʊ̃pãanyã, sɩrɛ jaa, 'lɔ lɛ 'yɛrɛ nɩ fʊ.”
Ka a daba pãa 'yɛr, “N Soro n sɔɔn de,” tɩ gbur dumo puor wʊ.
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr, “'Yɛr tɔɔrfʊ jie lɛ n wa ka a wɛr pɔ. Jɔ̃n na nyɛrɛ naa ka nɩbinyɛrɛ mɩ lɩɛb ɩ jɔ̃n.”
Ka a Faraseemɩne bamɩne na be a wʊ sɛ̃ wõ a lɛ na ba sʊʊr, “Bo ya! A sɩn mɩ ɩn a jɔ̃n ɔ?”
A Yesu 'yɛr ba, “Ala ɩ yɩ ta ɩn jɔ̃n, yɩ kʊ naa tara chɛfʊ a dɛɛr pɔ ɛ. Tɩchɛ, yɩn ben 'yɛr ɩka yɩ nyɛrɛ naa, yɩ chɛnɛ na be a yɩ dɛɛr pɔ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na maa tu a piir jɔɔ dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ tɩ do a dachin kpɛ, ɩn nãnyie nɩ nɩfara.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tu a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ kpɛ 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a pɛchinɛ.
A dɔ̃dɔ̃guro ma yuon a pãn kʊ a pɛchinɛ, ka a piir chɛlɛ a wʊ kɔkɔr. Wʊ maa bʊɔl naa a wʊ piir yoe, na wʊ ŋmaa ba yin.
'Lɔ wa ŋmaa a wʊ piir a jaa ka a yi, wʊ ma den nie ka a turo wʊ, bojũu ba bɔ̃ɔ naa a wʊ kɔkɔr.
Tɩchɛ ba kʊ̃ wa tu sãan jaa ɛ, ban jon yi a wʊ sɛ̃ bojũu baa bɔ̃ɔ sãan kɔkɔr ɛ.”
Yesu lɔb a sʊkpa nyã tɩchɛ baa bɔ̃ɔ a par a lɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ ba ɛ.
A lɛ jũu lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr ba go, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, maa lɛ a piir dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ.
A bala ba jaa na dɔ̃ɔ ma nie wa ɩn nãnyisɩ nɩ nɩfarba, tɩchɛ a piir ba chɛlɛ ba ɛ.
Maa lɛ a dɔ̃dɔr, nɩrɛ jaa na tu ma kpɛ, wʊn nyɛn faafʊ. Wʊn ma kpɛ̃n tɩ yi na wʊ nyɛrɛ bʊ̃diir.
Nãnyie ma wa naa ɩka wʊ wa ju, na wʊ kʊ, tɩ sɔ̃ɔ bar. Maa wa naa ka ban nyɛ nyɛvʊr, na ba nyɛ wʊ tɩ põn bar.
“Maa lɛ a pɛchiin sʊ̃, a pɛchiin sʊ̃ sɔɔn kpi a wʊ piir 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A pɛchinɛ 'lɔ ban yara, waa so a piir ɛ. 'Lɔ wa nyɛ gbõgboro na waara, wʊ ma tɛɛn a piir bar tɩ jo, ka a gbõgboro yɛ̃yɛl a piir tɩ nyɔɔr amɩne.
Wʊ ma jon a lɛ an ɩ libie tʊ̃mɔ̃ lɛ wʊ tʊ̃nɔ̃, a piir yele ba bã wʊ ɛ.
“Maa ɩ naa a pɛchiin sʊ̃, n bɔ̃ɔ naa a n piir, ka n piir mɩ bɔ̃ɔ ma.
Nɩtãa lɛ a Sãa na bɔ̃ɔ ma ka n mɩ bɔ̃ɔ a Sãa, ɩn sɔɔn kpi a piir 'yɔ̃ɔ.
N tara na piir amɩne na ba be a jɔɔ nyã pɔ ɛ, ɩn waan ba naa, ka ba mɩ wa chɛlɛ a n kɔkɔr, ka ba ɩ pɛgbul bʊ̃'yen na ba tara pɛchiin bʊ̃'yen.
A n Sãa na nʊ̃ ma par nɩ nyã, n sɔɔ naa na kpi tɩ lɛ ir ɩ vʊr go.
Nɩrɛ baa faara wʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ maa mãɛ lɛ sɔɔ na kpi. N tara na kpɛ̃ɔ na bar a nyɛvʊr naa lɛ tara kpɛ̃ɔ na de wʊ go. A nyã lɛ a n Sãa 'yɛr ma ɩka n ɩ.”
A 'yɛr nyã lɛ vɛ̃ ka a Juu nɩbɛ ŋma dẽ dẽ.
Ka a ba yɔɔ 'yɛrɛ ɩka, “Sɩdɛɛr lɛ wʊ tara, na wʊ gele, bo 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ chɛlɛ a lɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ?”
Tɩchɛ ka a bamɩne 'yɛrɛ, “A nyãna ba ɩ nɩrɛ na tara sɩdɛɛr 'yɛr ɛ, a sɩdɛɛr na tʊ̃ɔn yuo jɔ̃ɔ nɩbie ɔ?”
A ɩ naa uon ka ba maala a ba puorfʊ yir Pɔlfʊ lɔ̃ɔ di be a Jerusalɛm.
Ka Yesu be be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar ãsʊɔ pɔ, na wʊ yʊɔrɔ a be ban bʊɔlɔ a Solomon Jɛ̃bɛr.
Be a Juu nɩbɛrɛ bamɩne ŋmaa jilʊ̃ wʊ sʊrɔ, “A baalfʊ nyã fʊn 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ, dabor an wa baar? Ala ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ, 'yɛr kʊ sɩ chãa pɔ.”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “N dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr yɩ, yɩn lɛ ba sɔɔ de ɛ. A nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ɩn tʊ̃ nɩ a n Sãa yuor, 'yɛr naa n 'yɛr.
Tɩchɛ yɩn lɛ ba sɔɔ de ɛ, bojũu yaa ɩ a n piir ɛ.
A n piir ma chɛlɛ naa a n kɔkɔr, n bɔ̃ɔ ba naa ka ba ma turo ma.
N kʊ ban nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ. Ba kʊ̃ wɛ ɛ, nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ba 'loo faa a n nũu pɔ ɛ.
A n Sãa 'lɔ na de ba kʊ ma, wʊ gar bomo a jaa. Nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ba 'loo faa a n Sãa nũu pɔ ɛ.
Maa naa n Sãa jaa ɩn bʊ̃'yen.”
Ka a Juu nɩbɛrɛ wob kʊsɩbɛ ɩka ba lɔb wʊ go.
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu sʊʊr ba, “N tʊ̃n nɛ'maa tʊ̃yɔɔ yi a Sãa sɛ̃, buor sʊɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ pãa be lɔɔrɔ ma?”
Ka ba 'yɛr, “Saa lɔɔrɔ fʊ a anyã ãsʊɔ jaa 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ fʊn fere sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn yuor, tɩ mɩ ɩ nɩsaal.”
A Yesu 'yɛr ba, “A ba sɛb a yɩ Nɛɛ pɔ ɩka, ‘N 'yɛr naa ɩka, yɩ ɩn ŋmɩmɛ ɛ?’
Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bʊɔl naa a bala a wʊ 'yɛr, na wa a ba sɛ̃, ŋmɩmɛ, Nãaŋmɩn sɛɛr ba be na wa sɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a 'lɔ a Sãa na kaa ir a wʊ bɔfʊ pɔ, na wʊ tʊ̃ ka a wɛr pɔ. Bo lɛ so ka yaa bara ma ɛ, bojũu n 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn Bie lɛ n ɩ?
Yɩ taa sɔɔ de ma ɛ, ala ɩ n ba maala a lɛ a Sãa na maala ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ n tʊ̃ naa, yɩn gba ba sɔɔ de ma ɛ, yɩ sɔɔ de a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃, yɩn bɔ̃ɔn a par ɩka a Sãa ben a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ka n mɩ be a Sãa 'yɔ̃ɔ.”
Ka ba lɛ bʊɔrɔ a wʊ nyɔɔfʊ go, tɩ chɛ ka wʊ fʊɔl yi.
Be lɛ a Yesu lɩɛb gɔ̃ɔ a Jordan man gɔ̃ɔn, a jie 'lɔ a Jɔɔn na dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ na wʊ jɛ̃ a be,
ka nɩyɔɔ wa a wʊ sɛ̃ wa 'yɛrɛ, “Jɔɔn gba ba dɔ̃ɔ tʊ̃ nɛ 'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ɛ, a ala a jaa wʊn 'yɛr a daba nyã 'yɛr, ɩn yelmãɛ.”
Be lɛ a nɩyɔɔ sɔɔ de wʊ.
Daba ban bʊɔlɔ Lajarusɩ dɔ̃ɔ bɩɛrɛ, wʊ ɩn Mɛɛr nɩ Mata yɛdaba na ba kpɩɛrɛ a Betanɩ tẽe pɔ.
A Mɛɛr nyã na dɔ̃ɔ kpaar a kãnyũu 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu tɩ de a wʊ jukɔɔl fɩɛl, a wʊ yɛdaba Lajarusɩ lɛ a nyã na bɩɛrɛ.
Ka a yɛpɔbɔ tʊ̃ 'yɛr a Yesu, “Sɩ Soro, a fʊ baraa bɩɛrɛ naa.”
Yesu na wõ a lɛ, a wʊ 'yɛr, “A baal nyã ba ɩ kũu baal ɛ, tɩ an wiil Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr tɩ mɩ vɛ̃ ka Nãaŋmɩn Bie yuor yi.”
Yesu nʊ̃n Mata nɩ a wʊ yɛbɛ nɩ a ba yɛdaba Lajarusɩ.
Tɩchɛ wʊn wõ a Lajarusɩ baal tɩ na wʊ chɛnɛ jãnɛ a be wʊn be ber ayi.
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ poturbo, “Yɩ ɩ a sɩ lɩɛb chen a Judiya.”
Tɩchɛ ka a poturbo 'yɛr, “Wiwile, daar yɛ̃ yɛ̃ nyãna ba lɛ a Juu nɩbɛrɛ ta bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba lɔb fʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ a fʊ lɛ chiine a be go?”
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A ba ɩ a bɩbir tara na a wʊ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ chaarfʊ sɔ̃ɔ ɛ? Nɩrɛ wa chiine a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ wʊ maa ŋme gbɛr ɛ, wʊ nyɛ naa a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ chãa.
Bojũu ala ɩ tãsɔɔ lɛ wʊ chiine, wʊn ŋmen gbɛr, bojũu waa tara chãa ɛ.”
Wʊn wa 'yɛr a lɛ baar, wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A sɩ baraa Lajarusɩ gur naa, tɩchɛ ɩn chen tɩ sãɩ wʊ.”
Ka a wʊ poturbo 'yɛr, “Sɩ Soro, ala ɩ wʊ gur naa, wʊn ir naa.”
Yesu 'lɔ 'yɛr naa ɩka wʊ kpi naa, tɩchɛ ka a poturbo 'lɔ tɩɛr ɩka a gʊ̃ɔ sʊ̃ɔ lɛ wʊ 'yɛrɛ.
Ala lɛ so a Yesu pãa 'yɛr ka a chaar ɩka, “Lajarusɩ kpi naa.
A yɩ jũu, a nʊ̃mɔ̃ ma naa ɩn ba be be ɛ, ka yɩ na sɔɔ de ma. Tɩchɛ, yɩ ɩ a sɩ chen a wʊ sɛ̃.”
A wʊ poturo ãsʊɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Tomasɩ na ba lɛ bʊɔlɔ wʊ Naa 'yɛr kʊ a bala na chɛ, “Yɩ ɩ a sɩ 'mataa chiin wʊ mɩ tɩ kpi.”
Yesu na wa ta a be, wʊ nyɛn ka a ɩ ba ũu naa Lajarusɩ maal ber anaar.
Betanɩ nɩ a Jerusalɛm mɩ ba jãa ɛ.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ yɔɔ chen ɩka ba tɩ puor a Mata nɩ a Mɛɛr a ba yɛdaba kuor.
Mata na wa wõ ɩka Yesu waara naa, wʊ yin tɩ tuor wʊ, tɩchɛ kaa Mɛɛr 'lɔ jãnɛ a yir.
Be lɛ a Mata 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “N Soro, fʊ̃ʊ ta dɔ̃ɔ be ka, a n yɛdaba kʊ̃ naa kpi ɛ.
Tɩchɛ n bɔ̃ɔ naa pʊ̃pãanyã gba ɩka, bon jaa fʊn sʊɔr a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, wʊn kʊ fʊ naa.”
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “A fʊ yɛdaba na ir naa a kũu pɔ ɩ vʊr.”
Be lɛ a Mata 'yɛr kʊ a Yesu, “N bɔ̃ɔn na wʊn na ir a kũn irfʊ daar, a ber baaraa sɔ̃ɔ.”
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Maa lɛ ɩ a kũu pɔ irfʊ, nɩ nyɛvʊr, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sɔɔ de ma, 'lɔ kpi gba, tɩ wʊn tara na nyɛvʊr.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba kpi ɛ, tɩ na wʊ sɔɔ de ma, kʊ̃ lɛ kpi ɛ, fʊ sɔɔ naa a lɛ ɔ?”
Ka a Mata 'yɛr, “Ɔ̃ɔ, n Soro, n sɔɔn de ɩka fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa na ɩ Nãaŋmɩn Bie, 'lɔn na wa ka a wɛr pɔ.”
Wʊn wa 'yɛr a lɛ baar wʊ lɩɛb kul tɩ bʊl 'yɛr kʊ a yɛbile Mɛɛr, “A wiwile ben ka tɩ sʊrɔ fʊ.”
A Mɛɛr na wa wõ a lɛ, ka wʊ vaa ir chen a Yesu sɛ̃.
Yesu ba kpɛ a tẽe pɔ sɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ chɛnɛ ara a be a Mata na tuor wʊ.
A Juu nɩbɛ bala na wa a kuor puorfʊ jie be a Mɛɛr sɛ̃ a yir, na nyɛ a lɛ wʊn vaa ir yire, ka ba turo wʊ tɩɛr ɩka a yaa par lɛ wʊ chiine a kõn jie.
Mɛɛr na tɩ ta a jie nyɛ a Yesu a be, wʊ gbur dumo a Yesu niem tɩ 'yɛr, “N Soro, fʊ̃ʊ ta dɔ̃ɔ be ka, a n yɛdaba kʊ̃ naa kpi ɛ.”
Yesu na nyɛ a lɛ wʊn kõnõ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bala na bɩɛl wʊ mɩ kõnõ, nɩbaal kpɛ wʊ naa ka a suur nyɔɔ wʊ.
A wʊ sʊʊr ba, “Nyɩnɛ yɩ ũu wʊ?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “N Soro, wa nyɛ a jie.”
Ka Yesu kõ.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ pãa 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ taa, “Nyɛ lɛ wʊn nʊ̃ a Lajarusɩ.”
Tɩchɛ ka bamɩne pãa 'yɛr, “Wʊn dɔ̃ɔ yuo a jɔ̃ɔ nɩbie, kaa ɩ wʊ kʊ̃ naa tʊ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka a Lajarusɩ ta kpi bɩɩ?”
Ka nɩbaal kpɛ a Yesu, ka wʊ tɔɔ ta a yaa par. Kʊsɩr bɔɔ lɛ, ka ba 'mɔɔ a kʊsɩr ãsʊɔ pɔɔ a nɛɛ.
A Yesu 'yɛr, “Yɩ bil a kʊsɩr bar.” Tɩchɛ a Mata an ɩ a wʊ yɛdaba lɛ kpi, ka wʊ 'yɛr, “N Soro, wʊn nyuro naa, ber anaar nɩ dɩna ban ũu wʊ.”
Ka Yesu 'yɛr, “N ba 'yɛr fʊ ɩka fʊ̃ʊ sɔɔ de, fʊn nyɛn Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr ɛ?”
Be lɛ ba bil a kʊsɩr bar, a Yesu kaa saaju tɩ 'yɛr, “N Sãa, fʊ son puorfʊ, fʊn wõ a n sʊɔrfʊ.
N bɔ̃ɔn naa fʊn wõnõ a n sʊɔrfʊ, tɩchɛ n 'yɛr naa ka a na sʊ̃ʊ a nɩbɛ banyãna na ara a ka, a ba sɔɔ de ɩka, fʊ̃ʊ lɛ tʊ̃ ma.”
Yesu na 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ wʊ bʊɔl kpɛ̃ɔ jaa, “Lajarusɩ, wa yi.”
Ka a kũu yi, ka a gbɛɛ naa nuur ban vil a fɔpɩɛl pɔɔ ka a fɔbaa mɩ pɔɔ a ju. A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ yaar a kũu fɔɔr bar wʊ ka wʊ chen.”
Ala lɛ so ka a Juu nɩbɛ bala na wa ɩka ba wa puor a Mɛɛr, nyɛn a lɛ a Yesu na ɩ, a ba sɔɔ wʊ.
Tɩchɛ ka a bamɩne chen a Faraseemɩne sɛ̃ tɩ man a lɛ a Yesu na maal.
Be lɛ a Faraseemɩne nɩ a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ bʊɔl taa lɔ̃ɔfʊ na ba 'yɛr, “Ŋmɩnɛ sɩn ɩ, a daba nyã na ben tʊ̃nɔ̃ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ a nɩtɔ̃?
Ala ɩ sɩn be bar wʊ ka wʊ maala lɛ, nɩrɛ jaa na sɔɔn a wʊ yele, a Worom nɩbɛ wa wõ a yele ban wa wɛl sɩ naa a jisʊ̃ nɩ a tẽe bar.”
Ka a ba ãsʊɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Kayafasɩ na ɩ a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ a yuon 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ 'yɛr, “Yaa tara tɩɛr jaa ɛ.
Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a sɛɛ naa ka nɩbʊ̃'yen na kpi kʊ a nɩyɔɔ gar a nɩyɔɔ ba jaa na wɛ ɛ.”
A nyã ba yi a wʊ mãɛ sɛ̃ ka wʊ 'yɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊn ɩ a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ a yuon 'lɔ, ala lɛ wʊ de nie dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩka a Yesu na kpin kʊ a Juu nɩbʊrɔ ba jaa.
A ba ɩ bala tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka wʊ lɔ̃ɔ taa a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir bala na yɛ̃yɛl na wʊ maal ba a ba ɩ bʊ̃'yen.
An yi a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ba bʊɔrɔ na sɔr na kʊ a Yesu.
A lɛ juu Yesu ba lɛ yʊɔrɔ chãa pɔ a Juu nɩbɛ jie ɛ, tɩ chen jiyuo na gbʊr a mɔgɔ̃ɔ na wʊ tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a tẽbile ban bʊɔlɔ Eferɛm, be lɛ wʊ tɩ 'mataa jɛ̃n a wʊ poturbo.
A Juu nɩbɛ Gõl Bar Difʊ gbʊr naa, ka ba yɔɔ yi a tẽbil do a Jerusalɛm tɩ pɔlɔ a ba mãɛ chɛlɛ nɩ a bɩbir.
Ba kaara na bʊɔrɔ a Yesu a be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir, sʊrɔ taa, “Ŋmɩnɛ yɩ tɩɛr, wʊn wa naa a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie bɩɩ?”
Tɩchɛ ka a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Faraseemɩne 'yɛr, “Nɩrɛ jaa wa bɔ̃ɔ a jie a Yesu na be, wʊ 'yɛr ka ba tɩ nyɔɔ wʊ.”
A chɛn ber ayʊɔb ka a Gõl Bar Difʊ bɩbir ta. Yesu chen a Betanɩ na ɩ a Lajarusɩ 'lɔ na kpi ka wʊ sãɩ kpɩɛrɛ.
Ba maal bʊ̃diir kʊ wʊ a be, ka a Mata põnõ a bʊ̃diir. Lajarusɩ pʊɔ naa a nɩbɛ bala na lɔ̃ɔ jɛ̃n Yesu a bʊ̃diir jie.
Be lɛ Mɛɛr de kãnyũu vɩla daa na ɩ tuo wa pʊr 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu gbɛɛ pɔ, tɩ lɩɛb a jukɔɔl fɩɛlɛ nɩ ka a nyũu de a yir wʊ jaa.
Tɩchɛ a wʊ poturo ãsʊɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Judas na yi a Isɩkariyot, 'lɔ lɛ na wa gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu sʊʊr,
“Bo lɛ so ka baa da a kãnyũu nyãna ɛ, a libie na tãn nɩrɛ yuon gbul sãyar na ba de kʊ nɔ̃n dẽme ɛ?”
A nɔ̃n dẽme yele ba bã wʊ ɛ, bojũu nãnyie lɛ wʊ ɩ an ɩ 'lɔ lɛ tara a ba libie wʊɔ, na wʊ ma juro a ala ban 'yɔ̃ɔ a be sʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ wʊ mãɛ.
A Yesu 'yɛr, “Bar a pɔɔ jaa jomm, wʊ bin a kãnyũu nyãna gun a n ũufʊ bɩbir.
A nɔ̃n dẽme na ben a yɩ sɛ̃ bɩbir jaa, tɩchɛ maa kʊ̃ be a yɩ sɛ̃ bɩbir jaa ɛ.”
A Juu yɔɔ jie na wõ ɩka Yesu be naa a Betanɩ, ba wa naa a ba ɩ a 'lɔ tɛɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ ba bʊɔrɔ na ɩka ba nyɛ a Lajarusɩ 'lɔ wʊn sãɩ a kũu pɔ, ka wʊ ir ɩ vʊr.
A lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ, a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ mɩ guoro nɩ taa ɩka ba mɩn kʊ naa a Lajarusɩ.
A wʊ jũu lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ yɔɔ jie tɔr a ba nɩbɛrɛ wiilfʊ tɩ sɔɔrɔ a Yesu.
Wɛr na wa chaar, a nɩyɔɔ bala na wa a Gõl Bar Difʊ jie, wõ naa ɩka Yesu ben a sɔr pɔ waara a Jerusalɛm.
Ba 'mɛl bɛ vaɩ yi tuoro nɩ wʊ pãa chɩlɛ gɔ̃nɔ̃, “Yãan yooo, Nãaŋmɩn wʊ sʊ̃ʊ a 'lɔ wʊn tʊ̃.
Yesu nyɛn a bʊ̃pɔl na wʊ do jãnɛ nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ,
“A yɩn Jerusalɛm nɩbɛ, yɩ ta joro dãbãɛ ɛ, Yɩ nyɛ a yɩ nãa na do bʊ̃pɔl waara nɩ.”
A wʊ poturbo ba dɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a anyãna a jaa par ɛ, tɩ a Yesu na wa ir ɩ vʊr, ba tɩɛr yuo ɩka anyãna lɛ ba dɔ̃ɔ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ ka ba mɩ maal a lɛ kʊ wʊ.
A nɩyɔɔ bala na dɔ̃ɔ be a wʊ sɛ̃ na ba nyɛ a lɛ wʊn bʊɔl a Lajarusɩ ka wʊ yi a yaa pɔ ɩ vʊr, ba chɛnɛ na mana kʊrɔ a nɩbɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka a nɩyɔɔ yi tuoro wʊ, bojũu ba wõ naa ɩka wʊ tʊ̃n nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃.
Be lɛ ka a Faraseemɩne pãa 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ taa, “Yɩ nyɛ, saa lɛ tʊɔrɔ bon jaa maala ɛ. Nyɛ, a nɩbɛ ba jaa ben turo wʊ.”
A nɩbɛ bamɩne mɩ na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, pʊɔ naa bala na do a puorfʊ jie a Jerusalɛm a Gõl Bar Difʊ sɔ̃ɔ.
Ba chen a Filip na yi a Betɩsaida na be a Galilee wɛr pɔ sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, “Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, sɩ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka sɩ nyɛ a Yesu.”
Filip chen tɩ 'yɛr kʊ Andiru ka ba 'mataa chen tɩ 'yɛr a Yesu.
A Yesu 'yɛr ba, “A sɔ̃ɔ ta naa ka Nãaŋmɩn na kʊ a Nɩsaal Bie tɩɩr.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, chibir baa ũu tẽe ɛ, wʊn chɛnɛ na ɩ a chibir bʊ̃'yen. Tɩchɛ 'lɔ wa lo tẽe kpi, wʊ ma dɔɔn chibiyɔɔ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na nʊ̃ a wʊ nyɛvʊr na bɔr wʊ naa, tɩchɛ 'lɔ na 'laar a wʊ nyɛvʊr a wɛr nyã pɔ, wʊn tara na a nyɛvʊr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ.
Ala ɩ ãsʊɔ jaa bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka wʊ sʊ̃ʊ ma tʊ̃, wʊ turo ma, jie jaa ɩn be a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sʊ̃nɔ̃ ma tʊ̃nɔ̃ mɩ na ben be. Ka a n Sãa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a 'lɔ na sʊ̃nɔ̃ ma tʊ̃nɔ̃.
“Pʊ̃pãanyã, n pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ naa, tɩ n 'yɛr bo? N 'yɛr ɩka a Sãa wʊ faa ma a sɔ̃ɔ nyãna pɔ bɩɩ? Kai, a sɔ̃ɔ nyãna 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ n wa.
Sãa, kʊ a fʊ yuor tɩɩr.” Be lɛ a kɔkɔr pãa 'yɛr yi saaju, “N dɔ̃ɔ kʊ wʊ a tɩɩr, ɩn lɛ kʊ wʊ naa a tɩɩr go.”
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na ara a be wõ naa na ba 'yɛr, saa lɛ tãna, ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛr malaka ãsʊɔ lɛ 'yɛrɛ nɩ wʊ.
A Yesu 'yɛr ba, “A ba ɩ maa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a kɔkɔr 'yɛr ɛ, tɩ yɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ.
Pʊ̃pãanyã a sɔ̃ɔ ta naa ka a wɛr nyã 'yɛr na tɔɔr. Pʊ̃pãanyã, ban ir naa wɛr nyã nãa Satan bar.
Tɩchɛ maa, bala wa 'mɔɔ ma a saaju, ɩn tɔɔn nɩbɛ ba jaa waan a n sɛ̃.”
Wʊ 'yɛr a lɛ na wʊ wiil kũu 'lɔ tɔ wʊn na kpi.
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala 'yɛr, “Sɩ wõn yi a Nɛɛ pɔ ɩka, a Nɩ-iraa naa 'lɔ na ben be kpo kpo, tɩ ŋmɩnɛ a ɩ a fʊ 'yɛr ɩka ban 'mɔɔn a Nɩsaal Bie a saaju? An lɛ a Nɩsaal Bie 'lɔ?”
A Yesu pãa 'yɛr ba, “Ber bãlãa lɛ a chãa na be a yɩ sɛ̃, yɩ chiine a chãa pɔ wʊn chɛnɛ be be ka a libe taa pɔɔ yɩ ɛ. Nɩrɛ na be libe pɔ ba bɔ̃ɔ a jie wʊn chiine ɛ.
Yɩ sɔɔ de a chãa, yɩn chɛnɛ tara wʊ na yɩ tʊ̃ɔ ɩ a chãa bibiir.” Yesu na wa 'yɛr a lɛ baar, wʊ yin chen a baa nyɛ wʊ ɛ.
Yesu gba, wʊn tʊ̃ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ a ba sɛ̃, tɩ baa chɛnɛ sɔɔ de wʊ ɛ.
Ka a Isaiya 'yɛr ɩ yelmãɛ. Lɛ wʊn 'yɛr a kõr jaa, “Sɩ Soro an lɛ sɔɔ de a sɩ 'yɛr, an lɛ a Soro mɩ wiil a wʊ kpɛ̃ɔ?”
Ban ba tʊɔrɔ sɔɔrɔ ɛ, bojũu a Isaiya 'yɛr jie ãsʊɔ,
“Wʊ jɔ̃ɔn a ba nɩbie bar. Na wʊ pɔɔ a ba tɩɛr bar, baa lɛ nyɛrɛ ɛ. Ba kʊ̃ mɩ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ a par a ba tɩɛr pɔ ɛ, na ba lɩɛb wa a n sɛ̃ ka n sãa ba ɛ.”
Isaiya 'yɛr naa nɩtɔ̃, bojũu wʊ dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ a Yesu tɩɩr na wʊ 'yɛrɛ a wʊ 'yɛr.
An sɔɔ be a lɛ tɩ nɩbɛrɛ yɔɔ bamɩne sɔɔn de wʊ. Tɩchɛ a Faraseemɩne dãbãɛ jũu baa 'lara 'yɛrɛ ɛ, ka ba taa dii ba bar a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie ɛ.
Bojũu ba nʊ̃n nɩrɛ pɛɛfʊ gar Nãaŋmɩn pɛɛfʊ.
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa, “Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sɔɔ de ma a ba ɩ maa tɛɛ lɛ wʊ sɔɔ de ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊ sɔɔn de a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na nyɛ ma mɩ nyɛn a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma.
N wan a wɛr pɔ nɩtãa chãa, ka nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sɔɔ de ma kʊ̃ lɛ be libe pɔ ɛ.
“A nɩrɛ 'lɔ na wõ a n 'yɛr, tɩ na waa tu ɛ, n kʊ̃ tɔɔr a wʊ 'yɛr ɛ. N ba wa ɩka n wa tɔɔr a wɛr 'yɛr ɛ, tɩ n wa faa wʊ.
A 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ ben be, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tɔr ma na waa de a n 'yɛr bie ɛ, a 'yɛr 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ nɩ wʊ ju ɩn 'yɛr lɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ a 'yɛr a ber baaraa daar.
N ba 'yɛrɛ n mãɛ 'yɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ n 'yɛr naa a lɛ a Sãa na tʊ̃ ma 'yɛr ma ɩka n 'yɛr.
N bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka a wʊ 'yɛr kʊrɔ na nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ. Ala lɛ so ka n 'yɛr yɩ a lɛ nɛ a Sãa na 'yɛr.”
A kʊ̃ lɛ kor ɛ, tɩ a Gõl Bar Difʊ ta, Yesu bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a wʊ bɩbir vɩɛ naa ka wʊn yi ka a wɛr nyã pɔ lɩɛb chen a Sãa sɛ̃. Wʊ nʊ̃ naa bala na ɩ a wʊ tʊɔr a wɛr nyã pɔ, wʊ nʊ̃ ban tɩ tãn a wʊ kũu.
Ba põn a jãanʊɔr bʊ̃diir, ka a ɩ tɩɩ de nie kpɛ Judas na ɩ Simon na yi Isɩkariyot bidaba ka wʊ tɩ gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu.
Yesu bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a Sãa den bomo a jaa 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ nũu pɔ, an ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ lɛ wʊ yi na wʊ lɛ lɩɛb chiine a wʊ sɛ̃.
Be lɛ wʊ bar a bʊ̃diir tɩ ir na wʊ yaa a fuu bar tɩ de fɔfɩɛlaa sɛ a sɩɛ pɔ.
Na wʊ pʊr kʊ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ la'yɛlma pɔ piel pɛɛrɛ a wʊ poturbo gbɛɛ tɩ ma fɩɛl a fɔfɩɛlaa 'lɔ wʊn sɛ a sɩɛ pɔ bar.
Wʊn wa ta a Simon Pita ka wʊ 'yɛr, “N Soro, fʊ̃ʊ lɛ na pɛɛ a maa gbɛɛ ɔ?”
A Yesu 'yɛr wʊ, “Faa bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ ɩn ɩrɛ a pʊ̃pãanyã ɛ, tɩchɛ fʊn wa bɔ̃ɔn daar kɔ̃ɔ.”
Ka a Pita 'yɛr, “Kai, faa be na wa pɛɛ a n gbɛɛ ɛ.” A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Maa ba pɛɛ a fʊ gbɛɛ ɛ, saa lɛ be taa ɛ.”
Ka Simon Pita pãa 'yɛr, “N Soro ala be lɛ, a ta ɩ a gbɛɛ tɛɛ ɛ, pɛɛ a nuur nɩ a ju mɩ.”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “Nɩrɛ na so kʊ̃ɔ baar gbɛɛ tɛɛ lɛ wʊ ma wa pɛɛ, a wʊ ãgãn wʊ jaa yi naa. A yɩn mɩ yi naa an ba ɩ yɩ jaa lɛ ɛ.”
Yesu bɔ̃ɔn a lɔn na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ, ala lɛ so ka wʊ 'yɛr ɩka a ba ɩ ba jaa lɛ yi ɛ.
Wʊn wa pɛɛ a ba jaa gbɛɛ baar, wʊ lɛ den a fuu su tɩ jãnɛ nɩ a wʊ jie, tɩ sʊʊr ba, “Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a nɩtɔ̃ ɩn ɩ par ɔ?
Yɩ ma bʊɔl ma naa Wiwile bɩɩ Soro, yelmãɛ yɩ 'yɛr an ɩ a lɛ n ɩ.
Ala ɩ maa na ɩ a yɩ Soro nɩ a yɩ Wiwile pɛɛn a yɩ gbɛɛ, yɩ mɩ pɛɛrɛ taa gbɛɛ.
N maal wiil yɩ ɩka yɩ maala a lɛ ɩn ɩ kʊ yɩ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, gbãgbaa ba ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ gar a wʊ soro ɛ. Tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ mɩ ba ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ gar a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ wʊ ɛ.
Pʊ̃pãanyã yɩn bɔ̃ɔ a anyãna, an ɩn sʊ̃ʊfʊ ala ɩ yɩ ɩrɛ yaa naa.
“Yɩ jaa ba lɛ n 'yɛrɛ ɛ, n bɔ̃ɔ naa a bala ɩn ir. Tɩchɛ lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ na ɩ naa a lɛ an sɛb, ‘A 'lɔ ɩn lɔ̃ɔ dire nɩ na lɩɛb ɩ ma bier.’
“N 'yɛr yɩn a pʊ̃pãanyã tɩchɛ ka a ba ta sɛrɛ ɛ, ala wa ta ka yɩ sɔɔ de ma ɩka Maa lɛ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sɔɔ de a 'lɔ ɩn tʊ̃, maa lɛ wʊ sɔɔ de. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na sɔɔ de ma mɩ sɔɔn de a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma.”
Yesu na 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ baar a wʊ pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ naa ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, a yɩ ãsʊɔ na tɩ gar 'yɔ̃ɔ ma.”
Ka a poturbo kaara taa bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba bɔ̃ɔ a buor sɔɔ wʊn 'yɛrɛ.
A Yesu poturo ãsʊɔ wʊn nʊ̃ na jɛ̃ gbɛb wʊ,
'lɔ lɛ a Simon Pita 'lɩɩr 'yɛr, “Sʊʊr wʊ kaa, an lɛ wʊ 'yɛrɛ?”
Ka a poturo 'lɔ dɩɛl a Yesu tɩ sʊʊr wʊ, “N Soro, an lɛ fʊ 'yɛrɛ?”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “A 'lɔ ɩn na ŋmaa a paanʊ̃ɔ suun a jɩɛr kʊ, 'lɔ lɛ.” Wʊ ŋmaa naa a paanʊ̃ɔ suun a jɩɛr de kʊ a Judas na yi Isɩkariyot na ɩ Simon bie.
Judas na 'wɔb a paanʊ̃ɔ baar ka Satan kpɛ wʊ. Ka Yesu 'yɛr wʊ, “A lɛ fʊn bʊɔrɔ ɩka fʊ maal, pɔɔ fɔɔ maal.”
Tɩchɛ a bala na be a bʊ̃diir jie, ãsʊɔ jaa ba bɔ̃ɔ a par a lɛ Yesu na 'yɛr kʊ wʊ ɛ.
An ɩ a Judas lɛ tara a ba libie wʊɔ, ka bamɩne tɩɛr ɩka Yesu tɔ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ wʊ ɩka wʊ da bon kɔ̃ɔ waan a ba wa maal a lɔ̃ɔ di jie bɩɩ wʊ kʊ nɔ̃n dẽme bon kɔ̃ɔ.
A lɛ a Judas na wa de a paanʊ̃ɔ baar wʊ yi naa, tãsɔɔ mɩ lɛ.
Wʊn wa yi baar, Yesu 'yɛr naa, “Pʊ̃pãanyã maa Nɩsaal Bie nyɛn tɩɩr ka Nãaŋmɩn mɩ nyɛ tɩɩr tu a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn nyɛn tɩɩr tu a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ, Nãaŋmɩn na kʊ naa a Bie tɩɩr, wʊn maal naa lɛ ajienaa.
“N bibiir, n kʊ̃ lɛ be a yɩ sɛ̃ kor ɛ. Yɩn wa yʊɔrɔ na bʊɔrɔ ma tɩ a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr kʊ a Juu nɩbɛ, lɛ mɩ lɛ n 'yɛr kʊ yɩ a pʊ̃pãanyã. A jie 'lɔ ɩn chiine yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ wa be ɛ.
“Bin paalaa lɛ n kʊrɔ yɩ, yɩ nʊ̃ taa nɩtãa lɛ ɩn nʊ̃ yɩ. Yɩ mɩ nʊ̃ taa.
Yɩn wa nʊ̃ taa, nɩbɛ ba jaa na bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka yɩn lɛ ɩ a n poturbo.”
Ka a Simon Pita sʊʊr wʊ, “N Soro, nyɩnɛ fʊ chiine?” A Yesu 'yɛr, “A jie ɩn chiine, fʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ tu a pʊ̃pãanyã ɛ, tɩchɛ daar kɔ̃ɔ fʊn tu naa.”
Ka a Pita sʊʊr wʊ, “N Soro, bo lɛ so ka n kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ tu fʊ a pʊ̃pãanyã ɛ? Ɩn sɔɔn kpi a fʊ jũu?”
A Yesu 'yɛr wʊ, “Fʊn sɔɔn kpi kʊ ma? Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ fʊ ɩka nɔraa kʊ̃ kõ sɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ fʊ chiir gbɛɛ ata ɩka faa bɔ̃ɔ ma ɛ.”
Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a poturbo, “Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a yɩ pʊtɩɛr vavire ɛ, yɩ sɔɔ de Nãaŋmɩn na yɩ mɩ sɔɔ de ma.
De yɔɔ be na a n Sãa yir, ala ba ta ɩ lɛ ɛ, n kʊ̃ naa 'yɛr kʊ yɩ ɛ. N chiine naa na tɩ chɔɔr a jie kʊ yɩ.
Maa wa chen tɩ chɔɔr a jie baar, ɩn lɩɛb wa de yɩ ka yɩ tɩ be a n sɛ̃, ka yɩ mɩ tɩ be a jie 'lɔ ɩn be.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a jie 'lɔ ɩn chiine sɔr.”
Ka Tomasɩ sʊʊr wʊ, “N Soro, sɩn ba bɔ̃ɔ a jie fʊn chiine ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ sɩn ɩrɛ wa bɔ̃ɔ a sɔr?”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “Maa lɛ a sɔr, a yelmãɛ, nɩ a nyɛvʊr. Nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ chen a Sãa sɛ̃, na waa tu a n jie ɛ.
Ala ɩ yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ma naa, yɩn bɔ̃ɔn a Sãa mɩ. An be yi a dɩna yɩ bɔ̃ɔ wʊ naa, na yɩ nyɛ wʊ mɩ.”
Ka Filip 'yɛr, “N Soro, wiil sɩ a Sãa a lɛ na sɛɛ sɩ naa.”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “Filip, a mɔ̃ faa bɔ̃ɔ ma ɔ, a kõr jaa ɩn be a yɩ sɛ̃? Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na nyɛ ma nyɛn a Sãa. Ŋmɩnɛ fʊ 'yɛr ɩka n wiil yɩ a Sãa?
Faa sɔɔ de ɩka n ben a Sãa 'yɔ̃ɔ ka a Sãa mɩ be a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ? A 'yɛrbie ala ɩn 'yɛr kʊ yɩ a ba ɩ maa mãɛ 'yɛr ɛ, tɩ a Sãa na be a n 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ tʊ̃nɔ̃ a wʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃.
Yɩ sɔɔ de a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr ɩka n be naa a Sãa 'yɔ̃ɔ ka a Sãa mɩ be a n 'yɔ̃ɔ, bɩɩ yɩ sɔɔ de a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ala.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔɔ de ma, wʊn tʊ̃nɔ̃ naa a tʊ̃mɔ̃ ala ɩn tʊ̃nɔ̃. Wʊn tʊ̃n tʊ̃bɛrɛ gar anyãna, bojũu n chiine naa a Sãa sɛ̃.
Bon jaa yɩn de a yuor sʊɔr, ɩn maal wʊn kʊ yɩ, ka a Sãa nyɛ tɩɩr tu a Bie 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Yɩ de a n yuor sʊɔr ma bon jaa, ɩn maal wʊ naa.
“Ala ɩ yɩ nʊ̃ ma naa, yɩn tu naa a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr.
Ka n sʊɔr a Sãa ka wʊ kʊ yɩ a Sʊ̃nɔ̃ ãsʊɔ, ka wʊ be a yɩ sɛ̃ jaa kpo kpo.
A yelmãɛ Sɩɛ 'lɔ, a wɛr nɩbɛ na kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ de wʊ ɛ, bojũu baa nyɛ wʊ ɛ, bɩɩ bɔ̃ɔ wʊ ɛ. Tɩchɛ yɩn 'lɔ bɔ̃ɔ wʊ naa an ɩ wʊ kpɩɛrɛ naa a yɩ sɛ̃, na wʊn be a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
N kʊ̃ bar yɩ nɩtãa kpɩɩr ɛ, ɩn lɩɛb wa a yɩ sɛ̃.
A chɛn bãlãa a wɛr nɩbɛ kʊ̃ lɛ nyɛ ma go ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩn 'lɔ na nyɛ ma naa. Bojũu ɩn tara na nyɛvʊr ka yɩn mɩ na a nyɛvʊr.
A bɩbir 'lɔ wa vɩɛ, yɩn bɔ̃ɔ ɩka n be naa a n Sãa 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka yɩ mɩ be a n 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka n mɩ be a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na de a n 'yɛr na wʊ turo, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na nʊ̃ ma. 'Lɔ jaa mɩ na nʊ̃ ma, a n Sãa mɩ na nʊ̃ wʊ naa, ka maa mɩ nʊ̃ a nɩnyɩnɛ, naa wiil wʊ a n mãɛ.”
Be lɛ ka a Judas, a ba ɩ a Judas 'lɔ na yi a Isɩkariyot ɛ, 'lɔ lɛ 'yɛr, “Tɩchɛ, n Soro bo lɛ so ka fʊ wiil a fʊ mãɛ kʊ sɩ, tɩ na faa wile a fʊ mãɛ kʊrɔ a wɛr nɩbɛ ɛ.”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “Ala ɩ ãsʊɔ jaa nʊ̃ ma naa, wʊn turo naa a n wiilfʊ. A n Sãa na nʊ̃ wʊ naa, ka sɩ wa be a wʊ sɛ̃.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba nʊ̃ ma ɛ, wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ tu a n wiilfʊ ɛ. A 'yɛrbie anyãna yɩn wõ ba ɩ maa mãɛ 'yɛr ɛ, a yin a Sãa na tʊ̃ ma sɛ̃.
“A anyãna a jaa lɛ n 'yɛr kʊ yɩ, ɩn chɛnɛ be a yɩ sɛ̃.
Tɩchɛ a Sʊ̃nɔ̃ 'lɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, 'lɔ lɛ a Sãa na tʊ̃n a n yuor. Wʊn wiil yɩ naa a yele a jaa, na wʊ mɩ jɛɔ yɩ ala a jaa ɩn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr yɩ.
Nyã'maar pɔ lɛ n bar yɩ, a maa mãɛ nyã'maar lɛ n bar kʊ yɩ. N ba kʊ yɩ nɩtãa lɛ a wɛr nɩbɛ na ma kʊ ɛ. Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka yɩ tɩɛr vavire ɛ, ka yɩ joro dãbãɛ ɛ.
“Yɩ wõn a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr ɩka n chiine naa tɩ ɩn lɩɛb wa a yɩ sɛ̃. Ala ɩ yɩ ta nʊ̃ ma naa, yɩ pʊɔ naa pɛl naa ɩn chiine a Sãa sɛ̃ an ɩ a n Sãa lɛ bɛrma gar ma.
N den nie 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, tɩchɛ ka a na wa ɩ, ala wa ɩ, yɩn sɔɔn de.
Maa nɩ yɩn kʊ̃ lɛ 'yɛr kor ɛ, bojũu a wɛr nyã nãa Satan waara naa, tɩ waa tara kpɛ̃ɔ a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a wɛr nɩbɛ na bɔ̃ɔn ɩka n nʊ̃ naa n Sãa naa maal a lɛ nɛ a n Sãa na 'yɔ̃ɔ ma. Yɩ ir a sɩ chen.”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “Maa lɛ ɩ a tɩwɔ̃n sʊ̃ ka a n Sãa mɩ ɩ a tɩkaara.
Wʊ ma ŋman a wilsɩ ala na be a n 'yɔ̃ɔ tɩ ba wɔ̃nɔ̃ ɛ. A wilsɩ ala mɩ na wɔ̃nɔ̃, wʊ ma chɔɔr 'mɛl bar ka a wɔ̃ yɔɔ.
Yɩn 'lɔ, a 'yɛr ɩn 'yɛr kʊ yɩ chɔɔr yɩ naa.
Yɩ mar a n 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka n mɩ mar a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ. Wile jaa kʊ̃ wɔ̃ wɔ̃mɔ̃ a wʊ mãɛ ɛ, ka waa mar a tɩwɔ̃naa 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ. Yɩn mɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ wɔ̃mɔ̃ wɔ̃ ɛ. Yɩn mɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ wɔ̃mɔ̃ wɔ̃ ɛ, ka yaa mar a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
“Maa lɛ ɩ a tɩɛ, yɩn mɩ lɛ a wilsɩ, ala ɩ nɩrɛ be naa a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ka n mɩ be a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ, wʊn wɔ̃n wɔ̃mɔ̃ yɔɔ. Maa ba be a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ, yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ bon jaa ɩ ɛ.
Ala ɩ ãsʊɔ jaa ba be a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, wʊ nyɛntãan a wile ban lɔb bar ka wʊ ko. Ba ma wob a wilbie anyãna lɔb 'yɔ̃ɔ bũu pɔ ka a di.
Ala ɩ yɩ be naa a n 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a n 'yɛr be a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, yɩ sʊɔr bon jaa yɩn bʊɔrɔ, yɩn nyɛ naa.
A nyã lɛ ɩ a n Sãa tɩɩr yɩn wa wɔ̃nɔ̃ wɔ̃mɔ̃ yɔɔ, a mɩ nɩ wiil naa ɩka yɩ ɩ naa n poturbo.
“Lɛ a Sãa na nʊ̃ ma, lɛ mɩ lɛ n nʊ̃ yɩ. Yɩ ara a n nʊ̃fʊ pɔ.
Ala ɩ yɩ tu naa a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr, yɩn be naa a n nʊ̃fʊ pɔ, nɩtãa lɛ ɩn tu a n Sãa 'yɛr naa be a wʊ nʊ̃fʊ pɔ.
A anyãna lɛ n 'yɛr kʊ yɩ ka n pʊpɛl be a yɩ sɛ̃, ka a yɩ chɩlfʊ mɩ sɛɛ.
A n 'yɛr ɩn kʊrɔ yɩ nɩ nyã. Yɩ nʊ̃ taa nɩtãa lɛ ɩn nʊ̃ yɩ.
A nʊ̃fʊ 'lɔ na gar a nʊ̃fʊ a jaa lɛ nɩrɛ na sɔɔ kpi kʊ a wʊ barmɩne.
Yɩn lɛ ɩ a n barmɩne ala ɩ yɩ ɩrɛ naa a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr.
N ba lɛ bʊɔlɔ yɩ gbãgbaar go ɛ, bojũu tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ ba bɔ̃ɔ lɛ a wʊ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na ɩrɛ ɛ. N bʊɔlɔ yɩ naa n barmɩne, bojũu n 'yɛr yɩn a lɛ jaa ɩn wõ yi a n Sãa sɛ̃.
Yɩn baa ir ma ɛ, tɩchɛ maa lɛ ir yɩ ɩka yɩ tɩ wɔ̃ wɔ̃mɔ̃, a wɔ̃mɔ̃ ala na kʊ̃ sɔ̃ɔ ɛ. A Sãa na pãa kʊ yɩ naa bon jaa yɩn sʊɔr a n yuor pɔ.
A nyãna lɛ n 'yɛr ɩka, yɩ nʊ̃ taa.
“Ala wa ɩ a wɛr nɩbɛ 'laar yɩ naa, yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka ba dɔ̃ɔ de nie 'laar ma.
Ala ɩ yɩ ta ɩ naa a wɛr nɩbɛ, a wɛr nɩbɛ naa nʊ̃ yɩ naa nɩtãa a wʊ bon. Yaa ɩ a wɛr nyã tʊɔr ɛ. Tɩchɛ an ɩ n oo yɩn ir a wɛr nɩbɛ pɔ, ala lɛ so a ba 'laar yɩ.
Yɩ tɩɛr tɔ a 'yɛr 'lɔ ɩn 'yɛr kʊ yɩ. Gbãgbaa ba ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ gar a wʊ soro ɛ. Ala ɩ ba ge ma naa, ba mɩ na ge yɩ naa. Ala ɩ ba tu naa a n wiilfʊ, ba mɩ a n tu naa a yɩ wiilfʊ mɩ.
Ban maal yɩ naa a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ a n yuor jũu, bojũu baa bɔ̃ɔ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma ɛ.
Ala ɩ n ba ta wa 'yɛr 'yɛr kʊ ba ɛ, ba kʊ̃ naa tara yeldɛɛr ɛ, pʊ̃pãanyã baa tara a ba yeldɛɛr lɩɛb tunfʊ jie ɛ.
A 'lɔ na 'laar ma mɩ 'laara a n Sãa mɩ.
Maa ta ba tʊ̃tʊ̃mɔ̃ na ba sɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ jaa na ba ɩ ɛ, ba kʊ̃ naa tara yeldɛɛr ɛ. Tɩchɛ pʊ̃pãanyã ba nyɛn a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ɩn tʊ̃, tɩ chɛnɛ 'laar ma nɩ a n Sãa.
Tɩchɛ a anyã ɩ naa ka a ɩ yelmãɛ a lɛ an sɛb a Nɛɛ pɔ, ‘Ba 'laar man pɔrɔ.’
“A Sʊ̃nɔ̃ na wa na, a 'lɔ na yi a Sãa sɛ̃. A yelmãɛ Sɩɛ 'lɔ wʊ yin a Sãa sɛ̃, wʊn 'yɛr yɩ naa a n 'yɛr.
Yɩ mɩ na 'yɛr naa a n 'yɛr bojũu yɩ ben a n sɛ̃ a pielfʊ jaa.”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “A anyãna a jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, ka yɩ taa bar yi a sɔɔfʊ pɔ ɛ.
Ban dii yɩn bar a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie. Bɩbir kɔ̃ɔ na vɩɛ naa, ka ba kʊ yɩ tɩ tɩɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn tʊ̃mɔ̃ lɛ ba tʊ̃.
Ban ɩ naa anyãna, bojũu baa bɔ̃ɔ a Sãa ɛ, bɩɩ a maa ɛ.
N 'yɛrɛ yɩ naa anyãna ka a bɩbir wa vɩɛ yɩn tɩɛr tɔ, ɩka n dɔ̃ɔ kpãa yɩ. N ba dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ yɩ ɛ, bojũu n be naa a yɩ sɛ̃.
“Pʊ̃pãanyã n chiine naa a 'lɔ na tʊ̃ ma sɛ̃, tɩchɛ a ãsʊɔ jaa ba sʊʊr ma a jie ɩn chiine ɛ.
A anyãna ɩn 'yɛr kʊ yɩ jũu lɛ a yɩ pʊʊr sɔ̃ɔ ɔ?
Tɩchɛ yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, a yɩ jũu a sɛɛ naa ɩka n chen. Maa ba chen ɛ, a Sʊ̃nɔ̃ kʊ̃ wa a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ maa chen ɩn tʊ̃ wʊn ka wʊ wa a yɩ sɛ̃.
'Lɔ wa wa, wʊn wiil a wɛr nɩbɛ a ba bɔ̃ɔ ɩka ba bɔr naa, lɛ a yeldɛɛr nɩ yeltorsɩ na be, nɩ lɛ wʊn na tɔɔr a ba 'yɛr.
Wʊn vɛ̃ naa a ba bɔ̃ɔ a ba yeldɛɛr ban ba sɔɔ de ma ɛ.
Ba bɔr naa nɩ a yeltorsɩ, bojũu n chiine naa a Sãa sɛ̃, yɩ kʊ̃ lɛ nyɛ ma go ɛ.
Ba mɩ bɔr naa nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ yele, bojũu a wɛr nyã nãa Satan 'yɛr tɔɔr naa.
“N chɛnɛ na tara 'yɛr yɔɔ nɩ taa 'yɛr yɩ tɩchɛ a pʊ̃pãanyã, yɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a yelmãɛ Sɩɛ 'lɔ wa wa, wʊn wiil yɩ naa a yelmãɛ wʊ jaa par. Wʊ kʊ̃ 'yɛr a wʊ mãɛ 'yɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ wʊn 'yɛr naa a lɛ tɛɛ wʊn wõ, na wʊ lɛ 'yɛr yɩ a ala na wa.
Wʊn waan na tɩɩr wa kʊ ma, na wʊ vɛ̃ ka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a ala na ɩ a n bon.
Ala a jaa a Sãa na so ɩ naa a n bon. Ala lɛ so ka n 'yɛr ɩka a Sɩɛ na vɛ̃ naa ka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a ala na ɩ a n bon.
“A chɛn bãlãa yɩ kʊ̃ nyɛ ma go ɛ, ka a pãa lɛ ɩ bãlãa ka yɩ nyɛ ma go.”
Ka a poturbo bamɩne sʊrɔ taa, “A par nɩ bo wʊn 'yɛr ɛ ɩka, ‘A chɛn bãlãa yɩ kʊ̃ lɛ nyɛ ma go ɛ, ka a pãa lɛ ɩ bãlãa ka yɩ lɛ nyɛ wʊ go, nɩ wʊn lɛ 'yɛr ɩka, n chiine naa a Sãa sɛ̃?’ ”
Ba chɛnɛ na sʊrɔ taa, “A chɛn bãlãa par nɩ bo? ‘Sãa bɔ̃ɔ a par a lɛ,’ wʊn 'yɛrɛ ɛ.”
Yesu bɔ̃ɔn naa ban bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba sʊʊr wʊ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ sʊrɔ nɩ taa a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr ɩka, ‘A chɛn bãlãa yɩ kʊ̃ nyɛ ma go ɛ, ka a lɛ ɩ bãlãa ka yɩ nyɛ ma go’?
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka yɩn kõnõ na ka yɩ pʊʊr sɔ̃ɔ, tɩchɛ ka a wɛr nɩbɛ chɩlɛ. Yɩ pʊʊr na sɔ̃ɔ naa, tɩchɛ ka a yɩ pʊsɔ̃ɔ na lɩɛb pʊpɛl.
Pɔɔ wa dɔɔrɔ ãgãn ma chɩrɛ wʊ naa ka a ɔɔrɔ wʊ bojũu a wʊ dɔɔfʊ bɩbir vɩɛ naa. Tɩchɛ 'lɔ wʊ dɔɔ baar, wʊ ma ĩin naa a wʊ dɔɔyɛ bojũu wʊ dɔɔn nɩrɛ a wɛr pɔ.
Lɛ nɩ wʊ ju lɛ a yɩn mɩ, yɩ pʊʊr na sɔ̃ɔ naa a pʊ̃pãanyã, tɩchɛ ɩn lɛ wa nyɛ yɩn go ka yɩ pʊʊl pɛl, ka a nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ faa wʊ ɛ.
A bɩbir 'lɔ wa vɩɛ, yɩ kʊ̃ lɛ sʊʊr ma bon go ɛ. Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, a n Sãa na kʊ yɩn bon jaa yɩn sʊɔr a n yuor pɔ.
An wa ta a pʊ̃pãanyã, yaa de a n yuor sʊɔr bon gba ɛ. Yɩ sʊɔr, yɩn nyɛ naa, ka yɩ pʊpɛl na sɛɛ.
“Sʊkpar lɛ n lɔɔrɔ 'yɛrɛ nɩ yɩ a anyãna, a bɩbir wa vɩɛ, n kʊ̃ lɛ lɔb sʊkpar go ɛ, tɩchɛ ɩn 'yɛr yɩ naa a n Sãa 'yɛr chãa pɔ.
A bɩbir 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, yɩn sʊɔr naa nɩ a n yuor. N ba 'yɛrɛ ɩka maa lɛ na sʊɔr a Sãa kʊ yɩ ɛ.
An ɩ a Sãa nʊ̃ yɩ naa bojũu yɩ nʊ̃ ma naa na yɩ sɔɔ de ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ lɛ n yi.
A Sãa sɛ̃ lɛ n yi wa ka a wɛr pɔ, pʊ̃pãanyã n lɛ bara naa a wɛr tɩ lɩɛb chiine a Sãa sɛ̃.”
Ka a Yesu poturbo pãa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Pʊ̃pãanyã fʊ pãa 'yɛr ka a chaar faa lɛ lɔɔrɔ sʊkpar go ɛ.
Pʊ̃pãanyã sɩ nyɛn ɩka fʊ bɔ̃ɔn yele a jaa, na faa lɛ bʊɔrɔ ɩka nɩrɛ wʊ sʊʊr fʊ sʊʊrfʊsɩ ɛ. Ala lɛ so ka sɩ sɔɔ de ɩka Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ lɛ fʊ yi.”
Ka a Yesu sʊʊr ba, “Yɩ pãa sɔɔn de a pʊ̃pãanyã ɔ?
Tɩchɛ bɩbir kɔ̃ɔ na wa vɩɛ naa, wʊ ben ta, ka yɩ jaa na yɛ̃yɛl ka ãsʊɔ jaa kul a wʊ yir tɩ chɛ ma bar a n yõ. Tɩ n ba ɩ a n yõ ɛ, a n Sãa be naa n sɛ̃.
“N 'yɛr yɩ naa anyãna ka yɩ na tara nyã'maar an ɩ yɩ ben a n 'yɔ̃ɔ. A wɛr nyã pɔ yɩn din dɔɔyɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ nyɔɔ nyãa, bojũu n tʊ̃ɔn a wɛr.”
A Yesu na wa 'yɛr a anyãna baar, wʊ kãan saaju tɩ 'yɛr, “N Sãa, a bɩbir vɩɛ naa, kʊ a fʊ Bie a tɩɩr ka a fʊ Bie mɩ kʊ fʊ a tɩɩr.
Bojũu, fʊ̃ʊ lɛ kʊ wʊ sɔr ka wʊ tʊ̃ɔ a nɩbɛ ba jaa na wʊ kʊ ba a nyɛvʊr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, a bala ba jaa fʊn de kʊ wʊ.
A nyɛvʊr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʊ nɩ nyã, ka ban bɔ̃ɔ a fʊ̃ʊ Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ, na ɩ yelmãɛ sʊɔ, nɩ a Yesu 'lɔ fʊn tʊ̃.
N waan na tɩɩr wa kʊ fʊ a ka a wɛr pɔ, naa baar a tʊ̃mɔ̃ ala fʊn kʊ ma ɩka n tʊ̃.
Pʊ̃pãanyã, n Sãa kʊ ma a tɩɩr a fʊ niem, a tɩɩr 'lɔ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ tara tɩchɛ na fʊ wa maal a wɛr.
“N wiil fʊn kʊ a bala fʊn de kʊ ma ka a wɛr pɔ, fʊ̃ʊ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ so ba tɩ na fʊ wa de ba kʊ ma, ba tu naa a fʊ 'yɛr.
Pʊ̃pãanyã ba bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka bon jaa ɩn tara yin a fʊ sɛ̃.
Bojũu, a 'yɛr ala fʊn kʊ ma, n 'yɛr kʊ ba, ka ba sɔɔ de. Ba bɔ̃ɔn yelmãɛ jaa ɩka fʊ̃ʊ sɛ̃ lɛ n yi naa wa, na ba sɔɔ de ɩka fʊ̃ʊ lɛ tʊ̃ ma.
Bala 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ n sʊɔrɔ fʊ, n ba sʊɔrɔ fʊ kʊrɔ a wɛr nɩbɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala fʊn kʊ ma an ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ so ba.
Bon jaa ɩn tara ɩ naa a fʊ sofʊ, ka bon jaa fʊn mɩ na tara ɩ a n sofʊ. N nyɛn tɩɩr yi a ba jie.

Maa kʊ̃ lɛ be ka a wɛr pɔ go ɛ, tɩchɛ bala 'lɔ chɛnɛ na be ka a wɛr pɔ, n waara a fʊ sɛ̃. Sãa sʊ̃, gu ba nɩ a fʊ yuor kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ pɔ, a yuor 'lɔ fʊn kʊ ma ka ban ɩ bʊ̃'yen, nɩtãa lɛ maa nɩ fʊ̃ʊ na ɩ bʊ̃'yen.
Ɩn be a ba sɛ̃, n gu ban naa kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ fʊn kʊ ma. Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa ba bɔr ɛ, ala ba ɩ a 'lɔ tɛɛ an sɛɛ ɩka wʊ bɔr ka a lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ na ɩ yelmãɛ.
“N waara naa a fʊ sɛ̃ a pʊ̃pãanyã, tɩchɛ ɩn chɛnɛ be ka a wɛr pɔ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ a anyãna ka ban tara a n pʊpɛl wʊ jaa.
N kʊ ban a fʊ 'yɛr, ala lɛ so ka a wɛr nɩbɛ 'laar ba, baa lɛ chɛnɛ pʊɔ ba go ɛ, nɩtãa maa na ba pʊɔ ba ɛ.
N ba sʊɔrɔ fʊ ɩka fʊ ir ba yin ka a wɛr pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ fʊ guro ba a dɛɛr sʊɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Baa lɛ pʊɔ a wɛr nɩbɛ pɔ ɛ, nɩtãa n mɩ na ba pʊɔ ba ɛ.
Oo ba nɩ a fʊ yelmãɛ, a fʊ 'yɛr ɩn yelmãɛ.
Nɩtãa lɛ fʊn tʊ̃ ma a wɛr nɩbɛ sɛ̃, lɛ lɛ n mɩ tʊ̃ ba a wɛr nɩbɛ sɛ̃.
A ba 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ n oo a n mãɛ kʊ fʊ, ka ba mɩ na oo a ba mãɛ sɩrɛ jaa kʊ fʊ.
“A ba ɩ bala tɛɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ n sʊɔrfʊ ɛ, n mɩ sʊɔrɔ na kʊrɔ a bala na wa sɔɔ de ma tu a ba 'yɔ̃ɔ.
N sʊɔrɔ fʊ naa ɩka fʊ vɛ̃ ka ba jaa ɩ bʊ̃'yen. N Sãa, nɩtãa lɛ fʊn be a n 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka n mɩ be a fʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ. Ba mɩ be a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ ka a wɛr nɩbɛ na sɔɔ de ɩka fʊ̃ʊ lɛ tʊ̃ ma.
N kʊ ban a tɩɩr 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ nɩ wʊ ju fʊn kʊ ma, ka ba na ɩ bʊ̃'yen nɩtãa maa nɩ fʊ̃ʊ na ɩ bʊ̃'yen.
N ben a ba 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka fʊ mɩ be a n 'yɔ̃ɔ. Ka ba jaa mɩ na 'mataa ɩ bʊ̃'yen ka a wɛr nɩbɛ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka fʊ̃ʊ lɛ tʊ̃ ma na fʊ nʊ̃ ba gba nɩtãa a lɛ fʊn nʊ̃ ma.
“N Sãa, n bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka a bala fʊn kʊ ma, ba mɩ be a jie 'lɔ ɩn na be, na ba nyɛ a n tɩɩr. A tɩɩr 'lɔ fʊn de nie kʊ ma, bojũu fʊ nʊ̃ ma naa tɩ na fʊ wa maal a wɛr.
“N Sãa, a fʊ yele tor naa, tɩ a wɛr nɩbɛ ba bɔ̃ɔ fʊ ɛ, maa bɔ̃ɔ fʊ naa, ka a n poturbo mɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka fʊ̃ʊ lɛ tʊ̃ ma.
N vɛ̃n ka ba bɔ̃ɔ fʊ, ɩn chɛnɛ na maal ba ka ba bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ fʊ pʊɔrɔ ka a nʊ̃fʊ 'lɔ fʊn nʊ̃ ma na be a ba 'yɔ̃ɔ ka n mɩ be a ba 'yɔ̃ɔ.”
Yesu na sʊɔr a Sãa a nɩtɔ̃ baar, 'lɔ naa poturbo gɔ̃ɔ naa a Kidɩrɔn kʊla gɔ̃ɔn. 'Lɔ nɩ a wʊ poturbo chen a jie a kãa tɩɩr na be.
Judas na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ mɩ bɔ̃ɔn a jie nyã, bojũu Yesu naa wʊ poturbo ba gala a be lɔ̃ɔfʊ ɛ.
Be lɛ Judas tara a Worom sojasɩ, nɩ a puorfʊ die gugurbo bala a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Faraseemɩne na tʊ̃ chiin a jie 'lɔ. Ba tara na bũusɩ, fãtɩnsɩ nɩ jɛɛr bomo.
Yesu na bɔ̃ɔ lɛ na waara a wʊ sɛ̃, wʊ tuor sʊʊr ba, “An yɩ bʊɔrɔ?”
Ka ba 'yɛr, “Yesu na yi Najaretɩ lɛ sɩ bʊɔrɔ.” Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, “Maa lɛ.” Ka a Judas 'lɔ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ lɔ̃ɔn ba ara.
Yesu na wa 'yɛr ɩka, “Maa lɛ.” Ba lɩɛb puor lo lo tẽe.
Wʊ lɛ sʊʊr ban go, “An lɛ yɩ bʊɔrɔ?” A ba 'yɛr, “Yesu na yi Najaretɩ.”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “N ba 'yɛr yɩ ɩka ‘Maa lɛ.’ Ala ɩ maa lɛ yɩ bʊɔrɔ, yɩ ɩ ka a nɩbɛ banyã chiine.”
Yesu 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ ka a lɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩ yelmãɛ ɩka, “A bala fʊn kʊ ma, n ba vɛ̃ ka ãsʊɔ jaa bɔr ɛ.”
Be lɛ a Simon Pita na tara sʊɔ na wʊ vʊ̃ɔ chɛn a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ gbãgbaa nũsʊ̃ɔ toor ŋmaa. A gbãgbaa yuor din Malkusɩ.
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ a Pita, “Su a sʊɔ a sʊkpa pɔ, n ta nyũn a dɔɔyɛ ŋmele 'lɔ a Sãa na kʊ ma bɩɩ?”
Ka a sojasɩ nɩ a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'matãan a gugurbo bala ban tʊ̃, nyɔɔ a Yesu na ba lũ.
Ba den nie tara wʊ chiin Anasɩ sɛ̃, wʊ ɩ naa a Kayafasɩ dãɛ na wʊ mɩ ɩ bɔɔrlo nãa a yuon 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.
A Kayafasɩ nyãna lɛ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ a Juu nɩbɛ ɩka a ɩn sʊ̃, ka nɩbʊ̃'yen na kpi kʊ a nɩbɛ.
Simon Pita nɩ a poturo ãsʊɔ turo naa a Yesu, bojũu a poturo nyã bɔ̃ɔn a bɔɔrlo nãa ala lɛ so ka wʊ tu a Yesu kpɛ a bɔɔrlo nãa bɛchaar pɔ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita 'lɔ ara a yõo dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ. A poturo nyã a bɔɔrlo nãa na bɔ̃ɔ, yin wa 'yɛr a pɔɔbile 'lɔ na kaara a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ tɩ tara a Pita kpɛ̃n.
Ka a pɔɔbile 'lɔ na kaara a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ, sʊʊr a Pita, “A fʊ̃ʊ, faa mɩ ɩ a daba nyã poturo ãsʊɔ ɛ?” Ka a Pita 'yɛr, “N ba ɩ a wʊ poturo ãsʊɔ ɛ.”
Ɔɔr kʊrɔ naa ka a gbãgbaar nɩ a gugurbo bala gbɔɔ saalaa bũu ara uoro ka a Pita mɩ tɩ ara uoro.
A bɔɔrlo nãa sʊʊr naa a Yesu, ba boo lɛ ɩ a wʊ poturbo nɩ bo lɛ wʊ ma wile?
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Chãa pɔ lɛ n ma 'yɛrɛ a n 'yɛr kʊrɔ a nɩbɛ. N ma wile ba naa a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie nɩ a ba Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ jiir, be lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ ba jaa ma lɔ̃ɔ. N ba sɔɔl 'yɛr 'yɛr jaa ɛ.
Bo lɛ so ka fʊ sʊrɔ ma a lɛ? Sʊʊr a bala na wõ a n 'yɛr, ba bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr.”
Yesu na 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ ka a guguro ãsʊɔ na ara gbʊr wʊ 'ma wʊ tɩ 'yɛr, “Lɛ lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka fʊ 'yɛr kʊ a bɔɔrlo nãa ɔ?”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “Ala ɩ a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr n bɔr naa, wiil a n bɔrfʊ jie. Tɩchɛ ala ɩ yelmãɛ lɛ n mɩ 'yɛr, bo 'yɔ̃ɔ fʊ 'ma ma?”
Wʊ chɛnɛ na lũ tɩchɛ ka a Anasɩ vɛ̃ a ba tara wʊ chiin a bɔɔrlo nãa Kayafasɩ sɛ̃.
A Simon Pita na chɛnɛ ara uoro a bũu, ba sʊʊr wʊ naa, “A fʊ̃ʊ, fʊ ɩ naa a daba nyã poturo ãsʊɔ ɔ?” Ka Pita chiir 'yɛr, “N ba ɩ a wʊ poturo ãsʊɔ ɛ.”
A bɔɔrlo nãa gbãgbaa ãsʊɔ, wʊ nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ toor lɛ a 'lɔ a Pita na dɔ̃ɔ chɛ ŋmaa 'yɛr, “A ba ɩ n nyɛ fʊ naa fʊn be a wʊ sɛ̃ a kãa tɩɩr jie 'lɔ ɛ?”
Ka a Pita lɛ chiir, ka a nɔraa mɩ tɔ̃ɔ kõ ajienaa.
Be lɛ ba tara a Yesu yin a Kayafasɩ yir bibio pipi na ba chiin a Worom nɩkpɛ̃ɛ yir. A Juu nɩbɛ mãɛ ba kpɛ be ɛ, bojũu baa bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba sɔ̃ɔ ba mãɛ na ba kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ di a Gõl Bar Difʊ ɛ.
Lɛ lɛ a Pilate yi a yõo tɩ sʊʊr ba, “Bo yelbier yɩ ɩka a daba nyã ɩ naa?”
Ka ba 'yɛr, “'Lɔ ba ta maal yelbier ɛ, sɩ kʊ̃ naa tara wʊ waan a fʊ sɛ̃ ɛ.”
Ka Pilate 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩn mãɛ, yɩ de wʊ tɩ tɔɔr a wʊ 'yɛr, a lɛ a yɩn mãɛ nɛɛ na 'yɛr bin.” Tɩchɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ 'yɛr, “Saa tara sɔr na kʊ nɩrɛ ɛ.”
A ɩn a lɛ a Yesu na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr wiil a kũu 'lɔ tɔ wʊn na kpi.
Pilate lɩɛb kpɛ tɩ bʊɔl a Yesu sʊʊr, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nãa bɩɩ?”
A Yesu sʊʊr wʊ, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ tɩɛr a lɛ bɩɩ nɩbɛ lɛ 'yɛr a n 'yɛr kʊ fʊ?”
Ka a Pilate 'yɛr, “Fʊ tɩɛr ɩka n ɩn Juu nɩrɛ bɩɩ? A fʊ mãɛ nɩbɛ nɩ a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ baa nyɔɔ fʊ waan a n sɛ̃, bo fʊ̃ʊ ɩ?”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “A n nãalʊ̃ʊ ba yi ka a wɛr pɔ ɛ, ala ɩ a wɛr pɔ lɛ wʊ dɔ̃ɔ yi, a n poturbo naa jɛb faa ma ka a Juu nɩbɛrɛ ta nyɔɔ ma ɛ. Tɩchɛ a n nãalʊ̃ʊ ba yi a ka ɛ.”

Ka a Pilate pãa sʊʊr wʊ, “Ka ala ɩ a lɛ, nãa lɛ fʊ ɩ wɛ?” Ka Yesu 'yɛr, “Fʊ 'yɛr vɩla fʊn 'yɛr ɩka nãa lɛ n ɩ, ala 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ ba dɔɔ ma ka n wa ka a wɛr pɔ, naa wa 'yɛr a yelmãɛ 'yɛr. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na ɩ yelmãɛ sʊɔ chɛlɛ naa lɛ ɩn 'yɛrɛ.”
Ka Pilate sʊʊr wʊ, “Bo lɛ ɩ a yelmãɛ?” Wʊn sʊʊr a nɩtɔ̃ baar, wʊ yin a yõo a Juu nɩbɛrɛ sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, “N ba nyɛ yelsɔ̃ɔnaa jaa a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a yɩ binfʊ lɛ ɩka n ma ir nɩrɛ a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ kʊ yɩ a Gõl Bar Difʊ daar. Yɩ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka n yuo a yɩ nãa kʊ yɩ bɩɩ?”
A ba tãna 'yɛrɛ, “Kai, saa bʊɔrɔ wʊ ɛ, Barabasɩ lɛ sɩ bʊɔrɔ.” Tɩchɛ a Barabasɩ mɩ ɩn nɩkʊrɔ.
Pilate vɛ̃ naa ka ba nyɔɔ a Yesu chiin tɩ fɔb.
Ka a sojasɩ de gʊʊr wob jupil su a Yesu, tɩ mɩ de fuu jã ile ile na ba su wʊ.
Tɩ pãa ma tɔɔ ta a wʊ sɛ̃ 'yɛrɛ, “Sɩ puor fʊ naa Juu nɩbɛ nãa,” tɩ ma 'ma 'ma wʊ.
Pilate lɛ yin wa a Juu nɩbɛrɛ sɛ̃ go wa 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ nyɛ, ɩn vɛ̃n ka ba yi waan wʊ, ka yɩn mãɛ nyɛ ɩka, n ba nyɛ yelbier jaa a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.”
Ban wa yin a Yesu, wʊ sun a gʊʊr jupil nɩ a fuu jã ile ile 'lɔ, ka a Pilate 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ nyɛ a daba.”

A bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a puorfʊ yir gugurbo, ban wa nyɛ a Yesu, ka ba tãna 'yɛrɛ, “Kpa wʊ a daa ju. Kpa wʊ a daa ju.” Tɩchɛ ka a Pilate 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩn, yɩ de wʊ tɩ kpa wʊ a daa ju, maa 'lɔ n ba nyɛ yelbier jaa a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛrɛ 'yɛr, “Sɩ tara na nɛɛ, sɩn 'yɛr, ka a nɛɛ 'lɔ ɩka wʊ sɛɛn kũu, bojũu wʊ bʊɔlɔ naa wʊ mãɛ Nãaŋmɩn Bie.”
Pilate na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ ka dãbãɛ gba kpɛ wʊ.
Ka wʊ lɩɛb kpɛ na wʊ tɩ sʊʊr a Yesu, “Nyɩnɛ fʊ yi?” Tɩchɛ Yesu ba haa nɛɛ sɔɔ wʊ ɛ.
A Pilate sʊʊr wʊ, “Faa haar ma nɛɛ ɛ? Faa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka n tara na sɔr na vɛ̃ ka ba kʊ fʊ, naa lɛ tara sɔr na faar fʊ bar ɛ?”
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr wʊ, “Faa tara kpɛ̃ɔ bãlãa jaa a n jie ɛ, ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn ba de yin saaju kʊ fʊ ɛ. A lɛ jũu nɩrɛ 'lɔ na nyɔɔ ma wa kʊ fʊ, wʊ lon yeldɛɛr pɔ gar fʊ.”

An yi a be chiine, ka Pilate pãa mʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ faar a Yesu, tɩchɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛrɛ tãna 'yɛrɛ, “Fʊ̃ʊ vɛ̃ ka a daba nyã chen, faa ɩ a Siisa baraa go ɛ. Nɩrɛ jaa na ɩka nãa lɛ wʊ ɩ, wʊ jɛɛrɛ nɩ naa a Siisa.”
Pilate na wõ a nɩtɔ̃, wʊ yin naa Yesu tɩ jãnɛ nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ dakɔɔ ju, a jie ban bʊɔlɔ Kʊsɩpãn. Ka a Juu nɩbɛrɛ mɩ bʊɔlɔ a jie Gabata.
A Gõl Bar Difʊ bãnsɩ daar mɔ̃tɔ̃tuo sɔ̃ɔ, Pilate 'yɛr kʊ a Juu nɩbɛrɛ, “Yɩ nyɛ a yɩ nãa.”
Tɩchɛ ka ba tãna 'yɛrɛ, “Kʊ wʊ. Kʊ wʊ. Kpa wʊ yɔɔl a daa ju.” Ka a Pilate sʊʊr ba, “N kpa a yɩ nãa?” A ba 'yɛrɛ, “Saa tara nãa jaa ka nãa Siisa ba lɛ ɛ.”
Ka Pilate vɛ̃ a ba nyɔɔ a Yesu chiin na tɩ kpa ka a sojasɩ tara wʊ.
Yesu yin tuo a wʊ mãɛ daa chiin a jie 'lɔ ban bʊɔlɔ a Julaa Jie. Tɩchɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ mɩ bʊɔlɔ a jie, Gɔlgɔta.
Be lɛ ba kpa wʊ 'matãan nɩbɛ ayi, ka bala be a lõbobo tɩchɛ ka a Yesu be a sãlsɔɔ.
Pilate sɛb sɛbie 'mar a daa ju ɩka, YESU NA YI NAJARETƖ, A JUU NƖBƐ NÃA.
Kɔkɔɛ ata lɛ wʊ sɛb, a Juu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr, Worom nɩbɛ kɔkɔr nɩ a Greek dẽme kɔkɔr. Ka a Juu nɩbɛ yɔɔ kar a sɛbie bojũu a jie ban kpa wʊ ba jãan a yir ɛ.
Ka a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ 'yɛr kʊ a Pilate, “Ta sɛb ɩka a Juu nɩbɛ nãa ɛ, fʊn taa sɛb ɩka a daba nyã 'yɛr ɩka 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nãa.”
Ka a Pilate 'yɛr, “A lɛ ɩn sɛb n sɛb baar.”
A sojasɩ na wa kpa a Yesu baar, ba põn a wʊ fuusɩ jiir anaar ka ãsʊɔ jaa 'mɔɔ wʊ bon. A wa chɛn a fuu wõo 'lɔ na ba tara nɛɛ ɛ, bʊ̃bʊ̃'yen lɛ ba wob yin a saaju tɩ baar a gbɛɛ pɔ.
Ka ba 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ taa, “Yɩ ta ɩ a sɩ chɩɛr a fuu nyã ɛ, yɩ ɩ a sɩ gba gbãm kaa an lɛ na di?” Ba ɩn a lɛ ka a ala na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ na ɩ yelmãɛ, “Ba põn a n fuur tɩ de a n fuu gbãn gbãm.”
Yesu ma nɩ a wʊ ma yɛbɛ, Klopasɩ pɔɔ Mɛɛr nɩ a Mɛɛr 'lɔ mɩ na yi a Magdala ara naa be a wʊ daa par.
A Yesu na nyɛ a wʊ ma na ara, ka a poturo 'lɔ wʊn nʊ̃ mɩ ara gbʊr wʊ, ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a ma, “A fʊ bie lɛ a 'lɔ.”
Na wʊ mɩ 'yɛr kʊ a poturo 'lɔ mɩ, “A fʊ ma lɛ.” Ala lɛ so ka a poturo 'lɔ tara a Yesu ma kul a wʊ yir.
Yesu bɔ̃ɔn naa pʊ̃pãanyã ɩka yele a jaa pãa baar naa ka a lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, na ɩ yelmãɛ, ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Kɔ̃nyũur kpɛ ma naa.”
Dʊʊ ben be ka a dãmiir sɛɛ ka ba de sapɔ 'lɔr ir chab urbanyũu daa pɔ tur a Yesu.
Wʊn wa mʊʊr a dãmiir ala baar, ka wʊ 'yɛr, “A baar naa,” tɩ sur a ju na wʊ ŋmaa a vʊʊr.
A bɩbir chiiraa Chɔɔrfʊ Bɩbir Daar lɛ ka a wɛr na chaar ɩ Bɩbir Kpɛ̃ɛ, ala lɛ so ka a Juu nɩbɛ ba bʊɔrɔ ɩka a kũn a chɛnɛ be a daar jur ɛ. Ba sʊɔr a Pilate ɩka wʊ vɛ̃ ka ba kar a ba gbɛɛ tɩ yɔɔ ba.
Be lɛ a sojasɩ chen tɩ kar a bala ban lɔ̃ɔ kpan a Yesu gbɛɛ.
Tɩchɛ ban wa ta a Yesu sɛ̃, ba nyɛn ka a ɩ wʊ kpi naa ka baa kar a wʊ gbɛɛ ɛ.
Ka a sojasɩ ãsʊɔ de a pĩi wõo 'lɔ chɔr a Yesu lõboor ka jãɩ nɩ kʊ̃ɔ yi ajienaa.
A nɩrɛ 'lɔ na nyɛ a anyãna lɛ di a dãasɩɛ, ka wʊ dãasɩɛ ɩ yelmãɛ. Wʊ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr ɩn yelmãɛ, ka yɩ mɩ na sɔɔ de.
A anyãna ɩ naa ka a lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩ yelmãɛ ɩka, “A wʊ kɔɔr kʊ̃ kab ɛ.”
Ka ba lɛ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn jie ãsʊɔ ɩka, “Ban kaa naa a 'lɔ ban chɔr.”
A Josefʊ na yi Arimatɩya, ɩ naa a Yesu poturo, tɩ a Juu nɩbɛrɛ dãbãɛ jũu, waa dɔ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka ba bɔ̃ɔn ɛ. 'Lɔ lɛ sʊɔr a Yesu a Pilate sɛ̃. Pilate sɔɔ naa ka wʊ tɩ yɔɔ a Yesu.
A 'lɔ nɩ a Nikodimasɩ nyã na dɔ̃ɔ chen a Yesu sɛ̃ a tãsɔɔ pʊɔ wʊ naa, na wʊ mɩ waan a kãnyũur ala ban bʊɔlɔ sɩmura nɩ alosɩ. An tãn nũgbulo lɩjaata nɩ pie nɩ a nũu (75).
A ba jaa ayi den a Yesu vil wʊ a fɔpɩla tɩ jɛ wʊ a kãnyũu ala tu a lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ na ma ɩ tɩ ũu a nɩrɛ.
A jie 'lɔ ban kpa a Yesu, pobile ben be, ka yaa paalaa mɩ ban ba ũu nɩrɛ jaa ɛ, mɩ be be.
Bojũu an ɩ a bɩbir chiiraa Chɔɔrfʊ Bɩbir Daar lɛ, tɩchɛ ka a yaa mɩ gbʊr a be jũu, ba ũun a Yesu a be.
A daa gbul bɩbir dɔ̃ɔ daar wɛr na chaara wa la la la, Mɛɛr na yi a Magdala chen naa a yaa par tɩ nyɛ ka ɩ a kʊsɩr 'lɔ ban pɔɔ a yaa yuo naa.
Wʊ jon chen a Simon Pita nɩ a poturo 'lɔ a Yesu na nʊ̃ sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, “Ba ir naa a Soro ãgãn a yaa pɔ, ka saa bɔ̃ɔ a jie ban bin wʊ ɛ.”
Ka a Pita nɩ a poturo yi na chen a yaa par.
Ba jaa 'mantaa joro, tɩchɛ ka a poturo 'lɔ jo vɩɛ a Pita bar tɩ de nie ta a yaa par.
Na wʊ muul nyɛ a fɔpɩla 'lɔ na gã, tɩ waa kpɛ ɛ.
Be lɛ ka a Pita na turo a puor mɩ ta, na wʊ kpɛ a yaa pɔ, na wʊ nyɛ a fɔpɩla mɩ na gã.
Ka a fɔ-ũu naa 'lɔ ban vil a Yesu ju mɩ pil yi a fɔpɩla pɔ gã wʊ yõ.
A poturo 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ de nie ta a yaa par mɩ pãa kpɛ, na wʊ nyɛ a lɛ tɩ sɔɔ de.
Baa na bɔ̃ɔ a par sɛrɛ ɛ, ɩka lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr ɩka a Yesu na ir naa a kũu pɔ, ɩ vʊr ɛ.
A poturbo ayi bala lɩɛb kul a ba taaba sɛ̃.
Tɩchɛ ka a Mɛɛr ara a yaa par kõnõ. Wʊ kõn wa muul kaa a yaa pɔ,
na wʊ nyɛ a malakasɩ ayi na su fuu pɩɛl be a yaa pɔ, ka a ãsʊɔ jãnɛ a ju jie, ka a ãsʊɔ mɩ jãnɛ a gbɛɛ jie, a jie ban dɔ̃ɔ gaal a Yesu.
Ka ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Pɔɔ, bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ fʊ kõnõ?” A wʊ 'yɛr ba, “Ba ir naa a n Soro, ka n ba bɔ̃ɔ a jie ban bin wʊ ɛ.”
A nɩtɔ̃ wʊn 'yɛr, tɩ lɩɛb nyɛ a Yesu na ara, tɩchɛ waa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka 'lɔ lɛ ɛ.
Ka Yesu sʊʊr wʊ, “Pɔɔ, bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ fʊ kõnõ? An lɛ fʊ bʊɔrɔ?” Mɛɛr tɩɛr naa ɩka a jikaara lɛ, tɩ 'yɛr, “Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, ala ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ ir wʊ, wiil ma a jie fʊn bin, ka n chen tɩ 'mɔɔ wʊ.”
A Yesu bʊɔl, “Mɛɛr!” Ka wʊ lɩɛb 'yɛr nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr, “Woroboni.” A par lɛ, Wiwile.
A Yesu 'yɛr, “Ta gɔɔ ma ɛ, n ba chen a n Sãa sɛ̃ sɛrɛ ɛ. Chen a n poturbo sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr ba, n lɩɛb chiine a n Sãa Nãaŋmɩn mɩ na ɩ a yɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.”
Ka a Mɛɛr na yi a Magdala chen a poturbo sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, “N nyɛn a Soro,” na wʊ mɩ man a ala a Yesu na 'yɛr kʊ wʊ.
A daa gbul bɩbir dɔ̃ɔ daar jãanʊɔr, a poturbo lɔ̃ɔn taa a die pɔ, tɩ kpal a pãma a Juu nɩbɛ dãbãɛ jũu. A Yesu tɩ kpɛ ara a ba sɛ̃ tɩ puor ba 'yɛr, “Nyã'maar wʊ be a yɩ sɛ̃.”
Wʊn 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃, wʊ wiil ba naa a nuur nɩ a lõboor. Nʊ̃ɔ kpɛ̃n a poturbo ban nyɛ a Soro.
Yesu lɛ 'yɛr kʊ ba go, “Nyã'maar wʊ be a yɩ sɛ̃, lɛ a Sãa na tʊ̃ ma, lɛ lɛ n mɩ tʊ̃nɔ̃ yɩ.”
Tɩ pãa vʊʊr 'yɔ̃ɔ ba tɩ 'yɛr, “Yɩ de a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.”
Ala ɩ yɩ vɛ̃n nɩrɛ yeldɛɛr bar, Nãaŋmɩn mɩ na vɛ̃n bar wʊ. Ala ɩ yaa mɩ wa vɛ̃ bar ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn mɩ kʊ̃ vɛ̃ bar ɛ.
Tomasɩ ban lɛ bʊɔlɔ Naa na ɩ a Poturo Pie Nɩ Ayi ãsʊɔ ba dɔ̃ɔ be be a Yesu na wa ɛ.

Ka a poturbo bala na be be nyɛ a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Sɩ nyɛn a Soro,” tɩ wʊ 'yɛr, “Maa ba nyɛ a natɩɛ a wʊ nũu pɔ ɛ, naa de a n nubir tũ a kpafʊ jie ɛ, naa mɩ lɛ de nũu tũ a lõboor bɔɔ pɔ ɛ, n kʊ̃ sɔɔ de jaa ɛ.”
A ber aniin daar, a wʊ poturbo ba jaa lɛ lɔ̃ɔn taa a yir pɔ, ka a Tomasɩ mɩ be be. A pãma kpal naa, tɩchɛ ka a Yesu wa ara a ba sɛ̃ puor ba tɩ 'yɛr, “Nyã'maar wʊ be a yɩ sɛ̃.”
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʊ a Tomasɩ, “Tur a fʊ nubir a ka, nyɛ a n nuur na fʊ tur a fʊ nũu su a n lõboor bɔɔ pɔ, na fʊ bar a baal tɩ sɔɔ de.”
Ka a Tomasɩ 'yɛr, “N Soro nɩ n Nãaŋmɩn.”
A Yesu pãa sʊʊr wʊ, “Fʊn nyɛ ma jũu lɛ fʊ sɔɔ de ɔ? Pʊpɛl dẽme lɛ a bala na ba nyɛ ɛ, tɩ sɔɔ de.”
Yesu tʊ̃n nɛ'maa tʊ̃ yɔɔ a wʊ poturbo niem, ban ba sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ a gãn nyã pɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a anyãna sɛb naa ka yɩn sɔɔ de ɩka, a Yesu lɛ a Nɩ-iraa, na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie. Yɩn sɔɔ de jũu, yɩn tara naa nyɛvʊr yin a wʊ yuor pɔ.
A anyã puor, Yesu lɛ ir wʊ mãɛ wiil kʊ a wʊ poturbo be a Tiberiyas man pɔ. Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a tu.
Simon Pita, Tomasɩ ban bʊɔlɔ Naa, Natanɩɛl na yi Keena na be a Galilee paal pɔ, Jebedee bibiir ayi pʊɔn a poturbo ayi bamɩne 'mantaa.
Ka a Simon Pita 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Maa chiine naa jãmɛ nyɔɔrfʊ jie.” Ka ba mɩ 'yɛr, “Sɩn 'mantaa chen!” Ba yin kpɛ a gboro chen, tɩchɛ a tãsɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ baa nyɔɔ bon ɛ.
Bibio pipi Yesu ben a gogoro ju ara, tɩchɛ a poturbo ba bɔ̃ɔ ɩka 'lɔ lɛ ɛ.
Ka wʊ bʊɔl ba sʊʊr, “Barmɩne, yaa nyɔɔ jãm ɛ?” Ka ba 'yɛr “Kai.”
A Yesu 'yɛr ba, “Yɩ lɔb a lɔyaar 'yɔ̃ɔ a gboro nũsʊ̃ɔ jie, yɩn nyɔɔr amɩne.” Ban lɔb a lɔyaar 'yɔ̃ɔ, baa lɛ tʊ̃ɔnɔ̃ tɔɔrɔ ɛ, bojũu wʊ nyɔɔr jãyɔɔ.
Ka a poturo 'lɔ a Yesu na nʊ̃ 'yɛr kʊ a Simon Pita, “A sɩ Soro lɛ.” A lɛ a Pita na wõ ɩka, “A sɩ Soro lɛ,” wʊ sun a fuu wʊn dɔ̃ɔ yaa bar na wʊ ɔɔ lon a kʊ̃ɔ pɔ.
Ka a poturbo ba nyã na chɛ turo nɩ a gboro tɔɔrɔ a lɔyaar na sɛɛn a jãmɛ. Baa jãan a gogoro ɛ, an ɩn gbɛɛ kɔɔr ata (300).
Ban wa do a gogoro ju, ba nyɛn saalaa bũu jãmɛ na be be nɩ paanʊ̃ɔ.
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ ir a jãmɛ ala yɩn nyɔɔr a pʊ̃pãanyã amɩne waan.”
Ka a Simon Pita kpɛ a gboro pɔ, tɩ tɔɔ a lɔyaar na sɛɛn a jãbɛrɛ don a gogoro ju. A ɩn jãmɛ kɔbaa lɩjaayi nɩ pie nɩ ata (153), an ɩ a yɔɔ a lɛ, tɩchɛ a lɔyaar ba chɩɛr ɛ.
A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ wa suor nɛɛ.” Tɩ a poturbo ãsʊɔ jaa ba 'la sʊʊr wʊ ɩka, “An lɛ fʊ ɩ?” Ba jaa bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a Soro lɛ.
Yesu ir a paanʊ̃ɔ na wʊ kʊ ba, tɩ lɛ ir a jãmɛ mɩ kʊ ba.
A nyã lɛ ɩ gbɛɛ ata Yesu na ir a wʊ mãɛ wiil a poturbo wʊn ir a kũu pɔ ɩ vʊr.
Ban di baar ka Yesu sʊʊr a Simon Pita, “Simon, Jɔɔn bie, fʊ nʊ̃ man gar a banyãna ɔ?” Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Ɔ̃ɔ, n Soro, fʊ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩn nʊ̃ fʊ.” A Yesu 'yɛr wʊ, “Kʊrɔ a n pelsɩ a bʊ̃diir.”
Yesu lɛ sʊʊr go, “Simon, Jɔɔn bie, fʊ nʊ̃ man sɩrɛ jaa?” Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Ɔ̃ɔ, n Soro, fʊ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩn nʊ̃ fʊ.” Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Bɔ̃ɔ kaara ma a piir.”

Yesu lɛ sʊʊr wʊn gbɛɛ ata, “Simon Jɔɔn bie, fʊ nʊ̃ ma naa?” Ka a Pita pʊɔ sɔ̃ɔ bojũu gbɛɛ ata nɩ nyã a Yesu na sʊʊr wʊ, ɩka wʊ, “Nʊ̃ wʊ naa?” Tɩ 'yɛr, “N Soro fʊ bɔ̃ɔn yele a jaa, fʊ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩn nʊ̃ fʊ.” A Yesu 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Kʊrɔ ma a piir bʊ̃diir.

Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ fʊ, a fʊ pɔlbile daar fʊ mãɛ ma sun fʊ fuusɩ na fʊ chiin jie 'lɔ jaa fʊn bʊɔrɔ. Tɩchɛ fʊ̃ʊ wa kor baar, fʊ ma jãn a nuur ka nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ su fʊ a fuu tɩ tɔɔ fʊ chiin a jie 'lɔ fʊn ba bʊɔrɔ ɛ.”
Yesu 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ na wʊ wiil a kũu 'lɔ tɔ Pita na wa kpi 'yɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn yuor tɩɩr. Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʊ a Pita, “Turo ma.”
Pita lɩɛb nyɛ a poturo 'lɔ a Yesu na nʊ̃ ka wʊ turo ba. A poturo nyã lɛ dɔ̃ɔ dɩɛl a Yesu lɛ ban dire a di baaraa, na dɔ̃ɔ sʊʊr a Yesu, “N Soro, an lɛ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ fʊ?”
Pita na nyɛ wʊn turo ba, ka wʊ sʊʊr, “N Soro, tɩ nyã mɩ?”
A Yesu 'yɛr, “Maa nʊ̃ ɩka wʊ be be tɩ tãn ɩn na lɩɛb wa, a ɩ bo a fʊ sʊrɔ? Fʊ̃ʊ turo ma.”
A anyãna jũu lɛ a poturbo 'yɛr yʊɔrɔ nɩ ɩka a poturo 'lɔ kʊ̃ kpi ɛ. Tɩchɛ Yesu ba 'yɛr ɩka wʊ kʊ̃ kpi ɛ, wʊ 'yɛr ɩka, “Maa nʊ̃ ɩka wʊ be be tɩ tãn ɩn na lɩɛb wa, a ɩ bo a fʊ sʊrɔ?”
A poturo nyãna lɛ di a anyãna dãasɩɛ na wʊ sɛb bin, ka sɩ bɔ̃ɔn a wʊ dãasɩɛ na ɩ yelmãɛ.
Yesu tʊ̃n tʊ̃yɔɔ mɩ, ala ɩ a jaa ta sɛb bʊ̃'yen 'yen, a wɛr wʊ jaa kʊ̃ naa tara jie bin a ala na sɛb ɛ.
Teofilusɩ a n gãn dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ pɔ, n sɛb a ala a jaa a Yesu na dɔ̃ɔ piel maal tɩ na wʊ wiil a nɩbɛ.
Yesu tu naa a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pɔ na wʊ wiil a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ bala wʊn ir lɛ ban na ɩrɛ tɩ a Nãaŋmɩn de wʊ don a saaju.
A wʊ dɔɔyɛ difʊ puor, wʊ wiil wʊ mãɛ kʊ a nɩbɛ banyãna, ka a chaar ba nie ɩka wʊ ir naa na wʊ ɩ vʊr. A ber lɩjaayi daar lɛ wʊ wa dũu ba, na wʊ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr.
Wʊn wa lɔ̃ɔn ba ka ba 'mataa dire, ka wʊ kpãkpãan ba nɩ a 'yɛr bir nyã, “Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa yire a Jerusalɛm ɛ, yɩ chɛlɛ a kʊfʊ 'lɔ a n Sãa na põl ka n 'yɛr kʊ yɩ.
Jɔɔn 'lɔ, kʊ̃ɔ lɛ wʊ de son a nɩbɛ, tɩchɛ yɩn 'lɔ, a kʊ̃ lɛ kor ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn na so yɩ naa nɩ a wʊ Sɩɛ.”
Ba lɛ wa lɔ̃ɔn naa a Yesu go, na ba sʊʊr wʊ, “Sɩ Soro, a sɔ̃ɔ nyãna pɔ lɛ fʊn lɩɛb a Isɩral nãalʊ̃ʊ kʊ ba bɩɩ?”
A wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A ba ɩ yɩ 'yɛr ɛ, ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a sɔ̃ɔ bɩɩ a bɩbir a Sãa na bin a wʊ kpɛ̃ɔ pɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩn nyɛn kpɛ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa wa a yɩ sɛ̃, ka yɩ ɩ a n dãasɩɛ dẽme, a Jerusalɛm, nɩ a Judiya paal wʊ jaa, nɩ a Samariya paal tɩ tãn a wɛr tɛɛfʊ jie.”
A anyãna lɛ wʊ 'yɛr baar tɩ duoro a saaju a lɛ nɛ a ba nɩbiru ka a julõjuur tɩ pɔɔ wʊ.
Ka ba chɛnɛ dʊl kaara a saaju a lɛ nɛ wʊn duoro, be lɛ a dɔɔr ayi na su fuu pɩɛl wa dũu ba a lɛ nɛ ara a ba sɛ̃.
Na ba sʊʊr ba, “Galilee dɔɔr, bãa lɛ so a yɩ kaara a saaju a lɛ mɔ̃? A Yesu nyãna nɩ wʊ ju yɩn nyɛ na duoro a saaju, na lɩɛb a lɛ nɛ nɩ wʊ ju wa, nɩtãa a lɛ nɛ yɩn nyɛ wʊn duoro a saaju.”
A ba yi a tɔ̃ɔ ban bʊɔlɔ a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ lɩɛb kul a Jerusalɛm na ba jãan a tẽe ɛ, a fʊn tʊ̃ɔ chen a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar.

Ban wa ta, ba don a bɔɔpɩɛ pɔ, be lɛ ba dɔ̃ɔ lɔ̃ɔ taa. Ka a bala na dɔ̃ɔ be be lɛ Pita, Jɔɔn, Jemesɩ nɩ Andiru. Filip, Tomasɩ, Batolomi nɩ Matiu nɩ Alfayasɩ bidaba Jemesɩ nɩ Simon na mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a wʊ wɛr yele, nɩ a Jemesɩ bidaba Judas.
A banyãna ba jaa lɛ lɔ̃ɔ taa nɩ nɛbʊ̃'yen sʊɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn, ka a pɔbɔ bamɩne pʊɔ ba ka a Yesu yɛɛr nɩ a wʊ ma Mɛɛr mɩ be be.
Bɩbir ãsʊɔ lɛ a wʊ poturbo wa lɔ̃ɔ taa na ba ɩ nɩbɛ kɔbaa dɔɔl lɩjɛr. Ka Pita ir ara a ba pɔ
tɩ 'yɛr, “Yɛɛr, a sɛɛ naa ka sɩn maal a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na dɔ̃ɔ tu a Nãa David nɛɛ pɔ, a wʊ 'yɛr na wʊ sɛb bin a kõr jaa nɩtãa lɛ a Judas nyã na dɔ̃ɔ de a nɩbɛ nie a ba wa nyɔɔ a Yesu.
Wʊ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a sɩ ãsʊɔ na wʊ pʊɔ sɩ a tʊ̃mɔ̃ nyã pɔ.”
Judas putuyar wʊn nyɛ lɛ ɩka wʊ dãn wɛr, be lɛ wʊ chʊr ju pur ka a nyaba a jaa yi.
Nɩrɛ jaa na be ka a Jerusalɛm lɛ wõ a 'yɛr nyã na ba bʊɔlɔ a jie a ba kɔkɔr pɔ ɩka, Akeldama. A par lɛ, Jãɩ Wɛr.
Ka a Pita 'yɛr, “Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Nãa David sɛb a wʊ yiel gãn pɔ, ‘A wʊ jie wʊ lɩɛb dãlpʊɔ, ka a nɩrɛ jaa taa kpɩɛrɛ be ɛ,’
“A lɛ jũu, nɩyuo lɛ sɩn ir ka a nɩnyɩnɛ ɩ a 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ pʊɔ sɩ 'mataa yʊɔrɔ nɩ a Yesu.
Piel a Jɔɔn Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ sofʊ sɔ̃ɔ wa tãn a sɔ̃ɔ nyã a Yesu na yi a sɩ sɛ̃ do a saaju. A nɩrɛ 'lɔ lɛ na pʊɔ sɩ dire a wʊ kũu pɔ irfʊ dãasɩɛ.”
Be lɛ ba tɩɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩbɛ ayi. Josefʊ ban bʊɔlɔ Basabasɩ na ba lɛ bʊɔlɔ wʊ Jusɩtusɩ nɩ Matɩyasɩ.
Na ba pãa sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ, “Sɩ Soro, fʊ̃ʊ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ jaa pʊtɩɛr, wiil sɩ a nɩbɛ ayi banyãna ãsʊɔ fʊn na ir.
Ka wʊn de a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ tʊ̃mɔ̃ jie a Judas na bar, tɩ chen a jie wʊn pʊɔ.”
A ba pãa gba gbãm ka a gbãbie tɩ ir Matɩyasɩ a wʊ pʊɔ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ pie nɩ bʊ̃'yen pɔ.
A Pentikosɩ na wa ta, ba jaa ben a jibʊ̃'yen.
Ajienaa lɛ ka a damfʊ na kaara fɩka sɛsɛkpɛ̃ɛ na furo yi a saaju wa sɛɛ a die 'lɔ pɔ ban jãnɛ.
Be lɛ ba nyɛ bũu 'lɩraa na ŋmara jaa pʊrpʊr dɔɔlɔ ãsʊɔ jaa bʊ̃'yen 'yenɩ.
Ka ba jaa sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na ba piel 'yɛrɛ kɔkɔyor lɛ a Sɩɛ na kʊ ba.
A Juu nɩbɛ na joro a Nãaŋmɩn dãbãɛ na ba yi a tẽn tẽn wa kpɩɛrɛ a be a Jerusalɛm.
Ban wa wõ a gɔ̃mɔ̃ nyã, a nɩyɔɔ ba nyãna ba jaa wa lɔ̃ɔn taa na ba ɩ chĩcham, bojũu ãsʊɔ ma wõn ban 'yɛrɛ a wʊ kɔkɔr.
Ka a ɩ yel dũu naa, na a 'maa ba jaa nɛɛ ka ba sʊrɔ taa, “A ba ɩ Galilee dẽme lɛ a banyãna na 'yɛrɛ ɛ?
Tɩ ŋmɩnɛ a ɩ ka a sɩ ãsʊɔ jaa wõnõ ban 'yɛrɛ nɩ a sɩ kɔkɔɛ?
Parti dẽme, Mede dẽme, nɩ a Elam dẽme. Bamɩne mɩ yin Mesopotamiya, Judiya, Kapadosiya nɩ Pontus nɩ Asɩya.
Ka bamɩne mɩ yi Fɩrgɩya, nɩ Pamfiliya, nɩ Ijipitɩ, nɩ a Libiya dẽme na gbʊr a Sirenɩ wɛr nɩ a sãanba na yi a Worom,
a Juu nɩbɛ mãɛ nɩ a bala na lɩɛb a Juu nɩbɛ, bamɩne yin Kɩrete nɩ a Arabɩya dẽme. Sɩ wõn ban de a sɩ mãɛ kɔkɔr 'yɛrɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn tʊ̃bɛrɛ wʊn tʊ̃.”
Ka a anyãna sɔb ba nɩbir ka ba nɛɛr 'maa a ba sʊrɔ taa, “A anyãna par nɩ bo?”
Tɩchɛ ka a bamɩne kpɛrɛ 'yɛrɛ, “Dãa lɛ maal ba a lɛ nɛ.”
Ka a Pita nɩ a Pie Nɩ Bʊ̃'yen pãa ir ara ka wʊ 'yɛr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa kʊ a nɩbɛ, “Juu nɩbɛ nɩ nɩrɛ jaa na kpɩɛrɛ ka a Jerusalɛm, yɩ vɛ̃ ka n wiil yɩ a par. Yɩ chɛlɛ a lɛ ɩn na 'yɛr.
A nɩbɛ banyãna ba nyũ dãa ɛ, nɩtãa a lɛ yɩn tɩɛr ɛ, a chɛnɛ na ɩ bibi'maar.
Nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Joɛl dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr,

‘Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ɩka a ber baaraa daar, wʊn kpaaraa a wʊ Sɩɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɩbɛ ba jaa. Ka a yɩ dabil nɩ a pɔɔbil 'yɛrɛ a 'yɛrsɩ ala a Nãaŋmɩn na kʊ ba, ka a yɩ dabil nyɛrɛ nyɛfʊsɩ, ka a yɩ danyɔ̃n mɩ jãna jãnsɩ.
A bala gba na ɩ a n gbãgbadɔɔr nɩ a pɔbɔ, ba jaa pɔ lɛ ɩn kpaar a n Sɩɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba a ber ala pɔ, ka ba 'yɛrɛ a n 'yɛr.
Ɩn wiil ban yelfɛrsɩ na yi saaju ka a jãnsɩ mɩ be ka a tẽe, jãɩ, bũu nɩ jʊʊr na den jie wʊ jaa.
Ka a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ lɩɛb lĩi ka a ŋmɛra mɩ lɩɛb jãɩ kaar tɩchɛ ka a sɩ Soro bɩbir 'lɔn na chaar pãa wa.
Be lɛ nɩrɛ jaa na pãa bʊɔlɔ a sɩ Soro yuor na nyɛn faafʊ.’
“Isɩral nɩbɛ yɩ chɛlɛ ka, A Yesu nyã na yi a Najaretɩ 'lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn ir kʊ yɩ, na wʊ de wʊ tʊ̃n a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃, nɩ tʊ̃fɛrsɩ, nɩ jãnsɩ tʊ̃mɔ̃ a yɩ pɔ, ka yɩ mãɛ bɔ̃ɔn.
Ba nyɔɔn a daba nyãna 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩ nuur pɔ nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ tu a wʊ bɔfʊ nɩ a wʊ bɔ̃ɔfʊ pɔ, de nie 'yɛr bin, ka a putudẽme sʊ̃ʊ yɩ ka yɩ kpa wʊ a daa ju a wʊ kpi.
Tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn sãɩ wʊ a kũu pɔ, na wʊ faa wʊ a kũu wõm pɔ, bojũu a kũu ba tara kpɛ̃ɔ na nyɔɔ wʊ taa lɛ ɛ.
“A Nãa David dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a wʊ 'yɛr, ‘Bɩbir jaa lɛ n nyɛrɛ a n Soro, bojũu wʊ ben a n nũsʊ̃ɔ jie, n kʊ̃ wa lɔɔ gbɛr ɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka n pʊɔ pɛl ka n jãlbir chɩlɛ, ka a n ãgãn mɩ tara tɩɛr tɔfʊ jie.
Bojũu fʊ kʊ̃ wa bar ma be a yaa pɔ ɛ, bɩɩ ka fʊ bar a fʊ Chɛchɛ Sʊɔ 'lɔ ka wʊ pʊ̃ɔ ɛ.
Fʊ wiil man a nyɛvʊr sɔr, fʊn vɛ̃n ka nʊ̃ɔ kpɛ ma a fʊ niem.’
“N yɛɛr, n 'yɛr chãa pɔ kʊ yɩ ɩka a sɩ sãakpã David kpi naa a ba ũu, a wʊ yaa lɛ anyãna na be ka dɩna.
Tɩchɛ wʊ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr nɛɛ kʊ wʊ ɩka, wʊn vɛ̃ naa ka 'lɔ David yɔ̃ɔ jãnɛ a wʊ nãa dakɔɔ ju.
David den nie nyɛ a lɛ na be a wʊ niem, ala lɛ so ka wʊ 'yɛr a Kɩrɩsɩto kũu pɔ irfʊ 'yɛr, na wʊ 'yɛr ɩka wʊ kʊ̃ gã be a yaa pɔ ɛ, bɩɩ ka a wʊ ãgãn pʊ̃ɔ ɛ.
“Nãaŋmɩn sãɩ naa a Yesu nyãna ka wʊ ir ɩ vʊr, sɩn lɛ ɩ a anyãna a jaa dãasɩɛ dẽme.
'Lɔ lɛ wʊ 'mɔɔ don bin a wʊ nũsʊ̃ɔ jie, ka a Sãa kʊ a Yesu a wʊ Sɩɛ 'lɔ wʊn tɩr a nɛɛ kʊ wʊ. A Sɩɛ nyã lɛ wʊ kpaar 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ ka yɩ nyɛ tɩ be wõnõ.
David ba dɔ̃ɔ do a saaju ɛ, tɩ wʊ 'yɛr naa, ‘A Soro 'yɛr kʊ a n Soro, “Jãnɛ a n nũsʊ̃ɔ jie,
ka n wa de a fʊ dɔ̃dẽme ka ba ɩ a fʊ gbɛɛ dɔɔlfʊ jie.” ’
“A lɛ jũu, vɛ̃ ka a Isɩral nɩbɛ ba jaa bɔ̃ɔ sɩrɛ jaa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn maal naa Yesu nyã yɩn kpa a daa ju ka wʊ ɩ a sɩ Soro nɩ a Nɩ-iraa.”
A nɩbɛ na wõ a nɩtɔ̃, ka a ŋmara ba a nyãn, ka ba sʊʊr a Pita nɩ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ, “N yɛɛr, ŋmɩnɛ sɩn ɩ?”
Ka a Pita 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr, ka ba de a Yesu yuor son yɩ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, ka a yɩ yelbier baar. Ka a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ yɩ a wʊ Sɩɛ.
Yɩn nɩ a yɩ bibiir lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩr a wʊ nɛɛ kʊ, yɩn nɩ a bala ba jaa na be a tɛɛr, nɩ a bala ba jaa a sɩ Soro Nãaŋmɩn na wa bʊɔl.”
Pita den 'yɛr yɔɔ kpãan ba, na wʊ kpãkpãan ba 'yɛrɛ, “Yɩ faa yɩ mãɛ yin a dɩna nɩfɩlefɩlesɩ pɔ.”
Ka a bala na sɔɔ de a wʊ 'yɛr, ba so naa a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, ka nɩbɛ tur ata (3,000) pʊɔ ba a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.
Ba den ba mãɛ kʊ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ wiilfʊ, na ba tara nɛbʊ̃'yen lɔ̃ɔ dire, na ba lɔ̃ɔ puoro a Nãaŋmɩn.
Dãbãɛ kpɛ̃n nɩrɛ jaa a lɛ ban nyɛ ka a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ tʊ̃ a tʊ̃fɛrsɩ nɩ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃.
A bala na sɔɔ de, ba jaa lɔ̃ɔn taa jibʊ̃'yen na ba sʊ̃nɔ̃ taa.
Na ba daara a ba bʊ̃tarsɩ na ba ma põ ir kʊ taa lɛ jaa ãsʊɔ na bʊɔrɔ.
Bɩbir jaa lɛ ba ma lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ, na ba yʊɔrɔ taa yie ŋmara a paanʊ̃ɔ dire nɩ pʊpɛl nɩ pʊtɩɛr bʊ̃'yen.
Ba pɛɛrɛ naa Nãaŋmɩn ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa mɩ ara a ba puor. A sɩ Soro ma vɛ̃ naa ka a bala na nyɛ faafʊ, pʊɔ ba bɩbir jaa.
Bɩbir ãsʊɔ Pita nɩ Jɔɔn duoro naa a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir kpɛ̃ɛ pɔ, a puorfʊ jie mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na gɔr.

Ka a daba ban lɔ̃ɔ dɔɔn a wʊ gbɛr, a ba ma tuo wʊ tɩ bin a be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ 'lɔ ban bʊɔlɔ, Vɩla. Be lɛ ba ma tuo wʊ tɩ bin bɩbir jaa a wʊ ma sʊɔrɔ a bala na kpɩɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn yir bɛchaar pɔ libie.
Wʊn wa nyɛ a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn na kpɩɛrɛ, a wʊ sʊɔrɔ ba a libir.
Ka a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn kaara wʊ a lɛ a tãɩɩ, ka a Pita wa 'yɛr, “Kaara sɩ.”
Ka a daba tɔ̃ɔ fur a nɩbir a lɛ chir chir chir 'yɔ̃ɔ ba tɩɛrɛ ɩka wʊn nyɛn bon.
A Pita pãa 'yɛr, “N ba tara libir bɩɩ, sɛlma kʊrɔ fʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ ɩn tara lɛ ɩn kʊ fʊ. Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na yi a Najaretɩ yuor pɔ, ir chiine.”
Tɩ na wʊ nyɔɔ a daba nũsʊ̃ɔ sʊ̃ʊ wʊ ka wʊ ir ka a ɩ a gbɛpɛlɛ nɩ a nakɔɔtɩɛ kpɛ̃mɛ naa.
Ka a daba ɔɔ chʊr a gbɛɛ na wʊ piel chiine, na wʊ pãa tu ba kpɛ̃n be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ. Be lɛ wʊ tɩ ɔɔrɔ yʊɔrɔ na wʊ pɛɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn.
A nɩbɛ ba jaa na wa nyɛ wʊ, a lɛ wʊn chiine pɛɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn,
ba bɔ̃ɔ wʊ naa an ɩ 'lɔ lɛ ma jãnɛ sʊɔrɔ libie be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir dɔ̃dɔr 'lɔ ban bʊɔlɔ a, Vɩla. Ka a ɩ ba chĩcham naa 'maa ba nɛɛ a lɛ na ɩ.
An ɩ a daba chɛnɛ na pɔɔ a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn ka a nɩbɛ nɛɛr 'maa a ba jo wa titaa a be ban bʊɔlɔ a Solomon Bɛchaar pɔ.

Pita na nyɛ a lɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ, “Isɩral dɔɔr woɩ, bãa lɛ so ka a nɛɛr 'maa yɩ a lɛ mɔ̃? Bãa lɛ yɩ fur a nɩbir 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ fɩka sɩn mãɛ kpɛ̃ɔ bɩɩ sɩn mãɛ maal vɩla lɛ sɩ maal a daba nyã ka wʊ chiine?

A Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ɩ a Abraham, Isaakɩ nɩ a Jekɔb Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne Nãaŋmɩn lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ Yesu yuor. Yɩn lɛ nyɔɔ wʊ tɩr ɩka ba kʊ wʊ, ka a Pilate ŋme nyãa na bar wʊ tɩ yɩ 'yɛr ɩka yaa bɔ̃ɔ wʊ ɛ.
