Yɩ 'yɛr naa ɩka yaa bɔ̃ɔ a chɛchɛ sʊɔ nɩ a yelmãɛ sʊɔ ɛ, tɩ na yɩ sʊɔr ka ba yuo a nɩkʊrɔ kʊ yɩ.
Yɩn lɛ kʊ a nyɛvʊr sʊɔ, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn sãɩ wʊ a kũu pɔ. Sɩn lɛ nyɛ anyãna nɩ nɩbir.
A daba nyãna nɩ a sɩn na 'mataa sɔɔ a Yesu lɛ sa a daba nyãna baal yɩn nyɛ na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ, sɩrɛ jaa sɩn sɔɔ de a Yesu yuor lɛ wʊ sa, a daba nyãna yɩn ben nyɛ.
“Pʊ̃pãanyã, yɛɛr, n bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka ba bɔ̃ɔ fʊ lɛ vɛ̃ ka yɩ tʊ̃ a lɛ nɛ a yɩ nɩbɛrɛ na dɔ̃ɔ tʊ̃.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn ɩ naa a lɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka a wʊ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ 'yɛr ɩka, a wʊ Nɩ-iraa na din dɔɔyɛ.
Yɩ pãa lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr, na yɩ lɩɛb wa a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, ka wʊ fɩɛl a yɩ yeldɛbɛ bar. A ãkpɛ̃ɔ paalaa yɩn na nyɛ na yin a sɩ Soro sɛ̃,
ka wʊ gba na tʊ̃ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'lɔ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ ir bin kʊ yɩ.
Wʊn chɛnɛ na jãnɛ be a saaju, tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ Nãaŋmɩn na 'mataa a bonsɩ a jaa nɩtãa lɛ wʊn tɩr a nɛɛ a kõr jaa tu, a wʊ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ chɛchɛsɩ sɛ̃.
Bojũu Mosesɩ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, ‘A Soro Nãaŋmɩn na ir 'yɛ'yɛrɛ a n kaar ka wʊ ɩ a yɩ mãɛ nɩrɛ, a yɩ chɛlɛ a ala a jaa wʊn na 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ.
Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa ba wa chɛlɛ a lɛ wʊn na 'yɛrɛ ɛ, ban ir wʊ nũu bar a wʊ nɩbɛ pɔ.’
“Sɩrɛ jaa, a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ba jaa na yi a Samuwɛl sɔ̃ɔ mɩ 'yɛr naa a bɩbie anyãna 'yɛr.
Yɩn lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ banyãna bibiir nɩ a nɛtɩraa 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na tara nɩ a sɩ sãamɩne. Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a Abraham, ‘An tu naa a fʊ yɔn pɔ, ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa na be ka a tẽe na nyɛ sʊ̃ʊfʊ.’
Nãaŋmɩn na wa ir a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃, yɩn sɛ̃ lɛ wʊ de nie tʊ̃ wʊ ka wʊ tɩ sʊ̃ʊ yɩ na wʊ lɩɛb a yɩ ãsʊɔ jaa yin a wʊ putusɔr pɔ.”
A lɛ a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn na chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlorbo nɩ a puorfʊ yir nɩdiere 'matãan a Saduseemɩne wan a ba sɛ̃.
Ba wa nyɛn suur, bojũu ba wile naa a nɩbɛ ɩka Yesu jũu nɩrɛ jaa na ir naa kũu pɔ.
Be lɛ ba nyɔɔ a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn na ba 'yɔ̃ɔ ba pɔɔfʊ die pɔ bar ka wɛr na chaar, bojũu mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ mʊr baar.
Tɩchɛ a bala na wõ a lɛ a Pita na 'yɛr a Yesu 'yɛr na ba sɔɔ de na ɩn dɔɔr tur anũu (5,000).
A wɛr na wa chaar, a ba nɩdierbe nɩ a ba nɩbɛrɛ 'matãan a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe lɔ̃ɔn taa be a Jerusalɛm.
Ka Anasɩ na ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ Kayafasɩ, Jɔɔn nɩ Aleksanda 'matãan a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩbɛ bamɩne.
A ba tɩ yuo a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn waan a ba wa sʊrɔ ba, “Kpɛ̃ɔ buor nɩ yobuor lɛ yɩ de tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyãna?”
Ka a Pita na sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A yɩn nɩdierbe nɩ a yɩn nɩbɛrɛ,
ala ɩ yɩ ben bʊɔl sɩ dɩna ɩka sɩ wa man a maal vɩla nyã na vɛ̃ ka a gbɛrɛ sa.

Yɩ pãa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka yaa, a yɩn nɩ nɩrɛ jaa na be a Isɩral, ɩka a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nyã na yi a Najaretɩ yuor pɔ, a 'lɔ yɩn kʊ a daa ju, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn sãɩ wʊ a kũu pɔ, ka wʊ ɩ vʊr, lɛ sa a daba nyãna na ben ara a kana.
Wʊ ɩ naa ‘A kʊsɩr 'lɔ a yɩn mɩmɩɛrbɛ na tɔr bar, 'lɔ lɛ wa ɩ a kʊsɩr ju.’
Fafaara jaa ba lɛ be be ɛ, bojũu yuor jaa ba lɛ be ka a tẽe pɔ, na tʊ̃ɔ nɩrɛ faa ɛ.”
Ban nyɛ a lɛ a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn na ba joro dãbãɛ ɛ, tɩ mɩ bɔ̃ɔn ban ba jãn gãn chen tɛɛr ɛ, ka nɛ'maa ba. Ka ba tɩɛrtɔ ban dɔ̃ɔ be a Yesu sɛ̃.
Tɩchɛ ba mɩ nyɛn a daba 'lɔ na sa 'mataa ara nɩ ba, baa lɛ tara 'yɛr na 'yɛr ɛ.
Lɛ lɛ ba 'yɛr ba a ba yi chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ, tɩ ba pãa guoro taa 'yɛrɛ,
“Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ sɩn ɩ a nɩbɛ banyãna? Nɩrɛ jaa na be ka a Jerusalɛm bɔ̃ɔn naa a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ ban tʊ̃ a sɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ chiir ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ sɩn pɔɔ naa a yele nyãna sɔr ka nɩrɛ kʊ̃ lɛ wõ naa ɛ, yɩ ɩ a sɩ fuu ba ka ba taa ɩrɛ wa pʊrɔ a yuor nyãna kʊrɔ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ.”
Be lɛ ba bʊɔl ba a ba kpɛ ka ba kpãkpãan ba ɩka, ba taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ bɩɩ wile nɩ a Yesu yuor go ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩn mãɛ yɩ pɛ kaa, a sɛɛn Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ka sɩn tu a yɩ nɛɛ gar a Nãaŋmɩn bɩɩ?
Bojũu sɩn 'lɔ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ bar a 'yɛr sɩn nyɛn nɩbir tɩ wõ 'yɛrfʊ ɛ.”
Lɛ lɛ ba vuur ba tɩ bar ba a ba chen. Baa bɔ̃ɔ kpãa buor lɛ ban kpãa ba ɛ, bojũu a nɩbɛ ba jaa pɛɛrɛ naa Nãaŋmɩn a lɛ na ɩ.
Bojũu a daba nyãna na sa a nɛ'maa safʊ nyãna kor gar yuomo lɩjaayi (40).
Ban wa bar a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn, ba chen a ba taaba sɛ̃ tɩ man ala a jaa a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ na 'yɛr kʊ ba.
A ba taaba na wõ a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃, ba jaa 'mantaa nɩ nɛbʊ̃'yen puor Nãaŋmɩn na ba 'yɛrɛ, “Tʊ̃ɔnɔ̃ Sʊɔ, fʊ̃ʊ lɛ maal a saaju nɩ a tẽe nɩ a man kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ bon jaa na be a pɔ.
Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka a fʊ Sɩɛ haa a fʊ gbãgbaa na ɩ a sɩ sãa David nɛɛ ka wʊ 'yɛr, ‘Bo lɛ so ka a paalsɩ nyɛ suur, ka a nɩbɛ ŋmara a dɔɔl pɔrsɩ?
A wɛr nãmɩne tʊɔrɔ naa gbɛchile, ka a nɩbɛrɛ mɩ lɔ̃ɔ taa jɛɛrɛ nɩ a Soro nɩ a fʊ Nɩ-iraa.’
Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ a Hɛrɔd nɩ a Pontius Pilate lɔ̃ɔ taa nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ a tẽe nyãna pɔ, na ba jɛb a fʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃chɛchɛ Yesu, a 'lɔ fʊn ir.
Ba maal naa a lɛ fʊn kaa ir na ɩ a fʊ pʊtɩɛr, nɩ a fʊ kpɛ̃ɔ, nɩ a fʊ bɔfʊ fʊn dɔ̃ɔ de nie chɔɔr tɩ a wa ɩ.
“Pʊ̃pãanyã sɩ Soro, kaa lɛ ban fuu sɩ, tɩ na fʊ sʊ̃ʊ a fʊ gbãgbaar a sɩ mʊɔl a fʊ 'yɛr nɩ 'lafʊ.
Tur a fʊ nũu sãan baalsɩ, na fʊ tʊ̃ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ nɩ a fʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃chɛchɛ Yesu yuor.”
Ban wa puor baar, a jie 'lɔ ban lɔ̃ɔ taa damaa. Ka ba jaa sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, na ba 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nɩ 'lafʊ.
Ka a bala na sɔɔ de, ba jaa tara na tɩɛr bʊ̃'yen nɩ nyãbʊ̃'yen. Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa maa 'yɛr ɩka a wʊ bonsɩ ɩ naa a 'lɔ tɛɛ bon ɛ, ba ma põn bon jaa ban tara.
A nɩtʊ̃nsɩ den kpɛ̃ɔ mana nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu kũu pɔ irfʊ 'yɛr, ka a Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ be a ba jaa sɛ̃.
Ba ãsʊɔ jaa ba dɔ̃ɔ faa bon ɛ, sɔ̃ɔ jaa lɛ a bala na tara por nɩ yie ma da na ba ma waan a libie,
wa bin a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ sɛ̃, ka ba ma põ ir kʊ ãsʊɔ jaa lɛ an sɛɛn wʊ.
Josefʊ na yi Sipurusɩ na wʊ ɩ a Levi bal nɩrɛ, kaa a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ bʊɔlɔ wʊ Banabasɩ. A par lɛ nɩrɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ãkpãɛn.
Wʊ dãn a wʊ puo, na wʊ de a libie waan wa bin a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ sɛ̃.
Ka a daba ãsʊɔ na be be di Ananias ka a wʊ pɔɔ mɩ di Safira. Ba mɩ den a ba pobile da.
Wʊ ir naa libie amɩne bin ka a pɔɔ bɔ̃ɔn, tɩchɛ na wʊ chiin a ŋmaa tɩ bin a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ sɛ̃.
Ka a Pita sʊʊr a Ananias, “Bo lɛ so ka a Satan sɛɛ fʊ a nyãa a fʊ ŋmaa jir kara yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, na fʊ ir a libie amɩne a lɛ fʊn da a puo bin?
A ba ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ so na fʊ de da ɛ? Fʊn wa da baar a ba ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ so a libie ɛ? Bo lɛ ɩ a fʊ tɩɛr a fʊ maal a nɩtɔ̃? Nɩrɛ ba lɛ fʊ ŋmaa a jir nyã 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ.”
Ananias na wõ a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ na wʊ lo kpi a jie. Ka a dãbãɛ kpɛ a bala jaa na wõ naa.
Ka a pɔlbil ir a ba pɔ 'mɔɔ a kũu lũ tuo yin tɩ ũu.
An wa kor bãlãa ka a wʊ pɔɔ mɩ wa bʊ̃n dɔɔl ba bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ na ɩ ɛ,
ka a Pita sʊʊr a pɔɔ, “A libie a jaa lɛ a anyãna a fʊ̃ʊ nɩ a Ananias na da a puo nyɛ ɔ? 'Yɛr kʊ ma.” A wʊ 'yɛr, “Ɔ̃ɔ, lɛ lɛ.”
A Pita 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a ɩ a yɩ guor taa ɩka yɩ bɛɛr a sɩ Soro Sɩɛ kaa? Nyɛ a nɩbɛ bala a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ bala lɛ tuo a fʊ sɩrɛ yin tɩ ũu, ba mɩn tuo fʊn yin.”
Ajienaa ka a ɩ wʊ mɩ lon kpi be a Pita niem. A pɔlbil bala na ben wa kpɛ nyɛ ka a ɩ wʊ kpi naa, ka ba tuo wʊ yin tɩ ũu lan a sɩrɛ.
Ka a dãbãɛ kpɛ a pupuorbiir ba jaa nɩ nɩrɛ jaa na wõ naa.
A nɩtʊ̃nsɩ tʊ̃n nɛ'maa tʊ̃ yɔɔ a nɩbɛ sɔ̃ɔ. Ka a bala na sɔɔ de, ba jaa tara na nɛbʊ̃'yen ma lɔ̃ɔ taa a be a Solomon Bɛchaar pɔ.
Nɩrɛ jaa kpire ba naa, tɩ ãsʊɔ jaa maa 'la lɔ̃ɔn ba ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩyɔɔ jaa chɛnɛ na waara, ka dɔɔr nɩ pɔbɔ na sɔɔ de a sɩ Soro pʊɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.
A lɛ vɛ̃ naa ka a nɩbɛ yin a ba baalsɩ tɩ gaal ba a gador ju nɩ a sɔ̃n pɔ a sɔr kõkoor chɛlɛ nɩ a Pita, ɩka 'lɔ wa tala a wʊ gãagiel wʊ pɔɔ ba.
Nɩyɔɔ yin a tẽbil ala na jilʊ̃ a Jerusalɛm waan a ba baalsɩ wa lɔ̃ɔn 'matãan a bala a sɩdɛbɛ na tara, ka ba jaa sa.
Ka a nyuur kpɛ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a wʊ taaba bala na pʊɔ a Saduseemɩne gbul pɔ.
A ba nyɔɔr a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ pɔɔfʊ die pɔ bar.
Tɩchɛ a tãsɔɔ a sɩ Soro tʊ̃ naa a wʊ malaka ka wʊ wa yuo a pɔɔfʊ die pãn na wʊ tɔɔ ba yin
tɩ 'yɛr, “Yɩ chen a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ na yɩ tɩ 'yɛr a nyɛvʊr paalaa nyã 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ.”

A wɛr na wa chaar ba kpɛ̃n be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ, nɩtãa lɛ a malaka na 'yɛr ba tɩ piel wile a nɩbɛ. A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a wʊ taaba mɩ wa lɔ̃ɔn taa na ba bʊɔl a Juu nɩbɛ nɩdierbe ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa na ba na guor a 'yɛr, na ba pãa tʊ̃ ɩka ba chen a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ tɩ yuo a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ waan.
Tɩchɛ ban wa tɩ ta a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ baa nyɛ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ. A ba lɩɛb chen tɩ mana kʊrɔ ba,
“Sɩ chen tɩ nyɛ a pɔɔfʊ die dɔ̃dɔr na chɛnɛ kpal, ka a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ara gu chɛnɛ ara a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ, tɩchɛ sɩn wa yuo a pãn nɩrɛ jaa ba be be a die pɔ ɛ.”
Ban wa wõ a anyãna ban man ka a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir guguro nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãmɩne ka a ɩ ba chĩcham, a ba baala baa bɔ̃ɔ lɛn na ɩ ɛ.
Ka a nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ wa 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ nyɛ a nɩbɛ bala yɩn nyɔɔr pɔɔ, ba ben be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ wile a nɩbɛ.”
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir guguro nɩkpɛ̃ɛ tara a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ chiin tɩ tara a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ jaa jom waan. Baa tɩ fɩr ba ɛ, bojũu ba joro na dãbãɛ ɩka a nɩbɛ na lɔb ban nɩ kʊsɩbɛ.
Ban wa waan ba, ba vɛ̃n ka ba ara a nɩbɛrɛ niem, ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na sʊʊr ba 'yɛr,

“Saa kpãkpãan yɩ jaa 'yɛr ɩka, yɩ taa lɛ ɩrɛ wa pʊrɔ a yuor nyãna wile nɩ nɩrɛ jaa go ɛ? Tɩchɛ a yɩ chɛnɛ tɔr tɩ sɛɛ a Jerusalɛm nɩ a yɩ wiilfʊ nyãna, na yɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka yɩ de a daba nyãna jãɩ yele dɔɔl sɩ.”
Ka a Pita nɩ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ bala na chɛ 'yɛr, “Sɩn tun Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ gar nɩsaal.
A sɩ sãakpãmɩne Nãaŋmɩn lɛ sãɩ a Yesu a kũu pɔ, a 'lɔ yɩn yɔɔl a daa ju ka wʊ kpi.
Nãaŋmɩn 'mɔɔ wʊn don bin be a wʊ nũsʊ̃ɔ jie, ka wʊ ɩ Nãa nɩ Fafaara ɩka wʊ kʊ a Isɩral nɩbɛ sɔr ka ba lɩɛb ba tɩɛr, na ba nyɛ vɛ̃ kʊfʊ.
Sɩn lɛ ɩ a anyãna dãasɩɛ dẽme nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'lɔ wʊn de kʊ a bala na tu a wʊ nɛɛ.”
Ban wa wõ a anyãna, ba suur ir naa ka ba bʊɔrɔ a ba kʊfʊ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Farasee ãsʊɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Gamaliel na ɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwile, nɩrɛ jaa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʊ naa, ka wʊ ir ara a nɩdierbe pɔ tɩ 'yɛr ɩka, ba vɛ̃ ka a dɔɔr bala yi yõo bãlãa.
Tɩ na wʊ pãa 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Isɩral dɔɔr, yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʊ̃ a lɛ yɩn bʊɔrɔ ɩka yɩ maal a nɩbɛ banyãna.
Sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Tiudasɩ dɔ̃ɔ ir 'yɛr gãdaa 'yɛr ɩka nɩkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ wʊ ɩ ka a dɔɔr kɔɔr anaar (400) ir turo wʊ. Ba kʊ wʊ naa ka a nɩbɛ bala yɛ̃yɛl ka a jaa ɩ pɔrɔ.
Ala puor lɛ ka a Judas na yi a Galilee a nɩbɛ sɔrfʊ yuon ir nɩyɔɔ ka ba turo wʊ. Ba mɩ kʊ wʊ naa ka a bala jaa na turo wʊ mɩ bũbur.
A lɛ jũu, maa na 'yɛr yɩ naa ɩka yɩ ir nũu, tɩchɛ a nɩbɛ ba nyã bar. Yɩ bar ba a ba chiine. Ala ɩ a lɛ ban maala ɩn nɩrɛ lɛ bin an ɩn pɔrɔ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ lɛ a yi, yaa be jaa na wa tʊ̃ɔ ŋmaa a nɩbɛ banyãna sɔr ɛ, yɩn wa bɔ̃ɔn naa ka a ɩ Nãaŋmɩn mãɛ lɛ yɩ jɛɛrɛ nɩ.”
A nɩbɛrɛ tu naa a lɛ a Gamaliel na 'yɛr, tɩ na ba bʊɔl a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ fɔb ba tɩ kpãkpãan ba ɩka ba taa lɛ ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr pʊrɔ nɩ a Yesu yuor go ɛ, tɩ bar ba a ba chen.
A nɩtʊ̃nsɩ na wa yi a nɩbɛrɛ banyãna niem, ba chɩlɛ naa, bojũu ba sɛɛn naa a dɔɔyɛ nɩ a vã difʊ a Yesu yuor jũu.
Bɩbir jaa lɛ ba ma be a be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ wile a nɩbɛ na ba mɩ yʊɔrɔ a yie ba gala ɛ, na ba wile a nɩbɛ tɩ 'yɛrɛ a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ ɩka a Yesu lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.

A ber ala pɔ, a poturbo na waara pʊɔrɔ a bala ban dɔɔ a paal yuo pɔ, ka baa tʊɔrɔ 'yɛrɛ a Juu kɔkɔr ɛ, hũhũnõ na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bala na ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ, bojũu a ba pɔɔkɔɛ maa nyɛ a bɩbir jaa bʊ̃diir ban ma põ ɛ.
Be lɛ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ pie nɩ ayi bʊɔl a poturbo ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa wa 'yɛr, “A ba tara sɔr ka sɩn bar a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr 'yɛrfʊ tɩ põnõ bʊ̃diir ɛ.
A lɛ jũu yɛɛr, yɩ kaa a yɩ pɔ na yɩ ir dɔɔr ayopõi, bala yɩn bɔ̃ɔ ka ba sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tɩ mɩ tara yɛ̃, ka sɩn de a tʊ̃mɔ̃ nyã kʊ ba.
Tɩchɛ a sɩn 'lɔ mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sʊɔrfʊ nɩ a wʊ 'yɛr.”

A 'yɛr nyã pɛl ba jaa na duo a be pʊɔ, ka ba ir a nɩbɛ banyãna. Sɩteven a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na sɛɛ ka wʊ mɩ tara sɔɔfʊ, nɩ Filip, nɩ Porokorusɩ, nɩ Nɩkanor, nɩ Tɩmon, nɩ Pamenasɩ, nɩ Nikolasɩ na yi Antiok na wʊ lɩɛb kpɛ a Juu nɩbɛ puorfʊ pɔ.
A nɩbɛ banyãna lɛ ba ir waan a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ sɛ̃, ka ba dɔɔl ba nuur sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn kʊ ba.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr yaar, ka a poturbo mɩ na be a Jerusalɛm pʊɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃. A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlorbo yɔɔ jie mɩ sɔɔn de a 'yɛr.
Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ ben a Sɩteven sɛ̃ ka wʊ tara kpɛ̃ɔ tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃yɔɔ a nɩbɛ sɛ̃.

A nɩbɛ bamɩne na yi a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie a ba bʊɔl ba, Mãɛ Sorbo, nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne na yi a Sirenɩ nɩ a Aleksandiriya, ka bamɩne mɩ yi a Sɩlɩsɩya nɩ Asɩya. A nɩbɛ banyãna lɛ piel a nɛchɩrɛ na ba chɩrɛ nɩ a Sɩteven.
Tɩchɛ baa tʊɔrɔ wʊ ɛ, a yɛ̃ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na kʊ wʊ a wʊ 'yɛrɛ nɩ.
A ba pãa sɔɔl tʊ̃ nɩbɛ bamɩne ka ba ŋmaa jir 'yɛr ɩka, “Sɩn lɛ wõ a Sɩteven na fere 'yɛrɛ 'yɛrdɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Mosesɩ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn.”
Tɩ tɔ a nɩbɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe 'yɔ̃ɔ ka ba nyɔɔ a Sɩteven chiin a ba 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ sɛ̃.
Be lɛ ba waan jir ŋmarba ka ba wa 'yɛr, “A daba nyãna ba gala 'yɛr dɛbɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir chɛchɛ nyãna ɛ, nɩ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wʊn bin ɛ.
Sɩn mãɛ lɛ wõ wʊn 'yɛr ɩka a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ na ŋmɛr a jie nyãna, tɩ na wʊ lɩɛb a binfʊ ala a Mosesɩ na dɔ̃ɔ bin kʊ sɩ.”
Ka a bala jaa na jãnɛ a be a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ jie, kãan a Sɩteven nie ka wʊ kaara fɩka a malaka nie.
Be lɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sʊʊr wʊ, “Sɩrɛ lɛ a anyãna ban 'yɛr bɩɩ?”
Ka a Sɩteven haa 'yɛr, “Yɛɛr nɩ sãamɩne, yɩ chɛlɛ. A Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr sʊɔ dɔ̃ɔ yi a sɩ sãa Abraham lɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ chɛnɛ be a Mesopotamiya wɛr pɔ sɛrɛ tɩ wa chen a Haran.
A Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, ‘Yi a fʊ tẽe na fʊ bar a fʊ nɩbɛ tɩ na fʊ chen wɛr yuo pɔ ɩn na wiil fʊ.’
“A wʊ yi a Chaldea wɛr pɔ na wʊ chen tɩ jãnɛ a Haran wɛr pɔ. A wʊ sãa na wa kpi baar lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn waan wʊ a kana yɩn ben kpɩɛrɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn ba kʊ wʊ bon jaa a kana ɛ, waa kʊ wʊ jibile jaa gba ɛ, bɩɩ gbɛr nɛfʊ jie ɛ. Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn tɩr nɛɛ kʊ wʊ ɩka 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ yɔn lɛ na so a jie, tɩ waa tara bie gba ɛ.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊ a Abraham, ‘A fʊ yɔn na ɩ naa sãanba paal sãan pɔ, na ba ɩ gbãgbaar ka ba ge ba yuom kɔɔr anaar (400).
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr naa, ɩka wʊn yaa naa a sãn a paal 'lɔ na maal ba a gbãgbaar. A anyã puor lɛ ban wa puor ma a jie nyãna.’
Nãaŋmɩn tɩr nɛɛ kʊ a Abraham a yʊɔr ŋmaafʊ yele. Abraham na wa dɔɔ a Isaakɩ, wʊ ŋmaa wʊn a yʊɔr a ber aniin daar. Ka a Isaakɩ mɩ dɔɔ a Jekɔb, ka a Jekɔb mɩ dɔɔ a sɩ sãamɩne pie nɩ ayi.
“A sɩ sãamɩne banyãna na tara nɩ a ba yɛbile Josefʊ nɩ nyuur jũu, na ba nyɔɔ wʊ da kʊ a Ijipitɩ dẽme. Tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn be a wʊ sɛ̃.
Na wʊ faa wʊ yin a wʊ wõm a jaa pɔ. Wʊ kʊ naa a Josefʊ yɛ̃ na wʊ sʊ̃ʊ wʊ a wʊ nyɛ 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ a Faaro na ɩ a Ijipitɩ nãa niem, na wʊ maal wʊ ka wʊ ɩ a Ijipitɩ nɩ a nãa jie wʊ jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ.
“Ka a kɔ̃ lo Ijipitɩ nɩ a Kanaan wɛr wʊ jaa waan dɔɔyɛ, ka a sɩ sãamɩne ba nyɛrɛ bʊ̃diir ɛ.
Jekɔb na wa wõ ɩka bʊ̃diir ben a be Ijipitɩ, wʊ tʊ̃n a sɩ sãamɩne ka ba chen.
A gbɛɛ ayi sʊɔ ban chen lɛ a Josefʊ wiil a wʊ mãɛ kʊ ba, ka a Faaro mɩ pãa bɔ̃ɔ a Josefʊ yir nɩbɛ.
A anyã puor lɛ a Josefʊ tʊ̃ bʊɔl a wʊ sãa Jekɔb nɩ a wʊ yir dẽme, a ba jaa ɩ nɩbɛ lɩjaata nɩ pie nɩ anũu (75).
Jekɔb chen a be a Ijipitɩ nɩ a sɩ sãamɩne be lɛ ba jaa tɩ kpi.
Ba tuo naa a ba ãgãma waan a Sekem wa ũu ba a yaa 'lɔ pɔ a Abraham na da a Hamor bibiir sɛ̃ a be a Sekem.
“A sɔ̃ɔ na wa gbʊr ka a Nãaŋmɩn na maal a lɛ wʊn tɩr a nɛɛ kʊ a Abraham, a sɩ nɩbɛ na be a Ijipitɩ dɔɔn paal.
Ala lɛ ka a nãyuo wa di na wʊ kaara a Ijipitɩ na waa bɔ̃ɔ a Josefʊ yele ɛ.
Wʊ maal naa a sɩ nɩbɛ putuyele na wʊ ge ba, na wʊ ma fɩr a pɔɔ pʊʊr ka bala wa dɔɔ bipɩlɛ ba lɔb ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a kʊ̃ɔ pɔ a ba kpi.
“A sɔ̃ɔ nyãna lɛ ba dɔɔ a Mosesɩ, ka wʊ ɩ bivɩla a Nãaŋmɩn niem. A ba guol wʊ ŋmɛrsɩ ata be a wʊ sãa yir.
Ban wa yin wʊ tɩ bar a yõo, Faaro bipɔɔ de wʊn guol ka wʊ ɩ a wʊ mãɛ bidaba.
Ba jãn naa Mosesɩ a Ijipitɩ tẽe yɛ̃ a jaa, ka wʊ kpɛ̃mɛ a wʊ 'yɛr nɩ a wʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃ pɔ.
“A lɛ a Mosesɩ na wa ta yuom lɩjaayi (40), wʊ tɩɛr naa a wʊ yɛɛr Isɩral nɩbɛ na wʊ ɩka wʊ chen tɩ piir ba kaa.
Wʊ tɩ nyɛn a ba ãsʊɔ a Ijipitɩ nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ na gere ka wʊ ŋmaa de na wʊ kʊ a Ijipitɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ.
Mosesɩ tɩɛr lɛ ɩka a wʊ mãɛ nɩbɛ na bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka 'lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na de faan ba, tɩchɛ baa tɩɛrtɔ a lɛ ɛ.
A wɛr na wa chaar, wʊ tɩ nyɛn a Isɩral nɩbɛ ayi mɩ na jɛɛrɛ taa. Ka wʊ 'maal ba tɩ sʊrɔ ba, ‘Yɩn yɛɛr nara, bo lɛ so a yɩ jɛɛrɛ taa?’
Tɩchɛ a 'lɔ sʊɔ na tʊ̃ɔ a wʊ tɔ sʊɔ daan a Mosesɩ bar tɩ sʊʊr wʊ, ‘An tʊ̃ fʊ ɩka fʊ wa kaara sɩ na fʊ tɔɔrɔ a sɩ 'yɛr?
Fʊ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka fʊ mɩ kʊ ma nɩtãa lɛ fʊn kʊ a Ijipitɩ nɩrɛ a jãa wɛ?’
Mosesɩ na wõ a 'yɛr nyãna ka wʊ jo chen tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a Midiyan, be lɛ wʊ be na wʊ wa dɔɔ dabil ayi.
“Yuom lɩjaayi (40) na wa po, malaka wa lɩɛb bũu lɩrɛ tɩbile pɔ, na wʊ dũu a Mosesɩ be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ na gbʊr a Sinai tɔ̃ɔ par.
Wʊn wa nyɛ a lɛ ka a nɛ'maa wʊ, a wʊ tɔɔ gbʊr ɩka wʊ kaa. Be lɛ wʊ wõ a Soro kɔkɔr na 'yɛr,
‘'Maa lɛ ɩ a fʊ sãamɩne Nãaŋmɩn, Abraham, Isaakɩ nɩ a Jekɔb Nãaŋmɩn.’ Ka a dãbãɛ kpɛ a Mosesɩ waa lɛ 'lara na kaa ɛ.
“Ka a sɩ Soro pãa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, ‘Yaa a fʊ nafɔɔr bar, a jie fʊn ara ɩ naa jichɛchɛ.
N nyɛ naa a n nɩbɛ be a Ijipitɩ pɔ ban gere, n wõ naa ba hʊ̃ʊnfʊ naa suu ɩka n wa faa ba. Wa, ka n tʊ̃ fʊ a be a Ijipitɩ.’

“A Mosesɩ nyãna nɩ wʊ ju ban tɔr bar tɩ sʊʊr wʊ, ‘An lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ fʊ ɩka fʊ kaara sɩ na fʊ tɔɔrɔ a sɩ 'yɛr?’ 'Lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn mãɛ tʊ̃ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a malaka na wa dũu wʊ 'lɩrɛ a bũu a tɩbile pɔ, ɩka wʊ tɩ ɩ a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a ba fafaara.
'Lɔ lɛ tɩ de ba nie na wʊ tʊ̃ tʊ̃ yɔɔ be a Ijipitɩ tẽe pɔ, nɩ a Man Jɩɛ par nɩ a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ ban be a yuom lɩjaayi (40).
A Mosesɩ nyãna nɩ wʊ ju lɛ 'yɛr kʊ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ɩka, ‘Nãaŋmɩn na tʊ̃ naa a 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ãsʊɔ a maa kaar ka wʊ yi a yɩ mãɛ nɩbɛ pɔ.’
Wʊ dɔ̃ɔ pʊɔ a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ, 'matãan a sɩ sãakpãmɩne ka a malaka 'yɛr 'yɛr kʊ wʊ be a Sinai Tɔ̃ɔ par na ɩ nyɛvʊr 'yɛr ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ sɩ.
“Tɩchɛ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne tɔr wʊ naa, na baa tu a wʊ nɛɛ ɛ. Ba tɔr wʊn bar ka a ba tɩɛr lɩɛb chen be a Ijipitɩ.
Ba 'yɛr kʊ a Aaron, ‘Maal ŋmɩmɛ kʊ sɩ ka a ma de sɩ nie, a Mosesɩ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na yin sɩ a Ijipitɩ saa bɔ̃ɔ bo nɩ tara wʊ ɛ.’
A ba mɛ bʊtɩɩ a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ka wʊ nyɛtãan nele, na ba waan bomo wa lon bɔɔr a jie na ba dãɛn 'yɔ̃ɔn a ba nũu bʊ̃maalaa nyãna.

Tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ ba, na wʊ bar ba ka ba puoro a saaju bomo. Ka anyãna tɩ tuor a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ãsʊɔ na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb, wʊ sʊʊr naa, ‘A yɩn Isɩral nɩbɛ, yɩn be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ a yuom lɩjaayi (40) na yɩ dɔ̃ɔ waan a bɔɔrlo bomo maa lɛ yɩ wa kʊ bɩɩ?
Kai, tɩ a bʊtɩbɛ ala yɩn kaara lɛ a Molokɩ nɩ ŋmɛrbir ŋmɩn Arefan, a tɩbɛ anyãna lɛ yɩ dɔ̃ɔ maal puoro. A lɛ jũu, ɩn vɛ̃ naa ka ba nyɔɔr yɩ chiin a Babilon puor ka yɩ tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a be.’
“A sɩ sãakpãmɩne dɔ̃ɔ maal gãma yir be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ ka a ɩ dãasɩɛ, ba maal wʊ naa nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na man wiil a Mosesɩ ka wʊ nyɛ.
A gãma yir nyã lɛ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne tara ka a Josua de ba a nie ka ba waan, a ba wa faa a wɛr nyã pɔ a nɩyor na dɔ̃ɔ kpɩɛrɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn dii ba bar. A gãn yir nyã ben be lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ tãn a Nãa David sɔ̃ɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn maal vɩla kʊ wʊ ka wʊ ɩka wʊn mɛn yir kʊ a Jekɔb Nãaŋmɩn.
Tɩchɛ Solomon lɛ wa mɛ a yir kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn.
“Fʊ̃ʊ kaa, a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ɩ a saaju sʊɔ, ba kpɩɛrɛ a yie anyã nɩbɛ na mɛ ɛ. Nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ãsʊɔ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr,
‘Saaju lɛ ɩ a maa nakɔɔ, ka a tẽe ɩ a n gbɛɛ dɔɔlfʊ jie. Ka a sɩ Soro sʊʊr, yir bo tɔ lɛ yɩn mɛ kʊ ma? Bɩɩ nyɩnɛ lɛ na ɩ a n pɛ̃nfʊ jie?
A ba ɩ a maa nũu lɛ maal anyãna a jaa ɛ?’
“Yɩn nyãkpãɛn dẽme na ɩ nɩbɛ na ba wõnõ 'yɛr ɛ, yɩ kaara a yɩ sãamɩne kaar. Yɩ maa sɔɔ kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɔr ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ jaa ba be be ka a yɩ sãamɩne ba ge wʊ ɛ. Ba gba kʊ naa bala na de nie mʊɔl 'yɛr a Torfʊ Sʊɔ 'lɔ waa 'yɛr. A pʊ̃pãanyã, yɩn gba lɛ gar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ na yɩ kʊ wʊ.
Yɩn lɛ de a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ wʊn kʊ a malaka a wʊ wa kʊ yɩ ka yɩ de tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ, tɩchɛ a yɩ tɔr bar.”
A 'yɛr nyãna ban wa wõ, ka ba suur ir a ba kpar kparaa jur 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʊ.
Tɩchɛ a Sɩteven a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na sɛɛ a wʊ dʊl kaa saaju na wʊ nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr, ka a Yesu ara a Nãaŋmɩn nũsʊ̃ɔ jie.
Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Yɩ nyɛ ka, n nyɛ naa saaju na yuo ka a Nɩsaal Bie ara a Nãaŋmɩn nũsʊ̃ɔ jie.”
A anyãna ban wõ ba pɔɔn a tobo tɩ ŋme chɛlma na ba tɩ mɩl wʊ,
na ba tɔɔ wʊ yin a tẽe chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ tɩ piel lɔɔrɔ wʊ nɩ kʊsɩbɛ. Ka a bala na di dãasɩɛ yaar a ba fuusɩ bin pɔlbile kɔ̃ɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Sɔɔl sɛ̃.
Ban lɔɔrɔ wʊ a lɛ nɛ na kʊ ka wʊ sʊɔr Yesu, “N Soro Yesu de a n sãɛ.”
Wʊ lon gbur dumo tɩ pãa ŋme chɛlma 'yɛr, “N Soro taa ɩrɛ wa yaara ba sãn ɛ.” A anyãna lɛ wʊ 'yɛr baar tɩ ŋmaa vʊʊr.

A Sɔɔl mɩ dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ ɩka ba kʊ a Sɩteven. A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ jaa lɛ ba piel gere a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo be a Jerusalɛm. Ka ba jaa ŋma yaar a bamɩne chen Judiya a bamɩne mɩ chen Samariya tɩchɛ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ tɛɛ be a Jerusalɛm.
Nɩbɛ bamɩne na joro a Nãaŋmɩn 'mɔɔn a Sɩteven ũu tɩ na ba kõ a kuor.
Tɩchɛ ka a Sɔɔl mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir bur buro a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ bara, na wʊ yʊɔrɔ kpɩɛrɛ a yie nyɔɔrɔ dɔɔr nɩ pɔbɔ tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ.
A bala na jo ŋma a dẽdẽme chɛnɛ na mʊɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr jie jaa ban chen.
Filip chen Samariya tẽe pɔ, na wʊ tɩ 'yɛr ɩka Yesu lɛ a Nɩ-iraa a be.
A nɩyɔɔ na wa wõ a lɛ a Filip na 'yɛr tɩ mɩ nyɛ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ wʊn tʊ̃, a ba yuo toor chɛlɛ a lɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ.
A sɩdɛbɛ ala na dɔ̃ɔ pɔɔrɔ a nɩbɛ ŋmen chɛlsɩ wa yin a nɩbɛ pɔ, ka a gbɛkũn nɩ a gbɛrsɩ yɔɔ jaa sa.
Ka a tẽe 'lɔ dẽme ba jaa chɩlɛ.
Daba kɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ be be ban bʊɔlɔ Simon na wʊ ma tʊ̃nɔ̃ tãsɔɔ tʊ̃mɔ̃ ka a 'maa a Samariya nɩbɛ nɛɛ, na wʊ ma wile a wʊ mãɛ ɩka nɩkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ wʊ ɩ.
A nɩbɛ ba jaa, a bɛrɛ nɩ a bil ba jaa ma yuon toor chɛlɛ wʊ tɩ 'yɛrɛ, “A daba nyã 'lɔ kpɛ̃ɔ ɩ naa a gãdaa sʊɔ kpɛ̃ɔ.”
Ba turo wʊ naa bojũu a kor naa wʊn tʊ̃nɔ̃ a tãsɔɔ tʊ̃mɔ̃ ka a 'maa ba nɛɛ.
Tɩchɛ a lɛ ban wa sɔɔ de a lɛ a Filip na 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr, nɩ a Yesu na ɩ a Nɩ-iraa yuor, dɔɔr nɩ pɔbɔ ba jaa son a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ.
A Simon mɩ sɔɔ naa ka ba so wʊ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ a wʊ turo a Filip yʊɔrɔ, a nɛ'maa tʊ̃yɔɔ wʊn nyɛ wʊn tʊ̃.
A nɩtʊ̃nsɩ na be a Jerusalɛm na wa wõ ɩka a Samariya nɩbɛ mɩ sɔɔn de a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr, ba tʊ̃n Pita nɩ Jɔɔn a ba sɛ̃.
Ban tɩ ta, ba sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn kʊ a nɩbɛ ka ban nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ba kpɛ ãsʊɔ jaa sɛrɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ lɛ ba so ba, nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor.
Ka a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn pãa dɔɔl ba a nuur a ba nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
Simon na nyɛ a lɛ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ na dɔɔl ba a nũu ka ba nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, a wʊ de libie kʊ ba,
tɩ 'yɛr, “Yɩ mɩ kʊ ma a kpɛ̃ɔ nyãna ka maa wa dɔɔl nɩrɛ jaa a n nũu, a wʊ mɩ ma nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.”
Ka a Pita 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Fʊ̃ʊ nɩ a fʊ libie jaa yɩ wɛ, bojũu fʊ tɩɛr ɩka fʊn tʊ̃ɔ da a Nãaŋmɩn kʊfʊ nɩ libie.
Faa tara sɔr na lɔ̃ɔ tʊ̃n sɩ ɛ, bojũu a fʊ nyãa ba tor a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ.
Lɩɛb a fʊ pututɩɛr nyãna na fʊ sʊɔr a sɩ Soro amɩne sɛ̃ wʊn vɛ̃n kʊ fʊ a fʊ tɩɛr dɛɛr nyãna fʊn tara.
N nyɛn bɔ̃ɔn fʊn ɩ pubier sʊɔ ka a yelbier nyɔɔ fʊ pɔɔ.”
A Simon pãa 'yɛr, “Yɩ sʊɔr a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ ma ka ala yɩn 'yɛr taa waara a n sɛ̃ ɛ.”
A lɛ Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn na wa man 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr baar, ba lɩɛb kulo a Jerusalɛm ba 'yɛrɛ naa a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyãna a tẽbil ala na chɛɛl a Samariya.
Nãaŋmɩn malaka 'yɛr kʊ a Filip, “Ir suu de a sɔr 'lɔ na yi a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ tu a Jerusalɛm chen a Gaja.”
Lɛ lɛ wʊ ir chiine, na wʊ tɩ tuor a Etiyopiya daba ãsʊɔ ban maal ka wʊ ab na wʊ ɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kaara a Etiyopiya nãpɔɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Kandasɩ libie. Jerusalɛm lɛ wʊ chen tɩ puor,
na wʊ lɩɛb kulo jãnɛ a wʊ wii torko pɔ na wʊ kara a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Isaiya gãn.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr a Filip, “Chen tɩ gbʊr a torko par.”
A Filip jo chen a be a torko par na wʊ wõ a daba na kara a Isaiya gãn a wʊ sʊʊr wʊ, “Fʊ bɔ̃ɔ naa lɛ par fʊn kara ɔ?”
Ka a daba 'yɛr, “Ŋmɩnɛ ɩn ɩrɛ wa bɔ̃ɔ a par, ka nɩrɛ baa wiil ma ɛ?” Tɩ na wʊ bʊɔl a Filip ka wʊ do jãnɛ a torko pɔ.
A anyãna lɛ a da-abbaa 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ dɔ̃ɔ kara a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, “Ba nyɔɔ wʊn chiine fɩka pɛr na tɩ kʊ, Wʊ ɩn jaa gbul fɩka pele ban põnõ a kɔɔl na waa haa nɛɛ ɛ.
Wʊ siir a wʊ mãɛ a lɛ ban ba tɔɔr a wʊ 'yɛr kaa tor ɛ. An lɛ na tʊ̃ɔ 'yɛr a wʊ bal nɩbɛ 'yɛr? A wʊ nyɛvʊr ba tal tɛɛr a ka a wɛr pɔ ɛ.”
Ka a da-abbaa nyã sʊɔr a Filip, “Yãayãabɩlɛ, 'yɛr kʊ ma, an 'yɛr lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ nyã 'yɛrɛ? Wʊ mãɛ 'yɛr lɛ wʊ 'yɛrɛ bɩɩ nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr lɛ wʊ 'yɛrɛ?”
A Filip pãa piel na wʊ de a Nãaŋmɩn gãn 'yɛr nyãna man a Yesu 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ kʊ wʊ.
Ban 'mataa chiine tɩ ta kʊ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ par a sɔr pɔ, ka a da-abbaa 'lɔ 'yɛr, “Nyɛ kʊ̃ɔ, bãa lɛ so ka fʊ kʊ̃ so ma a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ ɛ?”
Tɩ na wʊ tɔɔ a torko a wʊ ara, ka a 'lɔ nɩ a Filip 'mataa kpɛ a kʊ̃ɔ pɔ, ka a Filip so wʊ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ.
Ban wa yi a kʊ̃ɔ pɔ, Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa jaa naa a Filip chiin ka a da-abbaa 'lɔ ba lɛ nyɛ wʊ go ɛ. Tɩ de wʊ sɔr chɩlɛ kulo.
Tɩchɛ ka a Filip tɩ yi naa Ajotusɩ na wʊ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr a tẽn ala a jaa tɩ tãn Sisariya.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a Sɔɔl chɛnɛ pʊrɔ a sɩ Soro poturbo ju, na wʊ bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ kʊ ba. Wʊ chen naa a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃,
na wʊ tɩ sʊɔr sɔr de gãn na chiin a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir ala na be a Damaskus ɩka 'lɔ wa tɩ nyɛ nɩrɛ na turo a Sɔr nyã, ka pɔɔ lɛ bɩɩ daba lɛ wʊ tʊ̃ɔ nyɔɔr ba waan a Jerusalɛm.
Ala lɛ wʊ de a sɔr chiine tɩ gbʊrɔ a Damaskus ka chãa yi be a saaju ajienaa wa nyɩɩr jil wʊ.
Ka wʊ lo tẽe tɩ wõ kɔkɔr na bʊɔlɔ wʊ sʊrɔ, “Sɔɔl, Sɔɔl, bo lɛ so a fʊ gere ma a lɛ?”
Ka a Sɔɔl sʊʊr, “An lɛ fʊ ɩ Soro?” Ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Maa lɛ ɩ a Yesu fʊn gere.
Pʊ̃pãanyã, ir na fʊ kpɛ be a tẽe pɔ, ban wiil fʊ naa a lɛ fʊn na ɩ.”
Ka a dɔɔr bala nɩ a Sɔɔl na 'mataa chiine gĩe ara, na ba wõ a dɔɔn, tɩchɛ baa nyɛ nɩrɛ ɛ.
Ka a Sɔɔl ir a tẽe ara na wʊ yuo a nɩbie tɩ waa lɛ nyɛrɛ ɛ. A ba nyɔɔ wʊ a nũu tɔɔ kpɛ̃n be a Damaskus.
Wʊ maal ber ata waa lɛ nyɛrɛ ɛ, waa di bʊ̃diir bɩɩ nyũ kʊ̃ɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a poturo ãsʊɔ ben a be Damaskus a ba bʊɔlɔ wʊ Ananias ka a sɩ Soro wa bʊɔl wʊ a jãna pɔ, “Ananias.” A wʊ sɔɔ, “Ɔ̃ɔ, n Soro.”
Ka a Soro 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Ir de a Sɔr Dẽdẽe chiine na fʊ tɩ ta a Judas yir sʊʊr daba na yi Tasusɩ a ba bʊɔlɔ Sɔɔl, be lɛ wʊ be sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn.
A wʊ jãna pɔ, wʊ nyɛn daba ban bʊɔlɔ Ananias na dɔɔl wʊ nũu ka wʊ lɛ nyɛrɛ.”
A Ananias 'yɛr, “N Soro, n wõn a daba nyã yelyɔɔ a lɛ wʊn ge a fʊ nɩsʊ̃n a be a Jerusalɛm.
A ka mɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ mɩ kʊ wʊn sɔr ɩka wʊ wa nyɔɔr a bala jaa na bʊɔlɔ a fʊ yuor.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Soro 'yɛr kʊ a Ananias, “Chen, a daba nyãna lɛ ɩ a n bʊ̃-iraa ka wʊn tuo a maa yuor chiin a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ, nɩ a ba nãmɩne sɛ̃, lɔ̃ɔn a Isɩral nɩbɛ.
Ɩ̃n wiil wʊ naa a lɛ wʊn na di dɔɔyɛ a n yuor jũu.”

Be lɛ a Ananias ir chen tɩ kpɛ be a yir, na wʊ tɩ dɔɔl wʊ a nũu tɩ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “N yɛbɛ Sɔɔl, a sɩ Soro Yesu na yi fʊ be a sɔr pɔ fʊn waara lɛ tʊ̃ ma a fʊ sɛ̃ ka fʊn lɛ nyɛrɛ go, na fʊ sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.”
Ajienaa ka bʊ̃nyɩnsɩ 'lɔɔr a Sɔɔl nɩbie pɔ lo a wʊ lɛ nyɛrɛ go. Wʊ ir naa a ba tɔ̃ɔ so wʊ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ.
Wʊn wa di a bʊ̃diir baar wʊ lɛ nyɛn kpɛ̃ɔ, na wʊ jãnɛ a poturbo bala sɛ̃ a be a Damaskus bãlãa.
Ajienaa, wʊ piel 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr be a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir, na wʊ 'yɛrɛ ɩka a Yesu ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn Bie.

Bala jaa na wõ a wʊ 'yɛr ka a 'maa ba nɛɛ a ba sʊrɔ, “A ba ɩ a daba nyãna lɛ ir gere a bala a be a Jerusalɛm na bʊɔlɔ a yuor nyãna ɛ? Na wʊ wa a ka mɩ ɩka wʊ wa nyɔɔr a bala mɩ chiin tɩ kʊ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ ɛ?”
Tɩchɛ ka a Sɔɔl kpɛ̃ɔ chɛnɛ pʊɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ka wʊ 'yɛr tʊ̃ɔ a Juu nɩbɛ na kpɩɛrɛ a Damaskus na wʊ wiil ba ɩka a Yesu lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.
Ber yɔɔ na wa po, a Juu nɩbɛ guor taa ɩka ba kʊ a Sɔɔl,
tɩchɛ kaa a Sɔɔl bɔ̃ɔn a ba guorfʊ. Mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ tãsɔɔ jaa lɛ ba mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir guro wʊ a tẽe dɔ̃dɔɩ nɛɛr, bʊɔrɔ a wʊ kʊ̃ fʊ.
Tɩchɛ ka a bala na turo wʊ 'mɔɔ wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ pɩɛ pɔ tãsɔɔ na ba tur wʊ bar ka wʊ tu a dãpuor dachin pɔ suu.
Wʊn tɩ ta Jerusalɛm, wʊ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka wʊ lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a poturbo tɩchɛ a ba joro wʊ dãbãɛ, baa sɔɔ ɩka wʊ ɩ naa a poturo ãsʊɔ ɛ.

Tɩchɛ ka a Banabasɩ tara wʊ chiin be a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ sɛ̃. 'Lɔ lɛ pãa man kʊ ba a lɛ a Sɔɔl na nyɛ a sɩ Soro a sɔr pɔ, ka a Soro 'yɛr 'yɛr kʊ wʊ. Wʊ 'yɛr ɩka a be a Damaskus wʊ mʊɔl 'yɛr a Yesu yuor 'yɛr, na wʊ ta jo dãbãɛ ɛ.
A Sɔɔl jãnɛ a be a ba sɛ̃ na wʊ so wʊ mãɛ yʊɔrɔ be a Jerusalɛm na wʊ mʊɔlɔ a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor 'yɛrɛ ba joro dãbãɛ ɛ.
Wʊ ma 'yɛrɛ naa ka a 'lɔ nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bala ban dɔɔ a paal yuo pɔ ka baa tʊɔrɔ 'yɛrɛ a Juu kɔkɔr ɛ, ma chɩrɛ taa, ka ba bʊɔrɔ a wʊ kʊfʊ.
A poturbo na wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃ ba tara wʊn chiin a Sisariya tɩ bar ka wʊ chen Tasusɩ.
Damfʊ ba lɛ be a bala na puoro be a Judiya, Galilee nɩ a Samariya, ka a nyã'maar. Ba kpɛ̃mɛ naa ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ãkpɛ̃ɔ ka ba nʊ̃ɔnɔ̃ na ba joro a sɩ Soro dãbãɛ.
Ka a Pita yʊɔrɔ a tẽn na wʊ wa chen Lida ɩka wʊ tɩ piir a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo kaa.
Be lɛ wʊ tɩ nyɛ daba ban bʊɔlɔ Ainɩyas na gbɛr gã yuomo aniin.
Ka a Pita bʊɔl wʊ, “Ainɩyas, Yesu yuor pɔ, sa. Ir saaju na fʊ pilʊ̃ a fʊ bʊ̃gãnaa.” Ajienaa lɛ a Ainɩyas ir saaju.
Ka a Lida nɩbɛ ba jaa nɩ a Saron nɩbɛ na nyɛ a lɛ, a ba lɩɛb puoro a sɩ Soro.
Pɔɔ kɔ̃ɔ mɩ na dɔ̃ɔ puoro ben a be Jopa, ka ba bʊɔlɔ wʊ Tabita, a yo bʊ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ba lɩɛb bʊɔlɔ Dɔɔkas. Wʊ ma maala na vɩla na wʊ sʊ̃nɔ̃ a nɔ̃n dẽme.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ wʊ ɩ baal na wʊ kpi, a ba so wʊ a kʊ̃ɔ don gaal be a bɔɔpɩɛ pɔ.
Lida nɩ a Jopa mɩ ba jãa ɛ, kaa a pupuorbo wõ ɩka a Pita ben a Lida, a ba tʊ̃ nɩbɛ ayi ka ba tɩ sʊɔr wʊ, “Yãayãabɩlɛ a wʊ wa fɔɔ.”
Ka bala naa Pita jaa 'mataa chen, wʊn wa ta ba de wʊn don be a bɔɔpɩɛ die pɔ. A pɔɔkɔɛ ba jaa ara na jilʊ̃ wʊ kõnõ na ba wile a Pita a fuusɩ nɩ a fɔɔr a Dɔɔkas na maal wʊn dɔ̃ɔ chɛnɛ be a ba sɛ̃.
Pita diin ba jaa a ba yi a be a die pɔ, tɩ na wʊ gbur dumo sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn, na wʊ lɩɛb tor a kũu tɩ 'yɛr, “Tabita ir.” A wʊ yuo a nɩbie nyɛ a Pita na wʊ ir jãnɛ.
Ka a Pita nyɔɔ wʊ a nũu sʊ̃ʊ wʊ a wʊ ir ara, tɩ pãa bʊɔl a bala na sɔɔ nɩ a pɔɔkɔɛ ka ba kpɛ wa nyɛ a wʊ ɩ nɩ nɩbir.
Ka a yele nyãna yaar a Jopa wʊ jaa ka a nɩbɛ yɔɔ jie wa sɔɔ a sɩ Soro.
A Pita jɛ̃n be a Jopa bãlãa a daba kɔ̃ɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Simon na ma nɔ̃nɔ̃ gãma yir.
Be a Sisariya, daba kɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ be be a ba bʊɔlɔ wʊ Konɩlɩyɔs, wʊ be naa a sojasɩ gbul 'lɔ pɔ a Itali nɩbɛ na bʊɔlɔ a sojasɩ kɔbaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ.
'Lɔ naa wʊ yir dẽme ba jaa puoro naa na ba joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbãɛ, na wʊ ma kʊrɔ a nɩbɛ bala an wõnõ pɔrɔ, na wʊ mɩ ma sʊɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn ba gala ɛ.
Bɩbir ãsʊɔ lɛ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa bal, a wʊ gã jãn jaa chɛchɛ nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn malaka a wʊ wa ara a wʊ sɛ̃ tɩ bʊɔl wʊ, “Konɩlɩyɔs.”
Ka wʊ chaal a lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ tɩ sʊʊr, “Bo lɛ N Soro?” Ka a malaka 'yɛr, “A fʊ puorfʊ nɩ a kʊfʊ fʊn kʊrɔ a nɔ̃n dẽme don tɩ pɔɔ a Nãaŋmɩn ka wʊ tara a fʊ tɩɛr.
Pʊ̃pãanyã, tʊ̃ nɩbɛ ka ba chen a Jopa tɩ tara daba kɔ̃ɔ na di Simon tɩ ba bʊɔlɔ wʊ Pita a wʊ wa.
Wʊ kpɩɛrɛ naa a daba na nɔ̃nɔ̃ gãma mɩ na di a Simon yir, ka a wʊ yir gbʊr a man kpɛ̃ɛ gogoro.”
A malaka na wa chen baar, Konɩlɩyɔs bʊɔl naa a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ ayi nɩ a soja ãsʊɔ mɩ na puoro na ma sʊ̃nɔ̃ wʊ.
Wʊ man a lɛ jaa na ɩ tɩ tʊ̃ ba a Jopa.
A wɛr na wa chaar mɔ̃tɔ̃tuo sʊ̃ɔ, ka ba be a sɔr pɔ chiine tɩ gbʊrɔ a tẽe, a Pita mɩ don a gar ju Nãaŋmɩn sʊɔrfʊ jie.
Ka a kɔ̃ kpɛ wʊ a wʊ bʊɔrɔ bʊ̃kɔ̃ɔ na di, ban chɛnɛ maala a bʊ̃diir ka a dedee kpɛ wʊ.
A wʊ nyɛ saaju na yuo a wʊ nyɛ bʊ̃kɔ̃ɔ fɩka fɔkpɛ̃ɛ na gbũ jiir anaar ka wʊ suro wa gbʊrɔ a tẽe.
Ka a dʊ̃gbɛɛ anaar a jaa bʊrɔ be be nɩ a tẽe bʊ̃vʊʊrsɩ nɩ a lubilɔɔrsɩ a jaa.
Be lɛ a kɔkɔr pãa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Pita, ir kʊ 'wɔb.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita 'yɛr, “Sɩrɛ jaa, kai. N Soro, n ba 'wɔb a dʊ̃dɛbɛ anyãna nɩ a dʊ̃chiirsɩ anyãna ãsʊɔ jaa ɛ.”
Ka a kɔkɔr lɛ 'yɛr go, “Ta bʊɔl bon jaa bʊ̃dɛɛr 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na maal a wʊ ɩ bʊ̃sʊ̃ ɛ.”
Gbɛɛ ata lɛ a ɩ, tɩchɛ ka a fɔbaa lɛ jaa a lɛ nɛ don a saaju ajienaa.
Lɛ a Pita na chɛnɛ pɛrɛ a nyɛfʊ nyã par, ka a dɔɔr bala a Konɩlɩyɔs na tʊ̃ mɩ nyɛn a Simon yir na ba ara a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ.
Ba bʊɔl sʊʊr, “Daba na di Simon tɩ ba bʊɔlɔ wʊ Pita ka lɛ wʊ kpɩɛrɛ ɔ?”
Lɛ a Pita na chɛnɛ tɩɛrɛ a nyɛfʊ nyãna ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Simon, dɔɔr ata lɛ bʊɔrɔ fʊ sʊrɔ.
Ir suu a ba sɛ̃, taa ɩrɛ wa baala fʊn na lɔ̃ɔ chiin ba ɛ, maa lɛ tʊ̃ ba.”
Ka a Pita ir suu tɩ nyɛ a nɩbɛ na wʊ 'yɛr, “Maa lɛ ɩ a nɩrɛ yɩn bʊɔrɔ, bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ wa?”

A ba 'yɛr, “Konɩlɩyɔs na ɩ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃ lɛ sɩ yi. A wʊ yele tor naa ka wʊ ɩ nɩrɛ na joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbãɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ ba jaa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʊ. A Nãaŋmɩn malaka wa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ ɩka wʊ bʊɔl fʊ a fʊ wa be a wʊ yir a wʊ wõ lɛ jaa fʊn na man.”
A Pita pãa tara ba kpɛ̃n tɩ gaal. Ka a wɛr chaar, a bala nɩ a Pita nɩ a pupuorbiir bamɩne na yi a Jopa pʊɔ ba a ba 'mataa chen.
Ba chen ka a wɛr tɩ chaar a ba ta a Sisariya, ka a ɩ a Konɩlɩyɔs mɩ chɛlɛ ba naa na wʊ bʊɔl a wʊ yir dẽme nɩ a wʊ barmɩne ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa a ba jɛ̃ gu.
Lɛ a Pita na ta kpɩɛrɛ a Konɩlɩyɔs yir wʊ ir tuor a Pita gbur dumo a wʊ niem na wʊ puor wʊ nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita nyɔɔ wʊ a wʊ ir, ka wʊ 'yɛr, “Ara, a maa mɩ nɩsaal lɛ n mɩ ɩ.”
Wʊ 'yɛr wʊ naa lɛ tɩ kpɛ a die pɔ tɩ nyɛ nɩyɔɔ na duo.
A wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩn mãɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa an ba tara sɔr ɩka a sɩn Juu nɩbɛ ba lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a yɩn bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ. Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn wiil ma naa ɩka n taa bʊɔl nɩrɛ jaa nɩdɛɛr ɛ, bɩɩ nɩsɔ̃ɔ naa ɛ.
Ala lɛ so yɩn wa bʊɔl ma n ba baala ɛ, bɩɩ 'yɛr ɩka n kʊ̃ wa ɛ, bo 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ bʊɔl ma?”
Ka a Konɩlɩyɔs 'yɛr, “Ber anaar nɩ dɩna ɩn be a die pɔ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na bal baar. Ajienaa lɛ ka a ɩ daba na su fuu ka wʊ nyɩlɛ wa ara a n sɛ̃,
tɩ na wʊ bʊɔl ma, ‘Konɩlɩyɔs, Nãaŋmɩn wõn a fʊ sʊɔrfʊ na wʊ tɩɛr a fʊ kʊfʊ fʊn kʊrɔ a nɔ̃n dẽme.
Tʊ̃ nɩrɛ a wʊ chen a Jopa tɩ bʊɔl Simon ban lɛ bʊɔlɔ Pita, wʊ be naa a daba ban bʊɔlɔ a Simon na nɔ̃nɔ̃ gãma ka a yir gbʊr man gogoro.’
Ala lɛ so ka n mɩ tʊ̃ a fɔɔ a lɛ nɛ bʊɔl fʊ, a fʊ mɩ pɛl pʊɔ tɩ wa. Pʊ̃pãanyã, Nãaŋmɩn niem lɛ sɩ jaa jãnɛ tɩ na chɛl bon jaa a sɩ Soro na tʊ̃n fʊ ɩka fʊ wa 'yɛr kʊ sɩ.”
Ka a Pita pãa piel na wʊ 'yɛrɛ, “Pʊ̃pãanyã n pãa bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn ba ooro ɛ.
Tɩchɛ wʊ ma den nɩbʊrɔ ba jaa na joro wʊ dãbãɛ tɩ maal a lɛ na tor.
A 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩr kʊ a Isɩral nɩbɛ nɩ a nyã'maar 'yɛr na tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a bon jaa Soro sɛ̃.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ala na ɩ a Judiya paal wʊ jaa na piel a Galilee a lɛ a Jɔɔn na wa mʊɔl a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ sofʊ 'yɛr baar.
Lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na ir a Yesu na yi Najaretɩ na wʊ de a wʊ Sɩɛ nɩ a wʊ kpɛ̃ɔ kʊ wʊ. Wʊ yɔn a ka wʊ jaa jilʊ̃ na wʊ maala vɩla sãana nɩ baalsɩ nɩ a bala jaa a dɛɛr sʊɔ na tara, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn ben a wʊ sɛ̃.
“Sɩn lɛ nyɛn nɩbir, a ala a jaa wʊn tʊ̃ a Juu nɩbɛ tẽn pɔ, nɩ a Jerusalɛm. Ba nyɔɔ wʊn kpa yɔɔl a daa ju ka wʊ kpi.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn sãɩ wʊ naa a kũu pɔ, a ber ata daar a wʊ ir ɩ vʊr na wʊ vɛ̃ a ba nyɛ wʊ.
Nɩbɛ ba jaa ba lɛ nyɛ wʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɩn na ɩ a dãasɩɛ dẽme a Nãaŋmɩn na de nie ir, sɩn nɩ 'lɔ 'mantaa di tɩ nyũ wʊn wa ir a kũu pɔ baar.
'Lɔ lɛ kpãkpãan sɩ ɩka sɩ mʊɔl 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ ɩka 'lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn ir ka wʊ ɩ a vʊɛ nɩ a kpĩisɩ 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ.
'Lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ba jaa 'yɛr a wʊ 'yɛr ɩka, nɩrɛ jaa wa sɔɔ de wʊ, wʊn nyɛn yelbier vɛ̃ kʊfʊ tu a wʊ yuor pɔ.”
Lɛ a Pita na chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ a anyãna, ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa kpɛ a bala jaa na wõnõ a 'yɛr nyãna.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bala na sɔɔ de na tu a Pita wa, nɛɛ 'maa ba naa a lɛ ban nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na pʊr a wʊ Sɩɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ.
A ba wõ ban 'yɛrɛ kɔkɔyor na ba pɛɛrɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn. Ka a Pita pãa 'yɛr,
“Nɩrɛ na tʊ̃ɔ ŋmaa a nɩbɛ banyãna sɔr ka ba ta so a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ ɛ? Ba mɩ nyɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nɩtãa a sɩn.”
Wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba naa ka ba so a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ nɩ Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor, a ba pãa sʊɔr a Pita ka wʊ be a ba sɛ̃ bãlãa.
A nɩtʊ̃nsɩ nɩ a yɛɛr na be a Judiya wõ naa ɩka a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, mɩ sɔɔn a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr.
Lɛ a Pita na wa lɩɛb chen a Jerusalɛm a bala na ŋmaa a yʊɔr tɩ sɔɔl mii 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ 'yɛrɛ,
“Fʊ ben chen a bala na ba ŋmaa a yʊɔr yir tɩ lɔ̃ɔ din ba wɛ?”
Ka a Pita pãa piel mana a lɛ jaa na ɩ na wʊ kʊ ba,
“N ben a Jopa tẽe pɔ naa sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka a wa ɩ ma jaa de dee, ka n nyɛ nyɛfʊ kɔ̃ɔ. N nyɛn bʊ̃kɔ̃ɔ fɩka fɔkpɛ̃ɛ ban tur bar ka wʊ yi saaju suu na wʊ gbũ jiir anaar ka wʊ suu wa ara a be ɩn be.
Be lɛ n muul kaa naa nyɛ dʊ̃gbɛɛ anaar jaa bʊrɔ na be ka a wɛr pɔ, mɔdʊ̃n, bʊ̃vʊʊrsɩ lɔ̃ɔn a lubil.
Ka n wõ kɔkɔr na 'yɛr, ‘Pita ir na fʊ kʊ 'wɔb.’
Ka n haa 'yɛr, ‘Kai, n Soro bon jaa na ɩ dɛɛr na ba vɩɛlɛ ɛ, ba kpɛ n nɛɛ pɔ jaa ɛ.’
Ka a kɔkɔr lɛ 'yɛr yi a saaju go, ‘Ta bʊɔl bon jaa Nãaŋmɩn na maal a wʊ vɩɛlɛ bʊ̃dɛɛr ɛ.’
A anyãna ɩ naa nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ gbɛɛ ata tɩ lɛ tɔɔ a jaa don be a saaju go.
“Ajienaa, ka a ɩ a nɩbɛ ata ban tʊ̃ a n sɛ̃ na yi Sisariya mɩ tãn a yir 'lɔ pɔ ɩn kpɩɛrɛ dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr kʊ ma ka n tu ba chen naa taa baala ɛ. Maa nɩ a yɛɛr ayʊɔb banyãna lɛ 'mataa chen na sɩ tɩ kpɛ a daba yir.
A wʊ man kʊ sɩ a lɛ a malaka na wa a wʊ yir wa 'yɛr, ‘Tʊ̃ nɩbɛ a Jopa ka ba tɩ bʊɔl daba na di Simon ban lɛ bʊɔlɔ Pita.
'Lɔ lɛ na waan 'yɛr wa 'yɛr kʊ fʊ ka a fʊ̃ʊ nɩ a fʊ yir dẽme ba jaa tu a 'yɛr 'lɔ pɔ nyɛ faafʊ.’
Ala lɛ ka n piel a 'yɛr naa 'yɛrɛ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa a ba sɛ̃ a lɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ wa a sɩ sɛ̃ a pielfʊ.
Ka n pãa tɩɛrtɔ a lɛ a sɩ Soro na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, ‘Jɔɔn den kʊ̃ɔ son, tɩchɛ yɩn 'lɔ Nãaŋmɩn na den a wʊ Sɩɛ son yɩ.’
Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kʊ ba, a kʊfʊ bʊ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ kʊ sɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ sɩn sɔɔ de a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto, maa mɩ nɩ ana, na ŋmaa Nãaŋmɩn sɔr?”
Ban wõ a anyãna, baa lɛ haa nɛɛ ɛ, tɩ pɛɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ, “Nãaŋmɩn pãa yuon sɔr kʊ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka ban lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr nyɛ nyɛvʊr.”
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ban kʊ a Sɩteven ka a pupuorbo bamɩne yɛ̃yɛl tɩ yi Fonisiya, Sipurusɩ nɩ Antiok, na ba mana a 'yɛr kʊrɔ a Juu nɩbɛ tɛɛ.
Ka a pupuorbo bamɩne na yi a Sipurusɩ nɩ a Sirenɩ, chen a Antiok na ba mɩ tɩ piel 'yɛrɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã kʊrɔ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ.
A sɩ Soro nũu dɔ̃ɔ pʊɔ ba ka a nɩyɔɔ dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ de na ba lɩɛb turo a sɩ Soro.
Ka a 'yɛr nyã lo a pupuorbo na be a Jerusalɛm toor pɔ, a ba ir Banabasɩ tʊ̃ a be Antiok.
Wʊn tɩ ta nyɛ a lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na wãɛ ba, nʊ̃ɔ kpɛ wʊ naa ka wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ãkpɛ̃ɔ tɩ 'yɛr, ka ba ara nɩ yelmãɛ nɩ a ba nyãa wʊ jaa kʊ a sɩ Soro.
Banabasɩ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ nɩsʊ̃ na sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na wʊ tara sɔɔfʊ na wʊ mɩ tɔɔ nɩyɔɔ waan a ba wa turo a sɩ Soro.
Ala puor lɛ ka a Banabasɩ pãa yɩ a be tu Tasusɩ tɩ bʊɔrɔ a Sɔɔl.
Wʊn tɩ nyɛ wʊ, ba lɩɛb wa Antiok na ba be be yuon gbul, ka a Banabasɩ naa Sɔɔl wile a nɩyɔɔ bala. Be a Antiok lɛ a pupuorbo nyɛ a yuor, “Kɩrɩsɩto turbo.”
A sɔ̃ɔ nyãna lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ yi be a Jerusalɛm wa Antiok.
A ba ãsʊɔ yuor na di Agabus ir ara, ka Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kpɛ wʊ a wʊ 'yɛr, “Kɔ̃kpɛ̃ɛ na lon a Worom wɛr wʊ jaa.” A kɔ̃ nyãna wa lo naa a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a Kɩlaudiyus na di a nãa.
A poturbo banyãna mɔ̃ naa na ba ir bʊ̃kɔ̃ɔ lɛ a ba fɔ̃ɔ na jã na ba sʊ̃ʊn a yɛɛr bala na be a Judiya.
Ban wa ir a kʊfʊ anyãna, Banabasɩ nɩ a Sɔɔl lɛ ba tʊ̃n a ba tɩ kʊ a nɩbɛrɛ.
A sɔ̃ɔ nyãna lɛ a Nãa Hɛrɔd nyɔɔr a pupuorbo bamɩne na wʊn ge.
Wʊ vɛ̃ naa ka ba ŋmaa Jemesɩ na ɩ a Jɔɔn yɛbɛ ju.
A Hɛrɔd nyɛn a lɛ ka a pɛl a Juu nɩbɛ pʊɔ, ka wʊ nyɔɔ a Pita mɩ. A anyãna ɩ naa a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban tara a Paanʊ̃kõo Lɔ̃ɔfʊ.

Wʊn nyɔɔ a Pita a lɛ, a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ lɛ wʊ tɩ pɔɔ wʊ, tɩ na wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ sojasɩ jiir anaar ka ba jʊrɔ taa kaara nɩ wʊ. Bojũu wʊ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka a Gõl Bar Difʊ wʊ po baar tɩchɛ ka wʊ tɔɔr a wʊ 'yɛr ka nɩrɛ jaa nyɛ.
Lɛ lɛ ba gu a Pita be a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a pupuorbiir mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʊrɔ wʊ.

A tãsɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a wɛr na chaar ka a Hɛrɔd na vɛ̃ ka ba waan a Pita ka wʊ tɔɔr a wʊ 'yɛr, bɔ̃jɔrsɩ ayi lɛ ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a Pita gbɛb sojasɩ ayi ka wʊ be a ba sãlsɔɔ gã guro, ka a sojasɩ bamɩne ara a pɔɔfʊ die dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ gu.

Ajienaa lɛ a sɩ Soro malaka wa kpɛ ara a wʊ sɛ̃ be a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ, ka a die wʊ jaa chaar. Ka a malaka ŋme a Pita jaa 'mɛ 'mɛ 'mɛ, sãɩ wʊ 'yɛr, “Pɔɔ fɔɔ jaa ir,” ka a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ for a Pita nũ'yɔ̃ɔ pɔ lo.
Be lɛ a malaka 'yɛr kʊ a Pita, “Su a fuu nɩ a nafɔbɔ na fʊ 'mɔɔ a fɔbaa vaar na fʊ turo nɩ ma.” Ka a Pita ɩ a lɛ a malaka na 'yɛr.
Pita tu wʊn a lɛ tɩ yin a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ, tɩchɛ nɩbir ba yuo wʊ a wʊ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a lɛ a malaka na 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ maala ɩn sɩrɛ ɛ, wʊ tɩɛr man tãa jãn lɛ wʊ jãna.

Ba tɩ yin a dɔ̃dɔr dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ pɔ, na ba lɛ tɩ yi a dɔ̃dɔr ayi sʊɔ pɔ, tɩ pãa ta a yõo dɔ̃dɔr a kur pãn na pɔɔ. Ban wa ta a wʊ yuo wʊ yõ a ba yi. A malaka tara na a Pita den a sɔr dẽdẽe ãsʊɔ chiin bãlãa tɩ bar wʊ tɩ chen ajienaa.
Ka Pita tɩɛr pãa yuo a wʊ 'yɛr, “Pʊ̃pãanyã n bɔ̃ɔn naa an ba ɩ baal ɛ, ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn lɛ tʊ̃ a wʊ malaka a wʊ wa 'loo ma faa a Hɛrɔd nũu pɔ, nɩ a lɛ jaa a Juu nɩbɛ na tɩɛr ɩka ba ge ma.”
A anyãna wʊn wa tɩɛr yuo, wʊ chen a Mɛɛr na ɩ a Jɔɔn Maakɩ ma yir, be lɛ a pupuorbiir yɔɔ lɔ̃ɔ taa sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʊrɔ wʊ.
Pita wa kpoor a yõo dɔ̃dɔr pãn, ka a gbãgbaa pɔɔbile ban bʊɔlɔ Woroda chen a pãn yuofʊ jie.
Wʊn wa wõ ka a ɩ Pita kɔkɔr lɛ ka a nʊ̃ɔ kpɛ wʊ tɩ põn bar, waa yuo a pãn ɛ, tɩ lɩɛb jo kpɛ a die pɔ tɩ 'yɛrɛ, “Pita lɛ be a yõo dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ!”
A ba tãn wʊ pĩpĩi bar tɩ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Gelfʊ baal lɛ kpɛ fʊ!” Tɩ wʊ chɛnɛ mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir 'yɛrɛ ɩka sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, ka ba 'yɛr, “A wʊ malaka tɔ̃ɔ lɛ.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita chɛnɛ kpooro a pãn, ka ba tɩ yuo nyɛ ka a ɩ 'lɔ lɛ ka a nɛɛ 'maa ba.
Ka a Pita wɩlwɩl ba a nũu a ba bar gɔ̃n tɩchɛ ka wʊ man a lɛ a sɩ Soro na yin wʊ a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ. Wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba ɩka ba tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a Jemesɩ nɩ a yɛɛr, na wʊ bar ba tɩ yi chen jiyuo.
A wɛr na chaar bibio, ka a sojasɩ ɩ chĩcham na ba sʊrɔ taa, “Bo lɛ na tara a Pita?”
Hɛrɔd vɛ̃n ka ba yɔbɔ wʊ faa na baa nyɛ wʊ ɛ, na wʊ kpãkpãan a sojasɩ mɩ faa tɩ 'yɛr ɩka ba kʊ ba. Ka a Hɛrɔd pãa yi a Judiya na wʊ chen a Sisariya na wʊ tɩ jãnɛ a be bãlãa.

A Hɛrɔd dɔ̃ɔ tara a Tire nɩbɛ nɩ a Sidon nɩbɛ nɩ jɛɛr, ka ba nyɛtaa nɛɛ na wa a nãa 'maalfʊ jie. Blastus na ɩ a nãa gbãgbaa wʊn 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sɛ̃ lɛ ba tʊ̃ ɩka wʊ 'maal a nãa kʊ ba bojũu a wʊ wɛr pɔ lɛ ba nyɛrɛ a ba bʊ̃diir.
Bɩbir kɔ̃ɔ, a Nãa Hɛrɔd sun a wʊ nafɔɔr jãnɛ nɩ a nãa dakɔɔ ju, na wʊn 'yɛr 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ.
Ka a nɩbɛ ŋmiere chɛlsɩ 'yɛrɛ, “Ŋmɩn kɔkɔr lɛ a nyãna na 'yɛrɛ, nɩrɛ ba lɛ ɛ.”
Ajienaa lɛ ka a sɩ Soro malaka wa 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ baal bojũu waa de a 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, ka a bufulo 'wɔb a nyaba ŋma ka wʊ kpi.
Tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr chɛnɛ yaara.
Lɛ a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sɔɔl na wa tʊ̃ a ba tʊ̃mɔ̃ baar a Jerusalɛm, ba tara naa Jɔɔn Maakɩ 'mataa chiin.

A Nãaŋmɩn puorbo bala na be a Antiok, ba tara naa bamɩne ka ba 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ka a bamɩne mɩ ɩ wiwiilbe, Banabasɩ nɩ Simeon ban bʊɔlɔ Nɩsɔɔlaa, Lusiyusɩ na yi a Sirenɩ tẽe pɔ, nɩ Manayen ban dɔ̃ɔ 'mataa guol a Nãa Hɛrɔd, nɩ a Sɔɔl.
A lɛ ban gal a kɔ̃ na ba sʊɔrɔ a sɩ Soro, ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ ir a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sɔɔl kʊ ma ka ba tʊ̃ a tʊ̃mɔ̃ 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɩn bʊɔl ba.”
A lɛ ban gal a kɔ̃ ba di bon jaa ɛ, ba dɔɔl ban a nuur sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn kʊ ba tɩ bar ba sɔr ka ba chen.
A nɩbɛ ayi banyãna den a sɔr ka a Nãaŋmɩn de ba nie suun be a Selusiya na ba tɩ kpɛ a gboro chiine a Sipurusɩ.
Lɛ ban tɩ ta a Salamis, ba mʊɔl a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr a be a Juu nɩbɛ lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir. Ka a Jɔɔn Maakɩ be a ba sɛ̃ na wʊ sʊ̃nɔ̃ ba.
Ba yɔn a man dõdol wʊ jaa tɩ ta Pafos, be lɛ ba tuor a Juu nɩrɛ jɩbʊrɔ ãsʊɔ na ma ŋmara jirsɩ ka a wʊ yuor di Bar-Yesu.
Wʊ dɔ̃ɔ be a Segiyusɩ Pɔɔlusɩ na kaara a dõdol na ɩ yɛ̃ sʊɔ, a tẽkaara nyãna lɛ bʊɔl a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sɔɔl bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ wõ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr.
Tɩchɛ a Elimasɩ na ɩ a jɩbʊrɔ a wʊ yuor par lɛ a lɛ nɛ, ŋmaan a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sɔɔl sɔr ba bʊɔrɔ ɩka a tẽkaara nyãna wʊ sɔɔ a Yesu ɛ.
Ka a Sɔɔl nyãna ban bʊɔlɔ a Pɔɔl na sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kaara a Elimasɩ jaa tãɩɩ tɩ wa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ.
“Fʊ ɩn Satan bie na fʊ ɩ bʊ̃sʊ̃n a jaa dɔ̃dɔ̃mɔ̃. A fʊ pʊɔ sɛɛn naa bɛlfʊ nɩ bɛlfʊ 'yɛr bie, fʊ kʊ̃ bar a jir fʊn bʊɔrɔ ɩka fʊ sɔ̃ɔn a sɩ Soro sɔr dẽdẽe bar ɛ?
Pʊ̃pãanyã a sɩ Soro na ŋme fʊ naa ka fʊ jɔ̃ɔ tɩ tãn sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ, fʊ kʊ̃ lɛ tʊ̃ɔ nyɛ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ chãa ɛ.” Ajienaa lɛ a Elimasɩ nɩbie de, ka a libe pɔɔ wʊ, ka wʊ bɔɔlɔ bʊɔrɔ nɩrɛ na nyɔɔ wʊ nũu.
A lɛ a tẽkaara na nyɛ a lɛ na ɩ, wʊ sɔɔn de, bojũu nɛɛ 'maa wʊ naa a lɛ ban wile a sɩ Soro yele.
Pɔɔl nɩ a wʊ taaba kpɛ̃n a gboro yi a Pafos chen be a Perga na be a Pamfiliya be lɛ a Jɔɔn Maakɩ tɩ bar ba tɩ lɩɛb chen a Jerusalɛm.
Ka ba yi a Perga chen Antiok na gbʊr a Pisidiya, a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir daar ba kpɛ̃n a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie na ba tɩ jãnɛ.
Ban wa kar a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ nɩ a ala a Nãaŋmɩn 'Yɛ'yɛrbɛ na sɛb baar, a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie nɩbɛrɛ sʊʊr naa Pɔɔl nɩ a wʊ taaba, “Yɛɛr, yɩn tara 'yɛr na sʊ̃ʊn a nɩbɛ sɩ kʊ yɩn sɔr, yɩ 'yɛr.”
Ka a Pɔɔl vaa ir wɩlwɩl ba a nũu tɩ 'yɛrɛ, “Isɩral nɩbɛ woɩ, nɩ a yɩn na ba ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ɛ, na puoro a Nãaŋmɩn, yɩ chɛlɛ a lɛ ɩn 'yɛrɛ.
A Nãaŋmɩn nyã a sɩn Isɩral nɩbɛ na puoro lɛ dɔ̃ɔ chɛl ir a sɩ sãakpãmɩne na wʊ vɛ̃ ka ba dɔɔ paal be a Ijipitɩ pɔ. Kpɛ̃ɔ lɛ wʊ de faan ba yin a paal 'lɔ pɔ,
na wʊ bɔ̃ɔ tara ba be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ yuom lɩjaayi (40).
Paal bʊrsɩ ayopõi lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn dii bar be a Kanaan tɩ de a wɛr 'lɔ kʊ a wʊ nɩbɛ ka a ɩ ba sofʊ.
“A anyãna a jaa lɔ̃ɔn taa ɩ yuom kɔɔr anaar dɔɔl lɩjaayi nɩ pie (450). A anyã puor, Nãaŋmɩn kʊ ban 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ tɩ tãn a Samuwɛl na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ sɔ̃ɔ.
Be lɛ ka a nɩbɛ pãa wa sʊɔr Samuwɛl a wʊ bɔ nãa kʊ ba, ka Nãaŋmɩn de a Sɔɔl na ɩ a Kɩsɩ bidaba kʊ ba na ɩ a Benjamin bal nɩrɛ a wʊ ɩ a ba nãa yuom lɩjaayi (40).
Wʊn wa ir a Sɔɔl bar, wʊ den a David ka wʊ ɩ a ba nãa. Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr naa, ‘N nyɛn a David na ɩ a Jesɩ bidaba ka a n ãgãn 'maa, wʊn maal yele a jaa ɩn bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ ɩ.’
“A Nãa David nyãna bal par pɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn ir a Fafaara Yesu kʊ a Isɩral nɩbɛ nɩtãa lɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ.
Sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka a Yesu wa, Jɔɔn mʊɔlɔ naa a tɩɛr lɩɛbfʊ 'yɛr na wʊ suoro a Isɩral nɩbɛ ba jaa a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ.
Lɛ a Jɔɔn na wa baaraa a wʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃, wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, ‘An lɛ yɩ tɩɛr ɩka n ɩ naa? N ba ɩ a 'lɔ yɩn tɩɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊ ben a n puor waara, n ba sɛɛ ɩka n for a wʊ nafɔbɔ ɛ.’
“Maa yɛɛr na ɩ Abraham yɔn nɩ a yɩn na joro a Nãaŋmɩn dãbãɛ na ɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, sɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a faafʊ nyãna wa.
Bojũu, a nɩbɛ na be a Jerusalɛm nɩ a ba nɩbɛrɛ ba chɛl a Yesu ɛ, na ba 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ 'yɛr ka a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na sɛb a ba ma kara a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir jaa ɩ.
Ba gban ba dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ yele jaa na wiil ɩka wʊ sɛɛn kũu ɛ, tɩ ba sʊɔr a Pilate ɩka wʊ vɛ̃ ka ba kʊ a Yesu.
Ban wa maal a lɛ jaa ban sɛb a wʊ yele baar, a wʊ poturbo yɔɔ wʊn a daa ju na ba tɩ ũu a yaa pɔ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn ir wʊ a kũu pɔ.
A ber yɔɔ na wa po, a bala wʊn dɔ̃ɔ lɔ̃ɔ yɔn yin a Galilee tɩ tãn a Jerusalɛm, ba nyɛ wʊ naa, bala lɛ ɩ a dãasɩɛ dẽme a pʊ̃pãanyã kʊ a sɩ nɩbɛ.
“Sɩn 'yɛrɛ naa a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyãna kʊrɔ yɩ, a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ kʊ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne.
Nãaŋmɩn maal kʊ a sɩn na ɩ a yɔn a lɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ kʊ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne, na wʊ sãɩ a Yesu yin a kũu pɔ. Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Yiel Gãma ayi pɔ, ‘Fʊ ɩ naa a maa bie, dɩna n lɩɛb a fʊ sãa.’
Lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na sãɩ wʊ a kũu pɔ nɩ nyã, wʊ kʊ̃ lɛ kpi pʊ̃ɔ go ɛ, a 'yɛr nyãna lɛ wʊ 'yɛr, ‘Ɩn kʊ yɩ naa a yelsʊ̃n nɩ a sʊ̃ʊfʊ 'lɔ ɩn tɩr a nɛɛ kʊ a David.’
A jie ãsʊɔ lɛ 'yɛr ɩka, ‘Fʊ kʊ̃ vɛ̃ ka a fʊ Chɛchɛ Sʊɔ kpɛ pʊ̃ɔfʊ jie ɛ.’
“A Nãa David na wa tʊ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʊɔrɔ a wʊ sɔ̃ɔ, wʊ kpi naa ka ba ũu wʊ be a wʊ sãamɩne yar par, ka a wʊ ãgãn pʊ̃ɔ.
Tɩchɛ a 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na sãɩ a kũu pɔ, ba kpɛ pʊ̃ɔfʊ jie ɛ.
“A lɛ jũu n yɛɛr, n bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ka a tu naa a Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ ka ba mʊɔl yelbier vɛ̃ kʊfʊ kʊ yɩ.
A tu naa a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɩka nɩrɛ jaa na sɔɔ de, Nãaŋmɩn na faa wʊn yin a ala a jaa a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ na kʊ̃ naa tʊ̃ɔ faa wʊ ɛ.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʊ̃, ka a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr taa wa a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ.
‘Nyɛ a yɩn na kpɛrɛ, yɩ bʊ̃bʊr na yɩ wɛ, bojũu ɩn maal yele kɔ̃ɔ a yɩ sɔ̃ɔ yɩn ba be na sɔɔ de ɛ, ala ɩ nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ gba 'yɛr kʊ yɩ.’ ”
Lɛ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ na wa yire a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie, a nɩbɛ lɛ sʊɔr ba naa ɩka ba lɛ wa a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar wa 'yɛr a 'yɛr nyãna go.
Lɛ a lɔ̃ɔfʊ dẽme na wa yaar, a Juu nɩbɛ yɔɔ jie nɩ a bala na lɩɛb a Juu nɩbɛ turo naa Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ na ba bʊrɔ nɩ ba kpãkpãana ba 'yɛrɛ ka ba mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ nyã pɔ.
A Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir na lɛ wa ta, a tẽdẽme yɔɔ jie tɩ lɔ̃ɔn taa na wõ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr.
Lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ na nyɛ a nɩyɔɔ ba nyãna, nyuur kpɛ ba naa ka ba tʊrɔ chɩrɛ nɩ lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛrɛ.

Ka a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ ba jo ba dãbãɛ ɛ, tɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Sɩn 'lɔ, sɩn den nie 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊ yɩ. Tɩchɛ yɩn ben tɔr bar na yaa kaa a yɩ mãɛ ɩka yɩ sɛɛn naa a nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, pʊ̃pãanyã 'lɔ sɩn lɩɛb chen a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ sɛ̃.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a sɩ Soro kpãkpãan sɩ ɩka sɩ ɩ, ‘Ɩn maal fʊ naa ka fʊ ɩ chãa kʊ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka fʊn chiin a faafʊ 'yɛr tɩ tãn a tẽe baaraa.’ ”
A lɛ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, na wõ a 'yɛr ba pʊɔ pɛl naa ka ba de 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ kʊ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr, ka a bala jaa a Nãaŋmɩn na ir ɩka ba nyɛ a nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, sɔɔ de.
Ka a sɩ Soro 'yɛr yaar a paal 'lɔ wʊ jaa.
Tɩchɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ dam a pɔbɔ bala na turo a Juu nɩbɛ puorfʊ tɩ ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, nɩ a tẽe nɩdierbe 'yɔ̃ɔ ka ba dii a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ bar a paal 'lɔ pɔ.
Ka ba pãpã a ba gbɛɛ tã-uul 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ka a wiil ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na ge ba naa tɩ na ba chen a Ikoniyum.
Ka a nʊ̃ɔ kpɛ a poturbo bala ka ba sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
Be a Ikoniyum lɛ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ ma chen a Juu nɩbɛ lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie, be lɛ ba man a 'yɛr jaa nɛ nɛ nɛ ka a nɩyɔɔ bamɩne na ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, sɔɔ de a 'yɛr.
Tɩchɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bala na ba sɔɔ de ɛ, dam a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, sɔ̃ɔ a ba tɩɛr ka baa bara a yɛɛr ɛ.
Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ jɛ̃n a be na ba kor bãlãa, na ba 'yɛrɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr ba joro dãbãɛ ɛ, ka a sɩ Soro mãɛ wiil ɩka a wʊ wãɛfʊ 'yɛr ɩn yelmãɛ na wʊ sʊ̃ʊ ba a ba tʊ̃ɔ tʊ̃ yelwiilsɩ nɩ nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃.
Ka a tẽdẽme ŋma jiir ayi, a bamɩne pʊɔ a Juu nɩbɛ, ka a bamɩne mɩ pʊɔ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ.
Nɛchɩrɛ lon a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ nɩ a ba nɩbɛrɛ chara pɔ, ka ban maal Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ dɛɛr lɔb ba nɩ kʊsɩbɛ.
Tɩchɛ a ba bɔ̃ɔn na ba jo chen a tẽn anyãna na be a Likoniya paal pɔ, Lɩstɩra nɩ a Debi nɩ a tẽn ala na jilʊ̃ a be.
Be lɛ ba chɛnɛ mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir na ba mʊɔlɔ a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ.
A be a Lɩstɩra, dagbɛrɛ kɔ̃ɔ ben be ban lɔ̃ɔ dɔɔn ka waa chen kaa jaa ɛ.
Wʊ chɛlɛ naa lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛrɛ ka a Pɔɔl kaa wʊ jaa tãɩɩ nyɛ na wʊ bɔ̃ɔn wʊn tara sɔɔfʊ na sa.
A wʊ bʊɔl a daba 'yɛr, “Ir ara naa fʊ gbɛɛ.” Ka a daba vaa ir na wʊ piel chiine.
Lɛ a nɩbɛ na wa nyɛ a lɛ a Pɔɔl na ɩ, ka ba ŋme chɛlma nɩ a Likoniya kɔkɔr pɔ, “A ŋmɩmɛ lɩɛb nɩbɛ suu wa a sɩ sɛ̃!”
Ba bʊɔlɔ naa a Banabasɩ “Jeyusɩ,” na ba bʊɔlɔ a Pɔɔl mɩ “Hɛmɩsɩ,” bojũu 'lɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a 'yɛ'yɛrɛ.
Ka a Jeyusɩ nyã puorfʊ yir na dɔ̃ɔ ara a tẽe kõkoor bɔɔrloro waan nɩ nadai nɩ a vapuulsɩ bojũu 'lɔ nɩ a nɩyɔɔ bala bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka ba lo bɔɔr kʊ ba.
Tɩchɛ lɛ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ, Banabasɩ nɩ a Pɔɔl na wa wõ a lɛ, ba tɔɔn a ba fuusɩ chɩɛr tɩ jo kpɛ be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ tɩ tãna,

“Nɩbɛ, bãa lɛ yɩ maala a lɛ? Sɩn mɩ ɩn nɩbɛ, nɩsaalba a yɩ kaar. Sɩn waan naa a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã wa kʊ yɩ, na sɩ 'yɛrɛ yɩ ɩka, yɩ lɩɛb yi a yelpɔrsɩ anyãna pɔ, tɩ turo a Nãaŋmɩn vʊr. 'Lɔ lɛ maal a saaju, nɩ a tẽe, nɩ a man kpɛ̃ɛ, nɩ bon jaa na be be.
A kõr jaa wʊ dɔ̃ɔ bar ka nɩrɛ jaa turo a wʊ sɔr.
Tɩchɛ wʊ ma wiil a lɛ wʊn ɩ maal vɩla sʊɔ, na wʊ ma wiil a wʊ maal vɩla vɛ̃ ka a saa yi saaju waara, ka a bʊ̃bʊɔrsɩ sɔ̃ɔ mɩ be be. Wʊ ma kʊ yɩn a bʊ̃diir yɔɔ ka yɩ pʊɔ pɛl.”
A 'yɛr nyãna gba ban 'yɛr, tɩchɛ a chɛnɛ na ɩ tuo ka ban ŋmaa a nɩbɛ sɔr ka ban bar a bɔɔr lofʊ.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne na pãa yi a Antiok nɩ a Ikoniyum wa tɔ̃n a nɩyɔɔ bala 'yɔ̃ɔ ka ba lɔb a Pɔɔl nɩ kʊsɩbɛ vu yin bar a tẽe kõkoor tɩɛr man tãa wʊ kpi naa.
Tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo tɩ ŋmaa jilʊ̃ wʊ ara nɩ ka wʊ ir kpɛ a tẽe pɔ. A wɛr na wa chaar ka 'lɔ naa Banabasɩ chen a Debi.
Be lɛ ba tɩ mʊɔl a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ, ka a nɩyɔɔ jaa sɔɔ turo a Yesu. A ba pãa lɩɛb chen a Lɩstɩra, Ikoniyum nɩ a Antiok,
tɩ mʊlɔ a pupuorbiir 'yɔ̃ɔn ba ãkpãɛn ka ba ara nɩ yelmãɛ a sɔɔfʊ pɔ, na ba 'yɛrɛ, “Dɔɔyɛ yɔɔ pɔ lɛ sɩn tu tɩ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ pɔ.”
Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ ir nɩdierbe kʊ ba a ba kaara a puorfʊ dẽme ãsʊɔ jaa. Ba gal kɔ̃ na ba sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn tɩ de ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro ban sɔɔ nũu pɔ.
Ba kpɛ̃n tala a Pisidiya, ba wa ta naa Pamfiliya,
ban wa mʊɔl a 'yɛr a Perga, ba suun chen be a Ataliya.
Be a Ataliya lɛ ba yi tɩ kpɛ a gboro chen a Antiok. Be lɛ ba dɔ̃ɔ de ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nũu pɔ ka wʊ sʊ̃ʊ ba, a ba tʊ̃ɔ a tʊ̃mɔ̃ a be tʊ̃ baar.
Ban tɩ tara jaa lɛ ba bʊɔl a pupuorbiir lɔ̃ɔ taa na ba man a lɛ jaa a Nãaŋmɩn na de ba tʊ̃n nɩ a lɛ mɩ wʊn yuo sɔr kʊ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka ba tʊ̃ɔ sɔɔ de.
Ba jɛ̃n a be kor bãlãa nɩ a poturbo.
Nɩbɛ bamɩne yin be a Judiya suun wa a Antiok wa wile a yɛɛr 'yɛrɛ, “Yɩn baa sɔɔ ka ba ŋmaa yɩ a yʊɔr nɩtãa lɛ a Mosesɩ na bin ɛ, yɩ kʊ̃ nyɛ faafʊ ɛ.”

A anyãna vɛ̃ naa ka a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ nɩ a nɩbɛ mĩi 'yɔ̃ɔ taa ka a ɩ nɛchɩrɛ. Be lɛ a ba ir Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ nɩ a pupuorbiir bamɩne 'yɔ̃ɔ ɩka ba chen a Jerusalɛm tɩ nyɛ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a 'yɛr nyãna.
A pupuorbiir na wa bar ba a sɔr, ba chen tɩ yi a Fonisiya nɩ a Samariya na ba man a lɛ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, na lɩɛb puoro a Nãaŋmɩn. Ka a yɛɛr ba jaa pʊɔ pɛl nɩ a 'yɛr nyã.
Ban wa ta Jerusalɛm, a pupuorbiir nɩ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ de ban nuur ayi, ka ba man a lɛ jaa a Nãaŋmɩn na de ba tʊ̃n.
Ka a pupuorbiir bamɩne na chɛnɛ tara a Farasee wiilfʊ ir ara tɩ 'yɛr, “A nɩyor banyãna, a sɛɛ naa ka ban ŋma a ba yɔɩ na ba tu a lɛ a Mosesɩ na bin.”
A nɩtʊ̃nsɩ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ lɔ̃ɔn taa na ban guor a 'yɛr nyãna.

A lɛ ban mana taa tɩ ta sɔ̃ɔ, Pita ir 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɛɛr, yɩ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn ir man a yɩ pɔ, ka a bala na ba sɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, mɩ na wõ a faafʊ 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ 'yɛr yi a n nɛɛ pɔ, na ba sɔɔ de.
Nãaŋmɩn na bɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ jaa nyãa lɛ wiil ɩka wʊ sɔɔn de ba na wʊ kʊ ba a wʊ Sɩɛ nɩtãa lɛ wʊn kʊ sɩ.
Waa maal a sɩn nɩ a bala ka sɩ tɛɛ taa ɛ, wʊ pɛɛn a ba nyãa ban sɔɔ jũu.
A lɛ jũu, bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ mʊɔrɔ ɩka yɩ bɛɛr Nãaŋmɩn kaa, na yɩ tuo a poturbo tuor a sɩ sãakpãmɩne na ba dɔ̃ɔ tʊ̃ɔ tuo ɛ?
Kai, sɩn sɔɔ naa ɩka a tu naa a sɩ Soro Yesu wãɛfʊ jũu lɛ sɩ nyɛ faafʊ nɩtãa a bala kaar.”
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na duo ɩ jaa gbulo, tɩ chɛlɛ a lɛ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ na mana a yelfɛrsɩ nɩ a nɛ'maa tʊ̃mɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn na de ba tʊ̃n a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bala pɔ.
Ban wa 'yɛr baar ka a Jemesɩ mɩ 'yɛr, “Yɛɛr, yɩ chɛlɛ ka.
Simon man kʊ sɩ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ tɩɛrtɔ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ ɩka wʊn ir nɩbɛ a ba pɔ, kʊ a wʊ mãɛ.
Ka a lɛ na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ nɩ a 'yɛr nyã ɩ yelmãɛ.
‘A anyã puor, ɩn lɩɛb tɩ mɛ a Nãa David yir 'lɔ na lo. Ɩn mɛn a 'lɔ na ŋmɛr, naa lɛ maal wʊ.
Ka a nɩbɛ bala na chɛ pãa na yɔ bɔ a Soro nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ na bʊɔlɔ a n yuor, lɛ lɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr na maal a yele anyãna,’
ka ba bɔ̃ɔn a kõr jaa jaa.
“Maa 'yɛr nɩ nyã ɩka sɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a ɩ tuo kʊ a nɩyor banyãna na lɩɛrɛ waara a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ ɩ a sɩ sɛb kʊ ba ɩka yaa, ba taa dire tɩɩ bon ɛ, na ba taa sɛ̃nɛ ɛ, dʊ̃ɔ na var kpi ba taa ɔɔrɔ ɛ, na ba taa ɔɔrɔ jãɩ ɛ.
Bojũu, lɛ lɛ a Mosesɩ bin a nɛɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ ma mʊɔlɔ a 'yɛr nyãna a tẽn a jaa ka ba mɩ ma kar naa a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir a Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar jaa.”

Ka a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ lɔ̃ɔn a pupuorbiir ba jaa pãa kaa ir nɩbɛ a ba pɔ, ka ban 'matãan a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ tʊ̃ ka ba chen a Antiok. Judas ban bʊɔlɔ Basabasɩ nɩ Silasɩ lɛ ba ir, a nɩbɛ ayi banyãna mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ nɩbɛrɛ pʊɔ a yɛɛr.
Bala lɛ ba tʊ̃n a gãn nyãna, “A sɩn nɩtʊ̃nsɩ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ na ɩ a yɩ yɛɛr puor naa a yɩn na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, na ɩ a sɩ yɛɛr be a Antiok nɩ a Siriya nɩ a Sɩlɩsɩya paal pɔ.
Sɩ wõn a bamɩne na yi a sɩ sɛ̃ sɩn ba kʊ ba sɔr ɛ, tɩ vuro yɩ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ yɩ 'yɛrɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka sɩ jaa sɔɔ ir nɩbɛ bamɩne tʊ̃ ka ban wa a yɩ sɛ̃, 'matãan a sɩ barmɩne Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ,
a nɩbɛ banyãna lɛ sɔɔ kũu a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor jũu.
A lɛ jũu lɛ sɩ tʊ̃n a Judas nɩ a Silasɩ ka ban tɩ man a ba nɛɛ a lɛ sɩn sɛb.
A vɩɛlɛ na kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nɩ a sɩn mɩ sɛ̃, ka sɩ kʊ̃ lɛ tuo yɩ tuor dɔɔl a anyãna ju ɛ.
Yɩ taa dire tɩɩ bon ɛ, yɩ taa ɔɔrɔ jãɩ ɛ, na yɩ taa ɔɔrɔ dʊ̃ɔ na var kpi nʊ̃n ɛ, bɩɩ sɛ̃nɛ ɛ. Yɩ mɔ̃ na yɩ nyɔɔ yɩ mãɛ a yelsɩ anyãna pɔ. Yɩ jɛ̃ vɩla.”
Ban wa bar a Pɔɔl, nɩ a Banabasɩ, nɩ a Judas nɩ a Silasɩ sɔr, ka ba suu chen be a Antiok, be lɛ ba tɩ lɔ̃ɔ taa a bala na puoro ba jaa na ba de a gãn kʊ ba.
A nɩbɛ na wa kar a gãn a 'yɔ̃ɔ ban ãkpãɛn ka ba pʊɔ pɛl.
Judas nɩ a Silasɩ mɩ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ 'yɛr 'yɛr yɔɔ 'yɔ̃ɔn a yɛɛr ãkpãɛn.
Ban wa jɛ̃ a be kor bãlãa, ka a yɛɛr lɛ bar ba sɔr nɩ nyã'maar ka ba lɩɛb chen a bala na tʊ̃ ba sɛ̃.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ jɛ̃ be a Antiok, be lɛ a bala nɩ a ba taaba bamɩne wile tɩ mʊɔlɔ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr.
A mɩn lɛ wa kor bãlãa ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr kʊ a Banabasɩ, “Vɛ̃ ka sɩ lɛ chen tɩ piir a yɛɛr kaa a tẽn ala pɔ sɩn mʊɔl a sɩ Soro 'yɛr na sɩ kaa ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ba irɛ.”
Ka a Banabasɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ de a Jɔɔn Maakɩ ka ba 'mataa chen.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl ba tɩɛr ɩka a ba tara sɔr ɛ, bojũu wʊ dɔ̃ɔ bar ba be a Pamfiliya ba lɛ pɔɔ ba chen a tʊ̃mɔ̃ jie ɛ.
Be lɛ ba tãn tãn taa na ba ŋma dẽdẽme, ka a Banabasɩ de a Jɔɔn Maakɩ na wʊ kpɛ̃n a gboro chiin be a Sipurusɩ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl mɩ ir a Silasɩ ka a yɛɛr de ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro nũu pɔ, ka wʊn sʊ̃ʊ ba.
Wʊ tun a Siriya nɩ a Sɩlɩsɩya 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bala na puoro ãkpãɛn.
Pɔɔl tɩ chen a Debi na wʊ tɩ po chen a Lɩstɩra, be lɛ wʊ tɩ nyɛ a pupuoro ãsʊɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Timoti ka a wʊ ma ɩ Juu nɩrɛ na wʊ puoro, tɩchɛ ka a wʊ sãa ba ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ɛ.
Ka a yɛɛr na be a Lɩstɩra nɩ a Ikoniyum pʊr a Timoti yovɩla.
A Pɔɔl bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ tara wʊ 'mataa chiine na wʊ ŋmaa wʊ a yʊɔr, bojũu a Juu nɩbɛ na kpɩɛrɛ a be bɔ̃ɔn naa a Timoti sãa na ba ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ɛ.
A lɛ ban lʊɔrɔ a tẽn, lɛ mɩ lɛ ba mana kʊrɔ ba lɛ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ nɩ a nɩdierbe na be a Jerusalɛm na 'yɛr bin ka nɩbɛ ba turo.
Ba 'yɔ̃ɔn a pupuorbiir ãkpãɛn ka a nɩbɛ mɩ waara pʊɔrɔ bɩbir jaa.
Pɔɔl nɩ a wʊ taaba tun a Fɩrgɩya nɩ a Galatiya paal pɔ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ŋmaa ba sɔr a ba taa mʊɔlɔ a 'yɛr a be a Asɩya ɛ.
Ban wa gbʊr a Misiya wɛr pɔ, ba ta mʊɔrɔ naa ɩka ba chen a Bitiniya tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ba kʊ ba sɔr ɛ.
A ba vɩɛ a Misiya bar tɩ suu chen be a Toroyas.
A tãsɔɔ lɛ a Pɔɔl nyɛ jãna pɔ, daba na yi Masedonɩya ara sʊɔrɔ wʊ 'yɛrɛ, “Gɔ̃ɔ wa ka a Masedonɩya wa sʊ̃ʊ sɩ.”
Pɔɔl na nyɛ a nyɛfʊ nyãna, sɩ ir chɔɔr a lɛ nɛ na sɩ chen a Masedonɩya, na sɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ bʊɔl sɩ a sɩ tɩ mʊɔl a wʊ 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ kʊ ba.
A Toroyas sɩn yi tɔ̃ɔ kpɛ a gboro a dẽdẽe a lɛ nɛ chen a Samotɩrasɩ, ka a wɛr na wa chaar, sɩ tãn a Neapolis.
Be lɛ sɩ yin gbɛɛ chiin a Filipai, Worom dẽme lɛ dɔ̃ɔ kpɩɛrɛ a be na wʊ mɩ ɩ a Masedonɩya jikpɛ̃ɛ, be lɛ sɩ jãnɛ maal ber aŋmɩnɛ jaa.
A Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar, sɩ yin a tẽe pɔ suu a põn pɔ, be lɛ sɩ tɩɛr ɩka sɩn nyɛn jie ban ma sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn. Sɩ jãnɛ naa be na sɩ piel 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr kʊrɔ pɔbɔ na lɔ̃ɔ a be.
A pɔbɔ banyãna na chɛlɛ ãsʊɔ yuor din Lidiya na yara fɔjɩɩr, na wʊ yi a Tayatira tẽe pɔ, wʊ mɩ puoro naa Nãaŋmɩn. A sɩ Soro yuon a wʊ tɩɛr ka wʊ sɔɔ de a lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛr.
'Lɔ nɩ a wʊ yir dẽme ba jaa na wa so a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, wʊ bʊɔl sɩ naa a sɩ wa a wʊ yir a wʊ wa 'yɛr, “Ala ɩ yɩ sɔɔ naa ɩka n sɔɔn de a sɩ Soro, sɩrɛ jaa yɩ wa jɛ̃ a n yir.” Lɛ lɛ wʊ mʊlɔ sɩ.
Daar kɔ̃ɔ sɩn lɛ chiine a jie 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn sʊɔrfʊ jie, sɩ tuor gbãgbapɔɔbile na tara a sɩdɛɛr na wʊ ma 'yɛrɛ yele na ɩ daar kɔ̃ɔ. A lɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ na wʊ nyɛrɛ libiyɔɔ kʊrɔ a bala na so wʊ.
Ka a pɔɔbile nyãna turo a Pɔɔl na wʊ turo sɩ tãna 'yɛrɛ, “A nɩbɛ banyãna ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na be saaju tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ na ba wile yɩ a faafʊ sɔr.”

Lɛ lɛ a pɔɔbile mar bɩbir jaa ka a Pɔɔl wa vʊʊr faa tɩ lɩɛb 'yɛr kʊ a sɩɛ 'lɔ na be a pɔɔbile pɔ ɩka, “Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor pɔ, n 'yɛr kʊ fʊ ɩka fʊ wa yi a pɔɔbile pɔ.” Ajienaa ka a sɩɛ yi tɩchɛ wʊ bar.
A pɔɔbile sorbo na wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka baa lɛ nyɛrɛ tɔ̃nɔ̃ a pɔɔbile sɛ̃ ɛ, ba nyɔɔn a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ tɔɔ chiin be a daa pɔ a nɩbɛrɛ niem.
Ba chiin ban tɩ kʊ a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ tɩ 'yɛr, “A nɩbɛ banyãna ɩ naa a Juu nɩbɛ na ba wa kpɛ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sɩ a tẽe.
Ba tara na yelsɩ kɔ̃ɔ an ba tara sɔr kʊ a sɩn Worom nɩbɛ a sɩn sɔɔ bɩɩ maal ɛ.”
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala ir pʊɔ na baa bara a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ ɛ, ka a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ vɛ̃ ka ba yaar a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ fuusɩ bar tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba fɔb ba.
A lɛ ban wa fɔb ba sɛɛ, ba nyɔɔr ban 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ, tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a 'lɔ na guro a pɔɔfʊ die, a wʊ bɔ̃ɔ kaara ba.
Wʊn wõ a nɩtɔ̃, wʊ tɩɛ ban 'yɔ̃ɔ a die 'lɔ na be a sãlsɔɔ tɩ lũ a ba gbɛɛ mar daa.
A tãsɔɔ bãɩn lɛ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn, na ba yiele nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn yiel, ka a ba taaba ban lɔ̃ɔ pɔɔn ba chɛlɛ.
Ajienaa ka a tẽe dam kpɛ̃ɔ jaa, ka a pɔɔfʊ yir par kparaa mɩ dam. Ka a pɔɔfʊ der dɔ̃dɔɩ yuo yuor a jaa, ka nɩrɛ jaa bɔ̃jɔrma ban lũn wʊ for for.
Ka a 'lɔ na guro a pɔɔfʊ die jɛɔ ir na wʊ nyɛ a lɛ a pɔɔfʊ der dɔ̃dɔɩ na yuor, ka wʊ vʊ̃ɔ sɔɔ ɩka wʊ kʊ̃n wʊ mãɛ, bojũu wʊ man tãa a pɔɔfʊ dẽme yin jo.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl tãn, “Ta ge fʊ mãɛ ɛ, sɩ jaa ben ka.”
A wʊ bʊɔl a ba waan fãtɩn wa kʊ wʊ a wʊ pɔɔ kpɛ̃n be a die pɔ, na wʊ tɩ lo gbur dumo mɩrɛ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ niem.
Tɩ pãa ir tara ba yin tɩ sʊʊr, “Nɩbɛrɛ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ɩn ɩrɛ wa nyɛ faafʊ?”
A ba 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Sɔɔ de a sɩ Soro Yesu, fʊ̃ʊ nɩ a fʊ yir dẽme na nyɛn faafʊ.”
Be lɛ ba pãa 'yɛr a sɩ Soro 'yɛr kʊ wʊ nɩ a bala jaa na be a wʊ yir.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a pɔɔfʊ die guguro de ba yin a tãsɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na wʊ tɩ pɛɛ a ba natɩɛ tɩchɛ a ba mɩ tɔ̃ɔ so a 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ yir dẽme ba jaa a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ.
Ka a pɔɔfʊ die guguro tara ba kpɛ̃n a wʊ yir tɩ maal bʊ̃diir kʊ ba, ka nʊ̃ɔ kpɛ a wʊ yir dẽme, bojũu 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ yir dẽme ba jaa sɔɔn de a Nãaŋmɩn.
Wɛr na wa chaar a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ ir a ba tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ tʊ̃ na ba 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ chen tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a 'lɔ na guro a pɔɔfʊ die ɩka, a wʊ yuo a dɔɔr bala bar.”
Ka a pɔɔfʊ die guguro 'yɛr kʊ a Pɔɔl, “A 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ tʊ̃n ɩka n yuo a fʊ̃ʊ nɩ a Silasɩ bar. A lɛ pʊ̃pãanyã yɩn tʊ̃ɔ chiine, yɩ chiine nɩ nyã'maar.”

Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr kʊ a bala ban tʊ̃, “Chãa pɔ jaa lɛ ba vɛ̃ a ba fɔb sɩ, baa tɔɔr a sɩ 'yɛr ɛ, sɩ gba ɩ naa a Worom dẽme tɩ ba 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ. Pʊ̃pãanyã a ba lɛ bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba sɔɔl yuo sɩ bar? Bala mãɛ ba wa yuo sɩ bar.”
A tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ na tɩ man a lɛ kʊ a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ, ban wa wõ ɩka a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ ɩ naa Worom dẽme, dãbãɛ kpɛ ba naa.
Ka a bala mãɛ pãa chen tɩ 'maal ba yin a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ, tɩ sʊɔr ba ɩka ba yi a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ.
Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ na wa yi a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ, ba chen a Lidiya yir, be lɛ ba tɩ tuor a yɛɛr ka ba 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ãkpãɛn tɩ pãa yi a be chen.
Ba tun a Amfipolis nɩ Apoloniya na ba wa a Tɛsalonika, be lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir be.
Lɛ a Pɔɔl na ma irɛ lɛ wʊ chen be a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir, Pɛ̃nfʊsɩ gbɛɛ ata jaa lɛ wʊ kpɛ a be ka a 'lɔ nɩ a bala vɩɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãma.
Wʊ mana na wile a lɛ an sɛɛ a Nɩ-iraa na di dɔɔyɛ tɩ na wʊ ir a kũu pɔ ɩ vʊr, “A Yesu nyãna ɩn ben 'yɛrɛ a wʊ 'yɛr, lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.”
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne sɔɔ a lɛ na ba pʊɔ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ, 'matãan a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ na dɔ̃ɔ puoro a Nãaŋmɩn lɔ̃ɔn pɔɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnsɩ.
Tɩchɛ ka a nyuur kpɛ a Juu nɩbɛ, ka ba bɔ a ba taaba nɩbomo be a daa pɔ lɔ̃ɔ taa, na ba piel gɔ̃mɔ̃ be a tẽe pɔ. Ba tɩ sɛɛn a Jason yir bʊɔrɔ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ ɩka ba yin chiin ba a nɩyɔɔ bala niem.
Tɩchɛ ban ba wa tɩ nyɛ ba ɛ, ba nyɔɔn a Jason nɩ a yɛɛr bamɩne chiin a tẽe nɩbɛrɛ niem tɩ tãna 'yɛrɛ. “A dɔɔr banyãna lɛ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wɛr wʊ jaa, ba wa tãn ka pʊ̃pãanyã
ka a Jason tuor de ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ yir. Ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ naa a Nãa Siisa chire na ba 'yɛrɛ ɩka nãa ãsʊɔ ben be ban bʊɔlɔ Yesu.”
A lɛ a tẽe nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩyɔɔ bala na wõ a 'yɛr nyãna, a dam ba naa.
A ba pãa 'yɔ̃ɔ a Jason nɩ a yɛɛr bala a ba yab libie tɩ ba bar ba sɔr.
A lɛ a wɛr na wa tɔ̃ɔ sɔb, ka a yɛɛr bar a Pɔɔl nɩ Silasɩ sɔr ka ba chen be a Beriya. Ban tɩ ta, ba chen be a Juu nɩbɛ lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir.
A Juu nɩbɛ bala na be a Beriya ɩn chɛchɛlbɛ gar a bala na be a Tɛsalonika, bojũu ba den a 'yɛr nɩ chɩlfʊ na ba vɩɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãma kaara bɩbir jaa ɩka ba kaa lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛrɛ ɩn yelmãɛ bɩɩ.
A Juu nɩbɛ yɔɔ jie sɔɔn de a 'yɛr lɔ̃ɔn a bala na ba ɩ Juu nɩbɛ dɔɔr yɔɔ jie, nɩ a pɔɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnsɩ bamɩne yɔɔ jie.
A Juu nɩbɛ na be a Tɛsalonika na wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Pɔɔl ben a Beriya mʊɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr, ba chen a be tɩ chãgbala a nɩbɛ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ ba.
Ka a yɛɛr mɩ tɔ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Pɔɔl a man sɔr a wʊ chen, tɩchɛ ka a Silasɩ nɩ a Timoti 'lɔ jɛ̃ be a Beriya.
A nɩbɛ bala na bɩɛl a Pɔɔl ba tɩ tãn wʊn a Atensɩ, bala lɛ wʊ lɩɛb tʊ̃ ɩka a Silasɩ nɩ a Timoti a ba wa fɔɔ a wʊ sɛ̃.
A lɛ wʊn chɛnɛ chɛlɛ ba be a Atensɩ, suur wa tɩ kpɛ wʊ naa a lɛ wʊn nyɛ a tẽe na sɛɛn a tɩbɛ.
Lɛ lɛ 'lɔ nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a Greek bala na puoro a Nãaŋmɩn ma mana taa be a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir, nɩ a bala wʊn ma pɔɔ a daa pɔ bɩbir jaa nɩ nɩrɛ jaa wʊn tuor.

Ka a bɔ̃bɔ̃ɔnbɔ bamɩne na yi a Epikuriya nɩ a Sɩtoyik gbul pɔ piel chɩrɛ nɩ a Pɔɔl. Ka a bamɩne sʊrɔ, “Bo lɛ a dabʊlɔbʊlɔ nyãna ara 'yɛrɛ?” Ka a bamɩne mɩ 'yɛrɛ, “Ŋmɩn sãansɩ kɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr lɛ wʊ 'yɛrɛ.” Ba 'yɛrɛ naa nɩtɔ̃ bojũu, Pɔɔl mʊɔlɔ naa a Yesu 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nɩ a kũu pɔ irfʊ 'yɛr.
Be lɛ ba pãa bʊɔl wʊ chiin be a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie a Areyopagusɩ na ba 'yɛr, “Fʊn tʊ̃ɔ wiil sɩ a fʊ wiil paalaa nyãna fʊn wile a sɩ bɔ̃ɔ bɩɩ?
'Yɛr sãan lɛ a nyã fʊn waan a sɩ wõnõ na sɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka sɩ bɔ̃ɔ a par.”
Atensɩ dẽme ba jaa lɔ̃ɔn a sãanba na kpɩɛrɛ a be, baa tara tʊ̃mɔ̃ lɛ pʊɔ a 'yɛr paalaa ban ma 'yɛrɛ na ba chɛlɛ nɩ yelpaalaa na ɩrɛ.
Lɛ lɛ a Pɔɔl pãa ir a nɩbɛ na lɔ̃ɔ a Areyopagusɩ na wʊ 'yɛr, “Atensɩ dɔɔr, n nyɛn bɔ̃ɔn yɩn nʊ̃ ŋmɩmɛ puorfʊ.
Bojũu ɩn yʊɔrɔ kaara a yɩ tɩbɛ jiir, n tɩ nyɛn a bɔɔr lofʊ jie ãsʊɔ yɩn sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ, ŊMƖN 'LƆ SƖN BA BƆ̃Ɔ Ɛ. A Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ gba yɩn mãɛ na puoro tɩ ba bɔ̃ɔ wʊ ɛ, 'lɔ lɛ n waan ɩka n wa mʊɔl kʊ yɩ.
“A Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ na maal a wɛr nɩ a bomo a jaa na be a pɔ, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a saaju nɩ a tẽe jaa Soro, na waa gãna a yie ala a nɩbɛ na mɛn a ba nuur kʊ wʊ ɛ.
Waa dɩɛl nɩrɛ nũu tʊ̃mɔ̃ ala ɩ wʊ bʊɔrɔ na bon kɔ̃ɔ ɛ, bojũu 'lɔ mãɛ lɛ kʊ nɩrɛ nyɛvʊr, ka wʊ vʊrɔ nɩ bon jaa.
Dabʊ̃'yen pɔ lɛ wʊ tu na wʊ maal a nɩbʊrsɩ, ka ba kpɩɛrɛ a wɛr wʊ jaa. A wʊ man a sɔ̃ɔsɩ kʊ ba, nɩ a jiir ala ban na kpɩɛrɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn maal naa nɩtɔ̃ ka nɩrɛ na tʊ̃ɔ yɔbɔ wʊ, amɩne sɛ̃ ban nyɛ wʊ naa, bojũu waa jãan a sɩ ãsʊɔ jaa ɛ.
‘Bojũu, a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ sɩ chɛnɛ na sɩ be ka a tẽe pɔ,’ na sɩ yʊɔrɔ nɩtãa lɛ a yɩn mãɛ nɩbɛ bamɩne na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, ‘A wʊ bibiir lɛ sɩ ɩ.’
“Sɩn ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir jũu, yɩ taa ɩ a sɩ tɩɛr ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn nyã kaara naa fɩka bon nɩrɛ na de wʊ yɛ̃ bɩɩ bɔ̃ɔfʊ mɛn, sɛlma, bɩɩ libipɩla, bɩɩ kʊsɩr kaar ɛ.
A kõr jaa 'lɔ, Nãaŋmɩn lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ ba bɔ̃ɔfʊ, tɩchɛ pʊ̃pãanyã 'lɔ, wʊ kpãkpãana na nɩrɛ jaa jie jaa ɩka, ba lɩɛb ba tɩɛr.
Bojũu wʊ ir bɩbir bin wʊn na de a daba 'lɔ wʊn ir, na wʊ tɔɔr a wɛr 'yɛr nɩ yeltorsɩ pɔ. Wʊ vɛ̃n ka a chaar kʊ nɩrɛ jaa wʊn sãɩ wʊ a kũu pɔ.”
Ban wa wõ a kũu pɔ irfʊ 'yɛr, bamɩne lan wuol, tɩchɛ ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛr, “Sɩn bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka sɩ lɛ wõ a 'yɛr nyã nɩdaar.”
A lɛ, Pɔɔl bar ba naa a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie.
Tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ bãlãa turo a Pɔɔl na ba sɔɔ de a 'yɛr, a ba ãsʊɔ lɛ Diyonɩsɩs na ɩ a Areyopagusɩ lɔ̃ɔfʊ nɩrɛ, ka a pɔɔ ãsʊɔ mɩ na pʊɔ yuor di Damarisɩ nɩ bamɩne mɩ na pʊɔ.
A anyã puor, Pɔɔl yin a Atensɩ na wʊ chen be a Korɩntɩ.

Be lɛ wʊ tuor a Juu nɩrɛ na di Akuila na wʊ ɩ Pontus bal nɩrɛ, 'lɔ nɩ a wʊ pɔɔ Pɩrɩsɩla na yi a Itali wa a ba kor ɛ, bojũu a Nãa Kɩlaudiyus 'yɛr naa ɩka a Juu nɩrɛ jaa wʊ yi a Worom. Ka a Pɔɔl chen ɩka wʊ piir ba kaa.
Wʊ tɩ jɛ̃n a be a ba 'mataa tʊ̃nɔ̃ bojũu ba jaa bɔ̃ɔn a gãma tʊ̃mɔ̃.
A Pɛ̃nfʊ Bɩbir Daar jaa Pɔɔl ma chen a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir ma tɩ 'yɛrɛ a 'yɛr bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ lɩɛb a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ tɩɛr.
Lɛ a Silasɩ nɩ a Timoti na wʊ yi a Masedonɩya wa a Korɩntɩ, Pɔɔl den a wʊ sɔ̃ɔ wʊ jaa na wʊ mʊɔlɔ mana kʊrɔ a Juu nɩbɛ ɩka a Yesu lɛ a Nɩ-iraa.

Tɩchɛ ka Juu nɩbɛ 'yɛrɛ a Pɔɔl kpõkpoor 'yɛr, a wʊ pãpã a fɔbaa 'yɔ̃ɔ ba tɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A yɩ jãɩ a lɩɛb dɔɔl a yɩ ju, a ba lɛ ɩ maa 'yɛr ɛ, an yi dɩna chiine, n chiine naa a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ jie.”
Pɔɔl yin be a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir na wʊ gʊɔr a daba ãsʊɔ na di Titiyusɩ Jusɩtusɩ na ba ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ɛ na puoro ka a wʊ yir gbʊr a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir.
Ka a Kɩrɩsɩpusɩ na ɩ a lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir nɩdiere nɩ a wʊ yir dẽme ba jaa sɔɔ de a sɩ Soro 'yɛr nɩ a Korɩntɩ dẽme yɔɔ na wõ a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr, a ba sɔɔ a wʊ so ba jaa a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ.
A tãsɔɔ ãsʊɔ, a sɩ Soro 'yɛr 'yɛr kʊ a Pɔɔl jãna pɔ ɩka, “Taa joro dãbãɛ ɛ, mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir mʊɔlɔ a 'yɛr ta pɔɔ nɛɛ ɛ.
Bojũu, ɩn pʊɔ fʊ naa, nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ nyɔɔ fʊ bɩɩ maal fʊ dɛɛr ɛ, bojũu n chɛnɛ na tara nɩyɔɔ a tẽe nyã pɔ.”
Be lɛ a Pɔɔl jɛ̃ a be a Korɩntɩ yuon gbul nɩ bʊ̃ŋmaa na wʊ wile ba a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a Galio ɩ a Akaya nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, ka a Juu nɩbɛ guor taa na ba nyɔɔ a Pɔɔl chiin be a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ jie.
Be lɛ ba tɩ 'yɛr, “A daba nyãna lɛ bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ lɩɛb a nɩbɛ tɩɛr ka ba puoro Nãaŋmɩn na ba tu a lɛ a sɩ nɛbinsɩ na 'yɛr ɛ.”
Ka a Pɔɔl haa nɛɛ ɩka wʊ 'yɛr 'yɛr, tɩchɛ ka a Galio 'yɛr kʊ a Juu nɩbɛ, “A yɩn, ala ta ɩ yeldɛɛr bɩɩ yelbier kɔ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ, ɩn taa 'maan ãgãn chɛlɛ.
Tɩchɛ an ben wa lɔ̃ɔ taa nɩ a yɩ 'yɛr bie nɩ yoe 'matãan a yɩ nɛbinãa yɩn mãɛ yɩ maal, maa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ a 'yɛr nyãna tɔɔr ɛ.”
Lɛ lɛ wʊ vɛ̃ a ba dii ba bar be a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ jie.
A ba lɩɛb nyɔɔ a Sosetenesɩ na ɩ a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na ba ŋme be a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ yir dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ, tɩchɛ a Galio baka ba be be ɛ.

Pɔɔl jɛ̃n be a Korɩntɩ tẽe kor bãlãa, tɩ pãa bar a yɛɛr na wʊ kpɛ a gboro chiine a Siriya ka a Pɩrɩsɩla nɩ a Akuila pɔɔ wʊ. Sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka wʊ chen, wʊ vɛ̃n ka ba põ wʊ a ju be a Senkereya, bojũu wʊ dɔ̃ɔ põl 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ mãɛ.
Ba tãn be a Efesus tẽe pɔ, ka a Pɔɔl bar a Pɩrɩsɩla nɩ a Akuila tɩ na wʊ mãɛ chen be a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie ka a 'lɔ naa Juu nɩbɛ tɩ mana taa.
A ba sʊɔr wʊ ka wʊ jãnɛ a be bãlãa tɩ waa sɔɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ wʊn wa chiine wʊ tɩr nɛɛ kʊ ba, “Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn wa sɔɔ naa, ɩn lɩɛb wa.” Be lɛ wʊ kpɛ a gboro yi a be a Efesus tẽe pɔ.
Wʊn tɩ ta a Sisariya wʊ don be a Jerusalɛm na wʊ tɩ puor a bala na puoro, tɩ pãa suu chen a Antiok.
Pɔɔl na tɩ jɛ̃ a be a Antiok kor bãlãa, wʊ pãa yin yʊɔrɔ a Galatiya paal 'lɔ wʊ jaa nɩ a Fɩrgɩya na wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a poturbo ãkpãɛn.
Ka a Juu nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ yuor na di Apolosɩ yin be a Aleksandiriya na wʊ wa a Efesus tẽe pɔ. Wʊ ɩ naa nɩrɛ na jãn na wʊ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn gãma tɩ bɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr sʊ̃.
Apolosɩ nyã dɔ̃ɔ jãn a sɩ Soro sɔr defʊ, na wʊ 'yɛrɛ nɩ nɩbijɩɛ na wʊ wile nɩ Yesu yele ka a tor, tɩchɛ ka a ɩ Jɔɔn Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ sofʊ tɛɛ lɛ wʊ bɔ̃ɔ.
Wʊ piel na wʊ 'yɛrɛ nɩ nyãa be a Juu nɩbɛ lɔ̃ɔfʊ yir. A Pɩrɩsɩla nɩ a Akuila na wa wõ a wʊ 'yɛr, ba bʊɔl wʊn be a ba yir na ba pãa wiil wʊ a Nãaŋmɩn sɔr jaa dẽ dẽ.
Apolosɩ wa bʊɔrɔ naa Akaya chenfʊ, ka a yɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ ãkpɛ̃ɔ tɩ sɛb gãn kʊ a bala na puoro a be a ba de wʊ. Wʊn tɩ ta a be a ɩn sʊ̃ʊfʊ kpɛ̃ɛ kʊ a bala a Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ na vɛ̃ ka ba sɔɔ de a Yesu.
Wʊ 'yɛr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa lɔb a Juu nɩbɛ chãa pɔ, na wʊ chɩrɛ ba yuoro nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn gãma wile ba ɩka a Yesu lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.
Lɛ a Apolosɩ na chɛnɛ be a Korɩntɩ, Pɔɔl den a mɔgɔ̃ɔ sɔr na wʊ tɩ ta a Efesus tẽe pɔ. Be lɛ wʊ nyɛ a poturbo bamɩne,
na wʊ sʊʊr ba, “A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ yɩn sɔɔ de a Yesu, yɩ nyɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ bɩɩ?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Kai, saa gba wõ ɩka Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ben be ɛ.”
Ka a Pɔɔl sʊʊr ba, “Tɩ kɔ̃buor lɛ yɩ so?” Ka ba 'yɛr, “Jɔɔn kʊ̃ɔ lɛ sɩ so.”
A Pɔɔl 'yɛr kʊ ba, “A bala na lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr lɛ a Jɔɔn so ba Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ ɩka ba sɔɔ de a 'lɔ na waara a wʊ puor, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Yesu.”
A nɩbɛ na wa wõ a anyãna ba sɔɔ naa ka wʊ so ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor.
Ka a Pɔɔl dɔɔl ba a wʊ nuur ka Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa kpɛ ba a ba 'yɛrɛ kɔkɔyor, na ba ma piel 'yɛrɛ lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na wiil ba.
Ban ɩn dɔɔr pie nɩ ayi.
Ŋmɛrsɩ ata lɛ wʊ be a be na wʊ ma kpɩɛrɛ a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jie na wʊ ma kpɩrkpɩrɛ ba wile ba a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr.
Tɩchɛ a bamɩne kpɛ̃mɛ naa a ba nyãa na ba tɔr baa sɔɔ ɛ, tɩ na ba kpɛrɛ a Sɔr. Ka a Pɔɔl bar ba, tɩ na wʊ ma tara a bala na sɔɔ de, ma kpɛ̃n be a Tiranusɩ jãnfʊ diyal 'lɔ pɔ, a ba ma tɩ mana taa.
Lɛ lɛ wʊ tara tɩ tãn yuom ayi, ka a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ, bala jaa na be a Asɩya paal pɔ wõn a sɩ Soro 'yɛr.
Nãaŋmɩn den a Pɔɔl tʊ̃n nɛ'maa tʊ̃yɔɔ.
A Pɔɔl fɔbile wʊn ma fɩɛlɛ nɩ nyĩe nɩ a wʊ pẽpele ala wa sɩɩr baalaa, a baalsɩ ba jaa ma sa naa, ka a sɩdɛbɛ ma yire a nɩbɛ pɔ.

Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne mɩ yi yʊɔrɔ na dii a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi na ba fere de a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ a bala na tara a sɩdɛbɛ, “A Yesu 'lɔ a Pɔɔl na mʊɔlɔ, a wʊ yuor pɔ lɛ sɩ 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ yɩ, yɩ wa yi.”
A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na di Sekeva dabil ayopõi lɛ dɔ̃ɔ maala a lɛ nɛ.
Daar kɔ̃ɔ a sɩdɛɛr sʊʊr ba naa, “N bɔ̃ɔn Yesu naa bɔ̃ɔ Pɔɔl, tɩchɛ a yɩn mɩ ba boo yɩ ɩ?”
Ka a daba 'lɔ na tara a sɩ dɛɛr pãa ɔɔ nyɔɔr ba jaa, na wʊ ŋme ba jaa pɩrpɩr tɔɔr a ba bonsɩ chɩɛr ka ba jo yi a die pɔ nɩ sal'mɔi.
A Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ, na kpɩɛrɛ a be Efesus tẽe pɔ, ba jaa bɔ̃ɔn naa a yele nyãna, ka dãbãɛ kpɛ ba a baa lɛ tara a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor dãɛnɛ nɩ ɛ.
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na sɔɔ de, yi chãa pɔ, na ba 'yɛrɛ a ba maal dɛbɛ.
A jɩbʊʊrbɔ bala mɩ na sɔɔ, waan naa a ba jɩbʊʊrgãma wa chʊm a nɩbɛ ba jaa niem, ban wa sɔr a gãma ala ban chʊm libie ka a ɩ libipɩla turo ayi dɔɔl lɩjaayi nɩ pie (50,000).
A sɔr nyãna lɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr yaar de jie wʊ jaa nɩ kpɛ̃ɔ.
A anyãna a jaa na wa ɩ, Pɔɔl ŋmen nyãa ɩka wʊn chen a Jerusalɛm na wʊn tu a Masedonɩya nɩ Akaya, “Maa wa ta a be baar, ɩn chen a Worom mɩ.”
Wʊ tʊ̃ naa a nɩbɛ ayi a bala na sʊ̃nɔ̃ wʊ Timoti nɩ Erastus ka ba chen a Masedonɩya, tɩchɛ ka a 'lɔ jãnɛ be a Asɩya paal pɔ kor bãlãa.
A sɔ̃ɔ nyãna lɛ a damfʊ ir a Sɔr tʊfʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Sãa kuro kɔ̃ɔ yuor na di Demetirus, wʊ ma den a kpãna na wʊ kur a Atemisɩ puorfʊ yirbil ka a bala na ɩ a tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ nyɛrɛ libie.
A Demetirus bʊɔl a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa nɩ a bala jaa mɩ na bɔ̃ɔ a maalfʊ na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɛɛr, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa tɔ̃nɔ̃ sɩn nyɛrɛ a tʊ̃mɔ̃ nyã pɔ.
Yɩn mãɛ nyɛ naa na yɩ wõ a lɛ a Pɔɔl nyãna na 'yɛrɛ na wʊ lɩɛrɛ a nɩyɔɔ tɩɛrsɩ a ka Efesus tẽe pɔ, nɩ a Asɩya wɛr wʊ jaa. Wʊ 'yɛr naa ɩka a ŋmɩmɛ ala ban maal nuur ba ɩ ŋmɩmɛ ɛ.
A ba ɩ a sɩ yara na lo tɛɛ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ ba kʊ̃ lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Atemisɩ puorfʊ yir kpɛ̃ɛ go ɛ. Ka a Asɩya nɩ a wɛr wʊ jaa kʊ̃ lɛ puoro a ŋmɩn pɔɔ nyã go ɛ.”
Ban wõ lɛ a Demetirus na 'yɛr, ka a suur nyɔɔ ba a ba tãna 'yɛrɛ, “A sɩn Efesus ŋmɩn Atemisɩ bɛrma naa.”
Ajienaa lɛ a tẽe wʊ jaa pɔɔn gɔ̃mɔ̃, ka a nɩbɛ nyɔɔ a Gayus nɩ Aristakus, Pɔɔl tʊ̃tʊ̃taaba lɛ a ba 'mataa yi a Masedonɩya na ba ŋmʊr ba a lɛ chiin a jie 'lɔ a tẽe nɩbɛ na ma lɔ̃ɔ dãɛnɛ.
Ka a Pɔɔl mɩ ta bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ daa yi a be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a poturbo ba sɔɔ ɛ.
A nɩbɛrɛ bamɩne gba na yi a paal 'lɔ pɔ na ɩ a Pɔɔl barmɩne, tʊ̃n nɩbɛ ka ba sʊɔr wʊ ɩka wʊ taa ɩrɛ wa yire be a dãɛn jie ɛ.
Burbur kpɛ̃n a nɩyɔɔ bala na duo a be, ka bamɩne 'yɛrɛ turo nɩ ka sɛn, ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛrɛ turo nɩ jã yuo, ka bamɩne mɩ gba ba bɔ̃ɔ bo 'yɔ̃ɔ ban be be ɛ.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ daa Aleksanda 'yɔ̃ɔ be a niem, ka a nɩyɔɔ bala tãna mana wʊ lɛ wʊn na 'yɛr. Wʊ wɩlwɩl ban nuur ɩka, ba bar gɔ̃n tɩ wʊ 'yɛr a ba kaa.
Tɩchɛ ban wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka Juu nɩrɛ lɛ wʊ ɩ, ba jaa ŋmen chɛl bʊ̃'yen lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ na ba 'yɛrɛ, “A sɩn Efesus ŋmɩn Atemisɩ bɛrma naa.”
A tẽe gãn sɛɛrɛ vɛ̃n ka a nɩyɔɔ bala ŋmaa vʊʊr tɩ wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Efesus dẽme woɩ, a wɛr wʊ jaa bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a Efesus tẽe lɛ kaara a Atemisɩ kpɛ̃ɛ nyã puorfʊ yir a wʊ kʊsɩr 'lɔ na yi a saaju lo.
A nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ jũu, nɩrɛ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ chɩɩr ɛ, yɩ ɩ jaa gbul na yɩ ta pɔɔrɔ yelsɩ ɛ.
A nɩbɛ banyãna yɩn waan a kana ba ju bon jaa a puorfʊ yir ɛ, bɩɩ 'yɛr 'yɛrdɛɛr jaa 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ ŋmɩn pɔɔ nyã ɛ.
Ala ɩ a Demetirus nɩ a wʊ tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ wa tara nɩrɛ nɩ 'yɛr, a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ bɩbie ben be nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ ban tʊ̃ɔ chen a be tɩ bʊɔl taa.
Ala ɩ yele kɔ̃ɔ mɩ ben be a yɩ bʊɔrɔ ɩka yɩ 'yɛr, ban tʊ̃ɔ maal a be a nɩyɔɔ ba jaa niem.
A lɛ an sɩ ben 'yɛr pɔ, a damfʊ nyã na dam a dɩna jũu. A 'yɛr nyãna jũu, saa be jaa na tʊ̃ɔ wiil a par ɛ, bojũu a ba tara par ɛ.”
A anyãna wʊn 'yɛr baar tɩ na wʊ wɛl a nɩyɔɔ bala bar.
Lɛ a gɔ̃mɔ̃ na wa baar, Pɔɔl tʊ̃n bʊɔl a poturbo ka ba wa, a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ãkpãɛn tɩ bar ba tɩ chen a Masedonɩya.
Be lɛ wʊ tu a tẽn ala pɔ na wʊ 'yɛr 'yɛr yɔɔ 'yɔ̃ɔn a bala na puoro ãkpãɛn na wʊ tɩ tãn a Greek wɛr pɔ,
wʊ jɛ̃n a be ŋmɛrsɩ ata. Bojũu a Juu nɩbɛ dɔ̃ɔ guoro taa a wʊ yele, ala lɛ so waa lɛ kpɛ a gboro chen a Siriya ɛ, tɩ na wʊ lɩɛb tu a Masedonɩya sɔr nɩ gbɛɛ.

Ka a bala na pʊɔ wʊ a ba 'mataa chen lɛ, Sopater a wʊ sãa lɛ Pirihusɩ na yi Beriya, Aristakus nɩ Sekundusɩ mɩ na yi Tɛsalonika, Gayus na yi Debi nɩ Timoti nɩ Tɩchɩkusɩ nɩ a Torofimusɩ na yi a Asɩya paal pɔ.
A nɩbɛ banyãna lɛ de nie tɩ chɛlɛ sɩ be a Toroyas.
Tɩchɛ a Paanʊ̃kõo Lɔ̃ɔfʊ di na wa baar, sɩ kpɛ̃n a gboro yi be a Filipai tẽe pɔ na sɩ maal ber anũu tɩ na sɩ pɔɔ ba a be Toroyas jãnɛ a be ber ayopõi.
A Pɛ̃nfʊ divɩɛ bio daar jãanʊɔr, sɩ jaa lɔ̃ɔn taa na sɩn 'mataa di. Pɔɔl 'yɛrɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊrɔ a nɩbɛ bojũu wɛr wa chaar, wʊn chen naa. Wʊ 'yɛr kor jaa ka wɛr tɩ põ.
A be a bɔɔpɩɛ pɔ sɩn lɔ̃ɔ ba chʊm fãtɩnsɩ yɔɔ bin.

Pɔlbile kɔ̃ɔ yuor na di Yutikus jãnɛ naa a tokoro nɛɛ ka a gʊ̃ɔ kpɛ wʊ. Lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛr kor a wʊ gur jaa chãɩɩ na wʊ yi a be a saaju faa lo a be tẽe, bojũu ba mɛn a bɔɔpɩɛ dɔɔl taa ata ka ba suu 'mɔɔ ka ɩ wʊ kpi naa.
A Pɔɔl suun tɩ lo bib a kũu tɩ kõr wʊ tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ, “Yɩ ta kõnõ ɛ, wʊ chɛnɛ na vʊrɔ.”
Wʊ pãa don be a bɔɔpɩɛ pɔ, ka wʊ tɩ ŋma a paanʊ̃ɔ ka ba 'mataa di tɩ wʊ lɛ 'yɛr lɛ̃ɛɛ ka wɛr tɩ chaar ka wʊ yi a be chen.
Tɩchɛ ka pɔlbile ir kpɛ̃mɛ ka ba ãgãn 'maa a ba tara wʊ kul a yir.
Sɩn den nie kpɛ a gboro na sɩ chiine a Asosɩ, be lɛ sɩn tɩ 'mɔɔ a Pɔɔl, lɛ lɛ wʊ dɔ̃ɔ man sɩ tɩ chiine nɩ gbɛɛ a be.
Lɛ wʊn tɩ tuor sɩ a be Asosɩ, sɩ 'mɔɔ wʊn 'yɔ̃ɔ a gboro pɔ na sɩ chiine be a Mitilene.
Wɛr na wa chaar, sɩ yin a be tɩ ta Kiyosɩ ka a wɛr lɛ bɔ̃ɔ chaar sɩ go kaa ɩ sɩ vɩɛn Samosɩ bar. A ber ata daar lɛ sɩ pãa ta a Miletusɩ.
Pɔɔl bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka wʊ po a Efesus tẽe bar na wʊ ta gã be a Asɩya paal pɔ ɛ, bojũu wʊ bʊɔrɔ na fɔɔ ɩka 'lɔ tʊ̃ɔ, wʊ ta a Jerusalɛm a Pentikosɩ bɩbir daar.
Pɔɔl na chɛnɛ be a Miletusɩ lɛ wʊ tʊ̃ bʊɔl a bala na puoro a be a Efesus, a ba nɩdierbe ka ba wa.
Ban wa ta, wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ bɔ̃ɔ lɛ ɩn be dɔ̃ɔ kpɩɛrɛ a yɩ sɛ̃, yi a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ jaa ɩn wa a Asɩya paal pɔ.
Mãɛ siirfʊ nɩ nɩbikʊ̃ɔ lɛ n tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a sɩ Soro tʊ̃mɔ̃, bojũu a Juu nɩbɛ ba maal ma vɩla ɛ.
Yɩn mãɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka n ba sɔɔl yɩ yele jaa na sʊ̃ʊ yɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ n wile yɩn chãa pɔ, nɩ a yɩ yie pɔ.
N kpãkpãan naa a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ɩka ba lɩɛb wa a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, na ba lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr sɔɔ de a sɩ Soro Yesu.
“Pʊ̃pãanyã 'lɔ, Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr man ka n chiine a Jerusalɛm, n ba bɔ̃ɔ lɛn na tɩ pɔɔ ma a be ɛ.
Yelbʊ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ n bɔ̃ɔ ɩka, tẽe jaa pɔ, a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ma vɛ̃n ka n bɔ̃ɔn ɩka die pɔ pɔɔfʊ, nɩ wõm lɛ ɩn tɩ tuor.
Tɩchɛ a anyãna maa bã ma ɛ, ala ɩ ɩn tʊ̃ɔ jo ta a baaraa naa tʊ̃ a lɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu na kʊ ma a tʊ̃mɔ̃, ɩka n 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ.
“Yɩ nyɛ, pʊ̃pãanyã a yɩn bala jie ɩn yɔ naa mʊɔl a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr, yɩ kʊ̃ lɛ nyɛ ma go ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ a dɩna ɩka ãsʊɔ jaa wa bɔr, n nũu ba pʊɔ be ɛ.
Bojũu n ba dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔl yɩ yele jaa ɛ, tɩ man a lɛ jaa a Nãaŋmɩn na bʊɔrɔ kʊ yɩ.
Yɩ gu yɩ mãɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ bala 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na maal yɩ a yɩ ɩ a nɩdierbe. Yɩ kaara a Nãaŋmɩn pupuorbiir bala wʊn dãn a wʊ mãɛ jãɩ.
N bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka maa wa chen baar, nɩbɛ na lɩɛb gbõgboi kpɛ a yɩ pɔ, ba kʊ̃ bar yɩ ɛ.
Bamɩne na yin a yɩn mãɛ pɔ gba, na ba jɛr a yelmãɛ bɛl nɩbɛ ka ba turo ba.
A lɛ jũu yɩ guro yɩ mãɛ na yɩ tɩɛr kaa, yuom ata nɩ nyã ɩn ba vɛ̃ a yɩ ãsʊɔ jaa wiilfʊ ɛ, nɩbikʊ̃ɔ lɛ n wile nɩ yɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ tãsɔɔ.
“Pʊ̃pãanyã, n de yɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nũu pɔ, nɩ a wʊ wãɛfʊ 'yɛr bie pɔ, a yɩ na tʊ̃ɔ nʊ̃ɔ a wʊ kʊ yɩ a bʊ̃sʊ̃n ala wʊn tara kʊ a wʊ nɩbɛ.
N ba tara nyuur nɩ ãsʊɔ jaa libir, bɩɩ sɛlma, bɩɩ a fɔɔr ɛ.
Yɩn mãɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a n bʊ̃bʊɔrsɩ, a n nũu pɔ lɛ a yi, naa sʊ̃ʊ a bala ɩn lɔ̃ɔ tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ.
Bon jaa ɩn maal, n wiil yɩ naa ɩka a tʊ̃kpãɛn a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ lɛ, sɩn tu na sɩ sʊ̃ʊ a nɩbaalsɩ, yɩ tɩɛrɛ a lɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, ‘An ɩn bɔɔsʊ̃n kʊ a 'lɔ na de bon kʊ nɩrɛ, gar a 'lɔ na de.’ ”
Wʊn 'yɛr a anyãna baar, wʊ gbur dumo ka ba jaa 'mataa sʊɔr a Nãaŋmɩn.
Ba jaa ŋman nɩbikʊ̃ɔ tɩ na ba kõr kõr wʊ.
A lɛ na maal sɔ̃ɔ a ba pʊɔ nɩ nyã, a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr ɩka ba kʊ̃ lɛ nyɛ wʊ go ɛ, tɩ na ba bɩɛl wʊ suun a gboro jie.
Sɩn wa bar taa baar, sɩ kpɛ̃n a gboro na sɩ tor a Kos a dẽdẽe a lɛ nɛ, a wɛr na wa chaar ka a ɩ sɩ tãn a Worodesɩ yi a be chen a Patara.
Sɩ nyɛn a gboro ãsʊɔ na chiine a Fonisiya ka sɩ kpɛ chiine.
Sɩn wa nyɛrɛ a Sipurusɩ tẽe sɩ lan wʊn bar a guba jie tɩ ta a Siriya tẽe pɔ. Tire lɛ sɩ ta ara an ɩ be lɛ a gboro na wɛl a tuor wʊn tuo.
Be lɛ sɩ nyɛ a poturbo bamɩne na sɩ jãnɛ a ba sɛ̃ ber ayopõi. Ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tu a ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba 'yɛr kʊ a Pɔɔl ɩka wʊ taa chiine a Jerusalɛm ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a sɩ bɩbie na wa ta, sɩ yin de a sɩ sɔr. Ka a poturbo bala ba jaa nɩ a ba pɔbɔ nɩ a ba bibiir ba jaa bɩɛl sɩ yin a tẽe pɔ, tɩ tãn a man gogoro nɛɛ, ka sɩ gbur dumo sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn.
Sɩn wa bar taa baar, sɩ kpɛ̃n a gboro pɔ, tɩ ba mɩ lɩɛb kulo a yir.
A Tire sɩn be yi, a man pɔ lɛ sɩ chen bãlãa tɩ ta a Tolemaisɩ be lɛ sɩ puor a yɛɛr bamɩne na be be na sɩ gã a be bɩbir bʊ̃'yen.
Sɩn ir a be chiine sɩ tãn be a Sisariya na sɩ chen a Filip na mʊɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ na wʊ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ ayopõi bala ãsʊɔ ban dɔ̃ɔ ir be a Jerusalɛm yir.
Wʊ dɔ̃ɔ tara pɔɔsarsɩ anaar na ba kul sɩrbɛ ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn ma kʊ ba a wʊ 'yɛr a ba 'yɛrɛ.
Sɩ jɛ̃n a be kor bãlãa ka a Agabus yi be a Judiya na,

wʊn wa a sɩ sɛ̃. Wʊ den a Pɔɔl sɩɛ gãn na wʊ lũn a wʊ mãɛ nuur nɩ a gbɛɛ tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr. “A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr naa, ‘Nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ na be a Jerusalɛm na lũ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na so a sɩɛ gãn nyãna, na ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nuur pɔ.’ ”
A lɛ sɩn wõ a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ ka a sɩn nɩ a nɩbɛ bala na be a be 'mataa sʊɔr a Pɔɔl ɩka wʊ taa chiine a Jerusalɛm ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr, “Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ kõnõ na yɩ chɩrɛ ma a ãgãn a lɛ? N sɔɔ naa, a ta ɩ a lũfu tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ n kpi be a Jerusalɛm a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor jũu.”
A lɛ sɩn sʊɔr wʊ faa sɩ mɩ bar naa tɩ 'yɛr “A sɩ Soro bɔfʊ a ɩ.”
A anyã puor lɛ sɩ chɔɔr na sɩ do be a Jerusalɛm.
Ka a poturbo bala na be a Sisariya bɩɛl sɩ na ba waan sɩ a daba 'lɔ na di a Minason yir be lɛ sɩn wa kpɩɛrɛ, Sipurusɩ tẽe pɔ lɛ wʊ yi tɩ na wʊ ɩ a poturo kor.
A lɛ sɩn wa ta a Jerusalɛm, a yɛɛr de sɩn nuur ayi.
Ka a wɛr na wa chaar, sɩn nɩ a Pɔɔl jaa 'mantaa chen ɩka sɩ tɩ nyɛ a Jemesɩ ka a ɩ be lɛ a nɩbɛrɛ ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Pɔɔl na puor ba jaa baar, wʊ man naa yele a jaa kʊ ba, a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na de wʊ tʊ̃n be a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ.
A lɛ ban wõ anyãna ba jaa pɛɛn Nãaŋmɩn tɩ na ba pãa 'yɛr kʊ a Pɔɔl, “Yɛbɛ faa nyɛ, a Juu nɩbɛ turo turo na sɔɔ de, tɩchɛ ba chɛnɛ na tara nɩbijɩɛ nɩ a nɛbinãa.

Ba man kʊ ba ɩka fʊ̃ʊ lɛ wile a Juu nɩbɛ bala na kpɩɛrɛ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ, ka ba taa turo a Mosesɩ ɛ, na fʊ lɛ wile ɩka ba taa ŋmara a ba bibiir yɔɩ ɛ, na ba taa ɩrɛ a lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ na ma ɩrɛ ɛ.
Ban wõn ɩka fʊ wan a ka, ŋmɩnɛ sɩn ɩ?
Fʊ̃ʊ bʊɔrɔ fʊ tu a lɛ sɩn na 'yɛr. Dɔɔr anaar ben ka a sɩ sɛ̃ na ba põl 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba mãɛ.
