De a nɩbɛ banyãna na fʊ pʊɔ ba, a yɩ tɩ pɔl a fʊ yab a ba jur põfʊ sãma. Ka nɩrɛ jaa na pãa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a lɛ ban man 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ ba ɩ yelmãɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a fʊ̃ʊ mãɛ mɩ turo naa a nɛbinãa.
Tɩchɛ a nɩyor bala na sɔɔ de, sɩ sɛb gãn kʊ ba a lɛ sɩn 'yɛr ɩka, ba taa dire tɩbɛ bomo ɛ, bɩɩ ɔɔrɔ jãɩ ɛ, bɩɩ 'wɔb dʊɔ na var kpi ɛ, na ba taa sɛ̃nɛ ɛ.”
Wɛr na wa chaar, Pɔɔl den a dɔɔr anaar bala ka ba 'mataa tɩ pɔl a ba mãɛ. Tɩ na wʊ pãa chen be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir na tɩ 'yɛr a bɩbie ala a ba pɔlfʊ na baar nɩ a bɔɔrlo bomo ala a ba ãsʊɔ jaa na ir.
A lɛ a ber ayopõi na wa gbʊrɔ a baarfʊ, a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne na yi a Asɩya paal pɔ nyɛn a Pɔɔl a be Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir, na ba dam a nɩyɔɔ bala a ba nyɔɔ wʊ.

Ba gboolo naa, “Isɩral nɩbɛ woɩ, yɩ wa sʊ̃ʊ sɩ yooo. A daba lɛ anyãna na wile a nɩbɛ jie jaa ka ba kpɛrɛ a sɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a nɛbinãa lɔ̃ɔn a jie nyãna. Lɛ tɛɛ gba ba lɛ ɛ, wʊ tara na a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, kpɛ̃n ka a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir na wʊ sɔ̃ɔ a jivɩla nyãna.”
Ba dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ a Torofimusɩ na yi a Efesus nɩ a Pɔɔl a ba tɩɛr man tãa a Pɔɔl tara wʊn kpɛ̃n be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir.
A tẽdaa wʊ jaa kab, ka a nɩbɛ yire a tẽe wʊ jaa joro waara na ba wa nyɔɔ a Pɔɔl. Ba nyɔɔ wʊn a lɛ tɔɔ yin a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir jie tɩ pɔɔ a pãma ajienaa.
Ka ba ta bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba kʊ a Pɔɔl ka a yele tɩ ta a Worom sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ɩka a Jerusalɛm wʊ jaa dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ naa.
A wʊ vaa ir a lɛ na wʊ tara a nɩbɛrɛ bamɩne nɩ a sojasɩ na wʊ suu chiin be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ. Lɛ ban wa nyɛ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a wʊ sojasɩ a ba bar a Pɔɔl ŋmefʊ.
Lɛ a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa ta wʊ tɩ nyɔɔn a Pɔɔl na wʊ vɛ̃ ka ba gbãr wʊ nɩ bɔ̃jɔrsɩ ayi. Tɩ pãa sʊʊr ɩka nɩ ana lɛ, nɩ bo lɛ wʊ maal.
Bamɩne na be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ 'yɛrɛ na turo nɩ jiyuo ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛrɛ turo nɩ jiyuo a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na ba nyɛ a yelmãɛ ɛ, a gɔ̃mɔ̃ jũu, wʊ vɛ̃n ka ba tara a Pɔɔl gʊɔr be a sojasɩ kpɛfʊ jie.
Lɛ a Pɔɔl na wa ta a dofʊ jie a nɩbɛ pir pirfʊ jaa waa naa ka a sojasɩ 'mɔɔ a Pɔɔl.
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na turo tãna 'yɛrɛ, “Yɩ kʊ wʊ.”
Lɛ a sojasɩ na wa ɩka ba kpɛ̃n a Pɔɔl a be a ba kpɛfʊ jie wʊ sʊɔr naa a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ɩka, “N 'yɛr 'yɛr kɔ̃ɔ kʊ fʊ bɩɩ?” Ka a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sʊʊr wʊ, “Fʊn tʊ̃ɔn 'yɛr a Greek kɔkɔr bɩɩ?
A ba ɩ fʊ̃ʊ lɛ a Ijipitɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ ŋmaa a jɛɛr na fʊ tɔɔ dɔɔr turo anaar (4,000) kpɛ̃n be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ ɛ?”
Ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr, “N ɩ naa Juu nɩrɛ naa yi a Tasusɩ na be a Sɩlɩsɩya paal pɔ, naa yi a tẽe nyãna pɔ nɩrɛ jaa na bɔ̃ɔn, yãayãabɩlɛ sɔɔ ka n 'yɛr 'yɛr kʊ a nɩbɛ.”
A sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kʊn a Pɔɔl sɔr, ka a wʊ ir ara a dofʊ jie, na wʊ wɩlwɩl a nɩyɔɔ bala a nuur ka ba bar gɔ̃mɔ̃. A lɛ ban wa ŋmaa a vʊʊr wʊ den a ba Juu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr na 'yɛrɛ nɩ.
“N yɛɛr nɩ n sãamɩne yɩ chɛlɛ a n 'yɛr ɩn 'yɛrɛ a pʊ̃pãanyã.”
A lɛ ban wa wõ wʊn 'yɛrɛ nɩ a ba mãɛ Juu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr ka ba jaa ŋma vʊrɔ, tɩ a Pɔɔl pãa 'yɛrɛ,

“Maa ɩn Juu nɩrɛ ka ba dɔɔ ma a Tasusɩ na be a Sɩlɩsɩya paal pɔ, tɩchɛ a kana a Jerusalɛm lɛ ba guol ma. A wiwile Gamaliel pĩlem lɛ n jãnɛ ka wʊ wiil ma a nɛɛr ala a sɩ sãakpãmɩne na dɔ̃ɔ turo ka n mɩ turo a Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a n nyãa wʊ jaa, nɩtãa a yɩ ãsʊɔ jaa na be turo a dɩna.
N gen a nɩbɛ bala na turo a Sɔr nyãna naa kʊ, n nyɔɔr dɔɔr nɩ pɔbɔ jaa 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ.
A bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ na tʊ̃ɔn di ma dãasɩɛ, ba sɛ̃ lɛ n de gãma na chiin a ba yɛɛr sɛ̃ be a Damaskus, n chen ɩka n tɩ nyɔɔr a nɩbɛ banyãna waan a Jerusalɛm ka ba kpãa ba.
“Mɔ̃tɔ̃tuo sɔ̃ɔ lɛ n chiine tɩ gbʊrɔ a Damaskus, ajienaa ka ɩ chãa yin be a saaju na wʊ wa chaar jilʊ̃ ma.
Ka a n tɔ̃ɔ lo a tẽe a lɛ nɛ tɩ naa wõ kɔkɔr na sʊrɔ ma, ‘Sɔɔl, Sɔɔl, bo lɛ fʊ gere ma a lɛ?’
Ka n sʊʊr, ‘Soro, an lɛ fʊ ɩ?’ Ka a kɔkɔr 'yɛr, ‘Maa lɛ a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ a 'lɔ fʊn gere.’
A maa nɩ a bala na lɔ̃ɔ chiine ba nyɛn a chãa, tɩchɛ baa bɔ̃ɔ a nɩnyɩnɛ kɔkɔr lɛ wʊn 'yɛrɛ nɩ ma par ɛ.
Ka n sʊʊr, ‘Soro, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ɩn ɩ?’ Ka a Soro 'yɛr, ‘Ir na fʊ kpɛ be a Damaskus tẽe pɔ, be lɛ ban tɩ man fʊ a lɛ ɩn bʊɔrɔ ɩka fʊ ɩ.’
Ka n lɔ̃ɔturbo bala nyɔɔ ma a nũu tɔɔ kpɛ̃n be a Damaskus tẽe pɔ, bojũu a chãa 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na chaar 'yɔ̃ɔ ma a lɛ nɛ n ba lɛ nyɛrɛ ɛ.
“Daba kɔ̃ɔ yuor na di Ananias wan ɩka wʊ wa nyɛ ma, wʊ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn puoro na wʊ turo a nɛbinãa ka a Juu nɩbɛ ba jaa na kpɩɛrɛ a be 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʊ.
Wʊ wa ara na gbɛb ma tɩ 'yɛr, ‘N yɛbɛ Sɔɔl, lɛ nyɛrɛ,’ ka a ɩ ajienaa ka a ɩ n nyɛ wʊ naa.
Be lɛ wʊ pãa 'yɛr kʊ ma, ‘A sɩ sãakpãmɩne Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ir fʊ ɩka fʊ bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ wʊn bʊɔrɔ, na fʊ lɛ nyɛ a chɛchɛ sʊɔ 'lɔ, na fʊ wõ a 'yɛr bie yi a wʊ nɛɛ pɔ.
Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ na ɩ a dãasɩɛ sʊɔ na fʊ kʊ a nɩbɛ ba jaa, a ala fʊn nyɛ, nɩ a ala fʊn wõ.
Pʊ̃pãanyã, bo lɛ fʊ lɛ chɛlɛ go? Ir a ba so fʊ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, ka a na pɛɛ a fʊ yeldɛbɛ bar a fʊ bʊɔlɔ a sɩ Soro yuor.’
“A lɛ ɩn lɩɛb wa a Jerusalɛm naa tɩ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn be a puorfʊ yir, ka a wa kaara ma jãna kaar.
Ka n nyɛ a sɩ Soro na 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr kʊrɔ ma. Wʊ 'yɛr naa, ‘Pɔɔ fɔɔ na fʊ yi ka a Jerusalɛm ajienaa, bojũu nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ sɔɔ a lɛ fʊn na 'yɛr a n 'yɛr ɛ.’
Ka n 'yɛr sɔɔ wʊ, ‘N Soro a nɩbɛ banyãna bɔ̃ɔn naa a lɛ ɩn yʊɔrɔ a lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir naa nyɔɔrɔ ba pɔɔrɔ tɩ ŋmiere a bala na sɔɔ de fʊ.
A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ban kʊrɔ a fʊ dãasɩ dire Sɩteven maa nɩ bala jaa ɩn nɛbʊ̃'yen ka n kaara a ba fuusɩ tɩ ba kʊ wʊ.’
Ka a sɩ Soro pãa 'yɛr kʊ ma, ‘Chen, ɩn tʊ̃ fʊn tɛɛr jaa be a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ.’ ”
A nɩyɔɔ bala chɛlɛ naa lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛrɛ wa tãn a jie wʊn 'yɛr a nɩyor pɔ chenfʊ 'yɛr, a ba pãa tãna 'yɛrɛ, “Yɩ ŋmaa wʊ ju, a ba sɛɛ ɩka wʊ lɛ chɛnɛ vʊrɔ ɛ.”
Lɛ lɛ ba pɔɔrɔ a gɔ̃mɔ̃ tɩ lɔɔrɔ a ba fɔɔr ɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a tãna lɔɔrɔ a saaju.
Ka a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ vɛ̃ ka ba tara a Pɔɔl kpɛ̃n be a sojasɩ yir. Wʊ 'yɛr ɩka ba fɔb a Pɔɔl a wʊ wiil ba bãa lɛ so a nɩbɛ pɔɔrɔ a gɔ̃mɔ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʊ a lɛ.
A lɛ ban lũ a Pɔɔl ɩka ba fɔb, ka wʊ sʊʊr a sojasɩ nɩdier na ara a be, “A tara na sɔr ka yɩn fɔb a Worom nɩrɛ na yaa sʊʊr kaa a yelnyɩnɛ wʊn ɩ ɛ?”
Lɛ a sojasɩ nɩdier na wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃ wʊ chen a ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, “Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ fʊn ɩ? A daba nyã ɩn Worom nɩrɛ.”
Ka a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ chen a Pɔɔl sɛ̃ tɩ sʊʊr wʊ, “'Yɛr kʊ ma, Worom nɩrɛ lɛ fʊ ɩ ɔ?” Ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr ɩka, “Ɔ̃ɔ.”
A sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ pãa 'yɛr, “Maa 'lɔ, libiyɔɔ lɛ n yab tɩ jãnɛ a ka.” Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr, “Maa 'lɔ, ka lɛ ba dɔɔ ma.”
Ka a bala na ara gu a wʊ fɔbfʊ mɩ tɔɔ yaar ajienaa. Dãbãɛ mɩ kpɛ̃n a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ a lɛ wʊn wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Pɔɔl ɩn Worom nɩrɛ tɩchɛ ka wʊ vɛ̃ a ba lũ wʊ.

A wɛr na wa chaar, a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka wʊ bɔ̃ɔ bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ ba bara a Pɔɔl ɛ. Wʊ for wʊn bar tɩ bʊɔl a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ nɩbɛrɛ ka ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa. Tɩ wʊ pãa suu waan a Pɔɔl a wʊ wa ara a ba niem.
Pɔɔl kãan a nɩbɛrɛ a lɛ a dẽdẽe tɩ 'yɛr, “N yɛɛr, n tʊ̃n a lɛ na sɛɛ kʊ Nãaŋmɩn wa ta a dɩna tɩ n nyãa ba dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ.”
A anyãna wʊn 'yɛr ka a Ananias na ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr kʊ a bala na ara gbʊr a Pɔɔl ɩka ba 'ma wʊ a nɛɛ pɔ.
Ka a Pɔɔl pãa 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Nãaŋmɩn na 'ma fʊ naa a fʊ̃ʊ na ɩ a tãpɩɛl dachin nyã. Fʊ jɛ̃n a be ɩka fʊ tɔɔr a n 'yɛr a lɛ a nɛɛ na bin tɩ na fʊ̃ʊ mãɛ lɛ sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a nɛɛ, na fʊ 'yɛr ɩka ba 'ma ma.”
A bala na ara gbʊr a Pɔɔl 'yɛr kʊ, “Aa! Bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ fʊ tʊrɔ ɔ?”
Ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr, “Yɛɛr n ba bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ wʊ ɩ ɛ, bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, ‘Taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ 'yɛrdɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʊ nɩbɛ nɩdier ɛ.’ ”

Pɔɔl na wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Saduseemɩne jɛr naa Faraseemɩne pɔ ka wʊ tãn kpɛ̃ɔ jaa be a nɩbɛrɛ pɔ na wʊ 'yɛr, “N yɛɛr, Farasee lɛ n ɩ, ka a Farasee nɩrɛ dɔɔ ma. N ara naa kana a ban tɔɔr a n 'yɛr, bojũu n sɔɔ naa ɩka kũu pɔ irfʊ ben be.”
A lɛ wʊn wa 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ ka a nɛchɩrɛ lo a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Saduseemɩne chara pɔ, ka a lɔ̃ɔfʊ ŋma jiir ayi.
Saduseemɩne 'yɛr ɩka kũu pɔ irfʊ ba be be ɛ, malakasɩ nɩ a nɩsɩɩr mɩ ba be be ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a Faraseemɩne 'lɔ sɔɔn ɩka a jaa ben be.

A gɔ̃mɔ̃ pɔɔfʊ tɩ gar naa ka a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe bamɩne na ɩ a Faraseemɩne ir ara tɩ chɩɩr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa ɩka, “Sɩn 'lɔ ba nyɛ a daba nyã chɛfʊ jie ɛ, tɩ ala wa ɩ sɩɛ kɔ̃ɔ bɩɩ malaka lɛ 'yɛr 'yɛr kʊ wʊ?”
A nɛchɩrɛ wa tɩ gar naa, ka a dãbãɛ kpɛ a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ a wʊ man tãa ban wa tɔɔr a Pɔɔl 'mɛl, ala lɛ so ka wʊ vɛ̃ a sojasɩ suu tɩ faa a Pɔɔl don be a sojasɩ yir.
A tãsɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, a sɩ Soro wa ara na gbʊr a Pɔɔl tɩ 'yɛr, “Nyɔɔ nyãa, a lɛ fʊn man a n yelmãɛ a ka a Jerusalɛm mɩ tɩ man a lɛ nɛ a be a Worom tẽe pɔ.”
Wɛr na wa chaar bibio, a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne jɛ̃n guor taa na ba pɔ'yɔ̃ɔ a ba mãɛ 'yɛrɛ ɩka ba kʊ̃ di bon jaa ɛ, bɩɩ nyũ bon jaa ɛ, ka bala baa kʊ a Pɔɔl ɛ.
Ba gar dɔɔr lɩjaayi na guor a guorfʊ nyãna.
Ba chen a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ sɛ̃, na ba tɩ 'yɛr, “Sɩ bin nɛɛ ɩka sɩ kʊ̃ di bon jaa ɛ, ka sɩn baa kʊ a Pɔɔl baar ɛ.
Pʊ̃pãanyã, yɩn nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ nɩbɛrɛ yɩ tʊ̃ 'yɛr a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ a wʊ waan a Pɔɔl a yɩ sʊʊr yele kɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a par. Sɩn na var gu be a sɔr pɔ kʊ wʊ ka waa ta a be a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl arbile wõ a guorfʊ nyã na wʊ chen be a sojasɩ yir na wʊ tɩ 'yɛr kʊ a Pɔɔl.
Ka a Pɔɔl bʊɔl a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ãsʊɔ na wʊ 'yɛr, “Tara a pɔlbile nyãna chiin a yɩ jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃ wʊ tara na 'yɛr na 'yɛr kʊ wʊ.”
Lɛ lɛ wʊ tara a pɔlbile chiin a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃ na wʊ tɩ 'yɛr, “A Pɔɔl na be a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ lɛ tʊ̃ bʊɔl ma na wʊ 'yɛr ɩka n tara a pɔlbile nyãna waan a fʊ sɛ̃, ka wʊ tara na 'yɛr na 'yɛr kʊ fʊ.”
Ka a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nyɔɔ a pɔlbile nũu tɔɔ yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ tɩ sʊʊr wʊ, “Baa lɛ fʊ bʊɔrɔ ɩka fʊ 'yɛr kʊ ma?”
A wʊ 'yɛr, “A Juu nɩbɛ guor taa na ban sʊɔr fʊ ka fʊn waan a Pɔɔl a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ sɛ̃ a bio ka a kaara fɩka ba bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka ba sʊʊr wʊ yele kɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a par.
Ta sɔɔ ɛ, bojũu ba gar nɩbɛ lɩjaayi na var gu wʊ, ba pɔn 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba mãɛ ɩka ba kʊ̃ di bon ɛ, bɩɩ nyũ bon jaa ɛ, ka bala ba kʊ wʊ ɛ. Bala ben chɔɔr baar a pʊ̃pãanyã tɩ chɛlɛ a fʊ nɛɛ.”
Ka a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ bar a pɔlbile sɔr tɩ kpãa wʊ 'yɛr, “Taa ɩrɛ wa vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka fʊ wan a n sɛ̃ ɛ.”

Tɩ pãa bʊɔl a wʊ nɩbɛrɛ ayi na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ chɔɔr sojasɩ kɔɔr ayi (200) na yɩ lɛ chɔɔr a sojasɩ lɩjaata nɩ pie (70) na bɔ̃ɔ wiisɩ dofʊ, nɩ sojasɩ kɔɔr ayi (200) mɩ na bɔ̃ɔ a pãɩ woor ala lɔbfʊ ka yɩ chen a Sisariya a tãsɔɔ nyãna.
Yɩ bɔ a wii ãsʊɔ kʊ a Pɔɔl a wʊ do jãnɛ a yɩ chiin wʊ vɩla tɩ kʊ a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Feliksɩ.”
A gãn wʊn sɛb 'lɔ nɩ nyã,
“Maa Kɩlaudiyus Lisiyasɩ lɛ sɛɛrɛ a gãn nyãna kʊrɔ a fʊ̃ʊ Feliksɩ a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ naa, n puor fʊ naa.
A daba nyãna lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ nyɔɔ na ba ta ɩka ba kʊ, tɩchɛ ɩn wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka Worom nɩrɛ lɛ wʊ ɩ, n chiin naa a n sojasɩ tɩ faan wʊ.
N ta bʊɔrɔ na ɩka n bɔ̃ɔ a yele 'lɔ jũu ban ba bara wʊ ɛ, naa de wʊ chiin be a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ nɩbɛrɛ sɛ̃.
Naa tɩ nyɛ ka ɩ a yele ɩ naa a ba nɛbinãa yele lɛ. Tɩchɛ saa lɛ nyɛ yele jaa wʊn maal na wʊ sɛɛn kũu bɩɩ die pɔ pɔɔfʊ ɛ.
Lɛ ban wa man kʊ ma ban guoro a daba nyã yele, ala lɛ so ka n vɛ̃ ka ba tara wʊ a fɔɔ a lɛ nɛ waan a fʊ sɛ̃. N mɩ 'yɛr kʊ a bala na tuoro wʊ a yele ɩka ba wa a fʊ sɛ̃ wa 'yɛr a fʊ mɩ kaa.”
A sojasɩ tun a lɛ a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na 'yɛr na ba de a Pɔɔl a tãsɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ jaa na ba tɩ tãn Antɩpatɩrsɩ tẽe pɔ.
Wɛr na wa chaar, ba vɛ̃n ka a wiir dẽme tara a Pɔɔl chiine, tɩchɛ ka a gbɛɛ dẽme lɩɛb wa a sojasɩ yir.
Lɛ ban tɩ ta a Sisariya tẽe pɔ ba den a gãn na ba kʊ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ tɩ de a Pɔɔl mɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʊ nũu pɔ.
Ka a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kar a gãn tɩ na wʊ sʊʊr a Pɔɔl a tẽbuor wʊn yi, wʊn wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Sɩlɩsɩya lɛ wʊ yi.
Ka a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr, “A bala na tuo fʊ a yele wa ta ala lɛ ɩn wõ a fʊ 'yɛr.” Wʊ vɛ̃n ka ba tara a Pɔɔl kpɛ̃n be a yir kpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ pɔ a Nãa Hɛrɔd na dɔ̃ɔ mɛ tɩ guro wʊ.
A ber anũu puor lɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Ananias suun chen be a Sisariya nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ bamɩne, ka a Tɛtulusɩ na ɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ pʊɔ ba a ba 'mataa chen na tɩ 'yɛr a Pɔɔl 'yɛr a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ niem.
Ban bʊɔl a Pɔɔl kpɛ̃n ka a Tɛtulusɩ na man a wʊ yele kʊ a Feliksɩ na wʊ 'yɛrɛ, “Sɩ din nʊ̃ɔ kor a fʊ jũu, ka a fʊ yɛ̃ lɩɛr yelvɩɛlsɩ kʊ a fʊ paal.
Jie jaa nɩ sɔr jaa pɔ fʊ ɩn nɩkpɛ̃vɩla, a sɩ sɔɔ de fʊ nɩ nuur ayi nɩ pʊpɛl.
Tɩchɛ n ba bʊɔrɔ ɩka n dam fʊ yɔɔ ɛ, yelbʊ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ n bʊɔrɔ ɩka n sʊɔr jaa bãlãa ka fʊ di kãnyir kʊ sɩ.
Sɩ nyɛn a daba nyãna ka wʊ ɩ gɔ̃bʊɔrɔ, a Juu nɩbɛ ba jaa lɛ wʊ ma tɔ a ba jur gbõtaa a wɛr wʊ jaa, na wʊ ɩ a nɩbɛ bala na turo a Najaretɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ nɩdiere.
Na wʊ bʊɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir sɔ̃ɔ barfʊ, ala lɛ so ka sɩ nyɔɔ wʊ.
Fʊ̃ʊ mãɛ fʊ sʊʊr wʊ kaa fʊn nyɛn bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a ala sɩn 'yɛrɛ dɔɔlɔ wʊ ɩn yelmãɛ.”
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ ba jaa na be be 'yɛr ɩka a lɛ a Tɛtulusɩ na 'yɛr ɩn yelmãɛ.
A paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kʊn a Pɔɔl sɔr a wʊ 'yɛr, ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr, “N bɔ̃ɔn naa an ɩ yuom yɔɔ lɛ fʊ kaa a paal nyãna, a nʊ̃mɔ̃ ma naa ka n na 'yɛr a n 'yɛr.
Fʊ̃ʊ sʊʊr ban 'yɛr ɩka a ba gar ber pie nɩ ayi ɩn chen be a Jerusalɛm ɩka n tɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn ɛ.
Ba ãsʊɔ jaa ba nyɛ ma ka n chɩrɛ nɩ nɩrɛ jaa be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir ɛ, bɩɩ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩyɔɔ be a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir ɛ, bɩɩ a tẽe pɔ jie jaa ɛ.
A anyãna ban 'yɛrɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma ãsʊɔ jaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ wiil ma a yelmãɛ ɛ.

Tɩchɛ n sɔɔ naa ɩka n puoro naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne na dɔ̃ɔ puoro naa lɛ turo a Sɔr 'lɔ ban bʊɔlɔ a sɔr yuo. N sɔɔn de a ala a jaa, na a sɔɔ lɛ a nɛɛ na sɔɔ nɩ a ala a jaa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb.
N mɩ tara naa a tɩɛrtɔ bʊ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩtãa a ba kaar ɩka nɩsʊ̃n nɩ a putudẽme na ir ɩ vʊɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka n mʊɔrɔ sɔ̃ɔ jaa ɩka a n pʊtɩɛr wʊ chaar Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a nɩrɛ niem.
“N yin kor, tɩ naa lɛ lɩɛb wa a Jerusalɛm nɩ libie ɩka n wa kʊ a nɔ̃n dẽme tɩ naa mɩ lo bɔɔr kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn.
N dɔ̃ɔ pɔl a n mãɛ baar a lɛ ban nyɛ ma a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ. Nɩyɔɔ ba dɔ̃ɔ pʊɔ ma ɛ, n mɩ ba dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ damfʊ jaa ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne na yi a Asɩya paal pɔ wa, bala mɩ lɛ a ta sɛɛ ɩka ba be ka na ba 'yɛr a n 'yɛr.
Bɩɩ a banyãna na be ka a ba wiil a yelnyɩnɛ ban nyɛ ɩn maal, a lɛ ɩn ara a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ niem.
Ala ba ɩ a 'yɛr bir bʊ̃'yen nyãna tɛɛ ɩn 'yɛr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa a lɛ ɩn ara a ba niem naa 'yɛr, ‘A kũn na ir ɩ vʊɛ, naa be ara a yɩ niem a yɩn tɔɔr a n 'yɛr a dɩna.’ ”
A Feliksɩ na wa pãa bɔ̃ɔn a Sɔr yele wʊ wɛl a nɩbɛ bar tɩ 'yɛr, “A Lisiyasɩ na ɩ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ wa wa ala lɛ ɩn 'yɛr a fʊ 'yɛr.”
Wʊ den a Pɔɔl kʊ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ tɩ 'yɛr ɩka a wʊ ma kʊ wʊ sɔr tɩ sɔɔ ka a Pɔɔl barmɩne ma sʊ̃nɔ̃ wʊ nɩ a wʊ bʊ̃bʊɔrsɩ.
A maal ber aŋmɩnɛ jaa tɩchɛ ka a Feliksɩ tara a wʊ pɔɔ Durusila na ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ waan. Wʊ tʊ̃n ka ba waan a Pɔɔl a wʊ chɛlɛ a lɛ wʊn mana a lɛ fʊn na sɔɔ de a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto.
Pɔɔl 'yɛr naa a lɛ nɛ wa pʊr yeltorsɩ yuor nɩ mãɛ nyɔɔfʊ nɩ lɛ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ na waara. Ka a dãbãɛ kpɛ a Feliksɩ a wʊ 'yɛr, “Pʊ̃pãanyã a sɛɛn lɛ, chiine maa wa tara jaa ɩn tʊ̃n bʊɔl fʊ.”
Wʊ tɩɛr man taa Pɔɔl na kʊ wʊn libie, na wʊ ma bʊɔlɔ a Pɔɔl jaa tɔ̃tɔ̃ ma 'yɛrɛ nɩ wʊ.
Yuom ayi na wa po Pɔsɩyusɩ Festus den a Feliksɩ jie, tɩchɛ a Feliksɩ na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ pɛl a Juu nɩbɛ pʊɔ jũu, wʊ bar a Pɔɔl a be a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ.
Festus na de a wʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃ maal ber ata wʊ yin be a Sisariya chen a Jerusalɛm.
Be lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a ba nɩdierbe man a 'yɛr ala ban tara nɩ, a Pɔɔl kʊ wʊ.
Ba sʊɔr a Festus nɩbijɩɛ jaa ɩka a lɛ ban sʊɔrɔ wʊ a wʊ sɔɔ na wʊ vɛ̃ a ba tara a Pɔɔl waan be a Jerusalɛm an ɩ ba chɔɔr ũu gu na kʊ a Pɔɔl a be a sɔr pɔ.
Ka a Festus 'yɛr, “A Pɔɔl ben a be a Sisariya a maa mãɛ a kʊ̃ kor ɛ, tɩchɛ ka n chen a be.
Yɩ vɛ̃ ka a yɩ nɩbɛrɛ bamɩne pʊɔ ma a sɩ 'mataa chen, ala ɩ wʊ maal yeldɛɛr a yɩ 'yɛr n kaa.”
Wʊn wa maal a be ber aniin bɩɩ pie wʊ chen a Sisariya, wʊn tɩ gã ir wʊ jãnɛ naa a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ jie tɩ na wʊ 'yɛr ɩka ba waan a Pɔɔl.
Ban wa waan a Pɔɔl a Juu nɩbɛ bala na yi a Jerusalɛm wa ara na jilʊ̃ wʊ ŋmara jir kara dɔɔlɔ wʊ tɩchɛ ba maa tʊ̃ɔ wiil a par ɛ.
A Pɔɔl pãa 'yɛr, “Maa ba maal dɛɛr jaa ɛ, naa sɔ̃ɔ a Juu nɩbɛ nɛbinãa nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʊ yir ɛ, bɩɩ 'yɛr 'yɛrdɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa ɛ.”
Festus bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka wʊ pɛl a Juu nɩbɛ pʊɔ na wʊ sʊʊr a Pɔɔl, “Fʊ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka fʊ do a Jerusalɛm ka a 'yɛr anyãna ban 'yɛr dɔɔl fʊ ka n tɩ tɔɔr a be bɩɩ?”
A Pɔɔl 'yɛr, “Pʊ̃pãanyã, n ben ara a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ jie a be an sɛɛ ɩka ba tɔɔr a n 'yɛr. N mɩ ba maal yeldɛɛr jaa a Juu nɩbɛ sɛ̃ ɛ, a lɛ a fʊ̃ʊ mãɛ na bɔ̃ɔn.

Maa ta maal dɛɛr naa sɛɛn kũu n kʊ̃ naa tɔr ɩka n kpi ɛ. Tɩchɛ a 'yɛr anyãna a Juu nɩbɛ na 'yɛr dɔɔl ma na ba ɩ yelmãɛ ɛ, nɩrɛ jaa ba tara sɔr na fɩr ma kʊ ba ɛ. Siisa sɛ̃ lɛ ɩn chen ka wʊ tɩ tɔɔr a n 'yɛr.”
Lɛ a Festus nɩ a wʊ nɩbɛrɛ na wa man taa baar wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a Pɔɔl, “Fʊ̃ʊ lɛ sʊɔr ɩka a Siisa sɛ̃ lɛ fʊn chen, be lɛ fʊn chen.”
A kor bãlãa ka a Nãa Agripa nɩ a wʊ yɛpɔɔ Bernisɩ wa be a Sisariya ɩka ba wa puor a Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Festus.
An ɩ ban jɛ̃n a be kor jũu, Festus mana naa a Pɔɔl yele kʊrɔ a Nãa Agripa 'yɛrɛ, “Daba kɔ̃ɔ lɛ be a pɔɔfʊ die pɔ a Feliksɩ na pɔɔ.
A lɛ ɩn chen a Jerusalɛm, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a ba nɩdierbe den yelyɔɔ dɔɔl wʊ na ba sʊɔr ma ɩka n tɔɔr a wʊ 'yɛr ge wʊ.
“Ka n 'yɛr kʊ ba a Worom nɩbɛ maa tɔɔr nɩrɛ 'yɛr ala ɩ a nɩnyɩnɛ ban 'yɛr a 'yɛr dɔɔl ba wa ara a bala na tara nɩ wʊ a 'yɛr niem na wʊ 'yɛr a wʊ nɛɛ 'yɛr ɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka ba pɔɔ ma a sɩ 'mataa wa a ka, n ba wa jɛ̃n a 'yɛr ɛ, a wɛr na wa chaar n jɛ̃ naa na tɔɔr a 'yɛr naa vɛ̃ ka ba waan a daba.
A bala na tara nɩ wʊ a 'yɛr na wa ir ara na 'yɛr, baa 'yɛr 'yɛr jaa na ɩ dɛɛr nɩtãa lɛ ɩn tɩɛr ban taa 'yɛr ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a ba 'yɛr tɩ ɩ naa a ba puorfʊ yele lɛ nɩ daba kɔ̃ɔ na di Yesu na kpi ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr ɩka wʊ ir naa na wʊ ɩ vʊr.
Ka a yele nyã sɔb ma nɩbir, n ba bɔ̃ɔ ŋmɩnɛ ɩn na ɩ vɩɛr a yele nyã ɛ, ala lɛ so ka n sʊʊr wʊ ala ɩ wʊn bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka wʊ chen a Jerusalɛm ka ba tɩ tɔɔr a 'yɛr anyãna a be.
Pɔɔl 'lɔ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa wʊ tɔɔr a wʊ 'yɛr, n vɛ̃n a ba tara wʊ tɩ tãn a lɛ ɩn na bar sɔr ka ba tara wʊ chiin a Siisa sɛ̃.”
Ka a Nãa Agripa pãa 'yɛr kʊ a Festus, “Maa mãɛ naa bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka n wõ a daba mɩ kɔkɔr.” Ka a Festus 'yɛr, “Bio fʊn wõn a wʊ kɔkɔr.”

A wɛr na wa chaar, a Nãa Agripa nɩ a Bernisɩ wa naa ka a nɩbɛ de 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ kʊ ba ka ba tɩ kpɛ̃n be a dikpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ pɔ ban ma lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a sojasɩ nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a tẽe nɩbɛrɛ. Ka a Festus vɛ̃ a sojasɩ tara a Pɔɔl waan.

Ka a Festus 'yɛr, “Nãa Agripa nɩ a yɩn bala jaa na be ka a sɩ sɛ̃, yɩ nyɛ a daba nyãna, a Juu nɩbɛ ba jaa 'yɛr a wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ma be a Jerusalɛm nɩ a ka a Sisariya tãna 'yɛrɛ ɩka a ba sɛɛ ka wʊ lɛ chɛnɛ go ɛ.
N mɩ ba nyɛ yele jaa wʊn ɩ ka a tara sɔr ka sɩn kʊ wʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ bojũu wʊ sʊɔr sɔr ɩka wʊ chen a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa sɛ̃, n mɩ na bar wʊn sɔr ka wʊ chen a Worom.
Tɩchɛ n ba tara a wʊ yele ala na sɛɛ ka n na sɛb kʊ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ ɛ. A lɛ jũu n waan wʊ naa a yɩ jaa niem nɩ a fʊ̃ʊ Nãa Agripa niem a fʊ mɩ jʊʊr a wʊ yele kaa, ka n bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ ɩn na sɛb.
Bojũu, a ba sɛɛn ma ɛ, ka n na vɛ̃ ka ba tara nɩrɛ ban pɔɔ chiine naa ba wiil a yelnyɩnɛ wʊn maal ɛ.”
Kaa Agripa pãa 'yɛr kʊ a Pɔɔl, “Fʊ tara na sɔr na 'yɛr a fʊ nɛɛ 'yɛr.” Pɔɔl tur naa a nũu tɩ piel mana a wʊ mãɛ yele,
“Nãa Agripa, a ɩ man bɔɔsʊ̃n ɩn ara a fʊ niem a dɩna naa na man a n yele ala a jaa a Juu nɩbɛ na 'yɛr dɔɔl ma.
Yelmãɛ jaa lɛ, a fʊ̃ʊ mãɛ jaa bɔ̃ɔn naa a Juu nɩbɛ yelbinsɩ a jaa nɩ a ba nɛchɩrɛ, a lɛ jũu n sʊɔr fʊ naa ka fʊ di kãnyir chɛlɛ ma.
“A Juu nɩbɛ ba jaa bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ɩn be a bibile daar jaa, a maa paal pɔ nɩ a ka a Jerusalɛm mɩ.
Ba bɔ̃ɔ man kor na ban tʊ̃ɔ di a lɛ dãasɩɛ ala ɩ ba bʊɔrɔ naa. Ba bɔ̃ɔn ma naa ɩn turo yele jaa nɛ nɛ nɛ a sɩ puorfʊ pɔ, naa ɩ a Farasee nɩrɛ.
A pʊ̃pãanyã a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ kʊ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne ka n tara a tɩɛr jũu lɛ so ka n 'yɛr be tɔɔrɔ a dɩna.
A nɛ tɩra anyãna jũu lɛ a sɩn bʊrɔ pie nɩ ayi ɩ a sɩ tɩɛrtɔ fʊ jie, ka a na wa ɩ a sɩ mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir puoro a Nãaŋmɩn mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ tãsɔɔ. A fʊ̃ʊ nãa a tɩɛrtɔ nyãna jũu, a Juu nɩbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma a 'yɛr.
Bo lɛ so ka yɩ tɩɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ sãɩ kũu ɛ?
“A maa mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ŋme nyãa naa ɩka ɩn ɩ naa lɛ jaa ɩn na tʊ̃ɔ naa sɔ̃ɔ a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ yuor.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ n ɩ be a Jerusalɛm. A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ kʊ man sɔr ka n nyɔɔr a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo yɔɔ naa pɔɔ, bala wa kʊrɔ ba n ma sɔɔ naa.
Sɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ jaa, n ma chen a be a ba lɔ̃ɔfʊ jiir naa tɩ ge ge ba, naa ma fɩrɛ ba 'yɛr 'yɛr dɛbɛ tɩchɛ a maa tʊ̃ɔ ɩ a lɛ ɛ. A lɛ a ba yele na dire ma a suur n ma chen a wɛr yuo pɔ tɩ ge ba a be.
“Ala jũu lɛ a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ dɔ̃ɔ kʊ ma a sɔr ka n chiine a Damaskus.
Mɔ̃tɔ̃tuo sɔ̃ɔ lɛ fʊ̃ʊ nãa, a lɛ ɩn be a sɔr pɔ, n nyɛn chãa na yi saaju chaar mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wʊ jilʊ̃ ma nɩ a bala ɩn lɔ̃ɔ chiine.
Sɩ jaa lon tẽe tɩchɛ ka n wõ nɩrɛ na sʊrɔ ma nɩ a Heburu kɔkɔr, ‘Sɔɔl, Sɔɔl bo lɛ fʊ gere ma a lɛ? Fʊ wõn tuo fʊn tɛb a dakʊra.’
Be lɛ n pãa sʊʊr, ‘Fʊ̃ʊ nɩ ana, Soro?’ A wʊ 'yɛr, ‘Maa lɛ a Yesu 'lɔ fʊn gere.
Pʊ̃pãanyã ir ara, n yi fʊ naa, naa ir fʊ a fʊn ɩ a n tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ na fʊ mʊɔlɔ a ala fʊn nyɛ a dɩna nɩ a ala ɩn na wiil fʊ.
Ɩn faa fʊ naa a fʊ̃ʊ mãɛ nɩbɛ nuur pɔ, nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nuur pɔ. Maa lɛ tʊ̃nɔ̃ fʊ,
tɩ yuo a ba nɩbie na fʊ tɔɔ ba yin a libe pɔ, waan a chãa pɔ, na fʊ yin a Satan kpɛ̃ɔ pɔ, waan a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, a wʊ vɛ̃ a ba yelbier kʊ ba ka ba mɩ nyɛ jie nɩ a bala na sɔɔ de ma, ka n faa ba.’
“A lɛ jũu, Nãa Agripa, n ba tɔr a nyɛfʊ nyã na yi a saaju ɛ.

N den nie man kʊ a Damaskus dẽme, nɩ a Jerusalɛm dẽme, nɩ a Judiya wɛr wʊ jaa, nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ mɩ. N mʊɔl kʊ ba ɩka ba lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr, na ba lɩɛb wa Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, na ba vɛ̃ ka ba tʊ̃mɔ̃ wiil ɩka ba lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr.
Ala lɛ so a Juu nɩbɛ nyɔɔ ma a ba puorfʊ yir bɛchaar pɔ bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba kʊ ma.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ sʊ̃ʊ ma wa tãn a dɩna, ka n be ara na man kʊ nɩrɛ jaa. N ba 'yɛr 'yɛr jaa tɩ põn a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ na 'yɛr ɩka an ɩ naa ɛ,
ɩka a Nɩ-iraa na din dɔɔyɛ na wʊ mɩ ɩ nɩrɛ na de nie ir a kũu pɔ, na wʊ man a chãa 'yɛr kʊ a wʊ nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ.”
Kana lɛ a Pɔɔl ta ka a Festus kpɛ tãn wʊ tɩ 'yɛr, “Pɔɔl a tɩɛr bɔr fʊ naa, a jãn yɔɔ vɛ̃n ka fʊ gele.”
Ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr, “Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Festus n ba gele ɛ, ala ɩn 'yɛrɛ ɩn yelmãɛ nɩ yɛ̃ 'yɛr.
A nãa bɔ̃ɔn a yele anyãna ala lɛ so ka n lɔb yãan bar tɩ 'yɛrɛ nɩ wʊ. N sɔɔ naa ɩka a yele anyãna ba sɔɔl wʊ ɛ, bojũu a yele nyã ba ɩ libe pɔ ɛ.
Nãa Agripa, fʊ sɔɔn a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ bɩɩ? N bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka fʊ sɔɔ naa.”
Ka a Nãa Agripa pãa sʊʊr a Pɔɔl, “Fʊ tɩɛr man tãa a dɩna tɛɛ lɛ fʊn lɩɛb ma ka n ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto turo bɩɩ?”

A Pɔɔl 'yɛr, “Ka dɩna tɛɛ lɛ bɩɩ daar kɔ̃ɔ lɛ yo, n sʊɔrɔ naa Nãaŋmɩn ɩka a ta ɩ a fʊ̃ʊ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩ nɩrɛ jaa na chɛlɛ a 'yɛr nyãna a dɩna ka yɩ kaara a n kaar tɩ na ba taa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ yɩ a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ anyãna ɛ.”
Ka a nãa vaa ir nɩ a wʊ nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Bernisɩ lɔ̃ɔn a bala wʊn 'mataa jãnɛ nɩ.
Ba yin a die pɔ, pãa 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr kʊrɔ taa na ba 'yɛrɛ, “A daba nyãna ba maal yele jaa na sɛɛn kũu bɩɩ pɔɔfʊ ɛ.”
Ka a Agripa 'yɛr kʊ a Festus, “Fʊn taa tʊ̃ɔ bar a daba nyãna ala ɩ waa ta sʊɔr sɔr ɩka wʊn chen a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa sɛ̃ ɛ.”
An wa ta ɩka sɩn chen a Itali, ba den a Pɔɔl nɩ a bamɩne ban pɔɔ kʊ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ban bʊɔlɔ Julius, wʊ ɩ naa a nãkpɛ̃ɛ soja kpɛ̃ɛ ãsʊɔ.
Sɩ kpɛ̃n a gboro kpɛ̃ɛ na yi a Adɩramatiyum ka wʊ ir an ɩ Asɩya kõkoor lɛ wʊn lana. Aristakus na ɩ a Masedonɩya paal nɩrɛ na wʊ yi a Tɛsalonika pʊɔ sɩ naa.
A wɛr na wa chaar, sɩ tãn a Sidon tẽe pɔ, ka a Julius maal a Pɔɔl vɩla na wʊ bar wʊ sɔr ka wʊ chen a wʊ barmɩne sɛ̃ ka ba tɩ sʊ̃nɔ̃ wʊ.
Be lɛ sɩ lɛ yin a gboro lana a Sipurusɩ bojũu a sɛsɛbɛ furo na tuoro sɩ.
A lɛ sɩn wa gɔ̃ɔ a man sãlsɔɔ Sɩlɩsɩya nɩ a Pamfiliya kõkoor lɛ sɩ wa ara nɩ a Mira na be a Lisiya wɛr pɔ.
Be lɛ a soja nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nyɛ a Aleksandiriya gboro kpɛ̃ɛ na chiine a Itali ka wʊ wɛl sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A ber waa naa sɩn maal a sɔr pɔ, jaa vɛ̃ nɛ nɛ nɛ lɛ sɩ chiine ka a wõ sɩ tɩ sɩ tɩ ta a Sɩnidusɩ tẽe pɔ. Lɛ a sɛsɛbɛ na ba sɔɔrɔ a sɩ chiine a dẽdẽe ɛ, a gboro tun sɩ naa a Kɩrete a Salmone tẽe puor.
A man kõkoor lɛ sɩ lana ka a wõ sɩ tɩ tãn a jie ban bʊɔlɔ a Gboro Juvɩla Ara A Jie na gbʊr a Lasea tẽe.
Sɩ sɔ̃ɔn sɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ a sɔr pɔ a sɛsɛbɛ na furo jũu, ka a gboro chenfʊ mɩ kʊrɔ dãbãɛ bojũu Kɔ̃ Galfʊ sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ mɩ po naa, ka a Pɔɔl kpãana ba 'yɛrɛ,
“Nɩbɛ, n kãan nyɛ ka a dãbãɛ be a sɩ chenfʊ pɔ, yelyɔɔ na sɔ̃ɔ naa, a gboro tuor nɩ a sɩn mãɛ mɩ.”
Tɩchɛ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ba chɛlɛ a lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ sɔɔ a lɛ a gboro mɔ̃nɔ̃ nɩ lɛ a gboro sʊɔ na 'yɛr.

A gboro ara a jie ba sɛɛn ban na ara a be a ɔɔr sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a ba yɔɔ jaa 'yɛr naa ɩka ba po chiine, tɩɛrɛ ɩka ban tãn a Fonɩksɩ na ba ara a be. A Kɩrete gboro ara a jie lɛ na tor a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ purfʊ jie guba nɩ a nũsʊ̃ɔ jie.
Lɛ a sɛsɛbaalʊ̃ʊ na wa furo yire a guba jie, ba tɩɛr ɩka ba nyɛn a lɛ ban bʊɔrɔ, ba for a kur nɛbie bara tɩ lana nɩ a gboro a Kɩrete gogoro.
An wa kor bãlãa, ka a sɛsɛbɛ kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban bʊɔlɔ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ purfʊ jie guba sɛsɛbɛ fun yi a be wa.
A sɛsɛbɛ tʊ̃ɔn a gboro a waa lɛ tʊ̃ɔnɔ̃ chiine a niem ɛ, ka a sɛsɛbɛ pãa tara sɩ chiine.
A lɛ sɩn wa pã a dõdolbile ãsʊɔ ban bʊɔlɔ Kawuda, a ɩn tuo kʊ sɩ ka sɩn 'mɔɔ a gborbile.
Lɛ a nɩbɛ na wa 'mɔɔ a gborbile ka wʊ do, ba den miir lũ gbɛb a gborkpɛ̃ɛ. Sɩ joro na dãbãɛ ɩka sɩ taa ɩrɛ wa tɩ mʊr a Sirtisɩ bire pɔ ɛ, ka ba bar a kur nɛbie ka a gboro pãa tɔɔrɔ.
A sɛsɛkpɛ̃ɛ nyã mɔ̃n sɩn jaa ka wɛr wa chaar ka ba piel wɛlɛ a tuor lɔɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a kʊ̃ɔ pɔ.
A ber ata daar a gboro dẽme mãɛ foro naa a gboro bomo nɩ a ba mãɛ nuur lɔɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a kʊ̃ɔ pɔ.
Lɛ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ a ŋmarbie na ba lɛ wa nyɩr ɛ, a ber waa naa tɩchɛ ka a sɛkpɛ̃ɛ chɛnɛ ire ka a sɩ chãɛfʊ tɩɛrtɔ jie baar.
A ber wa po naa tɩ baa di bon jaa ɛ, ka a Pɔɔl ir ara a ba sãlsɔɔ tɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Nɩbɛ, yɩn ta sɔɔ tu a n nɛɛ ka sɩ ta chɛnɛ be a be Kɩrete a wõm nyãna kʊ̃ naa pɔɔ sɩ ɛ, ka a bonsɩ be wɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ n sʊɔrɔ yɩ naa, yɩ nyɔɔ nyãa bojũu ãsʊɔ jaa kʊ̃ bɔr ɛ, a gboro tɛɛ lɛ na wɛ.
Jãa tãsɔɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na so ka n tʊ̃nɔ̃ a wʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃ tʊ̃n a wʊ malaka ka wʊ wa ara a n lõboor,
na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ma, ‘Pɔɔl taa joro dãbãɛ ɛ, fʊn nyɛn a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa nɩ nɩbir ka wʊ tɔɔr a fʊ 'yɛr. Ka a bala jaa fʊn lɔ̃ɔ chiin Nãaŋmɩn den a ba nyɛvʊr 'yɔ̃ɔ a fʊ nũu pɔ.’
A lɛ jũu yɩ nyɔɔ nyãa nɩbɛ, n sɔɔn de Nãaŋmɩn ɩka wʊn ɩ naa a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr kʊ ma.
Tɩchɛ sɩn don dõdol kɔ̃ɔ ju ara.”
A ber pie nɩ anaar daar, a sɛsɛbɛ chɛnɛ na mʊɔrɔ nɩ sɩ be a Adiriya man yal pɔ, a tãsɔɔ bãɩn ka a bala na kaara a gboro tɩɛr man tãa ba gbʊrɔ na gogoro.
Ba den a bon 'lɔ ban ma mana nɩ a kʊ̃ɔ, man ka a man yulʊ̃fʊ ɩ gbɛɛ kɔbaa dɔɔl lɩjɛr (120). Ban wa chen bãlãa ba lɛ man kaa ka a yulʊ̃fʊ lɛ ɩ gbɛɛ lɩjaanaar nɩ pie (90).
Ba joro na dãbãɛ ɩka a gboro wʊ taa tɔ̃n sɩ kʊsɩr ɛ, a ba wɛl a nɛbie ala anaar na ma nyɔɔ a gboro lɔb 'yɔ̃ɔ a man pɔ tɩ pãa sʊɔrɔ ɩka wɛr wʊ chaar fɔɔ.
Ka a gboro dẽme bʊɔrɔ sɔr ban na yi a gboro pɔ jo na ba for a gborbile bar ka wʊ suu a man pɔ tɩ maala fɩka a nɛbinyɔɔrsɩ ala lɛ ba foro bara a niem.
A Pɔɔl pãa 'yɛr kʊ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a sojasɩ, “Yɩn baa vɛ̃ ka a gboro dẽme banyãna be a gboro pɔ ɛ, sɩ wɛ naa a lɛ nɛ.”
Ka a sojasɩ ŋmaa a miir 'lɔ na nyɔɔ a gborbile taa lɛ ka wʊ lo.
Lɛ a wɛr na ɩrɛ a wa lalala, Pɔɔl sʊɔr ba jaa na wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩ di a bʊ̃diir bojũu ber pie nɩ anaar nɩ nyã yɩn jɛ̃n baal na yaa di bon jaa ɛ.
Pʊ̃pãanyã, n sʊɔrɔ yɩ naa ɩka yɩ di a bʊ̃diir na yɩ tara kpɛ̃ɔ, a yɩ ãsʊɔ jaa jukɔɔlbir kʊ̃ vʊ̃ɔ a wʊ ju pɔ ɛ.”
A anyãna lɛ wʊ 'yɛr baar tɩ na wʊ de a paanʊ̃ɔ amɩne puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan a ba jaa niem, tɩ pãa ŋmaa na wʊ ɔɔrɔ.
Ka a 'yɔ̃ɔ ba jaa ãkpɛ̃ɛ ka a ba mãɛ di a bʊ̃diir amɩne.
A sɩn bala na be a gboro pɔ ɩ naa nɩbɛ kɔɔr ayi dɔɔl lɩjaata nɩ pie nɩ ayʊɔb (276).
Lɛ ban wa di tɩɩ baar, ba wɛl a bʊ̃diir ala na chɛ lɔb 'yɔ̃ɔ a man pɔ tɩchɛ ka a gboro ɩ dẽfere.
Lɛ a wɛr na wa chaar, baa bɔ̃ɔ a jie ban be ɛ, tɩchɛ na ba nyɛ a jie na gɔr ka a bire be be a ba bʊɔrɔ ɩka ala ɩ ba tʊ̃ɔ naa a ba tɩ ara.
Ba ŋman a mibe ala na nyɔɔr a nɛbinyɔɔrsɩ ala bar, na ba mɩ lɛ for a vuulsɩ ala na ma dɛnɛ a gboro tɩ pãa yɛr a fɔbaa bar a gboro niem ka a sɛsɛbɛ pãa tɔɔrɔ ba chiine a bire pɔ.
Tɩchɛ ka a gboro tɩ tɔ a bire na duo a jie ãsʊɔ, ka a gboro niem mʊr wʊ jaa na wʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ chen ɛ. Ka a kɔ̃sɛbɛ ŋmiere a gboro pãa wɛlɛ.
Ka a sojasɩ ɩ nɛbʊ̃'yen bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba kʊ a bala ban pɔɔ ka a ãsʊɔ jaa taa dũu yi jo ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ faa a Pɔɔl jũu, waa sɔɔ ɩka ba ɩ a lɛ ɛ. Wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ naa a bala na bɔ̃ɔ a dũufʊ ka ba ɔɔ lo a kʊ̃ɔ pɔ de nie dũu do a gogoro ju.
Ka a bala na chɛ mɩ nyɔɔr a gboro daar bɩɩ a gboro da'mɛlɛ ala, nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ba ɩ ka ba ãsʊɔ tɩ jaa do a gogoro ju ka yele ba tara ba ɛ.
Sɩ jaa na wa do baar, ba 'yɛr ɩka a dõdol yuor din Malta.
A nɩbɛ bala na be a be maal sɩn vɩla, ba gbɔɔn bũu na ba bʊɔl sɩ a sɩ tɩ uoro, bojũu saa lɛ waara ka ɔɔr kʊrɔ.
Ka a Pɔɔl mɩ vaar delsɩ wa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bũu pɔ, ka a dʊ̃pãn na be a delsɩ pɔ, a bũu tʊl kpɛ ka wʊ yi dʊ̃ a Pɔɔl nũu mar taalɛ.
Lɛ a gogoro dẽme bala na wa nyɛ a lɛ a waa na mar a Pɔɔl nũu pɔ jɔ̃jɔlɔ, ka ba 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ taa, “A daba nyãna na ɩn nɩkʊrɔ, a man na ba di wʊ gba ɛ, tɩchɛ yeltorsɩ kʊ̃ sɔɔ ka wʊ be be ɛ.”
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl mɩr a waa 'yɔ̃ɔ a bũu pɔ tɩ yele jaa ba tara wʊ ɛ.
A nɩbɛ tɩɛr man tãa a nũu na mɔr wʊ naa bɩɩ a wʊ vaa lo kpi. Tɩchɛ ban chɛl lɛ̃ɛɛ wa faa ka a yele jaa ba ɩrɛ ɛ, ba lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ taa, “Ŋmɩn lɛ wʊ ɩ.”
A dõdol 'lɔ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ban bʊɔlɔ Pubilusɩ tara na jie na gbʊr a be a wʊ de sɩ sãan, na wʊ kʊ sɩ bʊ̃diir ber ata.
A Pubilusɩ sãa bɩɛrɛ na gã, ãgãn tʊl nɩ masʊmɔ̃ lɛ wʊ nyɩɛrɛ. Pɔɔl kpɛ̃n tɩ nyɛ wʊ, wʊn wa sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn baar wʊ dɔɔl wʊ naa nũu sãa wʊ.
Lɛ a anyãna na wa ɩ, baalsɩ bala jaa na be a jie 'lɔ mɩ wa naa ka Pɔɔl sãa ba jaa baalsɩ.
Ba den 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ kʊ sɩ sɔɩ jaa pɔ, a lɛ sɩn wa chɔɔr na yi, ba kʊ sɩn bon jaa sɩn na bʊɔrɔ.
Sɩ maal a be ŋmɛrsɩ ata tɩ na sɩ lɛ kpɛ a gboro ãsʊɔ na ara a be a sãɛ. A gboro yin Aleksandiriya na wʊ tara ŋmɩn yɩbɛ Kasɩtor nɩ Poluksɩ.
Sɩ tɩ ara naa Sɩrakusɩ maal ber ata a be.
Be lɛ a gboro yin sɩ tãn a be a Wuregiyum. Wɛr na wa chaar ka a ɩ a guba jie sɛsɛbɛ furo naa, a ber ayi daar ka sɩ ta a be Puteyoli na sɩ suu a be.
Be lɛ sɩ pɔɔ a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo bamɩne ka ba bʊɔl sɩ ka sɩ tɩ maal daa gbul a ba sɛ̃. Lɛ lɛ a ɩ tɩ sɩ pãa wa ta a Worom.

A Nãaŋmɩn puorbo na be a Worom na wa wõ ɩka sɩ waara naa, ba yin tuor sɩ tɩ ta Apiyusɩ Daa pɔ na ba pɔɔ sɩ a Sãanba Kpɛfʊ Jiir Ata. A lɛ a Pɔɔl na wa nyɛ a nɩbɛ banyãna wʊ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan ka a 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ ãkpɛ̃ɔ.
Lɛ sɩn wa ta a Worom, ba sɔɔ naa ka a Pɔɔl kpɩɛrɛ a wʊ yõ tɩchɛ ka a soja kaara wʊ.

Pɔɔl na wa maal ber ata, wʊ bʊɔl naa a Juu nɩbɛ nɩdierbe lɔ̃ɔ taa. Lɛ ban wa duo ka wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “N yɛɛr, n gba na ba maal yele jaa bɔr a sɩ nɩbɛ sɛ̃ ɛ, bɩɩ 'mab a sɩ sãakpãmɩne yel-ɩrsɩ ɛ, tɩ ba nyɔɔ ma naa be a Jerusalɛm na ba kʊ a Worom nɩbɛ.
Ba chɛ̃pɛ̃n a yele faa na ba ta bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba bar ma bojũu n ba maal yele jaa na sɛɛn kũu ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ na ba sɔɔ ɛ, ka n faa tɩ sʊɔr sɔr ka ba chiin ma a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa sɛ̃. A ba ɩ n tara na yele kɔ̃ɔ na de dɔɔl a n nɩbɛ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu lɛ so ka n bʊɔrɔ ɩka n nyɛ yɩ naa 'yɛr yɩ. Bojũu a Isɩral nɩbɛ tɩɛrtɔfʊ jie jũu lɛ ba gbar ma nɩ a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ anyãna.”
Ka ba 'yɛr, “Saa nyɛ gãn jaa yi a Judiya dẽme sɛ̃ ɛ, ka a sɩ yɛɛr bala mɩ na yi a be wa ba 'yɛr a fʊ 'yɛrdɛɛr jaa kʊ sɩ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ sɩn bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka sɩ bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ fʊn nyɔɔ, bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka jie jaa nɩbɛ 'laar naa a yele nyãna.”

Ba 'yɔ̃ɔn bɩbir ban lɛ wa a Pɔɔl sɛ̃, a bɩbir na wa vɩɛ ba wan yɔɔ jaa a be wʊn kpɩɛrɛ. An yi a bibio tɩ tãn a jãanʊɔr na wʊ mana a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ kʊrɔ ba, na wʊ de a Mosesɩ nɛɛ nɩ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na sɛb bʊɔrɔ ɩka wʊ lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr ka ba sɔɔ a Yesu.
Bamɩne lɩɛb ba tɩɛr a lɛ wʊn 'yɛr, tɩchɛ ka a bamɩne ba sɔɔ de ɛ.
Ba chɩrɛ nɩ taa na ba piel yire lɛ a Pɔɔl na wa 'yɛr a wʊ 'yɛr baaraa na wʊ 'yɛr, “A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr yelmãɛ kʊ a yɩ sãakpãmɩne a lɛ wʊn de a wʊ 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Isaiya nɛɛ
'yɛr, ‘Chen a nɩbɛ banyãna sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr kʊ ba, “Yɩn wõn lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ yɩ kʊ̃ wa bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ, yɩn fur nɩbir 'yɔ̃ɔ tɩ yɩ kʊ wa nyɛ bon jaa ɛ.”
Bojũu a nɩbɛ banyãna nyãn kpɛ̃mɛ naa, baa wõnõ ɛ, ba ma ũun a ba nɩbie, ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, ban taa nyɛn naa ba nɩbie na ba wõn a ba tobo bɔ̃ɔ a par na ba lɩɛb wa a n sɛ̃ ka n sãa ba.’
A lɛ jũu, n bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn den a wʊ faafʊ 'yɛr tɩ kʊ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ na chɛlɛ naa.”
Pɔɔl yab a yir 'lɔ pɔ wʊn kpɩɛrɛ yuom ayi, tɩ ma de nɩrɛ jaa na ma wa a wʊ sɛ̃.
Yele jaa ba ŋmaa wʊ sɔr ɛ, ka wʊ 'lara na wʊ mʊɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ 'yɛr na wʊ wile ba nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr.
Maa Pɔɔl na ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto gbãgbaa, Nãaŋmɩn na kaa ir bʊɔl ka n ɩ a wʊ nɩtʊ̃nãa naa ɩ a wʊ 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ, lɛ sɛɛrɛ kʊrɔ a yɩn na be a Worom.
A 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã wʊn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr nɛɛ a kõr jaa tu a wʊ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ sɛ̃ ka ba sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ,
na ɩ a wʊ Bie 'yɛr, ban dɔɔ ka wʊ ɩ a Nãa David bal nɩrɛ.
A tu naa a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pɔ wiil kpɛ̃ɔ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn Bie lɛ, na wʊ ir yi a kũn pɔ ɩ vʊr, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a sɩ Soro.
A tun a wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩ a wʊ yuor jũu, sɩ nyɛn wãɛfʊ nɩ a nɩtʊ̃nsɩ tʊ̃mɔ̃ na sɩn bʊɔl nɩrɛ jaa, ka ba wa wõnõ a wʊ toor nɩ sɔɔfʊ.
Yɩn mɩ pʊɔn a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na bʊɔl ka yɩ ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sofʊ.
N sɛɛrɛ na kʊrɔ a yɩn bala jaa na be a Worom a Nãaŋmɩn na nʊ̃, na wʊ bʊɔl yɩ a yɩ ɩ a wʊ nɩbɛ. Wãɛfʊ nɩ nyã'maar na yi a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jie a be a yɩ sɛ̃.
N den nie puor a maa Nãaŋmɩn yãan a yɩ jaa jũu tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, bojũu a yɩ sɔɔfʊ ŋmen yaar a wɛr wʊ jaa.
A Nãaŋmɩn nyã ɩn tʊ̃nɔ̃ kʊrɔ nɩ a n nyãa wʊ jaa, naa mʊɔlɔ a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã na ɩ a wʊ Bie 'yɛr, di man dãasɩɛ lɛ ɩn ma tɩɛrɛ a yɩ yele.
N ma sʊɔrɔ naa Nãaŋmɩn ba gala ɛ, naa sʊɔrɔ ɩka a wʊ bɔfʊ a ɩ, ka wʊ yuo sɔr a pʊ̃pãanyã kʊ ma ka n wa a yɩ sɛ̃.
N bʊɔrɔ naa yɩ nyɛfʊ naa na tʊ̃ɔ wiil yɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʊfʊ amɩne ka a 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ ãkpɛ̃ɔ.
Lɛ lɛ, a yɩn nɩ maa na pãa nʊ̃ɔ kpɛ̃mɛ a sɩ sɔɔfʊ pɔ.

N yɛɛr, n bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ ɩn mʊɔrɔ sɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ jaa, ɩka n wa a yɩ sɛ̃ tɩchɛ ka a sɔr pɔɔ wa tãn dɩna. Ɩn taa nyɛn a yɩ bamɩne a ba puoraa nɩtãa lɛ ɩn nyɛ a yɩ bamɩne na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, tɩ puoro.
N din a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala mɩ na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, nɩ a yɛ̃ dẽme nɩ a jɔlɔ sãn.
Ala lɛ so ka n mʊɔrɔ ɩka n mʊɔl a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ kʊ a yɩn mɩ na be a Worom.
Vã ba kʊrɔ ma nɩ a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyãna 'yɛrfʊ ɛ, bojũu a ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ wʊn de faara nɩ nɩrɛ jaa na sɔɔ, a Juu nɩbɛ lɛ de nie, ka bala mɩ na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, mɩ tu.

Bojũu a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã na wiil nɩrɛ lɛ wʊn na tor Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, torfʊ 'lɔ na yi sɔɔfʊ pɔ, yi a pielfʊ tɩ tãn a baaraa nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, “Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara sɔɔfʊ, tor naa, wʊn tara na nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ.”
Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃n ka a wʊ suur yele yi a saaju gã chãa pɔ, ɩka wʊ nyɛn suur 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na ba puoro ɛ, nɩ putudẽme bala na pɔɔ a yelmãɛ nɩ a ba putuyele.
An ɩ a ala ban na de bɔ̃ɔn a Nãaŋmɩn gãn chãa pɔ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn mãɛ lɛ ir wiil ba.
Bojũu, an yi a lɛ daar jaa a Nãaŋmɩn na mɛ a wɛr, nɩbɛ na tʊ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, ka wʊ ɩ Nãaŋmɩn mãɛ nɩ a bonsɩ ala wʊn maal, a lɛ jũu, tu yifʊ jie ba lɛ be be go ɛ.
Bojũu, ban sɔɔ bɔ̃ɔn a Nãaŋmɩn a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃, tɩ baa kʊ wʊ tɩɩr ɛ, bɩɩ dãna wʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ a ba tɩɛrsɩ ɩn burbur, ka a ba jɔl nyãn ala pãa lii.
Ban sɔɔ 'yɛr ɩka yɛ̃ bɔ̃ɔnbɔ lɛ ba ɩ, ba ɩn jɔlɔ,
an ɩ ba lɩɛb a tɩɩr 'lɔ ban taa kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ba kpire ɛ, na ba kʊ a bʊtɩbɛ ala ban pɛ̃n, ka a kaara a nɩbɛ kaar na kpire, nɩ lubil, nɩ dʊ̃n, nɩ dʊ̃gbɛɛ anaar jaa bʊrɔ.
Ala lɛ so ka Nãaŋmɩn ir nũu tɩchɛ ba bar be a ba vɔldɛɛr pɔ, ka ba bʊ̃nɔ̃ gãna nɩ taa, sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa nɩ a ba ãgãma.
Ba den a Nãaŋmɩn yelmãɛ tɛɛn jire, na ba puoro tɩ tʊ̃nɔ̃ kʊrɔ a bonsɩ ala a Nãaŋmɩn na maal, tɩ bar a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a ma maala 'lɔ a pɛɛfʊ na sɛɛn bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
A anyãna jũu, Nãaŋmɩn de ban bar be a vã vɔlaa pɔ. Ka a ba pɔbɔ gba ma lɩɛb gãna nɩ a ba pɔɔ taa ba.
A lɛ nɩ wʊ ju lɛ a dɔɔr mɩ bar a pɔbɔ bɔfʊ, ka a vɔlaa vɛ̃ ka ba lɩɛb bʊɔrɔ a ba taa dɔɔr. Dɔɔr na lɩɛb tʊ̃nɔ̃ a vã tʊ̃mɔ̃ nyãna nɩ a ba taa dɔɔr ba nyɛn a ba tʊ̃dɛɛr toor tɔɔfʊ.
Baa nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔ̃ɔfʊ a wʊ sɛɛn ba ɛ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn bar ba a be a ba tɩɛr sɔ̃ɔnaa pɔ, ka ba maala a ala na ba sɛɛn maalfʊ ɛ.
Ba sɛɛn naa putuo jaa bʊrɔ, bier ɩfʊ, bɔgar dẽme, nɩ bier maalfʊ. Nyuur sɛɛn ba naa, na ba ɩ nɩkʊrbɔ, bʊɔrɔ jɛɛr, na ba bɛlɛ taa, na ba tɩɛrɛ taa sɔ̃ɔfʊ. Ba ɩn gagarsɩ,
sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ taa yoe, 'laar Nãaŋmɩn, kpɛrɛ taa, mãɛ 'mɔɔfʊ nɩ yobɔyele. Ba bɔ̃ɔn sɔɩ ban ma tu maal bier, baa turo a nɩbɛ bala na dɔɔ ba nɛɛ ɛ.
Baa tara tɩɛr ɛ, baa tara yelmãɛ ɛ, baa tara nʊ̃fʊ ɛ, baa kaara nɩrɛ nɩbaal ɛ.
Ban sɔɔ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn toraa nyãna binfʊ, ɩka a nɩbɛ bala na maala a anyãna sɛɛn nɩ kũu, bala mãɛ tɛɛ ba lɛ maala a anyãna ɛ, tɩchɛ ba ma sɔɔ naa a bala na tʊ̃nɔ̃ a anyãna.

Yɩn a lɛ jũu, yaa mɩ tara tu yifʊ jie ɛ, a yɩn bala na ma tɔɔrɔ a bamɩne 'yɛr. Yele jaa pɔ fʊn tɔɔr a fʊ tɔ sʊɔ 'yɛr fʊ mɩ 'yɔ̃ɔn fʊ mãɛ 'yɛr, bojũu fʊ mɩ ɩn a yele 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a fʊ tɔ sʊɔ na ɩ, a fʊ tɔɔr a wʊ 'yɛr.
Pʊ̃pãanyã, sɩ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na tɔɔr naa a bala na ɩrɛ a yelsɩ anyãna 'yɛr tun yelmãɛ sɔr pɔ.
A lɛ a fʊ̃ʊ nɩsaal mɩ na tɔɔrɔ nɩbɛ 'yɛr, tɩ na fʊ mɩ maal a yele ala nɩ a ju, fʊ tɩɛr ɩka fʊn pɔl yi a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ pɔ ɔ?
Bɩɩ yɩ nyɛ naa Nãaŋmɩn yɛ̃ bɔ̃ɔn yɔɔ jũu, nɩ a wʊ maalvɩla, nɩ a wʊ kãnyir, na yaa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn maalvɩla wile yɩn tɩɛr lɩɛb fʊ sɔr ɛ?
Tɩchɛ a yɩ nyãkpãɛn nɩ yɩn ba lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr jũu, yɩ guoro naa a Nãaŋmɩn sutuo bine kʊrɔ a yɩ mãɛ guro nɩ a wʊ suur bɩbir 'lɔ wʊn na tɔɔr nɩrɛ jaa 'yɛr nɩ torfʊ.
Nãaŋmɩn “na yab nɩrɛ jaa lɛ wʊn tũ jã.”
Bala na mar ara na ba tʊ̃nɔ̃ vɩla bʊɔrɔ tɩɩr, nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ, nɩ a ala na ba pʊ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ, wʊn kʊ ban nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ bala na bʊɔrɔ a ba mãɛ bɔb, na ba tɔr a yelmãɛ tɩ turo dɛɛr, Nãaŋmɩn suur nɩ a wʊ kpãafʊ gãn kʊ ba.
Wõm nɩ tuo difʊ na ben be kʊ nɩsaal jaa na ɩrɛ yelbier. An piel naa a Juu nɩbɛ sɛ̃, tɩ mɩ lʊ̃ɔ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ tɩɩr nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ nɩ nyã'maar na ben be kʊ nɩrɛ jaa na maala vɩla, a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn ba tara kaa gar taa ɛ.
Bala jaa na ba bɔ̃ɔ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ tɩ tʊ̃ dɛɛr, mɩn wɛ naa ban ba bɔ̃ɔ a nɛɛ jũu, ka bala jaa mɩn bɔ̃ɔ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ tɩ tʊ̃ a dɛɛr Nãaŋmɩn na den a nɛɛ nyã tɔɔr a ba 'yɛr.
Bojũu a ba ɩ a bala na wõnõ a nɛɛ lɛ tor a Nãaŋmɩn niem ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala na turo a lɛ a nɛɛ na 'yɛr bala lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛr ɩka ba tor naa.
Sɩrɛ jaa a bala jaa na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, na baa tara a Mosesɩ nɛbinãa ɛ, ba gba ma ɩ naa a yelsɩ a nɛɛ na 'yɛr, bojũu bala mãɛ ɩn a nɛɛ ban sɔɔ ba tara a nɛɛ ɛ.
Ba wiil ɩka a lɛ a nɛɛ na bʊɔrɔ sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ be a ba nyãa pɔ, ka a ba tɩɛr mɩ di dãasɩɛ ma gɔ̃nɔ̃ ba bɩɩ 'yɛrɛ pʊɔrɔ ba.
A anyãna na ɩ naa a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn na tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ na wʊ tɔɔr nɩrɛ jaa yelsɔɔlsɩ nɩtãa lɛ ɩn 'yɛrɛ a n 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ.
Pʊ̃pãanyã a fʊ̃ʊ, ala ɩ fʊ bʊɔlɔ na a fʊ mãɛ Juu nɩrɛ, na fʊ dɩɛl a Mosesɩ nɛɛ na fʊ jɩrɛ lɛ fʊ̃ʊ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn na tara nɛbʊ̃'yen,
ala ɩ fʊ bɔ̃ɔ naa a wʊ bɔfʊ na fʊ bɔ̃ɔ a 'lɔ na gar a jaa bojũu a nɛɛ lɛ wiil fʊ,
ala ɩ fʊ chɛn nyãa ɩka jɔ̃tɔɔrɔ lɛ fʊ ɩ, na fʊ ɩ chãa chaara a bala na be a libe pɔ,
na fʊ wile a jɔlɔ, na fʊ wile a bibiir, bojũu a Mosesɩ nɛɛ pɔ lɛ fʊ nyɛ a bɔ̃ɔfʊ nɩ a yelmãɛ.
Fʊ̃ʊ nyã na wile a fʊ taaba, faa wiil a fʊ mãɛ ɛ? Fʊ̃ʊ nyã na ma 'yɛrɛ ɩka jufʊ ba ɩ ɛ, fʊ ma ju naa ɔ?
Fʊ̃ʊ na ma 'yɛrɛ ɩka nɩbɛ ba ta sɛ̃nɛ ɛ, fʊ ma sɛ̃n bɩɩ? Fʊ̃ʊ nyã na kpɛrɛ a tɩbɛ tɩ fʊ ma juro naa a tɩbɛ der bonsɩ bɩɩ?
Fʊ̃ʊ nyã na jɩrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ nyã, fʊ ma 'yɔ̃ɔn Nãaŋmɩn vã fʊn sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a nɛɛ ɔ?
Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, “A yɩ jũu lɛ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a n yuor.”
Yʊɔr ŋmaafʊ tara na tɔ̃nɔ̃ ala ɩ fʊ turo naa lɛ a nɛɛ na 'yɛr, tɩchɛ ala ɩ fʊ̃ʊ baa turo a nɛɛ ɛ, fʊn kaara fɩka faa ŋmaa yʊɔr ɛ.
Ala ɩ a bala na ba ŋmaa a yʊɔr ɛ, turo na lɛ a nɛɛ na bin, ba kʊ̃ kaara fɩka yɔŋmarba lɛ ba ɩ ɛ?
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba ŋmaa a yʊɔr a ãgãn pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ na wʊ turo a nɛɛ jaa nɛ nɛ nɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩn 'yɛr, a yɩn bala gba na tara a nɛbinsɩ gãn na fʊ ŋmaa a yʊɔr tɩ faa turo a nɛbinsɩ ɛ.
Nɩrɛ na ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ba ɩ a ãgãn nyã yele tɛɛ lɛ ɛ, bɩɩ a yʊɔr ŋmaafʊ na ɩ a ãgãn yele ɛ.
Kai, wʊ ɩn a Juu nɩrɛ na be a pʊɔm, ka a wʊ yʊɔr ŋmaafʊ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na ŋmaa a wʊ nyãa yʊɔr a ba yi a nɛbinsɩ gãn pɔ ɛ. A nɩrɛ nyãna pɛɛfʊ ba yire nɩbɛ sɛ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ a yin Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
Bo tɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a Juu nɩrɛ tara, bɩɩ bo tɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ be be a yʊɔr ŋmaafʊ pɔ?
Sɔr jaa pɔ, ala na de nie lɛ ɩka bala lɛ Nãaŋmɩn de nie kʊ a wʊ 'yɛrbie.
Bo lɛ na ɩ ala ɩ bamɩne ba tara sɔɔfʊ ɛ? A ba ba sɔɔfʊ na tʊ̃ɔn sɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn yelmãɛ bar bɩɩ?
Kai, sɔr ba be be ɛ! Vɛ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn ɩ yelmãɛ sʊɔ, tɩchɛ ka a nɩrɛ jaa ɩ jir ŋmara. Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, “Lɛ lɛ na wiil ɩka fʊ tor naa a fʊ 'yɛrbie pɔ, na fʊ tʊ̃ɔ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ jie.”
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a sɩ ba torfʊ vɛ̃n ka Nãaŋmɩn torfʊ gã chãa pɔ, sɩ lɛ 'yɛr bo? Sɩ 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn ba tor ɛ, wʊn vɛ̃ ka a wʊ sutuo dire sɩ ɔ? Nɩsaal nɛchɩrɛ lɛ a nyãna.
Sɩrɛ jaa ba lɛ ɛ. Ala ɩ lɛ lɛ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ tɔɔr a wɛr nɩbɛ 'yɛr?
Nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ na chɩrɛ na, “Ka ala ɩ a n ba torfʊ wiil naa ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn ɩn yelmãɛ sʊɔ ka a wʊ tɩɩr pʊɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ, bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ma 'yɛr ɩka yelbe-ɩrɛ lɛ n ɩ?”
Bo lɛ so ka sɩ kʊ̃ 'yɛr nɩtãa lɛ a yosɔ̃ɔnbɔ na 'yɛr ka a bamɩne mɩ 'yɛrɛ ɩka sɩ 'yɛr ɩka, “Yɩ ɩ a sɩ maala dɛɛr tɩ ka a lɩɛrɛ vɩla?” A ba sɔ̃ɔfʊ sɛɛn ba naa.
Bãa lɛ sɩn pãa de baar? Sɩn lɛ sa ba bɩɩ? Kai, sɔr ba be be ɛ. Sɩ den nie 'yɛr ɩka a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ba jaa nyɛntaa na ba be a yelbier pɔ.
Nɩtãa lɛ ban sɛb a ba yele 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, “Nɩtoraa jaa ba be be ɛ, nɩbʊ̃'yen gba ba be be ɛ.
Nɩbʊ̃'yen jaa ba be be bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ 'yɛr par ɛ, nɩbʊ̃'yen jaa ba yʊɔrɔ bʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ.
Ba jaa lɩɛb puor, ka ba jaa lɩɛb ɩ nɩsɔ̃ɔnsɩ. Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa ba maala vɩla ɛ, nɩbʊ̃'yen gba ba be be ɛ.”
“A ba kɔkɔbɔɔr yuon fɩka yar, ka a ba jãlbie bɔ̃ɔ bɛlfʊ.”
“Pɔ'yɔ̃ɔfʊ nɩ 'yɛr bitor lɛ ma yire a ba nɛɛr pɔ.”
“A ba gbɛɛ ma pɔɔrɔ naa jãɩ kpaarfʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Sɔr jaa ban de, sɔ̃ɔfʊ nɩ dɔɔyɛ lɛ ma ɩ a jãnɛ.
Baa bɔ̃ɔ nyã'maar sɔr ɛ.”
“A ba nɩbie ba joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbãɛ ɛ.”
Pʊ̃pãanyã, sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka lɛ jaa a Mosesɩ nɛɛ na 'yɛr, wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a bala na be a nɛɛ pɔ ɩka, a kpal nɩrɛ jaa nɛɛ, ka a wɛr nɩbɛ ba jaa wa man a ba nɛɛ 'yɛr kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn.
A lɛ jũu, nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ ɩ nɩtor a Nãaŋmɩn niem wʊn turo a nɛɛ jũu ɛ, an ɩ a tun a nɛɛ nyã pɔ, ka sɩ bɔ̃ɔ bier.
Tɩchɛ pʊ̃pãanyã, a chaar naa ɩka a torfʊ na yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, ba yi a Mosesɩ nɛɛ pɔ ɛ, ala lɛ a nɛɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ di dãasɩɛ.
A torfʊ nyã na yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, ɩn a sɔɔfʊ na tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, kʊ a bala jaa na sɔɔ de. Tɛɛ taa jaa ba be be ɛ.
Bojũu nɩrɛ jaa maal dɛɛr na baa ta a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr ɛ.
A Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ jũu, wʊ vɛ̃n ka sɩ tor na wʊ 'yɛrfaa sɩ pɔrɔ tu a faafʊ 'lɔ na yi a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃.
Nãaŋmɩn de wʊn a wʊ ɩ a bɔɔrlo bon, a wʊn de a wʊ jãɩ pɛɛn nɩrɛ jaa tu a sɔɔfʊ jũu. Nãaŋmɩn maal a anyã na wʊ wiil a wʊ torfʊ, bojũu a wʊ kãnyir vɛ̃ naa ka wʊ bar a ba yeldɛbɛ ala ban dɔ̃ɔ maal gefʊ.
Wʊ maal naa lɛ na wiil a wʊ torfʊ a pʊ̃pãanyã, na wʊ ma vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa na sɔɔ de a Yesu yele, tor.
Nyɩnɛ lɛ a yobɔyele lɛ be? A ba pʊɔ be ɛ. Yelbuor jũu? A Mosesɩ nɛɛ ban turo jũu bɩɩ? Kai, sɔɔfʊ jũu lɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka sɩn chɛnɛ sɔɔ ɩka nɩrɛ yele ma tor naa wʊn tara sɔɔfʊ a ba ɩ wʊn turo a nɛbinãa jũu ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn ɩn a Juu nɩbɛ tɛɛ Nãaŋmɩn bɩɩ? Waa ɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ mɩ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ? Ɔ̃ɔ, wʊ ɩn a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ mɩ tʊɔr.
An ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bʊ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ be be, 'lɔ lɛ na vɛ̃ ka a yɔŋmarba yele tor sɔɔfʊ jũu, na wʊ mɩ vɛ̃ ka a bala na ba ŋmaa a yʊɔr ɛ, yele mɩ tor a sɔɔfʊ jũu.
Sɩ pãa den a sɔɔfʊ nyã sɔ̃ɔn a nɛbinãa bar bɩɩ? Kai, sɔr ba be be ɛ. Sɩn lɛ pãa bɔ̃ɔ turo wʊ.
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ sɩn pãa 'yɛr a sɩ sãakpã Abraham 'yɛr, a yele nyãna pɔ?
Ala ɩ sɩrɛ jaa Abraham yele dɔ̃ɔ tor a wʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃ jũu, wʊn taa tara na yele kɔ̃ɔ bʊɔrɔ nɩ yuor, tɩchɛ a kʊ̃ naa ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn niem lɛ ɛ.
Bo lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn 'yɛr? Wʊ 'yɛr ɩka, “Abraham sɔɔn de Nãaŋmɩn ka a lɛ vɛ̃ ka wʊ ɩ nɩtor.”
Pʊ̃pãanyã nɩrɛ wa tʊ̃tʊ̃mɔ̃, a wʊ sãyar ba ɩ kʊfʊ ɛ, tɩchɛ a wʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃ sãyar lɛ.
Ala lɛ so nɩrɛ 'lɔ an ba ɩ tʊ̃mɔ̃ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊn sɔɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ na ma vɛ̃ ka a putudẽme yele tor, a wʊ sɔɔfʊ lɛ ma vɛ̃ ka wʊ ɩ a nɩtor.
A Nãa David mɩ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a 'yɛr bir nyãna nɩ wʊ ju, na wʊ 'yɛr ɩka, bɔɔsʊ̃n sʊɔ lɛ a 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ a wʊ ɩ nɩtor ka tʊ̃mɔ̃ ba pʊɔ ɛ.
“Bɔɔsʊ̃n dẽme lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ a ba bɔrfʊsɩ kʊ ba, ka a ba yelbebe ala pɔɔ.
Bɔɔsʊ̃n lɛ a 'lɔ a sɩ Soro na ba lɛ sɔrɔ a wʊ yelbier dɔɔlɔ wʊ ɛ.”
A bɔɔsʊ̃n nyãna ɩn a yɔŋmarba tɛɛ bon bɩɩ, a mɩ ɩn a bala na ba ŋmaa a yʊɔr ɛ, bon? Sɩ 'yɛr ɩka Abraham sɔɔfʊ vɛ̃n ka wʊ ɩ nɩtor.
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ anyãna dɔ̃ɔ ɩ kʊ wʊ? Wʊn ŋmaa a yʊɔr baar lɛ bɩɩ wʊn ba ŋmaa sɛrɛ lɛ? A ba ɩ wʊn ŋmaa baar ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊn dɔ̃ɔ ba ŋmaa sɛrɛ lɛ.

Nãaŋmɩn wa bɩɛr man wʊ a yʊɔr ŋmaafʊ yele, ka a ɩ jãnɛ ɩka a wʊ yele tor naa a wʊ sɔɔfʊ jũu wʊn dɔ̃ɔ ba ŋmaa a yʊɔr sɛrɛ ɛ. Lɛ lɛ wʊ pãa ɩ a bala jaa na sɔɔ de sãa, tɩchɛ na baa ŋmaa a ba yɔɩ ɛ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃ a ba ɩ nɩtorsɩ.
Wʊ mɩ ɩ naa bala jaa na ŋma a yɔɩ sãa. A ba ɩ yʊɔr ŋmaafʊ tɛɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ ban tara a sɔɔfʊ na ba turo nɩ a lɛ a sɩ sãa Abraham na dɔ̃ɔ turo tɩ wa ŋmaa a yʊɔr.
A ba ɩ a nɛbinãa jũu lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ kʊ a Abraham nɩ a wʊ yɔn ɩka bala lɛ na so a wɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊn ɩ nɩtor a wʊ sɔɔfʊ jũu lɛ.
Ala ɩ a bala na turo a nɛbinãa lɛ so a wɛr ɛ, sɔɔfʊ ba lɛ tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ wʊn tɩr mɩ ɩ pɔrɔ.
Bojũu a nɛbinãa waara nɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn suur. A jie 'lɔ mɩ a nɛbinãa na ba be ɛ, a nɛɛ bɔrfʊsɩ mɩ ba be be ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, a nɛtɩraa wa naa a sɔɔfʊ jũu, ka a Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ na sʊ̃ʊ a Abraham yɔn ba jaa, a ba ɩ a bala na turo a nɛɛ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala na tara a Abraham sɔɔfʊ, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a sɩ jaa sãa.
Nɩtãa an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, “N maal fʊ naa a fʊ ɩ a paal yɔɔ sãa.”
Tɩɛrtɔfʊ jie ba lɛ be be ɛ, tɩ Abraham tara tɩɛrtɔ jie, na wʊ sɔɔ de ka a lɛ vɛ̃ ka wʊ ɩ a paal yɔɔ sãa, nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ wʊ, “Lɛ lɛ a fʊ yɔn na wa be.”
Waa bal a wʊ sɔɔfʊ pɔ ɛ, wʊ mãɛ nyɛn bɔ̃ɔn a wʊ ãgãn na kor jʊɔl, bojũu yuom kɔbaa lɛ wʊ nyɛ ka a Saara mɩ ab.
Tɩchɛ Abraham ba tara baal a wʊ sɔɔfʊ pɔ, nɩ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a wʊ nɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊ nyɛn kpɛ̃ɔ a wʊ sɔɔfʊ pɔ, na wʊ de tɩɩr kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn.
Wʊ sɔɔn de nuur ayi ɩka Nãaŋmɩn tara na kpɛ̃ɔ na maal a lɛ wʊn tɩr a wʊ nɛɛ.
A anyãna lɛ so ka a Nãaŋmɩn, vɛ̃ a wʊ ɩ nɩtor.
A 'yɛrbir na 'yɛr ɩka, Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃n a wʊ ɩ nɩtor, a ba sɛb a 'lɔ tɛɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ,
tɩchɛ a mɩ ɩn a sɩ bon, Nãaŋmɩn mɩ na vɛ̃n a sɩ yele ka a tor, sɩn bala jaa na sɔɔ ɩka, 'lɔ lɛ sãɩ a Yesu na ɩ a sɩ Soro a kũu pɔ.
A sɩ yelbebe jũu lɛ ba dɔ̃ɔ kʊn wʊ, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn sãɩ wʊ a kũu pɔ a wʊ ɩ vʊr, na wʊ vɛ̃ ka sɩ tor.
Wʊn ben vɛ̃ a sɩ tor a sɩ sɔɔfʊ jũu, sɩ tara na nyã'maar Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ tu a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ sɩ tu nyɛ sɔr a sɩ sɔɔfʊ jũu kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ nyã pɔ sɩn ben ara a pʊ̃pãanyã, na sɩ chɩlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr tɩɛrtɔ nyã jũu.
A ba ɩ lɛ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ mɩ chɩlɛ na a sɩ dɔɔyɛ pɔ, bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a dɔɔyɛ lɛ na waan kãnyir,
ka a kãnyir wiil a lɛ fʊn be, ka a lɛ fʊn be mɩ waan tɩɛrtɔfʊ jie.
Ka a tɩɛrtɔfʊ jie kʊ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ vã ɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn kpaar naa a wʊ nʊ̃fʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ nyãn pɔ, tu a wʊ Sɩɛ 'lɔ wʊn de kʊ sɩ.
Yaa nyɛ, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ na sɛɛ lɛ, sɩn sɔɔ chɛnɛ ba tara kpɛ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ Kɩrɩsɩto kpin kʊ a bala na ba puoro ɛ.
An kpɛ̃mɛ naa ɩka nɩrɛ na sɔɔn kpi kʊ nɩrɛ yele na tor, amɩne nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ na tʊ̃ɔn sɔɔ kpi kʊ nɩrɛ na ɩ nɩsʊ̃.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn wiil a wʊ mãɛ nʊ̃fʊ a nɩtɔ̃ kʊ sɩ, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ sɩn chɛnɛ ɩ yelbe-ɩrbɛ, Kɩrɩsɩto kpin kʊ sɩ.
An ben ɩka pʊ̃pãanyã wʊ ben vɛ̃ a sɩ tor a wʊ jãɩ jũu, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an pãa kaara wʊn faa sɩ yin a Nãaŋmɩn suur pɔ.
Bojũu ala ɩ a lɛ sɩn dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃dẽme, ka a wʊ Bie kũu wa 'maal wʊ kʊ sɩ, a lɛ wʊn ben 'maal sɩ, wʊn faa sɩ naa tu a wʊ nyɛvʊr pɔ.
A ba ɩ anyã tɛɛ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ chɩlɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ tu a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, tu a 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩn ben nyɛ a 'maalfʊ a pʊ̃pãanyã.
Nɩtɔ̃ jũu lɛ a yelbier kpɛ a wɛr pɔ tu nɩbʊ̃'yen 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a kũu mɩ tu a yelbier 'yɔ̃ɔ mɩ wa, sɔr nyã lɛ a kũu mɩ tu pɔɔ nɩrɛ jaa, bojũu ba jaa maal yelbier.
Sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka a Mosesɩ wa bin a nɛɛ, yelbier den nie be ka a wɛr pɔ, tɩchɛ lɛ a nɛbinãa na ba dɔ̃ɔ be be ɛ, ba maa de yelbier maal bon ɛ.
Tɩchɛ kũu din nãa yi a Adama sɔ̃ɔ tɩ tãn a Mosesɩ sɔ̃ɔ, na wʊ gba mɩ tʊ̃ɔ a bala na ba maal a yelbier sɔ̃ɔ a nɛɛ a Adama kaar ɛ, Adama lɛ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a 'lɔ na wa wa gãagiel.
Tɩchɛ a kʊfʊ ba kaara a bɔrfʊ kaar ɛ, bojũu ala ɩ nɩyɔɔ kpi naa nɩbʊ̃'yen bɔrfʊ jũu, Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ nɩ a wʊ kʊfʊ ala na wa tu a nɩbʊ̃'yen Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wãɛfʊ jũu, na yaar kʊ nɩyɔɔ gar a lɛ.
A Nãaŋmɩn kʊfʊ gba ba nyɛtãan a nɩbʊ̃'yen yelbier 'lɔ ɛ. 'Yɛr tɔɔrfʊ tun a yelbe bʊ̃'yen 'lɔ na wʊ waan sɔ̃ɔfʊ, tɩchɛ a kʊfʊ mɩ tun a bɔrfʊsɩ yɔɔ pɔ, naa waan torfʊ.

Bojũu ala ɩ a nɩbʊ̃'yen bɔrfʊ jũu kũu din nãa tu a nɩbʊ̃'yen 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a bala na nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ nɩ a kʊfʊ 'lɔ na ɩ a torfʊ, na din nãa a ba nyɛvʊr pɔ tu a nɩbʊ̃'yen Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
An ɩ nɩbʊ̃'yen bɔrfʊ jũu lɛ waan sɔ̃ɔfʊ wa 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɩbɛ ba jaa, lɛ lɛ so nɩbʊ̃'yen mɩ na maal ka a tor, mɩ lɛ vɛ̃ ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa tor na ba nyɛ nyɛvʊr.
Nɩtãa lɛ a bawõno bʊ̃'yen na vɛ̃ ka a nɩyɔɔ ɩ yelbe-ɩrbɛ, lɛ mɩ lɛ a tu nɩbʊ̃'yen na tu Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ mɩ vɛ̃, ka a nɩyɔɔ mɩ ɩ nɩtorsɩ.
A nɛɛ pʊɔn 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a bɔrfʊsɩ mɩ waa. Tɩchɛ jie 'lɔ a yelbier na pʊɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ, Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ ma pʊɔn 'yɔ̃ɔ gar a lɛ.
Nɩtãa lɛ a yelbier na di nãa a kũu pɔ, lɛ mɩ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ na di a nãa tu a yeltorsɩ pɔ, na wʊ waan nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Sɩ pãa 'yɛr ɩka bo? Sɩ chɛnɛ ɩrɛ a yelbier tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ pʊɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃?
Kai, sɔr ba be be ɛ! Sɩ kpin kʊ yelbier, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a ɩ a sɩn lɛ chɛnɛ be a pɔ?
Bɩɩ yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a sɩn bala jaa na so a Nãaŋmɩn kʊ̃ɔ, wʊ pɔl sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ, a sɩ lɔ̃ɔ kpin wʊ nɩ a wʊ kũu pɔ ɛ?
A lɛ jũu, ba ũu sɩ naa a kʊ̃ɔ pɔ, a kũu kaar, ka a lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto na dɔ̃ɔ ir a kũu pɔ, tu a Sãa tɩɩr pɔ, ka sɩ mɩ na be be tara nyɛvʊr paalaa.
Ala ɩ sɩn nɩ 'lɔ 'mantaa a wʊ kũu pɔ, sɩn nɩ 'lɔ na 'mantaa ir a kũu pɔ.
Sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a sɩ ãgãn koraa pʊɔ naa a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, a ba kpan wʊ a be a daa ju, ka a yelbier ãgãn ba lɛ tara kpɛ̃ɔ a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, saa lɛ ɩ a yelbier gbãgbaar ɛ.
Bojũu nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na kpi, wʊ yin yelbier pɔ.
Ala ɩ sɩn nɩ Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ 'mataa kpi, sɩ sɔɔ naa ɩka sɩn nɩ 'lɔ lɛ na 'mataa be be tara a nyɛvʊr.
Bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a Kɩrɩsɩto na ir a kũu pɔ, wʊ kʊ̃ lɛ kpi go ɛ, kũu ba lɛ tʊ̃ɔ wʊ ɛ.
A kũu wʊn kpi, wʊ kpin kʊ yelbier gbɛbʊ̃'yen kʊ nɩrɛ jaa, tɩchɛ a wʊ nyɛvʊr pɔ wʊn be, wʊ ben be kʊ Nãaŋmɩn.
A lɛ nɛ nɩ wʊ ju mɩ lɛ ɩka, yɩ kaa a yɩ mãɛ ɩka, yɩ kpin kʊ yelbier, tɩ be be kʊ Nãaŋmɩn, Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jũu.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ta sɔɔ ka yelbier lɛ di nãa a yɩ ãgãn nyãn na kpi ka yɩ turo a wʊ dɛɛr bɔfʊ ɛ.

Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa diere a yɩ ãgãn jie ãsʊɔ jaa kʊrɔ yelbier maalfʊ ɛ, ka a ɩ putuyele tʊ̃tʊ̃bomo ɛ. Tɩchɛ yɩ sɔɔ de a yɩ mãɛ kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn, nɩtãa nɩbɛ na yi kũu pɔ tara nyɛvʊr, na yɩ sɔɔ de a yɩ ãgãn jiir kʊ wʊ, ka a ɩ yeltorsɩ tʊ̃tʊ̃bomo.
Bojũu, yelbier ba lɛ ɩ a yɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ɛ, bojũu yaa chɛnɛ be a Mosesɩ nɛbinãa pĩlem ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ ben a Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ pĩlem.
Ka bo go? Sɩ chɛnɛ ɩrɛ a yelbier bojũu sɩn ba lɛ chɛnɛ be a nɛɛ pĩlem ɔ, tɩ be a wãɛfʊ pĩlem bɩɩ? Kai, sɔr ba be be ɛ!

Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka ala ɩ fʊ wa den fʊ mãɛ kʊ nɩrɛ na fʊ turo a wʊ nɛɛ gbãgbaa kaar, fʊ ɩn gbãgbaa kʊ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ nɛɛ fʊn turo, ka yelbier gbãgbaa lɛ fʊ ɩ a 'lɔ na chiine a kũu pɔ, bɩɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ tufʊ 'lɔ mɩ na chiine nɩ fʊ a yeltorsɩ jie.
Tɩchɛ n puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, yɩn dɔ̃ɔ gba ɩ a yelbier gbãgbaar, tɩ yɩ wa sɔɔn naa a yɩ nyãa wʊ jaa na yɩ de a yɩ mãɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wiilfʊ nyã pɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn faa yɩn yin a yelbier pɔ a yɩ so yɩ mãɛ, na yɩ lɩɛb yeltorsɩ gbãgbaar.

Nɩsaal 'yɛr lɛ n de man a yɩ ãgãma yɩn ba tʊ̃ɔnɔ̃ nyɔɔrɔ jũu. Nɩtãa lɛ yɩn dɔ̃ɔ ma de a yɩ ãgãn jiir ka a ɩ gbãgbaar kʊ a ala na ba vɩɛl ɛ, naa ma pʊɔrɔ putuyele 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃, pʊ̃pãanyã 'lɔ, yɩ de a yɩ mãɛ ka a ɩ yeltorsɩ nɩ chɛchɛ ɩfʊ gbãgbaar.
Yɩn dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a yelbier gbãgbaar, a yeltorsɩ ba so yɩ ɛ.
Tɔ̃nɔ̃ buor lɛ yɩ nyɛ yin a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a yelsɩ ala na ben ɩ vã a pʊ̃pãanyã? A bomo ala baarfʊ daar ɩn kũu.
Tɩchɛ pʊ̃pãanyã, Nãaŋmɩn na ben faa yɩ yin a yelbier pɔ a yɩ ɩ a wʊ gbãgbaar, a tɔ̃nɔ̃ yɩn nyɛ ɩn chɛchɛ ɩfʊ ka a baaraa ɩ nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ.
Bojũu yelbier sãyar ɩn kũu, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn kʊfʊ ɩ nyɛvʊr na ba tara baarfʊ ɛ, tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Yaa be bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, yɛɛr, n 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ a bala na bɔ̃ɔ a nɛbinãa ɩka a nɛbinãa ma tʊ̃ɔn nɩrɛ na chɛnɛ nɩ nɩbir ɛ?
De man pɔɔ na kul sɩrɛ, a nɛɛ lũ wʊn mar a sɩrɛ ka wʊ chire dayuo na gãn wʊ, a sɩrɛ na chɛnɛ ba kpi ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɩrɛ wa kpi, a kul taa nɛɛ 'lɔ ba lɛ lũ wʊ go ɛ.
'Lɔ wa tɩ ir dayuo a sɩrɛ na chɛnɛ vʊrɔ, ban 'yɛr naa ɩka wʊ sɔ̃ɔ naa. Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a sɩrɛ kpi naa, a nɛɛ ba lɛ lũ wʊ go ɛ, ala ɩ wʊ gba na kul dayuo, waa sɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Lɛ lɛ, n yɛɛr yɩ mɩ kpin kʊ a nɛbinãa tu a Kɩrɩsɩto ãgãn pɔ, ka yɩn be be kʊ nɩyuo, a 'lɔ na ir a kũu pɔ ka sɩn tʊ̃ɔ wɔ̃ wɔ̃mɔ̃ kʊ Nãaŋmɩn.
Bojũu a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a yelbier ãgãn na so sɩ, ka a yelbier vɔlaa ma de a nɛbinãa tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ tʊ̃mɔ̃ a sɩ ãgãn pɔ a sɩ wɔ̃nɔ̃ kũu wɔ̃mɔ̃.
Tɩchɛ pʊ̃pãanyã, sɩ kpin kʊ a 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ lũ sɩ, sɩ son sɩ mãɛ yi a nɛbinãa 'lɔ pɔ, na sɩ pãa tʊ̃nɔ̃ a sɔpaalaa nyã pɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na ba ɩ a sɔkoraa ban sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ a gãn pɔ ɛ.

Bo lɛ sɩn lɛ 'yɛr go? A nɛbinãa ɩn yeldɛɛr bɩɩ? Kai, sɔr ba be be ɛ! Waa ɩ yeldɛɛr ɛ. Sɩrɛ jaa n kʊ̃ naa bɔ̃ɔ yelbier ɛ, ala ɩ a nɛbinãa ba be be ɛ. Bojũu n kʊ̃ naa bɔ̃ɔ jɩɛlfʊ ɛ, ala ɩ a nɛbinãa ba ta 'yɛr ɩka, “Taa jɩɛlɛ nɩrɛ bon ɛ.”
Tɩchɛ a yelbier far kpɛ na wʊ nyɛ sɔr a nɛbinãa sɛ̃ vɛ̃ ka n wɔ̃ jɩɛlfʊ jaa bʊrɔ vɔlaa. A nɛbinãa baa be be ɛ, yelbier ɩn bʊ̃kũu.
Ɩn dɔ̃ɔ be be ba bɔ̃ɔ a nɛbinãa ɛ, tɩchɛ a nɛbinãa na wa wa, yelbier faan a nyɛvʊr, ka a kũu kʊ ma.
Be lɛ n nyɛ ɩka a nɛbinãa 'lɔ naa waan nyɛvʊr, kũu lɛ wʊ bar tɩ waan.
Bojũu a yelbier nyɛn sɔr a nɛbinãa na kʊ wʊ, a wʊ far kpɛ na wʊ bɛl ma, ka a tu a nɛbinãa nyã pɔ, ka a kũu kʊ ma.
A lɛ jũu, a nɛbinãa ɩn chɛchɛ, ka a nɛbinãa 'yɛr mɩ ɩ chɛchɛ, naa tor ɩ vɩla.
Bon 'lɔ na ɩ bʊ̃vɩla pãa lɩɛb kũu wa kʊ ma? A ba ɩ lɛ lɛ ɛ. Tɩchɛ n bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a ɩn yelbier, na a lɩɛb kũu kʊ ma tu a bon 'lɔ na ɩ vɩla pɔ. A tu naa 'yɛr binãa pɔ, ka bier na ɩ yelbier sɩrɛ jaa.
Sɩn bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a nɛbinãa ɩn Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ bon lɛ, tɩchɛ ka a maa ɩ ãgãn yelbier na da ka n ɩ a wʊ gbãgbaa.
N maa bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ ɩn maala ɛ, bojũu a ala ɩn bʊɔrɔ ɩka n maal n maa maal ɛ, tɩchɛ a ala ɩn 'laar lɛ n ma maala.
Ala ɩ n ma maala naa ala ɩn ba bʊɔrɔ ɩka n maala ɛ, n sɔɔ naa ɩka a nɛbinãa ɩn vɩla.
An ben be a lɛ, a ba ɩ maa mãɛ lɛ bɔ̃ɔn tɩ ɩrɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a yelbier 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na be a n pɔ lɛ ɩrɛ.
N bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka yelvɩla jaa ba be a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a maa yelbier ãgãn tɛɛ lɛ. Bojũu n ma bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka n maal vɩla tɩ naa maa tʊ̃ɔ maal ɛ.
Bojũu a ala ɩn maala ba ɩ a vɩla ala ɩn bʊɔrɔ a maalfʊ ɛ. Kai, a bier ala ɩn ba bʊɔrɔ a maalfʊ lɛ, ala lɛ n ma maala.
Pʊ̃pãanyã, ala ɩ n maala naa a ala ɩn ba bʊɔrɔ ɩka n maal ɛ, a ba lɛ ɩ maa lɛ lɛ maala go ɛ, tɩchɛ a yelbier 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na be a n 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ maala.
Lɛ lɛ, n nyɛn a lɛ a nɛbinãa na tʊ̃nɔ̃, maa wa bʊɔrɔ ɩka n maal vɩla, a yelbier lɛ ma tɔɔ gbʊr ma jaa yɛ̃ yɛ̃.
N bʊɔrɔ naa Nãaŋmɩn nɛbinãa nɩ a n pʊɔ wʊ jaa,
tɩchɛ n nyɛ naa a nɛbinãa ãsʊɔ na tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a n ãgãn jiir amɩne. Wʊ jɛɛrɛ nɩ naa a n tɩɛr na wʊ maal ma ka n ɩ a yelbier nɩpɔɔraa a n ãgãn jiir pɔ.
Nɩjarma lɛ n pãa ɩ! An lɛ na faa ma yin a yelbier ãgãn nyã na chiine ma a kũu jie?
Nãaŋmɩn son puorfʊ tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ! A maa mãɛ a n tɩɛr pɔ, n ɩn a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ gbãgbaa, tɩchɛ a n yelbier ãgãn mɩ ɩ gbãgbaa kʊ a yelbier nɛɛ.
A lɛ jũu pʊ̃pãanyã, yele ba pɔɔrɔ a bala na be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
A tun a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ jũu, a nɛɛ 'lɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nyɛvʊr faa man yin a nɛɛ 'lɔ na ɩ yelbier nɩ kũu pɔ.

Bojũu a bon 'lɔ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ na ba dɔ̃ɔ tara kpɛ̃ɔ na maal ɛ, a sɩ yelbier ãgãn na bal bar, Nãaŋmɩn maal naa na wʊ tʊ̃ a wʊ mãɛ Bie a wʊ nyɛtãan a sɩn na maala a yelbier kaar a wʊ wa ɩ a yelbier bɔɔrlo bon. Lɛ lɛ wʊ sɔ̃ɔ yelbier a nɩsaal pɔ bar,
ka a lɛ a Mosesɩ nɛbinãa na bʊɔrɔ ka a sɛɛ a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, a sɩ kʊ̃ lɛ turo a lɛ a yelbier ãgãn na bʊɔrɔ ɛ, tɩ turo a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na bʊɔrɔ.
A bala na turo a ba yelbier ãgãn, ba den a ba tɩɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a ala na ɩ a ãgãn vɔlaa pɔ, tɩchɛ a bala mɩ na turo a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na bʊɔrɔ, mɩ den a ba tɩɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a ala a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na bʊɔrɔ.
Yelbier sʊɔ tɩɛr ɩn kũu, tɩchɛ a tɩɛr 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na so ɩn nyɛvʊr nɩ nyã'maar.
A yelbe-ɩrɛ tɩɛr ma 'laar Nãaŋmɩn, wʊ maa siir wʊ mãɛ kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ ɛ, wʊ mɩ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ɩ ɛ.
Bala na turo a lɛ a ba ãgãn na bʊɔrɔ, kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ pɛl Nãaŋmɩn pʊɔ ɛ.

Yɩn 'lɔ ba lɛ turo a lɛ a yelbier ãgãn na bʊɔrɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ turo naa a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na bʊɔrɔ, ala ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ben a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ. Ala ɩ ãsʊɔ jaa ba wa tara a Kɩrɩsɩto Sɩɛ ɛ, waa ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto tʊɔr ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ Kɩrɩsɩto ben a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, a yɩ ãgãn kpi naa a yelbier jũu, tɩchɛ ka a yɩ sɩɩr tara nyɛvʊr a yeltorsɩ jũu.
Ala ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'lɔ na sãɩ a Yesu a kũu pɔ, ben a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, 'lɔ na sãɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto a kũu pɔ, na kʊn a yɩ ãgãn kũn nyɛvʊr tu a wʊ Sɩɛ pɔ, a 'lɔ na be a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A lɛ jũu n yɛɛr, sɩ din sãn, tɩchɛ a ba ɩ a sɩ yelbier ãgãn nyã lɛ ɛ, a sɩn turo a lɛ wʊn bʊɔrɔ ɛ.
Bojũu ala ɩ yɩ turo naa a lɛ a yɩ yelbier ãgãn na bʊɔrɔ, yɩn kpi naa, tɩchɛ ala ɩ yɩ den a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʊ̃n a ãgãn ma maal bidɛbɛ bar, yɩ ben a nyɛvʊr sɔr pɔ.
Bojũu bala jaa a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na chiine, bala lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir.
A ba ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wʊn kʊ yɩ, waa maala yɩ gbãgbaar ka a dãbãɛ kʊrɔ yɩ go ɛ, tɩchɛ wʊ kʊ yɩn a wʊ Sɩɛ a yɩ lɩɛb a wʊ bibiir. A Sɩɛ nyã lɛ sɩ ma de bʊɔlɔ wʊ, “N Sãa Nãaŋmɩn.”
A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ mãɛ din dãasɩɛ nɩ a sɩ sɩɩr ɩka sɩ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn bibiir.
Pʊ̃pãanyã, ala ɩ sɩ ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn bibiir, sɩn lɛ so a bʊ̃sʊ̃n ala a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a wʊ nɛɛ, 'matãan a Kɩrɩsɩto. Ala ɩ sɩrɛ jaa, sɩ lɔ̃ɔn wʊn di a wʊ dɔɔyɛ, lɛ lɛ sɩ mɩn 'matãan wʊ põ a wʊ tɩɩr.
N man nyɛ a sɩ dɩna dɔɔyɛ ka waa jã bon ɛ, ɩn de man a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr 'lɔ na wa nyɩr a sɩ sɛ̃.
A bʊ̃maalsɩ a jaa nyʊnyʊlɔ naa chɩlɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir wʊn wa vɛ̃ a ba nyɩrɛ.
Bojũu a bʊ̃maalsɩ a jaa ben a ãgãn sal pĩlem an ba ɩ a ba mãɛ bɔfʊ ɛ,
tɩ ɩ a 'lɔ na maal ba bɔfʊ, na wʊ chɛnɛ tara ba nɩ tɩɛr sʊ̃, ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn na wa faa ban yin a gbãgbaa 'lɔ na sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ kpɛ a mãɛ sofʊ 'lɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir tɩɩr pɔ.
Bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa a bʊ̃maalsɩ a jaa na hʊ̃nɔ̃, ka a ɔɔrɔ ba fɩka pɔɔ na dɔɔrɔ yi a lɛ daar jaa wa tãn a dɩna.
A ba ɩ lɛ tɛɛ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɩn mãɛ lɛ tara a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʊfʊ bidɔ̃ɔ, mɩ ʊrɔ a sɩ pʊɔm na sɩ nyʊnyʊlɔ chɛlɛ nɩ wʊn wa lɩɛb sɩ a wʊ bibiir, nɩ a faafʊ wʊn wa faan a sɩ ãgãma.
A tɩɛrtɔ nyãna jũu lɛ sɩ nyɛn a faafʊ. Tɩchɛ bon fʊn nyɛn nɩbir, fʊ maa lɛ tara a wʊ tɩɛr go ɛ. An lɛ ma tɩɛrɛ bon wʊn tara baar?
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ sɩ tɩɛrɛ na bon sɩn ba tara sɛrɛ ɛ, sɩ ma din kãnyir chɛlɛ.
A lɛ nɩ wʊ ju mɩ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ma sʊ̃nɔ̃ sɩ a sɩ balfʊ pɔ. Saa bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ sɩn taa ma sʊɔr a Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ mãɛ lɛ ma de hʊ̃ʊnfʊ 'lɔ sɩn kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ man a 'yɛrbie ɛ, na wʊ ma sʊɔrɔ kʊrɔ sɩ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ma chɛl a sɩ nyãa bɔ̃ɔn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tɩɛr, bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nyãna lɛ sʊɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊrɔ a wʊ nɩbɛ nɩ a lɛ wʊn bʊɔrɔ.
Sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a yele a jaa pɔ, Nãaŋmɩn ma tʊ̃n ka a ɩ sʊ̃ kʊ a bala na nʊ̃ wʊ, a bala wʊn tu a wʊ tɩɛr pɔ bʊɔl.
Bojũu bala a Nãaŋmɩn na de nie bɔ̃ɔn na wʊ chɛl ir ka ba lɩɛb kaara a wʊ Bie kaar, ka wʊn ɩ a yɛɛr ba jaa pɔ Bidadɔ̃ɔ.
A bala wʊn de nie ir, bala lɛ wʊ bʊɔl, a bala wʊn bʊɔl, bala lɛ wʊ vɛ̃ ka a ba yele tor, a bala mɩ wʊn vɛ̃ ka a ba yele tor, bala mɩ lɛ wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ tɩɩr.
Bo lɛ sɩn pãa 'yɛr nɩ a yele nyãna? Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn ben a sɩ sɛ̃, an lɛ na tʊ̃ɔ jɛb sɩ?
A 'lɔ na ba mɔ̃ɔ sɩ a wʊ mãɛ bie ɛ, tɩchɛ na wʊ sɔɔ bar sɔr ka ba kʊ wʊ a sɩ jũu, bo lɛ na ŋmaa wʊ sɔr ka wʊ kʊ̃ de a wʊ wãɛfʊ 'matãan a bomo a jaa kʊ sɩ ɛ?
An lɛ na tʊ̃ɔ 'yɛr 'yɛr dɔɔl a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na ir? Nãaŋmɩn mãɛ lɛ maal ba a ba tor.
An 'lɔ lɛ na tʊ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba 'yɛr? Nɩrɛ jaa ba be be ɛ. A Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nyã na kpi, 'lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn mɩ sãɩ ka wʊ ir ɩ vʊr na wʊ ara Nãaŋmɩn nũsʊ̃ɔ jie, 'lɔ lɛ sʊɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn kʊrɔ sɩ.
An lɛ na tʊ̃ɔ tɔɔ sɩ yin a Kɩrɩsɩto nʊ̃fʊ nyã pɔ? Wõm, bɩɩ wʊʊr, bɩɩ gefʊ, bɩɩ kɔ̃, bɩɩ sal'mʊɔr, bɩɩ dɔɔyɛ, bɩɩ ban na kʊ sɩ nɩ sʊɔ?
Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, “A yɩ jũu, sɩ ma tuor kũu bɩbir jaa. Ba ma kaa sɩn fɩka piir ban chiine nɩ kɔkɔɛ ŋmafʊ jie.”
Kai, a anyãna a jaa pɔ, sɩ ɩ naa tʊ̃tʊ̃ɔnbɔ tu a 'lɔ na nʊ̃ sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Bojũu n bɔ̃ɔn sɩrɛ jaa ɩka kũu, bɩɩ nyɛvʊr, bɩɩ malakasɩ, bɩɩ a sɩdɛbɛ, bɩɩ ka dɩna lɛ, bɩɩ nɩdaar, bɩɩ ka kpãɛn dẽme lɛ,
ka dofʊ lɛ, bɩɩ suufʊ lɛ, bɩɩ bon jaa na be a bʊ̃maalsɩ pɔ lɛ, ãsʊɔ jaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ tɔɔ sɩ yin a nʊ̃fʊ a Nãaŋmɩn na nʊ̃ sɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Yelmãɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, n ba ŋmara jirsɩ ɛ, a n tɩɛr mɩ din dãasɩɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pɔ.
Nɩbaal kpɛ man tɩ põn bar, ka wʊʊr sɛɛ ma a nyãa.
An taa nʊ̃mɔ̃ ma naa ɩka n ben pɔ'yɔ̃ɔfʊ pɔ naa ba lɛ pʊɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ ɛ, a n yɛɛr Isɩral nɩbɛ jũu, bala lɛ ɩ a n mãɛ nɩbɛ.
A Isɩral nɩbɛ bala lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn de ka ba ɩ a wʊ bibiir, na wʊ kʊ ba a wʊ tɩɩr nɩ a nɛtɩrsɩ wʊn pɔn ba, na wʊ kʊ ba a nɛbinãa, nɩ a lɛ ban na puoro wʊ a wʊ puorfʊ yir nɩ a nɛɛr wʊn tɩr kʊ ba.
Bala lɛ ɩ a sãakpãmɩne, a ba pɔ lɛ ba bɩɛr a Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ na ɩ a nɩsaal yi, na wʊ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn kaara a bomo a jaa, 'lɔ lɛ ban pɛɛrɛ bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
A ba ɩ fɩka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ɩn faa ɛ, bojũu a ba ɩ a bala jaa ban dɔɔ a Isɩral nɩbɛ pɔ, ba jaa lɛ ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ɛ.
A ba ɩ baa yi a wʊ par pɔ ɛ, ba jaa baa ɩ Abraham bibiir ɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr nɛɛ kʊ a Abraham ɩka, “Isaakɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a fʊ yɔn na yi.”
A ba ɩ a ãgãn vaar bibiir lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir ɛ, tɩchɛ a bibiir bala a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a nɛɛ a wʊ dɔɔ, bala lɛ wʊ kaa a ba ɩ Abraham bibiir.
Bojũu nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ 'yɛr, “A daar wa ta, ɩn lɩɛb wa ka a Saara dɔɔ dabile.”
A ba ɩ anyã tɛɛ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a Worbɛka dɔɔn dabil ayi ka ba sãa ɩ bʊ̃'yen tɛɛ na ɩ a sɩ sãakpã Isaakɩ.
Sɛrɛ tɩ ka wʊ wa dɔɔ a yɩbɛ banyãna, baa mɩ maal yele jaa vɩla bɩɩ dɛɛr ɛ, tɩ nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a ɩ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʊ pɔ lɛ wʊ ma tu ir a nɩrɛ.
A kʊ̃ ɩ a fʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃ jũu ɛ, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ na bʊɔl fʊ. Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊ a Worbɛka, “A yɛkarma na tʊ̃nɔ̃ na kʊrɔ a yɛbile.”
Lɛ mɩ lɛ a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, “N nʊ̃n Jekɔb tɩchɛ naa 'laar a Esau.”
Bo lɛ sɩn pãa lɛ 'yɛr? Nãaŋmɩn ɩn nɩfɩlefɩle bɩɩ? Kai. Sɔr ba be be ɛ!
Bojũu wʊ 'yɛr kʊ a Mosesɩ, “Nɩrɛ 'lɔ ɩn na kaa nɩbaal lɛ ɩn na kaa nɩbaal, naa maal vɩla kʊ a 'lɔ ɩn na maal vɩla kʊ.”
A lɛ jũu a ba ɩ lɛ nɩrɛ na bʊɔrɔ ɛ, bɩɩ na tʊ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a yin Nãaŋmɩn nɩbaal kaafʊ pɔ.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʊ a Ijipitɩ nãa Faaro ɩka yaa, “Maa lɛ bin fʊ a yele nyãna jũu, ɩka n wiil a n kpɛ̃ɔ a fʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka ban bʊɔl a n yuor a wɛr wʊ jaa.”
A lɛ jũu, Nãaŋmɩn ma kãan nɩrɛ 'lɔ wʊn bʊɔrɔ nɩbaal, a 'lɔ wʊ mɩn bʊɔrɔ, wʊ ma vɛ̃n ka a wʊ nyãa kpɛ̃mɛ.
Ɩ̃sʊɔ na sʊʊr ma naa ɩka, “Bo lɛ so ka a Nãaŋmɩn na de yele dɔɔl sɩ? Bojũu nɩrɛ jaa kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ tɔr a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʊɔrɔ ɛ?”
Tɩchɛ fʊ̃ʊ mɩ nɩ ana, nɩsaal na fʊn 'yɛr lɩɛr Nãaŋmɩn? “Laa na tʊ̃ɔn sʊʊr a 'lɔ na mɛ wʊ ɩka, ‘Bo lɛ fʊ mɛ ma a nɩtɔ̃ ɔ?’ ”
A lamɩɛrɛ ba tara sɔr ɩka wʊ de a yɔɔr bʊ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ mɛn bʊ̃ʊdʊʊ tɩchɛ mɛn ladiraa ɛ?
Bo lɛ, ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kaa ir ɩka wʊ wiil a wʊ suur na wʊ vɛ̃ a ba bɔ̃ɔn a wʊ kpɛ̃ɔ, tɩ na wʊ chɛnɛ tara kãnyir nɩ a bonsɩ ala wʊn chɔɔr gun a sɔ̃ɔ barfʊ?
Bo lɛ, ala ɩ wʊ maal a nɩtɔ̃ ɩka a bonsɩ ala na ɩ a wʊ nɩbaal bomo, ka a bɔ̃ɔn a wʊ tɩɩr tɔ̃nɔ̃, a bala wʊn de nie chɔɔr gun a wʊ tɩɩr,
a sɩn gba wʊ mɩ na bʊɔl, na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ na wʊ bʊɔl a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ mɩ?
Nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ ka a wʊ 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Hosea sɛb a wʊ gãn pɔ, “Ɩn bʊɔl ban a maa nɩbɛ, a bala na ba ɩ a n nɩbɛ ɛ, naa bʊɔl wʊ a n nɩ nʊ̃ naa, 'lɔ na ba dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a n nɩ nʊ̃ naa ɛ.”
Ka wʊ sɛb a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ an ɩ a jie 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ wʊn 'yɛr ɩka, “Yaa ɩ a n nɩbɛ ɛ, bala naa lɛ ban lɛ bʊɔl a Nãaŋmɩn vʊr bibiir.”
Isaiya mɩ dɔ̃ɔ mʊɔl a Isɩral nɩbɛ na wʊ 'yɛr, “Ala ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ gba waan fɩka man nɛɛ bire, a bãlãa bala na wa chɛ, lɛ na nyɛ faafʊ.
Bojũu a sɩ Soro na pɔɔn naa a wʊ 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ na wʊ ŋmaa a ju.”
Isaiya dɔ̃ɔn de nie 'yɛr, “Ala ba ɩ a sɩ Soro na ɩ a gãdaa jaa gãdaa sʊɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ bar a sɩ par ŋmaa ɛ, sɩn taa mɩ nyʊɔl kaara a Sodom nɩ a Gomora tẽn kaar.”
Bo lɛ sɩn pãa lɛ 'yɛr? A bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, na ba dɔ̃ɔ turo a yeltorsɩ ɛ, bala lɛ be tara yaa. A ba yele tor naa ban tara sɔɔfʊ jũu.
Tɩchɛ a Isɩral nɩbɛ na turo a yeltorsɩ ba tara yaa ɛ,
Bo lɛ so? Bojũu baa turo nɩ sɔɔfʊ ɛ, tɩ turo nɩ tʊ̃mɔ̃, na ba bãr a kʊsɩr bãraa.
Nɩtãa lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ a wʊ 'yɛr, “Nyɛ, n bin a kʊsɩr be a Jiyon ka nɩbɛ na bãra nɩ a pie 'lɔ na vɛ̃ ka ba loro, ka nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔɔ de wʊ, vã kʊ̃ kpɛ wʊ ɛ.”
N yɛɛr, lɛ a n nyãa na bʊɔrɔ ka n sʊɔrɔ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ɩka, a Isɩral nɩbɛ ba nyɛ faafʊ.
Bojũu ɩn tʊ̃ɔn di a ba dãasɩɛ ɩka ba tara na nɩbijɩɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn yele, tɩchɛ bɔ̃ɔfʊ lɛ ba pʊɔ a ba nɩbijɩɛ pɔ ɛ.
Ban ba bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn yeltorsɩ ɛ, tɩ na ba bʊɔrɔ ɩka ba bin a ba mãɛ yeltorsɩ, baa siir ba mãɛ kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn yeltorsɩ ɛ.
Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ ɩ a nɛbinãa tɛɛfʊ jie, ka nɩrɛ jaa na sɔɔ de wʊ, wʊn vɛ̃n ka a nɩnyɩnɛ yele tor.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Mosesɩ man a lɛ a nɛbinãa na ma vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ yele tor, “A nɩrɛ 'lɔ na maala a lɛ a nɛbinãa na 'yɛr, na tara na nyɛvʊr.”
Tɩchɛ a yeltorsɩ ala na yire a sɔɔfʊ pɔ 'yɛr naa, “Ta tɩɛr a fʊ nyãa pɔ sʊʊr ɩka, ‘An lɛ na do a saaju?’
Bɩɩ sʊʊr a fʊ mãɛ ɩka, ‘An lɛ na chen a kpĩi tẽe?’ ”
Tɩchɛ bo lɛ a 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ? “A 'yɛr gbʊr fʊ naa, a ben a fʊ nɛɛ pɔ, naa be a fʊ nyãa pɔ.”
Ala ɩ fʊ haan a fʊ nɛɛ chiir a fʊ pʊɔ 'yɛr ɩka, “A Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ ɩ a Soro,” na fʊ sɔɔn a fʊ nyãa wʊ jaa ɩka, Nãaŋmɩn ir wʊn a kũu pɔ, fʊn nyɛn faafʊ.
Bojũu a fʊ nyãa 'lɔ fʊn sɔɔ den lɛ na vɛ̃ ka a fʊ yele tor, ka a fʊ nɛɛ 'lɔ fʊn haan 'yɛr lɛ na faafʊ.
Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, “Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔɔ de wʊ, vã kʊ̃ kpɛ wʊ ɛ.”
Bojũu tɛɛ taa ba be a Juu nɩrɛ nɩ a 'lɔ na ba ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ɛ. A Soro bʊ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ɩ ba jaa Soro, na wʊ sʊ̃nɔ̃ a bala jaa na bʊɔlɔ a wʊ yuor.
Bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, “Bala jaa na bʊɔlɔ a Soro yuor ɩka wʊ sʊ̃ʊ ba, na nyɛn faafʊ.”
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ban ɩrɛ wa bʊɔl a Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ ban ba sɔɔ ɛ? Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ban ɩ wa sɔɔ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ ban ba wõ a wʊ 'yɛr ɛ? Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ban ɩrɛ wa wõ a wʊ 'yɛr ka nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ ba wa mʊɔl a wʊ 'yɛr kʊ ba ɛ?
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ban ɩrɛ wa mʊɔl ka baa tʊ̃ ba ɛ? Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, “Nyɛ lɛ a bala na waara nɩ a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ gbɛɛ na vɩɛlɛ ka.”
Tɩchɛ a ba ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ba jaa lɛ lɩɛb kaa a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã ɛ. Bojũu Isaiya dɔ̃ɔ sʊʊr, “Sɩ Soro, an lɛ sɔɔ de a sɩ 'yɛr?”
Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ ɩka 'yɛr fʊn ma wõ pɔ lɛ fʊ ma sɔɔ, ka a 'yɛrbie ala ban wõ ɩn a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr.
Tɩchɛ ka n sʊʊr, a mɔ̃ baa wõ naa ɛ? Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ ba wõ naa naa. “A ba kɔkɔr yin de jie wʊ jaa, ka a ba 'yɛr tɩ ta a wɛr tɛɛfʊ jie.”
N lɛ sʊʊr kaa go, a mɔ̃ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ba bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ? Mosesɩ dɔ̃ɔ de nie 'yɛr, “A bala na ba ɩ paal ɛ, ɩn maal ba naa ka nyuur kpɛ yɩ, naa lɛ maal a paal 'lɔ na ba bɔ̃ɔ bon jaa ɛ, ka suur kpɛ yi.”
Ka Isaiya mɩ ba dɔ̃ɔ jo dãbãɛ ɛ, tɩ 'yɛr ɩka, “A bala na ba dɔ̃ɔ yʊɔrɔ bʊɔrɔ ma ɛ, ba nyɛ ma naa, n wiil naa n mãɛ kʊ a bala na ba dɔ̃ɔ sʊrɔ ma ɛ.”
Tɩchɛ a Isɩral nɩbɛ 'lɔ, nɩtɔ̃ lɛ wʊ 'yɛr, “Bɩbir jaa lɛ n ma tur a n nuur bʊɔlɔ a bibawõnsɩ nɩ a nɩdɛbɛ, na turo a sɔɩ ala na ba vɩɛlɛ ɛ bʊɔrɔ a ba mãɛ tɩɛrsɩ bʊ̃bʊɔrsɩ.”
N pãa sʊʊr naa, a Nãaŋmɩn ben tɔr a wʊ nɩbɛ bar bɩɩ? Kai! A maa mãɛ ɩn a Isɩral nɩrɛ, naa ɩ a Abraham yɔ̃ɔ yi a Benjamin bʊrɔ pɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn ba tɔr a wʊ nɩbɛ bar ɛ, bala lɛ wʊ de nie bɔ̃ɔ. Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr, lɛ a Elaija na dɔ̃ɔ sʊɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn waala dɔɔlɔ a Isɩral nɩbɛ,
“N Soro, ba kʊn a fʊ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ, na ba wɛl a fʊ bɔɔr lofʊ jiir bar. Maa tɛɛ lɛ chɛ, tɩ a ba bʊɔrɔ a n kʊfʊ.”
Bo lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʊ a Elaija? Wʊ 'yɛr naa, “N chɛnɛ na tara nɩbɛ tur ata kɔɔr anũu (7,000) na ba gbur dumo puor a tɩɩ Baal ɛ.”
Lɛ mɩ lɛ a dɩna, nɩbɛ bamɩne chɛ naa ka Nãaŋmɩn na ir ba a wʊ wãɛfʊ jũu.
Ala be ɩ a wãɛfʊ jũu lɛ, a ba lɛ ɩ tʊ̃mɔ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ go ɛ, ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, a wãɛfʊ kʊ̃ lɛ ɩ wãɛfʊ lɛ go ɛ.
Bo pãa lɛ? A ala a Isɩral nɩbɛ na bʊɔrɔ nɩbijɩɛ baa nyɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na ir lɛ nyɛ. Ka a bala na chɛ kpɛ̃mɛ a ba nyãa.
Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, “Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃n ka ba ɩ jaa bũrtũm wa tãn a dɩna. A ba nɩbie ala maa tʊ̃ɔ nyɛ bon ɛ, ka a ba tobo ala maa tʊ̃ɔ wõ 'yɛr ɛ.”
A Nãa David mɩ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a ba 'yɛr a wʊ gãn pɔ, “Vɛ̃ ka a ba bʊ̃diir difʊ jie ka a lɩɛb bʊ̃nyɔɔrsɩ nɩ chɛɛr, ka a ɩ a ba bãr lofʊ jie nɩ a ba sãyar.
A ba nɩbie a jɔ̃ɔ, a ba kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ nyɛ jaa ɛ, na ba kab gʊ̃mɔ̃ kʊ̃ lɛ tʊ̃ɔ dɔl ɛ.”
N lɛ sʊʊr go, ba ben bãr na lo na ba kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ ir jaa ɛ? A ba ɩ lɛ ɛ. A ba maal bɔrfʊ jũu, a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, nyɛn faafʊ ka nyuur na kpɛ a Isɩral nɩbɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a ba maal bɔrfʊ vɛ̃n ka a wɛr wʊ jaa le, ka a ba bɔrfʊ mɩ le a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, a bala mãɛ wa pʊɔ ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an kaara!
Yɩn na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʊrɔ, an ben ɩka maa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn ir tʊ̃ a yɩ pɔ, ka n ɩ a nɩtʊ̃nãa a yɩn na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ. N mʊ̃ɔn nɩbir nɩ a tʊ̃mɔ̃ nyã.
A maa tɩɛr lɛ ɩka nyuur wʊ kpɛ a maa mãɛ nɩbɛ ka n tʊ̃ɔ a bamɩne faa.
Bojũu ala ɩ a ba tɔr barfʊ ɩn 'maalfʊ kʊ a wɛr, ka a Nãaŋmɩn lɛ wa de ba, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an kaara, a kʊ̃ kaara fɩka nɩrɛ na yi kũu pɔ tara nyɛvʊr ɛ?
Ala ɩ fʊ den a paanʊ̃dɔ̃ɔ kʊ Nãaŋmɩn, a paanʊ̃ɔ ala na chɛ, a jaa ɩn chɛchɛ. Ala ɩ fʊ den a tɩɛ nyɩɩr kʊ Nãaŋmɩn, a tɩɛ wilsɩ mɩ ɩn chɛchɛ.
Ala ɩ ba 'mɛl a tɩɛ mãɛ wile ãsʊɔ bar tɩ ŋmaa a yɩn na ɩ a mʊɔ pɔ tɩɛ wile wa mar ka yɩ 'mataa tɔɔrɔ nyuro a kɔ̃bʊ̃'yen yire a tɩɛ ãgãn pɔ nʊ̃ɔnɔ̃,
taa tɩɛr ɩka fʊ sa naa a wilsɩ ala ɛ. Fʊ̃ʊ wa 'mɔɔrɔ fʊ mãɛ, lɩɛb tɩɛr kaa ɩka a ba ɩ a fʊ̃ʊ na ɩ a wile lɛ tuo a nyɩbɛ ɛ, tɩ a nyɩbɛ lɛ tuo a fʊ̃ʊ na ɩ a wile.
Yɩn 'yɛr yɩn pãa na 'yɛr nɩ nyã, “Ba 'mɛl a wilsɩ ala bar tɩ pãa na de ma mar.”
A lɛ ɩn yelmãɛ, tɩchɛ ba dɔ̃ɔ 'mɛl ba bar a ba ba sɔɔfʊ jũu, tɩchɛ ka a yɩn ara nɩ sɔɔfʊ. Yɩ ta bʊɔrɔ yuor ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ joro dãbãɛ.
Bojũu ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn ba dɔ̃ɔ bar a tɩɛ mãɛ wilsɩ ɛ, wʊ kʊ̃ bar a yɩn mɩ ɛ.

Yɩ tɩɛr kaa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a maal vɩla sʊɔ ka a wʊ yele mɩ kpɛ̃mɛ, a wʊ yele kpɛ̃mɛ na kʊ a bala na lo, tɩchɛ na wʊ maal vɩla kʊ a yɩn, ala ɩ yɩ chɛnɛ na chiine a wʊ maal vɩla pɔ. Ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, wʊn ŋmaa yɩn bar.
Ala wa ɩ ba tɛɛn a ba baal bar, Nãaŋmɩn na tʊ̃ɔn de ba lɛ mar a tɩɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ, Nãaŋmɩn na tʊ̃ɔn lɛ de ba mar a lɛ go.
Yɩ kaa, ala ɩ a yɩn ban ŋmaa yin a mʊɔ pɔ tɩɛ pɔ wa mar a yir tɩɛ ban sɛl, an lɛ ɩn tuo a yir tɩɛ wilsɩ ala ban dɔ̃ɔ 'mɛl bar marfʊ bɩɩ?

N ba bʊɔrɔ ɩka n vɛ̃ ka a yelsɔɔlaa nyã sɔɔl a yɩn na ɩ a n yɛɛr tɩ ba ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ɛ, ka yɩ taa bʊɔrɔ yuor nɩ a yele nyã ɛ. A Isɩral nɩbɛ tara na a nyãkpãɛn a lɛ nɛ na tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a bala na ba ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ɛ, na wa tɩ nyɛ a faafʊ baar.
Lɛ lɛ na ɩ tɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ba jaa pãa nyɛ faafʊ nɩtãa lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, “Fafaara na yin be a Jiyon wa, na wʊ wa lɩɛb tɩɛr jaa na ba vɩɛlɛ ɛ, yin a Jekɔb bal nɩbɛ pɔ bar.
A nɛtɩraa lɛ a nyãna ɩn na tara nɩ ba, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn wa de a ba yeldɛbɛ a jaa bar.”
Fʊ̃ʊ kaa, a 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ nyã vɛ̃n ka ba ɩ Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃dẽme a yɩn na sɔɔ de jũu. Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a irfʊ pɔ mɩ lɛ, bala lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nʊ̃ yɔɔ a ba sãakpãmɩne jũu.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn kʊfʊ nɩ a wʊ bʊɔlfʊ kʊ̃ tʊ̃ɔ lɩɛb jaa ɛ.
Nɩtãa lɛ a yɩn mɩ na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, na yaa dɔ̃ɔ wõnõ a Nãaŋmɩn toor ɛ, tɩchɛ pʊ̃pãanyã yɩ nyɛn a wʊ nɩbaal a ba bawõfʊ jũu.
Lɛ lɛ a bala mɩ na ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ, ba mɩ lɩɛb ɩ bawõnsɩ, na ba pãa mɩ na nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbaal a pʊ̃pãanyã, nɩtãa lɛ a sɩn mɩ na nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbaal.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn pɔɔn a nɩbɛ ba jaa a bawõnsɩ die pɔ, na wʊn tʊ̃ɔ kaa ba jaa nɩbaal.
Nyɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn lefʊ na suu jã. A wʊ yɛ̃ nɩ a wʊ bɔ̃ɔfʊ ba gbʊr ɛ! A wʊ 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ ba be bɔ̃ɔfʊ ɛ. A wʊ sɔɩ mɩ ba be bɩɛrfʊ ɛ!
“An lɛ dɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro tɩɛr? Bɩɩ an lɛ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a wʊ 'yɛr sʊ̃nɔ̃.”
“An lɛ dɔ̃ɔ de nie kʊ Nãaŋmɩn bon, ka wʊ pãa wa yara a sãn?”
Bojũu wʊ jie lɛ a bomo a jaa yi. 'Lɔ lɛ maal a jaa, na wʊ so a bonsɩ a jaa. 'Lɔ lɛ so a tɩɩr bɩbir nɩ bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
A lɛ jũu, n sʊɔrɔ yɩ naa yɛɛr, a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbaal nyã jũu, yɩ de a yɩ mãɛ na ɩ bʊ̃nɩbie lon bɔɔr kʊ Nãaŋmɩn. A ɩn chɛchɛ naa pɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn pʊɔ. Lɛ lɛ ɩ a puorfʊ na tara par.

Yɩ taa lɛ wa lɩɛrɛ maala a lɛ a wɛr nɩbɛ na maala go ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ maala a lɛ na lɩɛrɛ yɩ a tɩɛr paalaa nyã yɩn nyɛ. Yɩn pãa tʊ̃ɔn bɛɛr na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʊ, a ala na ɩ vɩla naa pɛlɛ a wʊ pʊɔ naa ɩ chɛchɛ.

A Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ nyã wʊn wãɛ ma jũu, n sʊɔrɔ naa a yɩ ãsʊɔ jaa ɩka, ta tɩɛr a yɩ mãɛ tɩ põn bar a lɛ yɩn taa tɩɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ ma tɩɛr a yɩ mãɛ 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ nɩbijɩɛ jaa jã a sɔɔfʊ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na kʊ yɩ.
Nɩtãa lɛ a sɩ ãsʊɔ jaa na tara ãgãn tɩ ka a tara jidẽdẽme, a jidẽdẽme anyãna ba tʊ̃nɔ̃ tʊ̃bʊ̃'yen ɛ.
Lɛ mɩ lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ, a sɩn bala na ɩ yɔɔ tɩ lɔ̃ɔ ãgãn bʊ̃'yen pɔ, a jidẽdẽme anyã a jaa 'mantaa tʊ̃nɔ̃.
Sɩ jaa tara na kʊfʊsɩ na tɛɛ taa, tu a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ wʊn wãɛn sɩ. Ala ɩ a ãsʊɔ kʊfʊ ɩn a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr 'yɛrfʊ lɛ, wʊ ma 'yɛrɛ jã a lɛ a wʊ sɔɔfʊ na ta.
Ka ala ɩ tʊ̃mɔ̃ tʊ̃fʊ mɩ lɛ, vɛ̃ ka wʊ ma tʊ̃nɔ̃, ala ɩ wiilfʊ mɩ lɛ, vɛ̃ ka wʊ ma wile.

Ala ɩ ãkpɛ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ lɛ, vɛ̃ ka wʊ ma 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a ãkpãɛn. Ka ala ɩ a wʊ kʊfʊ lɛ nɩbaalsɩ sʊ̃ʊfʊ, vɛ̃ ka wʊ ma sʊ̃nɔ̃ ba nɩ pʊpɛl. Ala ɩ nɩdiere tʊ̃mɔ̃ lɛ, vɛ̃ a wʊ ma mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a tʊ̃mɔ̃. Ala wa ɩ nɩbɛ 'maalfʊ tʊ̃mɔ̃ lɛ, wʊ ma maala a lɛ nɩ chɩlfʊ.
Nʊ̃fʊ wʊ ɩ yelmãɛ nʊ̃fʊ. 'Laar bon 'lɔ na ɩ dɛɛr, tɩ 'mar bon 'lɔ na ɩ sʊ̃.
Yɩ chɛlɛ taa yele, na yɩ de a yɛɛr nʊ̃fʊ nʊ̃n taa. Yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a yɩ taaba gar a yɩ mãɛ.
Yɩ ta ɩ nɩ tũtũlsɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ vɛ̃ ka a nʊ̃mɔ̃ yɩ a yɩ mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a sɩ Soro tʊ̃mɔ̃.
Yɩ chɩlɛ nɩ a yɩ tɩɛrtɔfʊ jie, na yɩ tara kãnyir a yɩ wõm pɔ, na yɩ tara yelmãɛ nɩ a yɩ Nãaŋmɩn sʊɔrfʊ pɔ.
Yɩ ma lɔ̃ɔ põn a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ bala na ba tara bon jaa ɛ, na yɩ ma diere sãanba a yɩ yie pɔ.
Na yɩ 'yɛrɛ nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bala na gere yɩ, na yɩ 'yɛr nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ ba, yɩ ta pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ɛ.
Yɩ chɩlɛ nɩ a bala na chɩlɛ, na yɩ mɩ pʊɔ a bala na kõnõ na yɩ kõnõ.
A yɩn nɩ a bala na kpɩɛrɛ, yɩ tara tɩɛr bʊ̃'yen. Yɩ ta kaara ba pɔrɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ sɔɔ 'matãan a nɩbɛ bala na ba jã yɩ ɛ. Yɩ ta kaa ɩka yɩn ɩn yɛ̃ dẽme ɛ.
Yɩ ta de bier yãan bier sãn ɛ. Yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʊ̃, na yɩ maala a ala na vɩɛlɛ nɩrɛ jaa niem.
Ala ɩ an tʊ̃ɔ naa, an ɩ yɩn mãɛ lɛ, yɩ tara nyã'maar nɩ a bala jaa yɩn lɔ̃ɔ kpɩɛrɛ nɩ.
N barmɩne, yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa yaara taa sãn ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ baraa kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn suur. Bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, “Maa lɛ so a sãn yaafʊ, ɩn lɩɛb yaa a sãn.” Lɛ lɛ a Soro 'yɛr.
Lɛ an na ɩ lɛ ɩka, “Ala ɩ kɔ̃ kpɛ̃n a fʊ dɔ̃sʊɔ, kʊ wʊ bʊ̃diir a wʊ di. Ala ɩ kɔ̃nyũur wa kpɛ wʊ naa, kʊ wʊ kʊ̃ɔ a wʊ nyũ. Fʊ̃ʊ be maala a nɩtɔ̃, an kaara fɩka bũu saalbie lɛ fʊ mʊ̃ɔ dɔɔl wʊ a jum.”
Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka bier tʊ̃ɔ yɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ de vɩla tʊ̃ɔn bier.
A yɩ ãsʊɔ jaa wʊ ma siir a wʊ mãɛ kʊ a paal nɩbɛrɛ, bojũu kpɛ̃ɔ jaa ba be be ka a ba ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ bin ɛ. Kpɛ̃ɔ sʊɔ jaa ba be be ka Nãaŋmɩn ba lɛ bin wʊ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na chɩrɛ nɩ a kpãɛn dẽme ba nyãna, a Nãaŋmɩn na bin ba lɛ wʊ chɩrɛ nɩ, ka a bala na ɩrɛ a lɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔn ba mãɛ 'yɛr.

Bojũu a kpãɛn dẽme maa diere bier dɔɔlɔ a bala na maala vɩla ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala na maala a dɛɛr lɛ ba ma de yele dɔɔlɔ. Fʊ bʊɔrɔ naa ɩka fʊ ta joro a kpãɛn dẽme dãbãɛ bɩɩ? Fʊ pãa maala a lɛ na vɩɛlɛ, ban dãna fʊ naa.

Bojũu wʊ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ ɩka wʊ maal fʊ vɩla. Tɩchɛ fʊ̃ʊ wa maal dɛɛr 'lɔ, vɛ̃ ka dãbãɛ kʊrɔ fʊ, a ba ɩ pɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ wʊ tara a sʊɔ ɛ. Nãaŋmɩn tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ lɛ wʊ ɩ na ara kʊ yeltorsɩ ɩka wʊ kpãana a bala na maala dɛɛr.
A lɛ jũu, a tara na sɔr ka yɩ siir yɩ mãɛ kʊ a kpãɛn dẽme, a ba ɩ ban na kpãa yɩ tɛɛ jũu ɛ, tɩchɛ an ɩ a yɩn mãɛ mɩ bɔ̃ɔ nyɔɔfʊ jũu.
A anyãna jũu lɛ so yɩn yara lõpoo kʊrɔ a kpãɛn dẽme na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn tʊ̃tʊ̃nbɔ na de a ba sɔ̃ɔ wʊ jaa tʊ̃nɔ̃ nɩ.
Nɩrɛ jaa sãn fʊn wa di, yab wʊ. Ka ala ɩ lõpoo lɛ faa yab ɛ, yab. Ka tẽmaal libie yabfʊ lɛ bɩɩ, yɩ ma yab, na yɩ joro a 'lɔ a jofʊ na sɛɛn, tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a 'lɔ mɩ a 'yɔ̃ɔfʊ na sɛɛn.
Yɩ taa pɛ̃nɛ taa libie ka sãn ma gã a yɩ chara pɔ ɛ, a sãn 'lɔ tɛɛ na gã a yɩ chara pɔ lɛ, nʊ̃fʊ yɩn na nʊ̃ nʊ̃ taa, bojũu nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na nʊ̃ a wʊ tɔ sʊɔ tun a lɛ a nɛbinãa na 'yɛr a jaa.
A 'yɛrbinsɩ lɛ a anyãna, “Ta sɛ̃ ɛ.” “Ta kʊ nɩrɛ ɛ.” “Ta ju nɩrɛ bon ɛ.” “Ta jɩɛlɛ nɩrɛ bon ɛ.”
Fʊ̃ʊ wa nʊ̃ nɩrɛ, faa maala wʊ bier ɛ. Ala lɛ so, fʊ̃ʊ wa tara nʊ̃fʊ, fʊ tu naa a lɛ jaa a Mosesɩ nɛɛ na 'yɛr.
Yɩ maala a nɩtɔ̃, bojũu yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa lɛ a dɩna sɔ̃ɔ nyã na kaara. A sɔ̃ɔ ta naa ɩka yɩ jɛɔ ir a yɩ gʊ̃ɔ pɔ, bojũu a sɩ faafʊ gbʊr jaa yɛ̃yɛ̃ gar a bɩbir 'lɔ sɩn dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ de.
A chɛn bãlãa ka a tãsɔɔ baar, tɩchɛ ka a ɩ a wɛr mɩ tɔ̃ɔ chaar a lɛ nɛ. Yɩ ɩ a sɩ yaar a tãsɔɔ bomo bar tɩ de a chãa bomo su.
Yɩ ɩ a sɩ kpɩɛrɛ jaa kãkar fɩka a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩbɛ, na sɩ ir sɩ mãɛ yin dãɛn bɔyuor pɔ, dãa buufʊ pɔ, sɛ̃sɛ̃yele pɔ, nɩ folaa ɩfʊ pɔ, bɩɩ gɔ̃mɔ̃ bɔfʊ nɩ nyuur pɔ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ de a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na yɩ su pɔɔ a yɩ mãɛ, na yɩ ta lɛ tɩɛrɛ ɩka yɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ a yɩ ãgãn vɔlaa na bʊɔrɔ go ɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ sɔɔfʊ na ba jã bon ɛ, yɩ ma sɔɔ de wʊ na yɩ ta tɔɔrɔ a wʊ yelbil 'yɛr ɛ.
Ɩ̃sʊɔ sɔɔfʊ ma vɛ̃n ka waa chire bon jaa ɛ, ka a ãsʊɔ sɔɔfʊ mɩ na bal ka 'lɔ mɩ dire jɛvai tɛɛ.
A nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba chire bon jaa ɛ, wʊ ta kaara a 'lɔ na ba dire a jaa pɔrɔ ɛ, a fʊ̃ʊ nyã mɩ na ba dire a jaa ɛ, ta kpɛrɛ a 'lɔ na dire a jaa ɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn de wʊ naa.
Fʊ̃ʊ mɩ nɩ ana na fʊn tɔɔr nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ 'yɛr? A wʊ mãɛ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃ ka wʊ ara na bɩɩ wʊ lo naa, wʊn lɛ ara na, bojũu a wʊ Soro na tʊ̃ɔn maal wʊ a wʊ ara.
Nɩrɛ ma kãan a bɩbir ãsʊɔ a wʊ gar ãsʊɔ, ka ãsʊɔ kaa a bɩbie a jaa ka a ɩ bʊ̃'yen. Ɩ̃sʊɔ jaa wʊ ma tɩɛr kaa a wʊ mãɛ tɩɛr pɔ.

Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na de a bɩbir ãsʊɔ a wʊ gar a jaa, wʊ ɩrɛ a lɛ a sɩ Soro jũu. 'Lɔ na ɔɔrɔ a nʊ̃n, wʊ ɔɔrɔ a sɩ Soro jũu, bojũu wʊ ma sʊɔr Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ. A 'lɔ mɩ na ba ɔɔrɔ ɛ, wʊ mɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ a sɩ Soro jũu, wʊ mɩ ma puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan.
Bojũu nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ jaa ba be be kʊ a wʊ mãɛ tɛɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ. Nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ jaa mɩ ba kpi kʊ a wʊ mãɛ tɛɛ ɛ.
Ala ɩ sɩ ben ka, sɩ ben be kʊ a sɩ Soro. Ala ɩ sɩ mɩ kpi naa, sɩ kpin kʊ a sɩ Soro. Ka sɩ chɛnɛ na vʊrɔ, bɩɩ sɩ kpi naa, a sɩ Soro lɛ so sɩ.
A anyãna jũu lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto kpi tɩ na wʊ lɛ ir ɩ vʊr, ɩka a wʊ ɩ a kũn nɩ a vʊɛ ba jaa Soro.
Fʊ̃ʊ mɩ, baa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ fʊ tɔɔrɔ a fʊ yɛbɛ 'yɛr, bɩɩ bo lɛ so ka fʊ kaara a fʊ yɛbɛ pɔrɔ? Bojũu sɩ jaa lɛ na ara a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ dakɔɔ par.
A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, “A sɩ Soro lɛ 'yɛr, ɩn ɩ vʊr jũu, a gbɛdumo a jaa na gbur a n niem, ka a kɔkɔr jaa haa 'yɛr ɩka maa lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn.”
Be lɛ a sɩ ãsʊɔ jaa na pãa 'yɛr a sɩ mãɛ 'yɛr kʊ a Nãaŋmɩn.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ɩ a sɩ bar a sɩ taaba 'yɛr tɔɔrfʊ, na sɩ lɩɛb a sɩ tɩɛr na sɩ ta ɩrɛ kʊsɩr bãraa kʊrɔ a sɩ taaba sɔɩ pɔ a ba ŋmiere loro ɛ.
A maa na be a sɩ Soro Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ, n sɔɔn sɩrɛ jaa ɩka bʊ̃diraa jaa ba ɩ dɛɛr a wʊ mãɛ ɛ. Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a nɩrɛ ãsʊɔ jaa wa kãan bon ɩka wʊ ɩn bʊ̃dɛɛr, a bʊ̃nyɩnɛ ɩn bʊ̃dɛɛr kʊ wʊ.
Ala wa ɩ a chɛn a fʊ yɛbɛ bʊ̃diraa kɔ̃ɔ fʊn di jũu, faa maala wile nɩ nʊ̃fʊ ɛ. Ta vɛ̃ ka a fʊ bʊ̃dirsɩ sɔ̃ɔ a fʊ yɛbɛ 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto na kpi ɛ.
Ta vɛ̃ ka a bon 'lɔ fʊ̃ʊ na bʊɔlɔ bʊ̃vɩla, ka nɩrɛ bʊɔl wʊ bʊ̃dɛɛr ɛ.
Bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʊ̃ʊ yele ba ɩ bʊ̃diir nɩ bʊ̃nyursɩ yele ɛ, tɩchɛ a ɩn torfʊ, nɩ nyã'maar nɩ a pʊpɛl na yi a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pɔ yele lɛ,
bojũu nɩrɛ jaa na tʊ̃nɔ̃ kʊrɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto tu a sɔr nyã pɔ, wʊ maala na a lɛ na pɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn pʊɔ, ka a nɩbɛ mɩ 'yɛrɛ a nɩnyɩnɛ 'yɛr vɩla.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ɩ a sɩ mʊ̃ɔ nɩbir, na sɩ maala a lɛ na waan nyã'maar a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔn taa ãkpãɛn.
Yɩ ta de bʊ̃diir yele sɔ̃ɔn a Nãaŋmɩn tʊ̃mɔ̃ bar ɛ. Bʊ̃diraa a jaa vɩɛlɛ naa, tɩchɛ a ɩn dɛɛr ala ɩ nɩrɛ din bon na vɛ̃ ka a wʊ tɔ sʊɔ lo.
A lɛ a sɛɛ naa ka nɩrɛ ta 'wɔb nʊ̃n ɛ, bɩɩ nyũ dãa ɛ, bɩɩ maal yele kɔ̃ɔ na vɛ̃ ka a wʊ tɔ sʊɔ lo ɛ.
Lɛ jaa fʊn bɔ̃ɔ a yelsɩ anyãna pɔ, bar ka a be a fʊ̃ʊ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn chara pɔ. Pʊpɛl sʊɔ lɛ a 'lɔ tɩɛr na ba 'yɔ̃ɔ wʊ yele nɩ a bonsɩ ala a 'lɔ mãɛ na 'yɛr ɩka a ɩ naa ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na dire nɩ baal, 'yɔ̃ɔn a wʊ mãɛ 'yɛr, bojũu waa dire nɩ sɔɔfʊ ɛ. Bon jaa mɩ na ba wa yi sɔɔfʊ pɔ ɛ, a ɩn bier.
Sɩn bala na kpɛ̃mɛ, a sɛɛ naa ka sɩ tuo a bala na ba kpɛ̃mɛ ɛ, na loro tuor, na sɩ ta pɛlɛ a sɩn mãɛ pʊʊr ɛ.
A sɩ ãsʊɔ jaa wʊ ma pɛlɛ a wʊ tɔ sʊɔ pʊɔ, na sɩ sʊ̃ʊ wʊ a wʊ mɩ ba nyɩbɛ.
Bojũu a Kɩrɩsɩto mãɛ gba mɩ ba dɔ̃ɔ pɛl a wʊ mãɛ pʊɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ a lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, “A tʊbie ala a bala na tʊfʊ, a wa dɔɔl a n ju.”
Bojũu a ala a jaa na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, a kõr jaa bin, a sɛb a sɩn wiilfʊ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a gãma anyãna kʊ sɩ kãnyir 'yɔ̃ɔn sɩ ãkpãɛn ka sɩ tara tɩɛrtɔfʊ jie.
A Nãaŋmɩn na kʊrɔ yɩ a kãnyir na wʊ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ yɩ a ãkpãɛn, wʊ kʊ yɩ nɛbʊ̃'yen ka yɩ turo nɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto.
Ka yɩ jaa 'mataa tara tɩɛr bʊ̃'yen na yɩ de nɛbʊ̃'yen 'yɔ̃ɔn a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr na ɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto Sãa.
Yɩ sɔɔ diere taa nɩtãa lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ na sɔɔ de yɩ, ka yɩn tʊ̃ɔ waan pɛɛfʊ wa kʊ Nãaŋmɩn.
N 'yɛrɛ na kʊrɔ yɩ ɩka, a Kɩrɩsɩto wa lɩɛb naa a Juu nɩbɛ tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn yelmãɛ jũu, na wʊ vɛ̃ ka a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a nɛɛ kʊ a sɩ Sãakpãmɩne ɩ yelmãɛ.
Ka a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, mɩ na tʊ̃ɔ kʊ Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr a wʊ nɩbaal jũu. Nɩtãa lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, “A lɛ jũu, ɩn dãnfʊ naa a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ sɛ̃, naa yiel yiel kʊ a fʊ yuor.”
A lɛ sɛb go, “A yɩn na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, yɩ 'matãan a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ chɩlɛ.”
A lɛ sɛb go, “A yɩn na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, yɩ pɛɛrɛ a sɩ Soro, na yɩ yiele pɛɛfʊ yiel kʊrɔ wʊ, a yɩn nɩbɛ ba jaa.”
Isaiya gba mɩ lɛ 'yɛr go a wʊ gãn pɔ, “A Jesɩ nyɩɩr na lɛ tɔ naa. 'Lɔ lɛ na ir na wʊ kaara a paalsɩ a jaa, na wʊ mɩ ɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, tɩɛrtɔfʊ jie.”
A Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a yɩ tɩɛrtɔfʊ sʊɔ, wʊ sɛɛ a yɩ nyãn nɩ chɩlfʊ, nɩ nyã'maar a lɛ yɩn sɔɔ wʊ, ka a yɩ tɩɛrtɔfʊ pãa ŋme yaar nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kpɛ̃ɔ.
N yɛɛr, maa mãɛ sɔɔ naa ɩka yɩ sɛɛn naa vɩla maalfʊ, na yɩ tara yɛ̃ na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ taa wiilfʊ.
N sɛb a da sɛɛr amɩne 'yɔ̃ɔ kʊ yɩ, ka a kaara fɩka n lɛ bɔ̃ɔ tɩɛr yɩ go, a Nãaŋmɩn wãɛfʊ wʊn kʊ ma

ka n ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tʊ̃tʊ̃nɔ̃ naa tʊ̃nɔ̃ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ jũu, naa sʊ̃nɔ̃ mʊɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʊ̃ɔ. Lɛ lɛ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, puorfʊ na tara par ka a Nãaŋmɩn sɔɔ de na wʊ oon ba nɩ a wʊ Sɩɛ.
Ɩn be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ jũu, a tʊ̃mɔ̃ ɩn tʊ̃nɔ̃ kʊrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn yin yuor.
N kʊ̃ wa 'la 'yɛr 'yɛr jaa ɛ, ka a ala a Kɩrɩsɩto na maal baar ba lɛ ɛ, tu a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ka a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, lɩɛrɛ wa wõnõ a Nãaŋmɩn toor, tu a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr nɩ a lɛ ɩn tʊ̃,
